cast: Akshay Kumar|Katrina Kaif|Nana Patekar|Anil Kapoor|Paresh Rawal
overview: Dubai-based criminal don Uday takes it upon himself to try and get his half-sister Sanjana married - in vain, as no one wants to be associated with a crime family. Uday's associate and best friend Majnu finds a well to do, nice young man, Rajiv, who lives with his maternal uncle and aunt - Dr. and Mrs. Ghunghroo. Through extortion he compels the Ghunghroos to accept this matrimonial alliance. With no escape from this predicament, the wedding is planned, with hilarious consequences.

title: Dostana
cast: Abhishek Bachchan|John Abraham|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Kirron Kher|Boman Irani
overview: Two straight guys pretend to be a gay couple to secure a posh Miami apartment, but fall for their gorgeous roommate. Hilarity ensues as they strive to convince everyone of the ruse while secretly trying to win her heart.

title: Housefull 4
cast: Akshay Kumar|Bobby Deol|Riteish Deshmukh|Kriti Sanon|Pooja Hegde
overview: Three couples who get separated from each other due to an evil ploy, reincarnate after 600 years and meet each other as history repeats itself again and their respective partners get mixed up this time.

title: Gully Boy
cast: Ranveer Singh|Alia Bhatt|Siddhant Chaturvedi|Vijay Raaz|Vijay Varma
overview: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Zero
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Katrina Kaif|Anushka Sharma|Tigmanshu Dhulia|Abhay Deol
overview: Short in stature but big on love, a bachelor meets two very different women who broaden his horizons and help him find purpose in life.

title: Barfi!
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Ileana D'Cruz|Saurabh Shukla|Jisshu Sengupta
overview: The heartwarming tale of Barfi, a charming deaf-mute young man from 1970s Darjeeling, and two unalike women who can't help but fall for him.

title: Paheli
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Rani Mukerji|Anupam Kher|Aditi Gowitrikar|Rajpal Yadav
overview: Kishanlal marries the beautiful Lachchi, but the day after the wedding, he leaves on business for five years. When Kishanlal reappears only a few days later, Lachchi is delighted, but this new Kishanlal is in fact a spirit who has taken the form of Lachchi's husband, after having seen her by chance and fallen in love with her. Four years later, the real Kishanlal returns and the townsfolk must determine who is who.

title: ABCD 2
cast: Prabhu Deva|Varun Dhawan|Shraddha Kapoor|Lauren Gottlieb|Pooja Batra
overview: Childhood friends Suresh and Vinnie want to become successful dancers. To fulfill their dreams, they form a dance group with their friends and compete in a hip-hop contest in Las Vegas.

title: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Shraddha Kapoor|Anubhav Singh Bassi|Dimple Kapadia|Boney Kapoor
overview: To earn extra cash, Mickey helps couples break up — but life gets complicated when he falls for Tinni, a career woman with an independent streak.

title: OMG: Oh My God!
cast: Paresh Rawal|Akshay Kumar|Mithun Chakraborty|Om Puri|Mahesh Manjrekar
overview: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

title: Karthik Calling Karthik
cast: Farhan Akhtar|Deepika Padukone|Ram Kapoor|Shefali Shah|Vivan Bhatena
overview: A much abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.

title: Dange
cast: Harshvardhan Rane|Ehan Bhat|TJ Bhanu|Nikita Dutta|Taniya Kalra
overview: Former friends Xavier and Yuva meet again in college as adversaries when their respective cohorts come to blows during their annual cultural festival.

title: Sarfira
cast: Akshay Kumar|Radhikka Madan|Paresh Rawal|R. Sarathkumar|Seema Biswas
overview: A young man from a remote village dreams of launching his own airline service. However, he must overcome several obstacles and challenges in order to be successful in his quest.

title: The Lunchbox
cast: Irrfan Khan|Nimrat Kaur|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Lillete Dubey|Nasirr Khan
overview: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system (Mumbai's Dabbawallahs) connects a young housewife to a stranger in the dusk of his life. They build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox. Gradually, this fantasy threatens to overwhelm their reality.

title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
cast: Salman Khan|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Akshay Kumar|Amrita Arora|Amrish Puri
overview: Sameer, fast at losing his temper is re-located to Goa where he falls in love with Rani. But Sameer's new roommate Sunny, has some plans of his own.

title: Jhalki
cast: Tannishtha Chatterjee|Boman Irani|Divya Dutta|Sanjay Suri|Yatin Karyekar
overview: A lyrical story of lost childhood, against the powerful backdrop of child slavery and human trafficking. It is a heart-rending but inspiring story of a nine-year old street-smart girl, Jhalki, in search of her seven-year old brother, Babu, who is suddenly thrown into an inhuman world of child labor with no respite from a terminally gloomy, dark and depressing workplace. Armed with an intimate folk tale of a tireless sparrow, her own ingenious efforts and her charming presence of mind, Jhalki manages her search and eventually free her brother, along with thousands of other enslaved children caught in this insidious practice, affecting over 200 million children worldwide.

title: Fiza
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Karisma Kapoor|Jaya Bachchan|Neha|Bikram Saluja
overview: In 1993 Fiza's brother disappears during the riots in Mumbai. In 1999 Fiza is tired of waiting and goes looking for him.

title: Highway
cast: Alia Bhatt|Randeep Hooda|Durgesh Kumar|Pradeep Nagar|Saharsh Kumar Shukla
overview: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

title: Panipat
cast: Arjun Kapoor|Kriti Sanon|Sanjay Dutt|Mohnish Behl|Mohan Joshi
overview: During 18th century India, the Marathas emerged as the most powerful empire in the nation until the Afghan King Ahmad Shah Abdali plans to take over India. Sadashiv Rao Bhau is brought in to save the empire from the king which then leads to the third battle of Panipat.

title: Badass Ravi Kumar
cast: Himesh Reshammiya|Prabhu Deva|Kirti Kulhari|Johnny Lever|Sanjay Mishra
overview: The Xpose franchise now goes to the next level  with Himesh Reshammiya doing a spin off from his iconic character Ravi Kumar.

title: LSD: Love, Sex aur Dhokha
cast: Anshuman Jha|Nushrratt Bharuccha|Rajkummar Rao|Neha Chauhan|Amit Sial
overview: A video camcorder, a store security camera, and concealed cameras candidly expose lives in three loosely linked tales.

title: Mission Mangal
cast: Vidya Balan|Akshay Kumar|Taapsee Pannu|Nithya Menen|Kirti Kulhari
overview: A team of Indian scientists at ISRO (Indian Space Research Organisation) take on the extraordinary task of successfully sending a satellite into the orbit of planet Mars in a country's maiden attempt.

title: Junglee
cast: Vidyut Jammwal|Pooja Sawant|Asha Bhat|Atul Kulkarni|Makrand Deshpande
overview: A vet returns home to his father's elephant reserve where he encounters and fights an international poacher's racket.

title: Chamatkar
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Shah Rukh Khan|Urmila Matondkar|Tinnu Anand|Shammi Kapoor
overview: When Sunder loses everything, he seeks refuge in a graveyard, where he befriends a ghost.

title: Karan Arjun
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Salman Khan|Rakhee Gulzar|Kajol|Mamta Kulkarni
overview: Karan and Arjun reincarnate in the different parts of the country. But the faith of their previous mother brings them together in order to avenge their death.

title: Baadshah
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Twinkle Khanna|Rakhee Gulzar|Amrish Puri|Johnny Lever
overview: A small time detective is mistaken as a CBI agent and gets embroiled in a deadly mission to save the Chief Minister from an assassination attempt.

title: B.A. Pass
cast: Shadab Kamal|Shilpa Shukla|Dibyendu Bhattacharya|Shikha Joshi|Vijay Kaushik
overview: After losing his parents in a car accident, Mukesh stays at his Aunt's house in Delhi. Enrolled in a good for nothing course in college he finds peace by playing chess at the local cemetery, the rest of the times he worries over ways to make a living and taking care of his sisters. 'B.A.Pass' is a story looking at the fatal promise of a new life. When Mukesh meets Sarika 'auntie' at a kitty party, little does he know of the city and it's ways and means to survive. Sarika seduces Mukesh, shy and inexperienced he falls for her. What follows is a twist of destiny, a kind of story that appears in the tabloids as 'heinous acts of crime'

title: Half Girlfriend
cast: Arjun Kapoor|Shraddha Kapoor|Rhea Chakraborty|Seema Biswas|Greg Kriek
overview: A boy meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she half-heartedly agrees to be his `half-girlfriend'.

title: Be Happy
cast: Abhishek Bachchan|Inayat Verma|Nora Fatehi|Nasaar|Johnny Lever
overview: A dance-drama film that follows a single father and his witty, wise-beyond-her-years daughter. When his daughter's dream of performing in the country's biggest dance reality show collides with a life-altering crisis, the father is driven to do the unthinkable, showcasing the extraordinary lengths he will go to fulfill her wishes and find happiness.

title: Shaandaar
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Alia Bhatt|Pankaj Kapur|Sanjay Kapoor|Kumud Pant
overview: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for Bipin's daughter's destination wedding in London.

title: Marjaavaan
cast: Riteish Deshmukh|Sidharth Malhotra|Tara Sutaria|Rakul Preet Singh|Nasaar
overview: Raghu and Zoya are enjoying their lives together until a gang leader with harmful intentions turns their world upside down.

title: Jaan
cast: Ajay Devgn|Twinkle Khanna|Amrish Puri|Saeed Jaffrey|Aruna Irani
overview: Police Commissioner Suryadeo Singh hires Karan, a trained weapons expert, to protect his daughter Kajal. Later, Kajal, who is unaware of Karan's secret agenda, falls in love with him.

title: Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha
cast: Ajay Devgn|Tabu|Jimmy Shergill|Shantanu Maheshwari|Saiee Manjrekar
overview: After 20 years in prison, a man reunites with his lost love and the truth behind his crimes is revealed.

title: 72 Hours: Martyr Who Never Died
cast: Alka Amin|Yeshi Dema|Veerendra Saxena|Shishir Sharma|Suraj Dholakhandi
overview: The story is based on the life of Rifleman Jaswant Singh Rawat. 55 years ago during 1962 Indo-China war , when the destiny of war was pre decided, there stood a brave soldier from 4th Garhwal Rifle against all odds and guarded our post from Nurunaang Base in Arunachal Pradesh then called NEFA border.

title: Chaahat
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Pooja Bhatt|Naseeruddin Shah|Ramya Krishnan|Anupam Kher
overview: Roop and his father come to the city for medical treatment where Reshma falls in love with Roop. However, Roop loves Pooja but when Reshma threatens to kill herself, Roop agrees to marry her.

title: Chhorii
cast: Nushrratt Bharuccha|Mita Vashisht|Rajesh Jais|Saurabh Goyal|Pallavi Ajay Patil
overview: Sakshi is eight months pregnant with her first child when she and Hemant are forced out of their home. They escape from the city and seek refuge in a house located deep inside sugarcane fields. The house is ridden with dark secrets that start unravelling as the story unfolds, posing a threat to Sakshi and her unborn child. Even as Sakshi tries to save herself and her unborn baby, scary sightings of three mysterious kids and a charred monster coupled with an eerie lullaby, emanating from an old transistor, wreak havoc with her sanity.

title: Toonpur Ka Superrhero
cast: Ajay Devgn|Kajol|Tanuja Samarth|Sanjay Mishra|Sanjay Dutt
overview: There is trouble brewing in the land of cartoons-Toonpur. The good guys of Toonpur and the bad guys are at constant war. That's when Devtoons decide to take superstar action hero Aditya's help and get him down to Toonpur. But things are not as simple as the Devtoons had thought.

title: Don 2
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Boman Irani|Kunal Kapoor|Lara Dutta
overview: Having conquered the Asian underworld, crime boss Don sets in motion a plan that will give him dominion over Europe.

title: Roohi
cast: Rajkummar Rao|Varun Sharma|Janhvi Kapoor|Manav Vij|Sarita Joshi
overview: In a fictional North Indian town, two boys Bhaura and Kattanni are stuck in a forest with Roohi. But there’s an insidious spirit following them with feet turned backwards.

title: Laal Singh Chaddha
cast: Aamir Khan|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Mona Singh|Manav Vij
overview: Events in India's history — from the Emergency and the famous Cricket World Cup win to the Punjab riots — unfold from the perspective of an innocent Sikh man Laal Singh Chaddha, a person with a low IQ but high optimism. Laal is able to achieve everything under the sun but his childhood love continues to elude him.

title: Baghban
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Hema Malini|Salman Khan|Mahima Chaudhry|Paresh Rawal
overview: After dedicating their whole life in upbringing their children, elderly couple Raj Malhotra and Pooja gets homeless. Instead of caring, their children treat them as a burden.

title: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Vaani Kapoor|Kanwaljit Singh|Gourav Sharma|Goutam Sharma
overview: Manu, a bodybuilder from Chandigarh, India, falls in love with Maanvi, a Zumba teacher. All seems well until a revelation causes turmoil in their love story.

title: Gunday
cast: Ranveer Singh|Arjun Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Irrfan Khan|Saurabh Shukla
overview: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful gangsters - Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

title: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Prem Chopra|Mukesh Bhhatt|D. Santosh|Naveen Kaushik
overview: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year is the sometimes thoughtless, sometimes thoughtful story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart - and stumbling upon a crazy way which turned his world upside down, and his career right side up. Welcome to the world of sales boss!

title: Sarkar
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Abhishek Bachchan|Kay Kay Menon|Supriya Pathak|Katrina Kaif
overview: Subhash Nagre runs a parallel government in the city where he has a cult following. When his enemies plot to murder him, his son takes charge and stands up against them.

title: Guzaarish
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Shernaz Patel|Aditya Roy Kapur|Suhel Seth
overview: Ethan, a magician rendered paralyzed in an accident, sets off a furor when he makes a petition to the court to end his own life.

title: Barfi!
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Ileana D'Cruz|Saurabh Shukla|Jisshu Sengupta
overview: The heartwarming tale of Barfi, a charming deaf-mute young man from 1970s Darjeeling, and two unalike women who can't help but fall for him.

title: Raees
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Mahira Khan|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub|Sheeba Chaddha
overview: Set in the early ’80s and ’90s in Gujarat, India, ‘Raees’ is a fictitious story of a crime lord named Raees, who builds an entire empire from scratch, and a police officer who is determined to bring him down.

title: Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video
cast: Rajkummar Rao|Triptii Dimri|Vijay Raaz|Mallika Sherawat|Tiku Talsania
overview: Vicky and Vidya, newly married, decide to record a video of their first night together as a keepsake for the future. However, their plan goes awry when the CD with the video gets stolen. What follows is a chaotic and comedic journey as the couple scrambles to retrieve it before things spiral out of control.

title: Shaandaar
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Alia Bhatt|Pankaj Kapur|Sanjay Kapoor|Kumud Pant
overview: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for Bipin's daughter's destination wedding in London.

title: Tallukh
cast: Anurag Jha|Yash Krishnani|Harshita Awale|Ghazala Ansari|Devansh Jaiswal
overview: An Inspector tries to figure out a case of serial kidnapping in neighborhood simultaneously a couple live their happy life, soon to realize everything is connected.

title: Be Happy
cast: Abhishek Bachchan|Inayat Verma|Nora Fatehi|Nasaar|Johnny Lever
overview: A dance-drama film that follows a single father and his witty, wise-beyond-her-years daughter. When his daughter's dream of performing in the country's biggest dance reality show collides with a life-altering crisis, the father is driven to do the unthinkable, showcasing the extraordinary lengths he will go to fulfill her wishes and find happiness.

title: Laadla
cast: Anil Kapoor|Sridevi|Raveena Tandon|Farida Jalal|Aruna Irani
overview: Laadla is the story of the kind-hearted Raju, who lives with his disabled mom. One day Raju, on his way to a job interview, saves the life of a rich textile mill owner who offers him a job in his factory. The mill is run by his ambitious daughter Sheetal, whose competitive attitude and open insults have made her many enemies. Raju and Sheetal clash often, until Sheetal tries to get the upper hand by forcing Raju to marry her, even though he has already fallen in love with Kaajal.

title: Hello
cast: Sharman Joshi|Sohail Khan|Isha Koppikar|Gul Panag|Amrita Arora
overview: Call-center workers receive a phone call from God.

title: Vivah
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Amrita Rao|Anupam Kher|Seema Biswas|Alok Nath
overview: Poonam, a traditionally brought-up young woman, is to marry Prem, a groom chosen by her uncle. Poonam and Prem's faith and love are to be tested however, when an accident occurs and Poonam might be scarred for life.

title: Hichki
cast: Rani Mukerji|Neeraj Kabi|Rohit Saraf|Sachin Pilgaonkar|Asif Basra
overview: Hichki presents a positive and inspiring story about a woman who turns her biggest weakness into her biggest strength.

title: Badass Ravi Kumar
cast: Himesh Reshammiya|Prabhu Deva|Kirti Kulhari|Johnny Lever|Sanjay Mishra
overview: The Xpose franchise now goes to the next level  with Himesh Reshammiya doing a spin off from his iconic character Ravi Kumar.

title: Sirf Tum
cast: Sanjay Kapoor|Priya Gill|Sushmita Sen|Mohnish Behl|Salman Khan
overview: Deepak, an ordinary young man with a big heart, and Aarthi, an attractive, middle class girl.

title: Baghban
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Hema Malini|Salman Khan|Mahima Chaudhry|Paresh Rawal
overview: After dedicating their whole life in upbringing their children, elderly couple Raj Malhotra and Pooja gets homeless. Instead of caring, their children treat them as a burden.

title: Talvar
cast: Irrfan Khan|Konkona Sen Sharma|Neeraj Kabi|Prakash Belawadi|Sohum Shah
overview: A hardened cop deals with three conflicting perspectives involving a brutal double murder. The case is complicated as the prime suspects are the parents who supposedly killed their teenage daughter.

title: Chamatkar
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Shah Rukh Khan|Urmila Matondkar|Tinnu Anand|Shammi Kapoor
overview: When Sunder loses everything, he seeks refuge in a graveyard, where he befriends a ghost.

title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
cast: Farhan Akhtar|Sonam Kapoor Ahuja|Divya Dutta|Pavan Malhotra|Rebecca Breeds
overview: The true story of the "Flying Sikh" world champion runner and Olympian Milkha Singh who overcame the massacre of his family, civil war during the India-Pakistan partition, and homelessness to become one of India's most iconic athletes.

title: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Prem Chopra|Mukesh Bhhatt|D. Santosh|Naveen Kaushik
overview: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year is the sometimes thoughtless, sometimes thoughtful story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart - and stumbling upon a crazy way which turned his world upside down, and his career right side up. Welcome to the world of sales boss!

title: Josh
cast: Chandrachur Singh|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Shah Rukh Khan|Sharad S. Kapoor|Priya Gill
overview: Two gangs fight for control of the streets: the Scorpions, led by Prakash and the Eagles, fronted by Max. When Prakash's brother Rahul comes to visit, he meets and quickly falls in love with Shirley, not realizing she's the sister of his brother's rival, Max. Though Rahul tries to keep their relationship secret, it's only a matter of time before it brings the gang rivalry to a head.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur - Part 2
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Huma Qureshi|Richa Chadha|Rajkummar Rao|Tigmanshu Dhulia
overview: After the death of his father and brother Danish, Faizal Khan vows to take revenge by destroying Ramadhir Singh's gang.

title: Bachchhan Paandey
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kriti Sanon|Jacqueline Fernandez|Arshad Warsi|Pankaj Tripathi
overview: A budding director tries to research a merciless gangster for making a film on gangsterism. But her secret attempts to conduct the research fail when she gets caught for snooping.

title: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Juhi Chawla Mehta|Johnny Lever|Paresh Rawal|Shakti Kapoor
overview: Two rival reporters team up to help prove the innocence of a man set to be hanged for the murder of a politician.

title: Dum Laga Ke Haisha
cast: Bhumi Pednekar|Ayushmann Khurrana|Sheeba Chaddha|Sanjay Mishra|Seema Pahwa
overview: A slim uneducated guy is pressured into an arranged marriage with an overweight college girl. The mismatched couple is challenged to compete in the annual wife-carrying race.

title: Kapoor & Sons
cast: Sidharth Malhotra|Fawad Khan|Alia Bhatt|Ratna Pathak Shah|Rishi Kapoor
overview: Returning home to visit their ill grandfather, two estranged brothers must confront their unresolved rivalry while their parents’ marriage frays.

title: Dear Zindagi
cast: Alia Bhatt|Shah Rukh Khan|Ali Zafar|Kunal Kapoor|Angad Bedi
overview: An unconventional thinker helps a budding cinematographer gain a new perspective on life.

title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Katrina Kaif|Upen Patel|Govind Namdeo|Darshan Jariwala
overview: When his love interest doesn't show up for a meeting, a man and his friends go to Goa in order to find her, where they discover she loves someone else.

title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun..!
cast: Salman Khan|Madhuri Dixit|Mohnish Behl|Renuka Shahane|Anupam Kher
overview: Prem and Nisha meet and fall in love at the wedding of their elder siblings, but their plans to be together are put in jeopardy when Nisha's sister dies, leaving behind a baby.

title: Bhoothnath
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Aman Siddiqui|Juhi Chawla Mehta|Rajpal Yadav|Shah Rukh Khan
overview: Banku, his mother, Anjali Sharma and father move in to their new house -- the Nath villa, unaware of the fact that the house is inhabited by a ghost. It is learnt the ghost is not too happy with his new housemates. But what the ghost is not prepared for is his unlikely friendship with Banku. Now Banku must uncover the reason why his ghostly friend is stuck and help him to attain salvation.

title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
cast: Ali Zafar|Imran Khan|Katrina Kaif|Tara D'Souza|Kyra Dutt
overview: A Mumbai man finds himself in an unpredictable situation when the prospective bride of his older brother is a woman he has history with.

title: Gunday
cast: Ranveer Singh|Arjun Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Irrfan Khan|Saurabh Shukla
overview: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful gangsters - Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

title: Veer
cast: Salman Khan|Mithun Chakraborty|Jackie Shroff|Sohail Khan|Raj Khatri
overview: A Pindari Prince goes to England to study military tactics so that he can avenge his people, but while there, he falls in love.

title: Hasee Toh Phasee
cast: Sidharth Malhotra|Parineeti Chopra|Adah Sharma|Manoj Joshi|Sharat Saxena
overview: On the eve of Nikhil and Karishma’s engagement, Karishma’s wealthy father, Devesh Solanki, expresses his disapproval, believing Nikhil to be a lackadaisical young man. With one week to prove himself worthy to marry Karishma, Nikhil and Karishma's sister, Meeta, grow closer to each other.

title: Kahaani
cast: Vidya Balan|Parambrata Chatterjee|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Saswata Chatterjee|Kharaj Mukherjee
overview: Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

title: Masaan
cast: Richa Chadha|Sanjay Mishra|Vicky Kaushal|Shweta Tripathi Sharma|Vineet Kumar
overview: Four lives intersect along the Ganges: a low caste boy in hopeless love, a daughter ridden with guilt of a sexual encounter ending in a tragedy, a hapless father with fading morality, and a spirited child yearning for a family, long to escape the moral constructs of a small-town.

title: Raman Raghav 2.0
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Vicky Kaushal|Sobhita Dhulipala|Amruta Subhash|Mukesh Chhabra
overview: A corrupt cop and a serial killer obsessed with a psychopath from the '60s get caught up in a ruthless cat-and-mouse game.

title: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
cast: Kartik Aaryan|Nushrratt Bharuccha|Sunny Singh|Alok Nath|Deepika Amin
overview: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romace.

title: Fateh
cast: Sonu Sood|Jacqueline Fernandez|Naseeruddin Shah|Vijay Raaz|Shivjyoti Rajput
overview: Ex-Special Ops officer Fateh Singh springs back to action when a girl falls prey to a cybercrime syndicate. Racing against time, can he bring down the mafia?

title: Laadla
cast: Anil Kapoor|Sridevi|Raveena Tandon|Farida Jalal|Aruna Irani
overview: Laadla is the story of the kind-hearted Raju, who lives with his disabled mom. One day Raju, on his way to a job interview, saves the life of a rich textile mill owner who offers him a job in his factory. The mill is run by his ambitious daughter Sheetal, whose competitive attitude and open insults have made her many enemies. Raju and Sheetal clash often, until Sheetal tries to get the upper hand by forcing Raju to marry her, even though he has already fallen in love with Kaajal.

title: Sir
cast: Tillotama Shome|Vivek Gomber|Geetanjali Kulkarni|Rahul Vohra|Divya Seth Shah
overview: A prosperous young Indian man falls in love with his servant, a widow with the dream of becoming a fashion designer.

title: 1920: Evil Returns
cast: Aftab Shivdasani|Tia Bajpai|Vidya Malvade|Sharad Kelkar|Vicky Ahuja
overview: This story revolves around a famous poet who meets a woman who is in trouble. In order to treat her, he takes her to Shimla in a big hospital, but soon that woman gets possessed by devil and goes out of control. Now the question remains that what is the relation that poet shares with her which compelled him to go to any extent to save her, why she was possessed by devil and who is the devil.

title: Aashiqui
cast: Rahul Roy|Anu Aggarwal|Deepak Tijori|Avtar Gill|Tom Alter
overview: Rahul and Anu Verghese meet on the same day, while both are held by the police on charges of creating a disturbance, and running away respectively. They meet again, and love happens. Rahul helps Anu to be independent, and seek a job. Then Anu is discovered by a talent agent to be a model, which she accepts. Rahul wants to marry Anu, but first must establish himself.

title: Bell Bottom
cast: Akshay Kumar|Huma Qureshi|Adil Hussain|Lara Dutta|Vaani Kapoor
overview: By the early ‘80s, India had already witnessed multiple airplane hijacks. In 1984, the country was made to face another such challenge. BellBottom, a RAW Agent, sees through the plan and thus begins India's first overseas covert operation. An operation, lead by a forgotten hero, that went on to create one of the most defining moments for India.

cast: Kunal Khemu|Boman Irani|Soha Ali Khan|Cyrus Broacha|Simone Singh
overview: Two unlucky delinquents stumble into a series of random misadventures when they attempt to collect a debt for their boss.

title: Fraud Saiyaan
cast: Arshad Warsi|Saurabh Shukla|Flora Saini|Varun Badola|Sara Loren
overview: The story of a con artist in North India who convinces women to marry him just so he can live off their money.

title: Yuva
cast: Ajay Devgn|Abhishek Bachchan|Vivek Oberoi|Rani Mukerji|Kareena Kapoor Khan
overview: An accident on a bridge ties together three young men from different social classes, sparking a course of events that will forever alter their lives.

title: Guzaarish
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Shernaz Patel|Aditya Roy Kapur|Suhel Seth
overview: Ethan, a magician rendered paralyzed in an accident, sets off a furor when he makes a petition to the court to end his own life.

title: Dhadak
cast: Ishaan Khatter|Janhvi Kapoor|Ashutosh Rana|Aditya Kumar|Aishwarya Narkar
overview: Madhukar and Parthavi fall head over heels in love with each other, but the fact that they belong to different castes of society, becomes an obstacle in their romance. The lovers dare to go against societal norms and battle all odds for the sake of love.

title: Neerja
cast: Sonam Kapoor Ahuja|Shabana Azmi|Shekhar Ravjiani|Yogendra Tiku|Jim Sarbh
overview: Neerja is a portrayal on the life of the courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on the Pan Am flight 73 in 1986. The flight was hijacked by a terrorist organization.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
cast: Akshay Kumar|Vidya Balan|Shiney Ahuja|Paresh Rawal|Ameesha Patel
overview: NRI Siddharth Chaturvedi and his wife Avni return to Siddharth's family's ancestral Varanasi palace while disregarding warnings of a curse and paranormal phenomena. Soon enough, inexplicable events begin occuring, which forces Siddharth to consult the eccentric psychiatrist Aditya Shrivastav to help solve the mystery.

title: Pippa
cast: Ishaan Khatter|Mrunal Thakur|Priyanshu Painyuli|Soni Razdan|Soham Majumdar
overview: The story of Captain Balram Singh Mehta of India’s 45 Cavalry regiment who, along with his siblings, fought on the eastern front during the Indo-Pakistani war of 1971. Named after the Russian amphibious war tank “PT-76”, which floats on water like an empty ‘pippa’ (tin) of ghee, the film traces Mehta's coming-of-age as he steps up to prove himself in a war to liberate Bangladesh.

title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
cast: Yami Gautam|Sunny Kaushal|Sharad Kelkar|Indraneil Sengupta|Barun Chanda
overview: A flight attendant and her boyfriend must steal a cache of diamonds to clear an old debt — but the plan spins into a mayhem when the plane gets hijacked.

title: Jaal: The Trap
cast: Sunny Deol|Reema Sen|Tabu|Amrish Puri|Anupam Kher
overview: Sunny Deol battles terrorists from Kashmir; from director Guddu Dhanoa.

title: Khel Khel Mein
cast: Akshay Kumar|Taapsee Pannu|Vaani Kapoor|Fardeen Khan|Ammy Virk
overview: What if for one night your mobile phone was a public property? 7 friends at a wedding after-party decide to play a seemingly harmless but as it turns out, a dangerous game which might have earth-shattering consequences with relationships, marriages and identities being at stake.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
cast: Aamir Khan|Salman Khan|Raveena Tandon|Karisma Kapoor|Paresh Rawal
overview: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Sarfarosh
cast: Aamir Khan|Naseeruddin Shah|Sonali Bendre|Mukesh Rishi|Akash Khurana
overview: When terrorists kill a cop's brother and disable his father, he fights back against the smuggling of guns and drugs which plagues his country.

title: Manorama Six Feet Under
cast: Abhay Deol|Gul Panag|Raima Sen|Sarika|Kulbhushan Kharbanda
overview: Satyaveer is an engineer suspended for allegedly accepting a bribe. However, Satyaveer, proud author of a tawdry and thoroughly unsuccessful crime novel, is approached by a woman named Manorama to investigate her husband, whom she suspects of having an affair.

title: Mughal-e-Azam
cast: Dilip Kumar|Prithviraj Kapoor|Madhubala|Durga Khote|Nigar Sultana
overview: In the 16th century, when Prince Salim falls in love with a beautiful courtesan named Anarkali, Emperor Akbar's disapproval leads to a battle between father and son.

title: Awaara
cast: Raj Kapoor|Nargis|Prithviraj Kapoor|Leela Chitnis|K.N. Singh
overview: A petty thief is put on trial for the attempted murder of a lawyer. Through a series of flashbacks, the intertwining lives of the thief, the lawyer, and the thief's defense lawyer are illustrated.

title: Raavan
cast: Abhishek Bachchan|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Vikram|Govinda|Ravi Kishan
overview: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.

title: King
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Suhana Khan|Abhishek Bachchan|Fahim Fazli|Abhay Verma

title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
cast: Ajay Devgn|Sushmita Sen|Esha Deol|Anupam Kher|Aanjjan Srivastav
overview: A mentally challenged man fights his former father-in-law for custody of his daughter.

title: Bang Bang!
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Katrina Kaif|Danny Denzongpa|Javed Jaffrey|Jimmy Shergill
overview: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

title: Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video
cast: Rajkummar Rao|Triptii Dimri|Vijay Raaz|Mallika Sherawat|Tiku Talsania
overview: Vicky and Vidya, newly married, decide to record a video of their first night together as a keepsake for the future. However, their plan goes awry when the CD with the video gets stolen. What follows is a chaotic and comedic journey as the couple scrambles to retrieve it before things spiral out of control.

title: Hello Brother
cast: Salman Khan|Rani Mukerji|Arbaaz Khan|Shakti Kapoor|Johnny Lever
overview: A ghost seeking revenge for his death haunts the man who received his heart in a transplant.

title: D
cast: Randeep Hooda|Chunky Pandey|Rukhsar Rehman|Isha Koppikar|Sushant Singh
overview: Deshu, a mechanic from Dubai, comes home to Mumbai, and gets embroiled in a crime by accident. The film shows his meteoric rise from common, law-abiding man to underworld kingpin.

title: Haseen Dillruba
cast: Taapsee Pannu|Vikrant Massey|Harshvardhan Rane|Aditya Srivastava|Yamini Das
overview: Under investigation as a suspect in her husband's murder, a wife reveals details of their thorny marriage that seem to only further blur the truth.

title: Baazigar
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Kajol|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Rakhee Gulzar|Dalip Tahil
overview: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces and kills his eldest daughter and then proceeds to his younger daughter but she begins to suspect her new lover's ulterior motive.

title: Vadh
cast: Sanjay Mishra|Neena Gupta|Manav Vij|Saurabh Sachdeva|Umesh Kaushik
overview: Shambhunath Mishra, a retired middle school teacher is living a mundane middle-class life with his wife Manju Mishra in Gwalior. Life takes a complete turn for the Mishra family when a situation gets out of hand and it leads to a killing at the hands of Shambhunath Mishra. Mishra ji has very little time to plan cautiously to turn this into a “perfect murder” and leave no trace behind.

title: Dhamaal
cast: Riteish Deshmukh|Arshad Warsi|Javed Jaffrey|Aashish Chaudhary|Sanjay Dutt
overview: Four friends meet an underworld don who, on his deathbed, clues them in on hidden treasure buried in Goa. The group race towards Goa, not knowing that their plans will soon be foiled, albeit hilariously, by a police officer, who is also after the money.

title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
cast: R. Madhavan|Dia Mirza|Saif Ali Khan|Anupam Kher|Tannaz Irani
overview: Maddy impersonates Rajeev, the person his love interest, Reena, is about to marry and attempts to woo her. However, he is unprepared for the moment when the truth will be revealed.

title: Ganapath
cast: Tiger Shroff|Kriti Sanon|Amitabh Bachchan|Rahman|Elli Avram
overview: In a dystopian future, Ganapath, a relentless and skilled vigilante, embarks on a mission to dismantle a powerful criminal empire that has gripped the city in fear. Ganapath becomes a symbol of hope for the oppressed in which leads dark.

title: Sirf Tum
cast: Sanjay Kapoor|Priya Gill|Sushmita Sen|Mohnish Behl|Salman Khan
overview: Deepak, an ordinary young man with a big heart, and Aarthi, an attractive, middle class girl.

title: Fashion
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Kangana Ranaut|Mugdha Godse|Arjan Bajwa|Samir Soni
overview: A small-town girl finally realizes her dream of becoming a famous supermodel but soon finds out that there's a price for her glamorous new life.

title: Chalte Chalte
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Rani Mukerji|Jas Arora|Satish Shah|Jayshree Talpade
overview: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.

title: Yaara Silly Silly
cast: Paoli Dam|Parambrata Chatterjee|Vidya Malvade|Parth Suri
overview: After spending time with a prostitute, a man later meets her on a train where their fond memories are rekindled and their romance blossoms

title: Nayak: The Real Hero
cast: Anil Kapoor|Amrish Puri|Rani Mukerji|Paresh Rawal|Johnny Lever
overview: Shivajirao, a TV reporter, gets a chance to be the Chief Minister of Maharashtra for a day after being challenged by incumbent Chief Minister Balraj Chauhan. After his one-day stint turns out to be a huge success, his life spirals out of control and he is embroiled in political intrigue.

title: Main Zaroor Aaunga
cast: Arbaaz Khan|Govind Namdeo|Hemant Pandey|Aindrita Ray|Vikas Verma
overview: A successful businessman, Yash Malhotra falls in love and marries a beautiful model named Lisa. Their marital bliss is disrupted by the entry of a fashion photographer named Peter who connects with Lisa and this betrayal leads to a series of dangerous consequences.

title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
cast: Kartik Aaryan|Kiara Advani|Gajraj Rao|Supriya Pathak|Siddharth Randeria
overview: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.

title: Baabul
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Rani Mukerji|Hema Malini|Salman Khan|John Abraham
overview: When his only son dies in an accident, Balraaj urges his depressed daughter-in-law to marry a man who has long loved her in silence.

title: Border
cast: Sunny Deol|Jackie Shroff|Suniel Shetty|Akshaye Khanna|Sudesh Berry
overview: It's 1971, and 2000 members of the Pakistani Army—armed with tanks—are at war with just 120 men in a battalion of Indian soldiers based in the Longewala region of Rajasthan in India.

title: Veere Di Wedding
cast: Kareena Kapoor Khan|Sonam Kapoor Ahuja|Swara Bhasker|Shikha Talsania|Sumeet Vyas
overview: Kalindi, Avni, Sakshi and Meera are childhood friends. Kalindi and Rishabh are getting married, and the four gal pals come together for their veere’s wedding. But of course, there can be no shaadi without showsha and a lot of drama. This wedding celebration brings out skeletons from the closet, unspoken truths and some harsh realities as well.

title: Section 375
cast: Akshaye Khanna|Richa Chadha|Meera Chopra|Rahul Bhat|Shriswara
overview: A filmmaker stands trial when a costume assistant on his movie accuses him of rape

title: Disco Dancer
cast: Mithun Chakraborty|Kim|Rajesh Khanna|Om Puri|Gita Siddharth
overview: Anil, a street singer, is humiliated and driven out of Bombay along with his mother. However, he soon becomes a famous performer but the enemies from his past try to destroy his hard-earned career.

title: Bhagam Bhag
cast: Akshay Kumar|Govinda|Paresh Rawal|Lara Dutta|Jackie Shroff
overview: After their lead actress quits their drama troupe; Bunty, Babla and their boss Champak search for a new heroine in London where they have just arrived, and get embroiled in a murder case involving a mysterious woman.

title: Thank God
cast: Sidharth Malhotra|Ajay Devgn|Rakul Preet Singh|Seema Pahwa|Kanwaljit Singh
overview: An egoistic real estate broker in huge debts, meets with an accident. As he gains consciousness, he realizes that he is in heaven. God appears before him and informs him that he must play a 'Game of Life'. If he manages to win, he will be sent back to earth; if he loses, he will be sent to hell.

title: Dishoom
cast: John Abraham|Varun Dhawan|Akshaye Khanna|Jacqueline Fernandez|Saqib Saleem
overview: When India's top cricketer is kidnapped in the Middle East, a loose cannon and a rookie cop are tasked with finding him before the high-stakes match with Pakistan.

title: Judaai
cast: Anil Kapoor|Sridevi|Urmila Matondkar|Saeed Jaffrey|Farida Jalal
overview: A greedy wife sells her husband to a wealthy woman but soon realizes that, with a luxurious life, she must pay a heavy price.

title: Laxmii
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kiara Advani|Ayesha Raza Mishra|Manu Rishi Chadha|Ashwini Kalsekar
overview: Aasif's belief in logic and science shatters when he gets possessed by a transgender's ghost.

title: Kathal
cast: Sanya Malhotra|Anant Joshi|Vijay Raaz|Rajpal Yadav|Neha Saraf
overview: When two prized jackfruits disappear from a politician's garden, a spirited cop's investigation takes an unexpected turn as she digs for the truth.

title: Wake Up Sid
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Konkona Sen Sharma|Rahul Khanna|Anupam Kher|Supriya Pathak
overview: Wake Up Sid! is the story of a lazy Mumbai college student who does absolutely nothing, with a turn of events will Sid realize his potential in this world and become a success in the fast-paced life of Mumbai.

title: Double Dhamaal
cast: Riteish Deshmukh|Arshad Warsi|Javed Jaffrey|Aashish Chaudhary|Sanjay Dutt
overview: Four slackers decide to avenge their humiliation at the hands of a con-man.

title: Karwaan
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Mithila Palkar|Irrfan Khan|Kriti Kharbanda|Amala Akkineni
overview: Avinash, a dejected soul stuck in a dead-end job shares a strange relationship with his father. He holds him responsible for crushing his dreams. However, he is left pondering upon this longstanding hatred when he hears of his father’s untimely demise.

title: The Kashmir Files
cast: Mithun Chakraborty|Anupam Kher|Darshan Kumaar|Pallavi Joshi|Chinmay Mandlekar
overview: Based on a true tragedy, the emotionally triggering film sheds light on the plight of Kashmiri Pandits (Hindus), a religious minority in the 1990s Kashmir valley, who were compelled to flee their homes by the Islamic militants.

title: Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii
cast: Zain Khan|Rahul Bose|Bobby Bedii|Raj Bhansali|Deiptimaan Chowdhury
overview: An orphan boy with dreams of finding a family and fame as a cricketer, finds a bat with magical powers and lands a spot in the Indian cricket team.

title: Rustom
cast: Akshay Kumar|Ileana D'Cruz|Esha Gupta|Arjan Bajwa|Usha Nadkarni
overview: A naval officer is devastated to learn about his wife's extramarital affair with a rich businessman while he was away. He pays him a visit and shoots him to death, following which he surrenders himself but claims to be "not guilty" in the court, much to the surprise of the businessman's sister and the officers dealing with his case.

title: Toilet: A Love Story
cast: Akshay Kumar|Bhumi Pednekar|Anupam Kher|Sudhir Pandey|Rajesh Sharma
overview: A woman threatens to leave her husband unless he installs a toilet in their home. To win back her love and respect, he heads out on a journey to fight against the backward society.

title: Udaan
cast: Ronit Roy|Rajat Barmecha|Aayan Boradia|Ram Kapoor|Manjot Singh
overview: Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.

title: Tamasha
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Deepika Padukone|Piyush Mishra|Vivek Mushran|Javed Sheikh
overview: Meeting while on vacation, Ved and Tara sense a connection but vow to keep their real identities a secret. Years later, their paths cross again.

title: Gabbar Is Back
cast: Akshay Kumar|Shruti Haasan|Suman Talwar|Jaideep Ahlawat|Sunil Grover
overview: A vigilante network taking out corrupt officials draws the notice of the authorities.

title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
cast: Ajay Devgn|Saif Ali Khan|Kajol|Sharad Kelkar|Reyhna Malhotra
overview: When Aurangzeb recruits his trusted soldier Udaybhan to control the Kondhana fort, Shivaji's military leader Tanhaji Malusare and his army of Maratha warriors set out to recapture the fortress.

title: Welcome Home
cast: Kashmira Irani|Swarda Thigle|Boloram Das|Tina Bhatia|Shashi Bhushan
overview: Welcome Home is being touted as a psychological drama with lots of thrills. The movie follows a pregnant woman living in a house. She is visited by a few other ladies presumably some officials and ask her about her lifestyle.

title: Aiyyaa
cast: Rani Mukerji|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Nirmiti Sawant|Satish Alekar|Anita Date-Kelkar
overview: Meenakshi, a Marathi gal with an ultra-sensitive sense of smell, lives her life in her dreams, dancing and enacting her favourite actresses Sridevi, Madhuri and Juhi. Not believing in arranged marriages, Meenakshi awaits her prince when she comes across Tamil artist Surya, to whom she is strangely attracted to.

title: Ludo
cast: Pankaj Tripathi|Abhishek Bachchan|Inayat Verma|Rajkummar Rao|Fatima Sana Shaikh
overview: Ludo is about the butterfly effect and how, despite all the chaos and crowd of the world, all our lives are inextricably connected. From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

title: Bodyguard
cast: Salman Khan|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Hazel Keech|Raj Babbar|Mahesh Manjrekar
overview: Lovely Singh is extremely respectful of Mr Rana and his daughter Divya. While appointed as Divya's bodyguard, he falls in love with a girl he has never met, unaware that she is none other than Divya.

title: Paheli
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Rani Mukerji|Anupam Kher|Aditi Gowitrikar|Rajpal Yadav
overview: Kishanlal marries the beautiful Lachchi, but the day after the wedding, he leaves on business for five years. When Kishanlal reappears only a few days later, Lachchi is delighted, but this new Kishanlal is in fact a spirit who has taken the form of Lachchi's husband, after having seen her by chance and fallen in love with her. Four years later, the real Kishanlal returns and the townsfolk must determine who is who.

title: Kahaani
cast: Vidya Balan|Parambrata Chatterjee|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Saswata Chatterjee|Kharaj Mukherjee
overview: Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

title: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
cast: Kartik Aaryan|Nushrratt Bharuccha|Sunny Singh|Alok Nath|Deepika Amin
overview: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romace.

title: Kranti
cast: Dilip Kumar|Manoj Kumar|Shashi Kapoor|Hema Malini|Shatrughan Sinha
overview: The film takes place in 19th Century British India and is the story of the fight for independence from the British in the years spanning from 1825 to 1875. It tells the story of two men who led the war against British Rule, Sanga and Bharat both of whom call themselves Kranti.

title: Gully Boy
cast: Ranveer Singh|Alia Bhatt|Siddhant Chaturvedi|Vijay Raaz|Vijay Varma
overview: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Mili
cast: Janhvi Kapoor|Manoj Pahwa|Sunny Kaushal|Vikram Kochhar|Seema Pahwa
overview: Mili Naudiyal, a nursing graduate is planning to move to Canada. She takes up a job at a food outlet for the time being but her sudden disappearance without a clue leaves her loved ones in a desperate search for her in this survival drama.

title: Deewana
cast: Rishi Kapoor|Shah Rukh Khan|Divya Bharti|Amrish Puri|Mohnish Behl
overview: A singer marries his biggest fan, but his uncle plans to kill him in order to gain his money.

title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
cast: Ali Zafar|Imran Khan|Katrina Kaif|Tara D'Souza|Kyra Dutt
overview: A Mumbai man finds himself in an unpredictable situation when the prospective bride of his older brother is a woman he has history with.

title: Maine Pyar Kiya
cast: Salman Khan|Bhagyashree|Alok Nath|Rajeev Verma|Reema Lagoo
overview: After Suman's father leaves her in the care of another family while he travels abroad, she falls in love with Prem. However, in order to for them to marry, Prem has to prove to Suman's father that he is not the same as his own dad.

title: Aashiqui
cast: Rahul Roy|Anu Aggarwal|Deepak Tijori|Avtar Gill|Tom Alter
overview: Rahul and Anu Verghese meet on the same day, while both are held by the police on charges of creating a disturbance, and running away respectively. They meet again, and love happens. Rahul helps Anu to be independent, and seek a job. Then Anu is discovered by a talent agent to be a model, which she accepts. Rahul wants to marry Anu, but first must establish himself.

title: Jalebi
cast: Rhea Chakraborty|Varun Mitra|Digangana Suryavanshi|Praveena Deshpande|Aanya Dureja
overview: An estranged couple happen to meet on a train journey where they independently reflect on what went wrong in their relationship and whether they will truly be able to move forward and start a new chapter, together or alone.

title: Jism
cast: Bipasha Basu|John Abraham|Gulshan Grover|Vinay Pathak|Ranvir Shorey
overview: Kabir Lal is an alcoholic lawyer whose life is looking as if going down the drain. One morning he sees a stunningly attractive woman on a beach and is instantly enamored by her. By chance he sees her again in a restaurant and offers to buy her a drink. In the process he learns that her name is Sonia and she is married. Unable to resist, he asks her whether she would show him her home. It marks the beginning of a passionate affair, during which Kabir is told that Sonia's husband neglects her. But Sonia cannot leave him because she cannot support herself without her husband's money. Sonia suggests murder and Kabir, blind with lust, agrees. They manage to kill Sonia's husband and make it look like an accident, but then Kabir gets to see Sonia's other side: she no longer is the passionate lover as before, but is a cool-headed mean woman now who won't let go of her wealth at any cost.

title: Dhobi Ghat
cast: Prateik Smita Patil|Monica Dogra|Kriti Malhotra|Aamir Khan|Danish Husain
overview: Arun is a reclusive and lonely modern art painter. Shai is an American banker who is on a visit to Mumbai. Munna is a washerboy also living near Arun and Yasmin. The movie is about these four characters from different class of society and how the lives of four characters are intertwined.

title: Ram Setu
cast: Akshay Kumar|Jacqueline Fernandez|Nushrratt Bharuccha|Satyadev Kancharana|Nasaar
overview: An atheist archaeologist turned believer must race against time to prove the true existence of the legendary Ram Setu before evil forces destroy the pillar of India’s heritage.

title: The Man Who Feels No Pain
cast: Abhimanyu Dasani|Radhikka Madan|Gulshan Devaiah|Mahesh Manjrekar|Jimit Trivedi
overview: Leveraging his ability to withstand pain, a young man trains to follow in the footsteps of his martial arts hero.

title: Welcome Home
cast: Kashmira Irani|Swarda Thigle|Boloram Das|Tina Bhatia|Shashi Bhushan
overview: Welcome Home is being touted as a psychological drama with lots of thrills. The movie follows a pregnant woman living in a house. She is visited by a few other ladies presumably some officials and ask her about her lifestyle.

title: Manoranjan
cast: Shammi Kapoor|Sanjeev Kumar|Zeenat Aman|Dev Kumar|Faryal
overview: Havaldar Ratan is a rookie at the local police station, and is assigned duty on foot patrol on Manoranjan Street, a notorious red-light area, on the very first day of his job. He strikes up a conversation with a good-looking young woman named Nisha, and tells her that there is a possible violation of Suppression of Immoral Trafficking Act taking place on this street. He witnesses several women soliciting men, and decides to call in the paddy wagon, and get them arrested. Alas, one of the men frequenting the prostitutes is none other than Ratan's superior officer, who immediately summons Ratan, and has him removed from service on corruption charges. Nisha takes pity on a homeless and unemployed Ratan, and asks him to live with her. He does not want her to sell her body, and so he decides to work at night, and during the day he takes on the guise of a rich Nawab and spends time with her.

title: Rowdy Rathore
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sonakshi Sinha|Nasaar|Yashpal Sharma|Mushtaq Khan
overview: A small-time thug comes across a young girl who claims him to be her father, following which he realizes he has a lookalike who's being hunted by goons.

title: Ludo
cast: Pankaj Tripathi|Abhishek Bachchan|Inayat Verma|Rajkummar Rao|Fatima Sana Shaikh
overview: Ludo is about the butterfly effect and how, despite all the chaos and crowd of the world, all our lives are inextricably connected. From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

title: Jalsa
cast: Vidya Balan|Shefali Shah|Rohini Hattangadi|Vidhatri Bandi|Manav Kaul
overview: A hit and run of an 18-year-old girl becomes the hub of a wheel that sets into motion many a spoke - a journalist, a raging mother, a cop and a system all caught in an ethical dilemma. Questions are raised only to realize that the truth is rarely pure and never simple.

title: Dabangg
cast: Salman Khan|Sonakshi Sinha|Arbaaz Khan|Sonu Sood|Vinod Khanna
overview: A troubled relationship with his younger half-brother and stepfather compels Chulbul Pandey to become a corrupt but fearless cop whose life changes when he locks horns with a corrupt political leader.

title: Tere Naam
cast: Salman Khan|Bhumika Chawla|Sachin Khedekar|Savita Prabhune|Anang Desai
overview: A rowdy ex-college boy who, after a hazing session, loses his heart to first year student Nirjara, a traditional Brahmin girl.

title: Tamasha
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Deepika Padukone|Piyush Mishra|Vivek Mushran|Javed Sheikh
overview: Meeting while on vacation, Ved and Tara sense a connection but vow to keep their real identities a secret. Years later, their paths cross again.

title: Bachna Ae Haseeno
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Deepika Padukone|Bipasha Basu|Minissha Lamba|Puneet Issar
overview: Raj is a heartbreaker. His love stories with Mahi, Radhika and Gayatri finally teach him about love and life in their own sweet, sexy and sassy way.

title: Brothers
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sidharth Malhotra|Jackie Shroff|Jacqueline Fernandez|Shefali Shah
overview: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag: Journey of a Woman
cast: Jaya Bachchan|Rani Mukerji|Konkona Sen Sharma|Abhishek Bachchan|Anupam Kher
overview: Badki and Chutki live a fun-filled life in Banaras, playing pranks, sneaking off to see a forbidden mujra, and soaking up all the excitement that goes on the ghats of the Ganga. Badki is aware that the family is in dire straits, but she and her mother protect Chutki at all costs. When things get worse, Badki decides to go to Mumbai and seek a living for the family.

title: Thappad
cast: Taapsee Pannu|Pavail Gulati|Dia Mirza|Maya Sarao|Geetika Vidya
overview: A young woman's life is shattered into pieces when her husband slaps her at a party, causing her to question what this relationship stands for.

title: R... Rajkumar
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Sonakshi Sinha|Mukul Dev|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Sonu Sood
overview: Rajkumar, an aimless youth, works for a drug baron and is sent to kill a rival dealer. His life is changed forever when he meets Chanda, and has no idea she is the adopted daughter of the man he is supposed to kill.

title: ...Aur Pyar Ho Gaya
cast: Bobby Deol|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Anupam Kher|Shammi Kapoor|Priya Tendulkar
overview: Aashi and Bobby fall in love with each other in the unlikeliest of circumstances, but they have to encounter their families' wrath in order to stay together.

title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
cast: Sunny Deol|Ameesha Patel|Amrish Puri|Lillete Dubey|Vivek Shauq
overview: Amongst the communal riots that erupt in the city, Tara shelters a wayward Sakina from a crazed mob and a bond that blossoms into love is created. The two eventually get married and have a son. The happy family, now living in Amritsar, gets the shock of their lives when Sakina learns that her father (Amrish Puri), whom she previously believed died in the riots back in Amritsar, is still alive after seeing his picture in a tattered, old newspaper. Upon contacting him, Sakina's father, now the mayor of Lahore in Pakistan, arranges for his daughter to arrive in Lahore to see him. Sakina leaves for Lahore minus Tara and her son, and upon reaching the city, learns of her father's plans for her - plans that include forcing Sakina to forget about her family and start life anew in Pakistan. Then begins an extraordinary journey which will lead Tara to cross the border into Pakistan to find his love Sakina

title: Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Ameesha Patel|Anupam Kher|Dalip Tahil|Mohnish Behl
overview: Sonia and Rohit love each other but Rohit is mysteriously killed. When Sonia moves to New Zealand, she meets Raj, Rohit's lookalike who helps her trace Rohit's killer.

title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
cast: Varun Dhawan|Alia Bhatt|Ashutosh Rana|Sidharth Shukla|Aditya Sharma
overview: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra'(wedding dress worth Rs. 2.5 Lakh), she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

title: Naina
cast: Urmila Matondkar|Amardeep Jha|Kamini Khanna|Anthony Rosato|Anuj Sawhney
overview: On a day of solar eclipse, five year old, Naina, loses her eyesight and her parents in a road accident in London. Twenty years later, she is bestowed with the gift of sight thanks to the marvels of modern science. Her period of darkness is over; or is it? A horrifying period of darkness begins. What is this curse that has been upon her? Will she ever be able to escape it? Will this extraordinary s

title: White
cast: Arjaa Banerjee|Sayantee Chattaraj|Meheli Das|Kaushik Roy
overview: The film is based on rape conjoining three silent short tales on the same subject.

title: Pagalpanti
cast: John Abraham|Ileana D'Cruz|Arshad Warsi|Urvashi Rautela|Pulkit Samrat
overview: 3 men, considered as losers in their lives by the people, plan to get rich along with their girlfriends by fooling 2 gangsters and robbing their money.

title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
cast: Imran Khan|Genelia D'Souza|Manjari Fadnnis|Prateik Smita Patil|Sugandha Garg
overview: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.

title: Jism
cast: Bipasha Basu|John Abraham|Gulshan Grover|Vinay Pathak|Ranvir Shorey
overview: Kabir Lal is an alcoholic lawyer whose life is looking as if going down the drain. One morning he sees a stunningly attractive woman on a beach and is instantly enamored by her. By chance he sees her again in a restaurant and offers to buy her a drink. In the process he learns that her name is Sonia and she is married. Unable to resist, he asks her whether she would show him her home. It marks the beginning of a passionate affair, during which Kabir is told that Sonia's husband neglects her. But Sonia cannot leave him because she cannot support herself without her husband's money. Sonia suggests murder and Kabir, blind with lust, agrees. They manage to kill Sonia's husband and make it look like an accident, but then Kabir gets to see Sonia's other side: she no longer is the passionate lover as before, but is a cool-headed mean woman now who won't let go of her wealth at any cost.

title: Babli Bouncer
cast: Tamannaah Bhatia|Sahil Vaid|Abhishek Bajaj|Saurabh Shukla|Supriya Shukla
overview: A first-of-its-kind for her village, Babli takes up a bouncer's job to win over her love, leading to a series of funny and heart-warming events.

title: 7 Khoon Maaf
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Vivaan Shah|Konkona Sen Sharma|Neil Nitin Mukesh|Usha Uthup
overview: Susanna is hungry for love and will go to any extent to find it in its purest form. In her quest for the perfect man, she gets married a number of times as each of her husband's die mysteriously.

title: Fever
cast: Rajeev Khandelwal|Gauahar Khan|Gemma Atkinson|Caterina Murino|Ankita Makwana
overview: An assassin takes on the identity of a writer to escape the law. He has two mysterious and sensuous women masquerading around him - Rhea and Kaavya. Suspense builds as they both uncover the lie.

title: October
cast: Varun Dhawan|Banita Sandhu|Gitanjali Rao|Sahil Vedoliyaa|Isha Chaturvedi
overview: Dan, a 21-year-old carefree boy is always surrounded by a bunch of friends and fellow hotel interns who feed off each other's everyday moments, their ups and downs. Shiuli is also an intern working in the same hotel, who at times is at a receiving end of Dan's audaciousness. Everything was normal in their life until a sudden turn of events smashes Dan and Shiuli's lives together, into a bond.

title: Article 15
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Isha Talwar|Sayani Gupta|Kumud Mishra|Manoj Pahwa
overview: A young IPS officer’s new posting in rural India has him confronting caste disparities and uncomfortable truths in the face of a gruesome crime. When three girls go missing in the fictional village of Lalgaon, two of them are found dead and there is no trace of the third one. Where is she and who is responsible for this heinous act?

title: Vaastav
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Namrata Shirodkar|Ekta Sohini|Kashmera Shah|Mohnish Behl
overview: Raghu, a simpleton, and his best friend decide to run a food stall to get rid of their unemployment. However, Raghu's life takes a drastic turn after he accidentally kills one of their customers and he is pushed into a life of crime.

title: Hera Pheri
cast: Akshay Kumar|Suniel Shetty|Paresh Rawal|Tabu|Gulshan Grover
overview: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.

title: The Bhootnii
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Mouni Roy|Palak Tiwari|Aasif Khan|Sunny Singh
overview: The Virgin Tree, based in the heart of St. Vincent's College, is home to a spirit who awakens every Valentine's Day  in response to the longing for true love. As strange incidents multiply, the Virgin Tree becomes a place of dread,  the authorities call in a veteran para-physicist to confront the entity.

title: Page 16
cast: Aseem Ali Khan|Bidita Bag|Kiran Kumar|Zakir Hussain
overview: Page 16 is a Supernatural thriller. It's a story about an ambitious builder Ajay, whose life turned upside down when he bought a book for his son Harsh. It all started with page 16 of that book where his past and present life gets entangled.

title: Gabbar Is Back
cast: Akshay Kumar|Shruti Haasan|Suman Talwar|Jaideep Ahlawat|Sunil Grover
overview: A vigilante network taking out corrupt officials draws the notice of the authorities.

title: Luck by Chance
cast: Farhan Akhtar|Konkona Sen Sharma|Dimple Kapadia|Rishi Kapoor|Juhi Chawla Mehta
overview: Not wanting the same fate as befell her sisters, Sona Mishra re-locates to Mumbai to try to make a living making movies, but she soon finds that the path she has chosen is not an easy one.

title: Trimurti
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Anil Kapoor|Jackie Shroff|Saeed Jaffrey|Priya Tendulkar
overview: Three brothers band together for a time, separate, then reunite for revenge on the man who killed their father and jailed their mother.

title: Malamaal Weekly
cast: Riteish Deshmukh|Paresh Rawal|Om Puri|Reema Sen|Rajpal Yadav
overview: After one of his customers dies from the shock of winning a lottery, lottery ticket seller Lilaram hatches a plan to have that money all for himself. But others from the village have also got their eyes on the money.

title: Ajnabee
cast: Akshay Kumar|Bobby Deol|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Bipasha Basu|Johnny Lever
overview: Raj and Priya befriend their new neighbors Vicky and Sonia. One day, Raj wakes up in Vicky's house and finds out that Sonia has been murdered and he's being framed for it. On the run, he must try and prove his innocence with the support of his loving wife.

title: Deewana
cast: Rishi Kapoor|Shah Rukh Khan|Divya Bharti|Amrish Puri|Mohnish Behl
overview: A singer marries his biggest fan, but his uncle plans to kill him in order to gain his money.

title: Ishaqzaade
cast: Arjun Kapoor|Parineeti Chopra|Gauahar Khan|Shashank Khaitan|Ratan Singh
overview: While fighting for the political supremacy of their respective families, a Hindu man and a Muslim woman share a forbidden romance.

title: Mumbai Saga
cast: John Abraham|Emraan Hashmi|Suniel Shetty|Kajal Agarwal|Prateik Smita Patil
overview: The film, set in the 1980s and 90s, chronicles the transformation of Bombay to Mumbai. The story is a cat and mouse game between a deadly don, Amartya Rao, who doesn’t think twice before killing, and there’s nobody who could stop him and a cop, who is dogging his every step.

title: Masoom
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Shabana Azmi|Jugal Hansraj|Urmila Matondkar|Aradhana
overview: D.K. Malhotra lives a comfortable lifestyle with his wife, Indu, and two school-going daughters, Pinky and Minni. He works in the office of an Architect. One day while the family is relaxing, D.K. gets a phone call that results in him bringing home a young school-going boy by the name of Rahul. Indu is shocked to learn that Rahul is D.K.'s son from another woman, Bhavana, who is no more. D.K. does his best to make Rahul comfortable, but fails. Rahul also feels that Indu does not really like him, though Pinky and Minni have taken to him in a big way. Finally, D.K. decides to admit Rahul in a boarding school in far off Nainital. Rahul reluctantly goes along with this new-found uncle/friend. It is when Rahul is asked to put his papers together for school that Rahul finds out that D.K. is his biological father. Watch what happens when Rahul disappears from D.K.'s house, and the impact this has on D.K., Indu, and her two daughters.

title: Garam Masala
cast: Akshay Kumar|John Abraham|Paresh Rawal|Daisy Bopanna|Nargis Bagheri
overview: Photographer and serial womaniser, Mac devises a scheme to keep three airhostesses, who are unaware of each other, as  his live-in partners. Everything works fine as long as they only come home every third day. But changing schedules, a jealous friend and his fiancé might just break apart his elaborately structured life of deceit.

title: Kambakkht Ishq
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Aftab Shivdasani|Amrita Arora|Sylvester Stallone
overview: Kambakkht Ishq is about a stuntman and a supermodel that don't believe in love but through a hilarious series of events they fall for each other.

title: Maine Pyar Kiya
cast: Salman Khan|Bhagyashree|Alok Nath|Rajeev Verma|Reema Lagoo
overview: After Suman's father leaves her in the care of another family while he travels abroad, she falls in love with Prem. However, in order to for them to marry, Prem has to prove to Suman's father that he is not the same as his own dad.

title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
cast: Kriti Sanon|Ayushmann Khurrana|Rajkummar Rao|Rohit Choudhary|Pankaj Tripathi
overview: Bitti Mishra is a bohemian Bareilly girl who falls deeply in love with Pritam Vidrohi, an author because she admires his progressive way of thinking. Finding him though proves to be as hard as looking for a needle in the haystack. So Bitti seeks the help of the local printing press-owner, Chirag Dubey on her journey of love.

title: State of Siege: Temple Attack
cast: Akshaye Khanna|Gautam Rode|Vivek Dahiya|Abhimanyu Singh|Parvin Dabas
overview: Based on the true incident of the 2002 terrorist attack in Gujarat's Akshardham temple, the story revolves around the bravery of NSG commandos, who stood up for their country and their people in the worst of times.

title: Hathyar
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Sharad S. Kapoor|Shakti Kapoor|Sachin Khedekar
overview: Hathyar is a narrative which probes into the household of Raghunath, a dreaded gangster. His bereaved son Rohit has to face a lot of flak from the outside world, repeatedly reminding him of the stigma attached to his family because of his father's past. Just like his father, circumstances force Rohit to become a gangster and he gets the name Boxer Bhai. Rohit has weaknesses, he cannot stand any woman being called a prostitute, because his mom, Sonu was one, and he has fallen hard for a married woman, Gauri, who is enduring a marriage with a physically abusive spouse. Rohit snatches her out of this abusive relationships and remarries her. But Rohit's problems are far from over. There is a change in the political scenario and Rohit does not find support from any godfather. He is ordered to be arrested - dead or alive.

title: Bandit Queen
cast: Seema Biswas|Nirmal Pandey|Rajesh Vivek|Raghubir Yadav|Aditya Srivastava
overview: Born a lower-caste girl in rural India's patriarchal society, "married" at 11, repeatedly raped and brutalized, Phoolan Devi finds freedom only as an avenging warrior, the eponymous Bandit Queen. Devi becomes a kind a bloody Robin Hood; this extraordinary biographical film offers both a vivid portrait of a driven woman and a savage critique of the society that made her.

title: Article 15
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Isha Talwar|Sayani Gupta|Kumud Mishra|Manoj Pahwa
overview: A young IPS officer’s new posting in rural India has him confronting caste disparities and uncomfortable truths in the face of a gruesome crime. When three girls go missing in the fictional village of Lalgaon, two of them are found dead and there is no trace of the third one. Where is she and who is responsible for this heinous act?

title: Ginny Weds Sunny
cast: Yami Gautam|Vikrant Massey|Ayesha Raza Mishra|Suhail Nayyar|Rajiv Gupta
overview: Delhi girl Ginny lives with her matchmaker mother and is set up with Sunny, who has given up on the idea of love. He just wants to get married and settle down. But, the match is not that simple. As Ginny meets Sunny, there’s a lot more that comes to the fore than previously imagined in this tale of love, life, weddings and music.

title: Wanted
cast: Salman Khan|Vinod Khanna|Ayesha Takia|Mahesh Manjrekar|Prakash Raj
overview: Radhe is a hardcore gangster. A sharpshooter with a sharp brain, he works for Gani Bhai, the dreaded Mafioso, but on his own terms. Totally fearless, Radhe single handedly eliminates Gani Bhai's enemies one by one; making more enemies than he bargained for.

title: Shivaay
cast: Ajay Devgn|Abigail Eames|Erika Kaar|Sayesha Saigal|Ali Kazmi
overview: Shivaay , a fearless Himalayan mountaineer covered in Lord Shiva tattoos, heads to Bulgaria to fulfill his nine-year-old daughter Gaura’s  wish of seeing her mother Olga, who abandoned them years ago. But their plan goes for a toss when the little girl gets kidnapped in the foreign land. Rescuing her from the masked child-traffickers becomes his only reason for survival.

title: Monica, O My Darling
cast: Rajkummar Rao|Huma Qureshi|Radhika Apte|Sikandar Kher|Bagavathi Perumal
overview: A slick robotics expert joins a murderous plot after a passionate affair takes a sudden turn, but nothing — not even death — is what it seems to be.

title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
cast: Shruti Haasan|Girish Kumar|Sonu Sood|Randhir Kapoor|Poonam Dhillon
overview: A wealthy NRI falls hard for a country girl during a visit to his homeland.

title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Anand Tiwari|Neeraj Kabi|Divya Menon|Swastika Mukherjee
overview: Byomkesh, fresh out of college, agrees to investigate the disappearance of Bhuvan, a chemist. Assisted by Bhuvan's son Ajit, Byomkesh links the case to a larger conspiracy that will unsettle Calcutta.

title: Udaan
cast: Ronit Roy|Rajat Barmecha|Aayan Boradia|Ram Kapoor|Manjot Singh
overview: Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.

title: Thank God
cast: Sidharth Malhotra|Ajay Devgn|Rakul Preet Singh|Seema Pahwa|Kanwaljit Singh
overview: An egoistic real estate broker in huge debts, meets with an accident. As he gains consciousness, he realizes that he is in heaven. God appears before him and informs him that he must play a 'Game of Life'. If he manages to win, he will be sent back to earth; if he loses, he will be sent to hell.

title: Mrs. Chatterjee Vs Norway
cast: Rani Mukerji|Jim Sarbh|Bodhisattva Mazumdar|Saswati Guhathakurta|Soumya Mukherjee
overview: An immigrant Indian mother fights the Norwegian foster care system and legal machinery to win back custody of her children.

title: Sarfarosh
cast: Aamir Khan|Naseeruddin Shah|Sonali Bendre|Mukesh Rishi|Akash Khurana
overview: When terrorists kill a cop's brother and disable his father, he fights back against the smuggling of guns and drugs which plagues his country.

title: Aah
cast: Raj Kapoor|Nargis|Vijayalakshmi|Pran Sikand|Ramesh Sinha
overview: At the behest of his father, Raj writes letters to Chandra, a prospective bride. However, unbeknownst to him, it is Neelu, Chandra's sister, who responds to his letters and falls in love with him.

title: Mirch Masala
cast: Smita Patil|Naseeruddin Shah|Om Puri|Deepti Naval|Suresh Oberoi
overview: Early-1940s, rural British India. When a woman decides to fight against the village's despotic subedar and is supported by the guard of the local spice factory, more women join to defy the prevailing oppression.

title: Selfiee
cast: Akshay Kumar|Emraan Hashmi|Nushrratt Bharuccha|Diana Penty|Mahesh Thakur
overview: RTO officer Om Prakash strikes a golden opportunity to meet his icon, Vijay Kumar. Bhut when his love gets spurned by the superstar, a clash of egos ensues.

title: Dil Bole Hadippa!
cast: Rani Mukerji|Shahid Kapoor|Anupam Kher|Dalip Tahil|Rakhi Sawant
overview: Veera, a fire-cracker of a girl who lives in a small village but dreams of playing cricket in the big league. Rohan is an accomplished captain of a county cricket team in England. Rohan returns to India to captain his father's cricket team which has been losing for the last 8 years. In a Village where girls don't play Cricket, Veera has to put on a put on a turban & beard to live her dream.

title: Rajput
cast: Rajesh Khanna|Dharmendra|Hema Malini|Vinod Khanna|Ranjeeta Kaur
overview: Unable to handle the taking of his kingdom by an Indian Government decree, the Maharaja kills himself. His son, Jaipal, takes over as the Maharaja, turns rebel, and refuses to hand over his title and kingdom to the Government. It is in this background that Police Superintendent Dhirendra Singh assumes his duties.

title: Mughal-e-Azam
cast: Dilip Kumar|Prithviraj Kapoor|Madhubala|Durga Khote|Nigar Sultana
overview: In the 16th century, when Prince Salim falls in love with a beautiful courtesan named Anarkali, Emperor Akbar's disapproval leads to a battle between father and son.

title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
cast: Kartik Aaryan|Kiara Advani|Gajraj Rao|Supriya Pathak|Siddharth Randeria
overview: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.

title: Taal
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Anil Kapoor|Akshaye Khanna|Amrish Puri|Alok Nath
overview: Businessman Manav falls for aspiring singer, Mansi, but their romance faces an uphill climb when Manav must depart and Mansi's suave manager moves in.

title: Kathal
cast: Sanya Malhotra|Anant Joshi|Vijay Raaz|Rajpal Yadav|Neha Saraf
overview: When two prized jackfruits disappear from a politician's garden, a spirited cop's investigation takes an unexpected turn as she digs for the truth.

title: Andaaz
cast: Akshay Kumar|Lara Dutta|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Rajeev Verma|Pankaj Dheer
overview: Young Raj Malhotra (Akshay Kumar) lives with his elder brother, Rohit; his sister-in-law Kiran, and a niece. After an accident fractures his leg, he is unable to walk for some time. Due to psychological reasons, he cannot walk even after the fracture heals. When the Malhotras move to Dehra Dun, Raj befriends young Kajal (Dutta), as both share a common passion for airplanes. Kajal encourages Raj to walk, and succeeds. Years later the two continue to be fast friends, and everyone expects them to marry soon. Then Raj is recruited by the Indian Air Force and goes for training for a year and a half. After his training gets over, he rushes to Kajal to propose to her, only to find out that she has given her heart to a multimillionaire, Karan Singhania (Verma), who owns several airplanes and choppers. Raj congratulates Kajal and Karan, but does not reveal his true feelings.

title: Pyaasa
cast: Guru Dutt|Waheeda Rehman|Mala Sinha|Johnny Walker|Rehman
overview: Vijay, a destitute poet, searches for true love while attempting to get his work published. With the assistance of two women in his life, his dream comes true - but at a cost that causes Vijay to rethink his worldview.

title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag: Journey of a Woman
cast: Jaya Bachchan|Rani Mukerji|Konkona Sen Sharma|Abhishek Bachchan|Anupam Kher
overview: Badki and Chutki live a fun-filled life in Banaras, playing pranks, sneaking off to see a forbidden mujra, and soaking up all the excitement that goes on the ghats of the Ganga. Badki is aware that the family is in dire straits, but she and her mother protect Chutki at all costs. When things get worse, Badki decides to go to Mumbai and seek a living for the family.

title: Jawaani Jaaneman
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Alaya F|Tabu|Chloé Booyens|Chunky Pandey
overview: The carefree life of a 40-year-old playboy comes to a standstill when he comes to know that he has a 20 something-year-old daughter.

title: Kambakkht Ishq
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Aftab Shivdasani|Amrita Arora|Sylvester Stallone
overview: Kambakkht Ishq is about a stuntman and a supermodel that don't believe in love but through a hilarious series of events they fall for each other.

title: Ajnabee
cast: Akshay Kumar|Bobby Deol|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Bipasha Basu|Johnny Lever
overview: Raj and Priya befriend their new neighbors Vicky and Sonia. One day, Raj wakes up in Vicky's house and finds out that Sonia has been murdered and he's being framed for it. On the run, he must try and prove his innocence with the support of his loving wife.

title: Raabta
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Kriti Sanon|Jim Sarbh|Vikas Verma|Rajkummar Rao
overview: An inseparable couple Saira and Shiva find themselves in a complicated situation when a stranger claims to be her reincarnated lover from their previous lifetime, hellbent on destroying their relationship and winning her back.

title: Dhadak
cast: Ishaan Khatter|Janhvi Kapoor|Ashutosh Rana|Aditya Kumar|Aishwarya Narkar
