overview: Madhukar and Parthavi fall head over heels in love with each other, but the fact that they belong to different castes of society, becomes an obstacle in their romance. The lovers dare to go against societal norms and battle all odds for the sake of love.

title: Badlapur
cast: Varun Dhawan|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Huma Qureshi|Yami Gautam|Divya Dutta
overview: After his wife and son are killed, a young man finds out the man behind the murder and fights against him, along committing some big mistakes.

title: Masoom
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Shabana Azmi|Jugal Hansraj|Urmila Matondkar|Aradhana
overview: D.K. Malhotra lives a comfortable lifestyle with his wife, Indu, and two school-going daughters, Pinky and Minni. He works in the office of an Architect. One day while the family is relaxing, D.K. gets a phone call that results in him bringing home a young school-going boy by the name of Rahul. Indu is shocked to learn that Rahul is D.K.'s son from another woman, Bhavana, who is no more. D.K. does his best to make Rahul comfortable, but fails. Rahul also feels that Indu does not really like him, though Pinky and Minni have taken to him in a big way. Finally, D.K. decides to admit Rahul in a boarding school in far off Nainital. Rahul reluctantly goes along with this new-found uncle/friend. It is when Rahul is asked to put his papers together for school that Rahul finds out that D.K. is his biological father. Watch what happens when Rahul disappears from D.K.'s house, and the impact this has on D.K., Indu, and her two daughters.

title: Chup Chup Ke
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Paresh Rawal|Rajpal Yadav|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Neha Dhupia
overview: After surviving a suicide attempt in which his family and fellow villagers believe he drowned, a debt-ridden man decides to start his life afresh in another village. He pretends to be mute and starts working for a rich man where he falls in love with his mute daughter.

title: Jawaani Jaaneman
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Alaya F|Tabu|Chloé Booyens|Chunky Pandey
overview: The carefree life of a 40-year-old playboy comes to a standstill when he comes to know that he has a 20 something-year-old daughter.

title: Aitraaz
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Amrish Puri|Paresh Rawal
overview: Aitraaz revolves around the character Raj Malhotra (Akshay Kumar) a successful businessman who has everything going for him, including a lovely wife (Kareena Kapoor). Just when he thinks things can't get any better, Sonia (Priyanka Chopra) - his ex-girlfriend, now the boss's wife - walks back into his life - and she wants Raj at any cost.

title: Bala
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Bhumi Pednekar|Yami Gautam|Saurabh Shukla|Javed Jaffrey
overview: A man suffering from alopecia copes with his lack of self-confidence and the societal pressure that comes with being bald.

title: Pardes
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Amrish Puri|Mahima Chaudhry|Apurva Agnihotri|Padmavati Rao
overview: Kishorilal wants an Indian bride for his westernised son. He gets him engaged to Ganga, his friend's daughter, and brings her to USA. But she shares a deeper bond with Arjun, Kishorilal's foster son.

title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Salman Khan|Ajay Devgn|Vikram Gokhale|Smita Jaykar
overview: A newly-wed man discovers that his wife is in love with another man and decides to unite them. Ignoring the ridicule he might have to face for this, he takes his wife to Italy in search of her love.

title: Veerana
cast: Jasmin|Hemant Birje|Sahila Chaddha|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Satish Shah
overview: A beautiful young girl, possessed from childhood by a vengeful spirit, wanders around lonely places to seduce and kill people and thus, gradually becomes lost in a dark world of revenge and lust.

title: Drive
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Jacqueline Fernandez|Vikramjeet Virk|Sapna Pabbi|Boman Irani
overview: A notorious thief allies with a street racer for a grand heist involving an elaborate game of deceit with authorities, who have their own dirty secrets.

title: Bobby
cast: Rishi Kapoor|Dimple Kapadia|Pran Sikand|Sonia Sahni|Premnath Malhotra
overview: Raja is the 18-year-old son of a wealthy Bombay businessman who suffers from his parents coldness and neglect. Shortly after finishing school he meets Bobby, the 16-year-old daughter of a poor Christian fisherman. They fall head over heels for each other, but they'll need everything they have to defend their love as their families won't accept them marrying each other...

title: Shree 420
cast: Raj Kapoor|Nargis|Nemo|Nadira|Lalita Pawar
overview: The story of a small-town man who comes to make it big in the city, where he is almost instantly relieved of all his possessions. Homeless and penniless, he is taken in by a woman who looks after him.

title: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Vaani Kapoor|Kanwaljit Singh|Gourav Sharma|Goutam Sharma
overview: Manu, a bodybuilder from Chandigarh, India, falls in love with Maanvi, a Zumba teacher. All seems well until a revelation causes turmoil in their love story.

title: Rockstar
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Nargis Fakhri|Shammi Kapoor|Aditi Rao Hydari|Kumud Mishra
overview: College student Janardhan is a simpleton who desperately seeks inspiration for the musician inside him. Although heartbreak helps him reach his goal, it also leads him to self-destruction.

title: Cuttputlli
cast: Akshay Kumar|Rakul Preet Singh|Sargun Mehta|Chandrachur Singh|Gurpreet Ghuggi
overview: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.

title: Raid
cast: Ajay Devgn|Saurabh Shukla|Ileana D'Cruz|Gayathri Iyer|Sheeba Chaddha
overview: After receiving an anonymous tip, a tax officer leads a raid on the mansion of the most powerful figure in Lucknow, a member of parliament who has been evading income tax for years.

title: Dil Ka Rishta
cast: Arjun Rampal|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Priyanshu Chatterjee|Rakhee Gulzar|Isha Koppikar
overview: Wealthy Jai Mehta is a young man with a heart that has gold. He supports many charitable organizations in India and one day when he visits a deaf and dumb school, he falls in love with the teacher there, Tia Sharma, expresses his love to her and is openly humiliated when she introduces her fiancé, Raj. Soon after Raj and Tia gets married and are proud parents of a baby boy, Anshu. A heart broken Jai takes to alcohol and one night under the influence of alcohol, Jai's car collide with Raj and Tia's car mysteriously killing Raj and seriously injuring Tia about the head. Tia is treated by doctor, recovers but is unable to remember anything from her troubled past. Jai makes it his responsibility to take care of her, slowly she falls in love with him and proposes marriage. But will this marriage takes place or will Tia remembers her past and takes revenge from Jai for the death of her husband and for her current condition

title: Band Baaja Baaraat
cast: Ranveer Singh|Anushka Sharma|Neeraj Sood|Puru Chibber|Manish Chaudhary
overview: Shruti and Bittoo decide to start a wedding planning company together after they graduate from university, but romance gets in the way of business.

title: Falak
cast: Jackie Shroff|Rakhee Gulzar|Madhavi|Anupam Kher|Paresh Rawal
overview: Two partners namely, Murlidhar and Narang, betray their third partner and take over his business. Ramnath works as a watchman in this organization, and he sees illegal business taking place, and attempts to put a stop to this, only to get killed in the process, leaving behind a widow and two sons to fend for themselves. The police classify this death as an accident, and the management refuses to pay any compensation. Years later, the two sons have grown up and remember the death of their dad and the humiliation suffered at the hands of the new owners, and devise a plan to avenge this, and find that the owners have friends in the police force, as well as politicians, who will leave no stone unturned to protect both Narang and Murlidhar.

title: Udta Punjab
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Alia Bhatt|Kareena Kapoor Khan|Diljit Dosanjh|Satish Kaushik
overview: Drug abuse and the darker side of Punjab rear their heads in the intense, interwoven tales of a policeman, a doctor, a migrant worker, and a rockstar.

title: Kaabil
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Yami Gautam|Ronit Roy|Rohit Roy|Narendra Jha
overview: Rohan is a kind, happy young man who has been blind since birth and works as a voice-over artist for a living. Through friends, he meets Supriya, a working woman who is also blind, but proudly independent. The two start liking each other and get married. Rohan toughest journey starts in his quest of vengeance for Supriya's indirect murderers.

title: Luka Chuppi
cast: Kartik Aaryan|Kriti Sanon|Vinay Pathak|Pankaj Tripathi|Aparshakti Khurana
overview: The story of a television reporter in Mathura who falls in love with a headstrong woman.

title: Amaran
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Sai Pallavi|Rahul Bose|Bhuvan Arora|Lallu Prasath
overview: A heroic true story of Major Mukund Varadarajan, an Indian Army officer who displayed extraordinary bravery during a counterterrorism mission in Kashmir’s Shopian district. The film captures his courage in protecting his nation and the devotion of his wife Indhu Rebecaa Varghese.

title: Thug Life
cast: Kamal Haasan|Silambarasan|Trisha Krishnan|Ashok Selvan|Abhirami
overview: In a world ruled by crime and betrayal, mafia kingpin Sakthivel and his brother Manikkam rescue a young boy, Amaran, during a violent police shootout and raise him as their own. Years later, when an assassination attempt shakes Sakthivel's empire, suspicion turns inward. Consumed by vengeance, Sakthivel sets out to destroy the very family he once built.

title: Tourist Family
cast: M. Sasikumar|Simran|Mithun Jai Sankar|Kamalesh Jegan|Yogi Babu
overview: A quirky Sri Lankan family seeking a fresh start in India transforms a disconnected neighborhood into a vibrant community with their infectious love and kindness.

title: Ace
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Rukmini Vasanth|Yogi Babu|B. S. Avinash|Babloo Prithiveeraj
overview: Kannan,  with a past comes to Malaysia to turn over a new leaf. But when he realises that the girl he loves needs money to get out of a difficult situation, he commits a robbery that makes him the target of a fearsome gangster and the girl’s stepfather, an immoral cop.

title: Arunachalam
cast: Rajinikanth|Rambha|Soundarya|Jaishankar|Ravichandran
overview: Arunachalam, the son of a  prominent village elder, discovers the truth about his past.

title: Retro
cast: Suriya|Pooja Hegde|Joju George|Jayaram|Vidhu
overview: Raised by a criminal father, Paarivel Kannan leaves behind his adoptive family to build a quiet life with his love, Rukmini. But his violent past won't let him go.

title: Eleven
cast: Naveen Chandra|Abhirami|Shashank|Reyaa Hari|Dhileban
overview: A series of murders targeting twins leads a detective down a dark path of revenge and childhood trauma.

title: Meiyazhagan
cast: Arvind Swamy|Karthi|Rajkiran|Jayaprakash|Sri Divya
overview: Twenty-two years after losing his home, Arulmozhi Varman returns to his native Thanjavur to attend his cousin's wedding. Amidst the celebrations, Arul is reintroduced to an upbeat man whom he cannot recall. With the help of the unknown man, Arul reconnects with his past.

title: Lover
cast: Manikandan|Sri Gouri Priya Reddy|Kanna Ravi|Harini Sundararajan|Harish Kumar
overview: An alcoholic designer struggles to save his six-year relationship while facing personal challenges and misunderstandings. As their bond is tested, he begins to confront his past and question whether love alone is enough to hold them together.

title: Maharaja
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Anurag Kashyap|Sachana Namidass|Natarajan Subramaniam|Abhirami
overview: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "Lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object, jeer at his request until they learn what they're really looking for.

title: Saravana
cast: Silambarasan|Jyothika|Prakash Raj|Vivek|Meghna Naidu
overview: Saravana and Krishna are close buddies in college. Saravana sees a video tape of Krishna's sister Sadhana studying in London and falls in love with her. So to meet her, Saravana goes with Krishna to a village near Tirunelveli where he finds that there is a bloody war going on between two warring caste groups. Krishna's brother Soundarapandi his wife and Krishna are killed by the rival group of Dorai Singam. However Saravana saves Sadhana and takes her to Chennai. Initially Sadhana is not accepted by Saravana's large family but slowly when they come to know about her background they support and love her. The rest of the film is how Saravana tries to help Sadhana to go back to London, and in the process eliminates the entire gang of Dorai Singam single-handedly.

title: Vikram
cast: Kamal Haasan|Fahadh Faasil|Vijay Sethupathi|Narain|Chemban Vinod Jose
overview: Amar is assigned to investigate a case of serial killings. When Amar investigates the case, he realizes it is not what it seems to be and following down this path will lead to nothing but war between everyone involved.

title: Sivaji: The Boss
cast: Rajinikanth|Vivek|Suman Talwar|Shriya Saran|Manivannan
overview: A wealthy engineer arrives in India with the mission of serving the nation and investing in the country's welfare but is met with strong opposition from corrupt officials and politicians. After being faced with insurmountable hardships, he decides to take drastic measures.

title: Good Bad Ugly
cast: Ajith Kumar|Trisha Krishnan|Arjun Das|Sunil Varma|Prabhu
overview: AK, a powerful gangster, surrenders to the police, in hopes that his wife and son will live a peaceful life. When he is released 17 years later, he learns that his son is falsely accused of serious crimes. To protect him, he is forced to go back to his old ways, facing enemies, both old and new.

title: Varisu
cast: Vijay|R. Sarathkumar|Jayasudha|Srikanth|Shaam
overview: Vijay, The prodigal son of business tycoon Rajendran agrees to take over the reins of the business, much to the chagrin of his brothers. But can Vijay prove himself to be a worthy varisu and also reunite his now-broken family?

title: Leo
cast: Vijay|Sanjay Dutt|Arjun Sarja|Trisha Krishnan|Gautham Vasudev Menon
overview: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, but it brings forth consequences with connection to a dangerous world, one which will shake his carefully constructed life to its very core.

title: Dragon
cast: Pradeep Ranganathan|Anupama Parameswaran|Kayadu Lohar|Mysskin|Gautham Vasudev Menon
overview: After a top student faces rejection and heartbreak, he cons his way into a finance career. But keeping up the facade proves tricky as the lies build.

title: Devil's Double Next Level
cast: Santhanam|Selvaraghavan|Geethika Tiwary|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Rajendran
overview: A well-known movie critic is invited by a strange person to watch a special horror film. But once the movie starts, he finds himself trapped inside it. The world keeps shifting timelines, endless day-to-night cycles, non-linear narration, and scary things from horror movies come to life. To escape, he must either stop reviewing movies forever or find a way to defeat the ghost that trapped him.

title: Mersal
cast: Vijay|S. J. Suryah|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Nithya Menen|Kajal Agarwal
overview: A few individuals in the medical profession are murdered or kidnapped, and the cop investigating the case suspects a doctor and arrests him. But is he the one who is behind these crimes? And why are they being committed?

title: Vidaamuyarchi
cast: Ajith Kumar|Trisha Krishnan|Arjun Sarja|Regina Cassandra|Aarav Kizar
overview: While struggling with his broken marriage, Arjun is pulled into a desperate search for his wife, Kayal, when she goes missing during a road trip.

title: Kanguva
cast: Suriya|Bobby Deol|Disha Patani|B. S. Avinash|Kovai Sarala
overview: A bounty hunter in present day, learns about his previous life as a legendary warrior, when fate unites him with a mutant kid.

title: Etharkkum Thunindhavan
cast: Suriya|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Vinay Rai|Sathyaraj|Saranya Ponvannan
overview: A lawyer turns judge jury and executioner and goes after a gang, led by a minister's son, that threatens women with videos of them.

title: Enthiran
cast: Rajinikanth|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Danny Denzongpa|Santhanam|Karunas
overview: Dr. Vaseegaran creates Chitti, a powerful robot in his own image, but it is rejected by the scientific body AIRD due to its lack of human behaviour and emotions. After a lightning strike triggers emotions in Chitti, he begins to develop human-like feelings. However, Chitti falls in love with Dr. Vaseegaran's fiancée, Sana, and turns against his creator, leading to dangerous consequences.

title: Raayan
cast: Dhanush|Dushara Vijayan|Sundeep Kishan|Kalidas Jayaram|S. J. Suryah
overview: Raayan, a simpleton patriarch has to protect his family when they inadvertently get muddled in a violent world with whirlpool of murder, debauchery, feud, politics and power, a quagmire that he has repeatedly warned them not to get pulled into.

title: Minnale
cast: R. Madhavan|Abbas|Reema Sen|Vivek|Nagesh
overview: Rajesh Shivakumar is a college hoodlum who has his first crush on Reena Joseph, who unfortunately, is engaged to be married to Rajiv Samuel, an Indian engineer settled abroad. In an effort to gain her heart, Maddy impersonates Rajiv and gets close to Reena, aided by his grandfather Subbuni and his crooked sidekick Chockalingam. However, the real Rajiv shows up, bringing a shocking end to Reena's romantic interlude.

title: The Greatest of All Time
cast: Vijay|Prashanth|Prabhu Deva|Mohan|Ajmal Ameer
overview: A once decorated member of the Special Anti-Terrorism Squad (SATS) is called back into action by his former colleagues for an important mission, setting him on a dangerous collision course with his own past.

title: Petta
cast: Rajinikanth|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Vijay Sethupathi|Sananth|M. Sasikumar
overview: A hostel warden becomes the target of a dreaded politician and his gangster son, but little do they realise that it is they who should fear him.

title: Kanchana
cast: Raghava Lawrence|R. Sarathkumar|Kovai Sarala|Devadarshini|Sriman
overview: Raghava (Lawrence) is a happy go lucky guy who loves to play cricket but is a chicken at heart. The very mention of the word ghost gives him shivers so much that he sleeps with his mom (Kovai Sarala). He is also in love with Priya (Lakshmi Rai). However, an attempt to play a cricket match in an unused ground leads Raghava to get something dark to his home. The dark spirit begins to cause few weird things at home and one day it enters the body of Raghava which goes on killing few specific people. Who is that evil spirit? Why is it killing few people? Can Raghava get rid of the spirit? All this forms the rest of the story.

title: Jailer
cast: Rajinikanth|Vinayakan|Vasanth Ravi|Yogi Babu|Ramya Krishnan
overview: Muthuvel Pandian, a retired, stern yet compassionate jailer lives a peaceful life with his family, but trouble knocks his door when his cop son’s tryst with an antique mafia gang goes awry and forces Muthu to step back into a dark world he had voluntarily took a break from.

title: Jai Bhim
cast: Suriya|Lijomol Jose|Baby Joshika Maya|Manikandan|Rajisha Vijayan
overview: A pregnant woman from a primitive tribal community, searches desperately for her husband, who is missing from police custody. So as to find her husband and seek justice for them, as their voice, a High Court advocate rises in support. Will their battle for justice succeed?

title: Chandramukhi 2
cast: Kangana Ranaut|Raghava Lawrence|Vadivelu|Lakshmi Menon|Mahima Nambiar
overview: A wealthy family moves into the Vettaiyapuram palace to renovate their ancestral temple and perform a pooja, unaware of that it will reawaken the feud between a classical dancer, Chandramukhi and Vettaiyan Raja from centuries ago.

title: Mahaan
cast: Vikram|Dhruv Vikram|Bobby Simha|Simran|Sananth
overview: A man's family leaves him when he strays from the path of ideological living in his search for personal freedom. However, as he realizes his ambitions, he also misses the presence of his son in his life. Having fulfilled his dream of becoming a billionaire, does life give him a second chance to be a father?

title: Hey! Sinamika
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Aditi Rao Hydari|Kajal Agarwal|Nakshathra Nagesh|Yogi Babu
overview: A wife who feels suffocated by her husband's incessant attention hires a psychologist to make him fall in love with her so that she can separate from him.

title: Kaththi
cast: Vijay|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Sathish|Neil Nitin Mukesh|Tota Roy Chowdhury
overview: Kathiresan aka Kaththi, a criminal, escapes from the Kolkata prison and comes to Chennai, where he comes across his doppelganger Jeevanandham, fighting for his life after being shot at by unknown men. Kathir decides to pass off as Jeeva and make away with a lump sum amount but once he realizes who Jeeva really is, Kathir turns a crusader.

title: Master
cast: Vijay|Vijay Sethupathi|Arjun Das|Malavika Mohanan|Andrea Jeremiah
overview: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster, who uses the children of the school for criminal activities.

title: Nilavuku En Mel Ennadi Kobam
cast: Pavish Narayanan|Anikha Surendran|Priya Prakash Varrier|Mathew Thomas|Venkatesh Menon
overview: Prabhu, a young chef, is ready to move forward with an arranged marriage when his past love, Nila, unexpectedly reenters his life, challenging his plans and emotions.

title: Manmatha Leelai
cast: Ashok Selvan|Smruthi Venkat|Riya Suman|Samyuktha Hegde|Chandran
overview: Two one-night stands in the life of a man that happen 10 years apart seem to mirror each other. Is there something more to them than what meets our eyes?

title: Amanuda Bhayam
cast: R.G. Harikrishnan|J.S. Sree Vishnu|Akhilsom|Rajesh Arapurayil|Arya
overview: This film shows the research project of a parapsychology student named Abdul who visits a haunted forest with his friend Subramani.

title: Indian 2: Zero Tolerance
cast: Kamal Haasan|Siddharth|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Jagan|Rishikanth
overview: As corruption becomes rampant in the country, a group of idealistic youngsters attract attention of freedom fighter-turned-vigilante Senapathy through social media, who returns to his homeland to finish what he started.

title: Subramaniapuram
cast: Jai Sampath|M. Sasikumar|Ganja Karuppu|Maari|Vichithran
overview: In 1980, five friends live a carefree life in Madurai until they commit a near-perfect crime but do not manage to get away with it.

cast: Rajinikanth|Akshay Kumar|Amy Jackson|Sudhanshu Pandey|Adil Hussain
overview: An ornithologist who commits suicide returns as fifth force to wreack vengeance on mankind for harming birds with mobile phone radiation. The only thing that is standing in his way is 2.0, the upgraded version of Chitti, the robot.

title: Rolex
cast: Suriya|Vijay Sethupathi|Arjun Das
overview: Spin-off story about Rolex, as a prequel to  Vikram (2022) to show us the rise of the cartel leader during the early 90s.

title: Vettaiyan
cast: Rajinikanth|Amitabh Bachchan|Fahadh Faasil|Rana Daggubati|Manju Warrier
overview: A sought-after Supercop gets caught in a series of unexpected events when he encounters a suspect who is accused of being involved in a murder case.

title: Kudumbasthan
cast: Manikandan|Saanve Meghana|Guru Somasundaram|Sundarrajan|Nivedita Rajappan
overview: Naveen's relationship with his parents becomes strained after he marries a oppressed-caste girl. Though they eventually reconcile, his sudden unemployment puts him in a difficult position. As financial pressures mount, Naveen must navigate societal challenges and personal struggles to regain stability and rebuild harmony within his middle-class family.

title: Gajaana
cast: Vedhika|Inigo Prabhakaran|Prathap Pothan|Yogi Babu|Velu Prabhakaran
overview: A group of greedy people were entering enchanted Forest in search of treasure and unexpectedly they over come hurdles in a mysterious way. did they find the solution and did escape from the hurdles in the forest

title: Chinna Marumagal
cast: Sivaji Ganesan|Siva|Mohini|Delhi Ganesh|Thiyagu

title: Theri
cast: Vijay|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Amy Jackson|Prabhu|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: When an honest cop, Vijay Kumar's family is ruthlessly slaughtered by a politician and his aides, he decides to change his identity and commits his life to bring his daughter up in a serene atmosphere. But some freak events end up compromising his identity and what he does to save his daughter and avenge the death of his family unfurls as Theri.

title: Captain Miller
cast: Dhanush|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Nivedhithaa Sathish|Elango Kumaravel|Shivaraj Kumar
overview: In the 1930s, during the British Raj, Analeesan "Eesa", a former soldier of the British Indian Army called Captain Miller, is on a mission to protect the people from the British after witnessing an atrocity.

title: Anaagarigam
cast: Vibhu Raman|Prajwal Poovaiah|Waheeda|Babilona|Rishikesh
overview: Story of a newly married professor who suffers his whole life for having an affair with his student.

title: Jana Nayagan
cast: Vijay|Bobby Deol|Pooja Hegde|Mamitha Baiju|Gautham Vasudev Menon

title: Ayan
cast: Suriya|Tamannaah Bhatia|Prabhu|Akashdeep Saigal|Jagan
overview: Deva works for Arumugam, a smuggler, who has taken care of him for many years. However, when his best friend gets killed, Deva decides to help the police to nab a dangerous drug lord.

title: Star
cast: Kavin Raj|Lal|Aaditi Pohankar|Preity Mukhundhan|Geetha Kailasam
overview: Follows a youngster Kalai and his aspirations of becoming a 'Star' in the Tamil Film Industry. Born in a lower-middle-class family, will Kalai overcome all his struggles to emerge as a Star?

title: Dada
cast: Kavin Raj|Aparna Das|Harish Kumar|Pradeep Anthony|Arvind Ezhilarasan
overview: Manikandan and Sindhu, final year college students, become parents accidentally. Situations separate them, forcing Manikandan to raise his child, Adhithya, as a single parent. What follows is a beautiful tale of a father and son and their journey against all odds.

title: Coolie
cast: Rajinikanth|Nagarjuna Akkineni|Upendra|Sathyaraj|Soubin Shahir
overview: Delves into a man's relentless quest for vengeance since youth, driven by righting past wrongs, shaping his very existence.

title: Soorarai Pottru
cast: Suriya|Aparna Balamurali|Paresh Rawal|Mohan Babu|Urvashi
overview: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

cast: Dhanush|Shruti Haasan|Sivakarthikeyan|Prabhu|Sunder Ramu
overview: Ram and Janani are high school sweethearts who eventually get married. However, Janani is mystified when Ram commits suicide all of a sudden and she tries to find out the truth behind his death.

title: Joe
cast: Rio Raj|Malavika Manoj|Bhavya Trikha|Charle|Anbu Thasan
overview: Joe, who is reeling from a heartbreak by his college sweetheart Suchitra, reluctantly marries Shruthi , who isn't ready to accept him as her husband because of the ghosts from her own past.

title: Kaithi
cast: Karthi|Narain|Arjun Das|Harish Uthaman|George Mariyan
overview: Dilli, a convicted criminal, is out on parole to meet his daughter. However, a drug bust sets him off on a mission to save the life of police officers.

title: Anniyan
cast: Vikram|Sadha|Prakash Raj|Vivek|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Unable to bear the growing corruption in society and rejection from his love interest,  a meek lawyer becomes diagnosed with multiple personality disorder due to which the personalities of  a vigilante killer and a metrosexual start existing within him.

title: Test
cast: R. Madhavan|Nayanthara|Siddharth|Meera Jasmine|Kaali Venkat
overview: The worlds of three ordinary people converge during a historic cricket match, ultimately forcing them to make life-altering decisions.

title: Seevalaperi Pandi
cast: Napoleon|Saranya Ponvannan|Ahana|Vagai Chandrasekar|Nizhalgal Ravi
overview: Seevalaperi Pandi is a 1994 Tamil drama film directed by Prathap K. Pothan. The film features Napoleon in lead role making his debut as hero. The film, produced by P. G. Srikanth, had musical score by Adithyan and was released on 23 June 1994. The film is based on the life of 'Seevalaperi' Pandi.

title: Adithya Varma
cast: Dhruv Vikram|Banita Sandhu|Priya Anand|Raja|Dheepa Ramanujam
overview: A brilliant and short-tempered young surgeon goes down a self-destructive path when the love of his life is forced to marry another man.

title: Thimiru
cast: Vishal Krishna|Reema Sen|Sriya Reddy|Vadivelu|Manoj K Jayan
overview: Ganesh comes to Chennai to pursue his studies. A group of goons are on his pursuit. A kind hearted Ganesh is eventually forced to go back to his old ways to fight them and restore order.

title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part I
cast: Vikram|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Ravi Mohan|Karthi|Trisha Krishnan
overview: The Chola kingdom is under threat from forces both internal and external, and with crown prince Aaditha Karikalan, his younger brother Arunmozhi Varman and the emperor, Sundara Cholar separated by situations, it is up to a messenger to ensure the safety of the kingdom. Can he succeed in his mission, especially with Karikalan's former girlfriend, Nandhini, plotting to bring down the entire Chola empire?

title: Veera Dheera Sooran: Part 2
cast: Vikram|S. J. Suryah|Suraj Venjaramoodu|Dushara Vijayan|Prudhviraj
overview: Kaali is a provision store owner and a loving husband and father, is brought back into the life of crime, when his former boss's son is being hunted by the police.

title: Spyder
cast: Mahesh Babu|Rakul Preet Singh|S. J. Suryah|Bharath Srinivasan|RJ Balaji
overview: A surveillance expert who wants to help people comes across a foe who is the very definition of evil. Can he stop the man before he destroys everything?

title: Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
cast: Karthi|Rakul Preet Singh|Abhimanyu Singh|Bose Venkat|Sonia Bose Venkat
overview: A hardnosed cop goes after a gang of ruthless dacoits who have been terrorising residents along the highway for a decade.

title: Ratsasan
cast: Vishnu Vishal|Amala Paul|Suzane George|Kaali Venkat|Radha Ravi
overview: A serial killer is murdering school girls, and a newbie cop has to track him down before the victim count increases.

title: Roja
cast: Arvind Swamy|Madhoo|Nasaar|Janagaraj|Pankaj Kapur
overview: Roja lives in a Tamil village, and her sister is about to marry a man from the city, who decides to marry Roja instead and gets a job assignment in Kashmir, where some militants decide to kidnap them.

title: Jagame Thandhiram
cast: Dhanush|James Cosmo|Joju George|Kalaiyarasan|Aishwarya Lekshmi
overview: When a clever, carefree gangster is recruited to help an overseas crime lord take down a rival, he is caught off guard by the moral dilemmas that follow.

title: Kathakali
cast: Vishal Krishna|Catherine Tresa|Pawan|Sreejith Ravi|Karunas
overview: Returning from the states to marry his girlfriend, a common man is blamed for the murder of a local don due to their enmity in the past. He is caught in a web of conspiracies as he struggles to prove his innocence and the don's in-laws order their henchmen to take him down.

title: Vishwaroopam
cast: Kamal Haasan|Rahul Bose|Andrea Jeremiah|Pooja Kumar|Shekhar Kapur
overview: Vishwanathan, a Kathak dance teacher in New York, is happy in his marriage with Nirupama, a nuclear oncologist who married him to pursue higher studies in the USA. Deciding to cut ties with her husband, Nirupama hires a private detective to monitor his activities. To her utter shock, certain truths about her husband are subsequently revealed, setting off a chain of events that will change both of their lives irreversibly.

title: Love Today
cast: Pradeep Ranganathan|Ivana|Akshaya Udhayakumar|Raveena Ravi|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: A young couple is made to exchange their phones for a day. What follows is a hilarious and emotional sequence of events that puts their lives in misery.

title: Vetrivel
cast: M. Sasikumar|Nikhila Vimal|Miya George|Ilavarasu|Prabhu
overview: A brother attempts to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy situations...

title: Ayalaan
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Siddharth|Venkatesh Senguttuvan|Sharad Kelkar|Rakul Preet Singh
overview: A lost alien seeks help from four friends to get back to his home planet, while a group of hostile scientists tries to capture it.

title: Bombay
cast: Arvind Swamy|Manisha Koirala|Prakash Raj|Nasaar|Kitty
overview: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Trisha Krishnan|Aditya Baskar|Gouri G Kishan|Devadarshini
overview: Ram is a photographer and nature lover who travels all around India capturing moments. On a chance visit to his hometown Tanjavur, he goes into his school and begins to walk down memory lane to 1994 when he was a student harboring feelings for his classmate Janu.

title: Vada Chennai
cast: Dhanush|Andrea Jeremiah|Samuthirakani|Daniel Balaji|Kishore
overview: Anbu, a young carrom player in North Chennai becomes inadvertently involved in an ongoing conflict between two local gangsters.

title: Thalapathi
cast: Rajinikanth|Mammootty|Arvind Swamy|Srividya|Jaishankar
overview: Surya, a courageous man who was raised in the slums, fights for the rights of the poor and befriends Deva, who hires him as his commander and changes his life completely.

title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part II
cast: Vikram|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Ravi Mohan|Karthi|Trisha Krishnan
overview: 968 AD. The Pandyan assassins gather once again to destroy the Chola dynasty. Now the mighty Chola princes must fight the Pandyas, the Rashtrakutas and other Chola enemies who have joined forces. Also, at play are the rumours of Ponniyin Selvan’s death at sea, the powerful Pazhuvettarayar’s betrayal, and the tragic destiny of Aditha Karikalan, whose heart was long lost to the vengeful Nandini.

title: Viswasam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Nayanthara|Thambi Ramaiah|Robo Shankar|Jagapati Babu
overview: A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

title: Aaru
cast: Suriya|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Trisha Krishnan|Vadivelu|Kalabhavan Mani
overview: A thug, with his partners, is chosen to work for a criminal gang and he becomes the left-hand man of the leader. The leader declares a war against another criminal and the thug has to protect him despite losing his friends.

title: Kadaikutty Singam
cast: Karthi|Sayesha Saigal|Sathyaraj|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Arthana Binu
overview: Gunasingam, a family-loving farmer who hails from a small town, tries his best to keep his big family united despite him being misunderstood by many.

title: Padayappa
cast: Rajinikanth|Sivaji Ganesan|Ramya Krishnan|Soundarya|Lakshmi
overview: Padayappa, a mechanical engineer whose father gives up his property to his foster brother, and then dies of shock soon after. Neelambari initially loves Padayappa, but plans to humiliate him after his family humiliates her father. The rest of the plot deals with Padayappa overcoming all the obstacles placed by Neelambari.

title: Yavarum Nalam
cast: R. Madhavan|Neetu Chandra|Sachin Khedekar|Ravi Babu|Murali Sharma
overview: Manohar and his family move into a new apartment on the 13th floor. However, their peace is disturbed by a spirit that uses the television set as a medium to communicate with them.

title: Appa
cast: Samuthirakani|Thambi Ramaiah|Namo Narayanan|Vinodhini Vaidyanathan|J Vignesh
overview: A do-gooder who views everything in a different perspective, inspires others by being a doting father, and tries to bring in a few changes in the society.

title: Sandakozhi
cast: Vishal Krishna|Meera Jasmine|Rajkiran|Lal|Suman Shetty
overview: Balu, on a visit to his friend's hometown, falls for the latter's sister, Hema. When he learns that this area is ruled by a local goon, Kaasi, Balu teaches him a lesson. Now, Kaasi is seeking revenge.

title: Sarkar
cast: Vijay|Keerthy Suresh|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Prem|Yogi Babu
overview: NRI corporate Sundar Ramasamy comes to India to vote, only to learn that his vote has already been cast. While he reclaims his right legally, it also sets in motion a chain of events that eventually lead to him entering the political fray, trying to change the system.

title: Aghathiyaa
cast: Jiiva|Raashii Khanna|Arjun Sarja|Edward Sonnenblick|Matilda
overview: Things go awry when a haunted mansion is opened as a tourist attraction by Aghathiyan leading to the unraveling of the dark history behind the mansion's previous occupant.

title: DSP
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Anukreethy Vas|Prabhakar|Pugazh|Ilavarasu
overview: A flower seller's son ends up in a tussle with a ruthless rowdy in Dindigul, forcing him to become a policeman and fight the odds.

title: Bigil
cast: Vijay|Nayanthara|Jackie Shroff|Kathir|Vivek
overview: A do-gooder don wants his footballer son to uplift the life of his people by becoming a champion, but fate draws the youngster into a life of violence. Will he be able to fulfill his father’s dream when an opportunity comes his way seven years later?

title: Muthu
cast: Rajinikanth|Meena|Sarath Babu|Radha Ravi|Senthil
overview: The story concerns Muthu, a charismatic, well-respected and loyal servant and charioteer of Raja Malayasimman, a wealthy zamindar. While Muthu and Raja's exploits lead them to fall in love with the same woman, an actress and dancer named Ranganayaki, Raja's materal uncle Ambalathar is keen on assuming control of the family's property.

title: Jilla
cast: Mohanlal|Vijay|Sampath Raj|Kajal Agarwal|Mahat Raghavendra
overview: A cop decides to take on his godfather, who raised him from childhood, and make him realize the error of his ways.

title: Iruvar
cast: Mohanlal|Prakash Raj|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Gautami Tadimalla|Revathi
overview: A fictionalized account of the lives of 1980s Tamil Nadu political icons M. G. Ramachandran and M. Karunanidhi, continuing the tryst between Tamil cinema and Dravidian politics.

title: Madha Gaja Raja
cast: Vishal Krishna|Santhanam|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Anjali|Sonu Sood
overview: Raja, a witty and fearless young man, becomes entangled in a conflict with a corrupt industrialist while trying to protect his family, friends and the woman he loves.

title: Beast
cast: Vijay|Pooja Hegde|Selvaraghavan|Shine Tom Chacko|Yogi Babu
overview: A former RAW officer, who is among the hostages in a mall taken over by terrorists, has to foil their plans and prevent the government from releasing a dreaded terrorist, who he had helped put in prison at great personal cost.

title: Drogam: Nadanthathu Enna?
cast: Kishore|Leena Chowdary|Swathi Varma|Saso|Ramya Sen
overview: Drogam Nadanthathu Enna film is based on a real incident which happened in Mumbai. The electric power goes at the time when a young police officer makes love to his wife. So the inspector goes to light a candle. At that time a stranger embraces the inspector's wife who is not able to recognize the person. She thinks that it is her husband. The stranger records this incident in his cell phone. The stranger blackmails the lady showing this clipping and asks her to make love with him. Whether she agrees or not is the rest of the story.

title: Nayakan
cast: Kamal Haasan|Saranya Ponvannan|Karthika|Janagaraj|Vijayan
overview: Velu Naicker, who witnesses the brutal murder of his father, kills a corrupt policeman and escapes to Mumbai, only to become a gangster.

title: Mankatha
cast: Ajith Kumar|Arjun Sarja|Vaibhav|Ashwin Kakumanu|Premji Amaran
overview: Vinayak, a suspended cop, helps a group of four men rob cricket betting money amounting to 500 crores INR. When it comes to splitting the amount, betrayal hits the team hard and a chase ensues.

title: Thiruchitrambalam
cast: Dhanush|Nithya Menen|Bharathiraja|Prakash Raj|Raashii Khanna
overview: A guy-next-door tries to find romance in his life while also dealing with his personal problems. How long will it be before he realises what he is looking for is right next to him?

title: Kaadhal Enbadhu Podhu Udamai
cast: Lijomol Jose|Rohini|Vineeth Radhakrishnan|Kalesh Ramanand|Anusha Prabhu
overview: Samyuktha, a passionate Kathak dancer, shares a deep bond with her mother, Lakshmi—a renowned motivational speaker and documentary filmmaker. Their progressive relationship is tested when Samyuktha reveals her love for another woman. While Lakshmi is initially thrilled, her excitement fades as she struggles to reconcile her traditional Indian values with modern ideas of love and sexuality. Through multiple perspectives, including that of Mary, who explores evolving notions of romance, the story delves into acceptance, identity, and the complexities of family dynamics.

title: Indian
cast: Kamal Haasan|Sukanya|Manisha Koirala|Urmila Matondkar|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Senapathy, an ex-freedom fighter, is angry. He is angry against the rampant corruption at every level of the bureaucracy. He will clean it up at any cost.

title: Siren
cast: Ravi Mohan|Keerthy Suresh|Samuthirakani|Anupama Parameswaran|Yogi Babu
overview: After being in jail for 14 years, Thilagavarman gets out of prison on parole. A cat-and-mouse chase unfolds as Nandhini, a tainted police officer zeroes in on him as suspect in a spate of murders

title: Good Night
cast: Manikandan|Meetha Raghunath|Ramesh Thilak|Bagavathi Perumal|Balaji Sakthivel
overview: Mohan, an IT youngster with a snoring issue starts his life with Anu, the girl of his dreams, hiding his issue. However, trouble begins, when his snoring starts affecting his life and the health of his partner.

title: Mark Antony
cast: Vishal Krishna|S. J. Suryah|Sunil Varma|Selvaraghavan|Ritu Varma
overview: Set in 1995, Mark, a skilled mechanic and the son of a former gangster, stumbles upon a phone that has the ability to connect with the past, tries to save his estranged mother from a grim fate. While facing his own family's legacy, Mark must navigate through dangerous consequences of altering the past, as it causes unforeseen repercussions in the present.

title: Tamil Rockers
cast: Premji Amaran|Meenakshi Dixit|VTV Ganesh|S.P.B. Charan|Devadarshini
overview: 4 Major characters running for the Money facing more challenges by forgetting the fact that it's not the decision of money to reach human.

title: Darbar
cast: Rajinikanth|Nayanthara|Suniel Shetty|Nivetha Thomas|Yogi Babu
overview: Aaditya, the commissioner of Mumbai Police, sets out to catch Ajay, a drug peddler. However, he uncovers a deeper controversy linked to an international drug lord and must mete out justice.

title: Maaran
cast: Dhanush|Malavika Mohanan|Samuthirakani|Smruthi Venkat|Ramki
overview: An investigative journalist gets into trouble when he publishes an article that exposes bitter truths about a corrupt politician.

title: Blue Star
cast: Ashok Selvan|Shanthanu Bhagyaraj|Keerthi Pandian|Prithvi Pandiarajan|Bagavathi Perumal
overview: The captains of two rival village cricket teams must put their longstanding grudge aside in order to take on the bullies threatening their right to play.

title: Chandramukhi
cast: Jyothika|Rajinikanth|Prabhu|Nasaar|Vadivelu
overview: Creepy happenings in an abandoned mansion are attributed to the ghost of an ancient courtesan, back for revenge.

title: Nanban
cast: Vijay|Jiiva|Srikanth|Ileana D'Cruz|Sathyaraj
overview: The plot of the film illustrates the embankment of two friends on a quest for a lost buddy, who was once an optimistic and successful student. On their journey, they recount their college life and special moments that the three shared up until their lost friend secretly parted ways after convocation. During their quest, the two encounter a rival classmate who once made a long forgotten bet with them, a funeral that goes impossibly out of control, and a wedding they must crash.

title: Rathnam
cast: Vishal Krishna|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Samuthirakani|Murali Sharma|Hareesh Peradi
overview: Rathnam, a henchmen working for MLA Panneer Selvam in Vellore, protects Malliga, a medical student who bears a resemblance to Rathnam's late mother, from the relentless pursuit of land grabbers Rayudu brothers and becomes her guardian angel.

title: Apoorva Sagodharargal
cast: Kamal Haasan|Jaishankar|Nagesh|Srividya|Gautami Tadimalla
overview: An honest police officer pays a heavy price after he gets involved with a group of criminals. Years later, his son goes on a vengeance spree but his twin is mistaken as the culprit.

title: Kaatteri
cast: Vaibhav|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Sonam Bajwa|Aathmika|Manali Rathod
overview: To escape the wrath of the gangster whom they work for, a gang of treasure-seeking, bumbling criminals go to a hillside village, which, they don't realise is a ghost town, literally!

title: Thevar Magan
cast: Kamal Haasan|Sivaji Ganesan|Nasaar|Revathi|Gautami Tadimalla
overview: London-educated Saktivelu returns to India and wants to open a chain of restaurants in Chennai. His father, however, wishes that he would stay back and help the villagers.

title: Pokkiri
cast: Vijay|Asin Thottumkal|Prakash Raj|Napoleon|Nasaar
overview: Amidst gang warfare and police crackdowns, mob hitman Tamizh falls for Shruthi, a nice girl unaware of his true identity. But she may not be the only one Tamizh is hiding secrets from...

title: Thangalaan
cast: Vikram|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Malavika Mohanan|Daniel Caltagirone|Pasupathy
overview: During the British rule, Thangalaan, a fierce tribal leader, and his tribe assist Lord Clement, a British General, to trace gold in their village. While searching for the gold, the villagers earn the wrath of Aarathi, an apparent sorceress, who Thangalaan sets out to stop with all his might.

title: Demonte Colony 2
cast: Arulnithi|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Tsering Dorjee Bawa|Antti Jääskeläinen|C. Arun Pandian
overview: Debbie attempts to contact the spirit of her deceased husband Sam, she inadvertently contacts Srinivasan, who had just died. This contact saves his life but leaves him in a coma for years. Later, Debbie unravels mystery about Lord Demonte sacrificing people and enslaves their spirits. Can Debbie break this cycle and help Srinivasan to wake up from his coma?

title: Aadhavan
cast: Suriya|Nayanthara|Vadivelu|Murali|B. Saroja Devi
overview: A professional assassin is tasked with the murder of a prominent local judge; however, after a series of failed attempts, he is forced to deal with complications and old relationships arising from his troubled past.

title: Kaala
cast: Rajinikanth|Nana Patekar|Samuthirakani|Easwari Rao|Huma Qureshi
overview: Karikaalan consistently fights to keep the people of Dharavi, a slum in Mumbai, safe from the clutches of mighty politicians and the land mafia don, Hari Dhadha.

title: Yaaradi Nee Mohini
cast: Dhanush|Nayanthara|Raghuvaran|Karunas|Karthik Kumar
overview: Vasu falls in love with Keerthi, but when he expresses his feelings to her, she turns him down and says that her marriage has already been arranged. He later learns that she is set to marry his close friend Cheenu.

title: Renigunta
cast: Johnny Chakravarthy|Sanusha Santhosh|Nishanth Russo|Sandeep|Theepetti Ganesan
overview: Renigunta is a 2009 Indian Tamil action film written and directed by newcomer Paneerselvam. Starring Johnny, son of producer, S. S. Chakravarthy of Nic Arts and newcomers, The film was a success at box office.  At Renigunta, few boys get the acquaintance of Sardar (an influential don) through Bunker. After a successful murder in the town, Sardar takes these boys seriously. Meanwhile, Sakthi comes across a dumb girl (Sanusha) in the neighbourhood. After a few encounters, romance blossoms between them. But the girl's brother plans to push her to flesh trade. Taking pity on Sakthi, his friends decide to help him elope with the girl, but only after completing a murder for Sardar.

title: Veeran
cast: HipHop Tamizha Adhi|Sassi Selvaraj|Athira Raj|Munishkanth|Kaali Venkat
overview: Kumaran has had a troubled childhood after getting hit by lightning, comes back to his village to fight evil elements and provide hope through indigenous deities.

title: I
cast: Vikram|Amy Jackson|Suresh Gopi|Upen Patel|Ramkumar Ganesan
overview: A deformed hunchback kidnaps a bride and holds her hostage while his connection to her and his targets is revealed in a series of flashbacks that unfold as he starts seeking revenge.

title: Aathi
cast: Vijay|Trisha Krishnan|Sai Kumar|Prakash Raj|Vivek
overview: Against the wishes of his foster parents, Aathi goes to college in Chennai. He is actually looking to avenge the murder of his biological parents. He meets and falls for Anjali, who has an agenda as well.

title: Thaamirabharani
cast: Vishal Krishna|Muktha George|Prabhu|Nadhiya|Nasaar
overview: Bharani, a hot headed man, tries to peacefully resolve the conflict between the families, from the one which he belongs, and the one from which his lover belongs. But several circumstances force him to use his fist than his heart first.

title: Billa
cast: Ajith Kumar|Prabhu|Nayanthara|Rahman|Santhanam
overview: The intertwined stories of an international Don in Malaysia, David Billa, chased by the cops, an Indian police officer, a woman who wants to avenge the death of her brother, and a lowly thief, Velu who shares with Billa, an unusual connection.

title: Anjaan
cast: Suriya|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Vidyut Jammwal|Manoj Bajpayee|Soori
overview: A man travels to Mumbai in search of his estranged brother, a feared figure in the criminal underworld. As he follows the trail through gang rivalries and shifting alliances, he uncovers a complex web of loyalty, deception, and violence that blurs the line between justice and revenge.

title: Mithran
cast: Shanmuga Pandian|Archana|Vamsi Krishna|N. Azhagamperumal|A. Venkatesh
overview: The film is about a youngster from a town, who becomes a cop and comes back to his own neighborhood joining the duty.

title: Sarpatta Parambarai
cast: Arya|Pasupathy|Kalaiyarasan|John Vijay|John Kokken
overview: When Sarpatta Parambarai is challenged to a do-or-die match, Kabilan, a young labourer, must choose whether to put on the gloves himself and lead his clan to victory, or be dissuaded by his disapproving mother and dangerous politics.

title: Anbe Sivam
cast: Kamal Haasan|R. Madhavan|Nasaar|Kiran Rathod|Santhana Bharathi
overview: Anbarasu, young and arrogant, and Nallasivam, damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

title: Karnan
cast: Dhanush|Rajisha Vijayan|Natarajan Subramaniam|Lal|Yogi Babu
overview: Karnan, an angry young man, fights for the rights of his oppressed people. Can he save them from those who wield power and weapons?

title: Dasavatharam
cast: Kamal Haasan|Asin Thottumkal|Mallika Sherawat|Jaya Prada|Napoleon
overview: Bio-technologist Govind K Somaiyya sets about on a precarious journey to India to retrieve a vial containing a deadly virus and prevent it from reaching the wrong hands of an ex-CIA agent and deadly assassins.

title: Alaipayuthey
cast: R. Madhavan|Shalini|Swarnamalya|Vivek|Jayasudha
overview: Karthik and Shakthi marry against the wishes of their families and start their new life. However, they soon realize that marriage is not the bed of roses they had imagined it would be.

title: Maaveeran
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Aditi Shankar|Saritha|Mysskin|Sunil Varma
overview: After a head injury, cowardly newspaper cartoonist Sathya hears a voice in his mind, foretells events and puts him in precarious situations and forces him to take on a corrupt politician.

title: Maari 2
cast: Dhanush|Sai Pallavi|Krishna Kulasekaran|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Tovino Thomas
overview: After falling off the radar for a few years, Maari is back in the fray doing what he does best: taking trouble by the horns and being a total bad-ass. This time around, he is facing off against a formidable opponent named Beeja, who would stop at nothing until he sees Maari's downfall.

title: Saani Kaayidham
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Selvaraghavan|Kanna Ravi|Lizzie Antony|Vinodh Munna
overview: A police constable from an oppressed caste and her half-brother go after the dominant caste men who raped her and burned her husband and kid alive.

title: Thalaivii
cast: Kangana Ranaut|Arvind Swamy|Nasaar|Bharathi Kannan|Bhagyashree
overview: The biopic charts the life of actor-turned-chief minister J. Jayalalitha and the relationship paving her rapid yet complicated path to power, who served five terms as the Chief Minister for the Indian state of Tamil Nadu.

title: Maanaadu
cast: Silambarasan|S. J. Suryah|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Anjena Kirti|Aravind Akash
overview: A Muslim man, who is stuck in a time loop, has to stop a political rally from taking place in order to save the state's chief minister and prevent religious violence.

title: Don
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Priyanka Arul Mohan|S. J. Suryah|Samuthirakani|Soori
overview: A youngster who is still figuring out what his passion is gets into an engineering college where he clashes with a disciplinarian faculty.

title: Raavanan
cast: Vikram|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Karthik Muthuraman|Prabhu
overview: After inspector Dev stirs the reign of Veeraiya, a tribal outlaw, the latter responds by kidnapping his wife, Ragini. While she tries to escape from him, Dev fights many resistances to find her.

title: Thottal Poo Malarum
cast: Sakthi Vasu|Gowri Munjal|Rajkiran|Sukanya|Vadivelu
overview: A happy-go-lucky youngster falls in love with his wealthy classmate. However, the girl's mother is opposed to their relationship and arranges her wedding with a gangster's son.

title: Vivegam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Kajal Agarwal|Akshara Haasan|Vivek Oberoi|Arav Chowdhary
overview: A group of counter-terrorism agents are brought in to track down a man who was once the head of their squad, and is believed to have gone rogue.

title: Vaazhai
cast: Ponvel|Rahul R.|Dhivya Dhuraisamy|Janaki Jayaraman|Kalaiyarasan
overview: A twelve-year-old bright schoolboy, Sivanandhan, his mother, sister, and with his friend Sekhar works during his school holidays carrying banana stalks, a task he dreads. As he navigates life's challenges, poverty, friendship, and the challenges of growing up, Sivanandhan’s determination is tested by the harsh realities of life.

title: Variyavan
cast: Parthy KL|Hari Kumar|Jawahar|Sandy Vijay|Selvaraj
overview: The movie is about a poor guy shifting from his hometown to a metro city for his career and facing several challenges in order to sustain.

title: Kandukondain Kandukondain
cast: Tabu|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Ajith Kumar|Mammootty|Abbas
overview: Two young women with differing views on love find themselves with three suitors in this modern take on Jane Austen's 'Sense and Sensibility' set in Tamil Nadu.

title: Niram Marum Ulagil
cast: Bharathiraja|Rio Raj|Sandy|Aegan|Natarajan Subramaniam
overview: During a train journey,  A ticket examiner narrates four tales of extreme parental sacrifice, exploring familial bonds through illness, estrangement, unexpected connections, and emotional turmoil, to a young woman

title: Vikram Vedha
cast: R. Madhavan|Vijay Sethupathi|Shraddha Srinath|Kathir|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar
overview: A notorious gangster Vedha surrenders himself to encounter specialist Vikram whom he challenges every step of the way by narrating his life events in the form of riddles that needs to be solved in order to capture him.

title: Sweetheart!
cast: Rio Raj|Gopika Ramesh|Renji Panicker|Arunachaleshwaran|Redin Kingsley
overview: Vasu, a gifted animator with a troubled past, is forced to face his commitment issues when his partner Manu reveals her pregnancy.

title: Thunivu
cast: Ajith Kumar|Manju Warrier|Samuthirakani|John Kokken|Veera Bahu
overview: A gang goes to rob a bank only to find that there's already a criminal mastermind holding it for ransom, but his identities and motives behind the heist remains mysterious. As they plan to collect the bounty and disappear without a trace, their crimes and their past slowly catches up with them.

title: Jigarthanda DoubleX
cast: Raghava Lawrence|S. J. Suryah|Naveen Chandra|Nimisha Sajayan|Ilavarasu
overview: A notorious gangster is incited to transform into a film hero and opts for a filmmaker and their project descends into a scenario they had never anticipated.

title: Perusu
cast: Sunil|Vaibhav|Balasaravanan|Nakkalites Dhanam|Deepa Shankar
overview: After discovering their father dead, two estranged brothers are shocked to find something inside him is still alive. What should have been a day of somber mourning breaks Into a complete bedlam as the two sons try to conduct the funeral as discreetly as possible. Forced to navigate nosy relatives, hidden family secrets, and their own strained relationship with their father, the brothers must hold it all together—or risk letting everything unravel.

title: Dheena
cast: Ajith Kumar|Suresh Gopi|Laila|Shyam Ganesh|Sriman
overview: A local gangster and his adopted brother rule over a town together. However, their relationship turns sour after the man's sister dies due to the gangster's mistake.

title: Shanthi Appuram Nithya
cast: Maha Adithya|Archana Sharma
overview: An erotic movie that depicts how innocent women fall for bad boys and how those men treat them without any courtesy.

title: Black
cast: Jiiva|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Vivek Prasanna|Shah Ra|Swayam Siddha
overview: Vasanth and Aaranya, a couple move into a serene row house, eager for peace and privacy, but a violent storm leaves them trapped inside, unsettling supernatural disturbances threaten to unravel their marriage. Vasanth must uncover the truth behind these supernatural occurrences before everything falls apart.

title: Mayakkam Enna
cast: Dhanush|Richa Gangopadhyay|Sunder Ramu|Pooja Devariya|Mathivanan Rajendran
overview: Karthik splits his time between aimlessly hanging around his friends and dreams of being an assistant to his role model, an arrogant yet world renowned wildlife photographer. When Karthik's close friend Sundar introduces his girlfriend Yamini to their group, they can't stand each other initially, but there lies the twist, when opposites attract.

title: Super Deluxe
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Fahadh Faasil|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Ramya Krishnan|Mysskin
overview: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged parent, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

title: Siruthai
cast: Karthi|Tamannaah Bhatia|Santhanam|Bhumika Chawla|Manobala
overview: A thief comes across a little girl who says that he's her father. When he learns the truth about his lookalike, who's an honest cop, he decides to turn a new leaf and help get rid of the local baddie.

title: Kannathil Muthamittal
cast: P. S. Keerthana|R. Madhavan|Simran|Nandita Das|Delhi Kumar
overview: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her birth mother, her family eventually agrees to take her to Sri Lanka, where they encounter the militant group known as the Tamil Tigers.

title: Thani Oruvan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Arvind Swamy|Nayanthara|Vamsi Krishna|Ganesh Venkatraman
overview: An idealistic cop and an ambitious scientist-businessman indulge in a high-stake battle of wits.

title: Thani Oruvan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Arvind Swamy|Nayanthara|Vamsi Krishna|Ganesh Venkatraman
overview: An idealistic cop and an ambitious scientist-businessman indulge in a high-stake battle of wits.

title: Mozhi
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Prakash Raj|Jyothika|Swarnamalya|Brahmanandam
overview: A musician's love towards a stubborn deaf woman makes her eventually realize that there is more to her life than she previously thought.

title: Manmadhan
cast: Silambarasan|Jyothika|Sindhu Tolani|Goundamani|Atul Kulkarni
overview: When Mythili meets Madhan, she's at once attracted towards and terrified of him since he looks exactly like the serial killer from her nightmares.

title: Lubber Pandhu
cast: Dinesh Ravi|Harish Kalyan|Sanjana Krishnamoorthy|Swasika|Kaali Venkat
overview: Middle aged local cricketer Poomalai finds a new rival in the form of a younger sports person named Anbu. Their rivalry in cricket gets complicated when Anbu falls in love with Poomalai's daughter Durga.

title: Asuran
cast: Dhanush|Manju Warrier|Ken Karunas|Teejay|Pasupathy
overview: A family from the underprivileged class is on the run after the teenaged son kills a rich man from the upper caste. Can the pacifist father be able to save his hot-blooded son?

title: Vedalam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Shruti Haasan|Lakshmi Menon|Soori|Thambi Ramaiah
overview: Ganesh, a cab driver and a doting brother to his sister Tamizh, is hunting down three notorious criminals in Kolkata. Who is he actually and what's his motive?

title: Jinn-The Pet
cast: Mugen Rao|Bhavya Trikha|Balasaravanan|Yuvikha Rajendran|Imman Annachi
overview: A musician brings home an ancient box containing a mystical Jinn, only to discover the creature he blamed for his family's misfortunes is actually their protector.

title: Anegan
cast: Dhanush|Amyra Dastur|Karthik Muthuraman|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Jagan
overview: Madhumitha is convinced that she and her colleague Ashwin were lovers in their past lives and have been brought together by fate. Is there any truth to this or is she merely hallucinating?

title: Polladhavan
cast: Dhanush|Kishore|Divya Spandana|Daniel Balaji|Sentrayan
overview: Prabhu is dejected when he learns that his bike has been stolen. He decides to find the people who stole the bike, but lands in trouble when he realises that his bike has been used to transport drugs.

title: Thangamagan
cast: Dhanush|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Amy Jackson|Sathish|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: The happiness of Tamizh and his middle-class family is shattered when his dad commits suicide. The youngster tries to understand why his father took this extreme step and clear his name.

title: Kutty
cast: Dhanush|Shriya Saran|Sammir Dattani|Mayilsamy|Radha Ravi
overview: Kutty, a kind young man, falls in love with Geeta, but she does not reciprocate his love. He continues to love her even after learning that she is in love with Arjun, her college-mate.

title: Maari
cast: Dhanush|Kajal Agarwal|Vijay Yesudas|Robo Shankar|Kaali Venkat
overview: A feared local rowdy, known for his dominance in the streets and pigeon racing, finds himself at odds with a newly appointed police officer. As tensions rise, hidden motives and betrayals unfold, shaking the balance of power in the neighborhood.

title: Chithha
cast: Siddharth|Sahasra Sree|S. Abiya Tasneem|Nimisha Sajayan|Anjali Aneesh Upasana
overview: Easwaran, a young government employee gets the shock of his life when his niece Sundari goes missing. When Easwaran gets to know that a child abuser has kidnapped her, after coming to terms with the ghastly reality of being him being wrongly accused in such a child abuse case, he makes it his mission is to rescue Sundari.

title: Kanchana 3
cast: Raghava Lawrence|Kovai Sarala|Vedhika|Nikki Tamboli|Oviya Helen
overview: A young man who gets easily scared is possessed by a ghost that is seeking revenge.

title: Friends
cast: Vijay|Suriya|Vadivelu|Devayani|Ramesh Khanna
overview: A man values his best friend more than anything else in the world. One day he confesses a dark secret from their childhood to his wife, which is overheard by another. Once the secret gets out, the friendship is destroyed.

title: Singam
cast: Suriya|Anushka Shetty|Prakash Raj|Nasaar|Vivek
overview: The story, set in the backdrop of Nallore, a small town in Thoothukudi District, revolves around Sub-Inspector Durai Singam, a brave and just policeman who serves in his hometown primarily to fulfill his father’s wish. Durai Singam settles every dispute in his town patiently with his words of wisdom and resorts to force only when the situation demands it. Kavya, a city girl who comes on vacation to Nallore, falls in love with Durai Singam. Erimalai, Durai Singam's bumbling colleague and friend, often accompanies him.

title: Velaiyilla Pattathari 2
cast: Dhanush|Kajol|Vivek|Samuthirakani|Amala Paul
overview: A cool-headed crusader for the struggling engineers, Raghuvaran faces the powerful and arrogant owner of a construction company Vasundhara Parameswaran, as they engage in a battle to win the corporate game.

title: Madrasapattinam
cast: Arya|Amy Jackson|Nasaar|Cochin Haneefa|Carole Trungmar
overview: Amy, the wife of an English governor, falls in love with Parithi, a villager, and they run away. However, they are caught and she is taken back to London. Years later, she comes back in search of him.

title: Lakshmi
cast: Prabhu Deva|Ditya Bhande|Aishwarya Rajesh|Karunakaran|Kovai Sarala
overview: A school student, who is passionate about dance, sets out to join a national-level competition without her mother’s knowledge.

title: Gangers
cast: Sundar C|Vadivelu|Catherine Tresa|Munishkanth|Bagavathi Perumal
overview: An undercover cop teams up with a crooked PT Master to loot 100 crore from a corrupt politician.

title: Lakshmi
cast: Prabhu Deva|Ditya Bhande|Aishwarya Rajesh|Karunakaran|Kovai Sarala
overview: A school student, who is passionate about dance, sets out to join a national-level competition without her mother’s knowledge.

title: Irugapatru
cast: Vikram Prabhu|Shraddha Srinath|Vidharth|Abarnathi|Sri
overview: Three couples from different economic backgrounds find ways to fix their relationships.

title: Rhythm
cast: Arjun Sarja|Meena|Lakshmi|Jyothika|Nagesh
overview: Karthikeyan, a photo editor in Mumbai, is a widower whose parents wish to see him settled and happy. Chitra, a widow with a son, gives them hope, unaware that their pasts are intertwined.

title: Mumbai Xpress
cast: Kamal Haasan|Manisha Koirala|Nasaar|Om Puri|Santhana Bharathi
overview: A young man's journey in Mumbai as a kidnapper.

title: Gatta Kusthi
cast: Aishwarya Lekshmi|Vishnu Vishal|Karunas|Munishkanth|Kaali Venkat
overview: Veera, a misguided man who wants a timid, not-so-learned and subservient wife with long hair, unknowingly ends up getting married to Keerthi, an intrepid wrestler who is also more educated than him and has cropped hair. For how long can Keerthi maintain the charade and what happens when Veera comes to know the truth?

title: Sardar
cast: Karthi|Raashii Khanna|Rajisha Vijayan|Laila|Chunky Pandey
overview: An espionage agent who is branded a traitor returns from exile to take down a dubious water project and safeguard the country.

title: Raja Rani
cast: Arya|Nayanthara|Jai Sampath|Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Santhanam
overview: John (Arya) and Regina (Nayanthara) are forced into wedlock against their wishes. Both undergo a rough patch initially in their marriage as they are not able to get over their past romances.  Prior to their marriage, Regina was in love with Surya (Jai), while John romanced Keerthana (Nazriya). What leads to the Arya-Nayanthara wedding? How they forget their romantic past and finally come together forms the rest of the story.

title: Ramanujan
cast: Abhinay Vaddi|Suhasini Maniratnam|Kevin McGowan|Abbas|Anmol
overview: A prodigious Indian mathematician has to overcome poverty and prejudices and make a mark with the help of his British mentor.

title: Garudan
cast: Soori|Unni Mukundan|M. Sasikumar|Revathy Sharma|Sshivada Nair
overview: Set in Theni, a minister’s greed to seize temple land sets in motion a chain of events that pits two childhood friends, Aadhi and Karuna against each other, Chokkan, who is their trusted confidant whose loyalty is tested in the tale of betrayal and retribution.

title: Avan Ivan
cast: G. M. Kumar|Vishal Krishna|Arya|R. K.|Janani Iyer
overview: A landlord takes a liking to two half-brothers who con people and adopts them. But his adopted family's harmony is disrupted when a smuggler enters their lives.

title: Thuppakki
cast: Vijay|Kajal Agarwal|Vidyut Jammwal|Sathyan Sivakumar|Jayaram
overview: Captain Jagadish, an intelligence officer in the Indian Army, returns to Mumbai for a vacation but soon finds himself in a deadly mission. After witnessing a bus bombing, he uncovers a network of sleeper cells planning multiple attacks across the city. With no official backing, he embarks on a personal mission with his trusted comrades to eliminate the mastermind, ensuring the sleeper cells remain leaderless and trapped in silence, waiting for orders that will never come. Ready to sacrifice his own life, he sets out on his final mission—but does he succeed, and at what cost?

title: Doctor
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Vinay Rai|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Yogi Babu|Archana Chandhoke
overview: An army doctor helps his love interest's family to find their kidnapped daughter.

title: Connect
cast: Nayanthara|Haniya Nafisa|Sathyaraj|Anupam Kher|Vinay Rai
overview: The announcement of a nation-wide lock-down due to the spread of COVID-19 pandemic disrupts the peace of a family. What follows is a series of bizarre events as one of them tries to invite the spirit of a family member.

title: Sachein
cast: Vijay|Genelia D'Souza|Bipasha Basu|Vadivelu|Raghuvaran
overview: A happy-go-lucky college student falls in love with a beautiful young woman at first sight, but decides to use a unique approach to get close to her, as she has many admirers in the college. How will their relationship evolve?

title: Iyarkai
cast: Shaam|Arun Vijay|Seema Biswas|Radhika Kumaraswamy|Senthil
overview: Marudhu, a sailor, falls in love with Nancy, a fruit vendor. However, she waits for the captain who had promised that he would return and marry her.

cast: Suriya|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Nithya Menen|Saranya Ponvannan|Ajay
overview: Scientist turned Entrepreneur Dr. Sethuraman tries to safeguard his newly invented time travel device from falling into the hands of his Evil Twin Brother Aathreya.

title: Paruthiveeran
cast: Karthi|Priyamani|Ponvannan|Saravanan|Sujatha Sivakumar
overview: A village tough finally succumbs to the unconditional love of his angelic cousin, but his romance faces insurmountable challenges, including family opposition and his own delinquent personality.

title: Amma Ponnu
cast: Vignesh|Akhila|Nagesh|K R Vijaya|Goundamani
overview: Amma Ponnu (English: Mother's daughter) is a 1993 Tamil romantic drama film directed by Arun. The film features Vignesh and newcomer Akhila in the lead roles, with Nagesh, K. R. Vijaya, Goundamani, Senthil, Ponvannan and Nandagopal playing supporting roles. The film, produced by Kovai M. Murugesan, had musical score by Ekandhan and was released on 9 April 1993.

title: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
cast: Silambarasan|Trisha Krishnan|VTV Ganesh|Babu Antony|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan
overview: A young, aspiring filmmaker falls in love with a girl who moves into the house above his, but her sophisticated nature does more harm than good to him.

title: Maara
cast: R. Madhavan|Shraddha Srinath|Sshivada Nair|Mouli|Alexander Babu
overview: When Paaru sees a fairy tale she heard from from a stranger as a child painted across the walls of a costal town, she goes in search of the man who painted it - Maara.

title: Maruthu
cast: Vishal Krishna|Sri Divya|Radha Ravi|R. K. Suresh|Soori
overview: Spurred by his grandmother, an angry young man locks horns with a thug who is intending to murder his sweetheart.

title: Karuppan
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Tanya Ravichandran|Bobby Simha|Pasupathy|Renuka
overview: A man wins the hand of a girl after winning in jallikattu, but her relative, who had hopes of marrying her, tries to cause a permanent rift between the couple.

title: Dharmadurai
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Tamannaah Bhatia|Srushti Dange|Aishwarya Rajesh|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: A doctor turns into an alcoholic, and becomes an embarrassment for his brothers. What caused this descent, and can he redeem himself?

title: Padikathavan
cast: Dhanush|Tamannaah Bhatia|Vivek|Suman Talwar|Devadarshini
overview: Rocky is looked down upon by his father and spends all his time in a mechanic shop. Problems arise in his life after he falls in love with Gayathri.

title: Vaathi
cast: Dhanush|Samyuktha|Sai Kumar|Samuthirakani|Tanikella Bharani
overview: An assistant maths teacher takes up a tedious task of transforming underprivileged students despite the politics around education in the 90s.

title: Boss Engira Baskaran
cast: Arya|Nayanthara|Santhanam|Chitra Lakshmanan|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan
overview: Bhaskaran is in love with a young and beautiful professor, Chandrika. In order to catch her attention and start a successful career, he along with his friend, Nallathambi, get up to various antics leading to hilarious consequences.

title: Arul
cast: Vikram|Jyothika|Pasupathy|Kollam Thulasi|Vadivelu
overview: Arul, who works in a mill, is the youngest of four brothers in a family of goldsmiths. Once, Arul's brother stole a chain due to financial circumstances. As Arul had taken the blame for it, he was labelled as a "thief" and seen as a black sheep by his father. Thus, he vows never to make a gold ornament ever again. Kanmani, who moves into the opposite house, begins by playing tricks on him, but eventually falls for his character. Arul doesn't believe in love, and keeps his distance from her. One day, when Arul's father scolds him in the temple,

title: Teddy
cast: Arya|Sayesha Saigal|Sakshi Agarwal|Sathish|Karunakaran
overview: A youngster with OCD sets out to save a girl from the clutches of an international medical mafia with the help of a teddy bear which behaves like humans.

title: Jeans
cast: Prashanth|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Nasaar|Lakshmi|Raju Sundaram
overview: The father of twin brothers wants to get them married to only twin sisters. But one of the brothers falls in love with a woman does not have a twin sister.

title: Gunaa
cast: Kamal Haasan|Roshini|Rekha|Janagaraj|S. P. Balasubramaniam
overview: Guna, a mentally-disturbed man, imagines a fictitious character of a woman to be his future wife. One day, he sees a girl in a temple and assumes that she is his imaginary love and kidnaps her.

title: Uthama Puthiran
cast: Dhanush|Genelia D'Souza|Vivek|K. Bhagyaraj|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: Siva is asked to help a friend in a love marriage. Siva kidnaps Pooja on a mistaken identity from the marriage hall. When Pooja is kidnapped, her uncles and their henchmen follow them.

title: Michael Madana Kama Rajan
cast: Kamal Haasan|Khushboo|Urvashi|Santhana Bharathi|Delhi Ganesh
overview: A wicked man separates a set of quadruplets after their birth and one of them ends up with their biological father, while the other three find new homes. Things take a turn after they meet each other.

title: Sulthan
cast: Karthi|Rashmika Mandanna|Ramachandra Raju|Nawab Shah|Lal
overview: A man raised by gangsters tries to reform them, and a hired job to protect a village presents him with the perfect opportunity.

title: Nesippaya
cast: Akash Murali|Aditi Shankar|Prabhu|R. Sarathkumar|Khushboo
overview: Two lovers, separated by life's circumstances, are reunited by a tragic fate—a murder. Arjun, driven by his love for Diya, defies all odds, crosses boundaries, and braves the unknown to uncover the truth behind her tragic fate.

title: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Ritu Varma|Rakshan|Niranjani Ahathian|Gautham Vasudev Menon
overview: Two wily online scammers mend their fraudulent ways after meeting the girls of their dreams — until a deceitful discovery throws their world for a loop.

title: Demonte Colony
cast: Arulnithi|Ramesh Thilak|Sananth|Abhishek Joseph|Antti Jääskeläinen
overview: Four friends go into a haunted mansion on a whim but they do not realize that they have returned home with an evil spirit, from which escape might be impossible.

title: Unnale Unnale
cast: Vinay Rai|Sadha|Tanishaa Mukerji|Lekha Washington|Raju Sundaram
overview: Karthik meets Deepika during a flight to Melbourne and they become friends. On reaching Australia, Karthik realises that Deepika works in the same firm as his ex-lover Jhansi.

title: Thiru.Manickam
cast: Samuthirakani|Ananya|Bharathiraja|Nasaar|Thambi Ramaiah
overview: In today's digital world, Manickam, a man determined to live an honest life, is tested and troubled by his family, relatives and many others. What did Manickam do to find himself in such a situation? How does he overcome the trials that question his integrity? This story unfolds in a simple yet engaging and thrilling way, keeping you hooked till the very end

title: Mahanadhi
cast: Kamal Haasan|Poornam Viswanathan|S. N. Lakshmi|Cochin Haneefa|Sukanya
overview: Krishnaswamy, an honest man, is conned into a chit fund business and imprisoned. While he faces unspeakable hardships in prison, his family disintegrates.

title: Lucky Man
cast: Yogi Babu|Raichal Rabecca Philip|Veera Bahu|R.S. Shivaji|Abdool Lee
overview: Murugan, a man labelled always as unlucky from his childhood gets a car as a prize from a 'Lucky' draw. His life turns upside down when he locks horns with an honest but arrogant Assistant Commissioner Sivakumar and the car gets nicked mysteriously.

title: Bloody Beggar
cast: Kavin Raj|Redin Kingsley|Maruthi Prakashraj|Sunil Sukhada|T.M. Karthik
overview: A beggar's life takes an unexpected turn when a misadventure upends his daily routine. Can he navigate the bizarre, witty situations that follow?

title: Emakku Thozhil Romance
cast: Ashok Selvan|Avantika Mishra|Urvashi|N. Azhagamperumal|M. S. Bhaskar
overview: Umashankar, who is an assistant director in the film industry, falls in love with Leo. In this case, Umashankar's friend Saranya to get pregnant through his lover Prashant, and Leo,who thought Umashankar was the reason, hated him and refused to love him, the two eventually reconcile after letting Leo know the truth.

title: Paraman
cast: Supergood Subramani|Vaiyapuri|Pazha Karuppaiah|Hello Kandasamy|Vetrivel Raja
overview: Paraman is a farmer, and his partner is Sadai. To seize Paraman’s land, Sadai prepares a fake document and uses the police to threaten him. However, Paraman manages to recover the land through the court, experiencing a brief moment of relief. But before he can fully enjoy this peace, the government issues a notice to take over the land for a bypass road. The lawyer discovers that this scheme is connected to the fake document prepared by Sadai. In response, Paraman once again approaches the court to fight this conspiracy.As a result, Paraman’s family loses their home. His son is sent to prison, and his daughter-in-law is forced to leave the house. Paraman and his wife, Kannathaal, are left alone in their small cottage, isolated and in despair. Did Paraman win? Or did the conspiracy win? is the end.

title: Bachelor
cast: G. V. Prakash Kumar|Divyabharathi|Munishkanth|Bagavathi Perumal|Nakkalites Arun Kumar
overview: A carefree young man gets into a live-in relationship with his colleague, and gets her pregnant. What happens next?

title: O Kadhal Kanmani
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Nithya Menen|Prakash Raj|Leela Samson|Vinodhini Vaidyanathan
overview: Aadi and Tara fall in love but both hate the idea of marriage and plan to separate when their lives take them to different countries. However, as they grow closer, their emotions are not easily managed.

title: Pudhupettai
