cast: Dhanush|Sneha|N. Azhagamperumal|Sonia Agarwal|Nithish Veera
overview: After running away from home, a young man from the slums falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the criminal underworld, transforming into a ruthless gangster as he navigates love, power and betrayal.

title: Enai Noki Paayum Thota
cast: Dhanush|Megha Akash|Sunaina|M. Sasikumar|Vela Ramamoorthy
overview: A college student’s life takes an unexpected turn when he falls for an actress caught in a dangerous web of control. As their love story unfolds, he is drawn into a high-stakes world where survival becomes the ultimate challenge.

title: Ko
cast: Jiiva|Karthika Nair|Ajmal Ameer|Pia Bajpiee|Prakash Raj
overview: Ashwin is a photographer, covering the upcoming elections for a newspaper. His life gets entangled with politics when one of his published photographs upsets a corrupt political party.

title: Paiyaa
cast: Karthi|Tamannaah Bhatia|Milind Soman|Sonia Deepti|Jagan
overview: Shiva, an engineering graduate, is not serious about his job or future even when his friends advise him about life. He falls in love with a girl he saw at a bus stop and finally gets to ride with her in a car.

title: Kadhal Kottai
cast: Ajith Kumar|Devayani|Heera Rajgopal|Raja|Karan
overview: Kamali loses her bag in the railway station. Later, her bag is sent to her home, along with a letter from Surya, who found it. Kamali and Surya send letters to each other and soon fall in love.

title: 7G Rainbow Colony
cast: Ravi Krishna|Sonia Agarwal|Suman Shetty|Vijayan|Chandramohan
overview: Kathir is a young underachiever who frequently vents his frustrations through public outbursts. When Anitha, a North Indian girl whose family has fallen on hard times, moves into his housing colony, he soon decides to pursue her with his love, but she keeps rejecting his advances.

title: Puli
cast: Vijay|Sridevi|Sudeep|Shruti Haasan|Hansika Motwani
overview: A virtuous soldier Magadheera aka Puli (Tiger) vows to save his people from the rule of a cruel queen and her treacherous Marshal. Does good triumph over evil?

title: Raja Rani
cast: Arya|Nayanthara|Jai Sampath|Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Santhanam
overview: John (Arya) and Regina (Nayanthara) are forced into wedlock against their wishes. Both undergo a rough patch initially in their marriage as they are not able to get over their past romances.  Prior to their marriage, Regina was in love with Surya (Jai), while John romanced Keerthana (Nazriya). What leads to the Arya-Nayanthara wedding? How they forget their romantic past and finally come together forms the rest of the story.

title: Azhagiya Tamil Magan
cast: Vijay|Shriya Saran|Namitha|Santhanam|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: Guru has the ability to predict future events. With his unique ability, he identifies several future events, including the attempted murder of his lover by a look-alike.

title: Lingaa
cast: Rajinikanth|Anushka Shetty|Sonakshi Sinha|Santhanam|Karunakaran
overview: After being turned down by the ruling Britons, the rightful heir to a famous dynasty inspires local villagers to build a dam themselves. A small-time thief reforms after learning about the role played by his grandfather in building a dam.

title: Hey Ram
cast: Kamal Haasan|Shah Rukh Khan|Vasundhara Das|Rani Mukerji|Atul Kulkarni
overview: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country. He sets out to kill him.

title: Vaseegara
cast: Vijay|Sneha|Gayatri Jayaraman|Vadivelu|Manivannan
overview: Bhupathi's father sends him to live under the guidance of his best friend, Viswanath, and find a job. He gets close to the family and falls in love with Viswanath's daughter, who is already engaged.

title: Pasanga
cast: Kishore DS|Sree Raam|Vimal|Vega Tamotia|Tamizh
overview: Two boys who instantly dislike each other learn to forgive after an accident.

title: Maamannan
cast: Vadivelu|Udhayanidhi Stalin|Fahadh Faasil|Keerthy Suresh|Sunil
overview: An MLA and his son, who are from oppressed community, are forced to stand up against the privileged, arrogant scion of a late politician, who is determined to make them bow down to him.

title: Lal Salaam
cast: Vishnu Vishal|Vikranth|Rajinikanth|Jeevitha|Nirosha
overview: When a cricket game between two brothers goes wrong, a group of Indian villages are torn apart in the process. With tensions exacerbated by a scheming politician, the two brothers and their father must reconcile their differences to revitalize the locals’ Hindu and Muslim unity.

title: Viduthalai: Part I
cast: Soori|Bhavani Sre|Chetan|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Rajiv Menon
overview: Kumaresan, a police constable, gets recruited for an operation implanted to capture Perumal Vaathiyar, who leads a separatist group dedicated to fighting against the authorities for committing atrocities against innocent village women in the name of police interrogations.

title: Maamannan
cast: Vadivelu|Udhayanidhi Stalin|Fahadh Faasil|Keerthy Suresh|Sunil
overview: An MLA and his son, who are from oppressed community, are forced to stand up against the privileged, arrogant scion of a late politician, who is determined to make them bow down to him.

title: Lal Salaam
cast: Vishnu Vishal|Vikranth|Rajinikanth|Jeevitha|Nirosha
overview: When a cricket game between two brothers goes wrong, a group of Indian villages are torn apart in the process. With tensions exacerbated by a scheming politician, the two brothers and their father must reconcile their differences to revitalize the locals’ Hindu and Muslim unity.

title: Chocklet
cast: Prashanth|Jaya Re|Mumtaj|Suhasini Maniratnam|Livingston
overview: Chocklet is a 2001 Tamil film directed by A. Venkatesh featuring Prashanth and Jaya Re in the lead roles. Livingston, Suhasini, Mumtaj and Nagendra Prasad play supporting roles, while the film's score and soundtrack are composed by Deva.

title: Baasha
cast: Rajinikanth|Nagma|Raghuvaran|Janagaraj|Devan
overview: Auto rickshaw driver Manickam avoids violence at all costs. When some thugs begin to intimidate Manickam's family, it triggers the revival of Manickam's old self.

title: Enemy
cast: Vishal Krishna|Arya|Prakash Raj|Mamta Mohandas|Mirnalini Ravi
overview: Two childhood friends end up on opposite extremes of morality, and face each other in a good vs evil war.

title: Love
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Vani Bhojan|Vivek Prasanna|Daniel Annie Pope|Swayam Siddha
overview: A lovely relationship between Ajay and Divya , who are head-over-heels in love with each other, turn upside down within a year of their marriage. What happens when the situation gets out of control?

title: Maayon
cast: Sibiraj|Tanya Ravichandran|Radha Ravi|Bagavathi Perumal|Hareesh Peradi
overview: An archaeology team lead by Arjun Manimaran a curious and intelligent man, is on a quest to break down the myths of an ancient temple, which might put their lives at risk, whilst their work continues other conflict arises which threatens to destroy the temple's relics and antiquity.

title: Boys
cast: Siddharth|Genelia D'Souza|Bharath Srinivasan|S. Thaman|Nakul
overview: The story centers on six youngsters, who experience the downfalls of teenage life. The film conveys a message about the importance of a good education and career over other distractions, such as romance and sex.

title: Kadhalikka Neramillai
cast: Ravi Mohan|Nithya Menen|TJ Bhanu|John Kokken|Lal
overview: Does the idea of a perfect life leading to love, marriage and babies exist? Shriya finds it a challenge, especially when she meets men like Siddarth who think marriage is a recipe for disaster, and babies should be banned. When times are changing and relationships are evolving, the idea of love remains timeless- the more you resist it the more you will fall in love.

title: Aalavandhan
cast: Kamal Haasan|Raveena Tandon|Anu Hasan|Milind Gunaji|Kitu Gidwani
overview: Nandu and Vijay are brothers who were abused by their stepmother during their younger days. Nandhu, who is mentally ill, decides to kill Vijay's fiancee as he visualizes her as his stepmother.

title: Por Thozhil
cast: Ashok Selvan|R. Sarathkumar|Sarath Babu|Nikhila Vimal|P.L. Thenappan
overview: Loganathan, a senior cop is asked to mentor Prakash, an academically bright but faint-hearted rookie and this unlikely duo team up to investigate a series of murder cases, and realize all of them are interlinked and that a psychopath serial killer is on the run.

title: Annaatthe
cast: Rajinikanth|Keerthy Suresh|Jagapati Babu|Soori|Nayanthara
overview: Kaaliyan is a village president in the Madurai district, who is fondly called Annaatthe. His nieces compete with each other to marry him. But, he falls in love with another woman who visits their village. Kaaliyan has a sister who gets married and shifts to Kolkata where she faces some unknown threats. Soon, her brother comes to her aid.

title: Chellamae
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Reema Sen|Vishal Krishna|Vivek|Girish Karnad
overview: A young man follows his newlywed neighbour from Chennai to Goa when she moves there with her husband. He ends up kidnapping her when his obsession takes a drastic turn.

title: Vaaranam Aayiram
cast: Suriya|Simran|Divya Spandana|Sameera Reddy|Deepa Narendra
overview: A son deals with the death of his father and examines how their relationship influences him through growing up, romance, tragedy and adventure.

title: Valimai
cast: Ajith Kumar|Huma Qureshi|Kartikeya Gummakonda|Gurbani Judge|Sumithra
overview: A honest cop tries to track down the brain behind a series of robberies and murders, but things turn personal when his family become pawns in the criminal's game.

title: Hero
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Arjun Sarja|Abhay Deol|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Ivana
overview: A fraudster gets to fulfill his childhood dream of being a superhero when he takes on a ruthless businessman whose business strategy is to crush the dreams of children.

title: Mudhalvan
cast: Arjun Sarja|Raghuvaran|Manisha Koirala|Manivannan|Vadivelu
overview: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

title: Vasool Raja MBBS
cast: Kamal Haasan|Prakash Raj|Prabhu|Sneha|Nagesh
overview: A goon, Rajaraman, enrols himself in a medical college to fulfil his father's dream. He defies the college rules and creates problems for Dr Vishwanathan.

title: Pebbles
cast: Chella Pandi|Karuththadaiyaan
overview: A young boy follows his violent and alcoholic father on a quest to find his mother, who has run away from his abuse.

title: Conjuring Kannappan
cast: Sathish|Regina Cassandra|Saranya Ponvannan|VTV Ganesh|Redin Kingsley
overview: A man begins to have nightmares where he experiences things in sleep have an effect on him in real life, too. But as his derangement spreads across his family and friends, they decide to go to the root of the cause.

title: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
cast: Vijay|Simran|Manivannan|Dhamu|Maayi Sundar
overview: A struggling singer feels guilty about a girl losing her eyesight; to meet the cost of her eye transplant surgery, he offers his kidney to a rich man.

title: Miral
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Vani Bhojan|K. S. Ravikumar|Meera Krishnan|Kaavya Arivumani
overview: A family with a past and trauma, encounters a series of strange incidences, in a car journey on their way home and runs into trouble in a windmills farm.

title: Komban
cast: Karthi|Lakshmi Menon|Rajkiran|Super Subbarayan|I. M. Vijayan
overview: An angry young man tries to give up his violent ways after his marriage runs into trouble. But his nemesis will not rest until he is killed.

title: Karuppu
cast: Suriya|Trisha Krishnan|RJ Balaji|Swasika|Natarajan Subramaniam

title: Raatchasi
cast: Jyothika|Hareesh Peradi|Poornima Bhagyaraj|Aruldoss|Muthu Raman
overview: The headmaster of a government school brings in several changes at her institution despite facing odds from various quarters.

title: The Elephant Whisperers
cast: Bomman|Bellie
overview: Bomman and Bellie, a couple in south India, devote their lives to caring for an orphaned baby elephant named Raghu, forging a family like no other.

title: Ambuli
cast: R. Parthiban|R. Ajay|P. S. Srijith|Gokulnath|Sanam Shetty
overview: People in a village believe that a monster resides and creates havoc in the corn fields. Two students who study at a college near the village decide to investigate the matter. They are successful in capturing the monster.

title: Thambi
cast: Karthi|Jyothika|Sathyaraj|Nikhila Vimal|Ammu Abhirami
overview: Brother and sister who get separated and reunite years later when the brother has grown to be a criminal.

title: Boomer Uncle
cast: Oviya Helen|Yogi Babu|Robo Shankar|M. S. Bhaskar|Seshu
overview: Nesam and his soon-to-be ex-wife, a foreigner named Amy, head to his neglected ancestral castle to fulfill a divorce agreement. Amy has a hidden agenda involving Nesam’s father’s scientific secrets. Meanwhile, Nesam’s old lackeys, Dawood, Bala and Thangadurai also converge on the mansion with their own plans. When a hologram of Oviya enters the picture, and Amy unleashes a “Franken-Hulk” monster with Robo Shankar’s head, the film abandons all attempts at coherence.

title: Santosh Subramaniam
cast: Ravi Mohan|Genelia D'Souza|Prakash Raj|Sayaji Shinde|Geetha
overview: Remake of Bommarillu (2006) Telugu film.  Santosh's life is dictated by his father, who decides everything for him. However, when Santosh falls in love with a girl, he struggles to convince his father to let him marry his girlfriend.

title: Ghajini
cast: Suriya|Asin Thottumkal|Nayanthara|Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat|Riyaz Khan
overview: After being hit by an iron rod, Sanjay Ramaswamy, a business tycoon, suffers from anterograde amnesia. He is unable to remember anything beyond fifteen minutes. Under such circumstances, he sets out on a quest to find the people who were responsible for his lover Kalpana's murder.

title: Kadhal Azhivathillai
cast: Silambarasan|Charmy Kaur|T. Rajendar|Karunas|Radha Ravi
overview: A young man and a woman fall in love with each other. But soon her father gets to know about their affair and goes to extremes to separate the couple.

title: Kadhalum Kadanthu Pogum
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Madonna Sebastian|G. M. Sundar|Samuthirakani|D.R.K. Kiran
overview: A small-time rowdy fresh out of prison and a runaway woman seeking a new life in Chennai become unexpected neighbors. Bound by loneliness, they form an unusual bond—one that teeters between friendship and love. As they navigate their struggles together, their lives take a heartwarming turn in this charming romantic comedy-drama.

title: Padai Thalaivan
cast: Shanmuga Pandian|Kasthoori Raja|Yamini Chander|Ramachandra Raju|Munishkanth
overview: An elephant trainer fights to find his beloved pachyderm after it is captured by poachers.

title: Action
cast: Vishal Krishna|Tamannaah Bhatia|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Yogi Babu|Ramki
overview: An Indian army officer goes after the mastermind behind a terror attack that also resulted in personal loss to him.

title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
cast: Harish Kalyan|Raiza Wilson|Anand Babu|Rekha|Thangapandiyan
overview: Two lovers, who are different in almost all ways, get into a live-in relationship. They go through tough times as their approach towards life do not match with each other's.

title: Imaikkaa Nodigal
cast: Nayanthara|Anurag Kashyap|Atharvaa Murali|Raashii Khanna|Manasvi Kottachi
overview: A CBI officer goes in search of a ruthless serial killer. Things get worse when the murderer targets the former and her family

title: Kaliyugam
cast: Shraddha Srinath|Kishore|Iniyan Subramani|Aarya Lekshmi|Master Ronith
overview: Set in the dystopian future,  2064 AD, the apocalyptic world is stripped of food, water, and humanity. In a ruthless fight for survival, the few remaining must navigate chaos, danger, and the depths of human desperation.

title: Kanthaswamy
cast: Vikram|Shriya Saran|Prabhu|Vadivelu|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: A CBI officer moonlights as a modern day Robin Hood in the guise of the masked Kanthaswamy, as he helps fight corruption and aid impoverished people.

title: Kuiko
cast: Vidharth|Yogi Babu|Sri Priyanka|Vinodhini Vaidyanathan|Ilavarasu
overview: A commoner who rears camels in Saudi Arabia for a living. When his mother passes away in his hometown, he asks for her mortal remains to be preserved in a freezer box, till his arrival.

title: Single Shankarum Smartphone Simranum
cast: Shiva|Megha Akash|Anju Kurian|Mano|Ma Ka Pa Anand
overview: A mobile phone with an inbuilt AI bot lands in the pocket of Shankar, a good delivery guy. Trouble begins when the AI called Simran falls head-over-heels in love with Shankar, with whom it interacts.

title: Kadaram Kondan
cast: Vikram|Abi Hassan|Akshara Haasan|Lenaa|Cherry Mardia
overview: Kadaram Kondan (Conqueror of Kadaram):  The pregnant wife of a young doctor is kidnapped and the kidnappers want him to help free a patient who is admitted in the hospital. Who is the patient? And why are the cops and criminals after him?

title: Kingston
cast: G. V. Prakash Kumar|Divyabharathi|Chetan|Elango Kumaravel|Sabumon Abdusamad
overview: The sea off the coast of Thoovathor becomes cursed following a paranormal event in 1982. Kingston, a daring sea smuggler, ventures into the haunted waters with his friends to break the curse and bring hope back to their doomed village.

title: Mafia
cast: Arun Vijay|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Prasanna|Thalaivasal Vijay|Bharath Reddy
overview: A narcotics officer engages in a cat-and-mouse chase to capture a powerful criminal kingpin.

title: Pattathu Arasan
cast: Atharvaa Murali|Rajkiran|Ashika Ranganath|Radikaa Sarathkumar|R. K. Suresh
overview: Chinnadurai along with his grandfather, a Kabbadi player, try to bring justice for his brother's death. Can they trace out the real culprits or end up confronting them inside the Kabbadi court?

title: Tamilarasan
cast: Vijay Antony|Remya Nambeesan|Suresh Gopi|Pranav MohanRaja|Sonu Sood
overview: Frustrated with a greedy hospital, an honest cop takes its heart surgeon hostage to save his son. Can he succeed, especially with his corrupt superior Rana Pratap Singh already has a bone to pick with him, trying to put him down?

title: Joshua Imai Pol Kaakha
cast: Varun Kamal|Raahei|Krishna Kulasekaran|Dhivyadharshini|Mansoor Ali Khan
overview: A contract killer seeking a different profession is assigned to protect a high-profile speaker.

title: Maadan Kodai Vizha
cast: Gokul Gowtham|Sharumiishaa|Dr. Suria Narayanan|Supergood Subramani|Sripriya
overview: Determined to revive a long-forgotten tradition, Murugan embarks on a mission to organize the annual Sudalai Madan ceremony, which has been defunct for years. However, his efforts are met with fierce resistance from various quarters.  Adding to the challenge, Murugan's girlfriend lays down an ultimatum: she will only marry him if he succeeds in pulling off the ceremony. Against all odds, Murugan perseveres, rallying the village community to support his cause. Will he triumph in his quest, and how will he overcome the hurdles to successfully organize the ceremony?

title: Kadhal Konden
cast: Dhanush|Sonia Agarwal|Daniel Balaji|Srikanth|Nagesh
overview: A genius-yet-introverted orphan, raised by a church priest, is sent to college where he turns out to be a social outcast. Although he is shunned by the majority of the other students, one girl shows him kindness and befriends him. Things take a turn when he falls for her, and she in turn falls for another classmate.

title: Thai Maaman
cast: Sathyaraj|Meena|Goundamani|Vijayakumar|Manivannan
overview: Rasappan (Sathyaraj) is a useless fellow who loves his sister's daughter Meena (Meena), a graduate girl. Their parents decide to engage them but Meena refuses to marry with a jobless groom. Rasappan challenges them to find a decent job. His uncle (Goundamani) advises him to become a MLA. Rasappan joins Paramasivan's party, Pramasivan (Manivannan) is convinced by his motivation. Meanwhile, villagers dissatisfied of Paramasivan politics, they encourage Velusamy (Vijayakumar) to contend at the MLA election. During the election, Rasappan asks the electors to vote for Velusamy and Rasappan wins it widely. Rasappan becomes an honest MLA and helps his village people, he convinces the villagers to deposit their money in a new bank. The bank manager, Paramasivan's relative, scams Rasappan and the villagers. Rasappan is immediately sent in jail because of Paramasivan's plan. Villagers burn Rasappan's house and steal his properties.

title: Virumaandi
cast: Kamal Haasan|Pasupathy|Napoleon|Abhirami|Rohini
overview: Angela, a civil advocate interviewing inmates at the Madras Central Prison for a documentary on the death penalty meets Virumaandi and Kothaala, who are sentenced to death and life respectively for their roles in perpetrating the massacre of 24 people during a brutal clash between feuding villages. As tensions mount within the prison walls, she listens to their conflicting accounts of the same story.

title: The Legend
cast: Arul Saravanan|Urvashi Rautela|Geethika Tiwary|Vivek|Nasaar
overview: A scientist is spurred by the death of his friend to find a cure for diabetes, but can he take on the might of the pharma mafia and succeed in his mission?

title: Kuselan
cast: Rajinikanth|Nayanthara|Meena|Tanikella Bharani|Prabhu
overview: Balakrishnan and Ashok are two childhood friends who lose touch with each other. One of them goes on to become a national figure and the other, a village barber.

title: Aayirathil Oruvan
cast: Karthi|R. Parthiban|Reema Sen|Andrea Jeremiah|Prathap Pothan
overview: Anitha, a government official, embarks on a journey to find Chandramouli, an archaeologist, who went to Vietnam to search for any existence of the prince of the Chola dynasty.

title: Samsaram Adhu Minsaram
cast: Visu|Lakshmi|Raghuvaran|Vagai Chandrasekar|Kamala Kamesh
overview: Ammaiyappan Mudaliar fulfils every need of his four children. However, when the eldest son fights with him and leaves the house, Uma, the daughter-in-law, tries to solve their issues.

title: Thupparivaalan
cast: Vishal Krishna|Prasanna|Vinay Rai|Andrea Jeremiah|Anu Emmanuel
overview: Detective Kaniyan Poonkundran is hungry for a challenging case to investigate and the mystery of a murdered dog leads to a rival who could be the match for him.

title: Server Sundaram
cast: Nagesh|K R Vijaya|R. Muthuraman|S. N. Lakshmi|Major Sundarrajan
overview: Sundaram, a hotel employee, dreams of becoming an actor. He meets Vijaya, who admires his innocence and sincerity, and falls in love with her. But Raghavan, Sundaram's best friend, hides the fact that he is engaged to Vijaya.

title: Ayya
cast: R. Sarathkumar|Napoleon|Nayanthara|Vadivelu|Prakash Raj
overview: A honest and peace loving village man turns into a politician but his past haunts him till he seeks redemption by surrendering himself to law.

title: Anbarivu
cast: HipHop Tamizha Adhi|Napoleon|Kashmira Pardesi|Shivani Rajashekar|Sai Kumar
overview: Separated twins, Anbu and Arivu have been brought up in two worlds, one which is filled with blood stain and revenge and the other is filled with Wisdom and Peace. Anbu and Arivu are forced to switch from their worlds to reunite their estranged family.

title: Visaranai
cast: Dinesh Ravi|Samuthirakani|Kishore|Anandhi|Aadukalam Murugadoss
overview: Pandi and his friends, immigrant workers in Andhra Pradesh, are picked up by cops for a crime they never committed. And thus begins their nightmare, where they become pawns in a vicious game where the voiceless are strangled by those with power.

title: David
cast: Neil Nitin Mukesh|Vikram|Vinay Virmani|Jiiva|Tabu
overview: The story is about two Davids living in different parts of India whose lives eventually come together in a twist of events., who are about to take a step which is going to change their lives forever.

title: Magalir Mattum
cast: Revathi|Urvashi|Rohini|Nasaar|Pasi Sathya
overview: In a male-dominated world, three women from different walks of life unite against their predatory manager, challenging his atrocities and pushing back with a bold feminist agenda.

title: Singam 2
cast: Suriya|Anushka Shetty|Hansika Motwani|Vivek|Santhanam
overview: Picking up the storyline from where Singam ended, Duraisingam has gone undercover after meeting the Home Minister and is working as an NCC officer in a school in Thoothukudi. The only people who know about this operation are the Chief Minister and Home Minister apart from himself.

title: Aranmanai 2
cast: Hansika Motwani|Siddharth|Trisha Krishnan|Poonam Bajwa|Soori
overview: A ghost enters a palatial mansion and starts attacking the men in the family. What is its back story?

title: Thillalangadi
cast: Ravi Mohan|Tamannaah Bhatia|Shaam|Vadivelu|Prabhu
overview: Nisha leaves Krishna because of his easy-going attitude towards his life and career. Soon, her parents arrange her marriage with an NRI and she reluctantly agrees, but things do not go as planned.

title: Dharma Chakkaram
cast: Vijayakanth|Rambha|C. R. Vijayakumari|Delhi Ganesh|Aarthi
overview: Dharma Chakkaram is a 1997 Tamil action drama film, directed by K. S. Ravikumar.

title: Aasai
cast: Ajith Kumar|Suvalakshmi|Prakash Raj|Rohini|Poornam Viswanathan
overview: A man kills his wife when she learns that he lusts after her sister. He then begins to make his moves for his sister-in-law. When he tries to sabotage the girl's marriage, her fiance gets suspicious.

title: Mambattiyan
cast: Prashanth|Meera Jasmine|Mumaith Khan|Prakash Raj|Vadivelu
overview: Mambattiyan is a 2011 Tamil action film directed by Thiagarajan, starring his son Prashanth as the titular character. The film, also starring Meera Jasmine, Prakash Raj, Vadivelu and Mumaith Khan in other pivotal roles, is a remake of the 1983 Tamil blockbuster of the same title that starred Thiagarajan himself and Saritha

title: Veeram
cast: Ajith Kumar|Tamannaah Bhatia|Vidharth|Bala|Santhanam
overview: A straightforward man, who uses violence to settle disputes, decides to mend his ways for the sake of his lover, but when he learns that her family is in danger, he decides to save them at all cost.

title: Varuthapadatha Valibar Sangam
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Soori|Sri Divya|Sathyaraj|Rajendran
overview: Set in a village in Tamil Nadu called Silukkuvarpatti, VVS talks about the love between Bose Pandi  and Latha Pandi. While Bose is a carefree but spirited young man who doubles up as the leader of a local ‘Sangam’, Latha is the daughter of the village’s head honcho, Sivanandi. Sivanandi and Bose don’t exactly see eye to eye and added to this, Sivanandi is dead against his three daughters falling in love as he sees it as an insult to his status and standing in the village. A superhit hilarious comedy entertainer.

title: Kireedam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Rajkiran|Ajay|Trisha Krishnan|Vivek
overview: A sincere man wishes to fulfill his father's dream that he follows in his footsteps and becomes a police officer. However, when his father is punished for his honesty and transferred to an area that is ruled with an iron fist by a heartless gangster, the young man must take the law into his own hands to protect his father.

title: Ullam Ketkumae
cast: Shaam|Arya|Laila|Asin Thottumkal|Pooja Umashankar
overview: A friendship between college friends Shyam, Priya and Pooja suffers when Shyam confesses his love for Priya, leaving Pooja, who also loves him, heartbroken.

title: 7Aum Arivu
cast: Suriya|Shruti Haasan|Johnny Nguyen|Ashwin Kakumanu|Guinness Pakru
overview: A genetic engineering student tries to bring back the skills of a legend of the past and use his skills to save India from a deadly virus attack by China.

title: Love Insurance Kompany
cast: Pradeep Ranganathan|S. J. Suryah|Krithi Shetty|Yogi Babu|Gouri G Kishan
overview: In a tech-chained world, a hero seeks love’s unshackled truth. Through their fight, humanity’s heart may beat free once more.

title: Sathya
cast: Kamal Haasan|Amala Akkineni|Rajesh|Nasaar|Vadivukarasi
overview: Sathya, a jobless youth who does not like injustice becomes a puppet in the hands of a corrupt politician, and unknowingly helps him in his malicious endeavors.

title: R. K. Nagar
cast: Vaibhav|Sana Althaf|Sampath Raj|Anjena Kirti|T. Siva
overview: Things look up for a Chennai man struggling to make ends meet when he falls for a politician's daughter until he gets entangled in a murder case.

title: Jama
cast: Pari Elavazhagan|Ammu Abhirami|Chetan|Sri Krishna Dayal|KVN Manimegalai
overview: A poignant tale of Kalyanam, a young Koothu artist, struggles to uphold his father’s legacy in traditional folk art amidst rivals suppressions , torn between his love, mothers wishes, societal expectations, and self-doubt in his quest to lead his own Jama.

title: Dum Dum Dum
cast: R. Madhavan|Jyothika|Vivek|Manivannan|Murali
overview: Adityan, a city slicker's marriage is fixed by his dad in the village to Ganga, a village belle. He is not happy with it, as he wants to marry a city girl and that too after falling in love. On the other hand, Ganga also is not interested, as she wants to marry only after completing her engineering in the city.

title: Arinthum Ariyamalum
cast: Arya|Navdeep|Prakash Raj|Sameksha Oswal|Adithya Menon
overview: A college student files a police complaint against the adopted son of a gangster for shooting his girlfriend. However, the gangster is shocked to learn that the student is his real son.

title: Cadaver
cast: Amala Paul|Riythvika|Thrigun|Munishkanth|Harish Uthaman
overview: A pathologist and a police commissioner try to solve a series of murders involving a prisoner. Their journey leads to shocking revelations!

title: Minsara Kanavu
cast: Arvind Swamy|Prabhu Deva|Kajol|Arundathi Nag|Nasaar
overview: Priya decides that she wants to be a nun, much to the horror of her father and Thomas, the boy who is in love with her. Thomas decides to enlist the help of Deva to change her mind.

title: Abhiyum Naanum
cast: Trisha Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Ganesh Venkatraman|Aishwarya Bhaskar|Elango Kumaravel
overview: The father of a grown daughter meets the father of a toddler at a playground and recounts the story of his own relationship with his daughter through the years, including his difficulties with accepting her marriage.

title: Villu
cast: Vijay|Nayanthara|Vadivelu|Prakash Raj|Ranjitha
overview: A son decides to avenge his father, an army officer, who was falsely framed and killed by three corrupt officers. Fatefully, he also ends up falling in love with the daughter of one of the killers.

title: Pichaikkaran
cast: Vijay Antony|Satna Titus|Bagavathi Perumal|Muthu Raman|Dheepa Ramanujam
overview: A rich man chooses to lead the life of a beggar for 48 days in the hope that his mother, who is on her deathbed, will recover.

title: Love Marriage
cast: Vikram Prabhu|Sushmitha Bhat|Meenakshi Dinesh|Sathyaraj|Ramesh Thilak
overview: Ram, a 33-year-old Bachelor From Madurai, Faces Mounting Pressure to Get Married. Amidst Cultural Expectations and Comic Misadventures, He Embarks on a Journey of Self-discovery, Questioning Tradition and Seeking His Own Path to Happiness

title: Velayudham
cast: Vijay|Genelia D'Souza|Hansika Motwani|Saranya Mohan|Santhanam
overview: An ordinary milkman is forced to become the fictional character Velayudham who takes on the scum of the earth.

title: Pathu Thala
cast: Gautham Karthik|Silambarasan|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Kalaiyarasan|Priya Bhavani Shankar
overview: An undercover cop goes into the big bad world, a place taken over by a don, where his safety may be compromised.

title: Samuthiram
cast: R. Sarathkumar|Murali|Manoj Bharathiraja|Abhirami|Kaveri
overview: Selvarasu is the head of the family and his two brothers Thangarasu and Chinnarasu are ready to give up their life for him. The three brothers think the world of their sister Rasamani. A rich man from the neighboring village feels insulted when Thangarasu mishandles his son, and to take revenge, he makes Rasamani his daughter-in-law. Starting with taking away all of the brothers' wealth, he insults them at every opportunity while ill-treating Rasamani. What transpires later forms the crux of the story.

title: Deepavali
cast: Ravi Mohan|Bhavana|Raghuvaran|Vijayakumar|Lal
overview: Susi, who suffers from post traumatic event disorder, falls in love with Billu. After Susi undergoes the treatment for her cure, she is unable to recognize Billu..

title: Kabali
cast: Rajinikanth|Radhika Apte|Sai Dhanshika|Winston Chao|Kishore
overview: A gangster in Malaysia goes in search of his family after 25 years of imprisonment.

title: Poovellam Kettuppar
cast: Suriya|Jyothika|Nasaar|Vijayakumar|Ambika
overview: A young couple needs to get the rivalry between their families sorted out so that they can get married with full consent of their parents.

title: Kuruthipunal
cast: Kamal Haasan|Arjun Sarja|Nasaar|Gautami Tadimalla|Geetha
overview: Adhi, a policeman, plans Operation Dhanush to catch a dreaded terrorist, Badri, and save innocent lives. However, when Badri, threatens his family, he must choose between his duty and his loved ones.

title: Ghilli
cast: Vijay|Trisha Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Janaki Sabesh
overview: Muthu Pandi, a village strongman, decides to marry Dhanalakshmi, and begins his quest by eliminating everyone who opposes their union - starting with both her brothers. In desperation, Dhanalakshmi decides to escape from the village, and in the process is unwittingly assisted by a university Kabaddi player Velu.

title: Coimbatore Mappillai
cast: Vijay|Sanghavi|Karan|Goundamani|Mahendran
overview: Coimbatore Maaple starring by vijay and Sangavi. Vijay comes to the city and stays with his friend who claims that he has a job. Actually he's also unemployed. Both of them are tenants of a girl named Sanghavi. First the hero and heroine get into fights, but then their arguments and fights turn into love.Meanwhile another guy, Karan, is also in love with Sangavi. During the initial fights Sanghavi gets Vijay into trouble with the other guy. Finally the hero clears his name with everybody and takes the hand of his lover.

title: Viruman
cast: Karthi|Aditi Shankar|Rajkiran|Prakash Raj|Soori
overview: An intrepid and good-hearted son fights to make his arrogant father pay the price for his sins, which includes his mother's death, and save his brothers from the man's grip.

title: Yogi
cast: Ameer|Madhumitha|Swathi|Vincent Asokan|Snehan
overview: For Yogi, assaults have become a daily routine, so much so that the sight of his latest victim, a heavily injured woman slumped in her car, leaves him untouched. But then he spots her baby on the back seat. Without a second thought, Yogi takes the completely defenseless creature along in a basket. Not even a machine gun pointed at his forehead could have had a stronger impact on his life; he feels threatened and seduced at the same time.

title: Kanchana 2
cast: Raghava Lawrence|Kovai Sarala|Taapsee Pannu|Jayaprakash|Pooja Ramachandran
overview: A TV channel’s crew goes to a deserted beachside bungalow to stage a horror show but the place is actually haunted and the ghost(s) in the place possess the director and the cameraman in the team.

title: Michael
cast: Sundeep Kishan|Divyansha Kaushik|Varun Sandesh|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar
overview: Set in the early 1990s, Michael, a simple yet daring boy from the south moves to Bombay with a personal strong motive, grow under the wings of Gurunath, a dreaded gangster. Michael is assigned with a task of killing the man involved in the attempted assassination of Gurunath. Things take a turn as he falls in love with the target's daughter, Theera, in Delhi.

title: Pulikkuthi Pandi
cast: Vikram Prabhu|Lakshmi Menon|Samuthirakani|Singampuli|R. K. Suresh
overview: A ruthless youngster becomes a kind and humble husband for his wife but as fate turns brutal, his patience is tested.

title: Parking
cast: M. S. Bhaskar|Harish Kalyan|Indhuja Ravichandran|Rama|Prathana Nathan
overview: An elderly man and a youngster, fight over a much-coveted parking spot, let their egos get the better of them and the clash brings out their ugliest sides.

title: Kuttram 23
cast: Arun Vijay|Mahima Nambiar|Vamsi Krishna|Thambi Ramaiah|Aravind Akash
overview: A case involving the disappearance of a pregnant woman turns into a personal one for the cop who is tasked with investigating it.​

title: DD Returns
cast: Santhanam|Surbhi|Redin Kingsley|Lollu Sabha Maaran|Munishkanth
overview: Madhi and his friends hides a bag full of money and jewels in a haunted bungalow to ditch the police. When he goes to retrieve the bag, a ghost makes him play a survival game in order to leave with the bag.

title: 90 ML
cast: Oviya Helen|Anson Paul|Masoom Shankar|Monisha Ram|Shree Gopika
overview: Thamara, Paru, Kajal and Suganya are four friends who are rather tired of their uneventful routine. However, things take a turn for the better with the arrival of the spirited and outgoing Rita, a young woman who encourages them to live their lives to the fullest.

title: RajiniMurugan
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Keerthy Suresh|Soori|Samuthirakani|Rajkiran
overview: Rajini Murugan locks horns with Yezharai Mookkan who tries to get a share of Murugan's ancestral property by defaming his grandfather.

title: Sundarapandian
cast: M. Sasikumar|Lakshmi Menon|Vijay Sethupathi|Soori|Appukutty
overview: Sundarapandiyan , who has finished college and goofs around in his village with friend Murugesan , decides to pitch in when Arivazhagan seeks his help in wooing Archana . But she rejects Arivazhagan and also another suitor Bhuvaneshwaran. Complications arise when she says she has been in love with Sundarapandiyan for a long time.

title: Aranmanai
cast: Hansika Motwani|Vinay Rai|Andrea Jeremiah|Raai Laxmi|Santhanam
overview: Aranmanai is about a family that wants to sell their ancestral home. The supernatural elements they discover there in the aranmanai (palace) lead to some bone-chilling moments.

title: Yezhu Kadal Yezhu Malai
cast: Nivin Pauly|Anjali|Soori|Ravi Mariya|N. Azhagamperumal
overview: Caught between family duty and romantic love, a young man faces an impossible choice.

title: Dev
cast: Karthi|Rakul Preet Singh|Prakash Raj|Ramya Krishnan|Nikki Galrani
overview: A youngster who has to fight against all the odds in order to achieve his desires.

title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam
cast: Nayanthara|Prathap Pothan|Bhumika Chawla|Rohini Hattangadi|Lee Nicholas Harris
overview: The heiress of a multi-millionaire, a hearing and speech impaired young woman, has to fend off a slasher all alone in her palatial estate.

title: Maattrraan
cast: Suriya|Kajal Agarwal|Sachin Khedekar|Tara|Irina Maleva
overview: Akhilan and Vimalan are the conjoined twins of genetic scientist Ramachandran, whose company makes Energion, a dietary supplement that promises to make geniuses out of children. When Russian journalist Volga tells them that there is something fishy about Energion and is mysteriously found dead, their lives are turned topsy-turvy.

title: Hot Spot
cast: Kalaiyarasan|Sofia Manikandan|Janani Iyer|Ammu Abhirami|Gouri G Kishan
overview: A hopeful director with a secret plan, tells the story of his movie to a well-known but imperfect producer. The Director's stories reflect and question the Producer's beliefs, leaving the Producer confused by how the stories seem to connect with his own grudges.

title: Something Something… Unakkum Enakkum
cast: Ravi Mohan|Trisha Krishnan|Prabhu|K. Bhagyaraj|Geetha
overview: The story starts in a jail, where prisoner Muthupandi (Prabhu) is being interrogated by a police officer (Vijayakumar) about his past. Without hesitation, Muthupandi tells. Muthupandi is a son of the soil, a very hard working self-made man who dotes on his only sister Kavitha (Trisha Krishnan). Their mother died very early and it was Muthupandi who brought up Kavitha with a lot of love and affection. Kavitha’s best friend Lalitha (Richa Pallod), who is getting married, takes Kavitha to her house for the nuptial ceremony. As an emotional scene prior to this notes, this is the first time Kavitha has been away from her brother.

title: Remo
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Keerthy Suresh|Sathish|K. S. Ravikumar|Saranya Ponvannan
overview: An aspiring actor dresses up as a female nurse to bag a role in a film, and more importantly, woo the love of his life.

title: Oru Kalluriyin Kathai
cast: Arya|Sonia Agarwal|Jaivarma|Santhanam|Charu Haasan
overview: After graduating, a young man and a girl, who are in love with each other, promise to meet again after five years in their college campus. When he does show up on the set day, his friends are shocked to see that he has completely changed.

title: Putham Pudhu Kaalai
directors: Gautham Vasudev Menon|Karthik Subbaraj|Sudha Kongara Prasad|Suhasini Maniratnam|Rajiv Menon
cast: Jayaram|Urvashi|Kalidas Jayaram|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Preethi Nedumaran
overview: Putham Pudhu Kaalai brings together 5 of the most celebrated directors in Tamil cinema - Sudha Kongara, Gautham Menon, Suhasini Mani Ratman, Rajiv Menon, and Karthik Subbaraj to create Amazon Prime Video's first Indian anthology film.

title: Osthe
cast: Silambarasan|Richa Gangopadhyay|Santhanam|Jithan Ramesh|Sonu Sood
overview: A police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians and what happens in the end forms the crux of the story.

title: Eazhaiyin Sirippil
cast: Prabhu Deva|Kausalya|Roja Selvamani|Suvalakshmi|Vivek
overview: Eazhaiyin Sirippil is a 2000 Tamil film directed by SUBHASH. The film stars Prabhu Deva, Kausalya, Roja and Suvalakshmi in lead roles.

title: Oh My Kadavule
cast: Ashok Selvan|Ritika Singh|Vani Bhojan|Shah Ra|M. S. Bhaskar
overview: Arjun is conveniently married to his best friend Anu and their marriage turns out to be a nightmare since he is not really in love with her. When things get tough Arjun gets a second chance in life that could change his path and perspective altogether.

title: Ramanaa
cast: Vijayakanth|Simran|Ashima Bhalla|Vijayan|Riyaz Khan
overview: Ramana decides to abolish corruption once for all with the help of his students who are now working in various government offices.

title: Rangoli
cast: Hamaresh|Aadukalam Murugadoss|Prarthana Sandeep|Saishri Prabhakaran|Akshaya Hariharan
overview: A School Boy Frequently Overcomes Uncertain Issues. Later Realize His Family Struggles Because of Him.

title: Thadam
cast: Arun Vijay|Vidhya Pradeep|Tanya Hope|Smruthi Venkat|Fefsi Vijayan
overview: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among a few cops when they find out that the one accused in the crime has a look-alike!

title: Irudhi Suttru
cast: R. Madhavan|Ritika Singh|Mumtaz Sorcar|Nasaar|Radha Ravi
overview: A grumpy boxing coach takes on a young, rebellious woman under his wings and starts training her for the world championship. But their biggest battle has to be fought outside the ring.

title: Amarkalam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Shalini|Raghuvaran|Nasaar|Ambika
overview: Vasu is a tough street crook who lives at a movie theater. One day while transporting the reels of a new film, he clashes with a music student Mohana. Mohana is the daughter of the Police Commissioner, who Tulsidas an ex-gang leader released from jail has an old grudge against. He tells Vasu to kidnap Mohana for two days in order to ruin the family's honor. While being held captive by Vasu, Mohana falls in love with him after hearing him sing. Vasu rejects her love, but on learning of it, Tulsidas pays him to pretend to be in love with her. By the time Tulsidas learns that his enmity with the police commissioner is false and tells Vasu to stay away from Mohana it is too late, Vasu's love has become real.

title: Bagheera
cast: Prabhu Deva|Amyra Dastur|Remya Nambeesan|Sanchita Shetty|Janani Iyer
overview: A psychopath, who claims to be a saviour for men, murders women who are involved in more than one relationship. Who is he, and what made him such a monster?

title: Pandiya Naadu
cast: Vishal Krishna|Vikranth|Lakshmi Menon|Bharathiraja|Soori
overview: Sivakumar is a timid young man, with a loving family in Madurai. His brother, a government official, earns the wrath of Simmakkal Ravi, the all-powerful gangster in the city. When he is murdered, Sivakumar and his father Kalayanasundaram plan to take revenge, in their own separate ways.

title: Iraivi
cast: S. J. Suryah|Vijay Sethupathi|Bobby Simha|Kamalinee Mukherjee|Anjali
overview: Three men try to overcome the problems in their lives not realising the impact their efforts are having on the women in their lives.

title: Kadhalar Dhinam
cast: Kunal Singh|Sonali Bendre|Nasaar|Periyar Dasan|Ragasudha
overview: Two college students, the slum child Raja and the dean's daughter Roja, chat with each other over the Internet and fall in love. However, Roja is engaged and Raja cannot bear to disrespect her father, to whom he owes his livelihood.

title: Nota
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Mehreen Pirzada|Sathyaraj|Nasaar|Yashika Anand
overview: Sitting Chief Minister Vinodhan, who is facing imprisonment in an illegal assets case, makes his son, Varun the temporary CM until his return. The disinterested young man gradually wakes up to the sorry state of affairs and tries to bring in a change.

title: Andhagan
cast: Prashanth|Simran|Priya Anand|Karthik Muthuraman|Samuthirakani
overview: A piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.

title: Anjali
cast: Shamili|Tarun|Shruthi|Revathi|Raghuvaran
overview: After a few years, Chitra learns that her child, who was believed to be dead, is alive but is suffering from a mental illness. However, her family faces many challenges while looking after her child.

title: Aayitha Ezhuthu
cast: Suriya|R. Madhavan|Siddharth|Meera Jasmine|Esha Deol
overview: A goon, who dreams of making it big in life, a student leader, who strives to keep politicians away from college election and a third guy who wants to settle abroad. Their lives change after an incident on a bridge.

title: Youth
cast: Vijay|Shaheen Khan|Vivek|Vijayakumar|Yugendran
overview: On his wedding day, Shiva (Vijay) discovers that his cousin and bride, Aruna, has run away because she does not want to marry a cook. But he takes it lightly and moves to Chennai with the girl's brother (Shyam Ganesh) to look for a job. One night, he saves Sandya from some goons. In gratitude, she kisses him. Shiva starts to fall in love with Sandya. After several occasions where they bumped into each other, Shiva harbours hope that she too reciprocates his affections.

title: Rowthiram
cast: Jiiva|Shriya Saran|Prakash Raj|Ganesh Acharya|Jayaprakash
overview: An angry young man who takes on the bad elements to clean the society.

title: Massu Engira Maasilamani
cast: Suriya|Nayanthara|Pranitha Subhash|Premji Amaran|R. Parthiban
overview: A conman gains the power to see and communicate with ghosts and decides to use it to make money. His happy-go-lucky lifestyle goes for a toss when a ghost who is his look-alike approaches him with an offer.

title: Raangi
cast: Trisha Krishnan|Anaswara Rajan|Gopi Kannadasan|Lizzie Antony|Waqar Khan
overview: Thaiyal Nayagi, a journalist from Chennai, happens to connect with a terrorist in Tunisia through a fake account in the name of her 16-year-old cousin, Sushmitha. Little she knew that this would put herself and her cousin in danger.

title: Kochadaiiyaan
cast: Rajinikanth|Deepika Padukone|R. Sarathkumar|Shobana|Aadhi Pinisetty
overview: A noble warrior seeks revenge against the ruler of his kingdom, who killed his father. At the same time, he also ends up upsetting the neighbouring enemy kingdom's ruler.

title: Oho Enthan Baby
cast: Rudra|Mithila Palkar|Anju Kurian|Mysskin|Redin Kingsley

title: Vendhu Thanindhathu Kaadu
cast: Silambarasan|Siddhi Idnani|Neeraj Madhav|Radikaa Sarathkumar|Siddique
overview: A youngster from Tamil Nadu goes to Bombay in search of a better life and gets sucked into the underworld. Will he be able to find a way out of the violence and bloodshed?

title: Miruthan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Lakshmi Menon|Anikha Surendran|Kaali Venkat|Sriman
overview: When a zombie outbreak occurs in a hill station, a traffic cop takes on the responsibility of transporting a team of doctors to a city hospital so that they can find an antidote.

title: New
cast: S. J. Suryah|Simran|Kiran Rathod|Devayani|Aishwarya Bhaskar
overview: An 8-year-old boy runs away from home and meets a scientist, who transforms him into a young man of 28, although mentally, he remains a child.

title: Udanpirappe
cast: Jyothika|M. Sasikumar|Samuthirakani|Kalaiyarasan|Soori
overview: A woman hopes for the reunion of two families caught in the ideological battle between her righteous but hot-headed brother and her law-abiding husband.

title: Mounam Pesiyadhe
cast: Suriya|Trisha Krishnan|Nandha|Neha Pendse|Laila
overview: Gautham, who runs a restaurant, falls in love with his friend Kannan's cousin, Sandhya. Problems arise when Gautham learns that Kannan's parents want Kannan to marry Sandhya.

title: Sabdham
cast: Aadhi Pinisetty|Lakshmi Menon|Redin Kingsley|Simran|Rajiv Menon
overview: A paranormal investigator is employed by a university to investigate a series of mysterious deaths some are attributing to supernatural causes.

title: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
cast: Kamal Haasan|Jyothika|Kamalinee Mukherjee|Lev Gorn|Prakash Raj
overview: DCP Raghavan sets off on the trail of the killers of Rani, the daughter of a police officer. Following this, many more murders take place, leading him to New York to capture the maniac killer.

title: Bommai
cast: S. J. Suryah|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Chandhini Tamilarasan|Joshua Parisutham
overview: Raj Kumar, a painter in a mannequin factory with troubled past, falls in love with a mannequin reminds him of his high-school sweetheart Nandini and imagines it to be real. But things get messy when the factory owner exports it to a showroom.

title: Pulikkuthi Pandi
cast: Vikram Prabhu|Lakshmi Menon|Samuthirakani|Singampuli|R. K. Suresh
overview: A ruthless youngster becomes a kind and humble husband for his wife but as fate turns brutal, his patience is tested.

title: Irumbu Thirai
cast: Arjun Sarja|Vishal Krishna|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Delhi Ganesh|Robo Shankar
overview: Kathiravan, a major in the Indian army with anger management issues, is compelled by circumstances to borrow a loan from a bank with false documents. When the entire money in the account vanishes, Kathiravan tries to track down the scamsters, and it leads him to White Devil, a master hacker.

title: Angadi Theru
cast: Anjali|Mahesh|Pandi|A. Venkatesh|Pazha Karuppaiah
overview: Jyothi Lingam, a bright student, leads a happy life in his small village. One day, tragedy strikes when his father, the only earning member of the family, dies in an accident.

title: Papanasam
cast: Kamal Haasan|Gautami Tadimalla|Kalabhavan Mani|Asha Sarath|Nivetha Thomas
overview: A cinephile tries to protect his family by hiding a heat-of-the-moment murder committed by his daughter by taking cues from the films he has watched. With the victim the son of a cop, can he get away with it?

title: Gopurangal Saivathillai
cast: Mohan|Suhasini Maniratnam|Radha|S.Ve. Sekar|Vinu Chakravarthy
overview: Murli, a stylish and handsome young man, is forced by his father to get married to Arukani, a village girl. To escape from his wife and father, he takes a job transfer to Bangalore, where he falls in love with Julie and gets married. Murli does not reveal his past to Julie, however, Arukani ends up at his house in Bangalore.

title: Jigarthanda
cast: Siddharth|Bobby Simha|Karunakaran|Lakshmi Menon|Ramachandran Durairaj
overview: A budding director endeavors to research a merciless gangster for making a film on gangsterism. But his secret attempts to conduct the research fail when he gets caught for snooping.

title: Pizza
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Remya Nambeesan|Aadukalam Naren|Karunakaran|Bobby Simha
overview: Michael, a pizza delivery boy, lives with Anu, an aspiring horror fiction writer. One day, on a delivery run, he goes to a bungalow, where mysterious events begin to unfold.

title: Kadhal Desam
cast: Abbas|Vineeth Radhakrishnan|Tabu|S. P. Balasubramaniam|Srividya
overview: Two boys from rival colleges, one rich and the other poor, become good friends after an incident. A new girl in college makes both their hearts melt but neither realises that they love the same girl.

title: Chikku Bukku
cast: Arya|Shriya Saran|Preetika Rao|Santhanam|Vaiyapuri
overview: Arjun and Anu fall in love with each other on a train journey. When Anu's father learns about their relationship, he remembers that he shares an unpleasant history with Arjun's father.

title: PT Sir
cast: HipHop Tamizha Adhi|Kashmira Pardesi|Anikha Surendran|Pandiarajan|Munishkanth
overview: The film follows a Physical Training teacher who inspires his students to realize their potential and pursue their aspirations. As he navigates various challenges within the school environment, his mentorship plays a crucial role in their journey of self-discovery and personal growth.

title: Veeram
cast: Ajith Kumar|Tamannaah Bhatia|Vidharth|Bala|Santhanam
overview: A straightforward man, who uses violence to settle disputes, decides to mend his ways for the sake of his lover, but when he learns that her family is in danger, he decides to save them at all cost.

title: Iraivan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Nayanthara|Rahul Bose|Narain|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: Arjun, a tough cop along with his friend Andrew embark on a mission to track down a truly gruesome psychopathic killer called Bhramma a.k.a The Smiley Man. They eventually manage to apprehend Bhramma at the cost of losing Andrew makes Arjun resign from the police force. However, tragedy hits home when Bhramma escapes from prison and resumes his killing spree.

title: Ten Hours
cast: Sibiraj|Gajaraj|Raj Aiyyappa|Saravana Subbiah|Jeeva Ravi
overview: A bus murder investigation unfolds, revealing possible scenarios and suspects. As everyone undergoes questioning, hidden layers of the case begin to surface.

title: Engeyum Kadhal
cast: Ravi Mohan|Hansika Motwani|Suman Talwar|Raju Sundaram|Karl E. Landler
overview: Kamal, a young billionaire, doesn't believe in love; his philosophy is simple: No love, no commitments = no disappointments. He works hard for 11 months and takes a month's break from all the work related commitments. Cute violinist Kayalvizhi alias Kayal believes in true love and is highly fascinated with Indian culture. Kayal's father Rajasekhar runs a small detective agency in France and Kayal often reads her father's case files for interesting stories. One day, Rajasekhar gets a new client who wants to know about his girlfriend's mystery man. After a brief investigation, Rajasekhar finds that his client's girlfriend is dating Kamal. Sonu gets angry and decides to kill his girlfriend and Kamal.

title: Iruttu Araiyil Murattu Kuthu
cast: Gautham Karthik|Vaibhavi Shandilya|Yashika Anand|Chandrika Ravi|Shah Ra
overview: A sexually-starved spirit traps two couples in a bungalow in Bangkok where they have planned to stay for a week. The spirit wants one of the two men to have sex with her. Can they manage to escape?

title: Pichaikkaran 2
cast: Vijay Antony|Kavya Thapar|Radha Ravi|Y. G. Mahendran|Mansoor Ali Khan
overview: A poor man with a painful past becomes a victim of illegal brain replacement surgery, leaving him to struggle in the shoes of a rich billionaire.

title: V.I.P
cast: Prabhu Deva|Abbas|Rambha|Simran|Manivannan
overview: A thief is mistaken for an NRI returning to work with a rich businessman and marry his daughter. The real guy, meanwhile, ends up with the thief's friend. The odd pairs fall in love midst the chaos.

title: Annamalai
cast: Rajinikanth|Sarath Babu|Khushboo|Rekha|Radha Ravi
overview: A class-divided friendship goes through highs and lows through several decades.

title: Kaashmora
cast: Karthi|Nayanthara|Sri Divya|Vivek|Jangiri Madhumitha
overview: Kaashmora, a present era black magic specialist; Rajnayak, an ancient era warlord and Ratnamahadevi is his queen. How these three are connected? What are the issues that arise?

title: Oru Kal Oru Kannadi
cast: Udhayanidhi Stalin|Hansika Motwani|Santhanam|Saranya Ponvannan|N. Azhagamperumal
overview: Saravanan falls for Meera at first sight, but she eventually turns him down. When he learns about her upcoming marriage, he and his friend, Partha, set out to Pondicherry to stop the wedding.

title: Theeradha Vilaiyattu Pillai
cast: Vishal Krishna|Neetu Chandra|Sarah-Jane Dias|Tanushree Dutta|Santhanam
overview: Karthik, a carefree management graduate, abstains from taking up a job. One day, he, along with his close friends, decides to conduct a straw poll by dating three women and then choosing the best one.

title: Kadhal Mannan
cast: Ajith Kumar|Maanu|Vivek|Girish Karnad|M. S. Viswanathan
overview: Strict and authoritarian, Rudran disowns his elder daughter for eloping. His younger daughter, Thilothama, lives under his rigid rules until she falls for Shiva, a kind-hearted mechanic. Fearful of her father’s, she struggles to confess her love. As emotions and traditions clash, will Thilothama and Shiva defy the odds, or will Rudran’s unyielding stance on love tear them apart?

title: Irumban
cast: Junior MGR|Aishwarya Dutta|Yogi Babu|Sentrayan|Shaji Choudhary
overview: Office, who belongs to hunter tribe, falls in love with Jain girl Mahima, whose life ambition is to become Nun. Office's friends kidnap Mahima into sea, to help their friend's Love. The Boat journey becomes adventurous and romantic and later dangerous due to goons with mission to eliminate office and his friends.

title: Maayavi
cast: Suriya|Jyothika|Himani Shivpuri|Sathyan Sivakumar|Aarthi
overview: A famous actress, after being kidnapped by a fan of her's, starts liking him.

title: Kodi
cast: Dhanush|Trisha Krishnan|Anupama Parameswaran|Saranya Ponvannan|G. Marimuthu
overview: A young politician finds himself in a position where he has to contest against his girlfriend, who is ambitious. Circumstances force his look-alike twin to also get involved in this political battle.

title: Rajakili
cast: Thambi Ramaiah|Samuthirakani|Aadukalam Naren|Deepa Shankar|G Praveen Kumar
overview: A God fearing multi-millionaire gets his life in shambles and becomes mentally & physically challenged after an entanglement with two other women apart from his first wife.

title: Nee Varuvai Ena
cast: R. Parthiban|Ajith Kumar|Devayani|Suvalakshmi|Vijayakumar
overview: Ganesh falls for his extremely caring and helpful new neighbour, Nandini, who lives in a house opposite to his. But, when Ganesh and his parents put forth a marriage proposal, she turns them down.

title: Jada
cast: Kathir|Yogi Babu|Kishore|Roshini Prakash|Swathishta Krishnan
overview: Jada is an upcoming Indian Tamil language sports drama film written and directed by Kumaran on his directorial debut. The film stars Kathir and newcomer Roshini in the lead roles, while Kishore and Yogi Babu play supporting roles.

title: Sivappathigaram
cast: Vishal Krishna|Mamta Mohandas|Manivannan|Raghuvaran|Upendra Limaye
overview: A man is working on a project with a smart professor whose daughter starts to like the man. During the legislature elections some mysterious killings take place. It's up to the guy to trace the killer.

title: Attagasam
cast: Ajith Kumar|Pooja Umashankar|Sujatha|Nizhalgal Ravi|Babu Antony
overview: Twin brothers Jeeva and Guru are separated in childhood by tragedy and fate. When their paths cross years later—one a humble driving instructor, the other a feared gangster—their identities collide, leading to a tale of revenge, redemption, and the enduring bond of family.

title: Sivalinga
cast: Raghava Lawrence|Ritika Singh|Vadivelu|Radha Ravi|Jayaprakash
overview: A cop investigating the suspicious death of a Muslim finds out that his own wife has become possessed by the young man’s ghost!

title: Goa
cast: Vaibhav|Premji Amaran|Jai Sampath|Aravind Akash|Sampath Raj
overview: Three young men, who always get into trouble in their village, dream of an effortless life. For this, they run away to Goa in the hope of finding and getting married to rich foreign women.

title: Bad Girl
cast: Anjali Sivaraman|Shanti Priya|Hridhu Haroon|Teejay|Sashank Bommireddipalli
overview: From her journey through high school and college, then out into the wider world, Ramya’s dream of finding the perfect guy is obstructed by societal mores, strict parents, unrequited love and the untrammeled chaos of her own mind.

title: Maaman
cast: Soori|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Swasika|Rajkiran|Balasaravanan
overview: An uncle's deep connection with his nephew is broken, when their family experiences personal differences.

title: Billa II
cast: Ajith Kumar|Vidyut Jammwal|Sudhanshu Pandey|Yog Jappie|Manoj K Jayan
overview: Small-time diamond smuggler David befriends Goa-based gangster Abbasi. But when David begins to build inroads with an international gangster, Abbasi is not happy, and soon the two turn into bitter rivals.

title: Pannaiyarum Padminiyum
cast: Jayaprakash|Tulasi|Vijay Sethupathi|Balasaravanan|Aishwarya Rajesh
overview: A kind and respected village landlord acquires a vintage Premier Padmini car from his friend and cherishes it more than anything else. Over time, the entire village grows attached to the car, forming an emotional bond with it. His wife, however, refuses to ride in it until he learns to drive, so he decides to surprise her with a ride on their wedding anniversary. But before he can fulfill his promise, the car is taken away due to unforeseen circumstances. Will they ever get it back? A deeply emotional tale of love, nostalgia, and the heartfelt connection between an elderly couple and their cherished car.

title: Pa Paandi
cast: Rajkiran|Prasanna|Chaya Singh|Dhanush|Revathi
overview: ‘Power’ Paandi, once a legendary stunt master who ruled the world of film stunts in his prime years is now content in living a peaceful life with his son and grandchildren. But he soon realizes that his acts that he thinks is normal and righteous, constantly irks his son who seems to taking their relationship for granted. One such overblown tiff with his son drives him to go do some soul searching, the outcome of which has many unexpected experiences.

title: Sabhaapathy
cast: Santhanam|Preeti Verma|M. S. Bhaskar|Sayaji Shinde|Pugazh
overview: A young man who has a speech disorder ends up with a suitcase filled with money that belongs to a corrupt politician.

title: Agni Natchathiram
cast: Karthik Muthuraman|Prabhu|Vijayakumar|Amala Akkineni|Nirosha
overview: Two step sons of an honest noble man choose different professions. One becomes a police office and the other turns into a goon. The rest of the film revolves around how the two confront each other.

title: Viyabari
cast: S. J. Suryah|Tamannaah Bhatia|Prakash Raj|Namitha|Malavika
overview: A businessman who wants to be rich loses out on family and social life. He marries a girl who loves him only because she would prove profitable to his business. He realizes what he lost after the death of his mother.

title: Malaikottai
cast: Vishal Krishna|Priyamani|Devaraj|Ajay|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: A young man is granted conditional bail, which requires him to go to the Trichy police station. On his way there, he falls for a beautiful girl. When the girl lands up in trouble, he finds himself facing the wrath of powerful politicians.

title: Kamaraj
cast: Richard Madhuram|J. Mahendran|V. S. Raghavan|Charu Haasan|Vijayan
overview: The film is a biographical sketch of the former Chief Minister of the then Madras State and the All-India Congress Committee secretary and a respected national figure. The film starts with the young age of Kamaraj and ends with the funeral procession of the leader.

title: Avvai Shanmugi
cast: Kamal Haasan|Meena|Gemini Ganesan|Nagesh|Manivannan
overview: A divorced husband desperately misses his daughter. In order to be with her, he takes up a job in his father-in-law's house. The only catch is that the job is that of a female governess.

title: Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada
cast: Silambarasan|Manjima Mohan|Sathish Krishnan|Baba Sehgal|Daniel Balaji
overview: A youngster goes on a road trip with the girl of his dreams and but an accident leads things to spiraling out of control.

title: Vantha Rajavathaan Varuven
cast: Silambarasan|Megha Akash|Catherine Tresa|Ramya Krishnan|Prabhu
overview: The young heir of a rich family embarks on a journey to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

title: Kaaka Muttai
cast: J Vignesh|Ramesh Thilaganathan|Aishwarya Rajesh|Joe Malloori|Ramesh Thilak
overview: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they manage to find the money to buy one?

title: Yennai Arindhaal
cast: Ajith Kumar|Arun Vijay|Anikha Surendran|Vivek|Anushka Shetty
overview: Sathyadev, who is on a career break, is forced to put on his cop shoes ones again to save Thenmozhi, a young woman who is the target of a criminal organ harvesting group, led by a ghost from his past.

title: Kattradhu Thamizh
cast: Jiiva|Anjali|Karunas|N. Azhagamperumal|Sree Raam
overview: A young Tamil-postgraduate, frustrated with the circumstances and futility of his job, slowly loses his mental balance and becomes a sociopath.

title: Sillunu Oru Kaadhal
cast: Suriya|Jyothika|Bhumika Chawla|Santhanam|Vadivelu
overview: Gowtham and Kundhavi married then she finds a diary from his time at college, five years earlier. She thinks he would rather be married to Aishwarya, his college sweetheart, so she makes arrangements for them to meet again.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
cast: Kathir|Anandhi|Yogi Babu|G. Marimuthu|Lijeesh
overview: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

title: Aval
cast: Siddharth|Andrea Jeremiah|Atul Kulkarni|Anisha Victor|Suresh
overview: Two families have a tough time dealing with a revenge-seeking spirit, which is strangely connected with one of its members

title: Vel
cast: Suriya|Asin Thottumkal|Vadivelu|Kalabhavan Mani|Nasaar
overview: Two sons that are separated as children grow up in drastically different environments.

title: Varuthapadatha Valibar Sangam
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Soori|Sri Divya|Sathyaraj|Rajendran
overview: Set in a village in Tamil Nadu called Silukkuvarpatti, VVS talks about the love between Bose Pandi  and Latha Pandi. While Bose is a carefree but spirited young man who doubles up as the leader of a local ‘Sangam’, Latha is the daughter of the village’s head honcho, Sivanandi. Sivanandi and Bose don’t exactly see eye to eye and added to this, Sivanandi is dead against his three daughters falling in love as he sees it as an insult to his status and standing in the village. A superhit hilarious comedy entertainer.

title: Maan Karate
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Hansika Motwani|Soori|Vamsi Krishna|Sayaji Shinde
overview: Five friends meet a mystic in a forest who grants their wish — a newspaper from the future. They decide to get rich by using their knowledge of the future. They focus their efforts on Peter, a carefree youth from Royapuram, who is predicted by the newspaper to win a boxing match and present the prize money of Rs. 2 crores to the five friends. However, they are perplexed when they discover that Peter has absolutely no knowledge of boxing.

title: Manmadhan Ambu
cast: Kamal Haasan|R. Madhavan|Trisha Krishnan|Urvashi|Sangeetha Krish
overview: Madhan is convinced that Ambu is unfaithful and refuses to pay detective Mannar when he reports otherwise. Wanting to make money to help a friend, Mannar cooks up stories about Ambu's infidelity.

title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
cast: Dhanush|Saranya Ponvannan|Samuthirakani|Amala Paul|Hrishikesh
overview: Raghuvaran, who is unemployed for years, gets his dream job but a powerful rival is keen to put him down. Can he take on his adversary?

title: Thiruda Thiruda
cast: Prashanth|Anand|Heera Rajgopal|Anu Aggarwal|S. P. Balasubramaniam
overview: An Inspector is assigned to track down a large sum of stolen money. His investigations lead him to a couple of small time crooks, a village belle, a murder, an absconding suspect, and an international drug dealer.

title: Tughlaq Durbar
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|R. Parthiban|Raashii Khanna|Manjima Mohan|Karunakaran
overview: A budding politician has devious plans to rise in the ranks — until an unexpected new presence begins to interfere with his every crooked move.

title: Meesaya Murukku
cast: HipHop Tamizha Adhi|Aathmika|Vivek|Vignesh|Vijayalakshmi
overview: A passionate youngster who dreams of making it in the music industry is on the verge of losing his love. What will happen to his career and romance?

title: Mugavari
cast: Ajith Kumar|Jyothika|K. Viswanath|Raghuvaran|Sithara
overview: Sridhar, an aspiring music director, has been struggling to get a foothold in the music industry for many years. He falls in love but is willing to put his relationship on a backburner for success.

title: Inji Iduppazhagi
cast: Anushka Shetty|Arya|Sonal Chauhan|Urvashi|Master Bharath
overview: An overweight, young woman, who finds it hard to land a husband, learns to accept her 'Size Sexy' figure and leads an awareness campaign against a dubious slimness centre.

title: Gentleman
cast: Arjun Sarja|Madhoo|M. N. Nambiar|Goundamani|Charan Raj
overview: Kicha is a modern-day Robin Hood, who along with his friend, Mani, steals from the rich to aid the poor. In society, he is a respected man who runs a small business.

title: Rudhran
cast: Raghava Lawrence|Priya Bhavani Shankar|R. Sarathkumar|Nasaar|Poornima Bhagyaraj
overview: Rudhran is a happy IT man living with his family until the moment his life is turned upside down. He comes upon a major criminal network including a businessman, Rudhran embarks on a mission to expose him the criminal network.

title: Enakku 20 Unakku 18
cast: Tarun|Trisha Krishnan|Vivek|Sunil Varma|Shriya Saran
overview: Sridhar and Preeti begin to like each other, but part ways without confessing their feelings. Over the years, they search for each other in vain while fate keeps working its own magic.  The film was also simultaneously shot and released in Telugu with a slightly different cast as Nee Manasu Naaku Telusu.

title: Thulluvadho Ilamai
cast: Dhanush|Sherin Shringar|Abhinay|Ramesh|Shilpa
overview: Six high-school classmates, three boys and three girls, coming from different strata of society, who have each their own problems in their respective families and escape from their homes, deciding to live together on their own with the help of an older friend of theirs.

title: Thakka Thakka
cast: Vikranth|Venkat Rahul|Abhinaya|Leema Babu|Parvati Nirban
overview: Karthi's lover Indu is kidnapped by her uncle, who works as an underling to Paraman, a gangster. Meanwhile, Shiva, his friend, murders Paraman's brother, Bala, with whom he has a history. Now, the gangster is baying for blood...

title: Moscowin Kavery
cast: Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Rahul Ravindran|Rupa Manjari|Santhanam|Manikandan
overview: Moscowin Kavery (English: Moscow's Kaveri ) is a 2010 Tamil romantic drama film written and directed by cinematographer Ravi Varman, making his directorial debut, besides handling the cinematography. The film, which has lyrics written by Vairamuthu and music scored by Thaman, stars Rahul Ravindran and Samantha in the lead roles with Harshvardhan, Santhanam and Seeman essaying supporting roles. Releasing on 27 August 2010, after nearly three years of production, the film was ultimately panned by critics.

title: Kolamavu Kokila
cast: Nayanthara|Yogi Babu|Saranya Ponvannan|Jacqueline|R.S. Shivaji
overview: A young woman takes up drug peddling to make money for the treatment of her mom, who has cancer.

title: Snegithiye
cast: Jyothika|Tabu|Sharbani Mukherji|Lakshmi|Ishita Arun
overview: Vasu and Radhika try to avoid Radhika's arranged marriage by saying that she loves Ramesh, a fictional man. However, they get into trouble when a man named Ramesh really walks into their life.

title: Mr. Local
cast: Sivakarthikeyan|Nayanthara|Yogi Babu|Robo Shankar|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: A happy-go-lucky guy lands in trouble after he locks horns with an egoistic lady.

title: Porkkalam
cast: Kishore|Niveditha|Tinnu Anand|Sathyan Sivakumar|Sampath Raj
overview: Porkkalam (Tamil: போர்க்களம்; English: Battlefield) is a 2010 Indian Tamil-language action film directed by debutant Bandi Saroj Kumar. Starring Kishore of Polladhavan and Vennila Kabaddi Kuzhu fame, Tinnu Anand, who starred in Mani Ratnam's Nayagan and Bombay, comedy actor Sathyan and Smitha, a newcomer from Karnataka, in lead roles and seven artists as Villains, the film has musical score by Rohit Kulkarni and cinematography by J. Mahendran. The film was released on 14 January 2010.

title: Boomika
cast: Aishwarya Rajesh|Avantika|Vidhu|Pavel Navageethan|Madhuri Jain
overview: Samyuktha's husband Gautham acquires a contract to build a township villa in an abandoned forest area. Gautham takes the help of his close friend Gayathri, an architect, to plan the construction. Gautham, Samyuktha, Gayathri, Aditi visit the guest house in the forest area to plan the construction. However, they start to experience several paranormal activities in the guest house which leaves them shocked and terrified.

title: Sumo
cast: Shiva|Priya Anand|Yoshinori Tashiro|VTV Ganesh|Yogi Babu
overview: When Shiva finds an unconscious stranger on the beach, he unknowingly begins a journey that leads to Japan's sumo rings. With truth and loyalty, he helps his friend reclaim his identity and honor, showing that bonds of the heart can rise above borders and power.

title: Chekka Chivantha Vaanam
cast: Arvind Swamy|Vijay Sethupathi|Arun Vijay|Silambarasan|Jyothika
overview: A bloody power struggle erupts between three brothers who are vying to take over the family business following the death of their father.

title: Ini Oru Kadhal Seivom
cast: Ajay Balakrishna|Suveta Shrimpton|KPY Thidiyan|Manu Parthiban|Vignesh Shanmugam
overview: Ini oru kadhal seivom is a love story that deals with the perception and ideology of a young man owing to his understanding about relationship in general and how his ideology changes with his love experience forms the crux of the story.

title: Katharbasha Endra Muthuramalingam
cast: Arya|Siddhi Idnani|Prabhu|K. Bhagyaraj|Aadukalam Naren
overview: An arrogant yet righteous man decides to get married to a woman, who has been suffering at the hands of her relatives. Little does he realize that an enmity from his past is going to invite trouble in his personal life.

title: Aadai
cast: Amala Paul|Ramya Subramanian|Sriranjini|Vivek Prasanna|Roju
overview: A free-spirited girl gets the shock of her life when she finds herself naked in an abandoned building after a late-night party.

title: Azhagi
cast: R. Parthiban|Nandita Das|Devayani|Vivek|Pandu
overview: Shanmugam meets his childhood sweetheart after many years and employs her as his housemaid as she urgently needs a job. However, his wife creates problems when she learns about their relationship.

title: Miss You
cast: Siddharth|Ashika Ranganath|Karunakaran|Balasaravanan|Sastika Rajendran
overview: What happens when a guy falls in love with the girl he thought he hated the most? Why does her simple `no` mean so much more than it seems?.

title: Vanamagan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Sayesha Saigal|Thambi Ramaiah|Prakash Raj|Vela Ramamoorthy
overview: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him.

title: Aambala
cast: Vishal Krishna|Hansika Motwani|Prabhu|Santhanam|Vaibhav
overview: Three brothers return to their native village to mend the relationship between their estranged father and his sisters. However, to unite the family, the brothers are told to marry their cousins.

title: Kaakha Kaakha
cast: Suriya|Jyothika|Jeevan|Daniel Balaji|Devadarshini
overview: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

title: Aranam
cast: Priyan|Varsha Saravanakumar|Laguparan|Keerthana kannadhasan
overview: The Story is set up in a villageAranthangi, where a zamindar lives with his prodigal son Mayavan. The zamindaradopted two fraternity sons Kathir and Sakthi.Mayavan, who always fights withhis father to register the zameen house to his name, dies unexpectedly. Peoplebelieve that Mayavan's spirit haunt the house.After the death of mayavanzamindar registered the zameen house to his fraternity sons. The same nightzamindar dies suddenly in that house. By the time Kanagu who is close to theZameendar uses some witchcraft tricks to conquer the bungalow.Kathir comes to live in thebungalow with his newly married wife. As they were living happily together someparanormal things happen and questions like what is the reason for thosesupernaturals? What was the cause of zamindar's death? arose.Kathir finds answer to these andmany other unanswered questions along with his younger brother Sakthi, how theyunveil the mystery and recovers from it; is told in a horror thriller genre inan unpredictable form.

title: Gargi
cast: Sai Pallavi|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Kaali Venkat|R.S. Shivaji|Jayaprakash
overview: When a schoolteacher's father is arrested for the rape of a 10-year-old girl, the media storm surrounding the case has lawyers reluctant about defending the accused. An inexperienced advocate with a speech disability agrees to take up the case despite the stiff opposition and ridicule from his association. It is now up to them to build their defence and prove that the man accused of committing the crime did not do it.

title: Punnagai Mannan
cast: Kamal Haasan|Revathi|Rekha|Srividya|Delhi Ganesh
overview: Chandram and Ranjani are in love with each other, but when their parents go against their union, they decide to commit suicide by jumping from a cliff. Unfortunately, Ranjani loses her life instantly but Chandram survives, and becomes a dance master.

title: Kanden Kadhalai
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Tamannaah Bhatia|Sapan Saran|Santhanam|Nizhalgal Ravi
overview: After his encounter with a chirpy girl, Anjali, during their train journey, a depressed Sakthivel's attitude towards life changes. Though he is attracted to her, he agrees to help her unite with her lover.

title: Thimiru Pudichavan
cast: Vijay Antony|Nivetha Pethuraj|Boxer Dheena|Daniel Balaji|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan
overview: A cop tries to bring a lot of positive changes in a city which is polluted by a goon’s actions.

title: Poochandi
cast: Ravishankar Ramamurthy|RJ Ramana|Tinesh Sarathi Krishnan|Logan Nathan|Ganessan Manogharan
overview: Thrill-seeking journalist Murugan heads to Malaysia to look for ordinary folks with odd stories, to be used as part of the true paranormal story collection he writes for a magazine. Everything goes well at first for him upon his arrival in Malaysia, that is until he encounters a supernatural experience that changes his life.

title: Once Upon a Time in Madras
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Pavithra Lakshmi|Abhirami|Anjali Nair|Shaan A
overview: In Chennai, along the Koovam River, 9-year-old Dinesh's life ends tragically when he's shot by retired army officer Krishnaraja in a fit of rage. Confusion ensues as the police investigation fails to identify the shooter.
