Krishnaraja disposes of the gun in the river, but its discoveries by a few people sets off a chain of events with unforeseen consequences.

title: Mullum Malarum
cast: Rajinikanth|Shoba|Sarath Babu|Fatafat Jayalakshmi|Venniradai Moorthy
overview: A young man, Kaali and his sister, Valli, who were orphaned as children, share a close bond. However, their relationship gets strained as Kaali butts heads with a newly appointed engineer from the city.

title: Idhaya Thirudan
cast: Ravi Mohan|Kamna Jethmalani|Prakash Raj|Santhanam|Nasaar
overview: To rebel against her mother, Deepika, a young girl, sends explicit pictures of herself to a fictitious email address. However, the pictures are received by a real person and the two fall in love.

title: Goli Soda 2
cast: Samuthirakani|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Bharath Seeni|Chemban Vinod Jose|Esakki Bharath
overview: The story revolves around the lives of three young friends, who struggle to establish themselves in the real world. They are working to make it big until they get caught up in a certain situation, only to get rescued by a common friend of 45-year-old.

title: Seval
cast: Bharath Srinivasan|Poonam Bajwa|Simran|Vadivelu|Sampath Raj
overview: Murugesan lives a life with no care in the world. Beats people up, sells his grandfather's land and incurs so much of his father's wrath that he's prophesied to meet a horrible end.

title: Ayogya
cast: Vishal Krishna|Raashii Khanna|R. Parthiban|K. S. Ravikumar|Devadarshini
overview: When a corrupt cop gets embroiled in a heroic brawl, he has no idea how it would eventually lead him to a shocking rape case and change his life forever.

title: Ayogya
cast: Vishal Krishna|Raashii Khanna|R. Parthiban|K. S. Ravikumar|Devadarshini
overview: When a corrupt cop gets embroiled in a heroic brawl, he has no idea how it would eventually lead him to a shocking rape case and change his life forever.

title: Kaadan
cast: Rana Daggubati|Vishnu Vishal|Shriya Pilgaonkar|Zoya Hussain|Paras Arora
overview: When a wealthy real estate company, backed by a powerful minister decides to build a township in a reserve forest area, it cuts off access to the water body to the elephants living in the area, endangering their lives. An eco-warrior decides to fight for their cause at a time when nobody else would.

title: Naan Mahaan Alla
cast: Karthi|Kajal Agarwal|Jayaprakash|Soori|Aruldoss
overview: A playful young man leads a very happy life, but everything changes when his father witnesses a heinous crime.

title: 10 Endrathukulla
cast: Vikram|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Pasupathy|Abhimanyu Singh|Manobala
overview: A skilled car driver takes on an assignment to deliver a 'package' from Chennai to Uttarkhand. What he doesn't realize is that the young woman who is travelling along with him is the 'package'. What is the mystery around her?

title: The Boys
cast: Santhosh P. Jayakumar|Shah Ra|Arshad|Yuvraj Ganesan|KPY Vinodh
overview: Five troublemaking bachelors get evicted and need to find refuge in a suspiciously affordable house on the outskirts of the city. Little do they know, the house has its own history.

title: Ree
cast: Prasanth Srinivasan|Gayatri Rema|Prasath|Sangeetha Paul|V. R. Manisankar
overview: Sagul's house seems haunting to Reema but later realizes it is not. She sniffs a new mystery man in Sagul's house. While Sagul looks at Reema as mentally ill. The things are completely puzzling until Mugil jumps in to find out who is causing the confusion.

title: Kavalan Avan Kovalan
cast: Prabhu|Rekha|Madhuri|Prameela|Kalaranjini
overview: Pachiappan loves Anjala but cannot marry her till he makes a name for himself. He finds an opportunity when he meets Chakravorthy, his lookalike and a popular director.

title: Buffoon
cast: Vaibhav|Anagha|Joju George|V. I. S. Jayapalan|Aanthakudi Ilayaraja
overview: Two Koothu artistes become pawns in a political power game and are falsely implicated in a drug smuggling case. For how long can they evade a determined police hunt?

title: Aanai
cast: Arjun Sarja|Namitha|Keerthi Chawla|Sanghavi|Vadivelu
overview: Vijay is an ex-cop who was framed up after he cleaned the city of the scum of the earth including nine encounter killings of dreaded gangsters. Now out of work, he is persuaded by his former boss to be the bodyguard of 8-year-old Priya whose parents are millionaires. He is hired to protect the little girl from kidnappers who are on the prowl. The kidnappers are led by a loony militant called 'Ahmed Khan' who manages to kidnap Priya and humiliate Vijay. The rest of the film is how Vijay assisted by two glam girls mete out vigilante justice in a cat-and-mouse game with the kidnappers.

title: Unnai Kodu Ennai Tharuven
cast: Ajith Kumar|Simran|Nasaar|Manivannan|Charle
overview: Surya (Ajith) has been brought up in the army barracks in Ooty, ever since his mother(Sukanya) handed him over as a baby to a brigadier (Nasser). She tells the officer the reason for her action but the audience is not allowed to hear it at this point. Surya grows up to be a patriotic youth and the best soldier in his class. He falls in love with Indu (Simran), the daughter of an army officer. Indu's parents accept her choice of husband but soon after, her father dies in a bomb blast while her mother loses her life on seeing her husband's body. Not wishing to lose her husband too in war, Indu asks Surya to choose between her and the army.

title: Singapore Saloon
cast: RJ Balaji|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Sathyaraj|Lal|Robo Shankar
overview: A young boy's friendship with a barber inspires him to open his own salon.

title: Priyamudan
cast: Vijay|Kausalya|Nasaar|Sujith Sagar|Manivannan
overview: Priyamudan starring by vijay and kausalya. Vasanth (Joseph Vijay) is a son of a wealthy businessman and grows possessively. In one instance he is shown in a gift shop where the gift he likes (A TajMahal replica) was already bought by another person. This causes such a tension to him that he breaks the gift and pays the owner the damages and with a tagline -

title: Sir
cast: Vimal|Saravanan
overview: The people of Mangollai village like Colochi Saami and Saamikannu opposed education for the poor while people like Annadurai and Sivangaanam fought against oppression.

title: Romeo
cast: Vijay Antony|Mirnalini Ravi|Yogi Babu|VTV Ganesh|Ilavarasu
overview: Leela, an aspiring heroine, is forced to tie the knot with Arivu, 35-year-old Malaysian return simpleton hailing from the same village. After knowing that Leela did not sign up for him or the wedding, Arivu decides to win his wife’s heart,and also confronts with his buried past.

title: Kadaisi Vivasayi
cast: Nallandi|Vijay Sethupathi|Yogi Babu|Muniswaran|Kaalaipandiyan
overview: Maayandi, the only farmer in a village that has abandoned farming, is charged with a petty case that leads to his imprisonment.

title: Kadhalil Vizhunthen
cast: Nakul|Sunaina|Sampath Raj|Livingston
overview: Kadhalil Vizhunthen is a movie starring Nakul and Sunaina. The movie's music was composed by Vijay Antony, cinematography by S D Vijay Milton and editing by V.T Vijayan. The movie was produced by Umapathy for Atlantic Cinemas. The shooting for the film started in August 2007 and the movie was released in September 2008.

title: Run Baby Run
cast: RJ Balaji|Aishwarya Rajesh|Vivek Prasanna|Smruthi Venkat|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: A bank employee encounters a stranger girl inside his car on his way home from work. Little did he know the girl's presence would put his life in trouble.

title: Hostel
cast: Ashok Selvan|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Sathish|Nasaar|Munishkanth
overview: A girl gets trapped inside a boys' hostel, which is under surveillance of a strict warden. Why has she entered the place and what happens next?

title: Mouna Raagam
cast: Revathi|Mohan|Karthik Muthuraman|V. K. Ramasamy|Ra. Sankaran
overview: Divya, a college student, is forced to marry Chandrakumar due to family pressure. However, she asks for a divorce as a wedding gift, revealing her past.

title: Anjathe
cast: Narain|Prasanna|Ajmal Ameer|Vijayalakshmi Agathiyan|Pandiarajan
overview: Sathya and Kiruba are friends. Sathya is reckless and gets into drinking and violent fights whereas Kiruba studies hard to become a Sub-Inspector. Tables are turned when Sathya becomes a Sub-Inspector.

title: Laila
cast: Vishwak Sen|Akanksha Sharma|Babloo Prithiveeraj|Abhimanyu Singh|Vineet Kumar
overview: Sonu Model, a renowned beautician from the old city, is forced to disguise himself as Laila, leading to a series of comedic, romantic, and action-packed events. Chaos ensues in this hilarious laugh riot

title: Devara: Part 1
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Saif Ali Khan|Prakash Raj|Srikanth|Kalaiyarasan
overview: Devara, a fearless man from a coastal region, embarks on a perilous journey into the treacherous world of the sea to safeguard the lives of his people. Unbeknownst to him, his brother Bhaira is plotting a conspiracy against him. As events unfold, Devara passes on his legacy to his mild-mannered and timid son, Varada.

title: Pushpa 2 - The Rule
cast: Allu Arjun|Rashmika Mandanna|Fahadh Faasil|Jagadeesh Bandari|Rao Ramesh
overview: As his smuggling empire grows, a brazen Pushpa longs for power and respect on his vengeful journey, while facing old rivals and new.

title: Kalki 2898-AD
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Prabhas|Deepika Padukone|Kamal Haasan|Saswata Chatterjee
overview: In the year 2898 AD, around 6000 years after Kurukshetra war, Ashwatthama gears up for his final battle of redemption at the sign of hope in a dystopian world and Bhairava, a wisecracking and self-interested bounty hunter, tired of the perilous life becomes the hurdle in the process.

title: RRR
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Ram Charan|Olivia Morris|Ray Stevenson|Alison Doody
overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.

title: Kuberaa
cast: Dhanush|Nagarjuna Akkineni|Rashmika Mandanna|Jim Sarbh|K. Bhagyaraj
overview: A ruthless billionaire, Neeraj, uses beggars as benamis to launder money, with the help of a disgraced civil submit servant, Deepak. One of the beggars, Deva, escapes with ₹10,000 crores and becomes the target of a deadly manhunt. He meets Sameera, who joins him in his mission to use the money to uplift society's poor. With Deepak's help, Deva fights back.

title: Supreme
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Raashii Khanna|Ravi Kishan|Rajendra Prasad|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: A taxi driver and orphan join a battle to save royal heirs from a corrupt, greedy businessman.

title: HIT: The Third Case
cast: Nani|Srinidhi Shetty|Komalee Prasad|Rao Ramesh|Surya Srinivas
overview: The Homicide Intervention Team (HIT) sends ruthless police officer Arjun Sarkaar to find a group of killers and stop their grisly murder spree.

title: The Raja Saab
cast: Prabhas|Malavika Mohanan|Nidhhi Agerwal|Riddhi Kumar|Brahmanandam
overview: A young heir embraces both his royal heritage and rebellious spirit as he rises to power, establishing unprecedented rules during his reign as Raja Saab.

title: Salaar: Part 1 - Ceasefire
cast: Prabhas|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Shruti Haasan|Easwari Rao|Jagapati Babu
overview: Set in the fictional dystopian city-state of Khansaar, the film follows the friendship between Deva, a tribesman, and Varadha, the prince of Khansaar. When a coup d'état is planned by his father's ministers and his relatives, Varadha enlists Deva's help to become Khansaar's undisputed ruler.

title: Mokshapatam
cast: Thiruveer Reddy|Pooja Kiran|Shanthi Rao|Jennifer Emanuel|Tarun Ponugoti
overview: Mokshapatam Gayatri is a middle-class woman working as a floor manager at a hotel. She has dreams of giving a better life to her kid and making a decent living with her savings until her family loses money to her husband's friend, who dies in an accident. On a fateful day, she discovers a bag forgotten by a customer in the hotel room. Will this bag change her fate or throw her into more problems? Watch now!

title: Sita Ramam
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Mrunal Thakur|Rashmika Mandanna|Sumanth|Gautham Vasudev Menon
overview: Afreen, a rebellious Pakistani student sets ablaze the car of an Indian in London. Angered Afreen returns to Pakistan to ask for money from her grandfather that she has to pay in a month's time as damages. However, she gets to know that he is no more and the only thing he has left for her is a letter-delivering task, written by Ram to Sita. As Afreen sets out to find Ram, there begins her journey of discovering the secret behind the 20-year-old letter.

title: Pushpa - The Rise
cast: Allu Arjun|Rashmika Mandanna|Jagadeesh Bandari|Sunil Varma|Anasuya Bharadwaj
overview: Pushpa Raj is a coolie who rises in the world of red sandalwood smuggling. Along the way, he doesn’t shy from making an enemy or two.

title: Bāhubali: The Beginning
cast: Prabhas|Rana Daggubati|Tamannaah Bhatia|Anushka Shetty|Ramya Krishnan
overview: The young Shivudu is left as a foundling in a small village by his mother. By the time he’s grown up, it has become apparent that he possesses exceptional gifts. He meets the beautiful warrior princess Avanthika and learns that her queen has been held captive for the last 25 years. Shividu sets off to rescue her, discovering his own origins in the process.

title: HIT: The 2nd Case
cast: Adivi Sesh|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Komalee Prasad|Maganti Srinath|Rao Ramesh
overview: Krishna Dev aka KD, a laidback cop working in Andhra Pradesh State HIT, takes on a gruesome murder case. As KD unravels the layers of the crime, the stakes rise unbelievably high and the threat comes unusually close.

title: The Family Star
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Mrunal Thakur|Rohini Hattangadi|Vasuki Anand|Abhinaya
overview: Govardhan, a devoted architect from Hyderabad, juggles supporting his extended family while seeking a partner who understands his commitments. When he discovers Indu thesis on his family, he challenges her, leading to unexpected twists as they navigate misunderstandings and eventually find love amidst sacrifice and understanding

title: Hi Nanna
cast: Nani|Mrunal Thakur|Baby Kiara Khanna|Jayaram|Shilpa Tulaskar
overview: Six-year-old Mahi, a spirited child with cystic fibrosis, shares a deep yet complex bond with her father, Viraj, a dedicated single parent and successful fashion photographer. Her curiosity about her absent mother leads to a journey of discovery when she runs away with her loyal dog, Pluto. A chance encounter with a kind woman named Yashna sparks unexpected revelations, intertwining their lives in ways they never anticipated. Set against a backdrop of love, sacrifice, and redemption, Mahi’s story is a heartfelt exploration of family, resilience, and the enduring power of connection.

title: Game Changer
cast: Ram Charan|Anjali|Kiara Advani|S. J. Suryah|Srikanth
overview: Ram, a newly appointed district collector, takes charge in a city in Andhra Pradesh and immediately confronts the deeply entrenched corruption and inefficiency plaguing the government. Determined to bring reforms, he initiates sweeping changes, sparking a fierce conflict with a powerful state Minister.

title: (MAD)²
cast: Sangeeth Shobhan|Narne Nithin|Ram Nithin|Vishnu Oi|Muralidhar Goud
overview: "Mad Square", serving as a sequel to the 2023 hit "Mad". This installment continues the adventures of college friends Ashok, DD, and Manoj as they embark on a trip to Goa, leading to a series of humorous and unpredictable events.

title: Lucky Baskhar
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Rajkumar Kasireddy|Ramki|Maganti Srinath
overview: A cash-strapped bank cashier embarks on a risky investment scheme and soon gets drawn into the murky world of money laundering.

title: Kannappa
cast: Vishnu Manchu|Preity Mukhundhan|Akshay Kumar|Mohan Babu|Mohanlal
overview: An atheist hunter Kannappa becomes a devotee of Lord Shiva and plucked out his eyes in an act of devotion.

title: Hanu-Man
cast: Teja Sajja|Vinay Rai|Amritha Aiyer|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Vennela Kishore
overview: In a small village, Hanumanthu, a petty thief, finds a mysterious gem, that gives him god-like powers. Will he succeed in keeping these powers from falling into the wrong hands and save his village?

title: #Single
cast: Sree Vishnu|Ketika Sharma|Ivana|Vennela Kishore|VTV Ganesh
overview: Vijay, a bank employee, falls in love with Purva at first sight and attempts to get closer to her in hopes of winning her affection. Meanwhile, Harini who secretly harbours feelings for Vijay, begins to follow him—turning his love life into a comedic triangle.

title: Robinhood
cast: Nithiin|Sreeleela|Vennela Kishore|Rajendra Prasad|Ketika Sharma
overview: Ram, a modern-day Robin Hood, is a master thief who unexpectedly finds himself switching sides. When fate forces him to become the personal security officer for Neera, a rollercoaster ride of action, comedy, and unexpected twists follows.

title: Bāhubali 2: The Conclusion
cast: Prabhas|Rana Daggubati|Anushka Shetty|Sathyaraj|Nasaar
overview: When Mahendra, the son of Bāhubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

title: Murari
cast: Mahesh Babu|Sonali Bendre|Lakshmi|Sukumari|Kaikala Satyanarayana
overview: Circa 1800s, an intoxicated Jamindar insults Durga Devi by stealing her temple idol. Enraged, Devi kills him and places a curse on his heirs that, every 48 years, she will take one family member. And every 48 years, a male heir meets an unfortunate, accidental end. Come present day (the end of another 48 years), it's Murari's turn.

title: Shaakuntalam
cast: Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Dev Mohan|Aditi Balan|Ananya Nagalla|Sachin Khedekar
overview: Shakuntala, daughter of Meneka and Rishi Vishwamitra lives in forest with her teacher, Rishi Kanva. In the forest she meets King Dushyant, falls in love with him and the two get married. After she has their baby (Prince Bharata), Dushyant leaves her in the forest with a promise to come back for her soon. However, due to a sage's curse, Dushyant forgets all about Shakuntala, until destiny brings them together again.

title: RRR: Behind & Beyond
cast: S. S. Rajamouli|N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Ram Charan|Ajay Devgn|Alia Bhatt
overview: An in-depth look at the making of S.S. Rajamouli's magnum opus, RRR, with behind-the-scenes footage and exclusive interviews. Explores the vision, challenges, and dedication involved in creating this cinematic phenomenon.

title: Maharshi
cast: Mahesh Babu|Pooja Hegde|Allari Naresh|Jagapati Babu|Prakash Raj
overview: Rishi Kumar is a billionaire and the CEO of Origins, someone who has always strived for the success he now owns. His friend Ravi needs help, how will he come through?

title: Lucky Baskhar
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Rajkumar Kasireddy|Ramki|Maganti Srinath
overview: A cash-strapped bank cashier embarks on a risky investment scheme and soon gets drawn into the murky world of money laundering.

title: Agent
cast: Akhil Akkineni|Mammootty|Dino Morea|Sakshi Vaidya|Sampath Raj
overview: Ramakrishna aka Ricky's only one goal in life is to be a RAW recruitee and undertake some Planet-saving mission. Mahadev, RAW head, ropes him in for the most important mission ever known and unknown to even the Prime Minister of India. Ricky must tame The God, the megalomaniacal lynchpin of a giant-sized crime syndicate.

title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
cast: Allu Arjun|Pooja Hegde|Murali Sharma|Jayaram|Sushanth
overview: Fate plays a vital role in connecting the life of Bantu, a son who seeks validation from his cold-hearted father with the life of Raj, whose millionaire father wishes that he was more assertive.

title: Geetha Govindam
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Rashmika Mandanna|Vennela Kishore|Subbaraju|Rahul Ramakrishna
overview: Vijay Govind, a young college lecturer who dreams of marriage falls for Geetha, a level-headed woman who's wary of strangers and isn't easy to convince. While things seem to go smoothly, Vijay makes a terrible mistake which not only derails any hope for his love story, but also potential repercussions with his family.

title: Radha
cast: Sharwanand|Ravi Kishan|Lavanya Tripathi|Aksha Pardasany|Saptagiri
overview: Radha Krishna, a young boy gets inspired to become a police officer following his belief that Lord Krishna rescued him in the avatar of a cop when he was a child, and does so. Radha Krishna is transferred to Hyderabad, where a bomb goes off at politician Sujatha's election campaign. Radha vows to take revenge, only to discover that all is not what it seems.

title: Blind Spot
cast: Naveen Chandra|Raashi Singh|Ravi Varma|Gayatri Bhargavi|Harika Pedada
overview: When 24-year-old Divya is found dead, what initially appears to be a suicide soon unravels into a gripping murder mystery. Officer Vikram, known for his sharp instincts, delves into a maze of hidden motives involving Divya's husband, stepchild, and maid. As buried secrets come to light and tensions rise, Vikram must investigate a house full of suspects and uncover the truth before time runs out.

title: Guntur Kaaram
cast: Mahesh Babu|Sreeleela|Ramya Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Jayaram
overview: Years after his mother left him and remarried, Ramana is asked to sign documents denying any relations with his mother, but he refuses and demands answer to why his mother left him.

title: Radhe Shyam
cast: Prabhas|Pooja Hegde|Sachin Khedekar|Krishnam Raju|Sathyaraj
overview: Vikramaditya, a world-renowned palmist, believes love does not exist in his stars, until he meets Prerana. But when destiny tries to pull them apart, will love prevail?

title: Kushi
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Jayaram|Sachin Khedekar|Murali Sharma
overview: Worlds and families collide when the son of a prominent atheist falls head over heels for the daughter of his father’s nemesis, a revered Hindu leader.

title: Janatha Garage
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Mohanlal|Unni Mukundan|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Nithya Menen
overview: Anand is an environmental activist who lives in Mumbai. A chance exchange programme takes him to Hyderabad and here, a chance encounter with Satyam results in him taking over the Janatha Garage from the latter.

title: Odela 2
cast: Tamannaah Bhatia|Hebah Patel|Vasishta N. Simha|Naga Mahesh|Murali Sharma
overview: It tells the story of a saviour called Odela Mallanna Swamy who protects a village from evil forces.

title: Maaya
cast: Sandhya Baayireddy|Abhishek Sabbe|Rohini Kumar|Dustin Lee|Mahima Yalavarthy
overview: Maaya is a business woman who abruptly begins getting fanatical dreams.. She is able see her future in her dreams. She then visits a psychologist for consultation and tells her that everything she could find in her dreams are materializing in a day or two. What happens next will blow your mind ?.

title: Odela 2
cast: Tamannaah Bhatia|Hebah Patel|Vasishta N. Simha|Naga Mahesh|Murali Sharma
overview: It tells the story of a saviour called Odela Mallanna Swamy who protects a village from evil forces.

title: Blind Spot
cast: Naveen Chandra|Raashi Singh|Ravi Varma|Gayatri Bhargavi|Harika Pedada
overview: When 24-year-old Divya is found dead, what initially appears to be a suicide soon unravels into a gripping murder mystery. Officer Vikram, known for his sharp instincts, delves into a maze of hidden motives involving Divya's husband, stepchild, and maid. As buried secrets come to light and tensions rise, Vikram must investigate a house full of suspects and uncover the truth before time runs out.

title: Manamey
cast: Sharwanand|Krithi Shetty|Vikram Adhitya|Shiva Kandukuri|Rahul Ravindran
overview: A charismatic playboy's life takes an unexpected turn when a young boy enters his world. Initially causing chaos, the boy gradually becomes an integral part of their lives.

title: Bubblegum
cast: Roshan Kanakala|Maanasa Chaudhary|Harsha Chemudu|Harshvardhan Rane|Kiran Macha
overview: After falling in love, a street-smart man and a wealthy woman from different worlds try to work out their differences.

title: Saripodhaa Sanivaaram
cast: Nani|S. J. Suryah|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Sai Kumar|Murali Sharma
overview: Set in Sokulapalem, bound by a promise to his mother, Surya, an LIC agent leads a normal life on six days, maintains a careful ledger of everyone made him angry,unleashing his anger only on Saturdays, solely for justifiable reasons. A tragic incident pits him on a collision course with the ruthless and borderline-manic cop Daya.

title: Guntur Kaaram
cast: Mahesh Babu|Sreeleela|Ramya Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Jayaram
overview: Years after his mother left him and remarried, Ramana is asked to sign documents denying any relations with his mother, but he refuses and demands answer to why his mother left him.

title: Salaar: Part 2 - Shouryaanga Parvam
cast: Prabhas|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Shruti Haasan|Easwari Rao|Jagapati Babu

title: Magadheera
cast: Ram Charan|Kajal Agarwal|Dev Gill|Srihari|Sunil Varma
overview: When Harsha, a bike stunter from Vishakapatnam, accidentally meets Indu, he discovers his warrior life Kala Bhairava in his last birth. The remaining story explains how Indu and Kala Bhairava are connected.

title: Khaleja
cast: Mahesh Babu|Shafi|Prakash Raj|Rao Ramesh|Anushka Shetty
overview: A village is struck by an unknown disease, decimating its population. The village priest prophecies that god's avatar will save them. Siddha goes searching and finds this supernatural potential in Seeta Rama Raju, a cab driver.

title: Eagle
cast: Ravi Teja|Anupama Parameswaran|Kavya Thapar|Navdeep|Vinay Rai
overview: A journalist pieces together the story of Eagle, a former professional sniper who falls in love with Rachana, and on a mission to redeem himself by working towards eradicating illegal arms from this world.

title: Liger
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Ananya Panday|Ramya Krishnan|Ronit Roy|Makrand Deshpande
overview: The journey of Liger, from Karimnagar to Mumbai, from a nobody to a competitor, in his search for recognition while navigating his weaknesses, relationships, and love life.

title: Eega
cast: Sudeep|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Nani|Adithya Menon|Thagubothu Ramesh
overview: Nani is a flower decorator, madly in love with his neighbor Bindhu. He gets killed by the baddie, Sudeep, a powerful businessman. Nani comes back as a housefly to get his revenge.

title: Nagavalli
cast: Venkatesh|Richa Gangopadhyay|Anushka Shetty|Poonam Kaur|Kamalinee Mukherjee
overview: After a family member receives a Nagavalli/Chandramukhi's portrait as a prize in the Nagavalli Dance competition, various characters start having abnormal experiences. In order to save themselves and unfold the mystery, the family looks to Ramachandra Acharya and Dr. Vijay.

title: Sarileru Neekevvaru
cast: Mahesh Babu|Vijayashanti|Rashmika Mandanna|Prakash Raj|Sangeetha Krish
overview: A tough army major is deployed to Kurnool on a mission to keep the country safe from external threats.

title: Acharya
cast: Chiranjeevi|Ram Charan|Sonu Sood|Jisshu Sengupta|Ajay
overview: Acharya, a middle-aged Naxalite-turned-social reformer, launches a fight against the Endowments Department over misappropriation and embezzlement of temple funds and donations.

title: Aarya
cast: Allu Arjun|Anuradha Mehta|Siva Balaji|Subbaraju|Sunil Varma
overview: Aarya is a happy-go-lucky young man who goes to college. When he falls in love with Geetha at first sight, he proposes to her - in front of her boyfriend Ajay, who recently also proposed to her. She bluntly refuses, but ...

title: Hello!
cast: Akhil Akkineni|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Ramya Krishnan|Jagapati Babu|Ajay
overview: Avinash/Seenu is a street urchin brought up by his loving adoptive parents Saru and Prakash. The love of his life is the girl he meets during childhood Junnu/Priya, whom fate had snatched away from him. Fourteen long years and they still wait for the day they will meet again. Will destiny help them?

title: Skanda
cast: Ram Pothineni|Srikanth|Sharath Lohitashwa|Ajay Purkar|Sreeleela
overview: The prodigal son of a respected leader takes on two political rivals and forms bonds with their daughters.

title: RRR: Behind & Beyond
cast: S. S. Rajamouli|N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Ram Charan|Ajay Devgn|Alia Bhatt
overview: An in-depth look at the making of S.S. Rajamouli's magnum opus, RRR, with behind-the-scenes footage and exclusive interviews. Explores the vision, challenges, and dedication involved in creating this cinematic phenomenon.

title: V
cast: Nani|Sudheer Babu|Nivetha Thomas|Aditi Rao Hydari|Vennela Kishore
overview: DCP Aditya, a celebrated cop, faces his most unsettling case yet involving a mysterious serial killer who has been brutally killing his targets and leaving behind notes challenging Aditya to nab him. Teaming with Apoorva, an aspiring crime novelist, and the police force, Aditya finds himself walking on thin ice upon discovering the killer has another challenge for him: to prevent four more murders from happening or give up his medals and resign. What he is yet to find out is the killer's past and his desperation to carry out the killing spree without fail.

title: Shivam
cast: Ram Pothineni|Raashii Khanna|Abhimanyu Singh|Brahmanandam|Jayaprakash Reddy
overview: The story of a boy (Ram) who wants to make his love life and marriage a success. The movie is directed by Srinivas Reddy and produced by Ravi Kishore. The film is produced under Sri Sravanthi movies banner.

title: Athadu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Trisha Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Nasaar|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: A professional killer is hired to fake the assassination of a politician. However, when the politician is killed and he is framed for his murder, he takes on a dead man's identity to escape the law.

title: Darling
cast: Prabhas|Kajal Agarwal|Prabhu|Tulasi|Ahuti Prasad
overview: Prabha prepares to meet Nandini, his childhood friend, at a reunion party organised by his father. However, things take a turn when Nisha, a gangster's daughter, falls in love with him.

title: Jayam
cast: Nithiin|Sadha|Gopichand|Siva Krishna|Prasad Babu
overview: The story is centered in a village where the parents of first cousins Sujatha (Sadha) and Raghu (Gopichand) decide that both will be married when they become adults. As a child, Sujatha's uncle gives her anklets, which she wears as she grows up. As they grow older, Raghu is caught smuggling money from his house. At school, Raghu beats up a kid for talking to Sujatha. They quarrel, and soon Raghu's family leaves for another village. Sujatha grows to be an attractive college girl, while the villain Raghu becomes a good-for-nothing character. On her way to college, Sujatha meets up with Venkat (Nitin), a poor but handsome, charming enthusiastic boy, and soon after their quarrels they fall in love.

title: Subham
cast: Harshith Malgireddy|Srinivas Gavireddy|Charan Peri|Shriya Kontham|Shravani Lakshmi
overview: Set in the early 2000s, in the pre-internet days of coastal Bheemili, A group of married men band together to find solutions, after their wives get possessed while watching a cable TV soap opera serial.

title: Businessman
cast: Mahesh Babu|Kajal Agarwal|Prakash Raj|Ayesha Shiva|Sayaji Shinde
overview: Just as the cops have declared the end of Mafia in Mumbai, a man named Surya arrives in the city with the intentions of conquering it.

title: Ammu
cast: Aishwarya Lekshmi|Naveen Chandra|Bobby Simha|Maala Parvathi|Satya Krishnan
overview: Ammu's thought marriage was a fairy tale – full of love and magic, ends when her cop-husband Ravi hit her for the very first time. What Ammu thought was a one-off incident soon turned into a never-ending cycle of abuse, trapping her and breaking her soul and spirit. Pushed to her limits, Ammu teams up with an unlikely ally to break free.

title: MAD
cast: Sangeeth Shobhan|Narne Nithin|Ram Nithin|Vishnu Oi|Sri Gouri Priya Reddy
overview: Set in an engineering college and revolves around the antics of the students there, primarily the boys, who get a kick out of torturing the hostel warden.

title: Andarivaadu
cast: Chiranjeevi|Rimi Sen|Tabu|Prakash Raj|Hema
overview: Andarivaadu (Telugu: అందరివాడు) is a 2005 Tollywood comedy film directed by Srinu Vytla. The film stars Chiranjeevi, Rimi Sen, Tabu and Prakash Raj. This movie was a hit.  Govinda Rajulu (Chiranjeevi) is a 'mesthri' who drinks a lot and lives a care-free life. His son Siddartha (Chiranjeevi), on the other hand, is a popular TV show host and is a more disciplined man — the opposite of his dad. The son gets his father married to Shanti (Tabu) to sober him.

title: Eagle
cast: Ravi Teja|Anupama Parameswaran|Kavya Thapar|Navdeep|Vinay Rai
overview: A journalist pieces together the story of Eagle, a former professional sniper who falls in love with Rachana, and on a mission to redeem himself by working towards eradicating illegal arms from this world.

title: Thandel
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Sai Pallavi|Sundip Ved|Prakash Belawadi|Kalpalatha
overview: Fisherman Raju is deeply in love with Satya. However, at one point, she urges him to stop going to the sea and look for other jobs. Ignoring her plea, Raju ventures out and accidentally drifts into Pakistani waters, where he is arrested.

title: Rajanna
cast: Annie|Nagarjuna Akkineni|Sneha|Nasaar|Shweta Menon
overview: The film is set in the Nelakondapalli village of khammam district in Nizam Princely State of Hyderabad of the late 1940s. The feudal society is under the vice-like grip of an aristocratic family and its head, a Dorasani (Shwetha Menon). Mallamma (Baby Annie) is the darling of the village, who is living in perpetual humiliation. They seek solace in her songs. Brought up by Sambayya, an old man, she develops a mysterious attachment to a basil tree which is regarded as holy by the entire village.

title: Evaru
cast: Adivi Sesh|Regina Cassandra|Naveen Chandra|Murali Sharma|Pavitra Lokesh
overview: When a high-ranking police officer is killed by his alleged rape victim, Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with investigating what seems like an open-and-shut case. However, as he delves deeper, Vikram finds the case spiralling into a dark tale filled with unexpected surprises.

title: Dasara
cast: Nani|Keerthy Suresh|Dheekshith Shetty|Shine Tom Chacko|Sai Kumar
overview: In 1990s, Set in small village Veerlapally, Dharani, Vennela, and Suri are childhood friends. Dharani loves Vennela, but she has Suri in her mind. Knowing Suri’s interest in Vennela, Dharani sacrifices his love and helps get them married. But Local politics between Rajanna, Shivanna and the latter's son Chinna Nambi threaten to disrupt their lives.

title: Rangasthalam
cast: Ram Charan|Aadhi Pinisetty|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Jagapati Babu|Prakash Raj
overview: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

title: Yashoda
cast: Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Unni Mukundan|Madhurima Narla|Rao Ramesh
overview: Looking to save her sister, Yashoda, a desperate woman agrees to be a surrogate and move in to a plush facility - but nothing is as it seems. In the world outside Eva, a Hollywood starlet dies under mysterious circumstances, so do a tycoon and a super model. An unknown drug seem to hold the key to the whole mystery.

title: Mahanati
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Dulquer Salmaan|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Vijay Deverakonda|Prakash Raj
overview: Mahanati depicts the life and career of one of Telugu cinema's greatest and most iconic starlets, the first Indian female super star, Savitri.

title: Waltair Veerayya
cast: Chiranjeevi|Shruti Haasan|Ravi Teja|Catherine Tresa|Bobby Simha
overview: A notorious smuggler Waltair Veerayya is hired by a CI Seethapathi, reaches Malaysia with the ostensible mission of kidnapping a drug mafia leader named Solomon, who escaped India after wreaking havoc on the RAW agents and local policemen. Veerayya manages to pummel Solomon, who is fiercely protected by his ruthless gang-lord brother Kaala. Tables are turned, when Veerayya reveals that he shares a turbulent past with Kaala & an ACP Vikram Sagar who is hell-bent on ending his smuggling activities.

title: Okkadu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Bhumika Chawla|Prakash Raj|Mukesh Rishi|Geetha
overview: Ajay is in Kurnool for a Kabaddi match when he happens to save Swapna from a brutal factionist, Obul Reddy. The latter pursues them but Ajay refuses to back down from a confrontation with him.

title: Oh! Baby
cast: Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Lakshmi|Rajendra Prasad|Rao Ramesh|Teja Sajja
overview: A 70-year-old woman transforms into her 24-year-old self after she's photographed at a studio, changing her life and those of the people around her forever.

title: Vikramarkudu
cast: Ravi Teja|Baby Neha|Anushka Shetty|Ajay|Vineet Kumar
overview: A thief's life changes after he discovers a little girl who claims he is her father, and what follows is violence after a gang hunting for his lookalike closes in on him.

title: Pokiri
cast: Mahesh Babu|Ileana D'Cruz|Prakash Raj|Brahmanandam|Nasaar
overview: Pandu is a contract killer , and will accept any contract provided the amount is right. The Police want him for questioning, while the underworld needs him to silence their opponents. No one really knows this assassin's background. It is only Pandu who knows his real identity and he has no intention of sharing it with anyone .

title: Yamadonga
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Priyamani|Mamta Mohandas|Mohan Babu|Brahmanandam
overview: Raja, an orphaned thief, dies while helping a gang in kidnapping a wealthy heiress, Mahi, in exchange of money. He then lands in Yamlok and fights with Yama, the god of death, to get his life back.

title: Shyam Singha Roy
cast: Nani|Sai Pallavi|Krithi Shetty|Madonna Sebastian|Murali Sharma
overview: A young filmmaker is in a soup right when he’s about to find his footing in the film industry. When he sets out to find an answer, turns out it’s in the past.

title: Beeruva
cast: Sundeep Kishan|Surbhi|Mukesh Rishi|Saptagiri
overview: Sanju, a careless young man, falls head over heels in love with Swathi. He, however, gets more than he bargained for when he learns that she is the daughter of an underworld kingpin.

title: #Bro
cast: Naveen Chandra|Avika Gor|Sai Ronak|Sanjana Sarathy|Pramodini Pammi
overview: Madhav is sent away from home to earn for his family at the tender age of fifteen. When he returns back home after the death of his little sister, he must go through a journey of healing and forgiveness.

title: Ante... Sundaraniki!
cast: Nani|Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Naresh|Rohini|N. Azhagamperumal
overview: A man from a Brahmin family falls in love with a Christian girl. In order to convince their parents, they say contrasting lies which complicates the situation and leads to a comedy of errors.

title: Devara: Part 2
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Saif Ali Khan|Janhvi Kapoor|Prakash Raj|Srikanth
overview: Sequel to the Devara (2024).

title: Daaku Maharaaj
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Bobby Deol|Pragya Jaiswal|Shraddha Srinath|Vedha Agarwal
overview: A man defends a beleaguered rural community from murderous drug-traffickers.

title: Uppena
cast: Panja Vaisshnav Tej|Krithi Shetty|Vijay Sethupathi|Gayatri Jayaraman|Rajsekhar Aningi
overview: Aasi has been in love with Bebamma since their childhood. But it is more than her father Rayanam that threatens to form a chasm between the lovers.

title: Baby
cast: Vaishnavi Chaitanya|Anand Deverakonda|Viraj Ashwin|Kusuma Degalamari|Sathvik Anand Bandela
overview: A pair of high school sweethearts face challenges in their relationship when they take different directions in life.

title: Mangalavaaram
cast: Payal Rajput|Ravindra Vijay|Chaitanya Krishna|Nandita Swetha|Divya Pillai
overview: Fear engulfs a village as murders pile up mysteriously. Shailu, a young woman, is the heart of the story and the enigmatic tale unravels with a suspenseful cinematic journey.

title: Vinaya Vidheya Rama
cast: Ram Charan|Kiara Advani|Vivek Oberoi|Sneha|Prashanth
overview: Ram is one among the five orphaned boys in Visakhapatnam, adopted by a doctor who ensures them a roof to live under, with dignity. Ram goes to any extent to protect his family and he's a handful for the baddie to handle in a time of crisis. How does Ram protect his family when they need him the most?

title: Buddy
cast: Allu Sirish|Gayatri Bhardwaj|Ajmal Ameer|Sriram Reddy Polasane|Ali Basha
overview: A teddy bear named Buddy is in trouble and asks pilot Aditya Ram for help. Can the duo join forces and help each other out?

title: HIT: The First Case
cast: Vishwak Sen|Ruhani Sharma|Murali Sharma|Bhanuchander|Brahmaji
overview: Vikram Rudraraju is a 30-year-old cop working for the Telangana State Police. While Vikram is battling with his own traumatic past, the stakes get high when a girl called Preethi mysteriously disappears in Hyderabad and Vikram has to solve the case at any cost.

title: Sarangapani Jathakam
cast: Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Roopa Koduvayur|Vennela Kishore|Harsha Chemudu|Vadlamani Srinivas
overview: Sarangapani, a man who finds comfort in the guidance of horoscopes, sets off on a turbulent journey that forces him to confront some hard truths about himself and his life.

title: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy
cast: Chiranjeevi|Sudeep|Vijay Sethupathi|Ravi Kishan|Jagapati Babu
overview: Gwalior Fort, during the Indian Rebellion of 1857. In a moment of despair, Lakshmibai, Rani of Jhansi, encourages her men by telling them the heroic story of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, a brave Telugu chieftain who took up arms in 1846 to protest against the numerous arbitrariness and crimes perpetrated by the leaders and military forces of the East India Company.

title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata
cast: Mahesh Babu|Keerthy Suresh|Samuthirakani|Vennela Kishore|Subbaraju
overview: Mahesh, a money lender, is swindled by a gambling addict called Kalaavathi in the US. While he comes to India to collect his debt, he decides to stay back and do his bit for the country's financial health.

title: Ashok
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Sameera Reddy|Prakash Raj|Sonu Sood|Rajiv Kanakala
overview: A short-tempered man falls in love with a woman, who is also pursued by a gangster that wants to marry her. As the man sets out to take on the mighty mob, his estranged family gets drawn into the fight.

title: Dear Comrade
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Rashmika Mandanna|Shruti Ramachandran|Suhas|Raj Arjun
overview: A hot-blooded student union leader falls for a state-level cricketer but his anger management issues and violent streak threatens to derail their love story .

title: Rowdy Boys
cast: Ashish Reddy|Anupama Parameswaran|Komalee Prasad|Vikram Sahidev|Karthik Rathnam
overview: Akshay, an engineering student, does everything on impulse, falls for Kavya (a bright medico) at first sight. Due to an incident in her college, Kavya decides to begin a live-in relationship with Akshay. Her classmate Vikram (Vikram Saahidev), who admires her, vows not to remain silent.

title: Srimanthudu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Shruti Haasan|Jagapati Babu|Rajendra Prasad|Sukanya
overview: Harsha, a multi-millionaire guy who has everything but there is something else he's looking for and in the process he adopts a complete village trying to bring change in the people.

title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata
cast: Mahesh Babu|Keerthy Suresh|Samuthirakani|Vennela Kishore|Subbaraju
overview: Mahesh, a money lender, is swindled by a gambling addict called Kalaavathi in the US. While he comes to India to collect his debt, he decides to stay back and do his bit for the country's financial health.

title: Jack
cast: Siddhu Jonnalagadda|Vaishnavi Chaitanya|Prakash Raj|Naresh|Brahmaji
overview: Jack, an aspiring but overeager intelligence agent, goes against protocol and the real spies, to foil a potential attack on home turf.

title: Nela Ticket
cast: Ravi Teja|Jagapati Babu|Malavika Sharma|Sampath Raj|Brahmanandam
overview: A carefree young man is forced to alter his life due to a shocking event that takes place in his life. He fights against an evil, corrupt politician to get justice for the society.

title: Aravindha Sametha
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Pooja Hegde|Jagapati Babu|Naveen Chandra|Eesha Rebba
overview: A young scion of a powerful family with a long history of violence decides to put an end to the bloodshed which leads him to a path of self discovery.

title: Karthikeya 2
cast: Nikhil Siddhartha|Anupama Parameswaran|Srinivasa Reddy|Harsha Chemudu|Adithya Menon
overview: Before the Kalyug begins, Lord Krishna hands over an anklet that holds the answer to all of world’s miseries. Years later a doctor finds himself in the thick of things when the pursuit for the anklet carries on. A doctor with a curious mind, Karthikeya, aka Karthik, believes in pursuing the truth. The quest leads Karthik to discover the power of the ancient Indian belief system and the essence of Krishna.

title: Hari Hara Veera Mallu : Part 1 - Sword vs Spirit
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Bobby Deol|Nidhhi Agerwal|Nasaar|Sunil Varma
overview: Set in the Mughal Era, outlaw Veera Mallu is tasked with the job of stealing the Koh-i-Noor diamond from the Mughals.

title: Son of Satyamurthy
cast: Allu Arjun|Upendra|Rajendra Prasad|Prakash Raj|Samantha Ruth Prabhu
overview: The son of a rich businessman struggles to save his father's wealth after his demise. However, he faces many challenges when he becomes the sole breadwinner of his family.

title: Chandamama
cast: Kajal Agarwal|Navdeep|Siva Balaji|Sindhu Menon|Ahuti Prasad
overview: Ranga Rao plans to get his beloved daughter Mahalakshmi married to Dorababu, but she loves Kishore. Dorababu promises to unite them, but gets involved in a love story of his own.

title: Mazaka
cast: Sundeep Kishan|Rao Ramesh|Ritu Varma|Anshu|Murali Sharma
overview: The path to true love does not run smoothly when a father and son seek marriage at the same time.

title: Gaami
cast: Vishwak Sen|Mohammad Samad|Harika Pedada|Chandini Chowdary|Abhinaya
overview: Shankar is a wounded, reluctant and reclusive aghora on a quest to find the cure for his very rare human condition – the one that will be cured, only when he can confront and conquers the haunting ironical questions of his life.

title: Om Bheem Bush
cast: Sree Vishnu|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Rahul Ramakrishna|Manish Kumar|Preity Mukhundhan
overview: Three friends united by their passion for science and their quest for discovery,  in search of treasure hidden within the Sampangi Mahal, venture into the village of Bhairavapuram, where locals fear a ghost of Sampangi living in the dreaded palace.

title: Thank You
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Raashii Khanna|Malavika Nair|Sai Sushanth Reddy|Avika Gor
overview: Abhiram aka Abhi is a successful entrepreneur who calls himself ‘self-made’ and doesn’t believe anyone but himself is the reason for his success. But when he’s forced to look back on life, what does he realise?

title: The Ghazi Attack
cast: Kay Kay Menon|Rana Daggubati|Atul Kulkarni|Taapsee Pannu|Amitabh Bachchan
overview: India’s first underwater war film tries to decode the mystery behind the sinking of Pakistani submarine PNS Ghazi during the Indo-Pak war of 1971.

title: Aadi
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Keerthi Chawla|Chalapathi Rao|Rajan P Dev|Ali Basha
overview: Aadi, who is raised by his father's faithful employee, learns about how his parents were cheated and killed by Nagi Reddy. Enraged by the injustice done to his family, he decides to confront Nagi.

title: Nannaku Prematho...
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Rakul Preet Singh|Jagapati Babu|Rajendra Prasad|Madhoo
overview: Subramanyam, a businessman, is on his deathbed when he tells his sons about a cunning man who stole most of his wealth. Hearing this, Abhiram, the youngest son, lays out a plan to seek his revenge.

title: Varsham
cast: Prabhas|Trisha Krishnan|Gopichand|Prakash Raj|Sunil Varma
overview: Venkat and Sailaja meet on a train and fall in love. But Sailaja's father disapproves of their relationship and decides to marry her off to Bhadranna, a ruthless landlord, who is obsessed with her.

title: Saindhav
cast: Venkatesh|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Baby Sara|Shraddha Srinath|Andrea Jeremiah
overview: The father of a sick child takes on a criminal gang running a pharmaceutical racket.

title: Matka
cast: Varun Tej|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Nora Fatehi|Naveen Chandra|Ajay Ghosh
overview: Set between the years 1958 and 1982, Matka tells the story of Vasu, who rises from poverty to create a powerful gambling empire in India, ultimately leading the nation into a battle with the government. Based on real events, the tale explores themes of love, moral choices, and the consequences of ambition.

title: Peddi
cast: Ram Charan|Janhvi Kapoor|Shivaraj Kumar|Jagapati Babu|Divyendu Sharma
overview: In 1980s rural Andhra Pradesh, A spirited villager unites his community through sports to defend their pride against a powerful rival.

title: Eenadu
cast: Kamal Haasan|Venkatesh|Ganesh Venkatraman|Bharath Reddy|Lakshmi
overview: The police commissioner of Hyderabad confronts an anonymous caller who has planted bombs in the city and will let them explode if four  terrorists are not freed from the police custody.

title: They Call Him OG
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Emraan Hashmi|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Prakash Raj|Sriya Reddy
overview: OG revolves around a ruthless gangster named Ojas Gambheera "OG" who returns to Mumbai after disappearing for 10 years on a personal crusade to finish crime bosses.

title: Virupaksha
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Samyuktha|Brahmaji|Rajiv Kanakala|Ravi Krishna
overview: Set in a village named Rudravanam in 1990's, Surya along with his mother, visit there after a long time. Suddenly a series of mysterious deaths occur due to an unknown person's occult practice and whole village is scared. Will Surya find the person causing the deaths and save the village?

title: Annayya
cast: Chiranjeevi|Soundarya|Ravi Teja|Venkat|Chandni
overview: Rajaram (Chiranjeevi), owner of a fleet of lorries, meets Devi (Soundarya), a garment factory owner. After that acquaintance, she once seeks his help in dealing with two street ruffians, who were teasing her sisters, Lata (Chandini) and Geetha (Sishwa), and is shocked when the culprits turn out to be his brothers, Ravi (Ravi Teja) and Gopi (Venkat). Rajaram takes the incident lightly as the pranks of youngsters and is very lenient to them. With more such incidents, the two fall in love, with the brothers and sisters not far behind.  On his brothers' request, Rajaram approaches Devi for her sisters' hands in marriage to his brothers. But she curtly refuses her consent on grounds that the two are wayward drunkards. Rajaram reacts sharply to it and vows to get his brothers married to her sisters.  Since then on he is more exacting with his brothers and brings about a transformation in them. Devi agrees to their marriage.

title: Indra
cast: Chiranjeevi|Sonali Bendre|Aarthi Agarwal|Mukesh Rishi|Sivaji Sontineni
overview: A man embarks on a quest to make peace between two families fighting over the water problem in their district. In a bid to solve this crisis, he agrees to marry a girl from the rival family.

title: Arjun Reddy
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Shalini Pandey|Rahul Ramakrishna|Kamal Kamaraju|Kanchana
overview: A brilliant but impulsive young surgeon spirals into self-destruction after a painful breakup, struggling to cope with love, loss, and the consequences of his own temper.

title: Ranga Ranga Vaibhavanga
cast: Panja Vaisshnav Tej|Ketika Sharma|Naveen Chandra|Naresh|Prabhu
overview: Two childhood sweethearts love to hate each other due to their egos. What happens when they reconcile but their families begin warring each other instead?

title: Munna
cast: Prabhas|Ileana D'Cruz|Prakash Raj|Rahul Dev|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: Munna (Prabhas) is a college student. His aim is to finish off mafia don Kakha (Prakash Raj) who keeps the entire city under his grip. Munna has personal vengeance to take on Kakha. An honest politician Srinivasa Rao (Kota Srinivasa Rao) relentlessly works to expose Kakha but gets killed. Meanwhile, Munna’s classmate Nidhi (Ileana D'Cruz) falls in love with him. The twist in the tale is that Kakha is none other than his estranged father who tries to sell off his mother and was responsible for the death of his mother and his kid sister. Another don in the city named Aatma, who is the opposition of Kakha (Rahul Dev) asks Munna to join him. But Munna refuses his proposal. Munna starts to beat Kakha and the mind game begins. Kakha's second wife and son-daughter left him and join Munna. After some incidents including the death of his best friend, Munna finds out that Aatma was working for Kakha all along.

title: Kingdom
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Bhagyashri Borse|Satyadev Kancharana|Venkitesh V P
overview: A tale of every spy can end up being a conspiracy theory. But their truth can never be disregarded.  A name that will be remembered by the masses in the coming years.  The Silent crown longing for a new ruler finds a new name, a powerhouse of aura, a persona that no one will dare to ignore.

title: 7:11 PM
cast: Saahas Pagadala|Deepika Reddy|Tess Walsh|Bharath Reddy|Suresh Chinamuthevi
overview: An incident that takes place at 7:11 PM changes the fate of a town called Hamsala Deevi and a planet called Proxima-EV12. Ravi, An IPS aspirant travels beyond imagination through time to stop a criminal mastermind, save his loved ones and his beloved town.

title: Bheeshma
cast: Nithiin|Rashmika Mandanna|Anant Nag|Vennela Kishore|Jisshu Sengupta
overview: Bheeshma Prasad, a simple meme creator has his life turned around when he wages a war against a powerful agro company that creates harmful chemicals to increase the crop yield and make more money.

title: Jagadeka Veerudu Athiloka Sundari
cast: Chiranjeevi|Sridevi|Amrish Puri|Prabhakar|Allu Ramalingaiah
overview: Raju (Chiranjeevi), a courageous and spirited young man, is a caregiver to four young orphans. He is a tourist guide in a picturesque hill station. One of the children is accidentally injured and, on the suggestion of an ayurvedic guru that the cure for this injury can be found on the banks of Manasa Sarovar, Raju goes to the Himalayas. During the same time, a celestial being, Indraja (Sridevi), the daughter of Lord Indra, happens to visit the Manasa Sarovar. She accidentally drops her ring, which is her passport to the Heaven. Raju finds this ring and starts wearing it, unaware of its divine power. Because Indraja is unable to enter Heaven, Brihaspathi, the Deva-guru, allows her to go back to Earth to retrieve it before the next Kartik Poornima.

title: Temper
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Kajal Agarwal|Prakash Raj|Posani Krishna Murali|Kovai Sarala
overview: Daya is a corrupt cop who joins hands with the local don. When Daya's girlfriend gets kidnapped, it triggers Daya to go against Vasu and his empire, leading him to uncover a bigger motive behind the kidnapping.

title: Jersey
cast: Nani|Shraddha Srinath|Ronit Kamra|Harish Kalyan|Viswant Duddumpudi
overview: After his career fails to take off, a gifted cricketer in his mid-thirties decides that he’s not ready to give up quite yet.

title: Nuvvu Naaku Nachav
cast: Venkatesh|Aarthi Agarwal|Sandeepa|Prakash Raj|Chandramohan
overview: Venky and Nandini's relationship changes from mere friendship to something that is more romantic. However, love only blossoms between the two after Nandini's marriage is fixed elsewhere.

title: Bhaje Vaayu Vegam
cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda|Rahul Haridas|Iswarya Menon|Tanikella Bharani|P. Ravi Shankar
overview: Two brothers from village move to city to pursue their dreams, but situations land them in trouble as they inadvertently tangle with dangerous local kingpin, while desperately seeking the money to pay for their father’s life-saving surgery.

title: Bloody Mary
cast: Nivetha Pethuraj|Kireeti Damaraju|Brahmaji|Ajay|Rajkumar Kasireddy
overview: Three best friends Mary, Raju and Basha come close to making their dreams come true. In an unexpected turn of events, the three of them have evidence to a murder and make enemies with some vicious people. Will Mary be able to escape her enemies while keeping her best friends safe?

title: Gamyam
cast: Allari Naresh|Sharwanand|Kamalinee Mukherjee|Rao Ramesh|Hema
overview: Two guys, a thief and a rich man, meet in a journey that the latter starts to find love. On their way they find the destinies of their lives.

title: Bhagavanth Kesari
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Sreeleela|Kajal Agarwal|Arjun Rampal|John Vijay
overview: Bhagavanth Kesari's life takes an unexpected turn when he becomes the guardian of Vijaya Lakshmi aka Vijji, daughter of his jailer. Kesari, with his unwavering sense of justice, embarks on a journey to nurture Vijji into a resilient young woman aspiring to join the Indian army. Intertwined in this narrative is the presence of Rahul Sanghvi, a power-hungry tycoon whose connection with Bhagavanth and Vijji, unravels hidden secrets.

title: Dhruva
cast: Ram Charan|Rakul Preet Singh|Arvind Swamy|Nasaar|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: A committed police officer is on a very dangerous mission to destroy the most corrupt person in the country, Siddharth Abhimanyu.

title: Sarrainodu
cast: Allu Arjun|Rakul Preet Singh|Aadhi Pinisetty|Catherine Tresa|Srikanth
overview: Only one man can stop a villain who, backed by his father, brutally murders anyone who gets in the way of his unscrupulous real estate deals.

title: Shakti
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Ileana D'Cruz|Prabhu|Sonu Sood|Brahmanandam
overview: The central minister's daughter who secretly goes on a trip is targeted by some evil Egyptians who want her and a holy diamond in their custody, while a guide gets linked to the fight as he protects her from all possible dangers.

title: Pelli Choopulu
cast: Ritu Varma|Vijay Deverakonda|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Abhay Bethiganti|Nandu Vijay Krishna
overview: Fed up with his carefree attitude, Prasanth's father fixes his marriage to make him responsible. However, meeting an ambitious girl changes his life for the better.

title: Double iSmart
cast: Ram Pothineni|Sanjay Dutt|Kavya Thapar|Sayaji Shinde|Getup Srinu
overview: Big Bull, a notorious assassin, wants to achieve immortality by transferring his memories to "iSmart" Shankar, who already has another's person's memories, leading to the intense confrontation between Shankar and Big Bull.

title: Sainikudu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Trisha Krishnan|Irrfan Khan|Prakash Raj|Ajay
overview: Siddharth and his friends rescue a village in Warangal from severe floods. Sidhartha is convinced that Govt will give some relief package to the flood effected. Some time later he realizes that Pappu Yadav hogged on the relief fund before it reached the effected. Pappu Yadav is now contesting in elections and Sidhu goes against him with his friend. The fight between the two starts on from then on. After a few twists, Sidhartha kidnaps the fiancee of Pappu Yadav, Varalaxmi. Siddharth is now hunted by both police and villains.

title: Gangs of Godavari
cast: Vishwak Sen|Neha Shetty|Anjali|Nasaar|Sai Kumar
overview: A man journeys from rags to riches with absolute grit and determination in the Eluru and Godavari coastal regions of India.

title: Ooru Peru Bhairavakona
cast: Sundeep Kishan|Varsha Bollamma|Kavya Thapar|Harsha Chemudu|Vennela Kishore
overview: A man goes in search of some urgently required answers to the world of Bhairavakona, from which there's seemingly no way out.

title: Tiger Nageswara Rao
cast: Ravi Teja|Anupam Kher|Gayatri Bhardwaj|Nupur Sanon|Renu Desai
overview: Based on the life of the notorious thief Nageswara Rao, who was the most wanted thief of south India& managed to evade the authorities on several occasions in the 1970s, earning him the moniker of 'Tiger.'

title: Mechanic Rocky
cast: Vishwak Sen|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Shraddha Srinath|Sunil Varma|Naresh
overview: Rakesh, a happy-go-lucky young mechanic, must take on the ruthless land grabber Rankireddy to save his beloved ancestral car garage, uncovering unexpected truths.

title: 1: Nenokkadine
cast: Mahesh Babu|Kriti Sanon|Nasaar|Anu Hasan|Kelly Dorji
overview: A schizophrenic rock musician, is convinced that his parents were murdered by three men. Taking the support of a journalist, he sets out to find the culprits. Will he succeed in his mission, and in the process, what will he learn about his own roots?

title: Ghatikachalam
overview: In a gripping psychological horror, a timid medical student, Kaushik, finds himself battling not only his inner demons but also a malevolent spirit named Ghatikachalam, who haunts his mind. As his family seeks answers through spiritual remedies, Movie winds through many interesting twists and turns in a quest to find the truth. Unraveling a tale of suppressed desires and a fight for Kaushik's sanity in the face of a sinister presence.

title: Bhimaa
cast: Gopichand|Malavika Sharma|Priya Bhavani Shankar|Vennela Kishore|Nasaar
overview: When mysterious occurrences plague a closed Shiva temple at Mahendragiri, a fearless and dynamic cop Bhimaa quests to unravel and confront the sinister truth hidden in the shadows and the revelations behind strange happenings in the village, supported by spirits.

title: Miss India
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Jagapati Babu|Rajendra Prasad|Nadhiya|Naveen Chandra
overview: Uprooted to America, an aspiring Indian entrepreneur confronts disapproval, sexism and rivalry as she draws from her culture to start a tea business.

title: SSMB29
cast: Mahesh Babu|Priyanka Chopra Jonas|Prithviraj Sukumaran|R. Madhavan

title: Mayabazar
cast: N.T. Rama Rao|S. V. Ranga Rao|Savitri|Nageshwara Rao Akkineni|Gummadi
overview: Balarama promises Subhadra that he'll marry his daughter to her son. But when the Pandavas loses their kingdom to the Kauravas, Balarama breaks his promise.

title: Oopiri
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Karthi|Tamannaah Bhatia|Jayasudha|Prakash Raj
overview: A true story of two men who should never have met – a quadriplegic aristocrat who was injured in a paragliding accident and a young man from the projects.

title: Pilla Zamindar
cast: Nani|Hariprriya|Rao Ramesh|Srinivas Avasarala|Dhanraj Sukhram
overview: PJ is the grandson of a wealthy zamindar and an irresponsible youngster who is spoilt by the pampering and excessive money. His grandfather writes a will with several conditions before he dies. He writes the will that PJ will inherit his entire wealth only if he completes his graduation as a common man without any luxeries. The rest of the story is all about how PJ learns about values and life as he achieves his goal.

title: Hippi
cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda|Digangana Suryavanshi|Jazba Singh|J. D. Chakravarthi|Vennela Kishore
overview: Devadas is a kick boxer turned techie who wants to break his relationship with Amukta Malyada at any cost. But will she let it happen?

title: 8 Vasantalu
cast: Ananthika Sanilkumar|Ravi Theja Duggirala|Hanu Reddy|Kanna Pasunoori
overview: A talented karate student embarks on a journey of self-discovery where she experiences both love and loss.

title: Dookudu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Sonu Sood|Prakash Raj|Brahmanandam
overview: A young policeman hunts down the men who caused the accident that put his politician father into a coma.

title: RX 100
cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda|Payal Rajput|Rao Ramesh|Ramki|Laxman Meesala
overview: When a city-bred girl comes home to her village, she falls for the macho village boy and asks him out. As a passionate romance brews, the guy falls madly in love with her, but does she feel the same way? Or is it just a passionate summer fling?

title: World Famous Lover
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Raashii Khanna|Catherine Tresa|Aishwarya Rajesh|Izabelle Leite
overview: An amalgamation of four different love stories: Seenayya and Suvarna, a middle-class couple in a small town; Gautham, an uber-cool youngster romancing in the streets of Paris with his girlfriend Iza, Union Leader Srinu head over heels in love with his boss lady, and and the first college romance.

title: Nani's Gang Leader
cast: Nani|Lakshmi|Saranya Ponvannan|Priyanka Arul Mohan|Shriya Reddy
overview: A crime novelist is approached by a group of bereaved women to help them plot revenge against those responsible for the loss of their loved ones.

title: Jathi Ratnalu
cast: Naveen Polishetty|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Rahul Ramakrishna|Faria Abdullah|Murali Sharma
overview: Srikanth and his friends Sekhar and Ravi head to the city in pursuit of some izzat. Once there, they realise that maybe they were better off back home in Jogipet.

title: Vimanam
cast: Samuthirakani|Master Dhruvan|Anasuya Bharadwaj|Meera Jasmine|Rahul Ramakrishna
overview: Differently abled and single parent Veerayya, with limited financial resources embarks on an endless pursuit to make his son Raju's biggest dream of traveling on an aeroplane come true.

title: Fidaa
cast: Sai Pallavi|Varun Tej|Sai Chand|Saranya Pradeep|Raja Chembolu
overview: Two young people embark on a winding and rocky path to love after meeting at a wedding.

title: Andala Rakshasi
cast: Lavanya Tripathi|Rahul Ravindran|Naveen Chandra|Pragathi Mahavadi|C. V. L. Narasimha Rao
overview: Gautham, a wealthy man, falls for a woman named Mithuna only to learn that she loves another man. However, a sudden chain of events changes their lives forever.

title: Bindaas
cast: Manchu Manoj|Sheena Shahabadi|Vennela Kishore|Master Bharath|Brahmanandam
overview: Bindaas (Telugu: బిందాస్) is a 2010 Telugu action film directed by Veeru Potla. The film stars Manoj Manchu and Sheena Shahabadi in the lead roles. Music of the film was launched on 9 November 2009. The movie released on February 5, 2010. On March 27, 2010 it had completed 50 Days in cinema halls. It is reported to have made over INR14 crores worldwide. It was dubbed and released in Malayalam as Happy 2 Happy.

title: Khushi
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Bhumika Chawla|Sudhakar|Sivaji Sontineni|Nasaar
overview: College friends Siddhu and Madhumati part ways due to a misunderstanding. Although they are in love and realize they cannot live without each other, their egos prevent them from uniting.

title: Seethamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu
cast: Venkatesh|Mahesh Babu|Prakash Raj|Anjali|Samantha Ruth Prabhu
overview: Seethamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu revolves around a lovable family headed by Relangi . He has two sons- Vijay "Peddodu" and Ajay "Chinnodu". The unemployment of his children and the ridicule heaped on the family by relatives puts some strain on the relationships. What does he do in these circumstances is the rest of the story.

title: DJ Tillu
cast: Siddhu Jonnalagadda|Neha Shetty|Prince Cecil|Brahmaji|Muralidhar Goud
overview: When a local DJ and his affair with a young woman put him square in the middle of a crime, he must do his best to get out of the predicament he’s in.

title: Operation Valentine
cast: Varun Tej|Manushi Chhillar|Mir Sarwar|Ruhani Sharma|Paresh Pahuja
overview: Showcasing the indomitable spirits of the Indian Air Force heroes on the frontlines and the challenges they face during one of the biggest, fiercest aerial attacks that India has ever seen.

title: Don Seenu
cast: Ravi Teja|Shriya Saran|Anjana Sukhani|Mahesh Manjrekar|Sayaji Shinde
overview: This story is all about a ambitious boy named Seenu (Ravi Teja) who dreams of becoming a don. He always likes to be called as ‘Don’ Seenu since childhood due to the strong influence of the Amitabh Bachchan starrer ‘Don’. He grows up with just one passion - that of becoming the World's No: 1 Don. Thanks to his enterprising nature, he gains access to the cream of the city's dons, and uses his cleverness to play off the top two - Machiraju (Sayaji Shinde) and Narsing (Sri Hari), fierce rivals - against each other.

title: Nene Raju Nene Mantri
cast: Rana Daggubati|Kajal Agarwal|Catherine Tresa|Navdeep|Ashutosh Rana
overview: Nene Raju Nene Mantri is the story of Radha Jogendra and the love of his life, Radha. His whole world revolves around her and he can go to any lengths to make her happy. But what happens when such profound love takes the shape of cavernous ambition?

title: Nee Sneham
cast: Uday Kiran|Aarthi Agarwal|Jatin Grewal|K. Viswanath|Giri Babu
overview: Madhav (Uday Kiran) and Seenu (Jatin) are neighbors and best buddies. They play football representing the AP team. During their trip to Calcutta, Seenu gets injured in order to save Madhav from an accident. Doctors say that Seenu is unfit to play football and he can walk only by using a walking stick. Seenu takes a vow from Madhav that he should not tell anybody that he was injured while saving Madhav.  Amrutha (Arti Agarwal) is a middle class girl who is raised by their grand parents (K Viswanath and Sujatha). Madhav happens to see Amrutha one fine day and falls in love with her. …… If I start telling the relationships and complexity of the relations, you would complain to me after watching the film that I deprived you of enjoying the happenings on the screen. So let me stop writing the story line and start jumping into actor's performance department.

title: Mangalyam
cast: Bandi Saroj Kumar|Himansee Katragadda|Divija Nakshatra|Nutan Naidu|Mettu Nishesh
overview: Dorababu, a contract killer and Lawyer by profession, never trusts in love and Marriage system, because of his love failure in the past. What factors make Dorababu to gain back the trust on love and marriage

title: Race Gurram
cast: Allu Arjun|Shruti Haasan|Shaam|M. S. Narayana|Jayaprakash Reddy
overview: Ram and Lakshman, aka Lucky, are brothers who are polar opposites in nature. Their mother wishes to see them united.

title: Annamayya
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Ramya Krishnan|Kasturi Shankar|Suman Talwar|Bhanupriya
overview: A cinematic version of the life of famous Indian saint-poet, Annamayya (born May 1408), follows the spiritual awakening of the mystic composer Annamayya, who's first motivated to write a song of praise after visiting a temple. His devotion is put to the test when he vows to fast until he comes face to face with God, an act of faith for which he's rewarded with a blessed meal of prasad. As his fame as a singer spreads, Annamayya eventually becomes a real personification of the holy Nandaka Sword.

title: Naa Peru Surya - Naa Illu India
cast: Allu Arjun|Arjun Sarja|Nadhiya|Anu Emmanuel|R. Sarathkumar
overview: Despite having serious anger management issues, Surya, an Indian Army officer is a brilliant officer but when anger takes control of him he is impossible to subdue. In spite of this issue, he achieves his goal of serving the country by overcoming the hurdles.

title: Majili
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Divyansha Kaushik|Ananyaa Agrawal|Rao Ramesh
overview: Poorna fails to appreciate the blessings in his life due to his unfulfilled dream of a cricket career and a failed romance that changes him.

title: Guna 369
cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda|Anagha|Adithya Menon|Shivaji Raja|Sai Kumar
overview: Guna is a happy-go-lucky guy who believes the solution to solving issues is not through violence but through compromise.When he is framed for a crime he didn't commit by someone close to him, Guna is left with no choice and forced to the extremes to prove his innocence.

title: Sita
cast: Bellamkonda Srinivas|Kajal Agarwal|Sonu Sood|Mannara Chopra|Payal Rajput
overview: Sita is a materialistic woman who only cares about materialistic gains and nothing else. MLA Basava Raju lusts for her and wants her to give him what she promised him for helping her. The villain of their tale is Ram, a man who’s way too innocent for his own good. How does Ram help Sita out of the fix she’s in forms the crux of the story.

title: Jaanu
cast: Sharwanand|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Gouri G Kishan|Sai Kiran Kumar|Vennela Kishore
overview: Decades post-high school, Ram and Jaanu meet at their school's reunion and explore their past thoughts consisting of affection, care, depth and grieve all over the period of one evening.

title: Saakshyam
cast: Bellamkonda Srinivas|Pooja Hegde|R. Sarathkumar|Meena|Jagapati Babu
overview: A group of people commit unspeakable crimes and are confident of getting away with it since there are no witnesses. But nature is witness to their crimes and when all five elements of nature combine to take revenge, can they survive against its wrath?

title: Tholi Prema
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Keerthi Reddy|Vasuki Anand|Ali Basha|Venu Madhav
overview: Balu falls in love with Anu who has come to her grandfather's house from the US. He even saves her life during an accident, but he is still not able to express his love to her.

title: Bhadra
cast: Ravi Teja|Meera Jasmine|Prakash Raj|Sunil Varma|Murali Mohan
overview: Bhadra(Telugu: భద్ర) is a Telugu film released on 12 May 2005 ( Dubbed in malayalam as Brahmam ) and was directed by debutant director Boyapati Srinu. Ravi Teja and Meera Jasmine played the lead roles. The film was later remade into Tamil as Saravana with Silambarasan and Jyothikaand also remade into bengali as Josh with Jeet and Srabonti. Linda Arsenio danced in an item number.

title: Rudrangi
cast: Jagapati Babu|Mamta Mohandas|Ashish Gandhi|Ganavi Laxman|Vimala Raman
overview: Set during the 1940s, Bheem Rao Deshmukh, a ruthless monarch and womanizer, rules Rudrangi and treats the local people there as his slaves.One day Bheem Rao comes across a woman named Rudrangi, and he falls for her beauty. Bheem Rao badly wants to have a sexual encounter with Rudrangi, and tyrannizes an entire village of Rudrangi fulfill his lust.

title: Padi Padi Leche Manasu
cast: Sharwanand|Sai Pallavi|Murali Sharma|Priya Raman|Vennela Kishore
overview: A young couple navigates through the highs and lows of a budding relationship.

title: Hanuman Junction
cast: Arjun Sarja|Jagapati Babu|Venu Thottempudi|Sneha|Laya
overview: Two friends, Krishna and Das, run a company in a small town with their loved sister Devi. However, Devaraj, an influential man in the village, is against them and vows to destroy their growth.

title: Srimadvirat Veerabrahmendra Swami Charitra
cast: N.T. Rama Rao|Nandamuri Balakrishna|Rati Agnihotri|Allu Ramalingaiah|Kanchana
overview: The story is based on the life of Pothuluri Veerabrahmam (N. T. Rama Rao), a well-known saint and astrologer of the 17th century. A brief life of Gautama Buddha, Ramanuja, Adi Shankara and Vemana (all essayed by NTR) are shown at the beginning of the film.

title: Jawaan
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Mehreen Pirzada|Prasanna|Satyam Rajesh|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: Jai  is a patriotic man for whom the nation always comes first. He harbours the dream to work for the DRDO and wants nothing else from life. But what happens when an evil mastermind Keshav makes a plan to harm the nation?

title: Ready
cast: Ram Pothineni|Genelia D'Souza|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani|Sunil Varma
overview: A brave man decides to kidnap his friend's beloved from a forced marriage, but ends up abducting the wrong bride. Ironically, the bride he kidnapped is ecstatic because she was already planning an escape. On the run, they fall in love, but in order to get married, they must convince their families.

title: Simhadri
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Bhumika Chawla|Ankitha|Nasaar|Brahmanandam
overview: Simhadri, a loyal servant in a landlord's house, leads a secret life as Singamalai, a powerful leader in the state of Kerala.

title: Rajakumarudu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Preity Zinta|Brahmanandam|Prakash Raj|Krishna
overview: Raj Kumar (Mahesh Babu) goes on holiday in Khandala and stays with his uncle Dhanunjay (Prakash Raj). He comes across Rani (Preity Zinta) and falls for her. However, he ends up teasing her and she begins to despise him. She is determined to avoid him, but he won't leave her alone. Raj Kumar saves Rani from some thugs, and she is impressed by his heroism. After spending some time together she begins to like him and eventually love him.  Raja Kumarudu is a 1999 Telugu movie directed by K. Raghavendra Rao. It stars Mahesh Babu and Preity Zinta. In the movie Krishna made a guest appearance as the father of Mahesh Babu. Raja Kumarudu received positive reviews and was commercially successful. It was dubbed into hindi as prince no 1

title: Ye Maaya Chesave
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Krishnudu|Sapan Saran|Sanjay Swaroop
overview: An aspiring Hindu director falls in love with a Christian girl whose parents disapprove of their impending relationship.

title: Raja the Great
cast: Ravi Teja|Mehreen Pirzada|Srinivasa Reddy|Vivan Bhatena|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: Raja is a blind man who's trained by his head constable mother to use his disability to his advantage. Lucky is the pampered daughter of a police officer and they're each other's whole world. What happens when Lucky's world is shaken by a goon Deva? How does Raja fit into this picture?

title: Gharshana
cast: Venkatesh|Asin Thottumkal|Salim Baig|Ravi Prakash|Daniel Balaji
overview: Rama Chandra (played by Daggubati Venkatesh) is the Deputy Commissioner of Police of Hyderabad City. His upbringing as an orphan, and the special nature of his job as a policeman, have left him reluctant to form relationships with women. He doesn't have much faith in the judicial system and seeks to 'eliminate' the criminals in the town through encounters.

title: Arjun S/O Vyjayanthi
cast: Kalyan Ram|Vijayashanti|Saiee Manjrekar|Sohail Khan|Arjun Rampal
overview: Arjun, an IPS aspirant turned kind-hearted gangster, learns that Pathaan, a notorious terrorist, wants to exact revenge on his principled mother Vyjayanthi, an honest IPS officer, and sets out to protect Vyjayanthi and their bond is put to the test.

title: Dubai Seenu
cast: Ravi Teja|Nayanthara|Sunil Varma|J. D. Chakravarthi|Sushant Singh
overview: Seenu (Ravi Teja) is fondly called as Dubai Seenu. His sole aim in life is to fly to Dubai and earn tonnes of money. In the process, he gets hold of a broker and gets duped by him in Mumbai. He along with his friends starts a small canteen to earn his llivelihood. and eventually falls in love with a girl called Madhumati (Nayana Tara). He then witnesses an incident that prompts him to return back to Hyderabad. The rest of the story is all about how he helps out Madhumati.

title: 28 Degree Celsius
cast: Naveen Chandra|Shalini Vadnikatti|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Harsha Chemudu|Raja Ravindra
overview: 28 degrees celsius is a romantic suspense thriller centred around Anjali, who suffers from a brain injury that makes her vulnerable to extreme temperatures and she must remain at a constant 28C to survive. As Karthik fights to protect her, unexpected twists unfold, blending love and suspense in a gripping narrative that keeps audiences on the edge.

title: KA
cast: Kiran Abbavaram|Nayan Sarika|Tanvi Ram|Ajay|Redin Kingsley
overview: Set in 1970s Abhinaya Vasudev, an orphaned and happy-go-lucky postman, treats the Krishnagiri village populace as his extended family. When several women missing and Vasudev’s loved one is nearly abducted, he is determined to find answers.

title: GodFather
cast: Chiranjeevi|Nayanthara|Satyadev Kancharana|Salman Khan|Tanya Ravichandran
overview: The sudden demise of the celebrated leader PKR leaves the ruling party in a political crisis and shakes up the family. The party has to elect a leader, and more than one player is in contention. Everyone’s intentions are blurred, and loyalties are in question. Brahma is a game changer in this squabble. Who will succeed as the leader and become the CM?

title: Ravanasura
cast: Ravi Teja|Anu Emmanuel|Megha Akash|Sushanth|Faria Abdullah
overview: An investigating officer is assigned to investigate few brutal murders, where he zeroes in on Ravindra, a criminal lawyer who has penchant for secretly committing murders as the mastermind behind the crime.

title: Darja
