cast: Anasuya Bharadwaj|Sunil Varma|Shakalaka Shankar|Sudha|RJ Hemant
overview: Kanaka Mahalaksmi is a local don, who does liquor business in Bandhar city and known for her ruthlessness. She sets her sights to rule the Bandhar port. As everyone including the police are terrified by her, ACP Shiva Shankar is transferred to the same city to get the crimes under control. The face off and the clash between these two powerful characters makes the rest of the story.

title: Thammudu
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Achyuth|Preeti Jhangiani|Aditi Gowitrikar|Ali Basha
overview: Subrahmanyam (Pawan Kalyan), the youngest son of the family wastes away his life. His father always scolds him but his brother Chakri (Achyuth) who is a boxer, and friend Jaanu (Preeti Jhangiani) dote him. Meanwhile he falls in love with Lovely (Aditi) and for this he keeps on telling lies to her that he is very rich. Jaanu in the middle truly loves Subrahmanyam and gives him everything he asks her for thinking that he is doing these for her but he does it for lovely. Will Subrahmanyam realize what true love is?

title: Mr. Majnu
cast: Akhil Akkineni|Nidhhi Agerwal|Subbaraju|Rao Ramesh|Vidyullekha Raman
overview: A playboy finds himself in a spot of bother when he falls in love with the right girl.

title: Krishna and His Leela
cast: Siddhu Jonnalagadda|Shraddha Srinath|Seerat Kapoor|Shalini Vadnikatti|Samyukta Hornad
overview: Torn between his past and present girlfriends, a confused bachelor’s indecisiveness spins a web of lies and cheating as he struggles to commit.

title: The Warriorr
cast: Ram Pothineni|Aadhi Pinisetty|Krithi Shetty|Nadhiya|Jayaprakash
overview: A young, naïve and idealistic Satya moves to Kurnool in hopes of a bright future. Discontent with how the city remains in the grip of a gangster, he decides to change the ‘treatment’ for the ‘disease’.

title: Induvadana
cast: Varun Sandesh|Farnaz Shetty|Mahesh Vitta|Dhanraj Sukhram|Raghu Babu
overview: Vasu is a forest officer who falls in love with the tribal girl, Indu. As time passes, Indu also loves Vasu. As things are going fine, One fine day, Indu gets killed and she becomes a ghost. Vasu must find out what happened.

title: Viswam
cast: Gopichand|Kavya Thapar|Baby Iyal|Jisshu Sengupta|Sunil Varma
overview: When terrorists target a young girl who witnessed an assassination, a heroic taxi driver comes to the rescue.

title: Jessie
cast: Ashima Narwal|Pavani Gangireddy|Archana|Kabir Duhan Singh|Atul Kulkarni
overview: Set in an abandoned house, the film follows a team of professional ghost hunters trying to conduct a paranormal investigation to unveil the mystery of two sisters, Jessie and Amy, where Amy shows unusual mental and physical behaviour.

title: Bharat Ane Nenu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Kiara Advani|Prakash Raj|R. Sarathkumar|Aamani
overview: Bharat, a graduate raised in London clueless about the future becomes the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh due to the circumstances. New to India and with no political knowledge he learns the ropes quickly and governs efficiently. However, while he endears himself to the crowd, he makes enemies out of the political class, including his own party members who create trouble for him and try to stop him from bringing in changes in the society.

title: Om Namo Venkatesaya
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Anushka Shetty|Jagapati Babu|Sourabh Raaj Jain|Sai Kumar
overview: Raama, who is a devotee of Lord Venkateswara, denounces worldly pleasures including his soon-to-be-bride and maradalu Bhavani and ends up at Tirumala. He decides to change the face of Tirumala by turning it into ‘Kaliyuga Vaikuntham’ both for pilgrims and the deity with the help of Krishnamma. His endeavours to do so, the hurdles and his encounters with the Lord himself is the story.

title: Bujjigaadu: Made in Chennai
cast: Prabhas|Trisha Krishnan|Sanjjanaa Galrani|Mohan Babu|M. S. Narayana
overview: Bujji runs away from his home in his childhood because of a dispute with his girlfriend Chitti. He ends up in Chennai for 12 years, and the rest of the story is about how they meet now to make their love successful.

title: Naa Saami Ranga
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Allari Naresh|Raj Tarun|Ashika Ranganath|Mirnaa
overview: Three brothers brought together by chance navigate their love lives while jealousy from village elders brews.

title: Pelli Kaani Prasad
cast: Priyanka Sharma|Muralidhar Goud|Saptagiri
overview: Caught between tradition and his father's greed, prasad struggles to fulfill his dream of marriage.

title: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
cast: Naveen Polishetty|Shruti Sharma|Ram Dutt|Suhas|Shredha Rajagopalan
overview: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is a brilliant, underrated detective from Nellore who runs an agency called FBI which sees no business. He gets more than what he asked for when a case happens to fall right into his lap out of nowhere.

title: Aadikeshava
cast: Panja Vaisshnav Tej|Sreeleela|Joju George|Aparna Das|Radikaa Sarathkumar
overview: A man battles criminals exploiting child labour.

title: A Aa
cast: Nithiin|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Anupama Parameswaran|Naresh|Nadhiya
overview: The love affair, conspired by creation, between Anasuya Ramalingam and Aanand Vihari.

title: Dhamaka
cast: Ravi Teja|Sreeleela|Jayaram|Sachin Khedekar|Tanikella Bharani
overview: Swamy and Anand Chakravarthy are lookalikes. Swamy is a jobless guy, while  Anand is the son of Nanda Gopal Chakravarthy, running a company called People Mart. Under dicey circumstances Pranavi, a pretty young girl falls in love with both of them. When JP, a monstrous corporate honcho seeks to acquire People Mart through unethical means, Anand and Swamy’s lives get intertwined.

title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam
cast: Venkatesh|Aishwarya Rajesh|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Upendra Limaye|Sai Kumar
overview: When a renowned tech entrepreneur is kidnapped upon returning to India, a police officer recruits her ex-boyfriend, a former cop now living a quiet family life, to assist in the rescue mission.

title: Govindudu Andarivaadele
cast: Ram Charan|Prakash Raj|Srikanth|Kajal Agarwal|Kamalinee Mukherjee
overview: Balaraju, the head of his village, lives with his wife Baby along with his two sons Chandrasekhar Rao and Bangari and two daughters. He helps Chandrasekhar become a doctor and builds a local hospital. On the day it opens, Chandrasekhar comes back home with his lover Kausalya, also a doctor. Both express their wish to marry and settle abroad, which upsets Balaraju, leading to their separation.  25 years later, Chandrasekhar, a successful doctor in London, tells the story to his son Abhiram and daughter Indu. Abhiram decides to go home to Balaraju and attempt a reconciliation. He meets his friend, Bunny, at the airport and goes to the village on Bunny's bike the next day.

title: Rakhi
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Ileana D'Cruz|Charmy Kaur|Suhasini Maniratnam|Chandramohan
overview: An ambitious and young man named Rama Krishna avenges his sister's death after her in-laws burn her alive due to their greed for dowry. Thereafter, he starts killing every man that harasses a woman.

title: Samajavaragamana
cast: Sree Vishnu|Reba Monica John|Naresh|Srikanth Iyengar|Nellore Sudharshan
overview: Balu, a determined middle-class man who finds himself at a crossroads when Sarayu enters his life, rekindling his long-lost desire for romantic relationships. Balu must try his best to stop his cousin’s marriage in order to save his own love life.

title: Mathu Vadalara
cast: Sri Simha|Satya|Naresh Agastya|Athulya Chandra|Brahmaji
overview: Babu is a delivery boy living with his friends Yesu and Abhi. Due to his meagre salary, he decides to quit, but then Yesu gives him an idea. The idea, however, soon spirals out of control and Babu finds himself deep in trouble. Will he survive the circumstances of his own actions?

title: Venky
cast: Ravi Teja|Sneha|Srinivasa Reddy|Chitram Seenu|Ramachandra
overview: Venky is headed to Hyderabad to join the police force. However, he ends up embroiled in a double murder on the train. When he joins the academy, he realises that their boss is the murderer.

title: Alexander
cast: Suman Talwar|Vani Viswanath|Kota Srinivasa Rao

title: Aarya 2
cast: Allu Arjun|Navdeep|Kajal Agarwal|Brahmanandam|Mukesh Rishi
overview: Two young boys staying together at an orphanage become friends. One of them is adopted by a wealthy family and grows up to become the owner of a software company. He provides employment for his friend, but when they both fall in love with the same young woman, conflict emerges.

title: Swag
cast: Sree Vishnu|Ritu Varma|Meera Jasmine|Saranya Pradeep|Daksha Nagarkar
overview: The eternal battle of the sexes is played out across several generations of a family who seek to obtain a fortune.

title: F2: Fun and Frustration
cast: Venkatesh|Varun Tej|Tamannaah Bhatia|Mehreen Pirzada|Rajendra Prasad
overview: After Venky, Varun also gets married thinking he can keep the wife in control but both of them gets frustrated with the marital life which generates fun.

title: Venky Mama
cast: Venkatesh|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Raashii Khanna|Payal Rajput|Nasaar
overview: When his sister and her husband die in a car accident, a rice-mill owner decides to raise his nephew as his own child. They become inseparable over the course of time, but there are evil forces at work that are trying to separate them.

title: BRO
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Pawan Kalyan|Ketika Sharma|Priya Prakash Varrier|Subbaraju
overview: After being fatally injured in a car crash, a man is given three months back on earth to make amends.

title: Sagara Sangamam
cast: Kamal Haasan|Jaya Prada|Sarath Babu|S.P. Sailaja|Sakshi Ranga Rao
overview: When a passionate classical dancer, Balakrishna, falls in love with Madhavi, a woman who admires his talent, fate separates them. Years later, as he drowns in sorrow and self-destruction, an unexpected encounter rekindles his lost hopes, emotions and talent.

title: Krishna Vrinda Vihari
cast: Naga Shaurya|Shirley Setia|Radikaa Sarathkumar|Vennela Kishore|Rahul Ramakrishna
overview: Krishna falls for Vrinda and tells a white lie at home to ensure they’re married. But what happens when it leads to unnecessary misunderstandings?

title: Jaya Janaki Nayaka
cast: Bellamkonda Srinivas|Rakul Preet Singh|Pragya Jaiswal|Jagapati Babu|R. Sarathkumar
overview: Gagan is very much in love with Sweety aka Janaki, a sweet-natured girl, ever willing to lend a helping hand to those in need. But she ends up rejecting Gagan and later finds herself in a situation from which there seems no escape. Why did Sweety reject Gagan and what does he do when he finds her in a dangerous predicament.

title: Chennakesava Reddy
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Shriya Saran|Tabu|Devayani|Brahmanandam
overview: After two decades in prison, legendary factionist Chennakesava Reddy (Balakrishna) returns to Rayalaseema, seeking revenge. Standing in his way, is his son Bharath (also Balakrishna), a law-abiding police officer.

title: Arundhati
cast: Anushka Shetty|Sonu Sood|Manorama|Sayaji Shinde|Kaikala Satyanarayana
overview: Arundhati  belongs to Gadwal samsthanam in 1920’s. She is known for her bravery in saving the Samstanam by killing Pasupathi an evildoer. But the spirit of Pasupathi haunts that place. Another girl is born in the same lineage after 3 generations and she is named as Arundhati. The spirit of Pasupati is after Arundhati to take the revenge.

title: Nuvve Kavali
cast: Tarun|Richa Pallod|Sai Kiran|Sunil Varma|Prema
overview: Nuvve Kavali (Telugu: నువ్వే కావాలి) (English translation I Want Only You) is a 2000 blockbuster Telugu film under Ushakiron Movies, directed by K. Vijaya Bhaskar of Swayamvaram fame. Tarun and Richa Pallod debuted with this film. In many ways the film became a catalyst for new trends in Tollywood. This movie was a remake of Malayalam Blockbuster Niram.

title: DJ: Duvvada Jagannadham
cast: Allu Arjun|Pooja Hegde|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani|Vennela Kishore
overview: A righteous young man who helps everyone gain their rightful justice, gets recruited as an undercover agent to work on a high profile case that involves a crime lord working for a corrupt minister who also happens to be the father of his romantic interest.

title: Brindavanam
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Kajal Agarwal|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Prakash Raj|Srihari
overview: Indu makes her boyfriend Krishna act like her friend Bhoomi's lover so that her family will stop searching for a groom. However, their lives takes a turn when Bhoomi falls in love with Krishna.

title: Saakini Daakini
cast: Regina Cassandra|Nivetha Thomas|RJ Hemant|Lahari Shari|Prudhviraj
overview: Two trainee female police officers find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to use their knowledge.

title: Tuck Jagadish
cast: Nani|Ritu Varma|Jagapati Babu|Daniel Balaji|Aishwarya Rajesh
overview: In a village with greedy property fights among the families, Jagadish carries on his father's legacy to reform all the property issues in his village while trying to reunite his family, which is also split due to property issues.

title: Most Eligible Bachelor
cast: Akhil Akkineni|Pooja Hegde|Jayaprakash|Aamani|Murali Sharma
overview: A well-educated, ‘settled’ NRI falls for a stand-up comedian and wants to marry her. But when she knows what she wants from her husband, will he fit the bill?

title: Jalsa
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Ileana D'Cruz|Prakash Raj|Mukesh Rishi|Brahmanandam
overview: Sanjay falls in love with Indu. Her father Rammohan Reddy doesnt approve of it and she is married to someone else. Later, Bhagyamathi falls for him and he goes to meet her father who turns out to be Rammohan Reddy. Somewhere in between Sanjay's life as a Naxal is depicted.

title: Thammudu
cast: Nithiin|Sapthami Gowda|Laya|Varsha Bollamma|Swasika
overview: an emotional story of a brother who goes to any extent to safeguard his sister from multiple challenges in her life.

title: Maryada Ramanna
cast: Sunil Varma|Saloni Aswani|Nagineedu Vellanki|Supreet|Prabhakar
overview: Ramu returns to his hometown to sell a piece of land he owns and falls in love with a young woman only to find out that her parents want him dead.

title: Illu Illalu Pillalu
cast: Sharada|Visu|Chandramohan|Maharshi Raghava|Anand Babu
overview: A middle-class family struggles to survive in an extremely demanding society and earn enough to live a comfortable life.

title: Nenu Local
cast: Nani|Keerthy Suresh|Naveen Chandra|Sachin Khedekar|Tulasi
overview: This story is about a happy-go-lucky young man, Babu, who falls in love with a girl. However, he runs into a problem while convincing her father to permit them to be together.

title: Goodachari
cast: Adivi Sesh|Prakash Raj|Jagapati Babu|Supriya Yarlagadda|Sobhita Dhulipala
overview: Gopi, is the son of an ex-RAW agent Raghuveer. Brought up by his uncle Sathya, he wants to be an agent just like his father and uncle. But Satya wants him to lead a normal life and not be killed like his father was. What happens in Gopi’s life that turns everything upside down?

title: Bangarraju
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Ramya Krishnan|Krithi Shetty|Vennela Kishore
overview: Chinna Bangarraju is taking forward his grandfather Bangarraju's legacy of being a massive flirt. His worried grandmother however wants to ensure he's not lonely anymore before she passes on.

title: Chal Mohan Ranga
cast: Nithiin|Megha Akash|Madhunandan|Lissy|Rao Ramesh
overview: A young man with dreams of making it big in the USA falls in love with an NRI woman residing there. She breaks up with him for reasons unknown to him but serendipity plays cupid.

title: Red
cast: Ram Pothineni|Nivetha Pethuraj|Malavika Sharma|Amritha Aiyer|Sampath Raj
overview: When civil engineer Siddharth is arrested for a murder on the basis of a pictorial evidence, cops discover his lookalike Aditya and realize they have only 48 hours to solve the case.

title: Athidhi
cast: Mahesh Babu|Amrita Rao|Brahmanandam|Nasaar|Ravi Prakash
overview: Young Amrita Goutham's parents bring home a poor and homeless boy from the streets of Hyderabad, and adopt him. Shortly thereafter her life is shattered when her parents are killed by this boy and she goes to live with her brother, and his wife. Years later, she has grown up, and has a niece, Aishwarya. While being chased by some goons, a male named Aditya, comes to her rescue, and she falls in love with him. Amidst nation-wide kidnappings taking place allegedly at the hands of one Kaiser, she soon finds out that Aditya is none other than the one who killed her parents and may have returned back into her family's life to kill all of them.

title: Missamma
cast: N.T. Rama Rao|Savitri|Jamuna|Nageshwara Rao Akkineni|S. V. Ranga Rao
overview: Rao and Mary, unemployed college graduates from Madras, act as if they are a married couple to get jobs as schoolteachers in the small village of Appapuram. Their story unfolds into an extremely hilarious comedy as they try to cover up that Mary is a christian. They are assisted in their drama by Devaiah, a friend and ex-beggar, in fooling the family they work for.

title: 35 - Chinna Katha Kaadu
cast: Arundev Pothula|Nivetha Thomas|Vishwadev Rachakonda|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Abhay Shankar
overview: A young mother faces challenges when her son fails to secure passing marks in mathematics, inciting events that test the family's resilience and unity.

title: F3: Fun and Frustration
cast: Venkatesh|Varun Tej|Tamannaah Bhatia|Mehreen Pirzada|Rajendra Prasad
overview: Venky and Varun Yadav are ordinary guys with ordinary lives. Their struggle is all about money. One day they hear about a wealthy industrialist in Vijayanagaram who is looking for his heir. What happens when Venky, Varun and the gang arrive at his doorsteps pretending to be his heir.

title: Leader
cast: Rana Daggubati|Harshavardhan|Priya Anand|Subbaraju|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: Upon the death of his father, Arjun Prasad campaigns to become the CM of Andhra. He hopes to eradicate corruption from Indian Politics.

title: Maa Vintha Gaadha Vinuma
cast: Seerat Kapoor|Kamal Kamaraju|Tanikella Bharani|Jayaprakash|Shishir Sharma
overview: College-goer who ogles at girls and doesn't seem to have a purpose in life. When he starts wooing one girl, a range of events follows.

title: Manam
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Nageshwara Rao Akkineni|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Shriya Saran|Samantha Ruth Prabhu
overview: A married couple die in an accident, leaving behind a son. As he grows up and becomes successful, he comes across reincarnations of his father and mother as youngsters, and vows to bring them back together.

title: (Tillu)²
cast: Siddhu Jonnalagadda|Anupama Parameswaran|Muralidhar Goud|Murali Sharma|Anish Kuruvilla
overview: Balagangadhar Tilak, also known as Tillu, is rebounding from the heartbreak inflicted by Radhika. He returns to what he excels at: being a DJ, embodying a flamboyant lifestyle, and managing the Tillu Events company with his family and friends. He becomes the center of attraction at every gathering. Just when life seems favorable, Lilly enters his life, captivating him completely. But who is Lilly? Is she akin to Radhika, or is there more to her than meets the eye?

title: Srivalli
cast: Neha Hinge
overview: Srivalli is a movie about a neuroscientist Srivalli(title role played by Neha Hinge) who undergoes an experiment about brain wave simulation. The story revolves around the effects and the repercussions she faces once her brain starts reacting to the experiment. Srivalli loses track of the past, present and future unable to distinguish between simulation and reality leading to thrilling circumstances.

title: Khiladi
cast: Ravi Teja|Meenakshi Chaudhary|Dimple Hayathi|Arjun Sarja|Anasuya Bharadwaj
overview: Mohan Gandhi is a wanted criminal who’s serving time for a crime he might or might not have committed. With large sums of money, lies and deceit involved, who is he really?

title: Taxiwala
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Priyanka Jawalkar|Malavika Nair|Ravi Prakash|Uttej
overview: A job monger, Shiva who ends up as a taxiwala only to realise his ride is a beyond what anyone can expect.

title: Vakeel Saab
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Prakash Raj|Shruti Haasan|Nivetha Thomas|Anjali
overview: Three girls find themselves accused of attempt to murder after escaping molestation. Their only hope is an alcoholic lawyer who agrees to take up the case.

title: Ninnu Kori
cast: Nani|Nivetha Thomas|Aadhi Pinisetty|Tanikella Bharani|Murali Sharma
overview: Pallavi invites Uma, her ex-boyfriend, to stay with her and her husband to convince him that she is happy in her marriage. Uma tries to create a rift between the couple, hoping to win Pallavi back.

title: Kavacham
cast: Bellamkonda Srinivas|Kajal Agarwal|Neil Nitin Mukesh|Mehreen Pirzada|Harshvardhan Rane
overview: After being framed for a kidnapping, an honest cop races against time to clear his name and catch the conspirator.

title: Naani
cast: Mahesh Babu|Ameesha Patel|Devayani|Raghuvaran|Aishwarya Bhaskar
overview: An impulsive youngster, who is furious with his mother, seeks assistance from a scientist for a way to become an adult overnight. His wish is granted and he begins look like a 28-year-old man. How will he deal with the complexities of adulthood? How will his relationship with his mother evolve?

title: Naayak
cast: Ram Charan|Kajal Agarwal|Amala Paul|Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat|Brahmanandam
overview: A young man and his lookalike team up to fight injustice and settle their personal scores with the evildoers.

title: Ramabanam
cast: Gopichand|Dimple Hayathi|Jagapati Babu|Khushboo|Vennela Kishore
overview: Years after running away from his pacifist brother Rajaram, Vicky lives as a gangster in Kolkata. When Vicky returns home, Rajaram's organic food business empire is in the doldrums because his rival GK is conspiring against it. Can Vicky save his brother's business in time and teach GK a lesson?

title: Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana
cast: Siddharth|Trisha Krishnan|Srihari|Prakash Raj|Archana
overview: Siri and Sriram fall in love with each other and plan to get married. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship.

title: Akhanda 2: Thaandavam
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Pragya Jaiswal|Samyuktha|Aadhi Pinisetty|Akshara Nunna Sujana

title: NTR Neel
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Tovino Thomas|Rukmini Vasanth|Nasaar
overview: Upcoming Prashanth Neel Film starring NTR

title: Mirchi
cast: Prabhas|Anushka Shetty|Richa Gangopadhyay|Sathyaraj|Brahmanandam
overview: A man returns to his country in order, ostensibly, to reform his girlfriend's violent family, but he seems to have a strange connection and a rather dark past.

title: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi?
cast: Vishwak Sen|Sai Sushanth Reddy|Abhinav Gomatam|Venkatesh Kakumanu|Anisha Ambrose
overview: Four friends, with a bittersweet history, get drunk and embark on a journey to Goa. On the trip, they lose an expensive ring which threatens to derail one of their engagement. They end up confronting one another and their own fears, as they enroll in a short film making competition in Goa to try and win the prize money for the ring.

title: Arjun
cast: Mahesh Babu|Shriya Saran|Keerthi Reddy|Raja|Prakash Raj
overview: A young man risks his life to guarantee his twin sister's happiness and protect her from murderous in-laws.

title: Gandeevadhari Arjuna
cast: Varun Tej|Sakshi Vaidya|Nasaar|Vimala Raman|Vinay Rai
overview: Ex-special forces officer turned Private security bodyguard Arjun Varma, agrees to protect Central Environment Minister Adtiya Raj Bahadur while he’s in London for a Climate Change Conference at the UN. But a series of events force him to protect much more than his client.

title: Mr Bachchan
cast: Ravi Teja|Bhagyashri Borse|Jagapati Babu|Tanikella Bharani|Sachin Khedekar
overview: Just four days before wedding, a fiercely honest Income Tax officer Bachchan’s life takes a dramatic turn when he is reinstated from suspension and tasked with raiding the home of the powerful and ruthless politician Mutyam Jaggaiah.

title: Ninne Pelladatha
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Tabu|Lakshmi|Chalapathi Rao|Rama Prabha
overview: When Mahalakshmi comes to the city, she falls in love with Seenu, whose family approves of her. But when her parents arrive, they forcibly take her away. Will the history of their families separate Mahalakshmi and Seenu?

title: Purushothamudu
cast: Raj Tarun|Hassini Sudhir|Ramya Krishnan|Prakash Raj|Brahmanandam
overview: Rachit Ram, heir to a multi-billion-dollar corporate conglomerate, sets off on his journey to fulfill a daunting challenge of living like a commoner for 100 days in the middle of nowhere with absolutely no money and privileges, while his aunt and cousin brother conspire together to make him fail his challenge.

title: Tantra
cast: Ananya Nagalla|Dhanush Raghumudri|Saloni Aswani|Temper Vamsi
overview: A timid girl named Rekha possesses an extraordinary power to perceive spirits. When she encounters a malevolent tantric, she's drawn into unraveling dark occult mysteries, putting her life at risk.

title: Chaurya Paatam
cast: Indhra Ram|Paayal Radhakrishna|Madee Manepalli|Mast Ali|Supriya Aysola
overview: Four aspiring criminals plan to rob the local bank at India's most richest and peaceful village, on the pretext of shooting a documentary. But their heist plans are disrupted when they discover the seemingly tranquil community harbors sinister secrets.

title: 18 Pages
cast: Nikhil Siddhartha|Anupama Parameswaran|Dinesh Tej|Sarayu Roy|Ajay
overview: When a heartbroken Siddhu stumbles upon a two-year-old diary, he finds himself drawn into the enigmatic world of a young woman named Nandini and falls for her.

title: Drushyam 2
cast: Venkatesh|Meena|Nadhiya|Sampath Raj|Kruthika Jayakumar
overview: 7 years after the events of Drushyam, the family lives with the trauma from that fateful night. A gripping tale of an investigation and a family threatened by it. Will Rambabu be able to protect his family this time?

title: Yatra
cast: Mammootty|Suhasini Maniratnam|Jagapati Babu|Ashrita Vemuganti|Rao Ramesh
overview: The film focus especially on the period from 1999-2004 when YSR undertook his famous Padayatra which ultimately proved instrumental in catapulting him to a comprehensive victory in the 2004 polls.

title: Brahmotsavam
cast: Mahesh Babu|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Kajal Agarwal|Pranitha Subhash|Sathyaraj
overview: When a charming NRI girl falls in love with a wealthy businessman, she unwittingly sparks conflict within his large joint family. How will her lover find a way to marry her, while still ensuring that his large family remains happy and harmonious?

title: Shankar Dada MBBS
cast: Chiranjeevi|Srikanth|Paresh Rawal|Sonali Bendre|Ali Basha
overview: Shankar Dada is a local goon who sets out to fulfill his parents' dream of him being a doctor. With help from his sidekick ATM, he enrolls himself in medical college and drives the principal and his daughter Dr. Sunitha up the wall.

title: Mr. King
cast: Tanikella Bharani|S.S. Kanchi|Mirchi Kiran|Vennela Kishore|Sharran Kumar
overview: Shiva is an RJ who is doing his thesis on airplane mechanism while Seetharama is cunning and complex. Umadevi and Vennela both fell in love with Shiva. How will Shiva untangle the love triangle and manage Seetharama Raju's twisted game?

title: Devil
cast: Kalyan Ram|Samyuktha|Malavika Nair|Satya|Vasishta N. Simha
overview: A British secret agent takes up the job of solving a dark mystery. He is led into a web of love, deceit and betrayal. His success and failure can change the course of history.

title: Rabhasa
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Pranitha Subhash|Brahmanandam|Jayasudha
overview: US return student Karthik pledges to marry his uncle Dhanunjay's daughter Indu, which was his mother's wish. A small family feud ends with both the families getting separated. He joins Indu's college to convince her to marry him, but mistakenly assumes Bhagyam as Dhanunjay's daughter. Later, Karthik realizes that Indu is his cousin but she is already in love with another guy. He gets entangled in a risky situation when he tries to help a stranger. The rest of the story is all about how he controls the damage and fulfills the wish of his mother.

title: Pournami
cast: Trisha Krishnan|Prabhas|Charmy Kaur|Rahul Dev|Ajay
overview: A dancer trains for an event where she has to perform a special dance in Lord Shiva's temple. But when she suddenly disappears, her younger sister Chandrakala decides to learn the dance.

title: Panjaa
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Sarah-Jane Dias|Anjali Lavania|Jackie Shroff|Atul Kulkarni
overview: Jai, an orphan, falls into bad company after Bhagwan, a gangster, gives him shelter and hope to live. However, Jai and Munna, Bhagwan's son, fight with each other after Munna kills an innocent woman.

title: Son of India
cast: Mohan Babu|Srikanth|Pragya Jaiswal|Meena|Tanikella Bharani
overview: Kadiyam Babji is an ageing man angry with the way society functions. He decides the best payback is to kidnap some high-profile people. But NIA officer Ira is hot on his heels.

title: Mirapakay
cast: Ravi Teja|Richa Gangopadhyay|Deeksha Seth|Prakash Raj|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: Rishi (Ravi Teja) is an inspector in the Intelligence Bureau. His colleagues fondly call him 'Mirapakaay'. The chief of the IB, Narayana Murthy (Nagababu) gets information that Kittu Bhai (Prakash Raj), a mafia don, is trying to spread his tentacles in India and is targeting Delhi first. During the course of the investigation, ACP (Sanjay Swaroop) is killed by Shankar (Kota Srinivasa Rao), a local goon with the help of his son (Supreet). Murthy sends Rishi to Hyderabad and gets him admitted to a college as a Hindi lecturer as part of an undercover operation. Rishi meets Vinamra (Richa Gangopadhyay) at a temple & falls in love at first sight. Incidentally, she studies in the same college and in the same class to which Rishi teaches Hindi. Their love blossoms. At this juncture, Vaishali (Deeksha Seth), daughter of Kittu Bhai, joins the same college. Grabbing the opportunity, the IB chief asks Rishi to extract information about Kittu from Vaishali.

title: Julayi
cast: Allu Arjun|Sonu Sood|Rajendra Prasad|Ileana D'Cruz|Tanikella Bharani
overview: An intelligent young man and a timid cop team up to catch a criminal who wants revenge after a foiled bank robbery.

title: Adhurs
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Nayanthara|Brahmanandam|Sheela Kaur|M. S. Narayana
overview: Twin brothers who are separated at birth receive different upbringing. After they grow up, they chance upon each other when one of them gets kidnapped by hoodlums.

title: Amma Cheppindi
cast: Sharwanand|Suhasini Maniratnam|Sriya Reddy|Pavan Malhotra|Nagendra Babu
overview: A mentally underdeveloped boy stays with his family; the people who live in his neighbourhood consider him to be less intelligent, until he saves everyone from a bomb threat in a rocket centre during a prominent event.

title: Extra Ordinary Man
cast: Nithiin|Sreeleela|Rao Ramesh|Rohini|Sampath Raj
overview: Abhi, from his childhood, revels in the art of playing other people. His mother recognizes his extraordinary talent, propelling him into the world of acting. As he matures, he becomes a sought-after junior artist, always relegated to the background. The lines between reel and real life blur as Abhi faces a complex situation at home, with a supportive mother and a nagging and concerned father. A chance encounter with Likitha , the MD of a company, leads to love, and Abhi finds himself playing the role of a CEO. However, a conniving director presents an intriguing script, introducing Abhi to Nero, a self-absorbed and evil character with conquest on his mind.

title: Bomma Blockbuster
cast: Nandu Vijay Krishna|Rashmi Gautham|Kireeti Damaraju|Raghu Kunche|Nandhu
overview: Pothuraju is a fisherman, film freak & ardent fan of Director Puri Jagannath. His life ambition is to conjure up the dramatic moments in his life & persuade his idol Puri Jagannath to make a film based on him. As time passes, he discovers life-altering secrets about his own family and life. Thus, Pothuraju will get forced to confront the deep pain behind his ludicrous antics and a simplistic worldview.

title: Sri Tirupati Venkateswara Kalyanam
cast: N.T. Rama Rao|Jayasudha|Jaya Prada|Nandamuri Balakrishna|Kaikala Satyanarayana
overview: 1979 Telugu Film

title: Sontham
cast: Sunil Varma|Aryan Rajesh|Rohit|Namitha|Chitram Seenu
overview: Vamsy, Bose, and Nandu are childhood friends, with their bond still going strong in college. However, will things change when Bose falls in love?

title: Kalinga
cast: Tanikella Bharani|Aadukalam Naren|Shiju|Dhruva Vaayu|Pragya Nayan Sinha
overview: A village is terrorized by a demonic entity and a deadly ancient curse.

title: Bhola Shankar
cast: Chiranjeevi|Keerthy Suresh|Tamannaah Bhatia|Sushanth|Murali Sharma
overview: A reformed gangster now taxi driver unwittingly draws the vengeance of a crime syndicate after aiding the police in busting a smuggling operation. Fueled by a burning desire for justice and to protect his adopted sister, he embarks on a relentless quest to hunt down the mobsters responsible.

title: M.C.A
cast: Nani|Bhumika Chawla|Sai Pallavi|Vijay Varma|Rajiv Kanakala
overview: Nani's brother and his friends are his world. But he shares a love-hate relationship with his sister-in-law Jyothi. What happens when Shiva threatens his family, is what 'MCA' is all about.

title: iSmart Shankar
cast: Ram Pothineni|Nidhhi Agerwal|Satyadev Kancharana|Nabha Natesh|Sayaji Shinde
overview: A contract killer goes on the run after eliminating a target and eventually finds himself linked to a slain cop whose memory is transferred to his brain.

title: Narappa
cast: Venkatesh|Priyamani|Karthik Rathnam|Prakash Raj|Murali Sharma
overview: Narappa is forced to flee into the forest with his younger son, Sinappa, after Sinappa murders an upper caste landlord to avenge his older brother’s death. And now Narappa must make more sacrifices and navigate a deeply unjust justice system to give his son a chance at future.

title: Loafer
cast: Varun Tej|Disha Patani|Revathi|Posani Krishna Murali|Mukesh Rishi
overview: Raja, who thinks his mother is dead, turns into a thief. However, his life changes when he falls for Mounika, a girl who is escaping a forced marriage, and eventually meets her aunt.

title: Jai Lava Kusa
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Nivetha Thomas|Raashii Khanna|Ronit Roy|Hamsa Nandini
overview: Jai, Lava and Kusa are triplets who get separated during their childhood because of small clashes. While Jai becomes an evil blooded criminal, the other two, Kusa and Lava end up as small-time crook and bank manager respectively. The twist in the tale arises when Jai kidnaps both the brothers and asks them to help him in his political growth. What is Jai’s agenda? Why did he kidnap his brothers? How can the innocent Lava and Kusa manage the criminal Jai?

title: Miss. Shetty Mr. Polishetty
cast: Anushka Shetty|Naveen Polishetty|Murali Sharma|Tulasi|Harshavardhan
overview: Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever. Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad in Telangana, India, wants to be in a committed relationship. The two appear to be in different stages of life but somehow connect.

title: Mangalya Bhagyam
cast: Bhanumathi|Jayanthi|Vennira Aadai Nirmala|Nirmalamma|Rama Prabha
overview: Mangalya Bhagyam is a 1974 Telugu family-drama film directed and produced by B. Padmanabham. The film starred Bhanumathi, Jayanthi, and Subha, and Sreedhar in the lead roles. M. Muthu composed the film's songs.

title: Maestro
cast: Nithiin|Nabha Natesh|Tamannaah Bhatia|Jisshu Sengupta|Naresh
overview: A piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.

title: Paagal
cast: Vishwak Sen|Nivetha Pethuraj|Murali Sharma|Rahul Ramakrishna|Mahesh Achanta
overview: After his mother's death, Prem, a young man, searches for love in every woman he comes across. However, when he finds true love in Theera, they face several challenges in their quest to unite.

title: Nuvve... Nuvve...
cast: Tarun|Shriya Saran|Prakash Raj|Chandramohan|Sunil Varma
overview: Vishwanath is a millionaire who loves his daughter Anjali obsessively. When Vishwanath discovers that Anjali is in love with Rishi, a happy-go-lucky man from a middle class family, he tries his best to separate them.

title: Custody
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Arvind Swamy|Krithi Shetty|Priyamani|R. Sarathkumar
overview: Siva, a police officer, has to escort a witness to the court. He learns that all the police service wants to kill the witness. An escape begins.

title: Balupu
cast: Ravi Teja|Prakash Raj|Shruti Haasan|Anjali|Brahmanandam
overview: Ravi, a collection agent for a bank, learns from his friend about a man and woman who cheat gullible people. Soon, he resolves to teach the couple a lesson.

title: Geethanjali
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Girija Shettar|Vijayakumar|Vijayachander|M. M. Radhabai
overview: Prakash, who is diagnosed with terminal cancer, and Geethanjali, an equally ill patient, fall in love with each other. However, when she learns about his illness, she decides to move out of his life.

title: Mr. Perfect
cast: Prabhas|Kajal Agarwal|Taapsee Pannu|Murali Mohan|Prakash Raj
overview: Vicky breaks his engagement with Priya, his childhood friend, after he learns that she is making many compromises for his sake. However, time makes him realise the need for compromises in life.

title: Narasimha Naidu
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Simran|Preeti Jhangiani|Mukesh Rishi|Flora Saini
overview: Narasimha (Balakrishna) is an unassuming dance teacher raising a young child on his own. His true identity, and the story of his violent past, begin to unravel as former enemies interrupt his quiet new life.

title: Spy
cast: Nikhil Siddhartha|Iswarya Menon|Abhinav Gomatam|Jisshu Sengupta|Nitin Mehta
overview: A RAW agent is in search of his brother’s killer, unravels the connection between a notorious arms dealer and the hidden secrets of Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose, risking everything to protect India from impending chaos.

title: Disco Raja
cast: Ravi Teja|Bobby Simha|Sunil Varma|Payal Rajput|Tanya Hope
overview: Found frozen and brain-dead in Ladakh, Vasu is brought back to life but with no memories of who he was, until he starts to regain his past and piece it together to find the people responsible for his murder.

title: Intinti Ramayanam
cast: Rahul Ramakrishna|Naresh|Navya Swamy|Surabhi Prabhavathi|Gangavva
overview: Set in a backdrop against Karimnagar, Telangana, When a theft happens, 50-year-old Ramulu and his the close-knit family torn between chasing the thief or begin to doubt each other, and their hidden motivations and ambitions surface.

title: Oosaravelli
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Tamannaah Bhatia|Payal Ghosh|Prakash Raj|Jayaprakash Reddy
overview: A youngster, who does anything for money, avenges on those who killed the family of Niharika.

title: Hello Guru Prema Kosame
cast: Ram Pothineni|Anupama Parameswaran|Prakash Raj|Pranitha Subhash|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: After a rocky start, a friendship develops between a happy-go-lucky youth and a girl from the city.

title: Kick 2
cast: Ravi Teja|Rakul Preet Singh|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani|Ravi Kishan
overview: A doctor living abroad returns to India to sell his property, where he falls in love with a woman who tries to get him to help the people in her village.

title: Tholi Prema
cast: Varun Tej|Raashii Khanna|Sapna Pabbi|Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Suhasini Maniratnam
overview: Aaditya  is an impulsive individual who takes decisions spontaneously and is unafraid to speak his mind. The love of his life Varsha is his extreme opposite — she chooses not to let her emotions control her actions or words. Will these two differing individuals ever make their relationship work?

title: Satyabhama
cast: Kajal Agarwal|Naveen Chandra|Prakash Raj|Ravi Varma|Harshavardhan
overview: ACP Satyabhama confronts her haunted past, diving into a high-stakes investigation to find a missing man. As she unravels dark secrets in various towns cloaked in shadows, redemption hangs in the balance. Will she triumph over the past or be consumed by its shadows?

title: Middle Class Melodies
cast: Anand Deverakonda|Varsha Bollamma|Chaitanya Garikipati|Divya Sripada|Goparaju Ramana
overview: Raghava, who runs a breakfast center in his village, dreams of starting a small hotel in the city. Against his father's wishes, he plans to buy an old shop with his friend Gopal. The shop happens to be owned by Nageswara Rao, father of his love interest Sandhya. How will Raghava's love life and his dream to establish his own hotel clash?

title: Ramayya Vasthavayya
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Shruti Haasan|Mukesh Rishi|Rao Ramesh
overview: Nandu, a happy-go-lucky college student falls head over heels in love with Akarsha and goes all out to woo her. But only after Akarsha falls for him does she realize that he has revenge on his mind.

title: Once Upon a Warrior
cast: Siddharth|Harshita|Shruti Haasan|Lakshmi Manchu|Vallabhaneni Ramji
overview: In a teardrop-shaped land called Sangarashtra, a 9-year-old girl with special healing powers tries to save her homeland from the tyranny of an evil queen with the help of a blind swordsman.

title: Aadavari Matalaku Ardhalu Verule
cast: Venkatesh|Trisha Krishnan|Srikanth|Kota Srinivasa Rao|K. Viswanath
overview: Ganesh, an unemployed man, lands up in a company where Keerthi, the girl he loves, works but who is already engaged to someone else. Sudden incidents ruin his life and he again comes across her, but refuses to marry her.

title: Agnyaathavaasi
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Keerthy Suresh|Anu Emmanuel|Aadhi Pinisetty|Boman Irani
overview: A billionaire Govinda Bhargav and his son are murdered with the aim of a hostile takeover of their company. But what his enemies do not know is that he has an heir that no one knows of.

title: Veera Simha Reddy
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Duniya Vijay|Honey Rose|Lal
overview: Jai Simha Reddy, a businessman in Turkey and doting son of Meenakshi falls in love with Eesha. On the verge of his marriage, Jai comes to know the secret about his father Veera Simha Reddy who comes to Turkey to settle the marriage, which is when Jai meets his father for the first time. Things take a drastic turn around when Veera's  past follows him to Turkey.

title: Darling
cast: Priyadarshi Pullikonda|Nabha Natesh|Moin|Ananya Nagalla|Brahmanandam
overview: Raghav works diligently at a tourist office, saving money for his sole ambition, dream honeymoon in Paris with his future wife. Accidentally meeting and marrying Anandhi changes his life forever.

title: Student No. 1
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Gajala|Rajiv Kanakala|Brahmanandam|Ali Basha
overview: At his father's request, Aditya attends a law college in the coastal metropolis of Visakhapatnam, although he actually wanted to become an engineer. On the first day he meets the beautiful Anjali. Over time, the female student slowly begins to become interested in the strange newcomer, who acts nice and friendly but doesn't seem to be interested in anything else. The college is notorious for its disobediently and disorderly students. It's not the professors who are in charge on campus, but rather the student leader Satya. He is also in love with Anjali and sees Aditya as a competitor who needs to be put in his place. So Aditya faces multiple problems as he tries to reform the unruly students while dealing with his terrible past that everyone doesn't know about.

title: Johnny
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Renu Desai|Mallikarjuna Rao|M. S. Narayana|Geetha
overview: A martial arts coach struggles to earn money through fights in order to save his wife suffering from blood cancer.

title: Tenali Ramakrishna BA.BL
cast: Sundeep Kishan|Hansika Motwani|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Murali Sharma|Brahmanandam
overview: Tenali Ramakrishna is a small-time lawyer who makes his living via compromises between warring parties. He is looking for a big case that could turn his life.

title: 90ML
cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda|Neha Solanki|Ajay|Ali Basha|Duvvasi Mohan
overview: An alcoholic who drinks 90ml of alcohol, three times a day, falls in love with a physiotherapist whose family would never approve of him and his habit.

title: Akhanda
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Pragya Jaiswal|Poorna|Nitin Mehta|Srikanth
overview: Murali Krishna and Akhanda are separated at birth because one of them has a destiny to fulfil and a war to fight. What brings these two together?

title: Sye
cast: Nithiin|Genelia D'Souza|Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat|Shashank|Rajiv Kanakala
overview: The story is set in the backdrop of a college that is riven by two groups led by Prithvi and Shashank. Though there is nothing malicious between the groups, they just can't see eye to eye on anything. The only thing common between the two are their abiding passion for rugby. Whenever a problem crops between the two, it is usually settled with a bitter scrum on the rugby field. As it happens, the college land falls into the hands of a local dadha Bikshu Yadav. This is good enough reason for the two groups to forge a common identity and fight for the land. Prithvi and Shashank bury the hatchet and get back the land. This is too much of a bitter pill for the dadha to swallow. And so he dares the students for a rugby match with his own group.

title: Bruce Lee - The Fighter
cast: Ram Charan|Rakul Preet Singh|Kriti Kharbanda|Chiranjeevi|Nagendra Babu
overview: When a stuntman is mistaken for a police officer, he begins fighting crime.

title: Tulasi
cast: Venkatesh|Nayanthara|Vijayakumar|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Rahul Dev
overview: Tired of her husband's crusade against factional feuds, Thulasi's wife leaves him. However, when their fatally ill son is abducted by factionists, he must resort to violence again.

title: Devi
cast: Prema|Abu Salim|Mahendran|Shiju
overview: Devi, a snake goddess, stays on earth to protect the girl whose father saved her life from greedy relatives and from the snake demon, Dantra.

title: Lakshmi Narasimha
cast: Nandamuri Balakrishna|Asin Thottumkal|Prakash Raj|K. Viswanath|Krishna Bhagavan
overview: Lakshmi Narasimha is a strict police officer who does not mind making his own rules to bring justice to the public. Once, he was indirectly affected by the goon Dharma Bhiksham which costs him his sister and lots of properties of his native village. But Dharma Bhiksham does not know that it was Lakshmi Narasimha who got affected by him. After a few months, Lakshmi Narasimha is transferred to Vijayawada. Dharma Bhiksham rules the mafia world from Vijayawada. Though, a strict police officer - he compromises with Dharma Bhiksham and takes bribes to the tune of one and half crores. He takes the bribes and then invests all the money into rehabilitating his native village affected by Dharma Bhiksham. Dharma Bhiksham comes to know about it and rebels against Lakshmi Narasimha. The rest of the story is all about how Lakshmi Narasimha puts an end to the life of Dharma Bhiksham using illegal methods.

title: Current Theega
cast: Manchu Manoj|Jagapati Babu|Rakul Preet Singh|Vennela Kishore|Tanikella Bharani
overview: Shiva Rama Raju, a noted good Samaritan in Parvatipuram who has a bet with Veerraju in the same village that "if any of his 3 daughters fall in love he will either kill them or cut down his ears" and he takes a vow that he will marry off his daughters to the grooms of his choice, neither love marriage nor elopement. Kavita is his third daughter. Raju is a wayward youth who is in deeply in love with an English teacher Sunny in a junior college. Kavita is one of Sunny's students. Raju uses Kavita as courier to love Sunny; as the things proceed, Raju and Kavita fall in love. The rest of the story is all about what happens when they want to get married.

title: Gharana Mogudu
cast: Chiranjeevi|Nagma|Rao Gopal Rao|Shubha|Kaikala Satyanarayana
overview: Gharana Mogudu is a remake of tamil movie Mannan and it is a drama based movie in which, Raju (Chiranjeevi) is a do-gooder who helps his fellow co-workers while working in Visakhapatnam shipyard, but when his mother suffers a paralytic stroke, he moves back to Hyderabad and looks for a job.Uma Devi (Nagma) daughter of industrialist Bapineedu (Raogopal Rao) takes over the business from her father and helps it to reach new heights which also sees her head strongness reach new heights as well. In this scenario, she not only rejects Ranganayakulu

title: Parugu
cast: Allu Arjun|Prakash Raj|Sheela Kaur|Sunil Varma|Saptagiri
overview: A group of friends are forcibly transported to a village and kept imprisoned, as the village head, who believes that they have helped in his daughter's elopement with her lover.

title: Aata
cast: Siddharth|Ileana D'Cruz|Sarath Babu|Brahmanandam
overview: Sri Krishna (Siddharth) grows up watching films playing in the theater in which his father works as a movie-projectionist in a village. Satya (Ileana) is harassed by Vicky (Munna) - son of a politician - who wants to marry her. Satya escapes from home and Sri Krishna falls in love with her the first time he meets her. As the goons and police chase Satya, Sri Krishna protects her and drops her in the house of the politician. He wins Vicky’s confidence. Then, he plays a one sided game with him. At the end, the police that were working with Vicky turn against him and arrest Vicky and his parents. Satya and Sri Krishna get married.

title: Shivangi
cast: Anandhi|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|John Vijay|Koya Kishore Kumar|Akshara Nunna Sujana
overview: A fearless software engineer fights workplace harassment, societal blame, and a murder accusation--only to uncover a dark conspiracy behind her husband's tragic accident.

title: Black
cast: Aadi Saikumar|Darshana Banik|Kaushal Manda|Aamani|Priyadarshi Pullikonda
overview: Aditya is a Police Constable who's life takes a turn when a murder and robbery that take place while he is on duty. Can Aditya manage it all?

title: Khadgam
cast: Srikanth|Prakash Raj|Ravi Teja|Sangeetha Krish|Kim Sharma
overview: After being victims of terrorism, an aspiring actor, a driver and a sincere police officer come together to stop a terrorist from fleeing and put an end to his plans.

title: Sri Ramadasu
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Sneha|Suman Talwar|Archana|Nageshwara Rao Akkineni
overview: Gopanna (Nagarjuna) is a happy-go-lucky guy and marries his childhood love Kamala (Sneha). He secures the job of Tahasildar for Husnabad on the recommendation of his maternal uncles Akkanna and Madanna. He gets inspired by the devotion shown by Dammakka towards Lord Rama and the way she protects the idols of Rama, Seeta and Lakshmana. He becomes a great devotee of Lord Rama over night. He vows that he would stay in open place just like statue of Lord Rama till a temple is constructed. He collects 6 lakhs of coins through donations and constructs Rama temple in Bhadrachalam with the guidance of his guru Kabir Das (ANR). A few ill-minded people misinform emperor Taanisha (Nasseer) that Gopanna misused emperor’s money to construct temple. Meanwhile, Kabir Das confers Gopanna the title of Sri Ramadasu on the insistence of Lord Rama. The rest of the story is all about how Tanisha realizes his mistake and sets Sri Ramadasu free.

title: Rudhramadevi
cast: Anushka Shetty|Rana Daggubati|Allu Arjun|Nithya Menen|Catherine Tresa
overview: Rudraba, daughter of Ganapatideva, the emperor of the Kakatiya dynasty, was officially designated a son through the ancient Putrika ceremony and given the name Rudradeva so that she could succeed her father after his death. Despite opposition, she became of the most prominent rulers of the Kakatiya dynasty and one of the few ruling queens in Indian history.

title: Das Ka Dhamki
cast: Vishwak Sen|Nivetha Pethuraj|Rao Ramesh|Hyper Adhi|Mahesh Achanta
overview: Krishna Das, a waiter by profession, falls for Keerthi. His look alike, Dr. Sanjay Rudra, dies in an accident the night before Das loses his job and love. A series of events turn Das's life upside down and he ends up in Sanjay's place. When Das decides he wants to live life large at least for a day, he ends up in circumstances he could not have foreseen.

title: Sundari
cast: Poorna|Arjun Ambati|Rakendu Mouli|Darbha Appaji Ambarisha|Chatrapathi Sekhar
overview: A village girl is married to a software employee who is head over heels with her beauty. Life takes an unexpected turn when her husband loses his job and she is forced to take a few steps that she has to go through an emotional turmoil.

title: Dhee
cast: Vishnu Manchu|Srihari|Genelia D'Souza|Brahmanandam|Chandramohan
overview: Babloo (Vishnu) likes to have fun and is always getting in trouble so his father (Chandramohan) gets him a job with Shanker Goud (Srihari). Shanker Goud and Bhallu are rivals and Bhallu is determined to kill Shanker Goud's sister Pooja (Genelia D'Souza). Babloo falls in love with Pooja but Shanker is planning an arranged marriage for her with Ajay (Akash) so Babloo and Pooja elope. The rest of the story is about how Babloo saves Pooja from Bhallu.

title: Bhairavam
cast: Bellamkonda Srinivas|Manchu Manoj|Nara Rohith|Aditi Shankar|Anandhi
overview: The relationship between three childhood friends begins to crumble as their loyalty is tested.

title: Colour Photo
cast: Suhas|Chandini Chowdary|Sunil Varma|Harsha Chemudu|Divya Sripada
overview: Jayakrishna is a dark-skinned guy who falls head over heels on Deepu but keeps his feelings to himself. As time passes by, a gang in his college beats him up and this issue brings Deepu closer to him. Slowly the friendship turns into love and this does not go well with Deepu’s brother Rama Raju. The rest of the story is as to how the couple reunites after facing several problems.

title: Bhari Taraganam
cast: Sadan|Deepika|Rekha Nirosha|Ali Basha|Sampoornesh Babu

title: Dohchay
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Kriti Sanon|Ravi Babu|Brahmanandam|Jeeva
overview: A conman faces his biggest threat when he is in urgent need for a lump sum and a policeman is after him to catch him red handed.

title: Geethanjali Malli Vachindi
cast: Anjali|Srinivasa Reddy|Satyam Rajesh|Shakalaka Shankar|Satya
overview: A group of boisterous artists come to film a horror movie in a seemingly haunted bungalow but their plans are soon derailed by intercepting ghosts and spirits inhabiting the premises.

title: Aagadu
cast: Mahesh Babu|Tamannaah Bhatia|Sonu Sood|Brahmanandam|Rajendra Prasad
overview: Shankar is an orphan raised by a sincere police officer Raja Rao. In an unexpected situation, Raja Rao's son Bharath kills a kid and Shankar takes the blame, and is imprisoned while Raja Rao warns him not to meet him again.

title: Azaad
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Raghuvaran|Soundarya|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Prakash Raj
overview: Azad (Telugu: ఆజాద్) is a 2000 Telugu film directed by Tirupathi Swamy. It stars Akkineni Nagarjuna in the lead role and Raghuvaran, Shilpa Shetty, and Soundarya in other important roles. C. Ashwini Dutt produced the film and Mani Sharma composed music. The film was released on 29 September 2000 and was dubbed into Hindi as Mission Azaad. The film was later remade into Tamil as Velayudham. The story was inspired from 1989 hindi film Main Azaad Hoon in which Amitabh Bachchan played the lead role of Azaad.

title: Subramanyam For Sale
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Regina Cassandra|Brahmanandam|Ajay|Adah Sharma
overview: Subramanyam and Sita have a chance meeting in the USA. Their act of a husband and wife to win a 'best couple' contest lands them in trouble as they have to continue the act. But the feelings of their families are at stake.

title: Ambajipeta Marriage Band
cast: Suhas|Saranya Pradeep|Shivani Nagaram|Jagadeesh Bandari|Nithin Prasanna
overview: In a small village during the early 2000s, happy twins Mallikarjuna and Padmavati find their lives changing on their 25th birthday.

title: Uppu Kappurambu
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Suhas|Babu Mohan|Shatru|Rameshwari Talluri
overview: A fictional village faces an extraordinary crisis as the cemetery runs out of space. Uproarious chaos ensues as the community rallies together, finding inventive solutions to overcome this unusual predicament.

title: Kantri
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Hansika Motwani|Tanishaa Mukerji|Prakash Raj|Brahmanandam
overview: The opening scenes give you an indication of how the movie is going to shape up. NRI Krishna returns to his village with his wife and child to work for the upliftment of the village folk. However, when the family, along with his old father, is on its way home with the money, PR Pothuraju (Prakash Raj) betrays everyone by killing them and running away with the money, leaving his wife and son behind. Pothuraju is the head of a huge empire and is known for his nefarious connections and illegal dealings. He is supported at every step by his friend and partner Seshu (Ashish Vidyarthi). Enters our hero Kantri (Jr. NTR), who flexes his muscles, shakes his leg, and gets into Pothuraju's gang to earn money for his orphanage where he grew up (he is orphaned at a very young age). Kantri falls in love with Varalakshmi (Hansika Motwani), who is such a lucky girl that she wins a foreign trip, house, and household gadgets for her family. However, she initially does not like Kantri.  Cast

title: Thimmarusu: Assignment Vali
cast: Satyadev Kancharana|Priyanka Jawalkar|Ajay|Brahmaji|Harsha Chemudu
overview: After a cab driver is found dead, a young pub employee is framed for the murder and is sent to jail for 8 years. When he comes out on parole, a young lawyer takes up the case to prove his innocence.

title: Shivam Bhaje
cast: Ashwin Babu|Digangana Suryavanshi|Arbaaz Khan|Tulasi|Murali Sharma
overview: Chandrasekhar, a humble loan recovery agent gets unwittingly entangled into a sinister international conspiracy to cause mass destruction in India. Realizing it's divine orchestration to avert an impending disaster, he stands up to face the dangers.

title: Masooda
cast: Sangeetha Krish|Bandhavi Sridhar|Thiruveer Reddy|Subhalekha Sudhakar|Satyam Rajesh
overview: A mother and her teen daughter from a middle-class background, whose humble life goes upside down, when the daughter gets possessed by a ghost and her single mother seeks the help of their cowardly neighbour.

title: Solo Brathuke So Better
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Nabha Natesh|Rajendra Prasad|Naresh|Rao Ramesh
overview: Virat is a new-age baba with a book of slokas that recite how singlehood is the best way of life and a bunch of loyal followers. But what happens when he gets a taste of his own medicine?

title: Oxygen
cast: Gopichand|Raashii Khanna|Anu Emmanuel|Shaam|Jagapati Babu
overview: Krishna arrives in India to get married to Shruti, but when Krishna saves her father from an attack, it is revealed he has a hidden agenda.

title: Srikakulam SherlockHolmes
cast: Vennela Kishore|Ananya Nagalla|Siya Gautham|Ravi Teja Mahadasyam|Muralidhar Goud
overview: A string of beach murders rocks a coastal town, prompting police to hire a meticulous private eye. His investigation zeroes in on seven suspects, including a village couple, after a young girl's killing sparks public outcry.

title: Amma Nanna O Tamila Ammayi
cast: Ravi Teja|Asin Thottumkal|Jayasudha|Prakash Raj|Subbaraju
overview: Chandu is very passionate about kickboxing and his life revolves around his mother and his girlfriend. His life is shattered when his dying mother asks him to meet his estranged father Raghuveer.

title: Chi La Sow
cast: Sushanth|Ruhani Sharma|Vennela Kishore|Anu Hasan|Rahul Ramakrishna
overview: While Arjun doesn't want to get married, his parents set up a blind date for him at his place. The story revolves around Arjun, how he falls for the girl he's about to meet, why and how he changed his decision to get married.

title: Oohalu Gusagusalade
cast: Naga Shaurya|Raashii Khanna|Srinivas Avasarala|Posani Krishna Murali|Prudhviraj
overview: Venky, who aspires to become a newsreader, must face the challenges posed by his boss, Uday. Things get worse when Uday seeks Venky's help to woo a girl in return for his desired post.

title: Hathya
cast: Dhanya Balakrishna|Pooja Ramachandran|Ravi Varma
overview: In Telugu State, influential politician J.C. Dharmendra Reddy is brutally murdered in his residence. Fearless cop Sudha takes on the case, diving into a web of secrets, deception, and lies. Can she uncover the truth, or will the system thwart her pursuit of justice?

title: Chinna Kodalu
cast: Vani Viswanath|Prabhakar Reddy
overview: A blind man, his merciless wife, their sheepish sons and stony-hearted daughter torture the eldest daughter-in-law, who is naive. But things change when the youngest son gets married to an orphan. Seeing this, she decides to teach them a lesson and make them mend their ways.

title: Alluri
cast: Sree Vishnu|Kayadu Lohar|Tanikella Bharani|Madhusudhan Rao|Suman Talwar
overview: Iqbal, the son of a retired police constable, is keen to become a cop too but fails to take charge of his ambition. In need of motivation, Iqbal’s father sets his son on a mission to trace the journey arc of an inspirational police officer, Alluri Sita Rama Raju. The journey takes Iqbal to Kothavalasa, Dharakonda, Vizag and Hyderabad, all the places where Alluri discharged his duties and left an indelible mark on eliminating corruption and crime.

title: Mass
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Jyothika|Rahul Dev|Charmy Kaur|Raghuvaran
overview: Mass, an orphan, bonds well with his landlord's son, Adi, who is in love with a mafia head's daughter. Attempting to separate the lovers, the gangsters kill Adi and Mass sets out to seek revenge.

title: Chikati Gadilo Chithakotudu
cast: Thrigun|Nikki Tamboli|Bhagyashree Mote|Sayantani Guhathakurta|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: A comedy drama film directed by Santhosh P Jayakumar, starring Adith Arun in the lead role.

title: Dhammu
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Trisha Krishnan|Karthika Nair|Kota Srinivasa Rao|Chalapathi Rao
overview: Rama Chandra, an orphan, gets involved in a feud between two royal families while trying to woo Sathya, his lady love. He soon realises that the lives of his fellow villagers depend on his choices.

title: Appudo Ippudo Eppudo
cast: Nikhil Siddhartha|Rukmini Vasanth|Divyansha Kaushik|Harsha Chemudu|John Vijay
overview: Rishi falls in love with a girl named Tara, a budding racer, due to a mistake made by his friend Yaji... Rishi and Tara who were meant to be close get separated. Rishi works as an intern in the racing circuit in London due to the suggestion given by Yaji.

title: Kick
cast: Ravi Teja|Ileana D'Cruz|Shaam|Brahmanandam|Sayaji Shinde
overview: Kalyan is a kind of guy who prefers a life full of thrills than leading a regular life style. He seeks kick in whatever he does. He finds liking in Naina. They separate due to differences. Krishna is a young cop who is in lookout for a big ticket thief who happens to be Kalyan. Meanwhile, Naina agrees for an engagement with Krishna. The rest of the story is all about how Kalyan wins back his lady love and the real intent behind the robberies of Kalyan.

title: Chitralahari
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Nivetha Pethuraj|Brahmaji|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: Vijay is a down-on-luck mechanical engineer who’s looking for that big break in life. Both his personal and professional lives are a mess; will he ever catch a break?

title: Srinivasa Kalyanam
cast: Nithiin|Raashii Khanna|Nandita Swetha|Prakash Raj|Jayasudha
overview: The film highlights the sacred bond with another human being through nuptial rituals and the sanctity of the institution of marriage.

title: Bommarillu
cast: Siddharth|Genelia D'Souza|Prakash Raj|Jayasudha|Kota Srinivasa Rao
overview: Siddu is the son of an over-protective business man. Every decision of his is made by his father, which leads him into frustration. He half-heartedly agrees to become engaged to a rich man's daughter, but then falls for a middle-class man's daughter called Haasini. The film focuses on his realization that he has to stand on his own and come out of his father's protective shell - and try to succeed in love.

title: King
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Trisha Krishnan|Srihari|Mamta Mohandas|Brahmanandam
overview: After Coimbatore-based Ravichandra Verma passes away, his young son, Raja, assumes the responsibility of running the family business as well as ensuring that his brother, Ajay, gets a good education - much to the chagrin of three of his uncles. Years later, while on a trip to Uttaranchal, despite of warnings from a Pandit, he gets killed by a female assassin, but his family is informed that he is missing. Shortly thereafter, Gyaneshwar Kale and his sister, Sravani/Shivani, will inform the family that Raja is still alive but is handicapped and suffers from memory loss. The family is overjoyed but are not aware that Raja is actually a hoodlum/extortionist known as Bottu Seenu/Raghu Rokda.

title: Yuddham Sharanam
cast: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Lavanya Tripathi|Srikanth|Rao Ramesh|Revathi
overview: When his family is torn apart, Arjun sets out to on a journey to solve the mystery and seek revenge.

title: Kotha Bangaru Lokam
cast: Varun Sandesh|Shweta Basu Prasad|Prakash Raj|Jayasudha
overview: Balu is son of lovable middle-class couple. Swapna is the daughter of a strict and rich father. Both of them study in a residential college located at a small town of Godavari district. Balu and Swapna fall in love. Swapna is withdrawn from the residential school because her father comes to know about her love. The rest of the story is all about how Balu and Swapna try to get back to each other.

title: Good Luck Sakhi
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Aadhi Pinisetty|Jagapati Babu|Rahul Ramakrishna|Gayatri Bhargavi
overview: Sakhi is known in her village as ‘bad luck Sakhi’ due to the misfortune she seemingly brings to whomsoever comes in her path. What happens when two men play catalysts to changing her destiny?

title: Dwaraka
cast: Vijay Deverakonda|Pooja Jhaveri|Prakash Raj|Prudhviraj|Surekha Vani
overview: A petty thief gains great wealth by pretending to be a baba. However, he has a change of heart after falling in love but finds himself getting pushed deep into the world of crime.

title: Namo Venkatesa
cast: Venkatesh|Trisha Krishnan|Brahmanandam|Chandramohan|Mukesh Rishi
overview: Venkata Ramana (Venkatesh) is a ventriloquist. He goes along with the troop of artists to perform for a local Telugu association in Europe. Paris Prasad (Brahmanandam) is a tour organizer in Europe. He enjoys making people around bakras. Pooja (Trisha) is the niece of Prasad. Venkata Ramana falls in love with her. Prasad realises that only way to make Ramana bakra is to tell him that Pooja loves him too. Pooja is the daughter of a rich factionist in Rayalaseema and she is forced to return back in the middle. Her marriage is fixed with a guy she doesn’t like. The rest of the story is all about how Prasad conspires with Ramana to rescue Pooja.

title: Prati Roju Pandaage
cast: Sai Durgha Tej|Raashii Khanna|Rao Ramesh|Sathyaraj|Naresh
overview: Raghu Ramayya is a man with limited time to live. His children, who all live elsewhere, struggle to schedule their time around his death. But what happens when his grandson Saitakes it upon himself to give his grandfather the farewell he deserves?

title: Ullasanga Utsahanga
cast: Yasho Sagar|Sneha Ullal|Chandramohan|Sudha|Surekha Vani
overview: Dhanalakshmi, who is in love with Balaji, runs away when her family tries to get her married to another man. However, her life takes a turn when she meets Arvind, who falls in love with her.

title: Veera
cast: Ravi Teja|Kajal Agarwal|Ali Basha|Taapsee Pannu|Sridevi Vijayakumar
overview: Veera Venkata Satyanarayana aka Veera is the son of a landlord. But his step mother and step sister stay in city away from them. Meanwhile, his father gets killed from a goon and Veera too murders him. However, a big industrialist plans for a power project in their village and wants to vacate the entire village and takes the help of a local don Rayudu. But Veera halts their efforts. At this juncture, Veera marries Kabaddi Chitti and his brother marries the daughter of commissioner of police.....

title: The Ghost
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Sonal Chauhan|Gul Panag|Anikha Surendran|Ravi Varma
overview: An ex-Interpol officer wreaks havoc and sends shock waves across the global underworld but goes missing in action, only to remerge years later, for his beloved family.

title: Katamarayudu
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Shruti Haasan|Rao Ramesh|Ali Basha|Ajay
overview: A violent man Rayudu tries to redeem himself to impress the love of his life, until he gets pushed into a situation that forces him to act.

title: Pindam
cast: Srikanth|Kushee Ravi|Easwari Rao|Srinivas Avasarala|Ravi Varma
overview: A powerful spirit that had never seen the face of earth, begins to threaten the life of a six-year-old girl with speech impairment. It's up to Annamma, the only demonologist, to rescue the family and uncover the spirit's true intentions.

title: Nenu.. Sailaja...
cast: Ram Pothineni|Keerthy Suresh|Sathyaraj|Naresh|Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat
overview: Hari (Ram), a DJ in Vizag, proposes to many girls none of them accept his love. One day he sees a beautiful girl Sailaja (Keerthi Suresh) and also impresses her but doesn't propose to her fearing that he would be rejected. Hari spends some good times with Sailaja and right when he proposes his love, she rejects him point blank. An upset Ravi continues with his life and as time passes by, he gets a huge clue which could help him getting back his love.

title: Atharintiki Daaredi
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Pranitha Subhash|Boman Irani|Nadhiya
overview: Goutham promises his grandfather that he will reunite him with his estranged daughter, Sunanda. Posing as a driver, Goutham enters Sunanda's house but trouble soon follows.

title: Goutham Nanda
cast: Gopichand|Hansika Motwani|Catherine Tresa|Chandramohan|Seetha
overview: Goutham is a billionaire and his father gives him a year’s time to enjoy his life to the fullest. The deal between the two is that after a year, he’ll take over his father’s businesses. The catch is that, beneath his seemingly perfect life, Goutham is clueless about what happiness or hunger feels like. On the other hand, Nanda, who hails from a lower-middle class background, wants to die rich and his father keeps criticising his aspirations.One fine day, Goutham and Nanda bump into each other, and since both of them are quite vexed up with their respective lives & they decide to swap their places to lead a new life for 30 days.

title: Nuvvila
cast: Yami Gautam|Remya Nambeesan|Vijay Deverakonda
overview: Nuvvila is the story that revolves around three guys and girls on same age. We will get introduced to three characters and three girls with having their respective problems.  Anand (Ajay) who is a graduate thinks about doing job or to continue studies further. In this dilemma, he will be idle for one year and mean while, he falls for his neighbor archana (yami). Everything goes well for him until he came to know that archana is in love with a cricketer Vishnu.  And the next guy Mahesh (Hayish) dream of becoming an aspiring model. He faces several problems in his way to accomplish his dream.  Coming to the third character Raja (Prasad) is a guy who wants to become a musician. He always thinks his classmate Rani as sign of bad luck for him. But to the funny, he marries that girl in an unavoidable situation.  Whether these three guys achieved their dreams forms the final crux….

title: Mishan Impossible
cast: Harsh Roshan|Bhanu Prakashan|Jayateertha Molugu|Taapsee Pannu|Ravindra Vijay
overview: Three little kids from Vadamalapeta want to hunt down Dawood Ibrahim and claim prize money. An investigative reporter and her sidekicks want to bring down a child trafficking nexus. How does this motley crew cross paths?

title: Iddarammayilatho
cast: Allu Arjun|Amala Paul|Catherine Tresa|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani
overview: A young woman becomes embroiled in a financial and political conspiracy while studying in Spain, as she meets a young musician with a somewhat dark past unfolded through the pages of his lover's diary.

title: Gudumba Shankar
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Meera Jasmine|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Brahmanandam|Sayaji Shinde
overview: Gudumba Shankar falls in love with Gowri and finds out that she is being forced to marry Kumar Swamy, a gangster.  Shankar tricks Kumar Swamy and gets married to Gowri.

title: Sardaar Gabbar Singh
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Kajal Agarwal|Sharad Kelkar|Brahmanandam|Ali Basha
overview: Gabbar Singh arrives at the empire of Rathanpur to save the princess and the civilians from the ruthless criminal Bhairav Singh.

title: Anaganaga Oka Raju
cast: Naveen Polishetty|Meenakshi Chaudhary
overview: Upcoming Family Entertainer Starring Naveen Polishetty & Meenakshi Chaudhary

title: Konchem Ishtam Konchem Kashtam
cast: Siddharth|Tamannaah Bhatia|Prakash Raj|Ramya Krishnan|Brahmanandam
overview: Geeta's father disapproves of her relationship with Siddhu as he isn't too pleased with the fact that the latter's parents are divorced. Determined to marry Geeta, Siddhu promises to reunite his parents.

title: Ugram
cast: Allari Naresh|Mirnaa|Sharath Lohitashwa|Shatru|Indraja
overview: CI Shivakumar,a brash police officer, handles a lot of missing cases which has caused great strain on his marriage life. After a serious accident,Shiva admits his wife Aparna and daughter Lucky in hospital, only to find them missing next day. Will Shiva solve the mystery despite suffering from a serious medical condition?

title: Vishwambhara
cast: Chiranjeevi|Trisha Krishnan|Ashika Ranganath|Kunal Kapoor|Meenakshi Chaudhary

title: Gaalodu
cast: Sudigali Sudheer|Gehna Sippy|Saptagiri|Shakalaka Shankar|Satya Krishnan
overview: Raju, a reckless guy from a village, escapes to Hyderabad after a fight with a local leader’s son. Raju saves  Shukla ,a good hearted wealthy girl  from some thugs. Shukla introduces Raju to her father and hires him as a driver. And so their acquaintance leads to love.

title: Tagore
cast: Chiranjeevi|Shriya Saran|Jyothika|Prakash Raj|Sayaji Shinde
overview: Tagore (Chiranjeevi) creates his own vigilante military network called the Anti-Corruption Force (ACF) that eliminates the most corrupt individuals, from all walks of life, in a systematic manner. As pressure builds on Police and Government to track down the Man who masterminds these killings, Balbir Singh (Puneet Issar), is specially summoned to head the task. He is aided by Suryam (Prakash Raj) who, though being just a constable in the mammoth Police force, is compelled by his instincts to see through the underlying design. Together they unravel the mystery and unveil the phenomenon called Tagore, but not before Badrinaryana (Sayaji Shinde), the human face of evil, finds out that his revelry in the belief of Tagore’s death was a mistake he can never make amends for.

title: Yevade Subramanyam
cast: Nani|Malavika Nair|Vijay Deverakonda|Ritu Varma|Nasaar
overview: A corporate man who sets out on a journey of self-discovery and heads to the Himalayas.

title: Kalki Part 2 (Kalki 2898 AD sequel)
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Kamal Haasan|Prabhas|Deepika Padukone|Disha Patani
overview: A sequel to the 2024 Indian epic science fiction film Kalki 2898-AD.

title: Godse
cast: Satyadev Kancharana|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Brahmaji|Prudhviraj|Mathew Varghese
overview: Vyshali, the assistant superintendent of police, is forcefully tasked to deal with unknown kidnapper Godse, who holds some high-profile personalities as hostages. Why did he kidnap them, what are his demands, and what does he want to achieve?

title: Sher
cast: Kalyan Ram|Sonal Chauhan|Mukesh Rishi|Sayaji Shinde|Posani Krishna Murali
overview: Gautham, a young man, gets into the bad books of Pappi, a local thug, by disrupting his marriage. Later, Pappi vows to take revenge from Gautham and threatens to ruin his life at any cost.

title: Sebastian P.C. 524
cast: Kiran Abbavaram|Nuveksha|Komalee Prasad|Rohini|Srikanth Iyengar
overview: Sebastian is a police constable suffering from night blindness. With the weakness hidden from world, he faces lot of challenges.When a murder takes place on his watch, how will he solve the crime?

title: Asura
cast: Nara Rohith|Ravi Varma|Priya Banerjee|Sree Vishnu|Satyadev Kancharana
overview: The story deals with the ego between a jailor(cop) and the prisoner who is subjected to death.

title: Maro Charitra
cast: Kamal Haasan|Saritha|Madhavi|J.V. Ramana Murthi|P. L. Narayana
overview: A young man and a woman fall in love with each other. However, their parents decide to test their relationship by separating the couple for a year.

title: Ek Niranjan
cast: Prabhas|Kangana Ranaut|Sonu Sood|Mukul Dev|Venu Madhav
overview: A bounty hunter searches for the family he was separated from as a child, and falls in love with the sister of a gang member.

title: Gam Gam Ganesha
cast: Anand Deverakonda|Pragati Srivastava|Nayan Sarika|Vennela Kishore|Satyam Rajesh
overview: During a Ganesh Chaturthi celebration, Ganesh, a small-time thief decides to take up a big heist that goes awry, leading to a comical clash with Rudra and his boss Kishore Reddy, who are also searching for a valuable item amidst the festive chaos.

title: Anveshana
cast: Bhanupriya|Karthik Muthuraman|Kaikala Satyanarayana|Sarath Babu|Rallapalli Narasimha
overview: An officer investigates a series of killings, allegedly by a man-eating tiger in the forest. However, his findings reveal the truth about a sinister serial killer.

title: Pottel
cast: Yuva Chandraa|Ananya Nagalla|Noel Sean|Ajay|Priyanka Sharma
overview: An underprivileged villager and a victim of caste-driven politics in his village, forced to run away with his daughter Saraswati, but returns after undergoing a spiritual reincarnation, which in turn changes how the village receives him.

title: Anji
cast: Chiranjeevi|Namrata Shirodkar|Tinnu Anand|Nagendra Babu|M. S. Narayana
overview: The Aatmalingam of the Himalayas possesses enormous divine powers. Once every 72 years, the Akasa Ganga from the sky flows into Aatmalingam. Those who drink Akasa Ganga 's holy water become immortal and gain supernatural powers.

title: Aarambham
cast: Mohan Bhagath|Surabhi Prabhavathi|Bhooshan|Supritha Sathyanarayana|Ravindra Vijay
overview: Prisoner No. 299 is on the death row at Kalaghati Jail, One night before his death penalty, He vanishes from his cell.  Chaitanya & Madhav are the detectives assigned to this case and with no clue left other than a diary written by Miguel, they should solve this mystery and find out where is miguel gone

title: Falaknuma Das
cast: Vishwak Sen|Harshita Gaur|Tharun Bhascker|Saloni Mishra|Uttej
overview: A group of youngsters headed by Das attempt to monopolise the meat business in Falaknuma. However, they encounter some unexpected problems, which lead them to the path of crime.

title: Ghaati
cast: Anushka Shetty|Vikram Prabhu
overview: Follows the story of an empowered woman who gets entangled with weed trade due to circumstances.

title: Manmadhudu 2
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni|Rakul Preet Singh|Vennela Kishore|Rao Ramesh|Lakshmi
overview: Under pressure to marry, a perennial bachelor hires a much younger woman to act as his fiancée, but her bond with his family throws his plan for a loop.

title: Kalisundam Raa
cast: Venkatesh|Simran|K. Viswanath|Ranganath|Srihari
