overview: Thampan and Antony are a long time best friends and business partners who owned a saw mill at Kattappana in the past. A family tragedy and its falling-out separates them for good. But now Antony and his family faces a grievous situation, and he is forced to ask his old friend for a help out. The timeline of the story spans over two generations

title: Kondal
cast: Antony Varghese|Gauthami Nair|Raj B Shetty|Shabeer Kallarakkal|Sarath Sabha
overview: Manuel had to leave Munambam Harbour to work on St. Anthony's boat due to a serious problem in his hometown, Anchuthengu. Unexpected events on the boat changes the lives of Manuel and the people working there.

title: Joji
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Baburaj|P N Sunny|Unnimaya Prasad|Basil Joseph
overview: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

title: Philips and the Monkey Pen
cast: Sanoop Santhosh|Jayasurya|Remya Nambeesan|Dhiya Zelen|Gourav Menon
overview: The film revolves around an eight-year old called Ryan Philip and his adventures with a magical pen called the Monkey Pen.

title: Chandralekha
cast: Mohanlal|Pooja Batra|Sukanya|Nedumudi Venu|Innocent
overview: An unemployed man saves a rich woman and takes her to the hospital where her relatives mistake him as her husband. He plays along as he needs money to repay a loan.

title: Oru Yamandan Premakadha
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Nikhila Vimal|Samyuktha|Salim Kumar|Suraj Venjaramoodu
overview: Lallu, a happy-go-lucky person who loves to hang out with his friends, is in pursuit of true love. One day, he finds a photo of a missing woman, Diya, in the newspaper and feels a spark.

title: Kooman
cast: Asif Ali|Renji Panicker|Baburaj|Jaffer Idukki|Hannah Reji Koshy
overview: The story takes place in a hilly village on the Kerala-Tamil Nadu border. The story is about a strict police officer who relocates there and the subsequent events that turn his and many other's lives upside down associated with that police station. Few normal incidents happen in the village, and some from the past suddenly appear to be abnormal. The secrets slowly start unfolding.

title: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
cast: Biju Menon|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Anil Nedumangad|Ranjith|Gowry Nandha
overview: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

title: Super Zindagi
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Mukesh|Parvatii Nair|Johny Antony|Suresh Krishna
overview: Story of two men, Sidharthan and Mujeeb, while Sidhu is a loafer whose only goal is to become extremely rich without any struggle and hence dreams up grand schemes for a business that will fetch him crores, Mujeeb is a successful “businessman” who occasionally earns big bucks through shady deals, thanks to his “well-placed connections”.

title: James and Alice
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Vedhika|Sijoy Varghese|Saikumar|Parvatii Nair
overview: James is a hardworking filmmaker in advertising and his girlfriend Alice works in banking. Against their parent's wishes, the two marry and the movie revolves around the misunderstandings between them caused by their busy lifestyles. Things take a turn when James meets with a freak car accident.

title: Parava
cast: Amal Shah|Govind V Pai|Shane Nigam|Dulquer Salmaan|Siddique
overview: The story of Parava revolves around pigeon race, a game, which is prominent in Mattancherry, Kochi, Kerala.

title: Swaha
cast: Sona Maria Abraham|Avinash|Mamukkoya|Kollam Thulasi|Kannur Sreelatha
overview: Set in the background of a village and city, Sreedevi, a woman good at heart gets married to a Unn who was born in a noble family. As she didn't know that the marriage was a trap, she had to suffer a lot. During the life journey, Sreedevi had to face many difficulties.

title: Nakhakshathangal
cast: Monisha Unni|Vineeth Radhakrishnan|Saleema|Thilakan|P. Jayachandran
overview: The story is about Ramu (Vineeth), a 16-year-old boy who is staying with his annoying uncle, who gets angry and often treats Ramu like a slave. On a trip to the pilgrim town of Guruvayoor with his uncle (played by Thilakan), Ramu meet 15 year old Gouri (Monisha), who has come with her grandmother. Both find love, and after sharing a few tender talks and moments depart without a clue that they will meet again. When back Ramu runs away from his uncle and lands up in the city with his neighbor namboothiri (played by P Jayachandran). As fate would have it, Ramu and Gouri meet again. Good conduct and intelligence of Ramu gets noticed and he is asked by a lawyer to stay in the house, where Gauri is a maid. The lawyer's deaf and dumb daughter Lakshmi (Saleema) gets attracted to Ramu and the lawyer fixes the marriage without asking Ramu. The triangle love story leads to a sad ending.

title: Neru
cast: Mohanlal|Priyamani|Anaswara Rajan|Siddique|K. B. Ganesh Kumar
overview: 'Neru' is an enthralling legal and emotional drama that delves into the life of Sara, a blind sculpture artist on a quest for justice following a harrowing incident.  Against the backdrop of the Indian legal system, this gripping story takes viewers through a rollercoaster of emotions, unveiling layers of deceit and ultimately exploring themes of redemption.

title: Ustad Hotel
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Thilakan|Nithya Menen|Siddique|Mamukkoya
overview: When his father refuses to support his choice of a career, an aspiring chef tries to fulfil his dream by helping his grandfather run his small eatery.

title: Varathan
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Sharafudheen|Dileesh Pothan|Arjun Ashokan
overview: After losing his job, Aby and his wife, Priya, move back to the latter's family estate in Kerala. However, things go from bad to worse for the couple as they encounter a new set of challenges..

title: Amen
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Indrajith Sukumaran|Kalabhavan Mani|Swathi Reddy|Joy Mathew
overview: Solomon, who belongs to a band, is in love with Soshanna, who hails from an upper class family. The story spells how Solomon manages to win over all the obstacles to marry Soshanna.

title: Sthanarthi Sreekuttan
cast: Aju Varghese|Johny Antony|Saiju Kurup|Ganga Meera|Kannan Nayar
overview: Sthanarthi Sreekuttan (Candidate Sreekuttan) is a story of four mischievous students in K.R Narayanan U.P school. Story revolved around the conflict between the protagonist Sreekuttan, and Ambadi, who is a bright student in the class.

title: Churuli
cast: Vinay Forrt|Chemban Vinod Jose|Jaffer Idukki|Geethi Sangeetha|Joju George
overview: Two cops undercover trailing a fugitive enter a hamlet inside a dense forest. At every turn, they encounter a mysterious character who further misleads them into new labyrinths.

title: Jallikattu
cast: Antony Varghese|Chemban Vinod Jose|Sabumon Abdusamad|Santhy Balachandran|Jaffer Idukki
overview: An escaped buffalo triggers a frenzy of ecstatic violence in a remote village.

title: Vandanam
cast: Mohanlal|Girija Shettar|Nedumudi Venu|Mukesh|M G Soman
overview: Professor Kurian Fernandez escapes from jail with his cellmate Raghu. Inspectors, Unnikrishnan and K.Purushothaman Nair are sent to track him down. They follow Kurian Fernadez's daughter to track him.

title: Pulimurugan
cast: Mohanlal|Jagapati Babu|Lal|Vinu Mohan|Bala
overview: Murugan, with his tools and expertise, protects Puliyoor's villagers from deadly tiger attacks. However, Daddy, an illegal drugs dealer, takes advantage of Murugan's innocence and wrongly frames him.

title: Bheeshma Parvam
cast: Mammootty|Soubin Shahir|Sreenath Bhasi|Shine Tom Chacko|Nadhiya
overview: Set in the backdrop of 1980s, Micheal helms his influential family in Kochi, inspiring fear and respect through his unnerving past. When a few younger members in the household feel his power over their lives too are aggravating, they join hands with foes to clamp down on him. And the story follows what’s in store for them.

title: Twenty 20
cast: Mohanlal|Mammootty|Suresh Gopi|Jayaram|Dileep
overview: Advocate Ramesh saves Devan from a murder case. Later, he realize Devan was the actual culprit. Ramesh tries for a payback, unaware of Devan's real intentions and the reason for the murder.

title: Nizhal
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Nayanthara|Saiju Kurup|Izin Hash|Shersha Sherief
overview: A First class judicial Magistrate comes across an 8 year old boy-Nithin & his murder stories. Do they have real life connection?

title: Salute
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Diana Penty|Manoj K Jayan|Lakshmi Gopalaswamy|Saniya Iyyappan
overview: Committed and fiery, Sub Inspector Aravind Karunakaran is obliged to be part of an investigation where an innocent man Murali is deliberately being set up for the murder of a middle-aged couple. Fearing the consequences of revealing that they had deliberately framed Murali, the team refuses to investigate it further and let go of the man that they had arrested. Will they find the one responsible?

title: Thalavan
cast: Biju Menon|Asif Ali|Miya George|Anusree Nair|Dileesh Pothan
overview: The intense rivalry between two police officers—CI Jayashankar and SI Karthik takes a dark turn when a body is found in Jayashankar’s house, and he becomes the prime suspect in a murder investigation, which is led by Karthik, adding a layer of tension to their already strained relationship.

title: CBI 5: The Brain
cast: Mammootty|Mukesh|Jagathy Sreekumar|Saikumar|Renji Panicker
overview: Series of bucket-killing murders happening in the city. Failure to resolve by police, a team of CBI Officers under CBI officer Sethurama Iyer take up the investigation to resolve the never experienced mystery.

cast: Tovino Thomas|Kunchacko Boban|Narain|Asif Ali|Lal
overview: A disaster film set during the 2018 Kerala Floods where people from all walks of life faced catastrophic consequences and put in collective efforts to survive the calamity.

title: Big B
cast: Mammootty|Nafisa Ali|Manoj K Jayan|Bala|Sumit Naval
overview: Four brothers try to find the mystery behind the murder of woman who raised them.

title: I Am Kathalan
cast: Naslen|Anishma Anilkumar|Dileesh Pothan|Lijomol Jose|Vineeth Vasudevan
overview: How many servers would you hack for love? What started as a silly attempt to win back his girlfriend turns into a dangerous game of revenge for Vishnu, risking everything he cherishes.

title: Hallo
cast: Mohanlal|Parvati Melton|Madhu|Siddique|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: Hello movie is about Shivaraman (Mohanlal) who is a lazy advocate, popularly called as Shiva. Even though an advocate by profession, he spends more time to booze than to be in court. And at those times, he is a known troublemaker of the city.One of the best friends of Shivaraman is Chandy Kunju (Jagathy Sreekumar) who is a Sivaraman

title: The Great Father
cast: Mammootty|Arya|Anikha Surendran|Sneha|Miya George
overview: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

title: Vikramadithyan
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Unni Mukundan|Namitha Pramod|Anoop Menon|Lenaa
overview: The lives of two boys - one the son of a cop and the other the son of a thief.

title: Lucifer 3: The Beginning
cast: Mohanlal|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Rick Yune

title: Athiran
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Sai Pallavi|Atul Kulkarni|Lenaa|Renji Panicker
overview: In an isolated hospital in the high ranges of Kerala, an autistic patient with special skills piques the interest of a psychiatrist, whose investigation into her past leads to startling revelations

title: Jawanum Mullappoovum
cast: Sshivada Nair|Sumesh Chandran|Rahul Madhav|Devi Ajith|Vinod Kedamangalam
overview: A school teacher and her family and depicts how they overcome the overcome the troubling circumstances thrown at them.

title: Antony
cast: Joju George|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Nyla Usha|Chemban Vinod Jose|Asha Sarath
overview: Antony is a ruthless gangster in a town and has a close-knit group, which includes Ann Maria, a college student trained in MMA. Maria and Antony soon get into trouble due to unforeseen circumstances and they set out to solve the issues in violent ways

title: Annayum Rasoolum
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Andrea Jeremiah|Sunny Wayne|Sija Rose|Ranjith
overview: A taxi driver, Rasool and a salesgirl, Anna fall in love with each other. But soon their union is put to question when Anna persuades Rasool to convert to Christianity.

title: Ittymaani: Made In China
cast: Mohanlal|Honey Rose|KPAC Lalitha|Aju Varghese|Dharmajan Bolgatty
overview: The son of a popular martial arts expert, Manikkunnel Ittymaani is an impulsive man who keeps landing into trouble.

title: Grandmaster
cast: Mohanlal|Priyamani|Arjun Nandhakumar|Babu Antony|Narain
overview: Chandrashekhar lives alone in a dark and violent city. Even with crime occurring all around him, he withdraws from all responsibility and lives quietly. Soon, change is forced upon him in order to catch a serial killer. Like a grandmaster who anticipates his opponents moves well in advance, he proceeds forward. But only once, just once, he makes a fatal mistake.

title: Mikhael
cast: Nivin Pauly|Navani Devanand|Siddique|J. D. Chakravarthi|Suraj Venjaramoodu
overview: A school kid commits suicide after a humiliating incident at school. All hell breaks loose as his brute businessman dad gets obsessed with finishing off all responsible for the same.

title: Aniyathipraavu
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Shalini|Harisree Ashokan|Sudheesh|Janardhanan
overview: Aniyathipravu movie is a wonderful love story. Mini (Shalini) who is the apple of her mother's (KPAC Lalitha) and three brothers (Janardhan,Cochin Haneefa and Shajin)eye. She falls in love with Suddhi (Kunchacko Boban). But when her brothers know about it,hell beaks loose in both the houses.The lovers elope with the help of some friends.But when they are going to get married,they have a small talk and realise that the best thing they can do to prove their love is to go back to their parents.

title: Ayalum Njanum Thammil
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Prathap Pothan|Samvrutha Sunil|Kalabhavan Mani|Remya Nambeesan
overview: Ayalum Njanum Thammil is a story of a committed senior doctor and an irresponsible junior doctor and through their relationship, a picture of the medical profession is drawn vividly. Prathap Pothan portrays the doctor who, by his absolute devotion to his profession, lives a lonely life and Prithviraj appears as the junior doctor.

title: Bannerghatta
cast: Karthik Ramakrishnan|Asha Menon
overview: One night Ashiq, an acting driver comes to know that his sister,who went out of town for a job interview is in a dangerous situation.

title: Naran
cast: Mohanlal|Madhu|Siddique|Jagathy Sreekumar|Innocent
overview: Mullankolli is a rustic remote village in northern Kerala. Velayudhan (Mohanlal) is an orphan who came floating during floods and he was brought up by Valiya Nambiar (Madhu) a do-gooder and a feudal landlord of the area. Velayudhan grows up into a riff-raff, drunkard and a local rowdy with a good heart. He hates injustice and has set his own rules for the villagers who are scared of him including local moneylender and politician - Member Kurupu (Jagathy) and Gopinathan Nambiar (Siddique), son-in-law of Valiya Nambiar who wants to rule over the village in his own way.

title: Aadhi
cast: Pranav Mohanlal|Sharafudheen|Siju Wilson|Siddique|Meghanathan
overview: Aadhi, an aspiring musician, travels to another state in hopes of making it big. While there, an unexpected event leaves him trapped, unable to return to his family and running for his life.

title: Chathikkatha Chanthu
cast: Jayasurya|Navya Nair|Bhavana|Lal|Vineeth Radhakrishnan
overview: Chanthu posts fake love letters to an imaginary girl Vasumathi, so that his landlord's daughter Indira who is in love with him won't pursue him. Things go awry when a real Vasumathi receives the letters and start looking for Chanthu

title: Forensic
cast: Tovino Thomas|Mamta Mohandas|Reba Monica John|Renji Panicker|Mohan Sharma
overview: A forensic analyst and an investigation officer are on a chase to hunt down a gruesome serial killer and crack one of the most famous cold cases in the history of their departments.

title: Aanandam
cast: Siddhi Mahajankatti|Thomas Mathew|Vishak Nair|Arun Kurian|Roshan Mathew
overview: A group of students visit Goa and Hampi while on their college trip. Their experiences during their journey help them understand the intricacies of love and friendship.

title: Ullozhukku
cast: Urvashi|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Arjun Radhakrishnan|Shebin Benson|Alencier Ley Lopez
overview: The film is set in a flooded region in Kerala where a woman and her daughter-in-law attempt to bury a loved one. However, due to heavy floods, the burial is postponed. This delay brings long-buried secrets and lies to the surface, threatening the family's unity.

title: DNA
cast: Raai Laxmi|Babu Antony|Hannah Reji Koshy|Renji Panicker|Raveendran
overview: The film depicts the many efforts of a lovely woman with a tender soul as she conquers a stone-cold man who does not reciprocate her love.

title: Idiyan Chandhu
cast: Vishnu Unnikrishnan|Lenaa|Sminu Sijo|Ramesh Pisharody|Vidhya Vijayakumar
overview: After a toxic childhood under an abusive father. Chandhu became an extremely violent person. But after a point, his aggressive ways become a headache for his family, and he decides to stay away from any sort of violence to keep a promise to his mother. But will that promise hold?

title: Jo & Jo
cast: Mathew Thomas|Naslen|Johny Antony|Nikhila Vimal|Melvin G Babu
overview: Jo & Jo is a coming of age comedy-drama that tells the story of how a few youngsters in a village enjoy their life when the world itself shuts down due to covid19 pandemic and how their life fell apart after an unexpected event happened.

title: Neymar
cast: Mathew Thomas|Naslen|Amala Rose|Vijayaraghavan|Shammi Thilakan
overview: Neymar tells the story of two friends who buy a Dog named Neymar.

title: Urumi
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Prabhu Deva|Genelia D'Souza|Vidya Balan|Nithya Menen
overview: Kelu is a warrior in 16th century Kerala whose father was killed by Vasco da Gama and his troops. Kelu vows to avenge his father's death with the assistance of Vavvali and Ayesha, a warrior princess.

title: Puthiya Mugham
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Bala|Priyamani|Meera Nandan|Sudheesh
overview: Krishnakumar is a resident of an agraharam in Kalpathi. Along with his studies, he pursues a career as a percussionist and teaches the mridangam to local students. He is in love with a girl—the daughter of a family friend. Their relationship is not only approved, but supported by both families.  Kichu moves on to the city of Kochi (Ernakulam) to enroll at an engineering college. The villain - Sudhi - is a senior student and the youngest of three brothers; he pursues a real estate business and routine crimes associated with it. In all his villainous endeavours on the campus he is supported by his brothers.

title: Oppam
cast: Mohanlal|Samuthirakani|Nedumudi Venu|Meenakshi|Anusree Nair
overview: Jayaraman (Mohanlal) is born as a blind man but with heightened senses of smell, sound and touch. He is trained in the martial art of Kalaripayattu. He works as an elevator operator in an apartment where many reputed people live. One day he happens to encounter a murder in a flat. The killer escapes and Jayaraman is charged with the murder. To prove his innocence to the law, Jayaraman must now find and kill the true murderer.

title: Vallyettan
cast: Mammootty|Shobana|Manoj K Jayan|Siddique|Vijayakumar
overview: Madhavankutty is the Valliettan (Big Brother) of the Arackal family. The long lasting rivalry between the Arackal Madhavanunni and Patteri Sivaraman forms the main thread of the story. Madhavanunni along with his four brothers he rules the village. But Sivaraman with the help of Bava develops their plan to trap Madhavanunni.

title: Moothon
cast: Sanjana Dipu|Nivin Pauly|Dileesh Pothan|Roshan Mathew|Shashank Arora
overview: A child from Lakshadweep sets off to Mumbai in pursuit of Akbar, an elder brother who left the island due to his sexual orientation.

title: Jack & Daniel
cast: Dileep|Arjun Sarja|Anju Kurian|Innocent|Saiju Kurup
overview: Jack, a thief who hoodwinks the system and steals black money, is chased by Daniel, a cop intent on catching him. This action thriller portrays a game of cat and mouse that will keep you on tenterhooks!

title: Curry & Cyanide: The Jolly Joseph Case
cast: Jolly Joseph|Renji Wilson|Remo Roy|Rojo Thomas|M. S. Mathew
overview: This true-crime documentary investigates six shocking deaths in the same family and the woman at the center of the unbelievable case: Jolly Joseph.

title: Aaraattu
cast: Mohanlal|Shraddha Srinath|Siddique|Saikumar|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Goparajan / Gopan, a native of Neyyattinkara and a real estate tycoon buys a large piece of land in Chittur for a construction purpose, but on his arrival, he learns that the residents are forcefully and unlawfully evicted from their properties by an Andhra based real estate mafia using illegal land acquisition rules with support from the local authorities and government officials.

title: Sadanandante Samayam
cast: Dileep|Kavya Madhavan|Cochin Haneefa|Siddique|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: This movie is about an ordinary person called Sadanandan played by Dileep who depends on astrology for everything. He comes to know from an astrologer that he is going to die soon. He panics and tries to do everything required for his wife and kids after he expires.

title: Pada
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Vinayakan|Joju George|Dileesh Pothan|Prakash Raj
overview: Based on a true incident, the film is about four men, who call themselves Ayyankali Pada, holding the Palakkad collector hostage demanding tribal land rights.

title: Olympian Anthony Adam
cast: Mohanlal|Meena|Nasaar|Seema|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: Antony Vargheese is a police officer who has been sent to a school as a teacher in disguise, to get details about the notorious Roy Mamman who is behind terrorist attacks in the city. Antony knows Roy Mamman's daughter Rose Mamman is studying in that school, but he does not know which of the kids is Mamman's. During his investigation he meets Angel Mary, a teacher, and attracts her enmity.

title: Mandakini
cast: Althaf Salim|Anarkali Marikar|Ganapathi S Poduval|Vineeth Thattil David|Aswathy Sreekanth
overview: Aromal and Ambili tied the knot.Aromal was really excited and delighted to start a life with Ambili but on that wedding night an unlikely incident happened which will put the entire family in complex situation.

title: Oru Jaathi Jaathakam
cast: Vineeth Sreenivasan|Nikhila Vimal|Mridul Nair|Babu Antony|P. P. Kunhikrishnan
overview: When a girl, supposedly an expert in palmistry, requests Jayesh to display his hand, he eagerly obliges. But when she tells him that this will be the worst time of his life, it surprises him.

title: Big Brother
cast: Mohanlal|Arbaaz Khan|Anoop Menon|Sarjano Khalid|Honey Rose
overview: After getting released for serving a double life sentence, Sachidanandan returns to connect and live with his family until his past catches up to him, forcing him to protect his loved ones.

title: Thanneer Mathan Dinangal
cast: Mathew Thomas|Vineeth Sreenivasan|Anaswara Rajan|Naslen|Shabareesh Varma
overview: A rom-com based in a school where a schoolteacher named Ravi Padmanabhan comes into the lives of Jason and his friends.

title: Devadoothan
cast: Mohanlal|Jaya Prada|Vijayalakshmi|Janardhanan|Murali
overview: Vishal Krishnamoorthy, a renowned music composer and singer, reminisces about his initial struggles and an unknown spirit that inspires him to compose songs.

title: Guruvayoorambala Nadayil
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Basil Joseph|Nikhila Vimal|Anaswara Rajan|Siju Sunny
overview: Vinu, who is still grieving over his breakup from five years ago, develops a strong relationship with Anandan, his prospective brother-in-law, but his attempts to resolve Anandan's problems have some unexpected consequences.

title: Salt N' Pepper
cast: Lal|Shweta Menon|Asif Ali|Mythili|Baburaj
overview: Kalidasan, a foodie, receives a phone call not intended for him. He finds that the person at the other end, Maya, is also fond of food and cooking. Soon they develop feelings for each other.

title: Chithram
cast: Mohanlal|Ranjini|Nedumudi Venu|Poornam Viswanathan|Sreenivasan
overview: A young woman is dumped by her boyfriend just before the wedding as she will not be inheriting any wealth from her father. When the girl's father pays her a visit, she hires a man to act like her husband.

title: applechedikal
cast: Arshed Iqbal|Haniya Nafisa|Raju Ponnurunni|Anishma Anilkumar|Yara Naisam
overview: Unemployed guests constantly pour into Jane's house, mistaking her for the previous tenant, a mystery man. Jane, though unemployed, lives her innocent life, with brief dreams and quiet hopes for her future. Her friend Suleiman, though bankrupt, lives his dynamic life around his fantasies and plans for the future. When the landlord's daughter, the Princess, demands rent from Jane, the unemployed, things are to change forever.

title: Black
cast: Mammootty|Lal|Rahman|Sriya Reddy|Janardhanan
overview: Black movie deals with the underworld operations in Kochi City. Karikkamuri Shanmugham (Mammootty) who is a hit man and a contract killer. David Carlos Padaveedan (Lal) who is a lawyer who masterminds and controls the operations of the underworld in Kochi..David and Shanmugham are friends and Shanmugham does whatever David asks him to do. As a child Shanmugham was picked up from the slums by the local secretary of the Marxist Party (Janardhanan) and put in an orphanage. He grew up without any love and affection and turned out to be a real goonda. He becomes a ruthless and cold blooded killer. As the story goes, Shanmugham was entrusted with the custody of a girl by the party secretary. It turns out to be that the girl is his own daughter.

title: Aaram Thamburan
cast: Mohanlal|Manju Warrier|Narendra Prasad|Priya Raman|Oduvil Unnikrishnan
overview: Jagannathan faces several challenges when he goes to stay in Kanimangalam village. He promises the villagers that he will help in the preparations for the annual temple festival, but will his enemies leave him in peace?

title: Punjabi House
cast: Dileep|Harisree Ashokan|Cochin Haneefa|Mohini|Lal
overview: Unni (Dileep) has many debts and no way to repay them. He decides to commit suicide so that his parents can use the insurance money to repay the debts, but he is saved by a fisherman named Gangadharan (Cochin Haneefa) and his employee Ramanan (Harisree Ashokan). When they notice Unni drowning, Unni pretends to be deaf and mute so that he can fake his death and the insurance money reaches his family. Gangadharan however has a debt of his own, to a Punjabi family of money lenders who have settled in Kerala. He is forced to make Unni and Ramanan to work at their home until he can repay it. A series of interesting events follow after Unni meets Pooja (Mohini) at the house, who is deaf and mute.

title: Action Hero Biju
cast: Nivin Pauly|Joju George|Saiju Kurup|Major Ravi|Anu Emmanuel
overview: Biju is an honest policeman who fights the injustice head-on. In his pursuit to keep things under control and clean, he encounters a series of events and cases which test his authority, honesty and integrity. With a week to his wedding, what ensues is a heartfelt story of a cop sans the cinematic hype.

title: Iyobinte Pusthakam
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Lal|Jayasurya|Vinayakan|Jinu Joseph
overview: Set in the backdrop of the picturesque Munnar, it tells the story of Iyob, a slave-turned-master.

title: Dreams
cast: Suresh Gopi|Meena|Abbas|Rahman|Srividya
overview: The story is about Nirmala Mathan who seeks vengeance on the person who she feels is responsible for the mysterious death of her lover, Shiva. When Shiva dies in mysterious circumstances, Nirmala assumes that Dr. Roy, who wanted to marry her, is behind it.

title: Driving Licence
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Suraj Venjaramoodu|Miya George|Deepti Sati|Adish Praveen
overview: A famous actor needs to renew his driver's licence, and the motor vehicle agent is a fan of his, but a series of misunderstandings causes a great deal of friction.

title: Ishq
cast: Shane Nigam|Ann Sheetal|Shine Tom Chacko|Maala Parvathi|Jaffer Idukki
overview: Two youngsters try to find joy after they lose out on love and their need for a mutual trust to sustain love and happiness.

title: Irul
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Soubin Shahir|Darshana Rajendran|Mashar Hamsa|Jipa John
overview: A dark rainy night, an empty house, a stranded couple and an unknown man. A sleek game of the cat and the mouse starts playing on, as the three of them find a dead body in the basement.

title: Antakshari
cast: Saiju Kurup|Priyanka Nair|Sudhi Koppa|Vijay Babu|Shabareesh Varma
overview: Circle Inspector Das is so obsessed with music that he plays the game of Antakshari with anyone, anywhere; whether it be for fun with his wife or to punish the culprits he arrests. However, things take a turn for the worse when Das has to dance to the tunes of a corrupt politician and a serial killer.

title: Angamaly Diaries
cast: Antony Varghese|Sarath Kumar|Tito Wilson|Bitto Davis|Sinoj Varghese
overview: Six young friends in the small town of Angamaly tries their luck by starting a pork business lead by Vincent Pepe. They initially strike a business deal with Rajan and Ravi despite the duo having killed a close friend of theirs in a gang fight. Vincent is in love with Sakhi and plan to immigrate abroad with her. But their plans hit a road bump as the deal with the gangsters hits some road bumps.

title: Ennu Ninte Moideen
cast: Parvathy Thiruvothu|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Tovino Thomas|Saikumar|Bala
overview: Based on the real life love story of Moideen and Kanchanamala, which happened in 1960s in the backdrops of Calicut.

title: Ram Part I
cast: Mohanlal|Trisha Krishnan|Indrajith Sukumaran|Adil Hussain|Durga Krishna

title: Unda
cast: Mammootty|Shine Tom Chacko|Lukman Avaran|Bhagwan Tiwari|Rony David Raj
overview: SI Manikandan and his police team are dispatched to Basthar, a Maoist area for election duty where they aren't trained to handle the attacks in a territory field filled with land mines while being armed with unnecessary ammunition.

title: Cup
cast: Mathew Thomas|Riya Shibu|Basil Joseph|Guru Somasundaram|Namitha Pramod
overview: The story of a sixteen-year-old boy, a badminton player from a village named Vellathooval in Idukki, who dreams of the Olympics.

title: Unto the Dusk
overview: A journey which takes him on an inward spiritual peregrination.

title: 2 Countries
cast: Dileep|Mamta Mohandas|Aju Varghese|Mukesh|Suraj Venjaramoodu
overview: Ullaas is a cunning guy who can go to any extent for money. One fine day, he cheats a priest and redirects an NRI match which is supposed to go to a known person in his village. He manages everything and finally ties the knot with Laya. The twist in the tale arises when Ullaas comes to know that the NRI girl he married is a complete alcoholic. Rest of the story is as to how Sunil manages to get his problematic wife back on track.

title: Kireedam
cast: Mohanlal|Thilakan|Kaviyoor Ponnamma|Mohan Raj|Sreenath
overview: Sethu aspires to become a police officer to fulfil his father's dream. However, his life turns upside down when he intervenes in a scuffle with a criminal to save his father's life.

title: Ore Mukham
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Aju Varghese|Maniyanpilla Raju|Arjun Nandhakumar|Devan
overview: The story depicts the campus life of the 80s. Zacharia Pothen is a rich and spoiled senior student who is also ruthless and arrogant. He is always accompanied by his friends for whose happiness, Pothen can go to any extent. Pothen and his friends have a lot of fun and experience many exciting events in the course of their campus life. The film is a campus love story with a lot of comic sequences to enjoy the 80s campus life.

title: Varshangalkku Shesham
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Pranav Mohanlal|Nivin Pauly|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Aju Varghese
overview: Set in the 1970s and '80s, a man of many talents and an aspiring filmmaker come together in their shared ambition of making it big in the magical world of cinema. As they struggle with a burning desire to prove themselves, can their friendship survive the test of time?

title: Achayans
cast: Prakash Raj|Jayaram|Unni Mukundan|Amala Paul|Anu Sithara
overview: Three cousins and their best friend leave for a road trip, hoping for one final hurrah before one of them gets married. Their path crosses with that of two girls who are on a getaway of their own. Their plans are derailed after a suspicious death. Who was the killer and why forms the plot.

title: Uyare
cast: Parvathy Thiruvothu|Asif Ali|Tovino Thomas|Siddique|Anarkali Marikar
overview: An aspiring pilot fights for her future -- and justice -- after surviving an acid attack from her abusive boyfriend.

title: Biriyaani
cast: Kani Kusruti|Shailaja Jala|Anil Nedumangad|Thonakkal Jayachandran|Mini I G
overview: The movie chronicles the life of Khadeeja, a married muslim woman confined within the four walls of the household, forced to conceal her desires in the name of religious and societal norms. When fate brings her to an abandoned life, she chooses a different way of financially and sexually liberating herself- to be a sex worker; soon to realize that her soul is still dissatisfied. Finding a new way of hope, she decides to give back to the forces that pushed her to live an orphaned life of humiliation and misery.

title: Indrajith
cast: Kalabhavan Mani|Indraja|Baburaj|Rajan P Dev|Indrans
overview: Bhasi (Kalabhavan Mani) following his father's footsteps moulds himself to be the leader of a powerful gang of goons. The entry of Zaheer Musthafa invites trouble into his life as he soon realizes that not all those who stand by him have the best intentions.

title: Garudan
cast: Suresh Gopi|Biju Menon|Abhirami|Divya Pillai|Jagadish
overview: Harish Madhav a straightforward cop and Nishanth a college professor get entangled in a crime and one has to fight for his integrity and other has to fight for justice.

title: Jacob's Kingdom of Heaven
cast: Nivin Pauly|Renji Panicker|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan|Aima Sebastian|Sreenath Bhasi
overview: Jacob, a successful businessman, is settled in Dubai with his family. He is forced to flee to another country when he ends up with a huge debt as his friend betrays him.

title: Pavithram
cast: Mohanlal|Shobana|Vinduja Menon|Sreenivasan|KPAC Lalitha
overview: A young man's relationship with his career, fiancee and brother is brought under stress by the birth of an unexpected sister.The film deals with the relationship between siblings Unnikrishnan and Meenakshi who have an almost 30 year age difference between them.

title: Her
cast: Urvashi|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Aishwarya Rajesh|Lijomol Jose|Remya Nambeesan
overview: ‘Her’ features five strong, unrestrained female characters, in a hyperlink narrative that celebrates womanhood in all its myriad forms. The story represents today’s women from varied backgrounds coming out of their comfort zones to live life to the fullest.

title: Otta
cast: Asif Ali|Arjun Ashokan|Sathyaraj|Divya Dutta|Rohini
overview: Otta is the thrilling saga of two young men and their unexpected journey towards an unforeseen future. Amidst the tumultuous relationship with their parents, Hari and Ben embark on a personal journey where actions and reactions spiral out of control.

title: Kaaryasthan
cast: Dileep|Madhu|G K Pillai|Akhila|Siddique
overview: Dileep and Salim Kumar play the overseers of two affluent families that have been loggerheads with each other for a long time.

title: Adi Kapyare Kootamani
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Namitha Pramod|Mukesh|Aju Varghese|Neeraj Madhav
overview: The story revolves around a bunch of college students living in a boy's hostel. The story unfolds over a period of four days in the hostel. Problems begin when a young woman enters the hostel.

title: Nanpakal Nerathu Mayakkam
cast: Mammootty|'Poo' Ram|Ashokan|Ramya Suvi|Ramya Pandian
overview: A group of Malayali travellers were returning to Kerala by bus after their visit to Velankanni. They all doze off in a lazy nap after lunch. Like a traveler who forgot his destination, James stops the bus in a village in Tamil Nadu. He starts to speak in Tamil like a native of the place, Sundaram, and behaves like him, confusing all who came with him and the villagers alike. He walks amidst faith, delusion, dream and trance, followed by others.

title: Sooryaputhran
cast: Jayaram|Divyaa Unni|Jagathy Sreekumar|Jagadish|Innocent
overview: When Jeevan is not allowed to adopt a boy from an orphanage for being a bachelor, he convinces a woman to pose as his wife.

title: Hunt
cast: Bhavana|Aditi Ravi|Chandhunadh|Renji Panicker|Nandhu
overview: A student of forensics gets entangled in unraveling the mystery behind the disappearance and murder of a woman with help from the supernatural

title: One
cast: Mammootty|Murali Gopy|Mathew Thomas|Siddique|Joju George
overview: Story of Kadakkal Chandran, the Chief Minister of Kerala whose uncompromising attitude towards corruption and his dictatorial actions has gained him a lot of enemies. The events gets more intense when he faces an allegation.

title: Runway
cast: Dileep|Kavya Madhavan|Murali|Indrajith Sukumaran|Harisree Ashokan
overview: Unni due to financial problems becomes the renowned smuggler Valayar Paramasivam in the Kerala-Tamil Nadu border check post Walayar.

title: Pandippada
cast: Dileep|Prakash Raj|Navya Nair|Harisree Ashokan|Rajan P Dev
overview: The story follows Malayali Bhuvana Chandran, an unsuccessful entrepreneur in a lot of debt, who gets involved in a land conflict between two powerful landlords in Tamil Nadu: Pandi Durai and Karuppayya Swami.

title: Thanmathra
cast: Mohanlal|Meera Vasudevan|Arjun Lal|Nedumudi Venu|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: A man leading a happy life with his loving wife and two children suddenly starts getting forgetful and lost. Then, he is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease leaving his family devastated.

title: Kala
cast: Sumesh Moor|Tovino Thomas|Divya Pillai|Lal|Pramod Veliyanad
overview: The life of Shaji, a laid-back youngster, turns upside down when someone from his past pays him a visit.

title: Valatty
cast: Roshan Mathew|Raveena Ravi|Mahima Nambiar|Vijay Babu|Rohini
overview: Tomy and Amalu are forced to elope when she gets pregnant, against their owners' wishes. As they leave home, they form a friendship with Kari after they are adopted by his owner. But then an agent of an animal testing center captures Amalu. Tomy and Kari must now find and rescue Amalu.

title: Irakal
cast: K. B. Ganesh Kumar|Thilakan|Sukumaran|Srividya|Ashokan
overview: Mathews, a ruthless rubber baron, is involved in various criminal activities. Baby, Mathews' son, begins to turn violent due to the environment he has grown up in, causing Mathews to repent his deeds.

title: Joseph
cast: Joju George|Irshad|Athmeeya Rajan|Dileesh Pothan|Madhuri Braganza
overview: Joseph is a retired police officer with adept investigative skills. He accidentally gets involved in a crime case after his ex-wife’s unexpected demise.

title: Ohm Shanthi Oshaana
cast: Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Nivin Pauly|Renji Panicker|Vineeth Sreenivasan|Aju Varghese
overview: Pooja Mathew, a spirited young girl, wants to have a love marriage in her life. Thus, she stops at nothing to impress Giri, who saved her once from a group of unruly men.

title: Bilal
cast: Mammootty|Manoj K Jayan|Bala|Mamta Mohandas
overview: Sequel to Big B (2007)

title: Phantom
cast: Mammootty|Malavika|Monica|Nishanth Sagar|Lalu Alex
overview: Phantom movie is all about Pailey (Mammootty) has come from Irutupetta, a small village in rural Kerala to Mumbai and made a name for him. He had come originally to Mumbai with the hope of making it big in Bollywood as an actor. But after many failed attempts, he becomes a stuntman who becomes the dupe for big stars. Due to his dare devil stunts he gets the name Phantom Pailey.

title: June
cast: Rajisha Vijayan|Joju George|Sarjano Khalid|Aswathi Menon|Arjun Ashokan
overview: The life story of a girl named June from 16 years of her age until she turned 26, thereby giving an insight into those ten years of her life.

title: Snehithan
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Nandana|Krishna|Preetha Vijayakumar|Cochin Haneefa
overview: The story begins in a register office where Malavika (Nandana) waits for her lover Anand(Krishna) to come and register their marriage. She is accompanied by photographer Joji (Kunchako Boban) to cover the function. But when Anand does not turn up Malavika is forced to go with Joji. Taking sympathy on her, Joji helps her to get a hotel room, which leads to more trouble for them.

title: Malootty
cast: Jayaram|Urvashi|Shamili|KPAC Lalitha|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Five-year-old Malooty is visiting her grandparents' home and ends up falling in a borewell while playing ball with her dog. Her father struggles to rescue her before it is too late.

title: Azhiyatha Bandhangal
cast: Mohanlal|Shobana|Bahadoor|Jagathy Sreekumar|Sumithra
overview: Azhiyatha Bandhangal is a 1985 Malayalam film directed by Sasikumar. The film stars Mohanlal, Shobhana, Srividhya and Prathapa Chandran in lead roles.

title: Satyam, Shivam, Sundaram
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Aswathi Menon|Jagathy Sreekumar|Balachandra Menon|Cochin Haneefa
overview: Sathyam Sivam Sundaram is a Malayalam language film. It was released in 2000. The movie had Kunchacko Boban and Aswathi in the lead roles and Balachandra Menon, Harisree Ashokan, Cochin Haneefa, Machan Varghese, Jagathi Sreekumar etc. in the supporting roles.

title: Swapnakoodu
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Meera Jasmine|Kunchacko Boban|Bhavana|Jayasurya
overview: Kunjoonju, Deepu and Ashtamurthy are studying hotel management at Pondichery. Kunjoonju is a 'Kanjirappally Achayan' who is always after girls. But his 'thrill' for a girl will end the moment he finds that she is interested in him. Abbas ,the trio's friend, arranges the top floor of a house for them to stay. The house is owned by Sophy and she she stays there with her two daughters Kamala and Padma. All three guys fall for Kamala, but Kunjunju and Deepu joins together and push Ashtamurthy out of the race by making him the 'Rakhi Brother' of Kamala. Kamala knows that Kunjunju is a flirt and so she tries to keep away from him. Deepu never tells about his love to Kamala or to Kunjunju, but Ashtamurthy knows about it. Kunjunju and Deepu falls apart after a fight and Ashtamurthy brings them together. The story takes a turn, when Sophy dies and the sisters are left alone

title: Mamangam
cast: Mammootty|Prachi Tehlan|Meghanathan|Unni Mukundan|Anu Sithara
overview: Based on the medieval fair called Mamankam, which was celebrated every 12 years between 800 AD and 1755 AD, the story of the film is supposedly about a brave warrior of Malabar and his loyal soldiers.

title: Sringaravelan
cast: Dileep|Vedhika|Lal|Kalabhavan Shajon|Joy Mathew
overview: Kannan (Dileep) is the son of a fashion weaver Ayyapanashan (Babu Namboothiri). His father has sent him for fashion designing,but Kannan wants to make more money easier. His friends are Yesudas a.k.a Yesu (Lal),a goonda and Vasu (Kalabhavan Shajon).

title: Thuramukham
cast: Nivin Pauly|Nimisha Sajayan|Joju George|Indrajith Sukumaran|Sudev Nair
overview: The Harbour shows how two brothers end up on opposing sides of this system. One becomes the leader of an employer’s gang of thugs, while the other becomes an activist. All the while, the women in their family go hungry and the community is ravaged by violence and alcoholism.

title: Meleparambil Aanveedu
cast: Jayaram|Shobana|Narendra Prasad|Meena|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: A young man marries a Tamil girl, and fearing his family, he brings her to the house as a servant. Problem starts when his elder brothers falls for her too.

title: Sagar Alias Jacky Reloaded
cast: Mohanlal|Bhavana|Manoj K Jayan|Shobana|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: An underworld don who operates internationally, Sagar Alias Jacky had to deal with the likes of Naina (Suman) and Goa based Rozario brothers who want to do away with Sagar.  But each time Sagar with his fearlessness and brilliance in plotting, outplays them. The film starts off very interestingly when Indhu(Shobhana), the daughter of the state chief minister (Nedumudi Venu) calls Sagar to save her husband Manu (Manoj K Jayan) from the clutches of Rozario brothers.

title: Heaven
cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu|Deepak Parambol|Alencier Ley Lopez|Jaffer Idukki|Sudev Nair
overview: Circle Inspector of Police, Peter Kurishinkal is a stoic and taciturn officer, who prefers brain over brawn to solve his cases. His world is brought upside down when he is assigned a sensational case of a homicide.

title: Mallu Singh
cast: Unni Mukundan|Kunchacko Boban|Samvrutha Sunil|Rupa Manjari|Biju Menon
overview: Anil decides to look for his friend Hari who has been missing since seven years. When he finally locates him in Punjab, Hari claims that he is Harinder Singh and has no connection with Kerala.

title: Ee Parakkum Thalika
cast: Dileep|Nithya Das|Harisree Ashokan|Salim Kumar|Cochin Haneefa
overview: Unnikrishnan owns an old bus, received as a compensation for his father's road accident and he is facing lots of consequences due to the pathetic condition of the bus. The plot took a turn when a girl named Basanthi entered the bus as a nomad

title: Ramji Rao Speaking
cast: Saikumar|Mukesh|Innocent|Rekha|Devan
overview: The story revolves around three unemployed people who get involved in a kidnapping saga due to a case of mistaken identity.

title: Kaathal - The Core
cast: Mammootty|Jyothika|R. S. Panicker|Anagha Maya Ravi|Sudhi Kozhikode
overview: Mathew Devassy, a retired bank manager decides to enter local panchayat elections. Unexpectedly, his wife Omana, shocks everyone by filing for divorce, claiming that Mathew is gay.

title: Devaraagam
cast: Arvind Swamy|Sridevi|KPAC Lalitha|Nedumudi Venu|Chippy
overview: Life for Lakshmi turns head over heels when Vishnu  the new priest's son, shows up in her village. Lakshmi is instantly intrigued by the new young man in town, and strives to start a relationship with him. Antics and innocent clashes follow and both of them fall in love. Later, problems arise due to Vishnu's status in society. Meanwhile, Lakshmi's marriage is fixed with her cousin.

title: Adios Amigo
cast: Asif Ali|Suraj Venjaramoodu|Anagha|Shine Tom Chacko|Althaf Salim
overview: A man with financial troubles finds himself on a boozy road trip with a wealthy stranger.

title: Kuttanadan Marpappa
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Aditi Ravi|Shanthi Krishna|Dharmajan Bolgatty|Salim Kumar
overview: When John Paul, a wedding photographer, meets Jessy for the first time, he instantly finds himself attracted to her. His crush eventually turns into love, the feeling which is reciprocated from Jessy's end too. However, their relationship is put to test when an arranged marriage proposition comes their way and everything in their relationships goes for a toss.

title: Natturajavu
cast: Mohanlal|Meena|Kalabhavan Mani|Nayanthara|KPAC Lalitha
overview: Natturajavu movie is all about Pulikattil Charlie who is a tough but easy going guy who owns a quarry and an estate. His late father Pulikattil Mathan has left behind a lot of problems for Charlie. Mathan had created quite a few enemies who are trying to get even with Charlie now.Mathan was a terrible person and practically no one liked him and no one had anything good to say about him even after his death. Charlie is trying to live a low profile life but is forced to sort out the mess created by his late father. He is living with his mother, grandmother and a younger sister Katrina who is an illegitimate child of Mathan.    Charlie had another brother Samuel who committed suicide a while ago due to Mathan

title: Oru Thekkan Thallu Case
cast: Biju Menon|Padmapriya Janakiraman|Nimisha Sajayan|Roshan Mathew|Aswath Lal
overview: Things take a turn as dramatic events unfold after a crime was committed in a village and as the culprit is sought after.

title: The Painted House
cast: K Kaladharan|Neha Mahajan|Akram Mohammed
overview: An old and lonely writer's life is turned around when a young woman comes into his life and one day a uninvited guest comes and makes things more complicated.

title: Madhuram
cast: Joju George|Shruti Ramachandran|Nikhila Vimal|Arjun Ashokan|Indrans
overview: "Love is sweet when it's new, it's sweeter when it's true".The movie mainly focuses on Sabu and Kevin, the two bystanders in the hospital. Sabu waits for his wife"s recovery, and Kevin, for his mother's surgery. Both of them become friends as Sabu's love story helps Kevin realize his mistakes in his marriage life.The movie revolves around the journey of Sabu's love life 10 years back and the journey of Kevin's realization. The movie also highlights other bystanders life story which can be related  to

title: Level Cross
cast: Asif Ali|Sharafudheen|Amala Paul|Prachi Tehlan|Lal Jose
overview: In a desolate desert, a reclusive gatekeeper offers refuge to a mysterious woman fleeing a dark past, leading to an unraveling of secrets and shattered realities.

title: Chenkol
cast: Mohanlal|Surabhi|Thilakan|Kaviyoor Ponnamma|Usha
overview: The sequel to 'Kireedam' (1989), 'Chenkol' continues the story of Sethumadavan, who hopes to regain his lost life after seven years in prison.

title: Kaduva
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Vivek Oberoi|Alencier Ley Lopez|Baiju Santhosh|Samyuktha
overview: The film is set in the late 90s revolving around the life of a young high range rubber planter from Mundakayam and his rivalry with a high ranking officer in the Kerala Police

title: Nayattu
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Joju George|Nimisha Sajayan|Jaffer Idukki|Yama Gilgamesh
overview: Three police officers are forced to go on the run when they get tangled in the death of a youth, a few days before the election.

title: Pranchiyettan & The Saint
cast: Mammootty|Innocent|Ganapathi S Poduval|Priyamani|Sasi Kalinga
overview: While Pranchiyettan, a devotee of St. Francis of Assissi, attains the best of riches, he is unsatisfied with his reputation and sets off to popularise himself as a celebrity in society.

title: Kiss Wagon
cast: Reshma Ramachandran|Jicky Paul|Midhun Murali
overview: In the realm of Mountland, Ms. Isla maintains control through a labyrinthine parcel service system. It’s the only form of order in this chaotic world. As the Atqaba religious festival nears, Ms. Isla is entrusted with the delivery of an unconventional package from an important figure, and its destination is anything but usual. It’s a mission even she feels unsettled by, but her reputation is everything, so she sets off on the perilous journey.

title: Sanchari
cast: Prem Nazir|Jayan|Mohanlal|Sankaradi|K P Ummer
overview: Sanchari is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed and produced by Boban Kunchacko. The film stars Prem Nazir, Jayan, Mohanlal and Adoor Bhasi in lead roles. The film had musical score by K. J. Yesudas

title: Kilukkam
cast: Mohanlal|Jagathy Sreekumar|Revathi|Thilakan|Innocent
overview: Nandini is an illegitimate child who comes to Ooty in search of her father. She meets Joji, a tourist guide, and pretends to be mentally unstable in order to get shelter in his house.

title: Bazooka
cast: Mammootty|Gautham Vasudev Menon|Shine Tom Chacko|Sidharth Bharathan|Gayathri Iyer
overview: A cop and a businessman team up on a mission to capture a serial killer, using a series of elaborate games to track him down.

title: Nandanam
cast: Navya Nair|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Kaviyoor Ponnamma|Revathi|Siddique
overview: Balamani is the housemaid looking after Unni Amma. There are three more housemaids in the house but it is Balamani's duty to look after them too. Balamani is a devotee of Guruvayoorappan (Lord Krishna of Guruvayoor). But she could never visit the Guruvayoor temple, though her house is very near to the temple. Unni Amma's grandson Manu comes to spend a couple of weeks with Unni Amma before he goes to USA. Manu and Balamani fall in love but the whole family is against their union. Will Balamani's friend Guruvayoorappan (Lord Krishna of Guruvayoor) come to their help..?

title: No Way Out
cast: Ramesh Pisharody|Dharmajan Bolgatty|Basil Joseph|Raveena Nair
overview: David and Suju are a newlywed couple,soon expecting a baby. David is knee-deep in debt, gets embroiled in an unforeseen financial dilemma during the lockdown, attempts handling it in his own maniacal ways

title: Diamond Necklace
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Samvrutha Sunil|Gauthami Nair|Anusree Nair|Sreenivasan
overview: Arun is an oncologist based in Dubai who lives life king size without worrying about the future. But he is in trouble when creditors start pestering him and he is restricted within the country.

title: Sadayam
cast: Mohanlal|Maathu|Janardhanan|Kaveri|Murali
overview: Sathyanathan is condemned to death for brutally murdering four persons – two adults and two young girls – and is awaiting his final call. He shows no remorse and is just as cheerful as a man who knows he has done no wrong. In a series of flashbacks, Sathyanathan's story is revealed.

title: CIA: Comrade In America
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Siddique|John Vijay|Soubin Shahir|Karthika Muraleedharan
overview: A young Aji Mathew is a communist who goes the whole nine yards for the ideologies he believes in. When the girl he loves leaves to the US out of the blue and her parents fix her wedding, Aji is left with just a fortnight to reach the country albeit with no passport or visa. How far he is willing to go for love forms the plot.

title: Sexy Durga
cast: Rajshri Deshpande|Kannan Nayar|Bilas Nair|Arun Sol|Baiju Netto
overview: Anxious Durga and her friend, Kabeer are running away from their village at midnight. On the same night there is a huge festival happening at the village temple where Goddess Durga is being worshipped. Devotees are offering their body and mind to please their Goddess. At the same time the woman, Durga, faces complete darkness of the night on the highway. Some drivers offer help to Durga and Kabeer to reach the railway station. Their journey filled with darkness and agony is mystical. Devi Durga is the Goddess of power but what about the woman Durga who is in the midst of darkness?

title: Arabeem Ottakom P. Madhavan Nayarum in Oru Marubhoomi Kadha
cast: Mohanlal|Mukesh|Bhavana|Raai Laxmi|Shakti Kapoor
overview: Madhavan Nair has over the years, finally managed to start leading a comfortable life in Abudhabi, when Meenakshi drops into his life from heaven. Love strikes, and in no time breaks, and a disheartened Nair finds himself lost in the desert along with Abdu, who spells disaster. The duo runs into Eliana , who has been kidnapped, and together they devise a new plan to mint some easy money.

title: Ee.Ma.Yau.
cast: Kainakary Thankaraj|Chemban Vinod Jose|Vinayakan|Dileesh Pothan|Pauly Valsan
overview: Set in Chellanam, Kochi, the story revolves around the death of Vavachan Mesthiri in a coastal village. It showcases the events that unfold between two evenings and looks at death from different perspectives.

title: Rani Padmini
cast: Manju Warrier|Rima Kallingal|Jinu Joseph|Sajitha Madathil|Sreenath Bhasi
overview: Padmini  a traditional married woman who goes to Manali, Himachal Pradesh to meet her car rallyist husband Giri . Rani a North Indian bred troublemaker with feminine qualities running away from a rowdy who has posed threat to her life. As fate would have, they meet together and an illustrious journey starts where they are met with pleasantness, happiness, dread and excitement.

title: Life of Josutty
cast: Dileep|Hareesh Peradi|Jyothi Krishna|Renjini Rupesh|Noby Marcose
overview: Life of Josutty narrates the story of the struggles and life lessons learned by Josutty(Dileep), a simple farmer living in a village in Kerala who migrates to New Zeland after marriage.

title: Eesho
cast: Jayasurya|Jaffer Idukki|Namitha Pramod|Johny Antony|Indrans
overview: While working the night at an ATM, a security guard, who is the prime witness in the case against a powerful industrialist, happens across a mysterious man named Eesho. They engage in a conversation and the guard pours his heart out to the stranger before realising that Eesho may not be a friend. Who is Eesho and what does he want?

title: Masterpiece
cast: Mammootty|Unni Mukundan|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Poonam Bajwa|Mukesh
overview: Edward Livingston, an English professor at the Travancore Maharaja College. As the defiant students continue to split into warring factions, Livingston sets out to restore order and make the campus a better place for everyone.

title: Bhramam
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Mamta Mohandas|Unni Mukundan|Raashii Khanna|Shankar
overview: A pianist pretends to be blind for inspiration, witnesses a murder. He suddenly finds himself in a blind spot with the victim's wife, the murderer. During this ordeal, he loses his eyesight for real. Will his girlfriend believe him?

title: Take Off
cast: Parvathy Thiruvothu|Kunchacko Boban|Fahadh Faasil|Prakash Belawadi|Asif Ali
overview: A group of Malayali nurses stranded in Iraq, must survive their capture by the extremists and reach out to the rescue team headed by the Indian government.

title: Iyer In Arabia
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Mukesh|Shine Tom Chacko|Urvashi|Durga Krishna
overview: When an orthodox father, who disregards history, and a mother with historical awareness and an eye on the future, visit their son in Dubai, a transformative shift occurs.

title: Kilukkam Kilukilukkam
cast: Kavya Madhavan|Kunchacko Boban|Jayasurya|Jagathy Sreekumar|Nayanthara Chakravarthy
overview: Chandini sees her father Krishnadas, Mayor of Cochin being killed by the rivals, but manages to escape from them and comes to Ooty. The needle of suspicion falls on Royichan and friend Appachan. Besides Roy and Appa, Nischal captivated by the beauty of Chandini and try to impress her.Meanwhile Chandini goes missing. Rest of the story is how Jogi comes from foreign and teams up with other to trace and save Chandini.

title: Ravanaprabhu
cast: Mohanlal|Napoleon|Vasundhara Das|Siddique|Vijayaraghavan
overview: Karthikeyan, a liquor baron, sets out to take back his ancestral house which was usurped by Shekharan. To seek revenge, Karthikeyan abducts Shekharan's daughter and ends up falling in love with her.

title: Vellithira
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Navya Nair|Kalabhavan Mani|Sudheesh|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: Counting on superstar Rajnikant's popularity, Raghuram and his motley crew of two, entertain residents of a small town, and gain fame almost overnight. Raghuram starts to call himself 'Style Raj', and decides to become a actor in his own right. He starts to woo local belle, Thatha, the daughter of a blacksmith. But it is only his crew that are aware that this self-styled 'Style Raj' has led a secret lifestyle that is inconsistent with his present background.

title: Operation Java
cast: Balu Varghese|Lukman Avaran|Binu Pappu|Irshad|Shine Tom Chacko
overview: B. Tech graduates Antony and Vinay Dasan are talented, but unemployed. That changes, however, when they approach the cyber cell with a new perspective to a film piracy case.

title: Christopher
cast: Mammootty|Sneha|Amala Paul|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Dileesh Pothan
overview: A maverick, vigilante cop who is forced to misbehave the limits of law when the system fails. It weaves across past and present whilesolving the motives and moral bruises that shape his actions.

title: Nadikar
cast: Tovino Thomas|Soubin Shahir|Bhavana|Dhyan Sreenivasan|Anoop Menon
overview: Follows the life of superstar David Padikkal. David is a good actor but there comes a point in his life when he is forced to look inward to locate his real character.

title: Kottayam Kunjachan
cast: Mammootty|Ranjini|Innocent|KPAC Lalitha|Usha
overview: Kottayam Kunjachan is about an erstwhile thug, who has just been released from jail. He has served a sentence of 7 years, for killing a man in a fight gone bad.After an altercation with his previous employers, he is arrested and later bailed out by his guardian, a Christian priest who found him as an infant in a garbage heap and raised him as his own. Following his father's advice, he leaves Kottayam and its bad influences for Odaangara. He starts a technical institute, accompanied by Bosco, his assistant. He generally endears himself to the village populace. It is there that he meets Mikhael and his wife, and gets in their good books by rescuing Mollykutty from a kidnap attempt by Jimmy and gang. leyamma convinces Mikhael to rent out their outhouse to Kunjachan, as a deterrent from further attacks by Paappan or Jimmy. Mikhael then convinces Kunjachan to go to confession, and start living as a good Christian.

title: Vikruthi
cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu|Soubin Shahir|Surabhi Lakshmi|Vincy Aloshious|Mamukkoya
overview: Mistaking the sleeping passenger on his train for a drunk, a young man posts a picture of him online, unaware of his impulsive act's ugly repercussions.

title: United Kingdom of Kerala
cast: Ranjith Sajeev|Johny Antony|Indrans|Rony David Raj|Sarangi Shyam
overview: A young man builds a youth movement to battle injustice in his town.

title: Ellarum Chollanu
cast: Mukesh|Suman Ranganathan|Jagathy Sreekumar|Saikumar|Maniyanpilla Raju
overview: Ramachandran comes back to his village from Dubai and pretends to be a rich businessman. He is, in fact, the victim of a visa fraud, but tries to turn his fortunes around.

title: Salalah Mobiles
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Jacob Gregory|Santhanam|Siddique
overview: Afzal is happy after his uncle helps him to set up his mobile shop. However, things take an unexpected turn when Azhagarsamy gifts him a virus-infected mobile application.

cast: Mammootty|Madhu|Suresh Gopi|T G Ravi|Seema
overview: The Malabar rebellion, more popularly known as the Mappila Lahala, has a dramatic impact on the lives of everyone involved.

title: Jai Ganesh
cast: Unni Mukundan|Mahima Nambiar|Jomol|Ravindra Vijay|Ashokan
overview: In the unforgiving shadows of sympathy, Ganesh Gangadharan, a paraplegic designer, wrestles with his inner demons, striving for a semblance of normalcy.

title: Kochavva Paulo Ayyappa Coelho
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Rudraksh Sudheesh|Nedumudi Venu|KPAC Lalitha|Muthumani Somasundaran
overview: Ayyappa, a schoolchild, strongly wishes to travel by an airplane. A swimming trainer helps the child achieve his dream through his optimistic and practical ways.

title: Chappa Kurishu
cast: Vineeth Sreenivasan|Fahadh Faasil|Remya Nambeesan|Nivetha Thomas|Roma Asrani
overview: The film revolves around the lives of two people: Arjun (Fahad Fazil), a wealthy man in the construction business in Kochi who has an affair with his subordinate Sonia (Remya Nambeesan), even though he is preparing to be engaged to his family friend's daughter Ann (Roma); and Ansari (Vineeth Sreenivasan), who lives in a slum and works in a supermarket doing odd jobs who is mocked for his appearance and has a crush his co-worker Nafiza (Niveda).

title: Inspector Balram
cast: Mammootty|Geetha|Urvashi|M G Soman|Manjula Vijayakumar
overview: Four years after the events of Aavanazhi, Balaram and Seetha are married with a daughter. When Seetha is killed by Dulabribai's men, Balram sends his daughter to be cared for by nuns along with his partner Madhavan. Balram faces his enemies, including Indira Shankar and Sayed Mohammad Shah, and Preethi avenges her father's death.

title: Praana
cast: Nithya Menen|Dulquer Salmaan|Nani|Kunchacko Boban
overview: A young woman decides to lead a solitary life in an old mansion, where she soon realizes that the nature surrounding her has other plans for her.

title: Guppy
cast: Chethan Jayalal|Tovino Thomas|Sreenivasan|Rohini|Sudheer Karamana
overview: The story revolves around a boy named Guppy(Master Chethan) who finds his living out of rearing and selling the small fish Guppy. Guppy has this dream of buying an automatic wheel chair for his ailing mother (Rohini). Things gets into turmoil when Engineer Thejus Varkey (Tovino Thomas) comes to the seaside village for the construction of a railway bridge. Many unexpected things occur when a small rivalry starts between Guppy and Engineer.

title: Kunjiramayanam
cast: Vineeth Sreenivasan|Dhyan Sreenivasan|Aju Varghese|Mamukkoya|Seema G Nair
overview: Kunjiraman returns from the Gulf intending to settle down in matrimony. But his plans are thwarted by his cousin Laalu and a curse that has gripped the village.

title: Jagratha
cast: Mammootty|Mukesh|Jagathy Sreekumar|Devan|Jose
overview: A renowned actress, Aswathi, is murdered. When a CBI officer, Sethurama Iyer, investigates the case, he unravels a dark secret about Aswathi which brings forth several complexities.

title: Ranam
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Rahman|Isha Talwar|Nandhu|Shyamaprasad
overview: The story of the Indian immigrant community in Detroit, where a garage mechanic gets unwillingly involved in the criminal world as a getaway driver.

title: Dhanam
cast: Mohanlal|Murali|Charmila|Nasaar|Kaviyoor Ponnamma
overview: A young debtor's idea of turning in a group of smugglers for a lump sum amount as a reward goes awry as they set the dogs on him.

title: Detective Ujjwalan
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Siju Wilson|Ameen|Nihal Nizam|Nibraz Noushad
overview: In the village of Plaachikkaavu, a local detective, Ujjwalan, must outsmart a mysterious figure in a deadly battle of wits, where his skills are put to the ultimate test.

title: The King
cast: Mammootty|Murali|Vani Viswanath|K. B. Ganesh Kumar|Vijayaraghavan
overview: The King is a 1995 Malayalam action thriller film. Directed by Shaji Kailas and written by Renji Panicker with Mammootty in the title role as district collector.

title: Thundu
cast: Biju Menon|Shine Tom Chacko|Abhiram Radhakrishnan|Raffi|Baiju Santhosh
overview: A constable aiming for a promotion unexpectedly encounters many problems. Facing the issues with humor and compassion, he works to overcome them.

title: Footage
cast: Manju Warrier|Vishak Nair|Gayathri Ashok|Kiran Peethambaran|Bhanumathi Payyanur
overview: A video blogging couple investigate a woman's strange behaviour and find themselves in grave danger.

title: Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha
cast: Mammootty|Mythili|Shweta Menon|Gowri Munjal|Sreenivasan
overview: In 1950, a young woman named Manikyam was found dead in the village of Paleri. Around 52 years later, Haridas, a private investigator, tries to unravel the truth about her death.

title: Thazhvaram
cast: Mohanlal|Salim Ghouse|Anju Prabhakar|Sumalatha|Sankaradi
overview: A man comes to an isolated valley to take revenge on his friend who murdered his wife.

title: Sunday Holiday
cast: Asif Ali|Aparna Balamurali|Sreenivasan|Lal Jose|Siddique
overview: Mr. Unni Mukundan who is very passionate about his first movie, coincidentally meets Mr. David Paul, a famous movie director. At the same time, the life experiences of Amal, who relocates himself to Cochin from Thalaserry, makes him undergo a total change in his vision of life due to his acquaintance with Nakutti and Rahul, the residents of 'Sargapournami' his home in Cochin. Sunday Holiday is a beautiful story that is replete with comedy.

title: Madura Raja
cast: Mammootty|Jai Sampath|Siddique|Vijayaraghavan|Nedumudi Venu
overview: When an illegal hooch baron's reign of terror troubles an entire village, the people turn to the only man who can save them: Raja, the flamboyant don with a heart of gold.

title: The Don
cast: Dileep|Lal|Gopika|Saikumar|Shammi Thilakan
overview: Kasim is a mafia boss and Unnikrishnan becomes his most trusted man. Later, when Kasim is found murdered, Unnikrishnan is charged with the crime and must prove his innocence.

title: Rathinirvedam
cast: Shweta Menon|Sreejith Vijay|Maniyanpilla Raju|Shammi Thilakan|Guinness Pakru
overview: A man falls for an older woman, but their affair seems doomed.

title: Anantaram
cast: Ashokan|Sudheesh|Shobana|Mammootty|Bahadoor
overview: A young man narrates two conflicting accounts of his life, changing the details and incidents in both, as he slowly approaches madness.

title: Sundari Gardens
cast: Aparna Balamurali|Neeraj Madhav|Binu Pappu|Jude Anthany Joseph|Vijayaraghavan
overview: Sundari Sara Mathews, popularly known as Suma, meets Victor, the school's new English teacher and falls for him. However, before expressing her feelings to him, another teacher, Lekha, asks him out and he accepts, leaving Suma heartbroken. While at a low point in her life after losing her mother and arguing with her brother, Suma is consumed by jealousy and plots to break up Lekha and Victor to have him to herself.

title: Margamkali
cast: Bibin George|Namitha Pramod|Shanthi Krishna|Siddique|Baiju Santhosh
overview: Unable to forget his first love, Sachi decides never to love anyone in his life. That’s when Oormila enters his life. Will he reconsider his decision?

title: Casanovva
cast: Mohanlal|Shriya Saran|Raai Laxmi|Vikramjeet Virk|Roma Asrani
overview: A group of fugitives end up killing an international businessman Casanovva's girlfriend, after entrapping the couple in a reality show. Furious, Casanovva sets out to avenge her death.

title: Azadi
cast: Sreenath Bhasi|Raveena Ravi|Lal|Salim Kumar|Saiju Kurup
overview: An elaborate plan is made to break a pregnant woman out of prison.

title: C U Soon
cast: Roshan Mathew|Darshana Rajendran|Fahadh Faasil|Maala Parvathi|Saiju Kurup
overview: Jimmy meets Anu on an online dating website and decides to marry her. Jimmy's mother entrusts his cousin Kevin to get details about Anu. Now it's Kevin's turn to search for his cousin's fiancee who vanished without a trace, only to discover dark, shocking truths about her.

title: How Old Are You
cast: Manju Warrier|Kunchacko Boban|Amritha Anilkumar|Kaniha|Vinay Forrt
overview: A married woman, who has set aside her dreams for the sake of her husband and daughter, rediscovers her true self and becomes an achiever.

title: Marykkundoru Kunjaadu
cast: Dileep|Biju Menon|Bhavana|Innocent|Salim Kumar
overview: Dileep plays Solomon in Marykkundoru Kunjadu, a village simpleton who has been nicknamed Kunjadu, since he is adept at getting beaten up by people. In love with Mary (Bhavana) and at loggerheads with her three gigantic brothers, life isn't easy for Solomon. When he befriends a giant of a man who calls himself Vishnu (Biju Menon) and whom he saves from a well, Solomon starts life afresh, and learns to set his spine straight for once.

title: Abrahaminte Santhathikal
cast: Mammootty|Anson Paul|Yog Jappie|Siddique|Renji Panicker
overview: Derick Abraham, a fiery and dutiful police officer, continues to be the best officer until his brother Philip Abraham gets arrested for false murder charges. Will he be able to investigate the case and serve justice to his brother?

title: Best Actor
cast: Mammootty|Sonu Gowda|Nedumudi Venu|Lal|Salim Kumar
overview: Best Actor is a movie about an ordinary school teacher who never gives up on his dream of becoming an actor.

title: Pattanapravesham
cast: Mohanlal|Sreenivasan|Ambika|Karamana Janardanan Nair|Thilakan
overview: CID officers Ramdas and Vijayan go to Kerala to find the murderer of a police officer. While doing so, they face a dangerous crime syndicate that deals in drug trafficking.

title: Pranayam
cast: Jaya Prada|Anupam Kher|Mohanlal|Anoop Menon|Nivetha Thomas
overview: Menon runs into his former wife Grace, who is married to a bedridden Mathew and loves him immensely. The movie revolves around their crossing and emotes the meaning of love and its various forms.

title: Njan Steve Lopez
cast: Farhaan Faasil|Ahaana Krishna|Alencier Ley Lopez|Sujith Sankar|Vinayakan
overview: A college student witnesses a gang attack and as his curiosity behind the encounter tries to get the better of him, he realizes that his dad and the police are involved.

title: Moonnam Pakkam
cast: Thilakan|Jayaram|Jagathy Sreekumar|Kirti Singh|Rahman
overview: Thampi, a retired old man, leads an isolated life in the village and is excited for his grandson Pachu's return. He welcomes Pachu and his friends, but his happiness is short-lived.

title: Jackson Bazaar Youth
cast: Indrans|Chinnu Chandini Nair|Jaffer Idukki|Lukman Avaran|Abhiram Radhakrishnan
overview: The lives of bandmates of the titular band, who get embroiled in a world of crime.

title: Nadan Pennum Natupramaniyum
cast: Jayaram|Samyuktha Varma|Srividya|Jagathy Sreekumar|KPAC Lalitha
overview: Govindan, a rich businessman, goes to any extent to make money. However, his life takes a turn when Gayathri enters his life to take revenge against him for ruining her father's life.

title: Purusha Pretham
cast: Prasanth Alexander|Jagadish|Darshana Rajendran|Devaki Rajendran|James Eliya
overview: Purusha Pretham, focuses on Inspector Sebastian as he handles an unidentified male body and becomes entangled in a procedural, personal and emotional maze. Somewhere between his personal troubles and procedural flaws, all hell breaks loose when he misplaces the corpse. Will Sebastian be able to sort out the mess before the deceased man's family arrives to identify him?

title: Big Ben
cast: Anu Mohan|Vinay Forrt|Vijay Babu|Aditi Ravi|Miya George
overview: Lovely and Jean Antony, living in separate countries, face a legal crisis when Jean visits Lovely in London with their infant daughter. Despite their unfamiliarity with local laws, will they overcome the challenges and reunite?

title: Thanthonni
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Sheela Kaur|Suraj Venjaramoodu|Ambika|Suresh Krishna
overview: Kochukunju (Prithviraj) is the spoilt son of the well known Vadakkan veettil family, situated in kannur. He is the son of Kathreena (Ambika), who believes that his formal father David (Saikumar) has died, who unknown to her is still alive(after being spared by the killer sent out by her brothers to kill him.

title: Avatharam
cast: Dileep|Lakshmi Menon|Mithun Ramesh|Sijoy Varghese|Joy Mathew
overview: Madhavan Mahadevan, who comes into the city from a village to see off his sister-in-law and her daughter after the death of his elder brother, an upright Customs Officer (KB Ganesh Kumar).  While running around to claim the insurance money, he comes to know that his brother was actually murdered by the underworld don Irumbanakkal John (Joy Mathew).

title: Vidheyan
cast: M R Gopakumar|Mammootty|Sabitha Anand|Tanvi Azmi|Babu Namboothiri
overview: Thommy is the loyal servant of Bhaskara Pattelar, a ruthless tyrant. He struggles between obedience and morality.

title: Thilakkam
cast: Dileep|Kavya Madhavan|Nedumudi Venu|Harisree Ashokan|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: Padmanabhan master and his wife are waiting for Unni, their only son who is missing for many years. 10 year old Unni got lost in the crowd during a temple festival where he was along with his neighbour Panikkar, popularly known as Poorappanikkar. Panikkar too did not return since he decided to return only after finding Unni. Ammu is Panikkar's daughter who also believes, like master and his wife, that her father will return one day with Unni. The master finds Unni and brings him back to the Village.  The villagers realize that Unni is abnormal and is mentally challenged. He behaves like a small boy and creates all sorts of trouble for the villagers and his parents.

title: Dominic and the Ladies' Purse
cast: Mammootty|Gokul Suresh|Viji Venkatesh|Wafa Khadeeja Rahman|Siddique
overview: Dominic, a former Circle Inspector dismissed due to a hidden color blindness that led to a crucial error, now struggles as a broke, divorced ex-cop living with an old landlady he can't pay. A seemingly simple case of lost property draws him into a complex murder mystery.

title: Jack N Jill
cast: Manju Warrier|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Soubin Shahir|Kalidas Jayaram|Aju Varghese
overview: Kesh, an accomplished young scientist, comes down to his hometown to execute his dad's dream AI project, Jack N Jill. Will he be able to implement it successfully?

title: The Great Indian Kitchen
cast: Nimisha Sajayan|Suraj Venjaramoodu|Ajitha V M|T. Suresh Babu|Ramadevi Kannanchery
overview: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be.

title: Anarkali
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Priyal Gor|Biju Menon|Kabir Bedi|Miya George
overview: Shanthanu who was a navy officer pines over a girl whom he loved 15 years ago and had to leave the navy because of his affair with her.Since the girl (Nadira) whom he loved was underage (15 years), both of them agree to wait to show their love is true, to the Nawabi father (Jaffer), who is also Shanthanu's Commanding Officer and Flag officer. Shanthanu lost touch with Nadira for 2 years, his search for her lead him to Kavaratti, Lakshadweep.

title: Cheena Trophy
cast: Dhyan Sreenivasan|Johny Antony|Jaffer Idukki|Devika Ramesh|Ponnamma Babu

title: Solo
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Sai Dhanshika|Sruthi Hariharan|Neha Sharma|Deepti Sati
overview: An experimental romantic thriller, Solo is the story of four different men, their love, rage and afterlife. Through four elements - water, air, fire and earth, they also represent different facets of Lord Siva.

title: Friends
cast: Jayaram|Mukesh|Sreenivasan|Meena|Divyaa Unni
overview: The threesome who lend reason to the title are Aravindan (Jayaram), Chandu (Mukesh) and Joy (Sreenivasan). They value friendship over everything else, even family, and for this reason, Chandu resists the advances of Aravindan's sister Uma (Divya Unni). When the trio take up a painter's job at a mansion, Aravindan falls in love with Padmini (Meena), who lives there and Padmini's jealous cousin makes him believe that his overtures are reciprocated. When the truth is revealed and Padmini rejects him outright, Chandu stands up for his friend and speaks ill of her. This makes her swear to separate the friends.

title: Shubharathri
cast: Dileep|Anu Sithara|Siddique|Nedumudi Venu|Sheelu Abraham
overview: Muhammad is all set to go for Hajj and his family is busy giving him a good send off, with everyone close to them. An unexpected arrival of someone on the day result in an unplanned course of action.

title: 5 Sundarikal
directors: Shyju Khalid|Sameer Thahir|Aashiq Abu|Anwar Rasheed|Amal Neerad
cast: Anikha Surendran|Chethan Jayalal|Isha Sharvani|Nivin Pauly|Kavya Madhavan
overview: Five women, Anikha, Isha, Gauri, Kullante and Aami, undergo life-changing experiences with regard to love.

title: King Liar
cast: Dileep|Madonna Sebastian|Lal|Balu Varghese|Asha Sarath
overview: Sathyanarayanan, who has an uncanny talent to deceive people, falls in love with Anjali, an aspiring model. He convinces her that he will help her enter the fashion world using his expertise.

title: Shadow Kill
cast: Oduvil Unnikrishnan|Sukumari|Narain|Murali|Nedumudi Venu
overview: A hangman questions the moral implications of his job after learning that he executed an innocent man.

title: Theevram
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Sreenivasan|Shikha Nair|Anu Mohan|Vishnu Raghav
overview: Harsha Vardhan is out to avenge his wife's murder. But it will be a tough job when Alexander, the police officer of the city, is very cautious of what is happening around.

title: Style
cast: Unni Mukundan|Tovino Thomas|Ilhan Layiq|Balu Varghese|Priya Kandwal
overview: Tom, a young auto mechanic falls in love with Diya whom he sees one day from the bus.
