The love got blossomed and at one point a psychopath named Edger came in to the life of this couple after an unfortunate accident. The incident lead to a scenario where Edger got humiliated and the movie is basically about the rivalry between Tom and Edger.

title: Olavum Theeravum
cast: Madhu|Usha Nandhini|Jose Prakash|Nilambur Balan|Dominic Alummoodan
overview: Baputty goes to his friend Abdu's house after his death to support his family and falls for Nabeesa, Abdu's sister. However, Nabeesa's greedy mother tries to get her close to the rich Kunjali.

title: Boeing Boeing
cast: Mohanlal|Mukesh|Sukumari|Lissy|Menaka Suresh
overview: The movie is an adaptation of the 1960 French play of the same name and is considered to be a cult comedy classic in Malayalam. It was also one of the first commercial successes of the Mohanlal-Mukesh-Priyadarashan team.  Shyam (Mohanlal) is a struggling journalist who gets an opportunity to be the caretaker of a flat in the city. Even while engaged to his childhood sweetheart Sreekutty (Menaka); he uses his charms and resourcefulness to make three air-hostesses (Lissie, Ashwini, Madhuri) fall in love with him. With the help of his maid (Sukumari) and friend (Raju) he carefully manages their schedule in the flat so that none of his girlfriends meet each other. Life is good for Shyam, till his former colleague and friend Anil (Mukesh) comes to visit him.

title: Vellimoonga
cast: Biju Menon|Aju Varghese|Nikki Galrani|Tini Tom|Siddique
overview: Mamachan is a forty-year-old man, who gets involved in politics due to his father. He becomes a national leader and contests for elections. In the course of his work, he meets a young girl and falls in love with her. As fate would have it, she turns out to be the daughter of the woman he loved in his youth.

title: Gajakesariyogam
cast: Innocent|Mukesh|Sunitha|KPAC Lalitha|Mamukkoya
overview: Ayyappan Nair is very fond of elephants.His profession is being as a Elephant Care taker. His daughter is Karthika and wife madhavi.He takes a bank Loan to have an Elephant.But he didn't get an Elephant for that money.Finaly he gets a Elephant from a circus crew.He takes that Elephant home.He realizes that it's a Hindi Elephant and he learns hindi from Jayachandran.Jayachandran & Karthika fells into love.

title: Karutha Pakshikal
cast: Mammootty|Meena|Padmapriya Janakiraman|Jagathy Sreekumar|Salim Kumar
overview: Karutha Pakshikal is the story of a Tamilian immigrant Murugan, who makes a living out of ironing clothes of city-dwellers in Kerala. He is a widower living in a slum with his three children, one of whom is blind and thereby his pet.

title: Vanaprastham
cast: Mohanlal|Suhasini Maniratnam|Kalamandalam Gopi|Kukku Parameswaran|Mattannoor Sankarankutty
overview: Kunhikuttan, a famous Kathakali dancer, meets Subhadra, a woman from an upper caste family, who falls in love with his character rather than himself.

title: Odum Kuthira Chadum Kuthira
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Kalyani Priyadarshan|Revathi Pillai|Vinay Forrt|Dhyan Sreenivasan

title: Kaiyethum Doorath
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Nikita Thukral|Siddique|Revathi|Mammootty
overview: Kaiyethum Doorath movie tells a flashback when Sachin (Shanu) is on his way to attend his lover's Sushma (Nikitha) marriage as he tells his past to the co-passengers on a ferryboat who gets hooked on to his love story.  What happens at the marriage forms the interesting twist in this love story.

title: Kusruthi Kuruppu
cast: Jayaram|Innocent|Meena|Jagathy Sreekumar|KPAC Lalitha
overview: Bachelor businessman Narendranatha Kurup (Jayaram) gets tired of his tight schedules & gilded lifestyle & takes a break to the country where he befriends Velu Kurup's (Oduvil Unnikrishnan) family & falls in love with Velu's daughter Meera (Meena). Later they marry & Narendran makes the mistake of inviting his in-laws over to stay with him.

title: Gold
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Nayanthara|Mallika Sukumaran|Lalu Alex|Shammi Thilakan
overview: The story unravels between the incidents that take place within four days of Joshi, a mobile shop owner who purchases a new car owing to a marriage alliance that is almost fixed with a girl called Radha.

title: Nerariyan CBI
cast: Mammootty|Mukesh|Jagathy Sreekumar|Bindu Ramakrishnan|Gopika
overview: A string of mysterious murders happen in an aristocratic mansion. The owners of the mansion seek CBI officer Sethurama Iyer's help to find the person responsible for the deaths.

title: Ennennum Kannettante
cast: Sangeeth|Sonia G Nair|Thilakan|Srividya|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Teenagers Kannan (Sangeeth) and Radhika (Sonia Nair) are cousins and childhood playmates. They meet again at their ancestral family house in the village during the holiday season. Kannan develops feelings for Radhika; but she is conflicted on how to act on the approaches by him.

title: Namukku Parkkan Munthiri Thoppukal
cast: Mohanlal|Shari|Thilakan|Vineeth Radhakrishnan|Kaviyoor Ponnamma
overview: Solomon falls in love with Sofia, his new neighbor but then finds that her family life is difficult.

title: Koode
cast: Nazriya Nazim Fahadh|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Ranjith|Maala Parvathi
overview: After years of being away in Dubai, Joshua returns for his sister's funeral. But it gets weird when he starts seeing his beloved sister's spirit.

title: Ennalum Ente Aliya
cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu|Lenaa|Siddique|Gayatri Arun|Meera Nandan
overview: Two immigrant families who live in the building in Dubai inadvertently square up because of a romantic misunderstanding. Things take a turn when the real culprits of the love affairs are revealed.

title: New Delhi
cast: Mammootty|Sumalatha|Urvashi|Suresh Gopi|Thyagarajan
overview: A journalist is illegally jailed for exposing two corrupt politicians, He exacts revenge through his new mysterious newspaper.

title: Double Barrel
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Indrajith Sukumaran|Arya|Isha Sharvani|Swathi Reddy
overview: Pancho and Vinci struggle to make money to buy precious stones from a don. However, they end up in trouble when they encounter many people who are trying to get those stones.

title: Rajni
cast: Kalidas Jayaram|Namitha Pramod|Saiju Kurup|Ashwin Kumar|Reba Monica John
overview: Siblings Naveen and Gowri find themselves entangled in a web of chaos and danger with a looming life threat, the story unravels a mysterious quest to uncover the enigmatic identity of Rajni.

title: Under World
cast: Asif Ali|Farhaan Faasil|Mukesh|Samyuktha|Lal Jr.
overview: Stalin and Majeed want to earn quick money through any means possible. However, things take a turn when they cross paths with Padmanabhan and Solomon.

title: Makalkku
cast: Shobana|Suresh Gopi
overview: A mentally ill woman gives birth to Manasi, who is raised in the mental asylum by Dr Warrier. However, despite his efforts to adopt Manasi, she is taken away by the state social welfare department.

title: Veyil
cast: Shane Nigam|Sona Olickal|Shine Tom Chacko|Merin Jose Pottackal|Sudhi Koppa
overview: Two brothers, Karthi and Sidhu live with their mother. As a family, how they face life and deal with all the challenges thrown at them is what forms the crux of the story.

title: Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol
cast: Mohanlal|Meena|Aima Sebastian|Anoop Menon|Kalabhavan Shajon
overview: Panchayat Secretary Ullahanan leads a monotonous life till a college reunion rekindles excitement in his 20-year-old marital life and infuses in him a renewed sense of purpose and love for everything that he once took for granted.

title: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja
cast: Mammootty|R. Sarathkumar|Manoj K Jayan|Suresh Krishna|Kaniha
overview: Set in the backdrop of the seventeenth century, the royal family of Kottayam is ruled by Pazhassi. The British government begins to impose heavy taxes on the locals in the Thalassery region of Kerala.

title: Balti
cast: Shane Nigam|Shanthanu Bhagyaraj|Preethi Asrani|Shiva Hariharan

title: Kattappanayile Rithwik Roshan
cast: Vishnu Unnikrishnan|Dharmajan Bolgatty|Siddique|Lijomol Jose|Prayaga Martin
overview: The story of a young man who dreams to become a movie star.

title: Parannu Parannu Parannu Chellan
cast: Unni Lalu|Sidharth Bharathan|Vijayaraghavan|Sajin Cherukayil|Sreeja Das
overview: Jiju Janardhanan is in love with Sandhya, she belongs to an old traditional family. Their annual pooja ritual along with Jiju and Sandhya's love and her intention to elope from home seems to be do or die situation. The large family is against their love and that complication leads to more interesting things to follow.

title: North 24 Kaatham
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Nedumudi Venu|Swathi Reddy|Chemban Vinod Jose|Sadiq
overview: Harikrishnan is a geeky software professional who suffers from an obsessive compulsive disorder. A harthal day sees him travelling to Trivandrum for a conference, and in the midst of the night, he ends up at Paravur railway station with two strangers - Gopalan  a veteran politician and Narayani a social worker - for company.

title: Abu, Son of Adam
cast: Salim Kumar|Zarina Wahab|Mukesh|Kalabhavan Mani|Suraj Venjaramoodu
overview: Abu, a poor perfume seller, lives with his wife. The couple strives hard to make an honest attempt to go for the Hajj pilgrimage.

title: Hello Mummy
cast: Sharafudheen|Aishwarya Lekshmi|Sunny Hinduja|Aju Varghese|Jagadish
overview: Boney, a carefree man finds his life turned upside down after marriage when hes forced to deal with the restless spirit of his obsessive-compulsive mother-in-law.

title: Ivan Maryadaraman
cast: Dileep|Nikki Galrani|Nagineedu Vellanki|Kailash|Abu Salim
overview: The lead character Raman (Dileep), is an employee in a rice mill in Pune. He used to carry the rice to the mill for processing on a bicycle. Later he decides to buy an auto rickshaw and goes to his village to borrow money from his mother to buy his dream vehicle. But once he reaches his village he is shocked to find a gang of people waiting there to kill him. The rest of the event forms the crux of the plot.

title: My Life Partner
cast: Sudev Nair|Ameer Niyaz|Anusree Nair|Sukanya|Geetha Vijayan
overview: My Life Partner deals with the deep and intricate emotional relationship between two men. The movie narrates the story of two friends-turned-lovers, Richard and Kiran, who were both born and brought up in different cultural backgrounds. Issues crop up when they plan to add a baby to their lives, reinforcing their mutual bond as the Indian law does not allow a man to adopt a child on his own. To find a way around this, Richard, who is a bisexual, marries an orphan, Pavithra. Their life goes topsy-turvy, when Pavithra discovers Richard and Kiran's relationship.

title: Malayankunju
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Rajisha Vijayan|Jaffer Idukki|Indrans|Arjun Ashokan
overview: Anikkuttan is an ill-tempered electronics technician who leads a quiet life with his mother. His daily routines are disrupted when his next door neighbour's new born baby stirs up undesirable memories from his past. What will happen next?

title: Saira
cast: Nedumudi Venu|Navya Nair|Rajesh Sharma|Baiju V.K.
overview: Saira is a 2005 Indian film starring Navya Nair and Nedumudi Venu. The film marks the directorial debut of Dr. Biju. It was the opening in the Tous Les Cinemas du Monde (World Cinema) section of 2007 Cannes Film Festival.[1][2] It also participated in 21 other international film festivals. It was also selected at the Indian Panorama 2006.

title: Mohan Kumar Fans
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Anarkali Nazar|Siddique|Mukesh|Sreenivasan
overview: A talented veteran actor, Mohan Kumar, is back on the big screen through a critically acclaimed film and those around him raise his hopes on great recognitions coming his way through the project. His path towards glory, however, isn’t easy.

title: Agathokakological
cast: Leona Lishoy|Prasant Murali|Maqbool Salmaan
overview: Nisha gets frequent blackmail calls from a Pvt number and she ignores it. Initially, it looks like a blackmail attempt, but things take a different turn as Nisha gets into trouble regularly. SI Ajith, has to figure out who's behind this.

title: Ottu
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Arvind Swamy|Eesha Rebba|Jackie Shroff|Aadukalam Naren
overview: Kichu takes up an assignment to befriend a gangster David, who has lost his memories to learn about a valuable gold shipment that has gone missing. Will Kichu pull off the task, or end up waking the monster in the gangster?

title: 1971: Beyond Borders
cast: Mohanlal|Arunoday Singh|Allu Sirish|Renji Panicker|Sudheer Karamana
overview: Set against the backdrop of 1971 Indo-Pak war, the movie is inspired by real incidents and the protagonists are inspired by Param Vir Chakra recipients. The movie shows what consequences of war are on the lives of soldiers on either side of the border.

title: Aadu
cast: Jayasurya|Vijay Babu|Vinayakan|Saiju Kurup|Dharmajan Bolgatty
overview: Triumph in a local Tug-of-war tourney gifted Shaji Pappan and his gang, a cute but naughty little goat 'Pinky'. Their attempts to dump the goat, unknowingly, interrupts few groups of smugglers, who are in race for the 'Neelakodiveli'.

title: Mark Antony
cast: Suresh Gopi|Divyaa Unni|Janardhanan|Lalu Alex|KPAC Lalitha
overview: The two prominent families in town, that of Pareil Pappu's (Janardanan) & that of Mampalli Chackappan's (V.K. Sriraman), were always at loggerheads, with most conversations resulting in fisticuffs. Pappu's dreaded nephew Antony (Suresh Gopi) poses a constant headache for Chackappan, but Chackappan's daughter Nimmy (Divya Unni) & Antony fall in love. Chackappan & Pappu forget their differences & unite, but soon after, Pappu is shot dead by a mysterious sniper & Antony sets out to find the killer.

title: Nettippattam
cast: Sreenivasan|Jagadish|Rekha|KPAC Lalitha|Jagathy Sreekumar
overview: Peethambaran (Sreenivasan) is an unemployed man who is addicted to solving other people's problems. He gives more priority to the people in his village than his family. His well intended actions though leads him to troubling situations.

title: Bhaskar The Rascal
cast: Mammootty|Nayanthara|Anikha Surendran|Sanoop Santhosh|Janardhanan
overview: Businessman Bhaskaran Pillai builds a large commercial empire until his wife dies. Under pressure from his son, Bhaskaran goes on a trip where he meets Hima, a small-business owner.

title: Thondimuthalum Driksakshiyum
cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu|Fahadh Faasil|Nimisha Sajayan|Alencier Ley Lopez|Vettukili Prakash
overview: Prasad and Sreeja are a couple planning to set up a new life in Kasargod. On a bus journey they end up being robbed by a thief also named Prasad and this lands them up in a police station.

title: Ennu Nathante Nimmi
cast: Mammootty|Rahman|Raadhu|Baiju Santhosh|Sukumari

title: Phoenix
cast: Aju Varghese|Chandhunadh|Anoop Menon|Nilja K. Baby|Bhagath Manuel
overview: John and his family relocate to a far away island village with hopes of rebuilding their lives. But destiny has other plans for them as a series of horrifying events begin to unfold.

title: Summer in Bethlehem
cast: Suresh Gopi|Jayaram|Manju Warrier|Janardhanan|Kalabhavan Mani
overview: Ravishankar and Dennis live on Dennis’s estate in the hills. When Colonel Menon arrives with his daughters, Ravishankar wonders which one of them has been sending him amorous letters. Meanwhile, Dennis is attracted to the enigmatic Abhirami, but what does Abhirami want?

title: Villain
cast: Mohanlal|Vishal Krishna|Hansika Motwani|Manju Warrier|Athira Patel
overview: ADGP Mathew Manjooran, returns to work after a seven-month sabbatical, only to take voluntary retirement. His last day has him investigating a case involving triple murder, including a police officer. Soon a pattern emerges and each clue also links Mathew. How is the veteran police officer tied to the murders and who is the real villain?

title: Simon Daniel
cast: Vineeth Kumar|Divya Pillai|Vijeesh Vijayan|V K Sreeraman|Sunil Sukhada
overview: When Simon Daniel, a wandering Archaeologist, learns that his friend, Santhosh, has disappeared while looking for a lost treasure in an mysterious estate, embarks on a journey to find him and complete the mission.

title: Olangal
cast: Amol Palekar|Poornima Bhagyaraj|Ambika|Anju Prabhakar|Adoor Bhasi
overview: Olangal is a 1982 Indian film in Malayalam, directed by Balu Mahendra.[2] The film's plot is inspired from novel Man, Woman and Child by Erich Segal.

title: Kulam
cast: Bhanupriya|Thilakan|Vijayaraghavan|Nasaar|Suresh Gopi
overview: A loose adaptation of C. V. Raman Pillai's historical novel Marthandavarma with focus on the character of Subhadra.

title: Shikkari Shambhu
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Vishnu Unnikrishnan|Hareesh Perumanna|Sshivada Nair|Alphy Panjikaran
overview: When an entire village is terrorised by the news of a tiger on the loose, they turn to Peeli and his jolly gang of friends for help. but has he got it in him to stop the dreaded predator from wreaking more havoc?

title: Mampazhakkalam
cast: Mohanlal|Shobana|Sudheesh|Adithya Menon|Sanusha Santhosh
overview: Mampazhaakalam centers on the life of the eldest son (Mohanlal) of a family who goes to the Gulf , after his father commits suicide on being cheated by evildoers. He returns home to regain the good times. At the end of the travails of the hero, it is once again 'Mampazhaakalam' ('spring time') in his life.

title: Maya Mayooram
cast: Mohanlal|Revathi|Shobana|Thilakan|Kaviyoor Ponnamma
overview: In Bangalore, Nanda is in love with a leading architect Narendaran. When Narendran dies, Nanda escorts his body to his homeland in Kerala. To her surprise she sees Narendran's twin brother Unni, who looks exactly like Narendran. She thinks Narendran is not dead and everyone is trying to fool her.  Narendran's parents want Nanda to marry Unni but he is already in love with Bhadra.

title: Kuttavum Shikshayum
cast: Asif Ali|Sunny Wayne|Sharafudheen|Alencier Ley Lopez|Senthil Krishna Rajamani
overview: A five-member Kerala Police have to use their best policing skills when they go to Rajasthan to nab a gang behind a jewellery shop theft.

title: Ezra
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Priya Anand|Sujith Sankar|Tovino Thomas|Vijayaraghavan
overview: An urban couple Ranjan Mathew and Priya have just moved to Kochi when powers of the supernatural start to take over their lives. How they tide over the forces forms the story.​

title: Lekhayude Maranam Oru Flashback
cast: Nalini|Gopi|Mammootty|Nedumudi Venu|Thilakan
overview: Lekha is an aspiring actress who becomes successful and very popular. One day, she commits suicide! Why?

title: Patriot
cast: Mammootty|Mohanlal|Kunchacko Boban|Fahadh Faasil|Nayanthara

title: Checkmate
cast: Lal|Anoop Menon|Noel Ramos|Rekha Harindran|Swapneel Batra
overview: In a tangled web of power and love, the lives of a pharmaceutical company CEO, a failed Don, a grieving widower, and a shrewd lawyer intersect when a mysterious woman is kidnapped, sparking a chain of events in New York City's underbelly.

title: Sudani from Nigeria
cast: Soubin Shahir|Samuel Abiola Robinson|Savithri Sreedharan|Sarasa Balussery|K T C Abdullah
overview: When a soccer club manager brings one of his injured foreign players home to recuperate, they form an unlikely bond despite their cultural differences.

title: Appan
cast: Sunny Wayne|Alencier Ley Lopez|Ananya|Grace Antony|Pauly Valsan
overview: A cruel womaniser, who cheated death and has been bedridden for ages, harasses his wife and son out of spite. As his family waits for him to die, the villagers form a mob demanding to kill him because of his actions. When he tricks his wife into allowing him to spend time alone with another woman, his family faces a hard decision that could alter their lives forever.

title: Kilometers and Kilometers
cast: Tovino Thomas|India Jarvis|Joju George|Sidhartha Siva|Basil Joseph
overview: When a debt-ridden man reluctantly agrees to drive an American tourist around India, their stark differences lead to bickering… and unexpected bonding.

title: Geethanjali
cast: Keerthy Suresh|Nishan K. P. Nanaiah|Mohanlal|Siddique|Madhu
overview: Anjali, whose sister Geeta has committed suicide, is haunted by her spirit upon her return to her mother's home. When psychologist Dr Sunny tries to help Anjali, he makes a shocking discovery.

title: Sundara Killadi
cast: Dileep|Shalini|Nedumudi Venu|Babu Namboothiri|Kuthiravattam Pappu
overview: Swapnabhoomi is a village where strange customs and rituals exist. When a water shortage occurs the leader sends a person to inform Premachandran of the situation and request him to come to Swapnabhoomi and dig a well. Because of his poverty, he accepts the advance and agrees.Then he discovers that other workers who had tried to dig a well there died because of earthquake after digging 45 metre of land.

title: Meow
cast: Soubin Shahir|Mamta Mohandas|Salim Kumar|Bhagath Abrid|Harisree Yousuf
overview: Follows Dasthakeer and Sulekha, a married couple that moves to Dubai with their three children for a better living.

title: In Harihar Nagar
cast: Mukesh|Siddique|Jagadish|Ashokan|Rizabawa
overview: 4 unemployed men who are in Harihar Nagar tries to impress a newly came girl next door.The story goes to the next level when a mysterious man comes and asks for a missing box.

title: Priyam
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Deepa Nair|Manjima Mohan|Ashwin Thampi|Devan
overview: Benny is the manager of the heavily in debt family business. He is also the guardian of his dead sister's mischievous kids. Rahul hires Annie as governess. Annie is a runaway from home as she does not want to marry the man her orthodox family has chosen for her. Predictably, Benny and Annie fall in love.

title: Dracula 2012
cast: Sudheer Sukumaran|Shraddha Das|Monal Gajjar|Nasaar|Prabhu
overview: Dracula 2012 is a 2013 Indian 3-D horror film directed by Vinayan, starring Sudheer Sukumaran, Prabhu, Monal Gajjar, Nassar, Shraddha Das and Thilakan. The film was shot in the Malayalam, Telugu, and Tamil languages simultaneously, with additional scenes and songs featuring Tamil and Telugu actors

title: Vinodayathra
cast: Dileep|Mukesh|Meera Jasmine|Murali|Innocent
overview: It is the story of a good natured but irresponsible young man, Vinod who comes to a hilly village live with his elder sister Vimala and brother in law, Shaji. Shaji is an engineer and Vinod wants to learn life from him, but end up creating problems for Shaji.

title: Thrishanku
cast: Arjun Ashokan|Anna Ben|Nandhu|Zarin Shihab|Suresh Krishna
overview: A small town couple, Sethu and Megha, plan to elope, but complications arise when Sethu's sister also decides to elope. Sethu and his quarrelling uncles must bring her back while trying to elope with Megha without getting caught.

title: Udal
cast: Indrans|Durga Krishna|Dhyan Sreenivasan|Jude Anthany Joseph|Anjana Appukuttan
overview: A woman, looking after her ailing mother-in-law is at breaking point. What happens when she can't take any more?

title: Puzhu
cast: Mammootty|Vasudev Sajeesh Marar|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Appunni Sasi|Nedumudi Venu
overview: Kuttan, an annoyingly disciplined and a bigoted upper-caste retired police officer, is living with his son Kichu. After Bharati, Kuttan’s younger sister, falls in love with lower caste Kuttappan and elopes with him against her family’s wish, the attempts on Kuttan's life increases and his paranoia make the lives around him miserable.

title: Madalasa
cast: Y. Vijaya|Mohan|Sreelatha Namboothiri|Prathapa Chandran|Sukumaran
overview: This dramatic tale revolves around Janu, a beautiful young woman who works as a maid-servant in the bungalow of a wealthy woman, whose son is Chandru, a timid and sexually repressed young man who lusts after Janu.

title: Mylanchi Monchulla Veedu
cast: Jayaram|Asif Ali|Kaniha|Meera Nandan|Madhu
overview: Mylanchi Monchulla Veedu is a 2014 Malayalam family-drama film written by Udayakrishna-Siby K. Thomas, directed by Benny Thomas and produced by Haneef Mohammed under the banner of Red Rose Creations

title: Gandhinagar 2nd Street
cast: Mohanlal|Karthika|Thilakan|Sreenivasan|Seema
overview: Sethu, an unemployed youth, struggles to find a job. When a spate of robberies takes place in his friend's neighborhood, he poses as a Gurkha to get a job as a security guard.

title: Ginger
cast: Jayaram|Muktha George|Mallika|Sudheesh|Jagadish
overview: Two scheming thieves Vivekanandan and Najeeb Kecheri plan to rob Harinarayanan and his wife Devika's house, but in a quirk of fate, becomes a part of their life. Meanwhile, when moneylender Edamuttam Pappachen asks them to do something special for him, the story takes another turn.

title: Hridayapoorvam
cast: Mohanlal|Malavika Mohanan|Sangita|Sangeeth Prathap|Siddique

title: Pokkiri Raja
cast: Mammootty|Prithviraj Sukumaran|Shriya Saran|Nedumudi Venu|Vijayaraghavan
overview: Madhavan Nair unknowingly kills a teenager. Raja, his eldest son, takes the blame and is sentenced to jail for five years. After jail, Raja rescues the daughter of a village land lord in Madurai, becomes his right hand Pokkiri Raja.

title: Adi
cast: Shine Tom Chacko|Ahaana Krishna|Druvan|Bitto Davis|Sreekanth Dasan
overview: Nandu, has been earning a living in Saudi and is engaged to Geethika. They get married but while returning from the church they get in a fight with two men on a bike.

title: Night Drive
cast: Roshan Mathew|Anna Ben|Indrajith Sukumaran|Kalabhavan Shajon|Siddique
overview: A young couple working are out on a drive where they meet with an accident. It leaves them in a triangle between a cop who investigates the accident and the corrupt political hegemony who are in pursuit of them.

title: Neeyethra Dhanya
cast: Karthika|Murali|Menaka Suresh|Mukesh|Nahas
overview: Neeyethra Dhanya is a Malayalam movie based on a novel named Oru Njayarazhchayude Ormaykk, by K. K. Sudhakaran. The film tells the story of a girl named Shyama, who committed suicide and the reason behind it.

title: Yathra
cast: Shobana|Mammootty|Adoor Bhasi|Thilakan|Kunchan
overview: Based upon the human rights violations by the police and the prison authorities in India during the emergency of 1975–1977, the film tells the story of Unnikrishnan, an ex-convict. Recently released from prison, Unnikrishnan relays his life story to fellow passengers on a bus. He tells of his orphan upbringing, career as a forest official, and love for a young woman named Thulasi, whom he promised he'd marry, before he was erroneously arrested for a crime he did not commit.

title: Aye Auto
cast: Mohanlal|Rekha|Thikkurissy Sukumaran Nair|Sukumari|Jagadish
overview: Sudhi (Mohanlal) who is a poor auto-rickshaw driver who meets Meenakshi (Rekha) who is the granddaughter of a well to do family. Sudhi and Meenakshi falls in love for each other and faces strong opposition from her family but the lone support of her grand father, Krishna Pillai (Thikkurisi Sukumaran Nair).

title: Thoovanathumbikal
cast: Mohanlal|Sumalatha|Parvathi|Ashokan|Babu Namboothiri
overview: Jayakrishnan falls in love with two girls, Radha (a villager) and Clara (a sex-worker), and fights his confusion about whom he should marry and spend his life with.

title: Role Models
cast: Fahadh Faasil|Namitha Pramod|Vinayakan|Vinay Forrt|Sharafudheen
overview: Gowtham is a geeky loner with hardly any social connections, though he was a jovial guy while at college. His parents, being worried about his extreme changes, attempt to bring back his old self with the help of Gowtham’s friends from college days.

title: Christy
cast: Mathew Thomas|Malavika Mohanan|Joy Mathew|Rajesh Madhavan|Vineeth Vishwam
overview: Roy, a village boy who's a failure at studies, joins Christy's tuition. They become good friends, but later when Christy gets a job abroad, Roy's life changes

title: Harikrishnans
cast: Mammootty|Mohanlal|Juhi Chawla Mehta|Kunchacko Boban|Innocent
overview: When Guptan, a college lecturer, gets killed, the police suspect Gabriel to be the murderer. A girl takes help from her brothers, who are famous lawyers, in proving his innocence.

title: Thrissur Pooram
cast: Jayasurya|Swathi Reddy|Sabumon Abdusamad|Vijay Babu|Sudev Nair
overview: Pullu Giri is trying to live a peaceful life forgetting his ruffian past in his hometown, Thrissur. However, he gets dragged into the affairs of the local goons and gangs after an incident, post which a ‘give and take’ drama with new baddies ensues.

title: Ente Ummante Peru
cast: Tovino Thomas|Urvashi|Hareesh Perumanna|Mamukkoya|Sai Priya Deva
overview: The life and journey of Hameed to find his biological mother and how his life changes when Aisha comes into his life.

title: Ariyippu
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Divya Prabha|Danish Husain|Kannan Arunachalam|Loveleen Mishra
overview: A sensitive and manipulated video clip is circulated amongst the co-workers of the factory where the couple work, which unleashes unexpected emotional, social and marital imbalances in their relationship.

title: B Tech
cast: Asif Ali|Arjun Ashokan|Saiju Kurup|Deepak Parambol|Niranjana Anoop
overview: A bunch of engineering students in Bengaluru struggle to get through the course due to their lackadaisical attitudes and frequent skirmishes within the college. An incident outside the campus though shakes them to reality and they are forced to confront it through a trial by fire.

title: Njan Kandatha Sare
cast: Indrajith Sukumaran|Baiju Santhosh|Anoop Menon|Alencier Ley Lopez|Mallika Sukumaran
overview: Joekuttan, a taxi driver, arrives at a lodge seeking female companionship. There, he witnesses a crime. When he goes to the police station to give his testimony, he faces a series of unexpected events, which entangle him in even more serious problems.

title: Paradise
cast: Roshan Mathew|Darshana Rajendran|Mahendra Perera|Shyam Fernando|Sumith Ilango
overview: An Indian tourist couple arrive in the hill country of crisis ridden Sri Lanka to celebrate their 5th wedding anniversary. But, when things take an unexpected turn, conflicts deepen revealing cracks in their relationship.

title: Spadikam
cast: Mohanlal|Thilakan|KPAC Lalitha|Rajan P Dev|Sphadikam George
overview: Chacko master, a school headmaster, is never happy with his son, Thomas, and always degrades him. However, having had enough of him, Thomas runs away from home only to return as a gangster after long.

title: Da Thadiya
cast: Sekhar Menon|Sreenath Bhasi|Ann Augustine|Nivin Pauly|Maniyanpilla Raju
overview: The film tells the love story of an obese youth named Luke John Prakash. Luke comes from a wealthy family and is in love with a girl named Ann Mary Thadikkaran (Ann Augustine). The evolution of their relationship through various stages forms the crux of the story.

title: Vasthuhara
cast: Mohanlal|Neelanjana Mitra|Padmini|Neena Gupta|Shobana
overview: Vasthuhara (Malayalam: വാസ്തുഹാര English: The Dispossessed) is a Malayalam social film by the late G. Aravindan which looks into the lives of partition refugees from East Bengal to West Bengal.

title: Kanalkkattu
cast: Mammootty|Jayaram|Urvashi|Oduvil Unnikrishnan|Mamukkoya
overview: Narayanan struggles to earn a living and he decides to become a thug to earn money. Problems start brewing in his life when he kills Benny, an engineer.

title: 101 Weddings
cast: Kunchacko Boban|Jayasurya|Biju Menon|Samvrutha Sunil|Suraj Venjaramoodu
overview: The story is set in the backdrop of a mass marriage ceremony,

title: Thenmavin Kombath
cast: Mohanlal|Nedumudi Venu|Shobana|Kaviyoor Ponnamma|KPAC Lalitha
overview: Sreekrishnan unknowingly falls in love with the woman his best friend, Manikyan, loves. Though Sreekrishnan tries his best to woo her, she resists, leading to a battle that ensues between the friends.

title: Rashtram
cast: Suresh Gopi|Madhu|Nedumudi Venu|Thilakan|Laya
overview: Maliakkal Ouseppachan is a politician. The chief minister of Kerala Janardhanan Kurup is his friend along with Saghav Gopalan. One day Janardhanan Kurup dies in hospital after having a heart attack at a meeting. he says to Ouseppachan that he wants him to be minister. Janardhanan Kurup dies after saying this. Ouseppachan thinks a lot about this and calls other people of the Party. In the end he says he is unfit for the job and makes his son Malaikkal Thommi (Suresh Gopi) chief minister.

title: Mattoral
cast: Karamana Janardanan Nair|Mammootty|Seema|Urvashi|Murali
overview: Susheela deserts her children and husband Kaimal to begin a new life with Giri. On learning this, Kaimal's friend, Balan, tries to reconcile them.

title: Oru Vadakkan Veeragatha
cast: Mammootty|Balan K Nair|Madhavi|Suresh Gopi|Captain Raju
overview: Chanthu, a poor orphan and Aromal are cousins and belong to the Chekavar clan, a warrior clan who hire themselves out as duellers to settle disputes among the rich and powerful. Aromal, jealous of the much more talented Chanthu, makes life miserable for him and Chanthu decides to leave and live with Aringodar, a rival chekavan, as his pupil. When the two sons of a local landlord have a property dispute and decide to hire Aromal and Aringodar to duel it out, Chanthu has to decide where his loyalty lies - with the family of the uncle who brought him up or with Aringodar who provided him with sanctuary.

title: Ullasam
cast: Shane Nigam|Pavithra Lakshmi|Renji Panicker|Deepak Parambol|Aju Varghese
overview: Two youngsters meet on a train journey from Ooty to Mettupalayam, but they don't exchange names or anything about themselves. Will they learn more about each other?

title: 4 The People
cast: Arun|Arjun Bose|Padma Kumar|Bharath Srinivasan|Narain
overview: Fed up of the corruption all around, four young men form a secret group called '4 the people' and decide to take on the corrupt on their own. They have a web site and eventually gain enormous support.

title: Thalavattam
cast: Mohanlal|Lissy|Nedumudi Venu|M G Soman|Karthika
overview: Vinod/Vinu (played by Mohanlal) is mentally ill and is hospitalized in the institution run by Dr. Ravindran ( M G Soman). Story progresses as Vinod recovers with the help of Dr. Savithri, Dr. Ravindran's daughter (Karthika) and Dr. Unnikrishnan (Nedumudi Venu) who finds that Vinu fell ill after the accidental death of his fiancée Anitha (Lizy). Later Vinu and Savithri fall in love but Savithri is already engaged to be married to her cousin, Hari(Mukesh). Plot progresses as Dr. Ravindran opposes the romance between the doctor and the recovered patient.

title: Fukri
cast: Jayasurya|Siddique|Lal|Anu Sithara|John Kaippallil
overview: An engineering dropout who traps himself in one trouble or the other, meets a wonderful woman and her cousin who changes his life.

title: Gumasthan
cast: Bibin George|Dileesh Pothan|Aathira Rajeev|Jaise Jose|Rony David Raj
overview: Cunning clerk exploits legal loopholes to murder wife, evading suspicion. As public and police close in, they race to outwit his intellect and unravel the mysteries shrouding his crime and home.

title: Anuraga Karikkin Vellam
cast: Biju Menon|Asif Ali|Asha Sarath|Rajisha Vijayan|Sreenath Bhasi
overview: The life of a father and son and their life experience when son tries to breakup with his lover.

title: Aadu 3
cast: Jayasurya|Vinayakan|Sunny Wayne|Saiju Kurup|Vineeth Mohan

title: Helen
cast: Anna Ben|Lal|Noble Babu Thomas|Aju Varghese|Rony David Raj
overview: An ordinary suburban girl faces the biggest battle of her life when her sudden disappearance for a brief period leads to a desperate search by her loved ones.

title: Sarkeet
cast: Asif Ali|Divya Prabha|Deepak Parambol|Orhan|Swathi Das Prabhu
overview: In a distant land, Balu and Stephy struggle to balance work, parenting their spirited son with ADHD, and holding their relationship together. When a worn-out stranger enters their lives, a fleeting connection sparks unexpected change in just one day.

title: Prajapathi
cast: Mammootty|Nedumudi Venu|Siddique|Seema|Aditi Rao Hydari
overview: Devar Madom Narayanan (Mammootty) is accused of killing his father and for being cruel to his mother. At the age of 13, he serves a sentence at the juvenile home. On returning, he becomes a leader in Perumalpuram village and expels all the wrongdoers. He thus makes many enemies.

title: Turbo
cast: Mammootty|Raj B Shetty|Anjana Jayaprakash|Kabir Duhan Singh|Niranjana Anoop
overview: An Idukki jeep driver attracts the ire of the head of a shady criminal syndicate after his friends uncover a large-scale financial scam.

title: Halal Love Story
cast: Grace Antony|Indrajith Sukumaran|Sharafudheen|Joju George|Soubin Shahir
overview: A group of friends attempts to make a 'halal' film that conforms to the guidelines and descriptions of an Islamic organization which they are a part of.

title: Christian Brothers
cast: Mohanlal|Suresh Gopi|Dileep|R. Sarathkumar|Kaniha
overview: When the daughter of a minister gets kidnapped, Christy is called upon to rescue her. Although he manages to save her, he himself gets embroiled in the kidnapper's murder.

title: Adam Joan
cast: Prithviraj Sukumaran|Narain|Bhavana|Rahul Madhav|Mishti Chakravarty
overview: Adam Joan Pothan from the village Mundakkayam. One day, he unexpectedly meets a girl named Emy and they go to Scotland together. The new people he meets on his journey changes his life.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
cast: Yash|Srinidhi Shetty|Ramachandra Raju|Archana Jois|Anant Nag
overview: A period drama set in the 1970s, KGF follows the story of a fierce rebel who rises against the brutal oppression in Kolar Gold Fields and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

title: Kantara
cast: Rishab Shetty|Sapthami Gowda|Kishore|Achyuth Kumar|Pramod Shetty
overview: Shiva, a tribal vagabond lives with his mother in hamlet, stays away from the traditional Daivaradhane and Bhoota Kola legacy due to an unforgettable childhood incident. He is happy loafing around with his friends and doing petty jobs for his landlord. When Forest officer Murali enters the scene, it gives a fresh dimension to the man-vs-nature fight. Can Shiva save the forest from Murali? Or is Murali just a dummy bait cast by bigger fish?

title: 777 Charlie
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Raj B Shetty|Bobby Simha|Sangeetha Sringeri|Bhargavi Narayan
overview: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie who is naughty and energetic which is a complete contrast with the Dharma’s character enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
cast: Yash|Sanjay Dutt|Raveena Tandon|Srinidhi Shetty|Archana Jois
overview: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields (KGF) has a new overlord now - Rocky, whose name strikes fear in the heart of his foes. His allies look up to Rocky as their Savior, the government sees him as a threat to law and order; enemies are clamoring for revenge and conspiring for his downfall. Bloodier battles and darker days await as Rocky continues on his quest for unchallenged supremacy.

title: Martin
cast: Dhruva Sarja|Vaibhavi Shandilya|Anveshi Jain|Giorgia Andriani|Chikkanna
overview: Martin revolves around Lt. Brigadier Arjun Saxena, whose journey takes him from Pakistan to India to discover his real identity and fight against black market dealers, who are involved with terrorists to orchestrate massive attacks in the country.

title: Koli Taal
cast: Radha Ramachandra|Prabhakar Kunder|Abhilash Shetty|Ganesh Mogaveera|Guruprasad Nairy
overview: Excited about their grandson's visit, an elderly couple plan to cook chicken curry for dinner. But, things begin to fall apart when the chicken goes missing.

title: Toby
cast: Raj B Shetty|Chaithra J Achar|Samyukta Hornad|Deepak Shetty|Gopalkrishna Deshpande
overview: An estranged man deemed to be a beast vows to break free from the evil world and transform himself for his foster daughter.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 3
cast: Yash|Srinidhi Shetty|Raveena Tandon|Achyuth Kumar

title: Bagheera
cast: Sriimurali|Rukmini Vasanth|Prakash Raj|Rangayana Raghu|Achyuth Kumar
overview: Dismayed by corruption and violence, a virtuous police officer becomes a masked vigilante to dliver lethal justice to criminals and crooked cops alike.

title: Bheema
cast: Duniya Vijay|Priya Shatamarshan|Dragon Manju|Cockroach Sudhi|Kalyani Raju
overview: Bheema, a gangster, wages a war against Dragon Manju, an aspiring politician and drug dealer, for supplying drugs in his locality and making the youngsters to become drug addicts.

title: Dia
cast: Kushee Ravi|Dheekshith Shetty|Pruthvi Ambaar|Pavitra Lokesh|Aravind Rao
overview: Dia tells the story of a young, introvert girl whose routine life brightens up when she falls for Rohith, one of her fellow college mates. Being an introvert girl and trying to express her love becomes the biggest challenge of her life. This romantic drama will make you lose yourself in the emotional journey of a girl falling in love.

title: Kolara
cast: Yogesh|Naina Sarwar|Adithya Menon|Ashwath Ninasam|Rajendran
overview: Thangam, known as Mini Veerappan in Kolar, has been cornered by an encounter specialist. He narrates his life story, on how he took to crime and also about the two important women in his life.

title: Laughing Buddha
cast: Pramod Shetty|Teju Belawadi|Diganth Manchale|Sundar Raj
overview: Explores the life and personal struggles of a police head constable.

title: Manada Kadalu
cast: Rangayana Raghu|H. G. Dattatreya
overview: "Manada Kadalu" is a coming-of-age love story. Sumukha, an MBBS dropout, pursues love interest Rashika. However, friend Anjali's influence leads him to self-discovery and reevaluating life's value.

title: Sapta Sagaradaache Ello – Side A
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Rukmini Vasanth|Sharath Lohitashwa|Ramesh Indira|Pavitra Lokesh
overview: In the heart of 'Sapta Sagaradaache Ello’ (Somewhere Beyond the Seven Seas), resides an ardent love story between Manu and Priya. Set in 2010, the couple hails from a middle-class background. Circumstances land Manu in jail, putting his relationship with Priya in jeopardy.

title: Kabzaa
cast: Upendra|Shriya Saran|Murali Sharma|Sudha|Sudeep
overview: During the British rule in India, Arakeshwara, an air force soldier and son of a freedom fighter Amareshwara,due to unavoidable circumstances, kills Khaleed, the don of Amarapura and thus gets trapped in the mafia world and later becomes the king of the underworld. However, trouble ensues for Arakeshwara as he has to deal with his rivals and Bhargav Bhakshi, a cop sent by the British to eradicate him and the underworld.

title: Kranti
cast: Darshan Thoogudeepa Srinivas|Rachita Ram|V. Ravichandran|Sumalatha|Tarun Arora
overview: Kranti Rayanna, a business tycoon in Europe is invited by his favorite teacher to attend the Centenary celebrations of the school. Kranti begins a revolution and takes the fight on with Salatri Group trying to takeover 12,000 government schools and privatize them.

title: Pailwaan
cast: Sudeep|Aakanksha Singh|Suniel Shetty|Kabir Duhan Singh|Sushant Singh
overview: A fierce wrestler becomes the symbol of hope for his people when he rises against the odds and fights the brutal oppression.

cast: Neethu Shetty|Sourabh Shukla|Raghu Ramappa|Adhvithi Shetty|Prathap Kumar
overview: When Demonetization (currency ban) is announced in India, 3 unlikely characters come face to face for a bag of cash. After that a car journey begins and some more characters come into picture. This results in a cat and mouse game with a very unexpected outcome.

title: Ranna
cast: Sudeep|Rachita Ram|Madhoo|Prakash Raj|Avinash
overview: Bhargava, the heir apparent of a wealthy family in Switzerland, is on a mission to reunite his aunt and grandfather. Of course, this isn't easy since his aunt holds a lot of grudges and isn't willing to pardon him right away.

title: Milana
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Pooja Gandhi|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Dileep Raj|Sumithra
overview: Hero is in love with a girl who is forced to marry a police officer. Hero is later forced by his parents to marry a girl liked by them. Here starts the trouble again, even she wants a divorce from him. Will hero divorce her or they are happy with each other is the later part of the story

title: MAX
cast: Sudeep|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Sunil Varma|Pramod Shetty|Manjunatha Gowda
overview: A maverick senior cop reports for duty at a new police station and soon find himself embroiled in an unexpectedly dangerous turn of events.

title: Yuva
cast: Yuva Rajkumar|Sapthami Gowda|Achyuth Kumar|Anil Kumar|Prashanth Natana
overview: Love blooms amid conflicts between insiders and outsiders at an engineering college, but soon conflict escalates into war.

title: Love Mocktail
cast: Darling Krishna|Milana Nagaraj|Amrutha Iyengar|Rachana Inder|Kushi Achar
overview: Love Mocktail is a 2020 Indian Kannada-language romantic drama film directed by Krishna in his director debut and jointly produced by Krishna, Milana Nagaraj. The film stars Krishna, Milana Nagaraj in the lead roles. The film was released on 31 January 2020.

title: Vikrant Rona
cast: Sudeep|Nirup Bhandari|Jacqueline Fernandez|Neetha Ashok|Ravishanker Gowda
overview: Almost half a century ago, a remote village in the middle of a tropical rain forest starts witnessing a series of unexplainable events which they attribute to the supernatural. Vikrant Rona, An eccentric police officer, is assigned to solve the mystery.  A mysterious game unfolds where everyone in the village is a potential victim and everyone is a suspect.

title: Banaras
cast: Sonal Monteiro|Zaid Khan|Sujay Shastri|Devaraj|Achyuth Kumar
overview: An astronaut from an indefinite future fall in love with a girl in present time each other. When his i love is threatened by an existential element, responsibility falls on him to save her, using his future knowledge as an edge ahead.

title: Toxic
cast: Yash|Nayanthara|Huma Qureshi|Kiara Advani|Sudev Nair
overview: Set in a bygone era, this gripping tale unfolds in the coastal paradise of Goa, where a powerful drug cartel pulls the strings behind a facade of sun-soaked beaches and vibrant culture.

title: U Turn
cast: Shraddha Srinath|Skanda Ashok|Roger Narayan|Dilip Raj|Radhika Narayan
overview: A journalist who intents to write an article on traffic rule breakers gets dragged into a whirlpool of murder cases and deception.

title: Tagaru
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Bhavana|Manvitha Harish|Dhananjay|Vasishta N. Simha
overview: Duniya Soori's Tagaru takes us on a bloody ride through the dark underbelly of the underworld and their clash against the police.

title: Kerebete
cast: Gowrishankar|Gopalkrishna Deshpande|Chillar Manju|Sampath Maitreya|Harini Shreekanth
overview: The annual Kerebete fishing event brings together the people of a Karnataka village. During the festivities, a controversial relationship causes tensions.

title: Pushpaka Vimana
cast: Kamal Haasan|Amala Akkineni|Tinnu Anand|Sameer Kakkar|Farida Jalal
overview: An unemployed man, who dreams of living it large, finds a rich man drunk and lying in the sewer. Things take a turn when he imprisons him and takes his identity to get a taste of his lifestyle.

title: UI
cast: Upendra|Reeshma Nanaiah|Nidhi Subbaiah|P. Ravi Shankar|Sadhu Kokila
overview: Set in a fictional world, the story is about the psychological conflict between a king in a town and an extraordinary man, and how that man, through his cunning and master minded plans takes over everything, takes control of the entire town, becomes a dictator.

title: Kshetrapathi
cast: Naveen Shankar|Achyuth Kumar|Archana Jois|Rahul Ainapur|Shailashree Urs
overview: Following his father's tragic suicide due to the unfair pricing of his crops, Basava, the protagonist, abandons his studies and embraces agriculture. He embarks on a revolutionary quest to secure the right prices for agricultural goods. However, he soon confronts a giant nexus comprising corporations, politicians, and traders. Basava grapples with immense challenges and setbacks throughout his journey.

title: Googly
cast: Yash|Kriti Kharbanda|Sudha Belawadi|Neenasam Ashwath|Anant Nag
overview: Googly is a 2013 Kannada romantic comedy film directed by Pawan Wadeyar and produced by Jayanna Combines. Yash and Kriti Kharbanda are the lead actors while Ananth Nag and Sadhu Kokila play the primary supporting roles. The film released on 19 July 2013 and opened to a fantastic response at the box office. The film was declared a "Blockbuster".

title: James
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Shivaraj Kumar|Priya Anand|R. Sarathkumar|Srikanth
overview: Santhosh Kumar, who goes by the name James, runs a security agency and has been commissioned to take care of a family that owns a drug cartel. He is swift, agile and deft with his work and wins the appreciation of everyone. But is there more to who Santhosh really is?

title: Please Turn Over
cast: Kailash TV|Adithi Kalkunte|Sudha Belawadi|Sharath Bhagavan|Anirudh Acharya
overview: A young, cricketer turned teacher, has to overcome a big challenge in his personal life; and teach a motley bunch of kids what it means to play hard but fair.

title: Eradu Kanasu
cast: Dr. Rajkumar|Kalpana|Manjula|K. S. Ashwath|Advani Lakshmi Devi
overview: Ramachandra Rao, a professor, is forced to marry Gowri at his family's behest despite being in love with Lalitha. He fails to get along with his wife and broods about his lost love. The movie is based on the novel of the same name by Vani. The film is considered as one of the greatest romantic films in Kannada noted for the strong performances of lead actors Rajkumar and Kalpana.

title: Sanaadi Appanna
cast: Dr. Rajkumar|Jaya Prada|Ashok|T. N. Balakrishna|Thoogudeepa Srinivas
overview: Based on a novel of same name by K Puranik, which is loosely based on real life events of Appanna, a rural shehnai artist from Karnataka. Appanna,  falls in love with a dancer, Basanti. But when Basanti dies, things changes a lot for Appanna.

title: Sapta Sagaradaache Ello - Side B
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Rukmini Vasanth|Chaithra J Achar|JP Tuminad|Gopalkrishna Deshpande
overview: Manu is released from prison and strives to rekindle his love with Priya.

title: Gurudev Hoysala
cast: Dhananjay|Naveen Shankar|Amrutha Iyengar|Nagabhushana N S|B. S. Avinash
overview: Gurudev Hoysala, an upright police officer, gets involved in the inter-caste marriage of a Bhoomi and Ravi, only to realise later that Bhoomi is an influential landlord’s daughter.The situation heats up as the girl's father  gets furious and starts an uproar in the town.

title: Anjaniputra
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Rashmika Mandanna|Ramya Krishnan|P. Ravi Shankar|Chikkanna
overview: A small-time businessman who runs a finance business at a local vegetable market enjoys the support of the local vendors and people in the area. All goes well for him until one day, he saves an honest police officer from being killed by a local gangster. Soon, a rivalry ensues between the two.

title: Bhajarangi 2
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Bhavana|Shruti|Saurav Lokesh|Shivaraj KR Pate
overview: When a group of lost villagers chance upon a Guruji at a shrine, he begins to narrate the story of two unlikely heroes, Anji and Bhajrangi, who lived across two different timelines.

title: Ghost
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Prashant Narayanan|Jayaram|Archana Jois|Anupam Kher
overview: A dreaded gangster called ‘Ghost’, takes hostage of a prison, and an efficient police officer Chengappa is immediately deputed to solve the issue. And thus begins the cat and mouse chase between an intelligent criminal and a ruthless police officer.

title: Daari Thappida Maga
cast: Dr. Rajkumar|Kalpana|Aarathi|B. Jaya|M. V. Rajamma
overview: Two estranged brothers, who could not be more different from one another, choose different paths in life and are eventually reunited by an unexpected twist of fate.

title: Mythri
cast: Mohanlal|Puneeth Rajkumar|Atul Kulkarni|Kalabhavan Mani|Bhavana
overview: Fast paced and evocative, this contemporary social drama delves into concepts of love and fidelity in human relationships in view of modern liberal lifestyles, through the lives of a scientist and a news anchor.

title: Shivu Paru
cast: America Suresh|Disha Poovaiah|Ramesh Bhat|Honnavalli Krishna|Chitra Shenoy
overview: A star-crossed romantic love story of an ill-fated girl Paru who falls in love and eventually get married to a TV anchor Shivu who is coincidentally her lover from the past life who gets killed. Paru kills herself to join her dead husband.

title: Avane Srimannarayana
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Shanvi Shrivastava|Pramod Shetty|Balaji Manohar|Achyuth Kumar
overview: In the pursuit of solving an ancient mystery of Amaravati, Narayana, a corrupt cop must battle the dangerous clan of dacoits and it's fierce leader.

title: Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana
cast: Raj B Shetty|Rishab Shetty|Gopalkrishna Deshpande|Deepak Rai Panaje|Prakash Tuminadu
overview: Shiva and Hari, two friends who are polar opposites in demeanour, are the terror in Mangaladevi. What happens when ego, ambition and jealousy creeps in between their strong friendship?

title: Ibbani Tabbida Ileyali
cast: Vihan Gowda|Ankita Amar|Girija Shettar|Mayuri Nataraj|Chandrajith Belliappa
overview: What defines love? Memories that you can fondly look at? Tomorrow's dream of togetherness? Or the longing after separation?  Ibbani Tabbida Ileyali is a poetic tale of romance that intends to celebrate unconditional love. An attempt to capture the essence of yesterday's romance, the relevance of today's and the perpetual nature of it that can stand the test of the future!  We aspire to make you sing, smile, dance and savour the sweet melancholy. A story that spans a decade encapsulating the days of college, career aspirations and adulthood! Urban cityscape, the greens and more importantly the dreamy atmospherics. There's a scent of summer, the warmth of winter and the melody of monsoon!

title: Yuvarathnaa
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Sayesha Saigal|Sonu Gowda|Dhananjay|Prakash Raj
overview: A government aided college, RK University, is on the verge of completing its golden jubilee but a bizarre event shuts it down indefinitely. Will RK University restore its lost glory?

title: Santhu Straight Forward
cast: Yash|Radhika Pandit|Shaam|Sneha Acharya|Devaraj
overview: Santhu is the typical do-gooder youngster, who is also the angry young hero. He falls for college student Ananya after a series of chance meetings. But, there's also dreaded don Deva in the picture forming the triangle.

cast: Bhavana|Ganesh
overview: 99 is a 2019 Indian Kannada-language romance film directed by Preetham Gubbi and produced by Ramu. The film stars Ganesh and Bhavana in the lead roles.The film was released on 1 May 2019. It is a remake of the 2018 Tamil film 96 which was reported to have similarities with the 2016 movie Blue Jay.

title: Bhairathi Ranagal
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Chaya Singh|Madhu Guruswamy|Babu Hirannaiah|Rukmini Vasanth
overview: The story revolves around the life of Bhairathi Ranagal's journey from being a law-abiding responsible lawyer to the benevolent crime boss of Karnataka.

title: Power
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Trisha Krishnan|Prabhu|Kelly Dorji|Rangayana Raghu
overview: A politician slips into coma after being attacked by criminals. He wakes up several years later to find his son having taken up his responsibilities. However, things are not what they seem to be.

title: Madhagaja
cast: Sriimurali|Ashika Ranganath|Chikkanna|Shivaraj KR Pate|Jagapati Babu
overview: Two warring lords are fighting over water and bloodshed. When the wife of one of them decides to send her son away from the land to a safe space, he returns to the same battlefield, much to her exasperation.

title: Raja Huli
cast: Yash|Meghana Raj|Chikkanna|Vasishta N. Simha|Manju Mandavya
overview: Raja Huli is a 2013 Indian Kannada-language comedy-drama film directed by Guru Deshpande and written by S. R. Prabhakaran. Produced by K. Manju's home production, the film is a remake of the Tamil film Sundarapandian (2012) which was produced and enacted by M. Sasikumar. The film stars Yash and Meghana Raj in the lead roles. The soundtrack and score for the film is composed by Hamsalekha. The film, which made its theatrical release on 1 November 2013, co-inciding with the Kannada Rajyotsava festival

title: Naanu Nanna Kanasu
cast: Prakash Raj|Amoolya|Sithara|Ramesh Aravind|Sihi Kahi Chandru
overview: Naanu Nanna Kanasu is the depiction of a father’s narration of his own coming-of-age, with the birth and growth of his daughter. It is a remake of  tamil movie, “Abhiyum Naanum”.Uthappa (Prakash Raj), who encounters a chance to meet a young father Jayanth (Ramesh Aravind) and his daughter, on his morning walk. As they introduce themselves to each other, going past the hilarity of the nature of their rendezvous Uthappa begins to narrate to Jayanth how it was to bring up his own daughter, Kanasu (Amoolya).Sharing the better half of this journey of Uthappa’s, is his wife and soulmate Kalpana (Sithara) who is seen to be the saner voice in the Uthappa household. Being quite literally, a letter from a father to a daughter, the story stands testament to the oft-quoted

title: Ugramm
cast: Sriimurali|Hariprriya|Tilak Shekar|Padmaja Rao|Atul Kulkarni
overview: Shivarudra Lingaiah, an MLA candidate, who along with Dheeraj, is awaiting to extract vengeance upon Prabhakar by killing his Daughter Nithya. She arrives at Bangalore to Talagavara to visit her late mother's grave and is kidnapped by Dheeraj's gang on the way. Agastya is an automobile mechanic, who saves her from Dheeraj's gang. He takes her to his house for safeguarding as advised by Prabhakar's family-friend, Vishwa.

title: Kabaddi
cast: Avinash|Kishore|Escort Srinivas|Sriraksha|Dharma
overview: It features real life Kabaddi players as important roles, while veteran actor Kishore played the role of a passionate sports coach. The directorial debut film, is a love story based around the sport of Kabaddi. Though it didn't perform well at the box office, critics named it one of the top Kannada films of 2009

title: A
cast: Upendra|Chandini|Kote Prabhakar|Michael Madhu|Archana
overview: A film director fades away from the industry after the failed love with the heroine of his movie. After being rehabilitated, he learns that some people conspired his fall and decides to take revenge.

title: Naanu Nanna Kanasu
cast: Prakash Raj|Amoolya|Sithara|Ramesh Aravind|Sihi Kahi Chandru
overview: Naanu Nanna Kanasu is the depiction of a father’s narration of his own coming-of-age, with the birth and growth of his daughter. It is a remake of  tamil movie, “Abhiyum Naanum”.Uthappa (Prakash Raj), who encounters a chance to meet a young father Jayanth (Ramesh Aravind) and his daughter, on his morning walk. As they introduce themselves to each other, going past the hilarity of the nature of their rendezvous Uthappa begins to narrate to Jayanth how it was to bring up his own daughter, Kanasu (Amoolya).Sharing the better half of this journey of Uthappa’s, is his wife and soulmate Kalpana (Sithara) who is seen to be the saner voice in the Uthappa household. Being quite literally, a letter from a father to a daughter, the story stands testament to the oft-quoted

title: Mr & Mrs Ramachari
cast: Yash|Radhika Pandit|Achyuth Kumar|Srinath|Malavika Avinash
overview: Lovers Ramachari and Divya part ways when Divya begins to question Ramachari's love, trust and way of life. Will they reconcile?

title: Yajamana
cast: Rashmika Mandanna|Darshan Thoogudeepa Srinivas|Dhananjay|Devaraj|Tanya Hope
overview: The film revolves around a hardworking man Krishna who lives in Hulidurga and is famous for traditional oil extraction. He is torn apart from being the rightful owner with the entry of business tycoon Devi Shetty. Will Krishna fight against all odds to bring justice to his people? Who will become the real `Yajamana` is what forms the crux of the story.

title: Kirik Party
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Samyuktha Hegde|Rashmika Mandanna|Aravinnd Iyer|Chandan Achar
overview: Karna from a small town has joined this engineering college and he gangs up with his hostel mates Loki, Alexander, Manja and others to fuel a lot of mischief in the college.

title: Raana
cast: Samyuktha Hegde|Shreyas Manju|Reeshma Nanaiah
overview: Raana an aspiring Police Office enters Bengaluru City. He's all set to marry Priya. Kapaali is killed under mysterious circumstances. Raana is blamed. He sets out to find the real killer.

title: Chaarulatha
cast: Priyamani|Skanda Ashok|Saranya Ponvannan|Seetha|P. Ravi Shankar
overview: Chaarulatha (also spelled as Charulatha) is a 2012 Indian horror film simultaneously made in Kannada and Tamil languages. The film was directed by Pon Kumaran, a former associate to K. Bhagyaraj and K. S. Ravikumar, and features Priyamani in the lead role. The film was an adaptation of the Thai horror film Alone. Sundar C Babu composed the film's music.] The film’s story is about conjoined twins. Produced by Global One Studios and distributed by Hansraj Saxena's Sax Pictures, Charulatha released on 21 September 2012 with dubbed Malayalam and Telugu versions with the same title.

title: Badava Rascal
cast: Dhananjay|Amrutha Iyengar|Nagabhushana N S|Poornachandra Mysuru|Rangayana Raghu
overview: Badava Rascal is the journey of Shankar who lives life on his own terms. When he gets kidnapped along with his friend over trivial issues by goons, how does he get out of the trouble and what is the motto of abduction unravels the theme of the story.

title: Love Li
cast: Vasishta N. Simha|Stefy Patel|Achyuth Kumar|Malavika Avinash|H. G. Dattatreya
overview: An orphan grows up to become a gangster who finds love. However, he faces a critical situation where he risks losing everything.

title: Adhyaksha
cast: Sharan|Hebah Patel|Chikkanna|P. Ravi Shankar|Asmita Sood
overview: Adhyaksha is a 2014 Indian Kannada language comedy film directed by Nanda Kishore. It stars Sharan, Heeba Patel, P. Ravi Shankar, Malavika Avinash, Chikkanna and Ramesh Bhat. It is a remake of the Tamil film Varuthapadatha Valibar Sangam.  The music for the film and soundtracks were composed by Arjun Janya.

title: Kotigobba 3
cast: Sudeep|Madonna Sebastian|Shraddha Das|P. Ravi Shankar|Aftab Shivdasani
overview: Sathya, a philanthropist who now runs an orphanage, has to go to Poland for the treatment of young Janu. While there, an international criminal named Ghost carries out heists. Who is Ghost? And what has Sathya got to do with it all?

title: Upendra
cast: Upendra|Damini|Prema|Raveena Tandon|Arun Govil
overview: Naanu, who always speaks the truth, is married to Swathi. However, he is soon pursued by Rathi and is forced to accept her love but finds it difficult to let go of his obsession with Keerthi.

title: Kantara Chapter 1
cast: Rishab Shetty
overview: Prequel to 2022  film Kantara

title: Rustum
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Vivek Oberoi|Shraddha Srinath|Rachita Ram|Mayuri Kyatari
overview: The disappearance of an honest IAS officer leads to his family seeking help from police, but to no avail. To their assistance arrives Abhishek, someone who happens to be there for them in times of need. But why does he want to help them? What is his real identity?

title: Shivalinga
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Vedhika|Sakthi Vasu|Vaishali Deepak|Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat
overview: Shivalinga is story weaved around a murder mystery. Who killed Rahim? Why was he killed? Is it murder of Suicide, CID Shivu (Shivrajkumar) investigates the murder mystery. But, what is Shivu's wife's involvement...

title: Pogaru
cast: Dhruva Sarja|Rashmika Mandanna|Dhananjay|P. Ravi Shankar|Sampath Raj
overview: Shiva, a ruffian, is the terror of his area in many ways, but still has a heart of gold. He has just one wish, for his mother to love him wholly like the way he does.

title: Odeya
cast: Darshan Thoogudeepa Srinivas|Sanah Thimmayyah|Ashwini Gowda|Chikkanna|Chitra Shenoy
overview: Gajendra is a kind-hearted man who lives a happy life taking care of his family and the people around him with utmost affection. He has chosen to be a bachelor and hates the term marriage and since his own brothers have to seek his permission for their own marriage proposals they come up with a plan to make him fall in love.

title: Katha Sangama
directors: Kiranraj K.|Karan Ananth|Chandrajith Belliappa|Shashi Kumar|Rahul PK|Jamadagni Manoj|Jayshankar A
cast: Kishore|Yagna Shetty|Prakash Belawadi|Sowmya Jaganmurthy|Hariprriya
overview: Anthology of 7 movies blended inside one.  7 directors, 7 DOPs, 7 Musicians and 7 editors have worked in the movie. This is movie is a tribute to legendary Puttanna Kanagal

title: Om
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Prema|Sadhu Kokila|Srishanthi|G.V. Shivanand
overview: Satya, the son of a priest, leads a straightforward life until he meets the girl of his dreams. His love for her drags him into the world of crime, making him lose everyone he is close to.

title: Aakash
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Divya Spandana|Avinash|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Pavitra Lokesh
overview: While working odd jobs, Aakash, a wedding photographer, meets Nandini, who falls in love with his optimistic and good-natured personality. The film stars Puneeth Rajkumar and Ramya in the lead roles, while Ashish Vidyarthi and Avinash play pivotal roles. The movie was declared as a Blockbuster hit at the box office. The film found a 200 days run at the cinema halls in Karnataka.

title: Aa Dinagalu
cast: Chethan Kumar|Archana|Sharath Lohitashwa|Ashish Vidhyarthi|Atul Kulkarni
overview: Chetan loves Mallika but his father hires an underworld don, Kotwal, to break their relationship. Irked by his father's actions, Chetan approaches Kotwal's rival, Jayaraj, to defeat him.

title: Vaamana
cast: Dhanveer Gowda|Reeshma Nanaiah|Tara|Avinash|Achyuth Kumar
overview: Explores the emotions and lifestyles of ordinary people, with a compelling hero Guna pursuing vengeance against antagonists. His actions are driven by his past life, which influences his present and future.

title: Chigurida Kanasu
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Vidhya Venkatesh|Rekha Unnikrishnan|Anant Nag|Avinash
overview: Shankar, a city lad, pays a visit to his ancestral village. When he decides to settle there for good, he faces opposition from his own family and from a village bigwig.

title: Kiss
cast: Viraat|Sreeleela|Sadhu Kokila|Chikkanna|Apoorva Gowda
overview: Kiss tells the love story of Nandini and Arjun. Nandini is a young, modern day college student who holds on to traditional values and Arjun is a rich, carefree guy. The film is an exploration of young love, directed by A. P. Arjun and produced by V. Ravi Kumar under Rashtrakuta Pictures. The lead actors are Viraat Vellanki and Sree Leela. The credit for the music score goes to V. Harikrishna and Adi Hari.

title: Appu
cast: Puneeth Rajkumar|Rakshita|Srinivasa Murthy|Sumithra|Ashok

title: ...Re
cast: Ramesh Aravind|Harshika Poonacha|Anant Nag
overview: Re is a Kannada comedy drama starring Ramesh Aravind and Anant Nag. A rich man arrives at an old palatial house to find that his ancestors are cursed to an afterlife in the house. Now it becomes his responsibility to undo the curse.

title: Dhruva
cast: Darshan Thoogudeepa Srinivas|Sherin Shringar|Om Puri|Avinash|Datthatreya
overview: An honest police officer who has taken an oath to clean up society must make some hard decisions when his friend becomes a criminal.

title: Gimmick
cast: Ganesh|Ronica Singh|Ravishanker Gowda|Shobaraj|Mandya Ramesh
overview: A happy-go-lucky poor guy Gani falls in love with wrestler Raani, who hails from a rich family. Raani's father tries every trick in the book to separate Raani and Gani. When nothing works, he comes up with a plan that he is sure will not let him down.

title: Dr. 56
cast: Priyamani|T. Praveen Reddy|Deepak Shetty|Ramesh Bhat|Manjunath Hegde
overview: Arjun is a theater artist who is suffering from an illness and has to take a pill every 56 minutes. Parallel to his misery is a murder investigation of three neurosurgeons lead by CBI officer Priya Krishna. Priya meets Dr Ashwath and the two go on an exposition about the medical mafia and its consequences.

title: Hebbuli
cast: Sudeep|V. Ravichandran|Amala Paul|Kabir Duhan Singh|Ravi Kishan
overview: A fearless commando arrives home at the news of his brother's suicide until he starts to deeply investigate the reason behind his mysterious demise.

title: Drona
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Rangayana Raghu|Iniya|Ravi Kishan
overview: Drona revolves around a school teacher who is transferred to a government school where the conditions are pathetic and the teachers indifferent towards the students. Step by step, he tries to make the school a better place but is constantly opposed by people including the Assistant Head Master. Will he succeed?

title: Kiraathaka
cast: Yash|Chikkanna|Oviya Helen|T. S. Nagabharana
overview: Kirataka is a 2011 Indian Kannada romantic comedy film directed by Pradeep Raj, starring Yash and Oviya in the lead roles. It is the remake of Tamil film, Kalavani (2010). The film was a success at the domestic box-office. This was the 3000th Kannada movie to be released.  The film is centered around the rivalry between two neighboring villages with rival gangs in both competing in every aspect. Nandisha (Yash), also known as Gooli is a road side romeo with no real direction to his life. He is flanked by his friends who support him in every act. Meanwhile, he falls in love with Nethra (Oviya), a girl studying at a college in the neighboring town. The rest of the movie revolves around how Gooly manages to win over Nethra despite the rivalry.

title: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
cast: Rakshit Shetty|Kishore|Tara|Yagna Shetty|Achyuth Kumar
overview: Malpe, a small fishing town on the Arabian Coast. Located 6 kms to the west of the temple town, Udupi. Malpe's beaches are washed clean everyday by the sea. The waves ensure that nothing gets left behind on the sands. But then, the waves cannot reach everything. It is the time of the year when Udupi and its surroundings are decked up to celebrate Sri Krishna Janmaashtami. Men and children walk the streets dressed up as characters from mythology. Teams painted as tigers are seen dancing to drum beats all around the town. But violence seems to be brewing in Malpe this Krishna Janmaashtami.

title: Lucia
cast: Sathish Ninasam|Sruthi Hariharan|Achyuth Kumar|Hardika Shetty|Balaji Manohar
overview: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

title: Super
cast: Upendra|Nayanthara|Tulip Joshi|Ali Basha
overview: Super (Kannada: ಸೂಪರ್) (originally known only by Vitarka Mudrā hand symbol) is a 2010 Indian multilingual film written and directed by Upendra.  This utopian film garnered extraordinary reception from critics and the general public for its revolutionary concept of a contrasting futuristic India set in the year 2030, and the contemporary image of India.  With the title of the film depicted only by a symbol, it features Upendra and Nayantara in lead roles and is produced by Rockline Venkatesh, while V. Harikrishna has scored the music. Raking in more than Rs 100 million through satellite television and audio rights even before release, it was declared a superhit in Kannada where it grossed a record Rs 25 million in first three days of the opening weekend. The film grossed over 50 crore (US$9.05 million) and has been declared one of the biggest blockbusters of Kannada cinema.

title: Suryavamsha
cast: Vishnuvardhan|Isha Koppikar|Lakshmi|Hema Chaudhary|Ramesh Bhat
overview: An aristocratic patriarch realizes the worth of his most caring son he despised because of his illiteracy. A family learns values forgotten or misunderstood. A great soul overcomes all hindrances thrown at him to finally emerge victorious.

title: Roberrt
cast: Darshan Thoogudeepa Srinivas|Jagapati Babu|Vinod Prabhakar|P. Ravi Shankar|Devaraj
overview: Raghava lives in Lucknow with his son Arjun and is the head cook in a Brahmin's catering unit. He leads a peaceful existence, wanting the best for his son. All seems to go well, until some skeletons come tumbling out of his closet and he is forced to take on his original avatar.

title: LAW
cast: Ragini Chandran|Mukhyamantri Chandru|Avinash|Achyuth Kumar|Sudharani
overview: Nandhini, a law student who is caught in a precarious situation, fights for justice for a gruesome crime involving herself.

title: Ondu Sarala Prema Kathe
cast: Vinay Rajkumar|Swathishta Krishnan|Mallika Singh|Karthik Mahesh|Sadhu Kokila
overview: Athishay is a young man who wants to become a music director. Anu is a kind hearted and caring woman. When it comes to love, being a musician Athishay dreams of a woman who matches the rhythm of his heartbeat, and Anu is waiting for a person who is genuine & wishes good for others without expecting anything in return. In a twist of fate, Athisay and Anu get married to each other. However, they do not lose hope and continue their quest for true love.

title: Sri Srinivasa Kalyana
cast: Dr. Rajkumar|B. Saroja Devi|Rajashankar|Srinath|Vajramuni
overview: It is a 1974 Kannada-language Hindu mythological film directed by Vijay. The film, based on lord Venkateswara, stars Rajkumar, B. Saroja Devi and Manjula. It also featured the first screen appearances of future actors and Rajkumar's sons, Shiva Rajkumar and Raghavendra Rajkumar. The movie was dubbed in Tamil as Ezhumalaiyan Dharisanam and in Telugu as Sri Tirupatikshetra Mahatyam (1977).

title: Naale Rajaa Koli Majaa
cast: Samrudhi Kundapura|Sanidhya Acharya|Prabhakar Kunder|Radha Ramachandra|Supreetha K S
overview: On the day of Gandhi Jayanti, when meat sale is prohibited nationwide, an 11-year-old girl goes on a quirky adventure in pursuit of a forbidden chicken curry.

title: Bachelor Party
cast: Diganth Manchale|Achyuth Kumar|Siri Ravikumar|Achara Kirk|Prakash Tuminadu
overview: A man dissatisfied in his marriage is persuaded to attend the bachelor party of an old friend.

title: Vajrakaya
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Nabha Natesh|Shubra Aaiyappa|Avinash|Ravi Teja
overview: Vajrakaya is a Kannada film directed by Harsha A and produced by C. R. Manohar and C R Gopi. The film stars  and Shivaraj Kumar in lead roles. Music was composed by Arjun Janya.

title: Veera Chandrahasa
cast: Shivaraj Kumar|Shithil Shetty Airbail|Prasanna Shettigar|Nagashree GS|Uday Kadabaal
overview: Kulinda, a noble of Kuntala, discovers an abandoned boy in the jungle and names him Chandrahasa for his radiant smile. Raised with love, Chandrahasa grows into a virtuous young man, unaware of the powerful enemies plotting against him.  But his unwavering faith shields him from harm. Each failed attempt only brings downfall to his enemies, turning foes into allies. Chandrahasa emerges as a symbol of divine grace, protected by the gods.

title: Maanikya
cast: Sudeep|V. Ravichandran|Ranya Rao|Varalaxmi Sarathkumar|Ramya Krishnan
overview: A village strives to overcome the rivalry between two ancient factions.

title: Sanju Weds Geetha
cast: Srinagar Kitty|Divya Spandana|Suhasini Maniratnam|Rangayana Raghu|Sadhu Kokila
overview: Sanju and Geeta are all set to get married. Unfortunately, the day before their wedding Geeta is kidnapped, and Sanju kills the kidnappers, and is sent to the jail. Can Sanju and Geetha ever meet?

title: Care of Footpath 2
cast: Avika Gor|Esha Deol|Deepp Pathak|Dingri Naresh|Karthik Jayaram
overview: An emotional suspense thriller inspired by true stories of juvenile delinquents in the India. Four teenage friends are provoked to plan and execute the murder of a cop.

title: Blink
cast: Dheekshith Shetty|Chaithra J Achar|Vajradheer Jain|Suresh Anagalli|Mandara Battalahalli
overview: Apoorva, a 24-year-old in Bengaluru, conceals his failed MA from his mother. Juggling part-time jobs, he relies on his love interest, Swapna, for support. Apoorva's unique ability to control blinking becomes a curse when a mysterious old man reveals his father's survival.

title: Case of Kondana
cast: Vijay Raghavendra|Bhavana|Kushee Ravi|Rangayana Raghu|Bala Rajwadi
overview: In the outskirts of Bangalore lies Kondana, a fiery ASI in a fictional Bangalore outpost, clashing with a local gangster. Meanwhile, his love life with Sahana faces hurdles. ACP Lakshmi hunts a notorious criminal, while Raju struggles to save his ailing son. As these lives intertwine, a singular case in Kondana becomes the focal point, linking them all in a tale of mystery and connection.

title: KTM
cast: Dheekshith Shetty|Sanjana Doss|Abhishek Srikanth|Kaajal Kunder|Prakash Thuminad
overview: Karthik seeks love through several attempts. Will he find his destined partner or face continued failure?

title: Salaga
cast: Duniya Vijay|Dhananjay|Sanjana Anand|Achyuth Kumar|Rangayana Raghu
overview: Vijaykumar, alias Salaga, is unknowingly pulled into the realm of the underworld. Samrat, an honest and upright cop, sees through him and decides to bring about justice.

title: Rathnan Prapancha
cast: Dhananjay|Reba Monica John|Umashree|Anu Prabhakar|Pramod Panju
overview: Rathnakara is an insurance agent living a mundane life with his unapologetically loud mother Saroja. An uncomfortable truth about his life leads him to go on a trail to find his world. What does he learn eventually?

title: Head Bush: Vol 1
cast: Dhananjay|Devaraj|Yogesh|Vasishta N. Simha|Sruthi Hariharan
overview: Head Bush revolves around Jayaraj, his friends, foes, police officers, and the politicians who changed the course of the political scenario of Bengaluru in the 1970s. The film focuses on the rise and rise of Jayaraj - from a teenager to a rowdy to a mass hero.

title: Jaanu
cast: Yash|Deepa Sannidhi|Rangayana Raghu|Sadhu Kokila|Laya Kokila
overview: Siddarth helps Rukmini reach home when she runs out of money on a trip. Rukmini's family attacks Siddarth, but welcome him after learning the truth. Both fall in love, but a surprise awaits them.

title: Apthamitra
cast: Soundarya|Vishnuvardhan|Ramesh Aravind|Dwarakish|Prema
overview: Apthamitra movie is based on Nagavalli (Dancer). Ramesh, an engineer buys the palace. Everyone believes that the spirit of Nagavalli, a dancer is captivated in a room of that palace. Ganga she opens  the locked room with the help of Soumya. Then start the troubles. Vijay  who came to ramesh house for holidays.

title: O2
cast: Ashika Ranganath|Praveen Tej|Raaghav Nayak|Prakash Belawadi|Siri Ravikumar
overview: A brilliant doctor battles her childhood trauma, to revive the dead with an illegal intravenous oxygen drug. Her quest challenges the boundaries of science, spirituality, and love. Will she succeed or lose everything!

title: Kiccha
cast: Sudeep|Shweta Agarwal|Sujatha|Ajai Rao|Sadhu Kokila
overview: Kiccha, an unemployed gold medalist tries his best to get a job but due to corrupt bribe system, he fails to get any job. This story tells how an intelligent unemployed youth enters politics and turns big playing their own game against them.

title: Z
cast: Prakash Raj|Prema|Ritu Shivpuri|Sundeep Malani|Tennis Krishna
overview: A 1999 Kannada film

title: Chambal
cast: Sathish Ninasam|Sonu Gowda|Pawan Kumar|Achyuth Kumar|Kishore
overview: Subhash is a young and dynamic IAS officer, His relentless and uncompromising way of working sends shivers across the corridors of power, cutting across political and business circles. Being incorruptible and principled, his idealism and righteousness soon become a threat to the entire system.

title: Rangi Taranga
cast: Nirup Bhandari|Avantika Shetty|Radhika Narayan|Sai Kumar|Siddu Moolimani
overview: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

title: Lucky
cast: Divya Spandana|Yash|Sharan|Sadhu Kokila|Shankar Bhat
