cast: Mohan Agashe|Amruta Subhash|Iravati Harshe|Milind Soman|Devika Daftardar
overview: The film revolves around Mr. Shastri, a retired Sanskrit professor who in due course suffers with Alzheimer's goes missing while travelling with his daughter .during this time of missing he gets fascinated with a elephant walking on street and goes to stay with the family which owns elephant. The film is inter cut to depict the human side of relationships with social message in end that only care and affection is medicine for Alzheimer's and there is no other cure for the same.

title: Kaul
cast: Rohit Kokate
overview: What would you do if you witness something extraordinary but cannot talk about it to anyone?Can you keep your sanity intact? What would you do, if a responsibility is assigned to you which might change the fate of universe?Would you be excited or petrified? A school teacher in a village goes through this mind-wrecking journey without a choice.The only choice left to him is whether he could complete the task assigned to him or he should get himself admitted in an asylum. Though the story is in the genre of supernatural thriller,the film tries to tell the story by following the cliches but breaking the rules in which cliches are told.

title: De Dhakka 2
cast: Bharati Achrekar|Makarand Anaspure|Abhijeet Deshpande|Gauri Ingavale|Anand Ingle
overview: Mr. Makarand Jadhav, and his funnily weird family land in London but they get embroiled in the financial scam and find themselves in the hands of the Pakistani mafia. To escape this ordeal they embark on a road trip adventure once again.

title: Dhagedore
cast: Sai Tamhankar|Umesh Kamat|Bhargavi Chirmule|Vinay Apte|Uday Tikekar
overview: Prasad, who hails from a middle-class family, is tried for the murder of his rich wife, Manju. Although innocent, Manju's family hires a prominent lawyer to ensure that he gets the worst punishment.

title: Kshanbhar Vishranti
cast: Bharat Jadhav|Sonalee Kulkarni|Maulik Bhatt|Hemant Dhome|Shubhangi Gokhale
overview: In today's hectic world, what everyone really needs is a moment of respite.

title: Story As Insignificant As A Mountain
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Nagesh Bhonsle|Madhavi Juvekar|Madhu Kambikar|Girija Oak
overview: In a village where farmers struggle to make ends meet, Rajaram returns to sell his land. However, his mother dissuades him from doing so. Meanwhile, his friend Nandu is burdened by a huge debt.

title: 22 June
cast: Mukta Barve|Prasad Oak|Sharad Ponkshe|Avinash Narkar|Mangesh Desai
overview: A woman is separated from her lover and murdered when their relationship is disapproved due to religious differences. Her spirit returns to seek revenge on the people responsible for her death.

title: Jatra: Hyalagaad Re Tyalagaad
cast: Bharat Jadhav|Vijay Chavan|Siddharth Jadhav|Ankush Chaudhari|Viju Khote
overview: Plotting to make some quick cash, conniving young Monya (Bharat Jadhav) targets the residents of a village caught in a feud with a neighboring community, but his plans are jeopardized when another youth who closely resembles him also arrives in town. As each boy is repeatedly mistaken for the other, they both must contend with the two villages' feverish rivalry over which will host a religious festival. Kedar Shinde directs this comedy.

title: Takatak 2
cast: Bhoomika Kadam|Pranali Bhalerao|Komal Bodkhe|Prathamesh Parab|Ajinkya Raut
overview: Three friends decide to become men before graduating college but the women they fall for are not eager to have sex with them. To what length will the friends go to keep their promise?

title: Umbartha
cast: Smita Patil|Girish Karnad|Shrikant Moghe|Ashalata Wabgaonkar|Daya Dongre
overview: After the passing of her husband, Mrs. Mahajan takes care of four institutions, and lives a comfortable lifestyle with her two sons - Dr. Mohan and his wife, Maya; and Advocate Subhash Mahajan, his wife, Savitri, and their daughter, Rani. Savitri is unhappy as she wants a career for herself. She finally gets a chance to prove her skills in social services when she gets a job offer as Superintendent of a Women's Reformatory Home in distant Sangamwadi. Although Rani and Subhash as well as the rest of the family oppose her going, she has made up her mind.

title: Premachi Goshta
cast: Atul Kulkarni|Sagarika Ghatge|Rohini Hattangadi|Satish Rajwade|Sulekha Talwalkar
overview: Premachi Goshta (Marathi: प्रेमाची गोष्ट , meaning: Story of Love) is a 2013 Marathi language film directed by Satish Rajwade.  The story is all about LOVE and discovering that correct person in life who can become the life partner. It's a story of believing on the person in front, its like a leap of faith.

title: Mud Stoves
cast: Sudhir Joshi|Vandana Gupte|Anand Abhyankar|Ankush Chaudhari|Madhura Velankar
overview: Vishal, a young man, falls in love with Pooja and marries her. However, his marital bliss turns into a nightmare due to the constant tussle between his wife and mother.

title: Zapatlela 2
cast: Sonalee Kulkarni|Adinath Kothare|Sai Tamhankar|Makarand Anaspure|Deepak Godbole
overview: Tatya Vinchu comes back to life after 20 years, and now wants to migrate into the body of Lakshya's son.

title: Marching in the Dark
cast: Sanjeevani Bhure|Parimala Shinde|Parvati Gadade|Dr. Milind Potdar|Babli Vaishnavi Bhure
overview: In a drought-struck region in India, suffering from climate change and a high suicide rate amongst farmers, a group of resilient women farmers, who recently lost their husbands, is coming together with a local psychologist to learn counselling and help others in grief.

title: Bhingari
cast: Sushma Shiromani|Nilu Phule|Vikram Gokhale|Ramesh Deo|Shreeram Lagoo
overview: Sada is imprisoned for a crime his friend, Daulatrao, committed. Suspecting that his wife and Daulatrao may be having an affair, Sada escapes to kidnap his own newborn.

title: Ye Re Ye Re Paisa
cast: Umesh Kamat|Sanjay Narvekar|Siddharth Jadhav|Tejaswini Pandit|Bijay Anand
overview: Its a story of funny misunderstandings that creates troubles for five individuals who are trying to achieve their life goals.

title: Hridaynath
cast: Urmila Matondkar|Aditya Pancholi|Jackie Shroff
overview: A schoolteacher known for his good deeds and benevolence takes a walk on the dark side after undergoing a heart transplant.

title: De Dhakka
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Siddharth Jadhav|Shivaji Satham|Medha Manjrekar|Hrishikesh Joshi
overview: A family traveling from Kolhapur to Mumbai will face many ups and down before they reach their destination.

title: Katha Doan Ganpatraonchi
cast: Mohan Agashe|Dilip Prabhavalkar|Uttara Baokar|Renuka Shahane|Madhav Vaze
overview: Located in a seaside village in Maharashtra during the 60s, the film unfolds over two decades. It is a tragic tale of how the best of friendships can rupture over a trivial quarrel. Once a rupture takes place, there are always people who know how to turn a quarrel to their own advantage, even if the main adversaries are completely destroyed in the process.

title: Welcome Home
cast: Mrinal Kulkarni|Sumeet Raghvan|Mohan Agashe|Spruha Joshi|Uttara Baokar
overview: After deciding to part ways with her husband, Professor Saudamini leaves along with her daughter and her mother-in-law, who is suffering from dementia. Saudamini`s return to her own house sends ripples across the family, as waves of contradictory emotions engulf them all.  Welcome Home is the story of a group of people who find themselves caught up in a collective emotional turmoil, and how they strive to overcome these setbacks

title: Silence! The Court Is in Session
cast: Amrish Puri|Amol Palekar|Sulabha Deshpande
overview: A political and social satire on middle-class society's hypocrisy. A group of teachers plan to stage a play in a village. When a cast-member does not show up, a local stagehand is asked to replace him. An improvised, free-flowing 'rehearsal' is arranged and a mock trial is staged to help the novice understand court procedures. A (mock) charge of infanticide is levelled against Miss Benare, another cast-member. Suddenly the pretend-play turns into an accusatory game when it emerges from the trial that Miss Benare is carrying an out-of-wedlock child from her failed illicit relationship with Professor Damle, the missing cast-member.

title: Chhapa Kaata
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Tejaswani Lonari|Mohan Joshi|Arun Nalawade|Vijay Patkar
overview: Namya, a devoted brother from a humble background, faces a challenge when seeking a match for his sister in a society favouring wealth. In a twist of fate, he enters a contract marriage with Shanaya, a wealthy girl. As the complexities unfold, Namya struggles with familial expectations, questions of genuine connection, and moral choices, all while racing against time to secure his sister's future.

title: Aaichya Gavat Marathit Bol
cast: Sanskruti Balgude|Parth Bhalerao|Omi Vaidya|Kishori Shahane|Ila Bhatey
overview: A love story revolving around a young man and his attempts at securing love by speaking nonsensically misspeaking his mother tongue.

title: Tujha Tu Majha Mi
cast: Neha Mahajan|Lalit Prabhakar
overview: Jay, an enthusiastic traveller, leaves his house to explore different parts of the country. On his way to Goa, he befriends Rajashree, a young woman who has also fled her home.

title: Anything For Love
cast: Uma Bhende|Prakash Bhende|Ashok Saraf|Laxmikant Berde|Padma Chavan
overview: Rama, a suspicious woman, lands herself in hilarious situations while trying to impress her husband, Madhav. Meanwhile, Dr Bagaram, a failed doctor, is in love with Ratan, Rama's sister.

title: Shyamchi Aai
cast: Gauri Deshpande|Sharva Gadgil|Om Bhutkar|Mayur More|Sandeep Pathak
overview: An adaptation of social worker and freedom fighter Sane Guruji's autobiographical novel Shyamchi Aai.

title: Bhai: Vyakti Ki Valli - Poorvardha
cast: Sagar Deshmukh|Iravati Harshe|Satish Alekar|Sunil Barve|Amol Bavdekar
overview: Biopic of Marathi comedian, India's first stand-up comedian P. L. Deshpande.

title: Pondicherry
cast: Sai Tamhankar|Vaibhav Tatwawadi|Amruta Khanvilkar|Tanmay Kulkarni|Nina Kulkarni
overview: Nikita and her eight-year-old son, Ishan, stay in an old family villa in Pondicherry where she runs a home-stay for travelers. A mysterious man with an agenda arrives at Nikita's home-stay, giving all their lives an unexpected twist.

title: Aboli
cast: Varsha Usgaonkar|Vijay Gokhale|Sayaji Shinde|Renuka Shahane|Deepak Shirke
overview: An actress lives a lonely life and her only companion is her doll with whom she shares everything. Fed up with her stressful life, she goes to a remote place in search of peace.

title: Timepass 2
cast: Nitin Jadhav|Priyadarshan Jadhav|Priya Bapat
overview: Timepass 2 is sequel of Marathi movie Timepass

title: Adrushya
cast: Pushkar Jog|Manjari Fadnis|Riteish Deshmukh|Ajay Kumar Singh|Anant Jog
overview: This is the story of two twin sisters Sayli and Sanika. Suffering from Progressive Blindness, Sayli commits suicide by hanging herself and Sanika comes to Dehradun with her husband to find out the reasons behind it. Despite having a loving husband Lavoon, the incident of her sister's death does not allow Sanika to remain silent. Doctors have predicted the possibility of her becoming blind like Sayli due to excessive stress. Sanika also has to lose her husband while trying to find out the real reason behind Sayli's death. Finally Sanika also has to face blindness. Sanika's eyes are operated after receiving a donor. After that, the game of thriller unfolds in the true sense of mystery.

title: Zombivli
cast: Amey Wagh|Vaidehi Parshurami|Lalit Prabhakar|Janaki Pathak|Sharat Sonu
overview: In the suburban neighborhood of Mumbai, a wall separates the haves and the have-nots. Sudhir and Seema, a newly married middle class couple, live a life without hardship while Vishwas, a slum dweller, dreams of dignity for his people. Their lives collide as post nightfall the town fills up with ominous cries and moans that don't belong to people - they belong to zombies.

title: Shevatcha Malusara
cast: Ramesh Deo|Shrikant Moghe|Ashok Kumar|Chandrakant Gokhale|Sachin Pilgaonkar
overview: An unusual Marathi war movie which mobilises and updates a historical/regional chauvinism associated with 17th-C. Maratha emperor Shivaji. Major Subhanrao Malusare, a direct descendant of Shivaji’s legendary lieutenant Tanaji Malusare, continues a proud family tradition by winning the Victoria Cross as an Allied officer fighting against Italian fascists in WW2. When he dies, his wife Savitri (Uma) vows that their son will never join the army. However, during the India-China conflict (1962), when her son’s friend is killed, she enjoins her son to fight for the nation even though the boy’s death would mean the end of the ancient clan. The film updated the rousing sentimentalism associated with Shivaji historicals into the present via songs such as He bharatiyano aika balidan katha veeranchi.

title: Tula Shikvin Changlach Dhada
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Rujuta Deshmukh|Kadambari Kadam|Sanjay Narvekar|Mohan Joshi
overview: A struggling actor (Sanjay Narvekar) falls in love with a woman (Rujuta Dehmukh) and marries her without realizing that her uncle (Mohan Joshi) is the director who had rejected him. He then comes up with a plan to teach him a lesson.

title: Godavari
cast: Jitendra Joshi|Vikram Gokhale|Nina Kulkarni|Gauri Nalawade|Priyadarshan Jadhav
overview: Set in present day Nashik, a city in western India on the banks of the river Godavari, this is the story of a family that is coping with death - one they know about and another that they aren't prepared for.

title: Whats Up Lagna
cast: Vaibhav Tatwawadi|Prarthana Behere|Vandana Gupte|Ila Bhatey|Sunil Barve
overview: An IT professional, Aakash, who leads a near perfect life, and Ananya, an actress, who leads a rather messy, imperfect yet classy life, face turbulent times post marriage as their careers take a drastic positive turn.

title: Elizabeth Ekadashi
cast: Chaitanya Badve|Durgesh Badve-Mahajan|Sayali Bandakavathekar|Nandita Dhuri|Prasad Godbole
overview: During a financial shortcoming, A boy and his friends try to raise money  to prevent his bicycle (Elizabeth) from being pawned off.

title: Taptapadi
cast: Shruti Marathe|Nina Kulkarni|Veena Jamkar|Kashyap Parulekar|Ambarish Deshpande
overview: Meera falls in love with her cousin and even gets married to him. Their marital bliss, however, is dampened when she suffers a miscarriage and begins losing her eyesight.

title: Saapala
cast: Chinmay Mandlekar|Sameer Dharmadhikari|Dipti Ketkar|Neha Joshi|Sunil Jadhav
overview: Uday Rohekar is a renowned playwright, but all his recent plays are flops. At this critical juncture in his career, Uday comes across a perfect script that can get him fame and fortune, if he could only get rid of the real writer.

title: Pandu
cast: Bhalchandra Kadam|Kushal Badrike|Anand Ingle|Sonalee Kulkarni|Hemangi Kavi
overview: Pandu and Mhadu are small-time stand-up comedians in small village of Maharashtra who catch the eye of powerful politician Babasaheb Pathare who has always been the target of rival parties. Babasaheb gets inspired by Pandu and Mhadu's performance as they are in need of job he offers them job in Mumbai police force after their parts as cops in the skit. They both clear their training and join the police force as Pandu Hawaldar and Mhadu Hawaldar where Mhadu becomes a corrupt cop taking bribes from people. But Pandu is an honest cop and gets famous after he arrests back-to-back criminals. Pandu meets Usha Keliwali a beautiful woman and both get married with blessings of their family and Babasaheb. But things don't seem to be how it looks as whatever is happening in Pandu's life has been pre-planned by someone who wants to eliminate Babasaheb by making Pandu a scapegoat as he is his trusted aide.

title: Chitthi
cast: Shrikant Yadav|Dhanashri Kadgaonkar|Ashwini Giri|Nagesh Bhonsle|Shubhankar Ekbote
overview: A rom-com that revolves around the confusion caused by a misplaced love letter.

title: Timepass
cast: Prathamesh Parab|Ketaki Mategaonkar|Vaibhav Mangle|Meghana Erande|Bhalchandra Kadam
overview: When Cupid strikes the very first time it sees no class or caste barrier. And though the path to reunite with a loved one seems arduous and almost impossible, it's this love which makes a person do good things. Love doesn't remain a Time Pass anymore.

title: Deva
cast: Mohan Agashe|Jyoti Chandekar|Ankush Chaudhari|Tejaswini Pandit

title: Life Continues
cast: Ratna Pathak Shah|Neeraj Kabi|Amruta Subhash|Siddharth Menon|Naseeruddin Shah
overview: The film sheds light on the complicated & emotionally charged decision-making process for families when confronted by having to consider the organ donation of their recently deceased loved ones.

title: Pipsi A Bottle Full of Hope
cast: Maithili Patwardhan|Saahil Joshi|Ajay Jadhav|Atul Mahale|Abhilasha Patil
overview: The adventures of eight-year-olds Chaani and Balu as they try to save a fish, believing its fate to be tied to Chaani's ailing mother, set in drought-stricken Maharashtra. Will they succeed in their pursuit?

title: Morya
cast: Santosh Juvekar|Chinmay Mandlekar|Dilip Prabhavalkar|Ganesh Yadav|Janardan Parab
overview: There is a history of enmity between the youngsters of Ganesh Chawl, led by Manya (Santosh Juvekar) and Khatav Chawl, led by Sameer (Chinmay Mandlekar). Their rivalry intensifies during festivals like Gokulashtami and Ganeshotsav when both camps try to out-do each other

title: Once More
cast: Rohini Hattangadi|Ashutosh Patki|Dhanshree Dalvi|Naresh Bidkar|Bharat Ganeshpure
overview: Once More is a Marathi movie about Kapil, an archaeologist, who's unhappily married to Anjali. When he finds a possibly magical dagger, he visits to Avadhpuri to find out more. Anjali is also visiting her grandfather who lives in Avadhpuri. When Kapil and Anjali are reunited in the town, strange things happen which are tied to a secretive, ancient past. What happens when this secret comes to light?

title: Krutant
cast: Suyog Gorhe|Vidya Karanjikar|Faiz Khan|Sandeep Kulkarni|Sandeep Kulkarni
overview: Samyak, a working professional staying in Mumbai, plans a sudden trip to Konkan with his friends. While he wants to drive down to the destination, Samyak's wife suggest he take the bus instead. On reaching Konkan, Samyak meets Baba, a wise old man, while waiting for his friends to join him.

title: She and Others
cast: Sonali Kulkarni|Subodh Bhave|Amruta Subhash
overview: Anirudh Godbole and Naina are a contemporary upwardly mobile middle-class Maharashtrian couple. They stay with their 2 daughters in a comfortable flat in suburban Mumbai. Anirudh has a well-paid job in a corporate firm and Naina is a rising singer. They invite few of their close friends over dinner to celebrate the release of Naina's music album. The evening begins on a very pleasant and relaxed note. Soon they witness the crime being committed in the neighbouring building and the evening turns into a moral hell for all.

title: Crossroad
cast: Pravin Tarde|Upendra Limaye|Akshay Tanksale|Sanskruti Balgude
overview: A Chowk is like a solid witness that passively observes people, relationships, friendships, festivities, politics, and social interactions. Chowk is about crossroads.

title: Pressure Cooker Modak
cast: Malhaar Rathod|Atisha Naik|Dr. Suyog Gore|Jayant Gadekar|Tejas Shetye
overview: A nervous woman tries to woo her boyfriend's parents by cooking them their traditional delicacies.

title: Ghost's Brother
cast: Sachin Pilgaonkar|Ashok Saraf|Bharati Achrekar|Anant Jog|Viju Khote
overview: A simple man killed in his village turns into ghost and comes to the city find his long lost mother and brother and wants his brother to come along with him to revenge his killers but the killers have laid some different trap.

title: Sarja
cast: Ravindra Mahajani|Ajinkya Deo|Ramesh Deo|Pooja Pawar|Seema Deo
overview: A film about a brave man's attempt to capture a formidable fort by climbing up its most treacherous inclines.

title: Kaakan
cast: Ashutosh Gaikwad|Jitendra Joshi|Madhavi Juvekar|Urmilla Kothare|Ashok Shinde
overview: Star-crossed lovers from different social strata struggle to overcome differences in class and family expectation, as well as a long separation.

title: Sahela Re
cast: Mrinal Kulkarni|Subodh Bhave|Sumeet Raghvan|Suhita Thatte|Gajanan Paranjape
overview: A college reunion brings Niranjan back into Shamaa's life and gives her the confidence to live her life with a fresh new start. Sahela Re is a mature love story that teaches us to accept the changes that relationships go through during different phases of life.

title: Jivan Sandhya
cast: Kishori Shahane|Ashok Saraf|Sameer Dharmadhikari
overview: Jivan Sandhya is a emotional journey that explores the life of two widowed people who find love in their 60's and get married against their family's wishes.

title: Tarri
cast: Lalit Prabhakar|Shashank Shende|Gauri Nalawade|Yogesh Dimble|Anil Nagarkar
overview: A young hot tempered boy, Sangram popularly known as Tarri for his fearless attitude and unfettered courage, he fights against all odds and powerful adversaries to achieve what he has decided.

title: Shejari Shejari
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Ravindra Berde|Sanjay Mone|Kishore Nandlaskar|Ravi Patwardhan
overview: Preeti's marriage is on the rocks at the same time she comes to know that she can get hold of her property only if she has good relations with her husband.

title: Slam Book
cast: Ritika Shrotri|Mrunmayee Deshpande|Shantanu Ranganekar|Kushal Badrike|Nakti Atharva
overview: This is a story about going after your first love in the early 2000s.

title: Davpech
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Bharat Jadhav|Kushal Badrike|Rajesh Bhosle|Bhalchandra Kadam
overview: Two friends Nilkanth and Vyankat go to Phulgaon village to participate in a unique game in return of huge sum of money.

title: Kesari (Saffron)
cast: Virat Madake|Mahesh Manjrekar|Vikram Gokhale|Mohan Joshi|Nandesh Umap
overview: This is inspiring tale revolves around a youngster from a poor family who makes all efforts to win the prestigious 'Maharashtra Kesari' Wrestling competition. Will he achieve his ultimate goal through this tedious journey?

title: Imago
cast: Aishwarya Ghaydar|Amol Deshmukh|Adarsh Kurne|Vishwas Kamble|Neha Awati
overview: Namrata, a shy, introvert teenage girl living in a small village is suffering from leucoderma or vitiligo, a skin abnormality. White spots on dark skin have set her aside from others. Weird, sympathetic, penetrating ‘normal’ eye sights have made her feel guilty and embarrassed for who she is and how she looks.One fine day a young and vibrant teacher joins her school. A fine young man with strong belief in freedom and self-pride, he creates space for Namrata to breathe freely. She finds solace in his gaze, relief in his presence. Her isolated bubble is about to dissolve in ether. Romance is kindling teenage desires. Too much at stake, too much to lose…. Destinations seem far away, but the journey prevails…the complexes, the taboos, the inner conflicts are about to resolve…making her in to a different being altogether.

title: Vanilla, Strawberry & Chocolate
cast: Radhika Deshpande|Kshitij Deshpande|Ravi Kale|Rajashri Nikam|Janaki Pathak
overview: This is a story of a 10th Std girl, 'Teju' and her best friend 'Vanilla', who is a female dog. This film not only entertains you but it gives a social message. It says, Love animals, adopt a pet.

title: Trijya - Radius
cast: Abhay Mahajan|Shrikant Yadav|Girish Kulkarni|Adwaita Jadhav|Arya Rothe
overview: Artistically inclined villager Avdhut Kale struggles to find his place in the metropolis of Pune. His work and the mounting societal pressures of what is expected of him is a disconnect from his true self. Moreover, his passivity towards life is made apparent through his discourses with friends and family, who voice their perspective of life. Trijya traces the journey of Avdhut and how he faces the reality of his own dreams and aspirations about life in a large Indian city. It takes us through the challenges of today's modern way of life and the compromises one inevitably makes along the way to find peace and a place we can call our own.

title: Guru
cast: Jyoti Chandekar|Ankush Chaudhari|Urmilla Kothare|Ravindra Mankani|Avinash Narkar
overview: A big heart conman Guru witness a murder and falls into a scandal. He decides to return to his village to avoid the scandal where he notices his village is under the threat of being forcefully evicted to make way for a 'Mega City. The murder he witnessed is part of a big conspiracy and has connection to his village.

title: Picasso
cast: Samay Tambe|Prasad Oak|Ashwini Mukadam|Shreenath Ambeskar|Bappu
overview: Gandharva, a 7th grade student from a remote village in the Konkan belt of Maharashtra is selected for a National Painting Competition. The winner gets to travel to Spain - Picasso's birthplace - to hone their art. But entering the competition requires a fee that his parents cannot afford. With an ailing mother and a father struggling with debt and alcoholism

title: Trauma
cast: Mukta Barve|Kadambari Kadam|Vikram Gokhale|Shashank Shende|Amol Kolhe
overview: Dr Smita and her senior, Dr Khurana, become rivals when she opposes a decision made by him during an operation. When he uses his influence to dismiss her, she gets an inquiry set up against him.

title: Swami Public Ltd.
cast: Nina Kulkarni|Subodh Bhave|Vikram Gokhale|Chinmay Mandlekar|Bharat Ganeshpure
overview: The current competitive lifecycle invited many stressful moments. The younger generation is looking towards spiritual way to find peace and calmness. Corporates are mining for profits by commercializing faith of such people. Swami Public Ltd. speaks about this issue.

title: Mother
cast: Nina Kulkarni|Dilip Kulkarni|Shivaji Satham|Sunil Barve|Milind Gawali
overview: Life becomes hard for a family after the father is involved in an accident that causes him to lose his legs.

title: The Grinding Machine
cast: Renuka Daftardar|Madan Deodhar|Girish Kulkarni|Chandrakant Gokhale|Gitanjali Takalkar
overview: After her husband died, a mother buys a grinding-machine in order to make a living. Initially fascinated by the machine, her son starts getting irritated by its noise. He tries to destroy the machine to regain his childhood.

title: Balache Baap Brahmachari
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Alka Kubal|Ashok Saraf|Nivedita Joshi Saraf
overview: Two bachelors find an abandoned baby boy outside their house. They have no other option than to take care of him.

title: Girlfriend
cast: Amey Wagh|Sai Tamhankar|Kavita Lad Medhekar|Yatin Karyekar|Isha Keskar
overview: Nachiket is single and peer pressure to be in a relationship drives him to do something risky. But, does it land him in trouble or does it change his life for good?

title: Jilabi
cast: Swapnil Joshi|Shivani Surve|Prasad Oak|Ganesh Yadav|Parna Pethe
overview: Corrupt Inspector Vijay Karamarkar takes charge of a wealthy industrialist's murder case, seeing it as a chance to profit. However, he soon finds himself entangled in deeper troubles, complicating his life further.

title: Ringa Ringa
cast: Sonali Kulkarni|Ajinkya Deo|Bharat Jadhav|Uday Sabnis|Santosh Juvekar
overview: Rangrao is all set to become Goa's Chief Minister despite his links with terrorists. But one of his men has a change of heart and makes the dangerous choice to work against him. He spills the beans of Rangrao to the Party Chief. He is assigned the task of getting the evidence against Rangrao. The latter is soon killed but before dying, he reveals to his wife the location of the evidence.

title: Panchak
cast: Bharati Achrekar|Tejashri Pradhan|Adinath Kothare|Dilip Prabhavalkar|Anand Ingale
overview: After the death of a person, the curse of "Panchak" befalls upon their family, meaning that any five members of that very same family are going to die within a year.

title: Ranbhoomi
cast: Urmilla Kothare|Vikram Gokhale|Amol Kolhe|Shantanu Moghe|Niranjan Namjoshi
overview: Bhaurao Patil murders the son of his rival to make it big in politics. Meanwhile, the lives of a few youngsters change when they find themselves embroiled in college politics.

title: Chatrapati Shashan
cast: Santosh Juvekar|Makrand Deshpande|Kishore Kadam|Prashant Mohite|Sayali Kale
overview: If we understand Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj correctly and implement his ideas, principles and vision in ourselves, then we can have much better things in our society.

title: Doctor Doctor
cast: Alka Kubal|Laxmikant Berde|Kishore Pradhan|Gulab Korgaonkar|Deepak Shirke
overview: A hospital is managed under a strict discipline of a doctor, a ward boy joins the hospital and tries to entertain everyone.

title: Naal
cast: Devika Daftardar|Shrinivas Pokale|Nagraj Popatrao Manjule|Seva Chouhan|Deepti Devi
overview: Pampered by his loving and caring parents, an eight-year-old boy's life takes a turn for the worse when he learns a hidden truth about himself. Soon, he begins to distance himself from his mother.

title: Changu Mangu
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Ashok Saraf|Aruna Irani|Nivedita Joshi Saraf|Ravindra Berde
overview: Changu and Mangu are sons of a rich father and enjoy their lives by parting and troubling people.

title: Ramabai Bhimrao Ambedkar
cast: Nisha Parulekar|Ganesh Jethe|Dashrath Hatiskar|Manoj Takne|Snehal Vilankar
overview: Ramabai Bhimrao Ambedkar, the wife of Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar, becomes a part of her husband's mission to uplift the downtrodden in the country.

title: Ajintha
cast: Sonalee Kulkarni|Philip Scott-Wallace|Manoj Kolhatkar|Avinash Narkar|Jan Bostock
overview: While replicating the murals of Ajanta Caves in the eighteenth century, Robert Gill, a skilled painter and a British soldier, falls in love with a tribal girl.

title: Keechak Vadh
cast: Shobhana Samarth|Sumit Gupte|Baburao Pendharkar|Vimala Kumari|Kiran
overview: An incident from Mahabharata wherein the Pandavas were exiled.

title: Silk Knot
cast: Reema Lagoo|Sachin Khedekar|Shreyas Talpade|Sonali Khare|Arun Nalawade
overview: Anna deeply loves her husband, Sally, who is only with her to spend her money. However, when Sally disappears, Anna's resulting loneliness begins to drive her towards a younger man.

title: Mohini Bhasmasur
cast: Durgabai|Kamala|D.D. Dabke|Vishnu Sonar|D.B. Sukte
overview: The plot of the film revolves around the Hindu mythological story of Mohini and Bhasmasur. At over five hours, it inaugurated the tradition of Indian cinematic epics and was the first Indian film to feature actresses.

title: Satyashodhak
cast: Rajshri Deshpande|Sandeep Kulkarni|Ganesh Yadav|Suresh Vishwakarma|Ravindra Mankani
overview: The film follows the life of social reformer and writer Mahatma Jyotiba Phule.

title: Raja Harishchandra
cast: D.D. Dabke|P.G. Sane|Bhalachandra D. Phalke|G.V. Sane|Dattatreya Kshirsagar
overview: Revolves around the noble and righteous king, Harishchandra, who first sacrifices his kingdom, followed by his wife and eventually his children to honor his promise to the sage Vishwamitra.

title: Buddha
cast: Shashank Shende|Ninad Mahajani|Ketaki Narayan Kulkarni|Lucky Singh
overview: In the drought stricken eastern part of Maharashtra, the Christian missionaries decide to sell the land given to Dalits in exchange for their conversion to Christianity.

title: Chiranjeev
cast: Bhargavi Chirmule|Alka Kubal|Bharat Jadhav|Kishore Kadam|Suhasini Deshpande
overview: After a chained Ganya Kaka, suspected of having a curse, commits suicide, a tension arises in the family as to who will be the next person the curse will be passed on to.

title: Shikari
cast: Mrunmayee Deshpande|Bharat Ganeshpure|Siddharth Jadhav|Suvrat Joshi|Bhalchandra Kadam
overview: Raghu is an assistant to film director Ajwani and lusts behind women.His uncle Bahu Mama arranges his marriage to Phulwa a childish village girl who doesn't know the meaning of marriage and wants to get rid of her.Raghu comes across a sexy village belly Savita who wants to be an actress.He takes her advantage and exploits her promising role in films. Raghu takes Savita to Mumbai to work in films where she faces the true identify of glamour world where he is been exploited my many on pretext of work.

title: Sixteen
cast: Shilpa Tulaskar|Sachin Pilgaonkar|Vikram Gokhale|Mohan Joshi|Bharat Ganeshpure
overview: Girish, a well-to-do engineer, is happily married to the love of his life, Vidya. The couple also have a talented young daughter. Unfortunately, things don't really work out between Girish and Vidya and they decide to get divorced. After his divorce, Girish is in a tough financial situation and he approaches Vidya for a land deal. They decide to sell the land to help Girish get back on his feet. However, the court procedure forces them to stay together for a couple of days during which the reasons that led to their divorce unfold.

title: Hyancha Kahi Nem Nahi
cast: Ankush Chaudhari|Bharat Jadhav|Siddharth Jadhav|Viju Khote|Kishore Pradhan
overview: Jewellery shop owners brother Heere and Moti and many others are held hostage inside their shop by a shooter who has hold them on gun point from a opposite building.

title: Sarivar Sari
cast: Madhura Velankar|Manasi Salvi|Mohan Joshi|Nina Kulkarni
overview: Vini and Mani are sisters who belong to an orthodox family which values conformity over independence. Their family and surroundings are a constant reminder of what their place and aim in life should be. While Vini, born with an intellect and desire to work towards her goals, finds her way by accepting these limitations, Mani refuses to lead a predestined life. She rebels against traditions and charts her own path. Mani's struggle to find her place under the sun brings her in direct conflict with the rigid society. Armed with boundless energy and a burning desire to make her own mark in this world, she crosses all hurdles, but fame proves expensive. While her sister is applauded, Mani is scorned. She finds herself at the pinnacle of glory, alone without her father's pride or a pat on the back. As pressures mounts, it seems her family might disintegrate.

title: Question
cast: Anjali Jadhav|Ganesh Jadhav|Rajkumar Munde|Pooja Rathod|Anil Rathod
overview: Ganga and her husband Rajkumar work as seasonal sugar cutting Labourers on a contract basis. They have to migrate from place to place for the work leaving behind their Native Village. Their only son Ganesh (Age 10 Years ) has to accompany them be- cause Nobody is there at home to take care of him. This is a problem for Ganesh's educational progress as he is absent every year for Three Months. How Ganga, a Third Standard educated woman overcomes the problem of Ganesh's Education as well as finds a way of acquiring knowledge for her own Progress.

title: Mogra Phulaalaa
cast: Dipti Bhagawat|Madhuri Bharti|Sanyogita Bhave|Umesh Damle|Sai Deodhar

title: Smruti Chitre
cast: Vijaya Mehta|Suhas Joshi|Ravindra Mankani|Pallavi Patil|Mangesh Kulkarni
overview: The memoir of a woman married to an orthodox Brahmin philosopher who converts to Christianity, her story explores issues of religious barriers, disillusionment,and romantic devotion.

title: Sarkarnama
cast: Ashwini Bhave|Prateeksha Lonkar|Ajinkya Deo|Dilip Prabhavalkar|Yashwant Dutt
overview: The residents of a village are being driven out of their homes for the sake of a new building by the politician-builder nexus, but one man tries to step in and stop them.

title: Sinhasan
cast: Shreeram Lagoo|Mohan Agashe|Reema Lagoo|Nana Patekar|Usha Nadkarni
overview: As a heated race for the post of chief minister erupts between the incumbent and a challenger from his own party, political passions play out behind the scenes as seen through a journalist's eyes in this landmark drama. Directed by Jabbar Patel and inspired by Arun Sadhu's novels Mumbai Dinank and Simhasan, the film -- one of India's earliest political pictures -- stars Arun Sarnaik, Shriram Lagoo and Nilu Phule.

title: Khatyal Sasu Nathal Soon
cast: Varsha Usgaonkar|Daya Dongre|Prema Kiran|Laxmikant Berde|Chandu Parkhi
overview: A woman is extremely possessive about her son, Abhay, and warns him against talking to any other woman. Things take a turn when he meets Maya and they fall in love.

title: Preetam
cast: Nakshatra Medhekar|Pranav Raorane|Upendra Limaye|Vishwajeet Sunil Palav|Sameer Khandekar
overview: Preetam revolves around a milkman living in a rural area of Konkan, Maharashtra, who struggles to deal with his dark skin. Exploring the question of whether outer beauty really matters, the film follows his search for love.

title: Rege
cast: Aroh Velankar|Neha Bam|Avadhoot Gupte|Anant Jog|Vidyadhar Joshi
overview: A college teen named Rege slowly becomes engulfed in the criminal underworld when he crosses the path of a mysterious small-time gangster named "M Bhai".

title: Navardev Bsc. Agri
cast: Kshitish Date|Priyadarshini Indalkar|Pravin Tarde|Hardik Joshi|Makarand Anaspure
overview: Story of a young educated farmer Rajvardhan who returns village to continue farming and help others to grow their yields better. He starts looking for a bride, but gets rejected as he is a mere farmer in the villagers' eyes.

title: Pitruroon
cast: Poorvi Bhave|Suhas Joshi|Sachin Khedekar|Omkar Kulkarni|Tanuja Samarth
overview: In today's urban Indian lifestyle where more relationships seem idealistic and flawless, an archaeologist encounters his look alike and the disturbing past of the look alike's aging mother in rural Maharashtra. But was his father responsible for the plight of this old woman. The film is an emotional story of a romance failed by a cruel twist of fate, a confrontation of shattered family values and rebuilding of human bonds.

title: Smile Please
cast: Lalit Prabhakar|Mukta Barve|Prasad Oak
overview: Nandini Joshi, an award-winning photographer, is going through a personal crisis. Even as her busy husband and stubborn daughter continue to neglect her, Nandini struggles to find a sense of purpose and dignity. Will she ever rediscover the lost verve for life?

title: Pandu Hawaldar
cast: Dada Kondke|Lata Arun|Roohi Berde|Usha Chavan|Ratnamala
overview: Pandu is an honest Hawaldar in Bombay police who loves to do his work with honesty whereas his co worker and his friend are totally the opposite of him and only want to extract money from people.

title: De Dana Dan
cast: Mahesh Kothare|Laxmikant Berde|Nivedita Joshi Saraf|Prema Kiran|Jairam Kulkarni
overview: Lakshya, a police constable gets some extra ordinary powers in his body after he is saved from a blast.

title: Alyad Palyad
cast: Makrand Deshpande|Gaurav More|Saksham Kulkarni|Bhagyam Jain|Anushka Pimputkar
overview: Everyone stays away from the island village for three days every year. It is said that whoever stays behind will get killed by the spirits lurking in the village. What will happen when three friends accidentally get stuck there along with their boatman?

title: Mumbai Pune Mumbai 2
cast: Mukta Barve|Swapnil Joshi|Prashant Damle|Savita Prabhune|Asawari Joshi
overview: Gautam and Gauri, who live in different cities, meet and decide to get married. However, when Gauri learns more about her in-laws, she starts having second thoughts about the wedding.

title: Oh The Cruel World
cast: Ranjana|Mandakani Bhadbhade|Mohan Gokhale|Alka Inamdar|Dinkar Inamdar
overview: Ratna is married off into a rich family and leads a happy existence with her husband. But the doings of a relative and her husband's tragic death push her down a road full of trials and tribulations.

title: Janmathep
cast: Ashwini Bhave|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Nilu Phule|Nishigandha Wad|Prabhakar Panshikar
overview: 'Janmathep' is a superhit drama Marathi movie starring Sadashiv Amarapurkar, Ashwini Bhave and Nilu Phule. Directed by Vishwas Patil and Produced by Mrs. Chandrasena Patil.

title: Apsara
cast: Vijay Nikam|Shashank Shende|Suyash Zunjurke|Ashish Warang|Akshata Padgaonkar
overview: A Marathi love story.

title: The Great Dr. Ambedkar
cast: Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar
overview: The film recounts the key events of Dr. Ambedkar’s life and it also features live footage of his later years.

title: Mosambi Narangi
cast: Usha Chavan|Shreeram Lagoo|Yashwant Dutt|Sushma Shiromani|Nilu Phule
overview: In an act of jealousy, Mambaji kills Raghuji's prize-winning bull, abducts his daughters and hits him, damaging his memory. When the daughters grow up, they try to find the truth from the past.

title: Naal 2
cast: Shrinivas Pokale|Deepti Devi|Devika Daftardar|Jitendra Joshi|Nagraj Popatrao Manjule
overview: Chaitanya comes to terms with his real mother and father, but it starts to cause a great rift between him and their son.

title: Kaasav: Turtle
cast: Iravati Harshe|Alok Rajwade|Mohan Agashe|Kishore Kadam
overview: Janaki, a divorcee trying to find meaning of life in a sea-turtle conservation project run by the conservationist Dattabhau in a coastal village, accidentally meets an young man. Janaki, with her empathy for the young man, Manav, tries to create a non-judgmental, non-intrusive, warm atmosphere to help him bloom. Janaki herself, her driver-assistant Yadu, conservationist Dattabhau, servant Bablya and street-kid Parshu - none of them not related to each other - become the vulnerable young Manav's support system.

title: Dhangad Dhinga
cast: Varsha Usgaonkar|Kishori Ambiye|Mahesh Kothare|Laxmikant Berde|Prajakta Dighe
overview: Lakshya wins his cases by lying and is unable to speak the truth. However, things take a turn when Lakshya gets a case where he needs to tell the truth to get justice for his client.

title: Mahasatta
cast: Ashwini Ekbote|Arun Nalawade|Avinash Narkar|Milind Shinde|Sandesh Jadhav
overview: Shows the current political outlook in India and how it has survived the ongoing corruption and power struggle and also offers solutions to eradicate corrupt practices and make India a superpower.

title: Pune Via Bihar
cast: Mrunmayee Deshpande|Umesh Kamat|Bharat Jadhav|Arun Nalawade|Uma Sardeshmukh
overview: The story of Pune via Bihar has the two states of Maharashtra and Bihar in the backdrop. The film is about the difference of opinion between two cultures. It does not make any political statement and is basically a love-story that depicts the bloodless struggle of a couple to unite with each other

title: Gho Mala Asala Hawa
cast: Radhika Apte|Mohan Agashe|Omkar Govardhan|Vidula Javalgekar|Nina Kulkarni
overview: Savitri, a young girl, revolts against the age-old custom of arranged marriages. Despite facing troubles, she manages to convince an entire village about the upshots of pre-planned matches.

title: Uttarayan
cast: Shivaji Satham|Nina Kulkarni|Uttara Baokar|Sharad Kelkar|Gauri Nigudkar
overview: After his wife passes away and a heart attack forces him to retire, middle-aged widower Raghuveer Rajadhyaksh (Shivaji Satham) moves back to his hometown of Mumbai , where he reconnects with his first love, Durgi (Neena Kulkarni). The pair quickly finds that the years have done little to diminish their feelings for each other. Director Bipin Nadkarni's tender romantic drama is based on Jaywant Dalvi's acclaimed play "Durgi."

title: Timepass 3
cast: Priya Bapat|Rakesh Bhavsar|Bhalchandra Kadam|Hruta Durgule|Vaibhav Mangle
overview: Dagdu hasn't changed much since Prajakta left but his attempt to appear again for 10th standard exams proves worthy and with help of his friends he manages to pass out with 36 percent.

title: Banya Bapu
cast: Sarla Yeolekar|Usha Naik|Sharad Talwalkar|Mohan Gokhale|Bal Karve
overview: Banya and Bapu are two friends who are living in a cow shed and in search of work. Banya leaves a suicidal letter to Bapu due to poverty but Kanta spoils his plans by asking to save his drowning brother. They both get a job as waiters in a hotel and Bapu falls in love with Kamal.

title: Chaitra
cast: Sonali Kulkarni|Lalan Sarang|Dhiresh Joshi|Bhakti Pathare|Vandana Vakhnis
overview: The story of a proud woman, her poetic vindication of unfair social insult, and her inevitable sad destiny. A very culture-specific film dipped in a local festival of rural women.

title: Alibaba Ani Chalishitale Chor
cast: Subodh Bhave|Mukta Barve|Umesh Kamat|Madhura Velankar|Shruti Marathe
overview: Doctor and his wife regularly invite a group of close friends for a weekend of partying at their farmhouse. When lights go out on one such occasion, and they hear a sound of a kiss followed by someone getting slapped, everyone is curious about who the perpetrators are. But it's only the beginning of a mystery.

title: Bol Hari Bol
cast: Akanksha Sakharkar|Akshay Kelkar|Ramesh Vani|Umesh Jangam|Akshay Shimpi
overview: The story revolves around a middle-class Indian family, where a father dreams of living in a building while his son wants to start a business, leading to a strained relationship.

title: Bandhan
cast: Nishigandha Wad|Ajinkya Deo|Ramesh Bhatkar|Asha Kale|Vasant Shinde
overview: Pramila believes that the only reason men marry women is so that they can treat them as slaves. When she meets Mohan and he proposes to her, she agrees to marry him to prove herself.

title: Sanai Choughade
cast: Subodh Bhave|Bharati Achrekar|Tushar Dalvi|Shreyas Talpade|Sai Tamhankar
overview: Sanai Choughade is a Marathi movie released in 2008. Produced by Deepti Shreyad Talpade & directed by Rajeev Patil. It is a family entertainer full of twists & turns which forces everyone to inspect the conventional arranged marriage system

title: Laal Ishq
cast: Swapnil Joshi|Anjana Sukhani
overview: A superstar named Yash Patwardhan agrees to be a part of his mentor's play. For the rehearsals, the entire team of the play comes to stay at a resort. This is where Yash meets Janhavi and falls in love with her. While their romance blossoms, the resort witnesses the murder of the play director Poddar. An investigation ensues at the hands of cops Randive and Nandini who consider Yash and Janhavi as the main suspects. As the case unfolds, lots of hidden truths surface.

title: Mast Challay Aamcha
cast: Vijay Patkar|Bharat Jadhav|Vishakha Subhedar|Kishori Ambiye|Bhushan Kadu
overview: Love and hate relationship between a bank manager Father in law and an auto rickshaw driver Son in law where both pretend to be one above the other.

title: Left Thumb Signature
cast: Ashok Saraf|Makarand Anaspure|Nirmiti Sawant|Mohan Agashe|Purnima Ahire
overview: In a village called Savargaon in Maharashtra, six male and female teachers are told to conduct the adult literacy program. This requires extra working hours but they run the program with no result.

title: A Dot Com Mom
cast: Meena Nerurkar|Vikram Gokhale|Sai Gundewar|Vijay Chavan|Shriram Kolhatkar
overview: Sulbatai returns to India after earning belittlement from her daughter-in-law for her demeanour. So, when her son requests her to return to the USA, she strives to prove her worth.

title: Fear
cast: Smita Gondkar|Sanskruti Balgude|Abhijeet Khandkekar|Siddharth Bodke|Satish Rajwade
overview: Gokul Joshi becomes overwhelmed with the fast-paced life of Mumbai and prefers staying at his home. However, things take a turn when he unexpectedly stumbles upon a murder scene.

title: Soniyachi Mumbai
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Priya Arun Berde|Deepak Shirke|Vijay Patkar|Vijay Gokhale
overview: Four friends decide to leave their village and go to Mumbai in search of a livelihood.

title: Chiki Chiki Booboom Boom
overview: A reunion near Mumbai takes a dark turn when friends find a corpse in the farmhouse. Unable to contact authorities, they face mounting tension as mysterious visitors arrive.

title: Ye Re Ye Re Paisa 2
cast: Smita Gondkar|Anand Ingle|Sanjay Narvekar|Mrinal Kulkarni|Rohit KaduDeshmukh
overview: Ye Re Ye Re Paisa 2 (English: Let money come) is an Indian Marathi language comedy drama film directed by Hemant Dhome and bankrolled by Ameya Vinod Khopkar, Purple Bull Entertainment, Trance VFX Studios Pvt Ltd and Panorama Studios.

title: Same to Same
cast: Priya Arun Berde|Laxmikant Berde|Ravindra Berde|Vijay Chavan|Alka Inamdar
overview: Three sets of twins navigate ambition, betrayal, and love, one set meeting with tragedy, the others finding their happily-ever-after.

title: Muramba
cast: Sachin Khedekar|Amey Wagh|Chinmayi Sumit|Mithila Palkar
overview: A seemingly perfect couple suddenly end their relationship, much to the chagrin of the parents, who try to speak to their children in their language.

title: Kunku
cast: Ajinkya Deo|sanjay bhalekar|Seema Deo|manda desai|Vikram Gokhale
overview: Dr Ram marries a widowed nurse from his hospital tragedy strikes when her dead husband comes to their house as Ram's patient.

title: Paradh
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Siddharth Jadhav
overview: Industrialization has reached each and every small village in India and the villages here are bearing the brunt of urbanisation in their own way. This is the story of a family residing in one such village. The family comprises an elder brother Vithal, a farmer by profession, younger brother Anand, a student, and the middle one Yeshwant, a vagabond, who left his education midway. He would squander his time by standing at the local paan shop, and as expected, he volunteers for the local political party.  Ambadas would often use such people to enhance his political status, challenges Appa, a senior political leader and uses Yeshwant as his scapegoat. Caught in a whirlpool of lies, deceit and betrayal, Yeshwant and his family are on the run. But without surrendering to the cruel and ruthless circumstances, they manage to stare in the face of danger with courage and valour.

title: Dahavi Fa
cast: Atul Kulkarni|Jyoti Subhash|Milind Gunaji
overview: School kids who feel discriminated against must learn to channel their righteous indignation in a positive way.

title: Mukkam Post London
cast: Mrunmayee Lagoo|Bharat Jadhav|Mohan Joshi|Bimegha Ghamkar|Krish Mandar Shinde
overview: After his mother dies, a boy from the village discovers that his father had abandoned them. He goes abroad to meet his father to return a few of his things. His father attempts to win him over.

title: Ladhaai
cast: Varsha Usgaonkar|Dipak Deoulgaonkar|Sayaji Shinde|Vinay Apte|Archana Patkar
overview: Sunita Nadkarni is known to fight for everyone's rights and she lives in quarters of KSB Chemical factory where recently the colony has noted four back to back deaths of children.

title: Janiva
cast: Vaibhavi Shandilya|Satya Manjrekar|Devdutt Dani|Anuradha Mukherjee|Sanket Agarwal
overview: It is a contemporary story of a teenager who portrays an image of a protagonist is progressive-thinking, creative, tech-savvy, yet socially responsible. He upholds age-old values like honesty, integrity and uprightness. There is thrill and adventure which is inbuilt in the film and then there happens an injustice towards a victim on a social networking platform and the teenager's life takes an intriguing turn.

title: Ventilator
cast: Ashutosh Gowariker|Ashutosh Gowariker|Jitendra Joshi|Sulabha Arya|Sukanya Kulkarni
overview: Ventilator is a Marathi Movie about Joint-Family relations and emotions.

title: Irada Pakka
cast: Sonalee Kulkarni|Siddharth Jadhav
overview: Rohit and Adhya are happily married and in order to break the monotony in life, they decide to play a game; little knowing that destiny had something else in store for them. A game in which unprecedented events take a different turn, a turn for the worst and threaten their very existence.

title: Chi Va Chi Sau Ka
cast: Mrinmayee Godbole|Lalit Prabhakar|Jyoti Subhash|Pornima Talwalkar|Sunil Abhyankar
overview: Savitri and Satyaprakash are introduced to each other through their families for marriage. Both being poles apart, they decide to understand each other by getting into a live-in relationship.

title: Mumbai Pune Mumbai 3
cast: Swapnil Joshi|Mukta Barve|Savita Prabhune|Suhas Joshi|Rupal Nand
overview: Gautam and Gauri, an ambitious couple, are happily married and decide to focus on their careers. But an unplanned pregnancy causes conflict between them and their families.

title: And What Is the Summer Saying
overview: The camera sways slightly, setting in a majestic black and white on the intimate stories of a small village bordering the jungle. A mystical and poetic cinematic experience, in which one gladly gets lost.

title: Target
cast: Tejaswini Pandit|Smita Gondkar|Ankush Chaudhari|Swapnil Joshi|Siddharth Jadhav
overview: Sanjubhai, Anky, Sattar, Swapnil and Pady along with three female friends go for a rave party at a farmhouse in the jungle, where a cop tries to arrest Swapnil for drugs possession. However all the friends escape in the jungle and then they see a child sacrifice being performed in the jungle and then chance upon another boy who is kidnapped. They rescue the boy but the kidnappers are after them will they survive in the jungle and get the bad guys into jail and solve the 'sacrifice' mystery.

title: Ek Gaon Bara Bhangadi
cast: Jayshree Gadkar|Arun Sarnaik|Dada Salvi|Nilu Phule|Varsha Patil
overview: Ek Gaav Bara Bhangadi is a 1968 Indian Marathi drama film released on 1968. The film is directed by Anant Mane.

title: Ishq Wala Love
cast: Adinath Kothare|Sulagna Panigrahi
overview: A lawyer who doubles up as a musician is looking for the perfect girl for his music video. The one he finds turns out to be perfect in every way.

title: Kuldeepak
cast: Savita Prabhune|Shreeram Lagoo|Laxmikant Berde|Daya Dongre|Nilu Phule
overview: Shyam returns from London and Rao Saheb hands him all the business. Janradhan and employee of Raosaheb who eyes his chair creates a rift between the the two as Shyam considers his employee at the top. He loves Kiran whose daughter of Bhau Kasbe, an old rival of Raosaheb, Janardhan tells him that she is the reason behind Shyam's change. Kiran and Shyam get married with blessings of her cousin Raja but Raosaheb disowns them and they start living separately and Janardhan takes advantage of the rift and kills Shyam. But Kiran soon delivers a baby boy named Deepak years later Raosaheb comes across him and wants to take his custody.

title: MyLek
cast: Sonali Khare|Sanayaah Anand|Umesh Kamat|Sanjay Mone|Shubhangi Latkar
overview: A young single mother struggling to balance her career and personal life navigates a loving but challenging relationship with her strong willed and intrepid teenage daughter as she hits puberty.

title: Maratha Tituka Melavava
cast: Sulochana Latkar|Kashinath Ghanekar|Chandrakant Gokhale|Alhaad|Jaishankar Danve
overview: The story is based in the times of Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. The film depicts the life of his soliders who sacrifice their life for their Maharaj.

title: Smell
cast: Amruta Subhash|Sonali Kulkarni|Nina Kulkarni|Milind Soman|Girish Kulkarni
overview: An ensemble of three independent stories is bound together by characters, who are going through experiences involving the senses of smell. The stories depict the complexity of relationships and their varied emotional landscape.

title: Dum Dum Diga Diga
cast: Kishori Ambiye|Priya Arun Berde|Pooja Nayak|Makarand Anaspure|Mangesh Desai
overview: Two unemployed youths find and persuade girls, who are rich, to marry them.

title: Territory
cast: Sheshpal Ganvir|Sandeep Kulkarni|Kishore Kadam|Yogesh Kulkarni
overview: A rift between tigers and remote villagers of Maharashtra, India and the rangers' quest to protect all of them.

title: & Jara Hatke
cast: Mrinal Kulkarni|Indraneil Sengupta|Shivani Rangole|Siddharth Menon|Sonali Khare
overview: A film about social norms, generation gaps, second chances and the tough choices that parents make for their children and sometimes when children have to do the same.

title: Y
cast: Mukta Barve|Prajakta Mali|Nitin Bansode|Omkar Govardhan|Rohit Kokate
overview: The story revolves around Dr. Aarti Deshmukh, a mother of a daughter, is tasked with investigating the medical systems involved in female foeticide. In front of the conscientious Aarti who does her job well, Dr. Purushottam stands as a challenge. Despite many attempts, Aarti does not find any evidence against Purushottam. Purushottam eventually uses his powers to transfer Aarti, but in the days remaining before the transfer, Aarti takes up the task of gathering evidence.

title: Unn Sawali
cast: Shivani Surve|Bhushan Pradhan|Ajinkya Nanaware|Raj Sharnagat|Ankita Bhoir
overview: Pranay doesn't want to get married and Aanvi on the other hand doesn't want to get married too but she cannot tell that to her mother so they both unwillingly say yes to their marriage for their parent's sake. Two strangers get engaged and their journey to find love in each other's heart begins.

title: Amar Bhoopali
cast: Panditrao Nagarkar|Sandhya Shantaram|Lalita Pawar
overview: Veteran director V. Shantaram spins this bio-pic about poet and musician Honaji Bala, best know for popularizing the Lavani dance form and for writing the classic raga Ghanashyam Sundara Shirdhara.

title: Man Yedyagat Zala
cast: Swanandi Berde|Sumedh Mudgalkar|Vidyadhar Joshi|Surekha Kudachi|Shweta Pardeshi
overview: A budding love story of two students in the bloom of their youth set against the backdrop of college.

title: Pune 52
cast: Sonali Kulkarni|Sai Tamhankar|Girish Kulkarni|Radhika Apte|Swanand Kirkire
overview: Amar works as a private detective and tries to make his overbearing wife happy. He becomes involved in a police investigation and has an affair with his client's paramour.

title: Sur Sapata
cast: Mangesh Kanthale|Upendra Limaye|Govind Namdeo|Pravin Tarde|Hansraj Jagtap
overview: This story is about young boys who have capabilities of playing KABADDI but the society is against them, they took this as challenge and their journey starts from here. Boys went out of the box after facing hardship and being discouraged from their guru and parents to win hearts of people. To feel the thrill, motivation, entertainment, comedy, sportsmanship; come and watch movie along with your family and friends.

title: Unsaid Harmony
cast: Kay Kay Menon|Rajeshwari Sachdev|Abhijit Aamkar|Shalva Kinjawdekar|Vibhav Rajadhyaksha
overview: In today’s rapidly changing world, it consists of a stressed life. With its changing lifestyle, every individual struggles to perceive their own existence in the world, and by that if today’s youth get diverted from their desired goals, then who should be blamed or questioned? The common people who struggle to accomplish their goals, or the society, or the parents who have too many hopes & expectations from today’s youth? Is it the irresponsible youth or the so-called responsible parents?

title: All Men Are Donkeys
cast: Padma Chavan|Sharad Talwalkar|Usha Naik|Kuldeep Pawar|Dhumal
overview: Three women run a women's self-help group and think themselves superior to their respective husbands. As a result, the men join hands with an unemployed youth to teach their wives a lesson.

title: 6 Marks
cast: Amruta Subhash|Sunil Barve|Archit Deodhar|Siddhesh Parab|Atul Todankar
overview: Vidya’s academic performance means everything for his mother Saraswati. She can’t fathom that in her quest to make Vidya the best student, she is turning him into a depressed kid. Competition from class newcomer Rajas takes a toll on Vidya. He contemplates suicide and it is only the return of his father Shriganesh from the US that brings his life back on track.

title: Songadya
cast: Usha Chavan|Dada Kondke|Bhalchandra Kulkarni|Ganpat Patil|Shanta Tambe
overview: Innocent Namya the son of the tough Shitabai, is taken by his friends to see a Tamasha performance. He gets so excited by the Mahabharata scene of Draupadi's Vastraharan, that he jumps on stage disrupting the performance. He goes to the next village to see the performance again, where as the actor who is to play the monkey-god Hanuman gets drunk, He is invited to understudy the part. Namya's distraught mother kicks him out of the house, but the dancer Kalavati offers him shelter. Then a simpleton Namya falls in love with the glamours Kalavati.

title: Karayla Gelo Ek
cast: Kishori Ambiye|Ashok Saraf|Vijay Chavan|Pradeep Patwardhan|Dipali Sayyed
overview: Friends Mane, Sathe and Kale decide to go on a road trip to Lonavla, where they meet a beautiful girl called Riya. Seeing Kale pursue her, the other two also join in, spoiling his plans.

title: Mumbai to Mauritius
cast: Varsha Usgaonkar|Ashok Saraf|Laxmikant Berde|Jayshree Gadkar|Bal Dhuri
overview: Mumbai Te Mauritius (1991) starring Ashok Saraf, Laxmikant Berde, Varsha Usgaonkar, Jayshree Gadkar, Sudhir Dalvi & Bal Dhuri. Directed by Satish Randive.

title: A Paying Ghost
cast: Umesh Kamat|Spruha Joshi|Atul Parchure|Mahesh Manjrekar|Pushkar Shrotri
overview: A Paying Ghost (PG) is a story based on a famous novel "Badali" authored by Vasant Purushottam Kale (V.P Kale). The story narrates the interaction between a common innocent man and a homeless ghost family. A horror film with streaks of fun and laughter and it also brings experience into the magical world of the Ghosts

title: Ek Krantiveer: Vasudev Balwant Phadke
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Ajinkya Deo|Ramesh Deo|Chandrakant Gokhale|Smita Gondkar
overview: Vasudev Balwant Phadke's sacrifice rekindled the dying flames of the 1857 Uprising and he came to be worshipped as the foremost revolutionary of the nation. Watch the movie to find out how he fought against all odds.

title: Sarva Line Vyasta Aahet
cast: Satish Agashe|Rani Agrawal|Sanskruti Balgude|Mahesh Manjrekar|Siddharth Jadhav
overview: Sameer's parents want him to get married, but he is awkward around girls and lacks the confidence to approach them. Sameer's childhood friend Babya, who has been a playboy all his life, decides to help Sameer get married to the girl of his dreams. But even before Sameer's love story can kick-start, Babya decides to get married leading to a roller coaster ride of fun and chaotic situations.

title: Kunku
cast: Keshavrao Date|Shanta Apte|Vimala Vashisht
overview: Neera (Apte) is trapped into marrying an old widower Kakasaheb (Date). He is a progressive lawyer with a son and daughter of Neera's age. Neera refuses to consummate the union claiming that while suffering can be borne, injustice cannot. Neera faces many hurdles including her mother-in-law and a lascivious stepson Pandit (Nene).

title: Dhum Dhadaka
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Ashok Saraf|Mahesh Kothare|Nivedita Joshi Saraf|Surekha
overview: Three young man will try all possible ways to impress Dhanajirao Wakde to approve their marriages.

title: Hello Jai Hind!
cast: Nitin Chandrakant Desai|Trupti Bhoir|Kedar Shinde|Vinay Apte|Mayur Kaushal
overview: The bravery of the Martyr Police Constable Tukaram Ombale during the terrorist attack in Mumbai.

title: Gaon Tasa Changala
cast: Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Sanjay Narvekar|Nilu Phule|Kranti Redkar|Siddharth Jadhav
overview: An elderly teacher relocates to Vaitagwadi, a village of uninterested and idle people. He hopes to reopen the school and educate the village folk but faces many obstacles.

title: Aayna Ka Bayna
cast: Akhilesh|Sulabha Arya|Sanket Farad|Amruta Khanvilkar|Sachin Khedekar
overview: We dance for laughter, We dance for tears, We dance for madness, We dance for fears, We dance for hopes, We dance for screams, We are the dancers, We create the dreams.

title: Haldi Kunku
cast: Ranjana|Usha Naik|Ashok Saraf|Sudhir Dalvi|Govind Kulkarni
overview: Film with a soundtrack featuring Asha Bhosle.

title: Ha Khel Savlyancha
cast: Madhu Apte|Sanjivani Bidkar|Sangita Bole|Dhumal|Kashinath Ghanekar
overview: When Indumati gets possessed by the spirit of her servant, Shekhar, a doctor who wants to marry her, decides to save her by risking his own life.

title: Classmates
cast: Ankush Chaudhari|Sachit Patil|Sushant Shelar|Sonalee Kulkarni|Sai Tamhankar
overview: Feel-good movie about a college life of couple of friends and the consequences of a turning point which changed the life of each one of them.

title: Anandi Anand
cast: Ashok Saraf|Tejashri|Prashant Damle|Archana Patkar|Vijay Kadam
overview: Advertising agency owner Prakash, a married man, is ecstatic when he lands a big account. But his joy comes to an end when after a night of drinking he wakes up in the house of a beautiful model.

title: Dangerous
cast: Mahesh Kothare|Laxmikant Berde|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Nutan Vasant|Aarti Chandorkar
overview: Two friends, Laxya and Bharat, run a detective agency. They face several challenges when they are asked to nab a serial killer.

title: My Husband Is a Millionaire
cast: Supriya Pilgaonkar|Sachin Pilgaonkar
overview: A poor girl aspires to have all the comforts in life by marrying a rich man. Opportunity comes her way, but the hitch is that the young man wants to marry a widow.

title: Nau Mahine Nau Divas
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Pooja Naik|Sanjay Narvekar|Nirmiti Sawant|Pradeep Patwardhan
overview: The Royal Deshmukh family is rich for a history of adoption, as the women have failed to conceive for seven generations. Here comes in Dr. Shriram, full of innovative home remedies for the couple who refuses to settle for adoption and is hellbent to have their own child.

title: Aaron
cast: Swastika Mukherjee|Neha Joshi|Antoinette Fekete|Shashank Ketkar|Barnabás Tóth
overview: Babu, a fifteen-year-old boy from a small village in Konkan (Maharashtra), has not met his mother for many years due to her work in Paris. The boy and his uncle, who is entrusted with the responsibility of taking him to his mother, start their journey to Paris, which turns out to be an unforgettable sojourn for them. Babu's quest to meet his mother with the help of his uncle reveals many dimensions of human nature, feelings, and emotions.

title: Subhadra Haran
cast: Jayshree Gadkar|Suryakant|Arun Sarnaik|Shahu Modak|Chitra
overview: Arjuna abducts Subhadra, the half-sister of Krishna, on the instructions of Krishna when she is about to marry Duryodhana.

title: Ubuntu
cast: Sarang Sathaye|Shashank Shende|Umesh Jagtap|Bhagyashree Shankpal|Kanha Bhave
overview: A school master and his students at a small school in a village in Maharashtra fight against all odds to keep the school open against the efforts of many in the village who would prefer the children work instead of attend school.

title: The Kill
cast: Radhika Apte|Girish Kulkarni|Shrikant Yadav
overview: A tribal man in central India finds himself at a crossroads where he must choose between winning his family's trust and betraying his religious beliefs, thereby endangering an innocent life.

title: The Anchor
cast: Kishori Shahane|Ravi Kale|Manava Naik|Milind Shinde|Pankaj Vishnu
overview: 'Langar' is a Marathi film that projects the life of the Waghya Murli community in Maharashtra. The story is based on a book written by renowned social reformist, Anil Awchat. The film creates awareness about the exploitation, sorrow and traditions that prevail in the Waghya Murli community. The film throws light on injustice to children from a particular community in a village, where parents offer their children to God, just to keep their vows to God.

title: Aaicha Gondhal
cast: Nirmiti Sawant|Sunil Barve|Kuldeep Pawar|Amey Wagh|Sharad Bhutadiya
overview: A dynamic woman loves her village and tries to protect its villagers from acts of injustice even after her death, along with her husband and son.

title: Vakratunda Mahakaaya
cast: Prarthana Behere|Rahul Pethe|Satchit Puranik|Naman Jain|Nachiket Purnapatre
overview: A terrorist attempts to plant a plush toy Ganesh containing a bomb in a temple, but it is stolen by a stubborn child and a race against time begins as the toy passes from hand to hand, ready to explode.

title: The Cheetahs of Roop Nagar
cast: Mugdha Chaphekar|Saorabh Rajnish Choughule|Karan Parab|Kunal Shukla|Hemal ingle
overview: The film follows a fascinating journey of two childhood friends and their contrasting lives in two different cities after an incident that changes their lives forever.

title: Sugar Salt and Love
cast: Sonali Kulkarni|Shilpa Tulaskar|Kranti Redkar|Sameer Dharmadhikari|Ajinkya Deo
overview: Three women navigate their way through life and love.

title: Pillu Bachelor
cast: Parth Bhalerao|Sayali Sanjeev|Akshaya Deodhar|Akshay Tanksale|Shashank Shende
overview: Revolves around the hilarious investigation about the disappearance of a young and famous Marathi service officer.

title: Avwanchhit
cast: Mohan Agashe|Barun Chanda|Mrinmayee Godbole
overview: Two world's collide, of a father and a son as they move towards the bigger priorities of their lives. Madhusudhan, the head of Nirupama old age home, strives every day to spread happiness and cheer in a place that houses a deep sense of loss and rejection. A home inhabited by frail and old abandoned people, who have nowhere else to go and call Nirupama their home. Tapan, Madhusudhan's only son grew up training himself to survive the world alone. He blames Madhusudhan for being a father in absentia and also for his mother's death. The story takes us through an emotional roller-coaster of a father and son relationship in the backdrop of Kolkata- a city jostling between fading tradition and modernity taking over.

title: Kanyadaan
cast: Usha Kiran|Raja Gosavi|Dada Salvi|Indira Chitnis|Suryakant Mandhare
overview: An ahead of its times Marathi classic about a father-in-law fighting his own wife and society in getting his widowed daughter-in-law remarried to a man she's fallen for.

title: Nagarsevak: Ek Nayak
cast: Neha Pendse|Upendra Limaye|Sayaji Shinde|Yash Kadam|Sanjay Khapre
overview: Its'a political journey of Malhar Shinde.

title: Ha Bharat Maza
cast: Radhika Apte|Uttara Baokar|Devika Daftardar|Renuka Daftardar|Ashwini Giri
overview: When Sukhatme's youngest son narrowly fails his entrance exams, the family are presented with a financial and moral conundrum.

title: Lathe Joshi
cast: Chittaranjan Giri|Ashwini Giri|Seva Chouhan|Om Bhutkar
overview: Mr. Joshi fondly known as 'Lathe Joshi' for his skill at working the Lathe machine is left jobless. While his family and the world at large, manage to survive or thrive, he struggles to retain his fading identity.

title: ZP
cast: Ajinkya Deo|Nishigandha Wad|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Dinkar Inamdar|Bhalchandra Kulkarni
overview: This film is directed by Anant Mane, starring Ajinkya Deo, Nishigandha Wad and Sadashiv Amrapurkar in the lead roles.

title: Kho Kho
cast: Kranti Redkar|Prajakta Mali|Resham Tipnis|Bharat Jadhav|Vijay Chavan
overview: A school teacher goes back to his village with dreams to settle down in his ancestral home, only to find out that a powerful builder is hounding him to sell the house.

title: Crystal Clear
cast: Devika Daftardar|Shekhar Kulkarni|Uttara Baokar|Vikram Gokhale|Nina Kulkarni
overview: Neeraja has vitiligo, a skin disease that makes her a social outcast. She faces many challenges in her life but with her will power, she overcomes them all.

title: Chandanachi Choli Anga Anga Jali
cast: Sandhya Shantaram|Arun Sarnaik|Ramesh Deo|Ranjana|Bhalchandra Kulkarni
overview: Vasudeo Deshmukh gets married on his mother's insistence without seeing the girl. Gaura, a famous dancer is on the same train as Vasudeo's. As fate has it, Gaura becomes Vasudeo's wife.

title: Navsaacha Por
cast: Alka Kubal|Yashwant Dutt|Ramesh Bhatkar|Sanjay Narvekar|Rui Jadhav
overview: Tatya is worshipped as a god by his villagers as his prediction never goes wrong. On a daily basis, villagers gather in their house to take his blessings and advice. Tatya's elder son Datta is married to Shanti who is cursed by villagers for being childless, his younger son Vaman is a drunkard and only frequents the village, Devaki his eldest daughter has left her husband's house and lives with him whose spoils the peace of the house.

title: Dhol Taashe
cast: Hrishitaa Bhatt|Jitendra Joshi|Abhijeet Khandkekar|Vinay Apte|Ila Bhatey
overview: Dhol Taashe is a Marathi drama that cinematically frames the musical culture of Maharashtra through the eyes of a simpleton, Amey an IT executive. Passionate about keeping the ethnicity of his state alive through music, Amey decides to join a group name Dhol Taashe that plays during cultural procession in Maharashtra.

title: Jhep
cast: Kashinath Ghanekar|Darshana|Ramesh Deo|Sharad Talwalkar|Raghavendra Kadkol
overview: Jhep is a 1971 Indian Marathi film, directed by Rajdutt and produced by Mukthaa. The film stars Ramesh Deo, Darshana and Dr. Kashinath Ghanekar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sudhir Fadke.

title: Sasu Varchad Jawai
cast: Ranjana|Ashok Saraf|Padma Chavan|Sulochana Latkar|Nilu Phule
overview: The film stars Ranjana and Ashok Saraf.

title: Gadbad Ghotala
cast: Laxmikant Berde|Prema Kiran|Nilu Phule|Savita Prabhune|Ashok Saraf
overview: Movie starring Smita Talwalkar, Savita Prabhune and is directed Shekhar Navre.

title: Karaar
cast: Kranti Redkar|Subodh Bhave|Urmilla Kothare|Suhasini Mulay|Arati More
overview: Unable to conceive a child, a married couple turns to surrogacy but find themselves in a strange situation.

title: Who's Daughter Is She?
cast: Nirmiti Sawant|Kadambari Kadam|Arun Nalawade|Swati Chitnis|Vilas Ujawane
overview: Sushila decides to have a baby through IVF and names her Gauri. When Gauri grows up and decides to get married to Anand, his family insists on meeting her biological father.

title: It's OK
cast: Aishwarya Gaikwad|Simran Kulkarni|Siddhi Rajhans
overview: An introvert girl agrees to visit social gatherings as suggested by her friends. She takes it as tasks to complete to overcome her fear for crowd. Will she succeed?

title: Hoy Maharaja
cast: Prathamesh Parab|Vaibhav Mangle|Ankita Lande|Sanika Kashikar
overview: A conman struggles to save his love and everything he cherishes, consequences of his misdeeds. With his hapless crew, they face hilarious trials, navigating a rollercoaster of ups and downs to escape sticky situations.

title: Anuradha
cast: Alka Kubal|Ajinkya Deo|Sulabha Deshpande|Suryakant|Girish Oak
overview: Avinash loves Anuradha and works in Mumbai, with a family to support. Avinash's mother wants him to get married but due to responsibility of his family he backs out. Avinash gets married to Anuradha as her family plans her to marry someone else. But Avinash soon passes away and his family blame Anuradha for his death. But without any hesitation she takes care of his family.

title: Lagna Kallol
cast: Mayuri Deshmukh|Siddharth Jadhav|Bhushan Pradhan|Vidya Karanjikar|Priya Arun Berde
overview: A young woman already in a secret relationship gets married to another man. To keep her lies undercover, chaos ensues.

title: Love You Zindagi
cast: Prarthana Behere|Omkar Joshi|Kavita Lad Medhekar|Sachin Pilgaonkar
overview: Anirudh hates the fact that he is growing old and wants to have fun and enjoy his life to the fullest. He sets out on a quest to explore what he missed in his youth. His life changes, when he meets Riya - a Zumba dance trainer, and her energetic gang. He befriends them to experience the thrill in life and does not care about what the society has to say of his new avatar. However, anything in access can lead to problems. Will Anirudh be able mend his ways, before it's too late?

title: Maza Chakula
cast: Mahesh Kothare|Laxmikant Berde|Nivedita Joshi Saraf|Ashok Saraf|Adinath Kothare
overview: Young Adi's life changes completely when he comes to Bombay with his mother, but ends up getting kidnapped. He manages to escape from the kidnappers but is all alone in the city.

title: Manya Sajjana
cast: Smita Shewale|Makarand Anaspure|Mohan Joshi|Kishori Ambiye|Aditi Bhagwat
overview: A twist of fate leads to Manya, a convict at large, being mistaken for a professor and working for a college in Sajjanpur. However, when his lover follows him, chaos ensues.

title: Ram Ram Gangaram
cast: Dada Kondke|Usha Chavan|Anjana Mumtaz|Ashok Saraf
overview: Gangaram, an ordinary man, inherits wealth after the death of his uncle and shifts to the city with his mother. Later, he gives up his fortune and chooses love and simple life.

title: We2
cast: Bageshree Deshpande|Prashant Patil|Gaurav Hirekan|Leena Nandi|Sohan Nandurdikar
overview: WE2 is a story of Roshan and Reva, an urban couple in their forties. Reva is asking for a divorce after a marriage of 10 years, but Roshan wants to know the reason as both are in love. Roshan decides to win her back by loving her more.

title: Baban
cast: Abhay Chavan|Bhausaheb Shinde|Gayatri Jadhav|Devendra Gayakvad|Mrunal Kulkarni
overview: In an endeavor to convert the traditional business into a big one, ambitious Baban strives hard to fulfill his dreams of prosperity, but the circumstances lead him elsewhere, which in-turn gives rise to a storm.

title: Chashme Bahaddar
cast: Sanjay Narvekar|Purnima Ahire|Pooja Ajinkya|Kishori Ambiye|Avinash Babbar
overview: Rajaram leads a simple life with his family in a haunted chawl. When Parveen Dholakia, a builder, learns about the chawl, he decides to vacate the place and redevelop it for his benefit.

title: Nasheebwan
cast: Asha Kale|Mohan Joshi|Usha Nadkarni|Laxmikant Berde|Alka Kubal
overview: A rich man falls in love with a poor woman who is related to his mother's friend.

title: Baaplyok
cast: Payal Jadhav|Neeta Shende|Vitthal Kale|Shashank Shende|Mahesh Bhosale
overview: The road ahead might be straight and even, but human character is shaped by the journey thereon. Sagar and his father set out to invite their far-off relatives to Sagar's wedding. But the venture is not as easy. Sagar has left his job in Pune in order to live with his parents in the village and work as a farmer. "Farmers are not good suitors", yet somehow Sagar has found a bride and they are about to be married. Sagar and his father are always at odds against each other for no particular reason. This father-son tension characterises their journey, their relationship in the hands of the dust and the soil of the road.

title: Naach Ga Ghuma
cast: Mukta Barve|Namrata Awate Sambherao|Sarang Sathaye|Myra Vaikul|Sukanya Kulkarni
overview: Follows the lively duo - the woman of the house and the house help, and how their love-hate relationship unfolds.

title: Ganimi Kawa
cast: Dada Kondke|Usha Chavan|Yashwant Dutt|Suryakant Mandhare|Asha Kale
overview: Following the victory at Sinhagad in 1670, the Moghuls began to notice the threat from the Marathas. The unique guerrilla tactics developed by Shivaji helped his warriors forge ahead with power.

title: Shortcut - Disto Pan Nasto
cast: Sanskruti Balgude|Rajesh Shringarpure|Vaibhav Tatwawadi|Naresh Bidkar|Uday Nene
overview: A story of Rohit, a 20 year old introvert guy from a middle class family. With lack of any interesting hobbies and spoken skills, suppressed thoughts, social fear he never managed to create his identity among his friends since his childhood. He has never felt his existence in the society. On the flip side, he is genius of computer algorithms and hacking. He is desperately in search for a unique identity and dreams of becoming noticeable to all.

title: Chakwa
cast: Mukta Barve|Atul Kulkarni|Deepa Parab|Vidyadhar Joshi
overview: An Indian engineer from America, visits his village on an assignment. There, he gets embroiled in the mystery and suspense surrounding his ancestral house and the mango factory in the village.

title: Manini
cast: Jayshree Gadkar|Ramesh Deo|Sharad Talwalkar
overview: Film starring  Jayshree Gadkar

title: Manjha
cast: Ashwini Bhave|Sumedh Mudgalkar|Rohit Phalke|Shivani Tanksale|Mohan Kapur
overview: A working mother with a teenage son shifts to a new town to escape her abusive husband and to begin a new life, but when she finds that her son is being forced to be party to a violent crime by his psychotic class friend, she has to decide if she is going to run away again or fight her deepest fears and stand up for herself.

title: When Suddenly
