cast: Jimmy Shergill|Kulraj Randhawa|Anita Devgan|Sajjan Adeeb
overview: While Sukhi and Tania are madly in love and want to get married, Garry and Kelly are married with kids. As working parents they try to juggle their domestic responsibilities and working career but the day-today grind takes a toll and they decide to separate. As Garry and Kelly contemplate separating, their kids try various tricks to make them fall in love again. Looking at Garry and Kelly's situation, Sukhi and Tania have second thoughts about getting married themselves. Will Garry and Kelly divorce each other? Will Sukhi and Tania finally get married?

title: Ishq My Religion
cast: Simrrann Sabharwal|Bobby Dhillon
overview: Ishq My Religion is a Punjabi movie starring Mukesh Rishi, Rahul Dev, Yaad Grewal and Yaad Grewal in prominent roles. It is a drama directed & written by Gurdeep Dhillon with Mukhtar Sahota as musician, forming part of the crew.

title: Wohti Le Kay Jani Aay
cast: Shaan Shahid|Saima Noor|Haya Ali|Iftikhar Thakur|Raheela Agha
overview: A village musician falls in love with a girl from an upper caste.

title: Road Of Life
cast: Harman Parmar|Arti Bhagat|Karam Kaur|Gurmail Dhaliwal
overview: A couple runs away to marry and starts a new life with their daughter. But years later, a mysterious girl enters their world, shaking their bond to the core. The wife slowly uncovers a side of her husband she never knew. As truths come crashing down, she faces a tough choice. Can she escape the chaos, or is it already too late? A gripping tale of love, lies, and betrayal.

title: Lock
cast: Gippy Grewal|Gurpreet Ghuggi|Geeta Basra
overview: A screenwriter loses a script in the back of a rickshaw, and complications in the driver's life make it difficult to return to its rightful owner.

While Pratap's brother-in-law is also a police officer, his son, Nishant, quite comically, wants to be a bandit, and much to Pratap's chagrin, wants to follow in the steps of Sholay's Gabbar Singh. Things get out of control after a bank is robbed, and the police launch a man-hunt for the robbers, whose leader they believe is none other than Nishant.

title: Shera
cast: M. Ismail|Ilyas Kashmiri|Neelo|Sultan Rahi|Habibur Rehman

overview: Upset over his role in the accidental death of a Sikh, a young Punjabi man living abroad returns to India and falls for a widow whose husband died in similar circumstances.

title: Shehri Babu
cast: Swaran Lata|Santosh Kumar|Allauddin|Inayat Hussain Bhatti|Nazar
overview: Film starring Swaran Lata.

overview: The movie is directed by Ajay Chandhok and featured Anirudh Lalit, Aanchal Tyagi, Harby Sangha and Neena Bundhel as lead characters. Other popular actor who was roped in for Saadi Marzi is Yograj Singh.

overview: A soldier faces dishonor when he tries to protect a woman.

overview: An engaged couple believes that they are meant to be together, but their conviction shatters when their families meet each other.

overview: A gangster controls the Punjab state in India. He grows his popularity with his crimes like rape, murders etc. Two boys stop him and burn him alive with fire.

overview: A young man concocts a scheme to marry a reluctant fellow student, but finds the task more difficult than it first appeared.

The movie is a fast paced thriller showing the fun filled bromance between Rambo and Ranjha. It will surely take you on a thrill ride full of fun and joy.

Their common friends, Gagan, and Jasleen, try to patch things up. While doing it they plan a holiday together which gets cancelled somehow. They come back not realizing that 5 prison escapes are now hiding in their house. In their own home, they become prisoners in hiding.

Its the story of three college friends, enjoying their young life but mostly it revolves around Rajveer (Ravinder Grewal). Rajveer is the commander of a short army of three friends and leads them to find fun every time. But with his fun loving life, he has to go through some real difficulties at his family level, friendship level and in his love life. When everything is going right in his life suddenly he gets hit with a big shock which changes the motive of his life. Then he decides to take turn towards rectifying all the problems caused because of him.

overview: Jessica's life was saved by timely support from her principal and classmate. Parents and teachers must collaborate to support and guide adolescents.

overview: A woman utilizes the help of a stranger to help search for her husband during which they begin to face some harsh realities.

They become friends but unfortunately are arrested by police who are trying to pin them for some unsolved crime cases. So they escape from the police station and reach a remote village where they find an aim in life. What is their aim? Will they be successful?

title: Khadari

overview: An aspiring wrestler becomes torn between his loyalty to his gangster brother and his burgeoning love for a fellow university student.

cast: Dua Qureshi|Sajjad Ahmed Warriach|Shahid Hameed|Shafqat Cheema|Akram Udass

However, the two can’t get married as Preet Harpal’s elder brother, Guggu Gill hasn’t tied the knot, and the reason behind the same is the rivalry of him with Yograj Singh. This is when Preet Harpal plans out a twisted tale to set things straight.

Notorious Baba tells Goga to summon the ghost of her grandfather, and only Kamal can see him. Their confusion leads to a touching tribute to love.

overview: Notty K encounters strange events on his visit to Italy to bring back Samira to reunite her with her family .

The girl is very career-oriented and tells these men that if one of them helps her to go to a foreign country for her dream project, she will choose him as her partner. The story goes on with the journey to reach the destination with these men.

title: Mehkma Chhadeyan Da
cast: B.N. Sharma|Rana Ranbir|Sardar Sohi
overview: No Information

title: Wada
cast: Moamar Rana|Saima Noor|Saud|Noor|Nargis
overview: Romantic mystery thriller film Between two brothers .Love story

overview: Set in 1947, this is a story of a set of people who have to vacate their house to move into another place. Chaos ensues as the original inhabitants face another family that enters the house.

title: Purja Purja Kat Marey

overview: Purja Purja Kat Marey (1998) cast and crew credits, including actors, actresses, directors, writers and more.

overview: Rahman suffers from a mental trauma which makes him a serial killer. Jaffar Ali begins his rule over the city and his son are obliged to start a human meat business. Inspector Vikramjit must uncover the dirty truths.

overview: Bai Ji, a powerful businessman loves to live life by his rules. However, trouble happens in paradise when his younger brother falls in love with one of his workers. What follows is a laughter riot.

overview: Do Posti is a film released in 1981, it is an Indian Punjabi film

overview: Embarks on a journey that traverses the rustic essence of a Pind (village) in India and the bustling, vibrant life of America. It’s not just a movie; it’s a story that promises to resonate with many, especially those who’ve lived between two cultures, two worlds, and two lifestyles.

title: Yakke Wali
cast: Ajmal|Zeenat Begum|Ilyas Kashmiri|Ghulam Mohammed|Nazar

He comes to Fatehgarh Sahib in Punjab along with his family to reconnect with his ancestral roots, culture, tradition. His grandmother tells about the entire history of martyrdom of Chote Sahibzadas and Mata Gujri.

It is now up to him to find his long-lost kins and more importantly, win everybody's approval to marry his sweetheart.

overview: In Rangpura, fear rules and secrets hide behind haunted walls. As villagers vanish, two friends uncover the terrifying truth behind Pyara Singh’s spirit.

overview: Dil Da Mamla is a Pollywood punjabi movie.

overview: Kirdar-E-Sardar is a Punjabi action film starring Nav Bajwa and Neha Pawar.

overview: Dhol Ratti is a period film set in the Punjab of 1970's. The theme of the movie encapsulates an emergency situation on the Punjab - Pakistan Border and how people live through it. The movie highlights the importance of family relations and moral values, with an important message for today's youth.

overview: Hypochondriac Ghuggi (Gurpreet Ghuggi) overhears another patient's prognosis and believes he's got only a short time to live. Expecting his wife (Upasana Singh) to soon be a widow, he encourages a visiting college friend, Sikander (Smeep Kang), to put the moves on her. Vivek Shauq co-stars in this uproarious comedy from director Ksshitij Choudhary.

title: Channa Mereya
cast: Payal Rajput
overview: Love across class divisions runs afoul of parental disapproval.

overview: Manmeet, a carefree young man living with his sister Rani's family, juggles family duties and his budding romance with Sam's teacher, Mehak. His world turns chaotic when he suspects his brother-in-law, Bikram, of having an affair with his secretary, Hina. Determined to protect his sisters marriage, Manmeet gets involved in a series of misunderstandings that strain his relationships.

title: Rabb Da Radio 3
cast: Simi Chahal|Tarsem Jassar

cast: Dheeraj Kumar|Jagjeet Sandhu|Simran Kaur Suri
overview: Ehaan, haunted by his past, transforms from a lost soul to a murderer. Maya, a psychology student, unravels the mystery by reopening an old case.

The movie explores this very friendship between these three boys as they spend their student days doing all the usual things that students normally do. They do everything together - bunking classes, getting into fights with a rival group, talking and laughing over numerous cups of tea - and they even fall in love together. However, the love stories of all the three friends turn out to be complicated.

overview: Pakistani Punjabi Movie

cast: Gurchet Chitrakar|Rahul Jungral|Rana Ranbir|Surjeet Singh Sidhu|Deep Jagdeep Jaedy

title: Sher Dil
cast: Shaan Shahid|Saima Noor|Sila Hussein|Zeeshan Sikandar|Shafqat Cheema

overview: 22 Chamkila Forever is a Punjabi film directed by Deepa Rai starring Deepa Rai, Yuvleen Kaur and Poonam Sood.

title: Ekam – Son of Soil
cast: Babbu Mann|Mandy Takhar|Bhagwant Mann|Amrik Gill|Tarsem Paul
overview: Ekam – Son of Soil is a film about family relations and family disputes. It’s a triangular love story with full of comedy and emotions. It’s about villager’s life and a journey of a hero from metro city to a village where he helps not just the poor farmers but also the drug ridden youth. He gives away his land to the villagers.

title: Balle O Chalaak Sajjna
cast: Raj Singh Jhinjar|Molina Sodhi|Harashjot Kaur|Nirmal Rishi|Mahabir Bhullar
overview: A Newlywed couple face hilarious yet heartwarming challenges amidst village gossip. They learn the vital lessons of trust and open communication.

title: Chhalle Mundiyan
cast: Ammy Virk|Mandy Takhar|Sonia Kaur|Kulwinder Billa|Karamjit Anmol
overview: Set against the backdrop of Punjab, Chhalle Mundiyan is a romcom that traces the life of Jassi (Mandy Thakar) and foreign returned Pammi (Ammy Virk) with a Caucasian woman and a child of his friend.

title: Nigah Marda Ayi Ve
cast: Sargun Mehta|Gurnam Bhullar|Nisha Bano|Adi Chugh
overview: An adventurous road trip takes Harman and Scarlett on a journey not only through love and life but also leaves them heartbroken. Will the star-crossed lovers ever meet?

title: Bharia Mela
cast: Naghma (Zubaida Begum)|Akmal|Rangeela|Agha Talish|Munawar Zarif
overview: a romance/musical? Apparently flopped at the box office

title: Kade Haan Kade Naa
cast: Singga|Mahira Sharma|Sanjana Singh|B.N. Sharma
overview: "Kade Haan Kade Naa" movie is a romantic comedy featuring Singga and Sanjana Singh. The plot of the movie story is based on a confusing situation with the characters.

title: Pagadi Sambhaal Jatta
cast: Iqbal Gajjan|Sukhjinder Shera|Rajinder Kaur|Yograj Singh|Ratan Aulakh
overview: Harwant Kaur and her husband get cheated out of their land by tyrannical and oppressive Zamindar Sardar Jwala Singh.

title: Shaadi Express
cast: Mast Ali|Aziz Naser|Altaf Hyder
overview: ShaadiExpress Is a Pure comedy Movie with Hyderabadi touch, Starring Saleem Pheku, Ismil Bhai, Aziz Naser, Jahangir, Altaf Hyder and others, Directed by Sanjay Punjabi. The Movie Produced By Sandeep Vig & Bhoj Reddy Challa Under The Banner of BS Entertainment.

title: Chadi Jawani Budhe Nu
overview: A small-time businessman (B.S. Sood) reaches the "naughty forties". Now his wife is not good enough anymore, so he decides he needs a modern up to date mistress, resulting in hilarious situations.

title: Jatt vs. Ielts
cast: Anita Devgan|Hobby Dhaliwal|Mandeep Ghai|Gurpreet Ghuggi|Khushi Malhotra
overview: In this hilarious laughter riot, a young man, like almost every other Punjabi, aspires to live his eternal Canadian dream. Struggling with his English and unable to clear the IELTS exam, he enrolls himself at an IELTS class.

title: Mitter Pyare Nu Haal Mureedan Da Kehna
cast: Dara Singh|Vindu Dara Singh|Rajeshwari Sachdev|Seema Siddhu|Surendra Sharma
overview: Ranjyot, Amar and their widowed mother flee from Rampur after their friend, Karim, informs them that their village is about to be attacked by Muslim shortly after the 1948 partition of India and Pakistan. The threesome manage to survive and end up in Dharampur in Punjab. They are re-united with Karim when both brothers get married to Jeeto and Satwant.

title: Jorr Jatt Da
cast: Guggu Gill|Sukhjinder Shera|Amar Noorie|Satnam Kaur|Yograj Singh
overview: Jorr Jatt Da is a Punjabi (Pollywood) movie.

title: Sab Fadey Jaange
cast: Harish Verma|Honey Mattu|Hashneen Chauhan|Sukhwinder Chahal|Prakash Gadhu
overview: A night before his wedding Boota, a cab driver, finds himself stuck in an unforeseen situation when he offers to help a drunk stranger.

title: Sadi Gali Aaya Karo
cast: Nav Bajwa|Raghveer Boli|Anuj Puri|Gagan Gill|Harpal Singh
overview: Two young boys, one from Punjab and the other from Haryana, face a dilemma when both fall for a girl from Chandigarh. They constantly compete to win her over and land themselves in sticky situations.

title: Tara Mira
cast: Ranjit Bawa|Nazia Hussain|Gurpreet Ghuggi
overview: A politician’s son falls in love with a girl from a different community. To please his parents, he comes up with a plan which leads to a series of lies and hilarious situations.

title: Saab Bahadar
cast: Ammy Virk|Jaswinder Bhalla|Preet Kamal|Rana Ranbir
overview: A small town cop finds himself investigating the murder of a prominent citizen.

title: Jaspal
cast: Vijayant Kohli|Preet Bhullar|Anmol Dhaliwal|Inder Bajwa|Sona Rajput
overview: Two Punjabi brothers are stuck in lives they want to escape. Jaspal dreams of a woman out of his reach, Vicky dreams of emigrating to Canada. Both are trapped by Sanjay, Chandigarh's Police Chief.

title: Blue Van
cast: Ravinder Grewal|Aman Sandhu|Ravinder Mand|Dilawar Sidhu
overview: Engaged women are murdered, suspects confess instantly, but Inspector Ranvijay senses a dark mastermind behind it. A gripping crime thriller unfolds!

title: Padma Shri Kaur Singh
cast: Karamjit Singh Batth|Prabh Grewal|Malkit Rauni|Seema Kaushal|Baninder Bunny
overview: The story of Padma Shri Kaur Singh starts out as a simpleton to becoming a boxing champion. From a army officer to a man who was promised a prize by the State government, waited for 37 years to receive it.

title: Beautiful Billo
cast: Neeru Bajwa|Roshan Prince|Rubina Bajwa|Raghveer Boli|Rupinder Rupi
overview: Comedy drama movie set against the backdrop of United Kingdom. With warmth at its center, the story deals with an emotional bond between a couple played by Rubina Bajwa, Roshan Prince and their tryst with a pregnant woman played by Neeru Bajwa.

title: Sayonee
cast: Hobby Dhaliwal|Shavinder Mahal|Sharan Kaur|Baninder Bunny|Singga
overview: A thief's heart is stolen when he meets a girl, who's about to turn his world of mischief into a tale of unexpected romance.

title: Jigra Jatt Da
cast: Paramveer Singh|Yograj Singh|Preeti Sapru|Upasna Singh|Jagdarshan Samra

title: Jattu Nikhattu
cast: Harwinder Singh Aujla|Divjyot Kaur|Shamsher Dhillon|Tarsem Paul|Malkeet Rauni
overview: A carefree boy Jattu has big dreams, but his father feels he won't make it big and compels him to do a government job. Will Jattu fulfil his dreams?

title: Good Luck Jatta
cast: Rubina Bajwa|Ninja|Naiqra Kaur|Lili Rich|Gurmeet Saajan
overview: Good Luck Jatta is a Punjabi movie

title: Nasibpura
cast: Navdeep Kaler|Raj Dhaliwal|Malkeet Rauni
overview: Strange murders are happening in Nasibpura, just like 20 years ago. Will the police solve this dark mystery?

title: Rab Ton Sohna Ishq
cast: Mandeep Mandy|Avantika Hundal|Milind Gunaji|Rana Jung Bahadur
overview: Story of Rabb Ton Sohna Ishq is about Kiran and Sooraj’s innocent love, who get aparted in childhood.

title: Mitti
cast: Mika Singh|Kartar Cheema|Kashish Dhanoyaa|Yaad Garewal|B.N. Sharma
overview: The movie mainly revolves around four characters with the protagonist being farmer Jeet Brar, who is also a `kisaan` leader. The four youngsters get involved with a corrupt politician Sardar Harmail Singh and get involved in crime and violence. They have no goals of their own. There is a love tringle introduced with two of the men and Neeru, the daughter of an NRI, who is forbidden from meeting the group by her father. A virtuous journalist called Sarabjit is on Harmail Singh`s trail, as he wants to expose the truth to the people of the state. What happens when he persists? Will love beat crime?

title: Allah Rakha
cast: Sultan Rahi

title: Mitran Nu Shaunk Hathyaran Da
cast: Sidhi Ahuja|Preet Baath|Mohit Bhaskar
overview: Mitran Nu Shaunk Hathyaran Da is a Punjabi movie released on 8th November 2019.

title: Bhagat Singh Di Udeek
cast: Sardar Sohi|B.N. Sharma|Malkeet Rauni
overview: Bhagat Singh Di Udeek is a Punjabi movie starring Arsh Chawla and B. N. Sharma in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Shivamm Sharma.

title: Yaar Pardesi
cast: Gurpreet Ghuggi|Claudia Ciesla|Vandana Singh|Binnu Dhillon|Raghveer Boli
overview: Yaar Pardesi is the story of two NRI girls and their foreign friend who reach India, befriending Kukku who they believe is a taxi driver. Through their journey, the girls face romance and are wooed by Kukku's friends who are interested in them upon hearing that they have come from Canada. Do Kukku's friends genuinely love the girls or are their intentions something related to settling in Canada? What follows is confusion and a lot of drama.

title: Please Kill Me
cast: Jagjeet Sandhu|Megha Sharma|Sukhwinder Chahal|Karanveer Khullar|Mohanty Sharma
overview: A girl returning from Canada after 4 years is abducted in Kharar, Punjab. The police is left clueless as the kidnapper is always one step ahead of them.

title: Jagga
cast: Zeenat Begum|Ilyas Kashmiri|Sultan Rahi|Agha Salim Raza|Meena Shorey

title: All the Best Pandya
cast: Malhar Thakar|Darshan Jariwala|Vandana Pathak|Yukti Randeria|Vedish
overview: A son must defend his father in court after a bribery accusation, forcing them to confront their strained relationship while fighting for justice in this legal drama.

title: Naadi Dosh
cast: Yash Soni|Janki Bodiwala|Raunaq Kamdar|Prashant Barot|Ashish Kakkad
overview: New generation love birds, Riddhi and Kevin, shrewdly tackle the issue of 'Naadi Dosh', an old and dogmatic faith.

title: Last Film Show
cast: Bhavin Rabari|Richa Meena|Bhavesh Shrimali|Dipen Raval|Rahul Koli
overview: A 9-year-old boy in a remote village in India begins a lifelong love affair with cinema when he bribes his way into a rundown movie palace and spends a summer watching movies from the projection booth.

title: Trisha on the Rocks
cast: Janki Bodiwala|Ravi Gohil|Hiten Kumar|Kailash Nayak|Bhushan Bhatt
overview: One fine Night Trisha (Janki Bodiwala) meets Vishal (Ravi gohil) at a party. Both of them are from different backgrounds and follow a different lifestyle. This meeting of both starts a super fun havoc with the cutest romance in their lives.

title: Samandar
cast: Mayur Chauhan|Jagjeetsinh Vadher|Dharmendra Gohil|Deeksha Joshi|Reeva Racch
overview: In the ruthless realm of the Fisheries mafia, two childhood friends, Uday and Salman, form a strong and enduring alliance. Their journey is marked by navigating a perilous path under the guidance of ex-MLA Arjan Parmar. As Uday and Salman establish their own empire, their primary target becomes Imtiaz Memon, the president of fisheries association. This choice is driven by a personal vendetta, as Imtiaz Memon is linked to the tragic demise of Uday's sister. However, as they delve deeper into the complexities of power, politics, and revenge, their once-unbreakable bond begins to crumble. Political intrigue, betrayal, and conspiracy surround them, leading to a transformation from inseparable allies to bitter foes. The story unfolds against a backdrop of unforgiving twists of fate, illustrating the harsh realities of their chosen path in the cutthroat world of the Fisheries mafia.

title: Gujarat 11
cast: Daisy Shah|Pratik Gandhi|Kavin Dave|Lika|Pradip Harsora
overview: Gujarat 11 is the story of an ex-football player, Divya, who takes up the challenge of training juvenile home boys for a state-level football tournament.

title: Jhamkudi
cast: Viraj Ghelani|Manasi Parekh|Sanjay Goradia|Ojas Rawal|Chetan Daiya
overview: When the Gujarat is celebrating Navratri, the village of Raniwada dwells in the darkness since ages as celebrating garba is forbidden due to a witch's curse. But the rules are broken and the haunting starts again. A real estate agent with tricks up his sleeve is called back from the city and an NRI heir of the royal family returns to face the wrath of the witch. Will they be able to solve the mystery and save Raniwada from the curse of Jhamkudi?

title: Chaal Jeevi Laiye!
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Yash Soni|Aarohi Patel|Jagesh Mukati|Aruna Irani
overview: In his quest to become successful, Aditya Parikh puts life on the back burner, including his Father Bipin Chandra Parikh. Infuriated and heartbroken, the father persuades his monotonous son to take an unplanned journey of a lifetime for a much needed appreciation that life deserves. Their trip to bliss soon turns into a nightmare when they meet a backpacker named Ketki Mehta. An enigma in her own way, she takes the father-son duo on a voyage that turns out to be more than they bargained for. The escapade turns out to be an experience as more surprises and realizations wait their way to happiness, opening new doorways to the meaning of life. Directed by Vipul Mehta, Produced by Rashmin Majithia and soulful Music by Sachin-Jigar, Chaal Jeevi Laiye is a film that's all about living life to the fullest.

title: Love Ni Bhavai
cast: Malhar Thakar|Pratik Gandhi|Aarohi Patel|Aarti Patel|Maulik Nayak
overview: A popular radio personality with an aversion to love meets two men with differing views on romance.

title: Dear Father
cast: Paresh Rawal|Manasi Parekh|Chetan Dhanani|Krunal Pandit|Kaushambi Bhatt
overview: The story is a representation of a growing sense of alienation in the minds of the senior citizens of today's nuclear structures. They are distanced from the mainstream of family action, having been denied the pivotal roles of the now defunct joint families, hence some of them demand attention through the tool of nuisance value. It's an attempt to show the futility of the so-called fluent logic of today's pompous professionals in trying to pin down hapless parents in hopeless debates.

title: Hello
cast: Jayesh More|Darshan Pandya|Mazel Vyas|Rishabh Joshi|Aayushi Dholakia
overview: During one of their night stays, three college teens play a silly prank where they randomly call people and tell them that they know who that person is and what they have done. What will happen when things take a dangerous turn?

title: Luv Ni Love Storys
cast: Deeksha Joshi|Pratik Gandhi|Vyoma Nandi|Alpana Buch|Bhavini Jani
overview: In pursuit of the true love of his life, he ends up leading himself into a crazy roller-coaster ride of multiple relationships.

title: Dhh
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Kuldeep Sodha|Kahaan|Karan Patel|Archan Trivedi
overview: Convinced only a miracle can save them from failing school exams, a trio of friends seek help from a magician. To their surprise, he gamely complies.

title: Chhello Divas
cast: Malhar Thakar|Yash Soni|Janki Bodiwala|Kinjal Rajpriya|Mitra Gadhvi
overview: The movie revolves around the lives of eight friends and their journey of growing up while they face the highs and lows of their relationships, love and romance, the end of their college days and the beginning of a new life.

title: The Great Gujarati Matrimony
cast: Siddhi Idnani|Mitra Gadhvi|Devarshi Shah|Tatsat Munshi|Hiten Kumar
overview: Iti, an aspiring actress, Raaghav, a matrimony agency owner, and Ved, a UK banker, navigate love, cultural clashes, and self-discovery, exploring the complexities of relationships and personal growth through their intertwined lives.  The Great Gujarati Matrimony is a romantic drama that follows the intertwined lives of Iti, an aspiring actress, Raaghav, a lively matrimony agency owner, and Ved, an investment banker from UK. As they navigate love, cultural clashes, and self-discovery, their journey explores the complexities of relationships and personal growth.

title: Aum Mangalam Singlem
cast: Malhar Thakar|Aarohi Patel|Bhamini Oza Gandhi|Tatsat Munshi|Darshan Jariwala
overview: Childhood friends and sweethearts are ready to get married. But they also want to experience being single before taking the plunge.

title: Umbarro
cast: Vandana Pathak|Kajal Oza Vaidya|Suchita Trivedi|Deeksha Joshi|Tarjanee Bhadla
overview: Seven women from rural Gujarat embark on their first international trip to London, facing cultural clashes, language barriers, and societal stigmas along their journey to claim their space in the world.

title: Shubh Yatra
cast: Malhar Thakar|Monal Gajjar|Darshan Jariwala|Archan Trivedi|Hitu Kanodia
overview: A young man, on the advice of an agent, lies that he is married, to go to America. But his visa application is rejected and now, he has to follow-up with a string of lies to hide one lie.

title: Kutch Express
cast: Manasi Parekh|Ratna Pathak Shah|Viraf Patel|Darsheel Safary|Dharmendra Gohil
overview: Your life is perfect with your family and husband. But when this perfect life is just an illusion, where else do you seek solace?

title: Kasoombo
cast: Dharmendra Gohil|Darshan Pandya|Raunaq Kamdar|Monal Gajjar|Shraddha Dangar
overview: Set amidst the picturesque landscapes of 14th-century Gujarat's Shetrunjay Hills, against the backdrop of Allauddin Khilji's menacing intent to pillage the sacred temples and cultural heritage of Shetrunjay, Dadu Barot stands resolute, leading a meager band against overwhelming opposition.

title: Fakt Purusho Maate
cast: Yash Soni|Darshan Jariwala|Mitra Gadhvi|Esha Kansara|Amitabh Bachchan
overview: Given the chance to return temporarily to the world of the living, a deceased grandfather schemes to disrupt his grandson’s marriage plans.

title: Raado
cast: Hitu Kanodia|Yash Soni|Tarjanee Bhadla|Nikita Sharma|Bharat Chawda
overview: Some powerful people, with strong political influence, leaders of the crowd and determined law enforcement collide with one another and the society implodes.

title: Hellaro
cast: Shraddha Dangar|Jayesh More|Tejal Panchasara|Shailesh Prajapati|Maulik Nayak
overview: A group of suppressed women from a village in Gujarat find someone in the desert and their lives are changed forever.

title: Nayika Devi: The Warrior Queen
cast: Khushi Shah|Manoj Joshi|Chunky Pandey|Jayesh More|Ojas Rawal
overview: Nayika Devi, the Warrior Queen is a Historical drama set in the 12th century. The film is about India's first female warrior.

title: Saiyar Mori Re
cast: Mayur Chauhan|Yukti Randeria|Mayur Soneji|Mehool Desai|Mehul Bhil
overview: Hari lives at a Gaushala with his bapu and transgender faiba. One fine day, while substituting for an odd job he sees Leela for the first time and instantly falls for her. They gradually fall in love but will it stay forever? What will happen when they separate?

title: Ittaa Kittaa
cast: Raunaq Kamdar|Manasi Parekh|Alpana Buch|Jia Vaidya|Princy Prajapati
overview: The Jariwala family is devastated when Kavya is diagnosed infertile. Craving a child, she and husband Nirav adopt two girls, 7 and 13, accidentally.

title: Shubhchintak
cast: Manasi Parekh|Swapnil Joshi|Viraf Patel|Deep Vaidya|Mehul Buch
overview: Novice Meghna and her two accomplices plot to honey trap Sanjay for revenge, facing humorous and moral challenges. Will she let revenge consume her?

title: 3 Ekka
cast: Malhar Thakar|Yash Soni|Mitra Gadhvi|Kinjal Rajpriya|Esha Kansara
overview: Three friends stuck in financial crises, come up with an idiotic plan to transform a simple middle-class house into a secret gambling den. A series of mishaps inside and outside the gambling den keep piling up. Will they win or lose?

title: Vash
cast: Janki Bodiwala|Hiten Kumar|Hitu Kanodia|Nilam Panchal|Aaryan Sanghvi
overview: Atharva, a family man, takes his family for a vacation and unfortunately gets trapped in black magic by a stranger named Pratap.

title: Thank You, Come Again
cast: Nirav Bhakta|Asit Vyas|Rohan Singh|Talon Warburton|Ruben Barela
overview: After the trigger of a hate crime, an undocumented Indian American convenience store clerk comes crashing into his subconscious as he grieves the passing of his father during an attempted border crossing.

title: Faati Ne?
cast: Hitu Kanodia|Smit Pandya|Aakash Zala|Chetan Daiya|Hemin Trivedi
overview: directed by Faisal Hashmi

title: Fera Feri Hera Feri
cast: Kuldeep Gor|Bijal Joshi|Manoj Joshi|Rishil Joshi|Arti Nagpal
overview: Mr. Hasmukhlaal is (un)fortunate enough to keep 2 wives at the same time, but the wives have no knowledge of the other marriage. On top of that, he orchestrates his own death for one family and stays with the other. For a long time it's all fine until his son from the first marriage and his daughter from the second marriage happen to get in touch with each other and plan to meet. And thus starts a roller-coaster ride of confusion and cover-ups. Will the 2 wives ever come to know the truth?

title: Kehvatlal Parivar
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Supriya Pathak|Vandana Pathak|Bhavya Gandhi|Sanjay Goradia
overview: Welcome to the world of Kehvatlal Parivar to experience drama, love, and togetherness. When there is unlimited madness in the house, this Parivar is all set to deliver delightful moments that can make laugh and cry.

title: Udan Chhoo
cast: Deven Bhojani|Prachee Shah|Aarohi Patel|Aarjav Trivedi|Jay Upadhyay
overview: The middle-aged in-laws in love with each other elope from their children's wedding.

title: Karma
cast: Chetan Dhanani|Brinda Trivedi|Aanshul Trivedi|Anushka Pandya|Shruti Gholap
overview: Karma, never loses an address. A family in which husband-wife and daughter were living a happy life and suddenly how the deeds are done in the past by someone brings changes in their lives.

title: Vetal Nagri
cast: Abhishek Hasmukbhai Mistry
overview: In India, in the region of Gujarat, a man whose face is never shown travels through the large city of Vadodara by night and distributes a mysterious illustrated newspaper. It provokes an irresistable desire in all the street merchants and craftsmen to tell stories of ghosts and ghouls.

title: Reva
cast: Bhairavi Athavle|Abhinay Banker|Chetan Dhanani|Monal Gajjar|Prashant Barot
overview: Karan is a spoiled rich 25-year-old American NRI who has an extravagant life with his needs being at the center of his world. His grandfather passes away and leaves all his wealth in his will to a charity, an Ashram located at the banks of the Narmada river in India. The only way he could get his wealth back was to convince the Ashram to sign a No Objection Certificate.

title: Anokhee
cast: Bhumika Barot|Aarjav Trivedi|Nakshraaj
overview: Anokhee – A Unique Story is a movie of an independent disabled girl. Story revolves around how a person can influence the living style of life and bring a change in thinking. How a girl who lost her hope of living starts loving her self and believes herself. A simple story to admire and be admired.

title: Gujjubhai ni Golmaal
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Purvi Vyas|Rohinton Chesun|Hitesh Upadhyay|Sameer Gaurav
overview: Arvind, a simpleton, is burdened with many responsibilities to meet the demands of his family members. When God blesses his wife with the power to let her dreams come true, he becomes greedy.

title: Char Fera Nu Chakdol
cast: Sanjay Goradia|Disha Savla Upadhyay|Vishal Thakkar|Smit Pandya|Bhavwini Gandhi
overview: A hilarious battle between Mukesh Bhambhani and his wife, Neeta.

title: Back Bencher
cast: Krish Dharam Chauhan|Dev Desai|Dharmendra Gohil|Ami Trivedi|Chetan Daiya
overview: The tale of how children deal with the cut-throat competition in today's world, where marks and grades are the only parameters taken into consideration to assess a child's overall potential.

title: GujjuBhai: Most Wanted
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Jimit Trivedi|Tejal Vyas|Purvi Vyas|Jayesh More
overview: Gujjubhai and his son Khagesh try a shortcut to earn money which gets them into trouble with terrorists and cops.

title: Ghantadi
cast: Prem Gadhavi|Smit Pandya|Hemang Dave|Akshat Irani|Jahnvi Chauhan
overview: Four lifelong friends Sam, Prem, Ravi and Purohit gets frustrated from their respective life. Sam decides to take them to his farm house for a break. And invites a call girl to farm house for a night. whenever Sam tries to touch her, every time various characters rings the door bell and disturbs him. Sam insists her to stay for another day and offers more money. so instead of one night girl stays there for three nights, and demands lots of money. Although Sam doesn't even able to touch her. because of Sam, they all get stuck in serious situation. and makes a plan to get rid out of it.

title: Vickida No Varghodo
cast: Malhar Thakar|Manasi Rachh|Monal Gajjar|Jhinal Belani
overview: Vikas Majethia aka your Vicky is getting married soon. Amidst the festivities, things take an exciting twist, when not one, but two of his exes return to his life. The big question on everyone's mind, including Vicky's, is who will he get married to?

title: Chor Chor
cast: Anurag Prapanna|Sunil Vishrani|Hemang Shah|Rajan Rathod|Bhushan Bhatt
overview: A 3,000-year-old statue, stolen from an international museum, lands in Gujarat and falls into the hands of pickpockets Nagda and Pintu, who trade it to hotel owner Dhanraj to cover their food bill. When they discover that the government is offering a reward of ₹50,00,000 for the statue, they decide to steal it back from Dhanraj's mansion. Meanwhile, unemployed friends Raju and Santosh, dressed as policemen, arrive to steal jewelry. When the duo encounter Nagda and Pintu, they learn about the valuable statue and join the hunt.

title: Hurry Om Hurry
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Raunaq Kamdar|Vyoma Nandi|Malhaar Rathod|Shivam Parekh
overview: Longtime friends, Om and Vini find their lives taking an unforeseen turn when Vini decides to propose marriage to Om. However, their once-promising union encounters stumbling blocks as Om begins to drift away, leaving Vini with a profound sense of betrayal. Just when all hope seems lost, a strange encounter shakes Om's world, promising to alter the course of everything.

title: Superstar
cast: Dhruvin Shah|Rashami Desai
overview: A media storm follows a famous actor after he is wounded during a shooting scene in which fake bullets were replaced with real ones.

title: Danny Jigar - Ek Matra
cast: Yash Soni|Tarjanee Bhadla|Jitendra Thakkar|Chetan Daiya|Prem Gadhvi
overview: Stylish super cop Danny Jigar takes the challenge of recovering a stolen 600-year-old statue. With his style and humor, He showcases his intelligence while solving the case.

title: Natsamrat
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Deepika Chikhalia|Manoj Joshi|Tasneem Sheikh
overview: The film is the story of an actor who has reached many heights in his career but has to retire from acting at the peak.

title: Bye
cast: Pallavi Patil|Hritik Yadav

title: Saheb
cast: Malhar Thakar|Kinjal Rajpriya|Archan Trivedi|Nisarg Trivedi|Sharvary Joshi
overview: The plot revolves around a youngster Malhar, who is very impulsive by Nature and accepts any challenge without even thinking about the consequences. When he loses his friend due to the negligence of the system, he decides to fight against the corrupt system. As Malhar's agitation becomes stronger, he is threatened for his life by the Chief Minister. However, this does not deter him and he challenges to dethrone the Chief Minister from power in 30 days. Will Malhar face the consequences of his impulsive nature? Will Malhar be able to avenge his friend's death?

title: Vaar Tahevaar
cast: Monal Gajjar|Parikshit Tamaliya|Tiku Talsania|Anurag Prappana|Kalpana Gagdekar
overview: Preetal and Shubh represent today's generation mindset. They are not very keen on starting their own families; they are focused on earning money and achieving their goals, but getting married is not a priority for them. But their families, determined to change Preetal and Shubh's mindsets, convince them to attend the grand Holi festival and the wedding of Shiv and Shivani, who are madly in love with each other (presenting the madness of love) and embody the joy and fulfillment of traditional family values.

title: Bey Yaar
cast: Manoj Joshi|Amit Mistry|Darshan Jariwala|Pratik Gandhi|Divyang Thakkar
overview: In the desperation to earn quick money, two best friends put their moral values at stake and end up losing their pride and dignity. They then choose a wrong path to set things right and snatch back what was rightfully theirs.

title: Ghost of the Highschool
cast: Viramdev Sinh Gohil|Vishvaraj Sinh Gohil|Ruturaj Sinh Zala|Parthivsinh Gohil
overview: Two friends start making a documentary about their village's haunted high school, and while making this documentary something crazy happens with them at night.

title: Baap No Bagicho
cast: Sanjay Goradia|Ravi Kishan|Mushtaq Khan|Govardhan Asrani|Rina Soni
overview: A real estate agent wants to buy a family ancestral home "Baap No Bagicho" and continues to threaten the family until they give up the house. The father has a plan to get out of this, but will he able to successfully implement his plan?

title: Builder Boys
cast: Raunaq Kamdar|Shivam Parekh|Esha Kansara|Shekhar Shukla|Hemin Trivedi
overview: The movie is expected to follow the story of friends navigating the challenges and comedic mishaps of a construction project, providing audiences with a fresh and engaging storyline.

title: Hun Iqbal
cast: Mitra Gadhvi|Sonali Lele Desai
overview: Iqbal, an artist, pulls up an unbelievable - never seen before the heist and the rest of the movie revolves around the police department trying to catch the most flamboyant thief they have ever witnessed in their career.

title: Fakt Mahilao Maate
cast: Yash Soni|Deeksha Joshi|Deep Vaidya|Amitabh Bachchan|Tarjanee Bhadla
overview: Chintan Parikh, a 28-year-old middle-class man constantly surrounded by and troubled by the women in his life. On one fateful trip to Ambaji Temple he prays and asks for a power that could help him understand women and his wish is granted. Watch the drama unfold after he starts hearing voices.

title: Gujjubhai The Great
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Swati Shah|Jimit Trivedi|Dipna Patel|Alekh Sangal
overview: Hasmukh Gandhi has a simple philosophy: enjoy and let enjoy. But his stress-free life is interrupted when his daughter, Tanisha comes home with her boyfriend, Montu. While everyone in the Gandhi family has fallen for Montu's charm, Hasmukh sees him for the trickster he is. Not wanting his daughter to be entrapped, Hasmukh has found the perfect boy for her; one who is not only trustworthy, but also someone he knows will take care of her. The trouble is no one approves of his choice.

title: Best of Luck Laalu
cast: Supriya Pathak|Simran Natekar|Kurush Deboo
overview: Story of a boy named Laalu, a student of tenth standard, and how he deals with exam stress among other things that bother a teenager.

title: Thai Jashe!
cast: Manoj Joshi|Malhar Thakar|Monal Gajjar
overview: Thai Jashe! is an upcoming urban Gujarati film written and directed by Nirav Barot. The film is about the struggles of a middle class man to achieve his goals in the metrocity Ahmedabad. The film stars Manoj Joshi, Malhar Thakar and Monal Gajjar.

title: Chabutro
cast: Raunaq Kamdar|Anjali Barot|Bhumika Barot|Dharmesh Vyas|Chhaya Vora
overview: Viraj is living his dream life in the US but is forced to move back to Ahmedabad due to visa issues. During this time, he meets Nivedita, an architecture student, who is completely opposite to him. Now, Viraj must make a choice. Will he choose to go back or stay here?

title: Pagalpanti
cast: Mukul Dev|Rahul Dev|Purva Rana|Dinesh Lamba|Nicholas Benjamin
overview: A tourist group from all parts of India go on holiday to Fiji Island, encountering various situations and their holiday turns to a patriotic mission. By navigating a local Fijian Don, Chhoti Goli, and, with the help of Inspector Ram, they succeed in their mission over international wanted criminal Kazaam, making India proud.

title: Kahi De Ne Prem Chhe
cast: Vishal Solanki|Yukti Randeria|Smit Pandya|Heena Varde|Kalpesh Patel
overview: Kahi de ne prem chhe is a story of a small town bubbly girl anjali, who fell in love with Aaditya an absolute opposite character. As anjali does every effort to make aaditya believe in love but fails all the time.

title: Bachubhai
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Apara Mehta|Amit Singh Thakur|Poorvi Palan|Naman Gor
overview: Bachubhai, is a journey of an old man, who decides to go back to college, in pursuit of getting back his job. Will he triumph against all odds and make his dream a reality? What will happen in this journey?

title: Sharato Lagu
cast: Malhar Thakar|Deeksha Joshi|Hemant  Jha|Prashant Barot
overview: Satya and Saavi are a couple who are poles apart in personality and are introduced to each other as prospective marriage partners. Their crazy romantic story forms the crux of the plot.

title: Lagan Special
cast: Malhar Thakar|Puja Joshi|Mitra Gadhvi|Ragi Jani|Kalpana Gagdekar
overview: Shekhar and Suman are supposed to get married in the morning and tonight is the Sangeet Sandhya. It's an arranged marriage where Shekhar seems to be over excited about the marriage but moments before the Sangeet Sandhya function, Suman finds that Shekhar doesn't love her and, heartbroken, decides to call off the wedding.

title: Pappa Tamne Nahi Samjaay
cast: Manoj Joshi|Johnny Lever|Ketki Dave|Bhavya Gandhi|Shraddha Dangar
overview: The generation gap between a 56-year-old father and an 18-year-old son results in misunderstanding, distance, and tension between them. A family entertainer, Pappa Tamne Nahi Samjaay has the right balance of comedy and drama, featuring the emotional bond the two protagonists share.

title: Gulaam Chor
cast: Malhar Thakar|Vinita Joshi|Ojas Rawal|Vyoma Nandi|Dharmesh Vyas
overview: Twelve people who gather to gamble at a house party with Rs 12 crore. But at midnight, the lights go out, and the money disappears. No one has entered the house, no one has left. The money isn't found in the house vicinity either.

title: Aav Taru Kari Nakhu
cast: Monal Gajjar|Aditya Kapadia|Tiku Talsania|Amar Upadhyay|Manisha Kanojia
overview: A stoic father falls in love and ends up marrying his college sweetheart whose sons are incidentally in love with both of her daughters. The sons then hilariously attempt ways to try and sabotage their father's marriage.

title: Dhaad
cast: Kay Kay Menon|Raghubir Yadav|Nandita Das|Sandeep Kulkarni|Sujata Mehta
overview: Drama centred around a dacoit named Ghela who believes in the power of the gun and regards it as a necessary tool for survival.

title: Sonu Tane Mara Par Bharoso Nai Ke
cast: Malhar Thakar|Jayesh More|Kalpana Gagdekar|Ragi Jani|Nijal Modi
overview: Kartik who belongs to a middle class family buys a television from Chor Bazar which turns out to be defective. In his attempt to repair the television, Kartik finds gold coins in it. He hands over the gold to the Police and earns 10% commission for his honesty. Things take a hilarious turn, when the smuggler of the gold coins reaches Kartik's house. How would Kartik handle this situation? Would the smuggler get his gold coins back?

title: Mijaaj
cast: Malhar Thakar|Esha Kansara|Revanta Sarabhai|Abhinay Banker|Chhaya Vora
overview: Mijaaj is the story of three youngsters, Jay (played by Malhar Thakar), Jhanvi (played by Esha Kansara) and Yogesh (played byRevanta Sarabhai), who are caught in the middle of a fight between Sarita ben an old lady, who owns India Lodge - a heritage property, and an MNC wanting to possess it. The lodge is a shelter to people from all walks of life, but when a local goon, joins hands with the MNC to evict the residents of the lodge, Jay, Jhanvi, and Yogesh make it their mission to fight against the goons and save India Lodge.

title: Auntypreneur
cast: Supriya Pathak|Brinda Trivedi|Margi Desai|Yukti Randeria|Kaushambi Bhatt
overview: Supriya Pathak Kapur helms a titular role in a comic tale of 65-year-old Jasuben, who teams up with fellow homemakers to claim their financial independence, proving, as she says, "Why should boys have all the funds?"

title: Lapet
cast: Nayan Shukla|Ketan Kumar Sagar|Vikee Shah|Bhakti Kubavat|Prashant Barot
overview: Don Bhanu Pratap wants her daughter Mausam to get married to a groom of his choice. Out of three suitors arranged by him, an NRI, a villager, and a local goon, one has to be chosen by Mausam. In their attempt to woo Mausam, the three suitors go to extreme ends, which leads to hilarious situations. Meanwhile, Bhanu Pratap's rival gang has hired a kidnapper to kidnap Mausam. Will Bhanu be able to save Mausam from the kidnappers? Is the kidnapper one of the three guys chosen by the family? Who will Mausam be married off to?

title: Shu Thayu?
cast: Jay Bhatt|Mayur Chauhan|Malhar Thakar|Yash Soni|Mitra Gadhvi
overview: Manan wants to marry Dipali and with great difficulty he has convinced Dipali's parents. Marriage has to take place briskly but before marriage Manan meets with an uncanny accident while playing with friends Neel, Viral and Chirag. Manan starts to speak one sentence repeatedly and when his friends make him consult the doctor; they find out that Manan has lost his memory of past two years as he was hit in the head. Now Manan doesn't know Dipali, about his marriage and apart from his friends nobody else knows about this incident. Will Manan get married? Will Manan remember everything? Will his family know about this? Will Manan be able to say, What Happened?

title: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye
cast: Karan Bhanushali|Krishna Bharadwaj|Hemen Chauhan|Dharmendra Gohil|Rudrakshi Gupta
overview: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye recounts the riveting saga of a business family which finds itself at the crossroads, where one wrong decision could end up costing them everything.

title: Desire
cast: Rinkal Dhamelia|Milan Bhil
overview: ‘Abharkha’ literally translates to desire; a strong feeling of wanting to have something. The story travels through the journey of two characters Milan and Mira, wherein we find childish affection, the needs of a capitalist village and a woman’s stoic resilience and grit. Milan is a quiet and aloof child who shares a unique bond with his mother and a blind teacher, Girish Sir at school. They guide him through life in their own simple ways. Mira’s story of resilience captures her personal and professional battles as she holds on stoically through her journey in an isolated marriage. The story is a tapestry of small moments of smiles, hidden anguish, cries and whispers of Milan’s constant struggle and of Mira’s hope. It succeeds and fails, but eventually lies in the moments in between.

title: Kaashi Raaghav
cast: Deeksha Joshi|Jayesh More|Shruhad Goswami
overview: In Kolkata's shadows and Varanasi's light, a mother's love and a Truck driver's guilt collide. Kaashi Raaghav is a story of vengeance, redemption, and sacrifice - where fate burns brighter than hope. A lost child, a haunted past, and a tragic love story: Kaashi-Raaghav unravels a journey through betrayal, redemption, and the flames of an unforgiving society.

title: Dhuandhaar
cast: Malhar Thakar|Hiten Kumar|Netri Trivedi|Alisha Prajapati|Ashish Kakkad
overview: Everything changes for Aarav when he gets involved in a road accident. A wrong decision takes him on a journey darker than his wildest dreams. Loved by a father, pampered by a friend and chased by a cop, will he be able to find redemption?

title: Duniyadari
cast: Malhar Thakar|Esha Kansara|Aarjav Trivedi|Tarika Tripathi|Parikshit Tamaliya
overview: College buddies play cupid for a couple whose love story is destined to end in tears - yet, when they reunite years later, the college pals find their memories to be mostly sweet.

title: Raktbeej
cast: Denisha Ghumra|Nakshraaj|Nisarg Trivedi|Tarjanee Bhadla|Nischay Rana
overview: On a stormy night, Aadhya shodhan a famous indian author gets trapped in a cafe with some suspicious people. Each of them have different motives to kill. Will she survive the night or will she be found guilty?

title: Short Circuit
cast: Dhvanit Thaker|Kinjal Rajpriya|Smit Pandya|Utkarsh Mazumdar|Vikee Shah
overview: Samay, an average IT guy, gets trapped in an evil plan of a scientist. He has to fight back, to save his love and the world by breaking the time loop.

title: Between Day and Night
overview: Without a love of my own.

title: Oxygen
cast: Rohini Hattangadi|Darshan Jariwala|Prateeksha Lonkar|Vyoma Nandi|Pankaj Pathak
overview: A new world of relationships

title: Montu Ni Bittu
cast: Maulik Nayak|Aarohi Patel|Mehul Solanki|Bansi Rajput|Happy Bhavasar
overview: Montu has loved Bittu since childhood, but even when Bittu's marriage is on the cards, they are still just friends. But that's not the only problem, as a prospective suitor, Abhinav, makes things even more complicated for Montu and Bittu. The story takes us through their journey of emotions.

title: Locha Laapsi
cast: Malhar Thakar|Chirag Vohra|Vaibhavi Upadhyay|Chetan Dhanani|Nilesh Pandya
overview: Bhaskar Joshi, a determined engineer, is on his way to Kutch-Bhuj to showcase his latest venture. But when his cab gets a flat tire in the middle of nowhere, Bhaskar's journey takes a wild turn. He accepts a lift from a mysterious stranger, only to discover that his new driver is harboring a dark secret-a dead body in the trunk. As the tension mounts, Bhaskar is joined by another unwitting passenger: the wife of a police officer, who also hitches a ride. Caught between the terrifying reality of the situation and his own fear, Bhaskar must navigate this nerve-wracking journey without tipping off the suspicious man who holds all the power-and a gun. Will Bhaskar find a way out of this deadly predicament, or is he trapped in a ride straight to disaster?

title: Tamburo
cast: Manoj Joshi|Bharat Chawda|Pratik Gandhi|Ojas Rawal|Jayesh More
overview: The Plot revolves around three P’s – Paisa (Money), Property & Pyaar (Love). Hardik and Bhavik, friends for life are ambitious young men who dream of becoming wealthy quickly. In their quest for easy money, with a twist of fate the duo find themselves embroiled in a situation that sets a chain reaction where the Mafia, the Police and the Gamblers are all on a wild but hilarious chase after them.

title: Golkeri
cast: Malhar Thakar|Manasi Parekh|Sachin Khedekar|Vandana Pathak|Dharmesh Vyas
overview: Sahil and Harshita, overnight end their perfect relationship of two years. But, as much as they want to move on and move away from each other, they are stuck in awkward situations put up by their parents who make persistent attempts to bring them back together. Will their parents' concern cross the line and turn into interference? Or will they triumph in explaining the children that a relationship is just like 'Golkeri' - A sweet-sour traditional Gujarati pickle. The taste only gets better with time.

title: Naseeb Ni Balihari
cast: Gopi Desai|Paresh Rawal|Naseeruddin Shah|Om Puri|Smita Patil
overview: Naseeb Ni Balihari is a Gujarati movie released in 1982

title: Malik Ni Varta
cast: Anang Desai|Monal Gajjar|Rajeev Mehta|Hitu Kanodia|Sunil Vishrani
overview: In a fearful town, whispers of Malik, a mysterious and intimidating figure, spread like wildfire. As the community grapples with fear, individuals speculate about Malik's true identity.

title: Dhunki
cast: Pratik Gandhi|Deeksha Joshi|Vishal Shah|Kaushambi Bhatt|Vaibhavi Bhatt
overview: Two friends start a food delivery business after quitting their well-paying IT jobs. Their shared journey as young entrepreneurs managing a start-up comes at the cost of personal sacrifices and will test their mettle. Will they succeed?

title: Roll No. 56
cast: Ashok Beniwal|Het Dave|Shruti Gholap|Akhilendra Mishra|Prince Shah
overview: The Film Revolves around 12 year old kid, who has some physical disabilities. Due to this, his life becomes abnormal. Thus, film portrays his life incidents.

title: Bhavni Bhavai
cast: Smita Patil|Naseeruddin Shah|Mohan Gokhale|Om Puri|Dina Pathak
overview: In a drought-stricken city in India, the emperor Maharaja Dhiraj Chandrasen, who has two wives, and no children, orders all kinds of rituals to appease the Rain Gods

title: Order Order Out of Order
cast: Prashant Barot|Jinal Belani|Hemang Dave|Anang Desai|Manan Desai
overview: A Gujarati Film where The film focuses on the story of two brothers Yash Thakar and Raj Thakar, who are fighting their inner demons. After training as lawyers, they decide to follow the path of truth and honesty. While doing so, they establish their own firm. One such case changes their lives and leaves them in turmoil.

title: Lakiro
cast: Raunaq Kamdar|Deeksha Joshi|Netri Trivedi|Nisarg Trivedi|Shivani Joshi
overview: Richa and Hrishi are millennials, who fall in love and get married. Like most working couples today, their careers slowly start to create a divide between them. Things turn so ugly that they eventually decide to file for divorce.

title: Dhummas
cast: Ojas Rawal|Jayesh More|Kinjal Rajpriya|Kinal Trivedi|Chetan Daiya
overview: In this movie humanity has been portrayed in a moral and superior manner, and climax will keep the audience on the edge and curious. One should not think defeated till the last breathe because table can turn at any moment in life. A person should be law abiding citizen and work accordingly.

title: Romance Complicated
cast: Umang Acharya|Haresh Daghiya|Shweta Dhasmana|Dhwani Gautam|Darshan Jariwala
overview: As a favor to his father's best friend, a young man agrees to escort a woman to America where she's expected to devote herself to her studies.

title: Adko Dadko
cast: Sanjaysinh Chauhan|Akshat Irani|Maulika Patel|Smita Jaykar|Firoz Irani
overview: On realising that his girlfriend is pregnant, Rahul seeks help from his business partner and friends. Will his friends and acquaintances help him? Will Rahul be able to deal with this situation in his life?

title: 21st Tiffin
cast: Netri Trivedi|Raunaq Kamdar|Jhanvi Patel|Hitesh Thakar|Deepan Shah
overview: This is a story of a middle aged lady in the multitude her of roles: a wife, a mother, a daughter, a sister, a friend and an entrepreneur. Her wage-earning comes through tiffin services. Nitu, her daughter pursuing undergraduate studies, notices that her mother performs all her duties well but there's an affliction and 'something lacking' in her behavior. Dhruv, a young man and the 21st customer of her tiffin service, appreciates the lady. The sudden fact of appreciation and attention strikes out the affliction. Nitu's observation about her mother woven through the various emotional and socio-cultural situations makes an interesting drama.

title: Kevi Rite Jaish
cast: Divyang Thakkar|Veronica Kalpana-Gautam|Tom Alter|Rakesh Bedi|Rita Bhaduri
overview: The Patels, members of the Gujarati farming community, are obsessed with migrating to the United States to buy a motel.

title: Love in the Time of Malaria
cast: Dilip Joshi|Renuka Shahane|Mohan Gokhale|Manoj Joshi|Nimesh Desai
overview: Caused by mysterious mosquitos, a strange illness spreads through the land, causing restlessness and agitation among the people. Young, ambitious and loyal to the throne, Hunshilal steps up to develop anti-mosquito medicines from onions. While doing so, he falls in love with his colleague.

title: Gajab Thai Gayo!
cast: Malhar Thakar|Pooja Jhaveri|Ujjwal Chopra|Sunil Vishrani|Vaibhav Biniwale
overview: Sheth Kapurchand Mangaldas Vidyalaya is one of the last existing Gujarati medium schools. Principal of the school wants to preserve his heritage and is struggling with changing world. Enter Bhagirath, who is a post graduate from Princeton University and offers to teach the students for free. Vishwa, principal's daughter and a teacher herself doesn't trust Bhagirath as his teaching methods are unconventional. Bhaga, Vishwa and students- Anant, Paheli, Virat travel to nearby village and their journey begins to achieve the goal.

title: Chandlo
cast: Kajal Oza Vaidya|Manav Gohil|Shraddha Dangar|Jayesh More|Ojas Rawal
overview: Chandlo is an upcoming Gujarati movie scheduled to be released on 22 Jul, 2023. The movie is directed by Hardik Gajjar and will feature Manav Gohil, Shraddha Dangar, Jayesh More and Kajal Oza Vaidya as lead characters.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
cast: Malhar Thakar|Yukti Randeria|Archan Trivedi|Vandana Pathak|Satish Bhatt
overview: Varun and Komal meet in collage, fall in love and decide to marry despite their unsupportive families. It's about togetherness, standing between right and wrong, woman value, freedom and besides how small misunderstandings creates a space within the loved once and family.

title: Desh Re Joya Dada Pardesh Joya
cast: Hiten Kumar|Roma Manek|Arvind Trivedi|Sameer Rajda|Ramesh Mehta
overview: Desh Re Joya Dada Pardesh Joya is a romantic action comedy Gujarati movie, Directed and Produced by Govindbhai Patel. Featuring Hiten Kumar, Roma Manik and Ramesh Mehta in the lead roles . Radha, a village girl, is married off to an NRI after her marriage to her childhood sweetheart is cancelled. But, she undergoes a cultural shock in her new surroundings and yearns to get back home.

title: Tari Sathe
cast: Bhavya Gandhi|Jhinal Belani
overview: The story revolves between two youngsters who are at the age of getting married. The girl seeks to meet the boy with a wish of a denial. On the other end boy with positive mindset without revealing his original identity.

title: Jaysuk Zdpayo
cast: Johnny Lever|Jimit Trivedi|Puja Joshi|Hardik Sangani|Anang Desai
overview: This is the story of a guy name Jaysukh, whose father has left tremendous amount of debt on him, while he is single earning person and he has to repay back of his father debt. Jaiyukhcomes to Ahmedabad city and got a job in firm, he falls in love with Jigna his co worker, meanwhile his boss's sister (Kiran) comes back to india after completing her graduation from london and falls in love with Jaisukh. Now his Boss Mansukh force to Jaysuk to marry his sister, Jaiyuk denies it and ask his friends to help him. Sushil (Jaysuk's friend) tells lie to mansukh that, he and jaysuk are in relation. Now the boss fires him and here the problems starts in Jaisukh's life.

title: Chor Bani Thangaat Kare
cast: Amit Mistry|Bijal Joshi|Prem Gadhavi|Ojas Rawal|Sharad Sharma
overview: Taxi-driver Rajkumar hopes to recover from kleptomania after falling for a female passenger, but things soon go sour between the two as she learns about his disorder. He invites more trouble into his life by stealing a bomb from a terrorist.

title: Cheel Zadap
cast: Darshan Jariwala|Soniya Shah|Jimit Trivedi|Sushant Singh|Kalpesh Chouhan
overview: Cashier working in bank threaten by underworld don to be part of robbery. Things get complicated after look-alike of cashier is found in another city

title: Karsandas Pay and Use
cast: Jay Bhatt|Mayur Chauhan|Chetan Daiya|Deeksha Joshi|Hemang Shah
overview: Two brothers run a public restroom when one of them meets Jaya.

title: Frendo
cast: Tushar Sadhu|Twinkal Patel|Kushal Mistry|Jay Pandya|Deep Vaidya
overview: Four buddies who are proudly and voluntarily jobless embark on an exhilarating voyage. They will wait for the wind to come and blow the fly off if it is sitting on their mouth. These four are having a good life together, but Kana has to make a decision since he falls in love with Radhika right away and wants to marry her. things they are unable to do.

title: Fodi Laishu Yaar
cast: Vishal Solanki|Alisha Prajapati|Chintan Dave|Koyal Shewale|Vivek Pathak
overview: For the first time ever in Gujarati Cinema, Fodi Laishu Yaar presents a very young and fresh romance comedy movie based on engineering students life. The story revolves around 4 friends who also represents 4 major parts of Gujarat

title: Vitamin She
cast: Smit Pandya|Dhvanit Thaker|Prem Gadhavi|Maulik Nayak
overview: Jigar, an independent, carefree, insurance agent falls in love with Shruti. Soon he realizes that love is not eternal but it comes with an expiry date.

title: Aapne To Dhirubhai
cast: Vrajesh Hirjee|Jayaka Yagnik|Bhakti Rathod|Ritesh Mobh|Ashish Bhatt
overview: The story about a college student, who wants to be as rich as Dhirubhai Ambani. The fun begins when he starts imitating him and creates multiple blunders in his business. And with all this the laugh riot begins.

title: Pela Adhi Akshar
cast: Aanshul Trivedi|Parth Oza|Semal Bhatt|Bhakti Kubavat|Pooja Ruparel
overview: Pela Adhi Akshar is a coming-of-age feel-good film that tries to explore the space between boys and girls, fact and fiction, reality and fantasy, and life and film. It is also everybody's story, an introspective look at lives of people we know so very well: Ourselves. Catch four friends at the crossroads of life, trying to tackle everybody's problem: What do we do with the rest of our lives?

title: Swagatam
cast: Malhar Thakar|Katha Patel|Vandana Pathak|Ojas Rawal
overview: It is a story about a madhouse which has some weird secrets and trail of insanity which runs in the blood. Manav’s innocent looking family has a secret habit of killing the over-aged lonely men who have nothing to look forward in life. One day, Manav gives his family the good news of his marriage and he discovers all dark secrets of the house. How will he get his life and his family’s life on track.

title: Chal Mann Jeetva Jaiye 2
cast: Krishna Bharadwaj|Hemen Chauhan|Dharmendra Gohil|Rajeev Mehta
overview: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye 2 recounts the riveting saga of a business family which finds itself at the crossroads, where one wrong decision could end up costing them everything.

title: Congratulations
cast: Sharman Joshi|Manasi Parekh|Archan Trivedi|Jayesh Barbhaya|Swati Dave
overview: Aditya marries his college girlfriend Ragini who wants to have a kid but Aditya is not mentally ready to be a parent. After a miscarriage and delivering a stillborn, Ragini cannot conceive a baby. How far will Aditya go to revive his love life with Ragini? Will he become the first pregnant Gujarati man alive?

title: Veer-Isha Nu Seemant
cast: Malhar Thakar|Puja Joshi|Anurag Prapanna|Chhaya Vora|Feroz Bhagat
overview: A Couple decides to have no kids after their marriage and stick to it till death does them apart, but their families and society have expectations from them, making it difficult for their marriage. Will they able to stick to their plan?

title: Ram Bharosey
cast: Dhairya Thakkar|Reeva Rachh|Nilesh Parmar|Jagjeetsinh Vadher|Maulik Nayak
overview: In a remote village in Gujarat, Keshav and Kesar's secret love story blossoms with handwritten letters and secret meetings, orchestrated by the help of Keshav's friend Parag. During one such meeting, Keshav and Kesar indulge in an intimate encounter. What will happen when Kesar misses her period?

title: Bhram
cast: Mitra Gadhvi|Sonali Lele Desai|Abhinay Banker
overview: A dementia patient finds herself at the center of a murder investigation, desperately trying to piece together scattered memories that may identify the killer - if she can trust what her mind tells her.

title: 3 DOBA: 3 Mistakes of God
cast: Nirav Mashruwala|Chetan Daiya|Nishith Brahmbhatt|Maulika Patel|Shivani Purohit
overview: This is a comedy about three physically impaired brothers named Nayan (blind), Dhwanit (mute) and Karan (deaf). Their lives take endearing turns when they meet a beautiful thief named Sheena.

title: Wassup! Zindagi
cast: Ravish Desai|Sonu Chandrapal|Prem Gadhavi|Jhinal Belani|Jayaka Yagnik
overview: Four friends, Bhavesh (Ravish Desai), Dharmesh (Prem Gadhvi), Rehaan (Gaurav Passwala) and Dinesh Bhai (Jayesh More) want an eventful life. But as Bhavesh gets married to his girlfriend Jharna (Jayaka Yagnik) of four year, when their life changes into a monotonous routine. As the four friends find themselves getting trapped into the boredom of household life, Nisha (Jhinal Belani) walks into Bhavesh’s life and things change further. What follows is a series of confusions, misunderstandings, revelations and more. But all’s well that ends well.

title: Mister Kalaakar
cast: Jay Bhatt|Adi Irani|Akshat Irani|Manoj Joshi
overview: Protagonist Jigar Majmudar desires to become an actor, his interest clashes with his father who is a lawyer. He must tackle various obstacles and incidents which put him in a tough spot. It will be interesting to watch, how he faces the problems and comes out of it.

title: Ventilator
cast: Pratik Gandhi|Jackie Shroff|Sanjay Goradia|Manan Desai|Mitra Gadhvi
overview: A son whose father is in serious condition and kept under a ventilator during the period of the Navratri festival creates a situation that can ruin the festival for other relatives.

title: Maunam
cast: Bhavik Bhojak|Aanchal Shah|Maulik Chauhan|Chetan Daiya|Allok Thakar
overview: Raghav, a supermarket employee, and Meera, a journalist fall in love, marry and await their first child's arrival. Their lives take an unexpected turn when they're involved in an accident, leaving Raghav hospitalized in a intensive care.

title: Seth Sagalsha
cast: Shrikant Soni|Snehlata|Ramesh Mehta|Narayan Rajgor|P Kharsani
overview: In rural Gujarat, Seth Sagalsha and his wife make a solemn vow to feed a sadhu before eating themselves. When Lord Vishnu tests their resolve, their dedication faces an unexpected challenge. A story of faith and sacrifice unfolds in this poignant short.

title: Polam Pol
cast: Jinal Belani|Prem Gadhavi|Jayesh More|Ojas Rawal|Jimit Trivedi
overview: Two struggling actors get a chance to work on a movie project.

title: Dhan Dhatudi Patudi
cast: Sanjaysinh Chauhan|Jahnvi Chauhan|Jitendra Thakkar|Jitu Pandya|Hemang Dave
overview: Dhan Dhatudi Patudi is peaceful village where people live happily but the day all saw a dream to become a millionaire overnight and confusion in chase of the money run creates the fun ride with laughter every moment.

title: Daav Thai Gayo Yaar
cast: Dharmesh Vyas|Sunil Vishrani|Rakesh Pujara|Mitra Gadhvi|Mayur Chauhan
overview: Three friends who are masters at solving problems and are a helping hard to the society, get into a trap while solving a personal problem which gradually creates a mess for them. How they come out of it is what will make us laugh.

title: Khape
cast: Aditya Lakhia|Karan Patel|Chirag Modi|Prashant Barot
overview: Aditya Lakhia (who played the beloved Kachra in Lagaan) stars in a moving Gujarati drama about Ali, a young boy who works as a labourer to help support his poverty-stricken family. But despite living in a community where education is frowned upon as a waste of time, Ali’s father insists he be educated for the opportunities it offers. Khape explores the power of education to break down barriers and help people rise above their circumstances to aspire to a better life.

title: Mithada Maheman
cast: Yash Soni|Mitra Gadhvi|Aarohi Patel|Mihir Nishith Rajda|Sonali Lele Desai
overview: Distraught Aditya finds himself on a road trip with three strangers who offer different perspectives on his life.

title: Aagantuk
cast: Utsav Naik|Hiten Kumar|Netri Trivedi|Shriya Tiwari|Sonali Lele Desai
overview: On his way back to his house in Saputara, Daanish stumbles upon a stranger lying on the road. The old and tired stranger Shukhlaji latches on to Daanish for a lift on the deserted streets of Saputara ghat. Both strangers, with opposing personalities, inside a car set for a journey full of surprises and shocks.

title: Mendi Rang Lagyo
cast: Usha Kiran|Rajendra Kumar|B.M. Vyas|Bhimji Bhai|Chandrakant Sangani
overview: In the wake of an alcoholic rage that drove away his beautiful wife and children, Anil is sent to prison, where he has plenty of time to reflect on his actions. Vowing to start anew, he moves to the city of Kolkata, where his wife and children just so happen to be living. But can he really regain their trust?

title: Chasani
cast: Manoj Joshi|Divyang Thakkar|Maira Doshi
overview: Ramnik is married for 25 years and thinks his life is picture perfect but does not know what love is. While Rahul is 25 years old but has just lost the love of his life. A chance meeting of the two takes them on a journey of discovering the true meaning of love.

title: Cchupp
cast: Hiten Kumar|Morli Patel|Heena Varde|Hemang Dave|Hemin Trivedi

title: Dhola Maru
cast: Naresh Kanodia|Snehlata|Ramesh Mehta|Jayshree Talpade|Firoz Irani
overview: Prince Dhola is unaware of his childhood marriage to princess Maru, whom he falls in love with as an adult. The couple fight against jealous relatives attempting to break up their relationship.

title: Safalta 0 Km
cast: Dharmesh Yelande|Nikunj Modi|Manisha Thakur|Dharmesh Vyas|Kurush Deboo
overview: Safalta 0 Km follows the journey of a dancer - the extensive struggles he must go through and the risks he must take in order to achieve his dream.

title: Aghattit
cast: Chetan Daiya|Alisha Prajapati|Dolly Trivedi|Ashish Rajput|Archan Trivedi
overview: Aghatit is a gujarati featured murder mystery. The storyline revolves around shrikant desai's murder and the murder suspects. As the investigation proceeds, various phases of shrikant's life are unfolded and a series of unbelievable events come to limelight.

title: JaiShree Krishh
cast: Simran Natekar|Devarshi Shah|Akash Trivedi|Ragi Jani|Chetan Daiya
overview: An enchanting musical journey of love and faith.

title: Bhed
overview: A web of intrigue unfolds when a professional killer, Sattu, is tasked with kidnapping industrialist Sudhakar Rana's family. Meanwhile unaware of the danger, Sudhakar's daughter, Ishika becomes entangled with a manipulative drug peddler, Lucky. As secrets and hidden motives emerge, the film takes audiences on a thrilling journey of suspense and unexpected revelations.

title: Premji: Rise of a Warrior
cast: Abhimanyu Singh|Happy Bhavsar|Mehul Solanki|Aarohi Patel|Malhar Pandya
overview: The Story is about a boy named Premji (played by Mehul Solanki) who hails from a Kutchi village. He comes to Ahmedabad with a tragic past and he constantly struggles to know who he really is. In this journey, his soul mate, Pavan (played by Aarohi Patel) and his best friends Mukesh (Maulik Nayak), Chitra (Namrata Pathak) and Roy (Malhar Pandya) supports him and joins his fight against the evil.

title: Affraa Taffri
cast: Prashant Barot|Nilesh Bhrahmbhatt|Chetan Daiya|Sonali Lele Desai|Vipul Desai
overview: This is the story of a village named Vishrampur. The village leader Trikamdas is lying on his death bed and wants to fulfill his last wish which is seeing his granddaughter being married. However, the girl has no intention of getting married anytime soon. This twists the film into a complete entertainment package full of situational, slapstick, farce and dark humor.

title: Carry On Kesar
cast: Supriya Pathak|Darshan Jariwala
overview: Story of a couple in their 50s who have lost all hopes of becoming parents are inspired well sort of forced by a 20some youngster to become parents. This child in this 20some girl teaches a couple equivalent to their parents age, the idea of 'Never give up' and age is 'just a number'. A slice of life comedy meant for the entire family, not only tickles your funny bones but awakens the dying hopes of several childless couples in India. It not only inspires the childless couples but also hints the youth to dedicate themselves towards their passion.

title: Aavuj Reshe
cast: Manoj Joshi|Shekhar Shukla|Mehul Kajaria
overview: Three happy-go-lucky friends squander their time and are not willing to take up responsibilities. However, they soon come across an attractive opportunity that turns their world upside down.

title: Kalapi
cast: Sanjeev Kumar|Aruna Irani|Padmarani|Nutan|Pratap Oza
overview: Kalapi is a 1966 Indian Gujarati biographical film directed by Manhar Raskapur, starring Sanjeev Kumar, Padmarani, Aruna Irani, Nutan, Pranlal Kharsani.

title: Romeo & Radhika
cast: Vidhi Parikh|Tushar Sadhu|Hemang Dave|Shyam Nair|Mushtaq Khan
overview: In The Movie Romeo and Radhika, Romeo Represents naughtiness in Love and Radhika Represents The Sincerity of Love but both of them represent the Art Of Love in modern era which has the feeling to go extreme to become one. People fall in love with their best friends in real life all the time. Have You Ever Proposed Your Best Friend ??? Sometimes the sweetest love stories are ones that start with a friendship and ends in eternal love. R&R is a journey about how Rahul wins Radhika's heart with great help of his best buddies though this journey has lot of turns and twist in it creates a great story to watch. Radhika represents today's modern girl with great value system of the gujarati family exhibit the perfect mix of a true friend and a very responsible personality in it. All the characters are unique and will surely connect to some or the other way to our all audience.

title: Vash Level 2
cast: Janki Bodiwala|Hiten Kumar|Hitu Kanodia
overview: Sequel of Vash

title: Kamthaan
cast: Hitu Kanodia|Darshan Jariwala|Arvind Vaidya|Sanjay Goradia|Krunal Pandit
overview: A small-time thief makes the robbery of a lifetime when he accidentally breaks into the house of the newly appointed Police Inspector.

title: Gujarati Wedding in Goa
cast: Garima Bhardwaj|Geet Brahmbhatt|Shivang Brahmbhatt|Jay Khetani|Jenny Soni
overview: Ajay and Soumya are planning a destination wedding in Goa. The guests at the wedding including the cousins of the couple hate each other's presence and create trouble for each other. The film replete with ritual, and emotions will take you on a joy ride.

title: Mane Lai Jaa
cast: Pratish Vora|Mamta Solanki|Shraddha Padhiyar|Bhavini Jani|Bhakti Kubavat
overview: Mane Lai Ja is a film based on a 10-year-old girl Anandi. Along with entertainment, this film also delivers a social message to society and questions the dreadful rituals of our culture.

title: Ratanpur
cast: Jigar Bundela|Haresh Dagiya|Uday Dangar|Ronak Madgut|Jimmy Nanda
overview: Ratanpur is a nail-biting Gujarati thriller where the protagonist, an IPS officer recently posted in the village of Ratanpur, is faced with his life's toughest challenge - a murder that will change his life forever.

title: Wrong Side Raju
cast: Pratik Gandhi|Asif Basra|Kavi Shastri|Kimberley Louisa McBeath|Hetal Puniwala
overview: A driver named Raju embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing lives of 3 people due to a controversial hit and run accident.

title: Kyan Rami Avya Raas
cast: Hitu Kanodia|Amar Upadhyay|Pranjal Bhatt|Jayendra Maheta|Jaimini Trivedi
overview: Deepak and Jyoti have been lovers since childhood. What will happen when the savior of the world, Shri Krishna, joins their love story?

title: Kem Chho?
cast: Kinjal Rajpriya|Tushar Sadhu|Chetan Daiya|Haresh Dagiya
overview: Mayur is a married middle-class man and that becomes his biggest problem. Juggling between various expectations of friends, family, and society, Mayur is in search of a solution as we all are. But does such a solution really exist?

title: Percy
cast: Ruby Patel|Kurush Deboo
overview: There is something comical and pathetic about Percy, an awkward young man of 28, living alone with his aged mother in an old house tucked away in the Parsi colony in Bombay -- a very middle-class setting. Though Banubai, Percy's mother, utterly dominates Percy's life, she does so with love and kindness. Percy holds a clerical position in a small Unani pharmacy, famous for its sexual restoratives. It is only at his place of work, where he wields some power, that Percy displays a measure of authority and self-assurance. One day, Percy discovers a fraud in the office accounts, as a consequence of which one of the junior employees is sacked. This event has far-reaching consequences in the lives of Percy and Banubai. Percy's peace is soon to be shattered.

title: Bau Na Vichaar
cast: Bhavya Gandhi|Janki Bodiwala|Devarshi Shah|Sanjay Galsar|Ragi Jani
overview: Getting selected in final 8 teams of a reality show specially for entrepreneurs, Varun an unaware over thinker , seeks to win the show to prove his unique start up idea's worth to his father by solving civil war amongst his best friend/business partners and saving them from fear of failure, confusion, insecurity and negative thinking,with help of Dadu, while unknowingly tackling a traitor amongst his team.

title: Divaswapna
cast: Chetan Daiya|Pravin Gundecha|Garima Bhardwaj|Rittesh Mobh|Bimal Trivedi
overview: Divaswapna is a story of the journey of a village boy named Kanaji who achieved all his dreams with his courage, commitment and passion despite of many odds in his life.

title: Lamboo Rastoo
cast: Jay Soni|Shrenu Parikh|Manoj Joshi|Anang Desai|Maulik Pathak
overview: Dhaivat, an ambitious musician, aspires to present a symphony that he created for his daughter at a symphony competition. However, the organizer of the competition, Param, doesn't want him to participate in the competition and kidnaps Dhaivat's daughter to stop him.

title: Hu Ane Tu
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Sonali Lele Desai|Parikshit Tamaliya|Puja Joshi|Sunil Vishrani
overview: The story revolves around Umesh, who rekindles his romance with his long-lost college crush Ketaki, a divorcee. Meanwhile, Umesh's son Tejas meets the girl of his dreams: Reva. As the father and son prepare for a double wedding, they encounter numerous challenges. What ensues is roller-coaster ride entailing misunderstandings, twists, and trials as they navigate the crossroads of tradition and modernity.

title: Vaahlam Jaao Ne
cast: Pratik Gandhi|Deeksha Joshi|Sanjay Goradia|Tiku Talsania|Jayesh More
overview: Reena is in love with Sumit. However due to her eccentric nature, Sumit has his reservations about getting married to her. But when Reena proposes the idea of meeting her father, Sumit is unable to say no that leads to a comedy of errors.

title: Agan Pankhudi
overview: In the small-town of Idar in Gujarat, Rashmi's father is protesting to stop illegal stone mining which is ripping the mountain city off its rich history. Her life turns upside down when one afternoon her father was shot dead. She wants justice for her father but only gets disappointment by the corrupt system. What happens next for the sake of justice was unforeseen.

title: Grand Hali
cast: Devang Patel|Khevna Rajyaguru|Hasmukh Bhavsar|Siddhi Idnani
