overview: Grand Hali is story of a satirical take on the concept of joint family in today's age. What happens when a domestic helper purposely creates confusion and misunderstandings in a joint family for his guilty pleasure is the crux of the story.

title: The Good Road
cast: Ajay Gehi|Keval Katrodia|Shamji Dhana Kerasia|Sonali Kulkarni|Poonam Kesar Singh
overview: Pappu is a truck driver. Supporting his parents and extended family is beyond his means. Now, he has been presented a plan. An accident will be staged. Pappu will "die". Insurance payments are substantial.David and Kiran, a middle class urban couple, with their son Aditya, are on a holiday. Aditya will be accidentally separated from them during a brief halt at a Dhaba. And his loss will only be discovered several hours, and several hundred kilometers later. They must double back to find him. Poonam is an 11-year old-year-old child from the city.

title: Shubh Aarambh
cast: Harsh Chhaya|Prachee Shah|Deeksha Joshi|Bharat Chawda|Aarjav Trivedi
overview: In the midst of her wedding, a young girl tries to save a 28 year old love marriage, of her future in-laws, which is falling apart.

title: Halo Manvyu Na Mele
cast: Hiten Kumar|Aanandee Tripathi
overview: The movie story deals Poor Kanu and Jeevi both are in love and would like to marry each other. But Jeevi's dad, Dhana Patel, wants her to marry a wealthier man and rejects Kanu.

title: The Other Side of the River
cast: Jayesh More|Ragi Jani|Happy Bhavasar|Bharat Thakkar|Nirmit Vaishnav
overview: Mrugtrushna is about four kids living on the banks of a river in 1980s Gujarat, and their desire to explore the other side of the river, leading them on a journey of imagination and wonder that they would cherish and remember forever.

title: Jagat
cast: Yash Soni|Chetan Daiya|Hitu Kanodia
overview: When a 12-year-old boy goes missing on his way to school, things don't seem what they appear to Police Sub-Inspector Jagat Pandya. As he digs deeper, the one thing he has to keep is his patience. A tiny detail leads him to the sinister truth he wasn't prepared for.

title: BaagadBillaa
cast: Chetan Dhanani|Jolly Rathod|Ojas Rawal|Chetan Daiya|Dinesh Lamba
overview: Chiranjeev, a.k.a. Chiru, is a cab driver, who meets a girl in his cab and falls for her until one night he gets into an unexpected ride.

title: Katlaa Curry
cast: Mayank Gandhi|Priyaank Gangwani|Rohit Prajapati
overview: Set in the sleepy fishing village along the banks of the river Narmada, a local fisherman Raaymal, pulls a young man Ratan adrift in his fishing net, setting off a journey of profound connection and self-discovery. As Raaymal discovers Ratan’s hidden struggle with his sexuality, he extends a helping hand to build a “new home”; and in his journey toward self-acceptance.

title: Holy Cowboys
overview: Holy Cowboys offers a fascinating, disconcerting look at Indian youth indoctrinated as bovine vigilantes. This observational documentary from Sundance Institute alumnus Varun Chopra goes deep into a world of bigotry and division, where a genuine love for animals and a naive sense of righteousness are weaponised.

title: The Durga Mehta Case
cast: Gazal Raii|Yatin Parmar|Rajkamal Deshpande|Jeenal R Umrania|Nilesh Bhatt
overview: After leaving her abusive marriage with Jayesh, Durga seeks refuge at her mother’s house with her son. But when Jayesh falls into a coma after a tragic incident, she is unjustly blamed despite not being there. How will she navigate through this crisis?

title: I Wish
cast: Monal Gajjar|Teeshay Shah|Aarjav Trivedi|Mehul Buch|Sharad Vyas
overview: Two very distinct individuals, Isha and Vismay, fall head over heels for one other, but once they begin living together, they find it challenging to keep the passion alive while still dealing with the responsibilities of a relationship. Isha and Vismay both refuse to give up on their love and pursue very distinct and unique roads to save it. For each of them, the voyage leads to self-discovery, but will they be able to live with each other again?

title: Karkhanu
cast: Kajal Oza Vaidya|Archan Trivedi|Parth Madhukrushna|Hardik Shastri|Raju Barot
overview: Three carpenters trapped in a haunted factory on Kalichaudash must burn a possessed girl's anklets, only to reveal the entire spooky tale was filmed in a single take with hilarious behind-the-scenes chaos.

title: Hahacar
cast: Mayur Chauhan|Hemang Shah|Mayank Gadhvi|Manish Vaghela|Chetan Daiya
overview: Hahacar is a situational suspense comedy film that takes you on a ride filled with chaos and drama packed into one night's story.

title: Tari Maate Once More
cast: Bharat Chawda|Janki Bodiwala|Ojas Rawal|Shraddha Dangar|Hemang Dave
overview: It is a love triangle with humorous situational comedy and masti masala content. There is a suspense, romance, comedy, drama, melodrama, aggression, problems at one situation. There are six friends Mihir, Tara, Aaisha, Jaadu, Maggie and Harry. Mihir and Aaisha love each other but Tara loves Mihir. See what happens next?

title: Jija Sala Jija
overview: Family relationships get hilariously complicated when three connected brothers-in-law find themselves in increasingly absurd situations.

title: Hoon Tari Heer
cast: Puja Joshi|Ojas Rawal|Bharat Chawda|Dharmesh Vyas|Surabhi Zaveri Vyas
overview: Heer, a small town girl faces taboos in her community to meet her man of dreams. she faces all odds to live a life of her choice and why can't a girl live with her parents like boys do and still be considered a stranger in her own home.

title: Ilu Ilu
cast: Bhavik Bhojak|Khushbu Trivedi|Maulik Chauhan|Chetan Daiya
overview: When it was time of Kevin and Riya's Wedding, Kevin's Father and Riya's Mother runs away and here starts ILU ILU. A 26 year old romantic love story, which revolves around 2 passionate lovers, who gets departed because of the caste and financial situations of their families then. Who now, after these many years meet again accidentally for their children's wedding.

title: Happy Familyy Pvt Ltd
cast: Rajeev Mehta|Karan Ashar|Vrajesh Hirjee|Avnish Mehra|Dhaval Pandya
overview: Happy Familyy Pvt Ltd is a movie starring Karan Ashar, Vrajesh Hirjee, and Avnish Mehra. What would life be like without the concept of money?. The very rich and very busy Mehta family of Mumbai, gets into exactly this situation. When Mr. Uttam Mehta is almost shot at gunpoint, they all fear their lives are in danger and are advised to go hide off in a far away location - called Antillapur. There seems to be something very strange about this village and the Mehtas are in for a big surprise when they find out - it functions off a BARTER SYSTEM.

title: Mom Tane Nai Samjay
cast: Amar Upadhyay|Rashami Desai|Namit Shah|Virti Janak Vaghani
overview: Devoted mother Aashka sacrifices her career to raise Meera and Kabir while husband Kunal gets consumed by work. Feeling neglected, she leaves but mentors students needing maternal care. Her absence makes the family realize her worth.

title: Jesal Toral
cast: Anupama|Upendra Trivedi|Arvind Trivedi|Ramesh Mehta|Jayant Bhatt
overview: Jesal, a hardcore bandit, gets reformed by Toral who is a virtuous, god-fearing Kathi girl. Later, they both get married to each other and lead a pious life.

title: Moti Na Chawk Re Sapnaman Deetha
cast: Hiten Kumar|Roma Manek|Aarti Patel|Jaimini Trivedi|Archan Trivedi
overview: Life is tough for Leena as she is the only earning member of a middle-class household wherein the mother is a housewife, father is handicapped and her sister, Surekha, suffers from Schizophrenia. All her dreams get crushed as she loses herself in the daily grind to make ends meet. She loves dancing and that's where she meets and falls in love with Anupam. But like all others, this dream of hers also gets crushed as she finds out that Anupam is in love with Surekha. What follows is an epic tale of unconditional love and sacrifice between two sisters.

title: Bhadar Tara Vehata Paani
cast: Snehlata|Upendra Trivedi|Ramesh Mehta|Shrikant Soni|Arvind Rathod
overview: Ratan's father promises her hand in marriage to another man. However, she is affectionate towards Ram and thinks of him as her husband.

title: Maru Mann Taru Thayu
cast: Heena Varde|Bharat Chawda|Mukesh Rao|Rahul Raval|Mitresh Verma
overview: Upcoming Gujarati movie

title: Kadu Makrani
cast: Upendra Trivedi|Arvind Pandya|Shalini|Champshibhai Nagada|Jayesh Desai
overview: Kadu Makrani is a 1960 Gujarati historical fantasy film directed by Manhar Raskapur from India. The film tells the story of the historical figure Kadu Makrani, a bandit, fighting the British. The lead role was played by Arvind Pandya. The music was composed by Avinash Vyas. It was a commercial success.

title: Aapne to chhie bindaas
cast: Vikee Shah
overview: The film is about the lifestyle of 3 close college friends who live their life on their own terms. But accidentally they insulted one child who was regularly met them for the donation. This 3 Bindaas boys insulted him very roughly and after that they came to know that the boy was from NGO. This 3 Bindaas boys emotianally attached with NGO and try to help Harikaka. Now What ?

title: 47 Dhansukh Bhawan
cast: Jay Bhatt|Shyam Nair|Gaurav Paswala|Hemang Vyas|Rishi Vyas
overview: Dhaval, a young man along with his elder brother Rishi and Rishi's friend Shyam comes to visit his old house over a weekend. The motto is to sell out old goods along with the house itself as soon as possible. They have figured out that they do not have electricity in the house. Shyam goes back to the main city and brings some rechargeable batteries so that they can spend the night and next day wrap up the things. Meanwhile back in the house, Dhaval finds the strange sound in the house and asks Rishi to go and check, Rishi goes to the upper floor of the house and disappears. What follows are the series of mishaps throughout the night. Dhaval is not able to figure out whether there is a ghost or a Robber in the house who is doing everything or maybe there is a whole new perspective of the whole story only.

title: Veer Mangdavalo
cast: Snehlata|Upendra Trivedi|Arvind Trivedi|P Kharsani
overview: In a land of promises and spirits, Mangdavalo's vow binds him as a ghost, while Padmavati's world crumbles with arranged marriage. Their love defies even death, weaving a tale of magic and sacrifice in a heartwarming journey

title: Paaghadi
cast: Revanta Sarabhai|Tilana Desai|Pralay Rawal|Bharat Thakkar|Alpana Joshi
overview: After his return from the USA, Aaditya decides to fulfill the last wish of his grandfather, i.e, to study about meteor showers that happen in Gujarat. While on his quest to explore meteor showers, Aaditya finds a companion in Chanda. Together, Aaditya and Chanda travel the picturesque landscape of Gujarat.

title: Fuleku
cast: Anang Desai
overview: The biggest toy trader in Gujarat, suddenly finds himself in huge debt during the pandemic. Their house gets raided by the income tax. What they find turns the lives of the family in a new way.

title: Bushirt T-shirt
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Kamlesh Oza|Vandana Pathak|Bhakti Kubavat|Muni Jha
overview: In the world of the Pandyas, chaos is the norm and laughter is the solution to every problem. Just as the name suggests, 'Bushirt T-shirt' highlights two diverse ideologies between parents and their children along with the drama and emotions that follow. In an unexpected series of events, the Pandya's navigate their way through comic twists and entertaining turns in their quest to overcome their differences.

title: Insurance Jimmy
cast: Parth Shukla|Chetan Daiya|Brinda Trivedi|Ragi Jani
overview: Seemingly ordinary insurance agent Jimmy's life takes a dramatic turn overnight.

title: Gj to Nj (Gujarat Thi New Jersey)
cast: Jitesh Keshwala|Pankti Patel|Nisarg Trivedi|Dhruv Joshi|Kinnal Nayak
overview: Niyati is a middle-class girl, whose father is frustrated with unethical practices and is desperate to get Niyati married to an NRI guy. But Niyati is in love with their neighbour. How far will they go for the consent of their parents?

title: Medal
cast: MD. Shinha Sarder|Alamgir Hossain Raj|MD. Meyaraz Hossen Rahad
overview: A young English teacher declines a dream job at private school to teach at a government school. He fights social stigmas, cultivates young minds and trains them to win a medal at Khel Kala Mahakumbh, will they win?

title: Hello Zindagi
overview: A young social media addict influencer goes on an extraordinary journey that changes her life. Disha is a Social Media Addict who consider everything else to be worthless. Her day eclipses by social media platform, as she heads to be an influencer.

title: Hey Kem Chho London
cast: Leena Jumani|Deep Vaidya|Manas Shah|Alpana Buch|Anang Desai
overview: The plot is all about 2 childhood friends, with connected family bonding through their ancestors and how different the life of the 2 boys were. Enter the girl. A common name "Krishna" leads to a lot of confusion, misunderstanding and lots of banter. Enter the same girl again. You know where it's heading! Oh yes, some more confusion, misunderstanding and lots of banter.

title: Pahelo Divas
cast: Dilip Prakash|Ashika Ranganath

title: Narasinh Mehta
cast: Mohanlala|Maruti Rao|Master Manhar|Master Bachhu|Umakant Desai
overview: The first Gujarati feature film is a saint film about the life of Narasinh Mehta (1408-75), played by Master Manhar. Mehta is known for his evocative Prabhatiyan (morning hymns) and especially for his composition Vaishnava jana to ('The Vaishnav is he who knows the pain of others') made popular by Gandhi, who also adapted the poet's term Harijan (children of god) for the nation's Untouchables. The film adheres to the Gandhian interpretation of Narasinh Mehta's work, avoiding e.g. miracle scenes.

title: Jai Mata ji Let's Rock
cast: Malhar Thakar|Vyoma Nandi|Tiku Talsania|Vandana Pathak|Shekhar Shukla
overview: An 80-year-old woman faces four wild options after a government program disrupts her life: revenge on family, rekindling romance, living luxuriously, or choosing it all in this comedy about family surprises

title: Bluffmaster Gujjubhai
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Tejas Vyas|Nilesh Joshi|Jyuthika Shah|Jitendra Sumar
overview: The craziest Gujjubhai adventure where chaos happens as a mysterious girl proposes Gujjubhai in front of his wife, and his mother-in-law is supposed to arrive with ₹10 crore as per his father-in-law’s wish. Can Gujjubhai tackle all this through his bluff and insane hilarity?

title: Yuva Sarkar
cast: Kachhi Anish|Mehul Buch|Dhebar Harshit|Harshal Mankad Heyan|Sujal Hulchulboy
overview: YUVA Sarkar is a story of young honest school teacher who accidentally became a part of active politics. His desire is to change the system and for that he has to face many problems. Generes synopsis-drama, political thriller. Content - young honest teacher who wanted to change the system one day became part of the active politics and faced many realities.

title: Sampoorna Mahabharat
cast: Danny Denzongpa|Jayshree Gadkar|Snehlata
overview: Mahabharata

title: Chirayu Mistry: Mistry Solved
cast: Chirayu Mistry
overview: "Mistry Solved" is a solo show by stand-up comedian Chirayu Mistry. In the show, he talks about his strange job offers, the relationship between parents and children, a mob experience, and many other unpredictable topics. It has been performed over 100 times in 8 countries, with more than 20,000 tickets sold. If you have read this far, Chirayu believes you should press the PLAY button if you haven't already.

title: Dhaman
cast: Anang Desai|Jayesh More|Aarjav Trivedi
overview: Dhaman is a Gujarati movie released on 2 Dec, 2022. The movie is directed by Rajan R Verma and featured Aarjav Trivedi, Jayesh More, Anang Desai and Bhavini Jani as lead characters. Other popular actor who was roped in for Dhaman is Katha Patel.

title: Passport
cast: Malhar Thakar|Anna Ador|Ujjval Dave
overview: Anna, an American student comes to Ahmedabad to explore Amdavadi Culture. While her journey in the city, she loses her purse carrying all essentials including her passport. Kabir, her college friend helps her in getting it back! Will they get the passport back? Or Anna will have to leave India immediately? It becomes the flight full of entertainment when a maverick don and a mysterious thief join the band; everyone faces the music of love, thrill, betrayal and humour. Get ready to experience chase, fun, drama, happiness and comedy!

title: Meru Malan
cast: Naresh Kanodia|Snehlata|Firoz Irani|Narayan Rajgor|Ramesh Mehta
overview: A princess and a servant boy form an unlikely bond, but their love faces opposition from the king's concerns about social status. Through trials and perseverance, they strive to overcome obstacles and find a way to be together against all odds.

title: Tu Rajee Re
cast: Divyang Thakkar|Janki Bodiwala|Anang Desai
overview: Parth is a talented mimicry artist who falls in love with the girl in his neighbourhood, Disha. However, their life takes an unfortunate turn when Parth is diagnosed with cancer. Will Parth be able to survive the disease?

title: Navri Bazar
cast: Disha Patel|Hemin Trivedi|Chetan Daiya|Sunil Vaghela|Dipa Trivedi

title: Meghdhanusya - The Colour of Life
cast: Bhim Vakani|Anand Devmani|Asha Panchal|Jakee Patel
overview: Tanmay is a gay man who during childhood adopts feminine behaviors, concerning his parents. They consult a doctor and apply parental and social pressure to modify their son. During his youth, he is pressured to marry, and derided by his fellow college students as "special". Eventually, he is forced to leave his home. Later in life, Tanmay and Aniket adopt a child together, naming him "Shlok". The boy grows to become a successful businessman, but his gay parents keep their distance from him to avoid burdening him with social stigma. Shlok meets a woman, Disha, whom he wishes to marry, but his parents' homosexuality becomes an impediment.

title: I v/s Me
cast: Prit Goswami|Mausami Shailesh|Nimesh Patel|Jyoti Chudasma|Milan Trivedi

title: Night Out - A tale of Friendship and Love
cast: Meet Sudani|Aamir Jasdanwala|Siddhi Jain|Hardik Gohil
overview: The film depicts the life of two strangers who meet coincidentally at a tea stall. This is the first zero-budget Gujarati language film which was made only with a DSLR camera.

title: I.M.A Gujju
cast: Rohit Roy|Manoj Joshi|Sunny Pancholi
overview: A wealthy Gujarati businessman's only son wants to join the Indian Army, but his father wants him to join the family business.

title: Veer Hamirji – Somanath Ni Sakhate
cast: Shivalika Katari|Maulik Pathak|Pramatesh Mehta|Sonya Shah|Manish Rohit
overview: With only a handful of his friends, Veer Hamir sets to defend the Temple of Somnath in Veraval, Gujarat against the powerful army of Sultan Mohamad Begado. An unlikely endeavor. This historical film, based on the doctoral thesis of Dipak Vyas, beautifully captures 15th century Gujarat, India: their people, religious beliefs, and politics.

title: Dear Love
cast: Hetansh Shah|Vidhi Shah|Krishna Chauhan|Avirajsinh Mangrola
overview: A crestfallen Varun, who is dejected in love, meets and falls in love with Preeti but fate has something else written in it.

title: Chel Chabilo Gujarati
overview: Asrani, Priya Tendulkar and Indra Kumar star in this crime drama that pits three brothers against a shady industrialist. Ajit assigns his brother Ajay to investigate the case of millionaire Shakti Singh, who happens to be Ajit's friend. Ajay quickly uncovers evidence of criminal activity, but is killed before he reveals the truth. Bent on finding the killers, Ajit retrieves Ajay's twin from a mental institution, but his dangerous plan goes awry.

title: Love Story Ma Locho Padyo
cast: Hemant  Jha|Megha Joshi|Grishma Mehta
overview: Love Story Ma Locho Padyo is a Gujarati movie released on 10 March, 2017. The movie is directed by Manoj Nathvani and featured Hemant Jha, Dhavan Mevada and Grishma Joshi as lead characters. Other popular actors who were roped in for Love Story Ma Locho Padyo are Megha Joshi.

title: Band Baaja Babuchak
overview: Revolves around four guys- Bako, Pako, Chako, and Bahilu. They are dreamers and believe in making easy and quick money. One day, they come across an advertisement about an NRI girl, Simran, whose multi-millionaire father is looking for a groom for his only daughter. All the four guys try all their tricks to impress the girl; and after a few twists & turns Simran starts liking not only one but all of them.

title: Hu Tu Tu Tu : Aavi Ramat Ni Rutu
cast: Bansri Bhuptani|Abhay Chandarana|Mehool Desai|Raunaq Kamdar
overview: Hu Tu Tu Tu is based on youth, relationships, ambitions, and the twists of destiny. A tale - never told before.

title: Jiti Le Zindagi
cast: Kalpesh Patel|Jaimini Trivedi|Ragi Jani|Kartik Rashtrapal|Hirav Trivedi
overview: A saga of an extraordinary conflict of a rich family, which takes you on a roller-coaster ride of unusual yet hilarious situations arising through greed, conspiracy and sacrifice of the family members.

title: Tulsi
cast: Satvik kapadia
overview: A film about what's Meaningless to one and what's meaningful to another. On Aesthetics and on it's "meaningless explanations"

title: Manan Desai: Jati Rehje
cast: Manan Desai|Kaushika Desai
overview: Unstoppable.. unique.. Comedy star Manan Desai's stand-up special

title: Commitment
cast: Manas Shah|Maulika Patel|Vivek Shah|Kartik Rashtrapal|Vishal Vaishya
overview: This film exposes the scams prevailing in pharmaceutical world; how people pursuing medical profession make money at the cost of poor patients. Though this movie brings up an important issue of corruption in country, it's element of romance and comedy makes it perfect entertainer.

title: Ghaat
cast: Buddhdev Yash|Pramath Pandit|Anant Velani|Vaibhav Biniwale|Mehul Vyas
overview: Shashwat commanded the most opportune place in the center of the Ghaat, making him the unofficial leader of the entire Ghaat, and now, that place has become vacant.

title: Mara Pappa Superhero
cast: Abhinay Banker|Shraddha Dangar|Bhavya Sirohi|Revanta Sarabhai|Priyanka Raja
overview: Mara Pappa Superhero is about a 9 year old girl's struggle to establish that her father is a superhero. She takes it as a challenge to convince everybody that her father is a superhero.

title: O Taareee
cast: Revanta Sarabhai|Janki Bodiwala|Riddhi Jain|Pratik Rathod|Jayesh More
overview: Group of friends, who, for love, friendship and wooing the most beautiful girl in the college, tumble into a politically driven plot where a sudden murder brings them face to face with each other and a reality that shakes them to their core.

title: Shunya
cast: Jia Sheth|Lily Patel|Mehul Buch|Raju Barot|Mayur Ninama
overview: Anu, an innocent eleven year old girl who can not spend a day without her grandmother, and is told that she has gone to "God's House" upon her demise. Now she sets on a journey with a traveling folk group (Bhavai) to find God's house and get her grandmother back. It is a journey of understanding the illusion of life and the reality of death.

title: Nakkama
cast: Prapti Ajwalia|Swati Dave|Akhil Kotak|Tushar Dave|Rohan Sinha

title: Chhutti Jashe Chhakka
cast: Janki Bodiwala|Saurabh Rajyaguru|Bharat Chawda|Arvind Vegda|Hemang Dave
overview: Sachin Thakkar, a cricket-crazy get influenced by his childhood friend, Raj Nag to enter the world of cricket betting which takes them on a roller coaster ride into a world they had never imagined.

title: એકવાર પીયુને મળવા આવજે
overview: Indian film with music from Appu, Vikram Thakur and more!

title: Testimony of Ana
cast: Anaben Pawar
overview: Anaben Pawar is an elderly tribal woman accused of witchcraft in rural India. Through Ana's story, we delve into a deep-rooted culture of patriarchy and examine one of the most monstrous attacks on women's bodies in modern India: the witch-hunt.

title: Nasoor
cast: Hitu Kanodia|Nilam Panchal|Denisha Ghumra|Heena Varde
overview: Harshvardhan, at the peak of his achievements, fails to find a purpose to live. Desperation drives him to find a reason but he fails to notice the things he is leaving behind.

title: Armaan: Story of a Storyteller
cast: Poojan Trivedi|Alisha Prajapati|Netri Trivedi|Prashant Barot|Twishaa Bhatt
overview: The movie narrates a simple but the most indispensable message of life --- KARMA --- One should always only focus on his work/karma that he is destined to do - Hard work and perseverance are the keys to Success whereas people often go off track by focusing on taking revenge.

title: Gandhi & Co.
overview: Mintoo & Mitra (Both 11 Year Old) are know for two things, firstly their collective potential towards mischief and secondly for their legendary friendship with Bharat Bhai. The boys are clever but scrupulous and our old man is an embodiment of all the teachings of Gandhi. An unexpected happening corners Mintoo ( a Superhero Jango fan) into proclaiming Mahatma Gandhi as his role model. Mintoo soon starts mimicking Gandhi’s behavior but he is nowhere close to imbibing Gandhi’s values.

title: Umbro
overview: Umbro, the threshold of a home, is the liminal space that speaks to the lives of women, including the filmmaker's mother and her friends who live in the small town of Dhrangadhra in Gujarat, India. The film explores joyful friendships among women, often dismissed and unsung - carrying in them moments of shared stories, solidarities, conflicts and, most of all, routine acts of resistance.

title: Family Circus
cast: Raunaq Kamdar|Mitra Gadhvi|Monal Gajjar|Smit Pandya|Bharat Chawda
overview: This is a story of Best two friends named Ronak and JJ; Story runs ahead; with a very middle class atmosphere and lifestyle; with comparison of Cherishing and rich lifestyle. They both compare in dreams, discussion. Gradually JJ found an idea to become a rich, and story changed and rename with the circus. They took financial help from DON ALTAF ANNA, The gang of ANNA rooming after our heroes, and they took more help from ANNA to impress a girl name RIYA.

title: Victor 303
overview: Following a bitter heartbreak, orphaned Victor crashes his lover's wedding, unknowingly sparking a violent feud with the salt mafia that rules the infamous land of Maliya Miyana. What begins as a quest for revenge quickly spirals into a deadly game of betrayal and bloodshed. As the conflict unfolds, Victor learns his true identity, and the legacy he never knew he had, forcing him to confront his past and claim the future he was always meant to inherit.

title: Dhummas
cast: Sonali Bharadwaj|Pramodini Nanavati|Sunita Shirsolkar
overview: A day long encounter between an old almost bedridden grandmother who has supposedly lost her memory and a young girl Mrinalini, sparks an interesting yet intriguing conversation, and in these conversations Mrinalini draws an unlikely parallel between her present and her grandmother-in-law’s past. The conversations also bring to light that the grandmother is very much in possession of her memories as she emerges as a representative of the suppressed woman. A number of things are left unsaid and the unsaid make up the essence of the story.

title: Zokuri. Kaidan Yowa ~ Hontō ni Atta Noroi no Emono-gatari 10-wa ~
overview: 10st installment in "Zokuri. Kaidan Yowa" film series.

title: Mad for Each Other
cast: Sanjay Bhatia|Ashish Bhatt|Neelam Gandhi|Titiksha Pandya|Abhijeet Somiytra
overview: Mad For Each Other is a comic love story between two teenagers with totally different personalities, educational qualifications and lifestyles.

title: Bas Ek Chance
cast: Aditya Kapadia|Bhakti Kubavat|Falguni Dave|Rajeev Mehta
overview: A passionate film-maker's journey and struggle against the stereotype of the society.

title: Khedut Ek Rakshak
overview: Son of an hard working farmer, Vikram is a topper in studies. He quits education as his father cannot afford money for fees. Now, he fully focuses time in farming. One fine day, when he goes to village sarpanch's house, he realises their corrupt attitude and fights for justice of the farmers.

title: Raja Gopichand
cast: Upendra Trivedi|Arvind Rathod|Ghanshayam Naik|Jayaben Bhatt
overview: A Gujarati film.

title: Gujjubhai E Gaam Gajavyu
cast: Siddharth Randeria|Ashish Bhatt
overview: The story revolves around three characters Hasubhai (Siddharath Randeria), his daughter Kajal (Leena Shah) and his Manager Rasik (Ashish Bhatt). Having a typical Baniya mentality, Hasubhai wanted his daughter Kajal to marry his employee Rasik. However, Kajal is in love with an Ad film Maker. The laughter ride begins when Hasubhai and Rasik take the challenge to induce Kajal for marriage. Will Hasubhai and Rasik win the battle? To find out, watch this breathtaking humorous play.  Starring: Siddharth Randeria, Ashish Bhatt, Sachi Joshi, Leena Shah, Rahul Patel, Suraj Vyas,Tanvi Abbas, Himanshu Upadhyay, Mulik Pathak, Krupa Chandera, Yatin Parmar  Directed By Siddharth Randeria

title: Shu Tame Kunwara Chho?
cast: Amit Bhanushali|Haresh Dagiya|Chetan Daiya|Kurush Deboo|Hemangini Devi

title: Famous in Ahmedabad
overview: Set during the kaleidoscopic backdrop of the kite-flying festival in India, 'Amdavad Ma Famous', witnesses the transformation of an 11-year-old Zaid from a boy next door to an aggressive and a passionate kite-runner until he comes across a hindrance that prevents him from flying kites on the terrace. And thus begins the fight for the terrace on the day of the biggest kite flying festival in India.

title: Chaal Reverse Ma Jaiye
cast: Muni Jha
overview: While celebrating his 60th wedding anniversary with his wife, Manilal can't help but notice that neither one of them is happy. He yearns for the opportunity to go back and do things differently. But he couldn't really do that -- or could he? With divine intervention, anything's possible! Rajesh Joshi directs this Gujarati-language play about living life, cherishing love and taking advantage of second chances.

title: Surprise
overview: Two stylish thieves head to Goa with stolen riches. Picking up a stranger who recognizes one of them turns their escape into a dangerous web of lies - revealing dark secrets beyond their heist.

title: Sati Savitri
cast: M. Bhagwandas|Ghori|Keki Adajania|Gohar Jan
overview: This mythological film is based on the Mahabharata. It depicts the tale of how Savitri (Gohar) saves her husband Satyavan (Bhagwandas) from the clutches of Yama, the god of death.

title: Welcome Purnima
cast: Hiten Kumar|Hem Sevak|Manasi Rachh
overview: Himmatlal Andhariya has a flourishing marriage bureau that has helped over a thousand couples tie the knot, but he has been unsuccessful in finding a suitable match for his son, Yug.

title: Kale Lagan Chhe!?!
cast: Parikshit Tamaliya|Puja Joshi|Anurag Prapanna|Dipika Rawal|Pooja Mistry
overview: The journey of an 'Annoyed Ayush' makes him meet a Gunned Girl, Ishika' on his way to Diu, where mysterious revelations oblige him to change his original plan and each twist brings hilarious turns.

title: Prem Thai Gayo
overview: A Struggling artist got married to a rich girl by escaping. Within six months, they apply for a mutual divorce.

title: Famine '87
overview: The film examines the impact of sustained scarcity and flawed ideas of modernization on the lives and land of the pastoral Banni community in the desert region of Kutch in Western Gujarat.

title: MBA - Mane Badhu Aavde
cast: Sejal Shah|Amita Rajda|Parth Desai|Jigna Trivedi
overview: Tarla divecha has a problem . After coming to stay at her Son’s Place in Mumbai , a city that is totally depended on Mobiles , Tarla doesn’t know how to use a smart phone . and none of her family members have the time and patience to teach her . so she takes it upon herself to master the thing called smart phone. Does she succeed?

title: Bela: Gujarati Urban Film
cast: Prashant Barot|Chetan Daiya|Hitendra Gajjar
overview: The film is female oriented. Anshu is the hero of the film and a small screen star while Anshu is a big businessman. Belle wants to make her own biopic but does not have finance, while Anshu transfers 10 Crores to her account.

title: The Catch
overview: A struggling fisherman, yearning for a better life, sees a glimmer of hope in a rare, valuable catch. But life, with its usual sense of irony, has other plans.

title: The Illustrated Woman
overview: In Ahmedabad, Isabel gives an animation workshop on Mehndi design to a group of temporary tattoo artists. She asks them about their dreams: Ramia would love to fly, Saadiya dreams of an all-woman parliament, Shubhashree longs to travel to Switzerland, and Samira voices her independence through rap.

title: Vat Vachan Ne Veer
cast: Nalin Dave|Naresh Kanodia|Sushma Verma|Arvind Rathod
overview: A Gujarati Feature Film.

title: Raghu CNG
overview: A story is about one psychopath human who is Raghu Himself. Raghu is the single handed character who draw the story.

title: Kanku
cast: Arvind Joshi|Kishore Jariwala|Kishore Bhatt|Pallavi Mehta
overview: Based on a short story by Pannalal Patel, the film depicts the life struggles of a widow named Kanku.

title: Aakhet
overview: Suryakant, an opportunist, plans to satisfy his fantasy with his old crush Lata Suraiya. He has a disgustful plan to provoke Rajesh Suraiya, Lata's husband to commit suicide. But God has his own plan as Rajesh Suraiya's son joins Suryakant's firm and plans to give him a taste of his own medicine.

title: 3 Chakram
overview: An unmarried man and his two married friends go to a scenic place for his bachelor party and indulge in fun with beautiful women leading them into trouble causing hilarity and complications.

title: Tame Aavya Ne Ame Favya
overview: Dhairya Kumar (Mehul Buch) a renowned and successful Gazal singer has a lovely girlfriend Ritu (Manisha Vora), who is a very ambitious girl and is preparing herself for a Miss Beauty Pageant. Sharmila (Rupa Divetiya) the mother of Dhairya Kumar is very keen that her son gets married. Dhairya Kumar tries to convince Ritu but she refuses as the pageant is approaching.  Sharmila is adamant about her son’s marriage and therefore goes on a hunger strike. Helpless Dhairya Kumar agrees to get into a contract marriage with Mausami (Sneha Desai) a close friend of Ritu. But destiny plays its own role and in a few days Sharmila dies. With her death start the twists and turns in the play.

title: Listoo
cast: Nozzer Pardiwala|Shahaan Pardiwala|Shahen Pardiwala|Pratik Suratwala
overview: Mostly when Parsi cuisine is talked about it's the Patra-ni-macchii or the Dhansak. IISTOO remains the lesser known but frequently eaten delicacy. So are our emotions frequently felt but less visited and lesser spoken about.

title: Dard
overview: Akash and Pooja love each other very much. Pooja's father comes to know about the love affair. He Forces Pooja to Taksh by emotional blackmail. Akash goes abroad, after becoming Rich he comes to India to take back his love, but Akash does not get his love, then he gets only "Dard".

title: Reunion: Chalo Pachha Maliye
overview: The movie revolves around the life of some friends, and this is a new age smart Gujarati film which shows what is true friendship even after you get separate from your friends.

title: The Bomb 2024
cast: Parthivsinh Gohil|Ruturajsinh Zala|Virmdevsinh
overview: The Bomb is a story of two Indian detective Who is investigating a Pakistani terrorist who has planted time bombs in the big city of India, and they torturing him to know where does he planted these bombs.

title: Bancho sarayashiki
cast: Matsunosuke Onoe
overview: short film about Banchō Sarayashiki.

title: Hu Raju Ne Rukhsana
overview: Raju Rajgor is a young boy who has moved to Mumbai from Ahmedabad. He still has a lot of Amdavadi traits. Raju has a friend, Kalapi Keriwala, a scriptwriter, director, actor, and producer - in short a jack of all trades but master of none. But Kalapi becomes the quintessential genie for Raju when he falls in love with an actress from Kalapi's tele serial. His joy is short lived when he comes to know that the girl Rukhsana Karim Lala is a muslim. Rukhsana too objects from seeing Raju when she comes to know that he is a hindu. Kalapi then tries to make them understand and not make religion an issue in their love and also helps them get married despite the objection from both the families. Hu Raju Ne Rukhsana is a hilarious musical comedy, reflective of incidents that are part of our lives.

title: Jessu Jordaar
overview: Imagine a girl full on fighting at the airport where the queue is quite a bit. You step in to help her out and somehow get thrown into this roller coaster with her DISCLAIMER -without the safety belt on! Happy go lucky, quirky, a chatter box and completely unfiltered, that's Jessu for you.

title: Zer To Pidhan Jani Jani
overview: I'm not sure yet

title: Welcome Baby
overview: Welcome Baby is an upcoming Gujarati movie. The movie is directed by Ramesh Karolkar and will feature Rachna Nagewadia, Chhaya Shukla and Nimesh Desai as lead characters.

title: Tu Aavish To Kharo Ne
cast: Bhumika Patel|Gopal Raval|Shubhangini Pandey|Alpana Joshi|Mahesh Rabari

title: Devang
cast: Priyankk|Anilta Purswani|Mihit Raval
overview: A first of its kind crime based thriller in Gujarati

title: Nice to Meet You
cast: Rahul Antani
overview: Jaanvi, the daughter of Pratap Raichura, has an unreal experience, when the man she had only in her imagination, comes to reality. What's in store for Jaanvi and family?

title: Kar Lo Duniya Muthi Mein
overview: Kar Lo Duniya Muthi Mein is a gujrati movie

title: Love Karva Ma Lafdu Thayu
overview: Fashion photographer and advertising designer Ram Mehta is a flirt by nature and that's why he is avoiding marriage but his latest girlfriend in a long list of girlfriends, Pari, is adamant to marry him.

title: London Calling
overview: Londin Calling is a Gujrati Movie

title: Angry Family
overview: Love blossoms between a girl and a boy from neighbouring families that are at odds with each other.

title: Gujju Lal Kare Dhamal
overview: Kuber’s daughter Dhangauri marries Naresh who is not financially sound. Kuber gets an attack and when he finally meets the couple, he thinks Naresh’s friend Dilip is the husband. Dhangauri and co play along to avoid any further stress which leads to chaos and confusion but guarantees lots of laughter.

title: Thank You Boss
overview: It's suspense comedy of a working couple, very often asking money from their bosses putting forward one or other guise to exploit emotions of their bosses. Also they have borrowed loans from almost all banks and instalments are not paid.

title: Bou Buttu Bhuta
cast: Babushaan Mohanty|Aparajita Mohanty|Archita Sahu|Bunty R Samal|Choudhury Jayaprakash Das
overview: Buttu and his mother live a modest life in an Odisha village, with Buttu dreaming of leaving for a better life elsewhere. However, a series of unforeseen events disrupt their lives. Will they overcome the challenges and realise their dreams?

title: Nani Ma
cast: Musamoni Panigrahi|Damayanti Beshra|Laxmikanta Tripathy|Panchanan Mohanty
overview: Musamoni Panigrahi (1920s–2017), fondly called “Nani Ma” by her neighbours, appears in the centre of this first film in the Baleswari dialect of India's Odia language. The story revolves around folklore and folk songs narrated by Nani Ma. Born in the 1920s in pre-independent rural India in a coastal village in the Balasore district of Odisha, she never got to go beyond the first few days of school.  The film is an alternate history of a society broken through colonization, Brahminical patriarchy and a post-famine (Orissa famine of 1866, killing nearly 5 million people, one-third of the population), and the dominance of formal writing over spoken tongues. Three academics -- Damayanti Beshra, PhD (recipient of India’s fourth civilian award, “Padma Shri”), Panchanan Mohanty, PhD (noted linguist), and Laxmikanta Tripathy, PhD, DLitt (anthropologist and author) -- also appear in the film to provide contextual commentary on patriarchy, oral history and the sociolinguistic diversity.

title: Ananta
cast: Sabyasachi Mishra|Suryamoyee Mohapatra|Kuna Tripathy
overview: "Randi Pua Ananta" follows the journey of Ananta, a notorious troublemaker who undergoes a remarkable transformation into a selfless hero. When a devastating flood threatens his village, Ananta makes the ultimate sacrifice to save his people, proving that redemption can come in the most unexpected ways.

title: DAMaN
cast: Babushaan Mohanty|Dipanwit Dashmohapatra|Manaswini Takri|Sriharsa Purohit|Ashok Tripathy
overview: The film is set in 2015. Sid, is a young doctor who completed his MBBS has been posted to the cut-off of area of Malkangiri district Odisha having 151 villages & infamous for Naxals dominance & no basic facilities. It's journey of a doctor.

title: Trikanya
cast: Barsha Patnaik|Manoj Mishra|Shraddha Panigrahi|Partha Sarathi Ray|Nishant Majithia
overview: A widowed professor forms an unconventional bond with a robotic doll, while a different woman navigates the complexities of an abusive marriage. Parallely, a relentless quest for motherhood drives another woman to extraordinary lengths.

title: Tora Mora Katti
cast: Siddhanta Mahapatra|Sailendra Samantray|Sheetal Patra|Sanjay Naik (Tutu)|Sudhansu Mohan Sahoo
overview: Tora Mora Katti is a story of two young couple Adi (Sailendra Samantray) and Saachi (Sheetal Patra) who got married accidentally and now facing problem for divorce. Meanwhile adi trying to convince saachi but in a circumstance Gabbar (Siddhant Mohapatra) a baaghi kidnap them and negotiate with government.

title: Kuhudi
cast: Anubhav Mohanty|Dipanwit Dashmohapatra|Supriya Nayak|Prakruti Mishra|Sukumar Tudu
overview: Sagar Mishra is accused of a heinous crime against his daughter. With relentless determination, advocate Anshuman Patnaik wages a solitary battle for justice, sacrificing everything in pursuit of the truth.

title: Delivery Boy
cast: Sailendra Samantray|Priyambada Swain|Suryamoyee Mohapatra|Buddhaditya Mohanty|Pupul Bhuyan
overview: Partha works as a delivery boy for a food delivery company. Partha's friend faces a road accident while rushing to deliver a parcel on time and partha faces some difficulties.

title: Sei Jhiati
cast: Rachana Banerjee|Uttam Mohanty|Debu Bose|Siddhanta Mahapatra
overview: 2002 Oriya film directed by Aluri Chakrapani.

title: Karma
cast: Anubhav Mohanty|Suryamoyee Mohapatra|Divyadisha Mohanty|Sanoj Kumar|Manmay Dey
overview: Stranded in a remote graveyard, special investigation officer Amar Patnaik uncovers chilling secrets, only to realise he's caught in a gripping tale of Karma and Fate

title: Dho Re Babu Dho
cast: Harihara Mohapatra|Divyadisha Mohanty|Satwaki Mishra|Pinky Pradhan|Bobby Mishra
overview: A Tragic Tale of a Loving Mother, a Hopeless Father & A Desperate Couple, and how their fates are entwined.

title: Dasama
cast: Sailendra Samantray|Nilakhi Patra|Suman Pattnaik|Akash Hota|Armaan Mohanty
overview: Set in a small, close-knit village school, The film seamlessly weaves between the past and captures the innocence, friendship, and youthful exuberance of their school days.

title: Malyagiri: Kahani Aarambha
cast: Babushaan Mohanty|Amlan Das|Sivani Sangita|Suryamoyee Mohapatra|Rabi Narayana Mishra
overview: Parshu is a happy go lucky guy who staying with his family. One day, his father gets ill and a large sum of money is required for his operation. Failing to pay that amount, he decides to climb Malyagiri mountain and collect the vedic leafs.

title: Jai Jagannath
cast: Sritam Das|Pintu Nanda|Jyoti Mishra|Anurag Sharma|Mohini Shilalipi
overview: When Bhagwan Shri Jagannath and his brother, Bhagwan Shri Balabhadra, refuse to partake offerings from a lower-caste woman, Shriya. Devi Maa Lakshmi is offended and puts a curse on both of them. The duo, hungry and homeless, go from village to village, house to house in search of food. What they don't realize is that Devi Maa, in collusion with Vayu Dev, Agni Dev, and Pawan Dev is determined to teach both of them a lesson they will never forget.

title: Adieu Godard
cast: Choudhury Bikash Das|Sudhasri Madhusmita|Dipanwit Dashmohapatra|Abhishek Giri|Choudhury Jayaprakash Das
overview: A small Indian village: an old man is addicted to watching pornography with his friends. One fine day, he accidentally brings home a DVD with a Godard film inside it. Though his friends were disgusted, Ananda gets attracted to Godard’s film and gradually develops an obsession. He initiates the idea of hosting a film festival in their village where Godard’s films will be screened. The festival gets organized after a lot of drama, but what happens next is to be seen.

title: Mind Game
cast: Atul Kulkarni|Manoj Mishra|Tanikella Bharani|Shiju A.R.|Sanju Sivaram
overview: Inspired from a shockingly true incident of Hate and Revenge. The film is an investigative thriller that explores the mind-set of a criminal hiding in plain sight. A newly married couple receives a gift box five days after their wedding, their happiness turns short lived when the gift turns out to be a bomb that kills the husband and his grandmother and seriously injuring the wife. A massive investigation begins to find the killer.

title: Nabakalebara

overview: The daughter of an agricultural family is completely reliant on her father, the family`s lone breadwinner. The father experiences a loss as a result of climate change, leading to a mental breakdown. The daughter, who is pursuing a career in agriculture, protests for farmer`s rights, prompting the Chief Minister to make an audacious offer to act as CM for three days.

title: BOSS
cast: Varsha Priyadarshini|Raj Rajesh|Harihara Mohapatra|Arabinda Sadangi|Bijayinee Mishra

Amidst the turmoil, they fight to bridge divides and foster unity. PARAB is a poignant story of hope, resilience, and humanity, embodying the spirit of Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam.

title: B and S
overview: B and S is the third letter in Lipika Singh Darai’s essay series. During the filmmaker’s imaginary conversations with her late grand aunt, she tells the story of B and S. As she starts, B and S appear, sharing their memories, negotiating the meaning of transness, love, loss, friendship and violence. A teak tree and a little parrot help Darai intertwine these narratives. The result is a personal, warm and heartfelt ode to friendship, and to building a different kind of home.

title: Tulasi Apa
cast: Barsha Patnaik|Lochani Bag|Premanjan Parida|Sujeet Paikaray|Mamata Panda
overview: Born and brought up in a tribal region of Odisha, India, 'Padmashri' 'Tulsi Munda did not allow the poverty, illiteracy and un-development of her locality to dishearten her, discourage her or dampen her spirit. She took a humble step to educate her fellow beings, which grew into a huge movement. Be it urban-rural divide or conflict of mines-owner and workers or exploitation of the have-nots by the haves, Tulsi Munda protested each and every act of injustice and discrimination and turned the tide in favor of her fellow beings. The film will encapsulate the essence of Tulsi Munda's life. It will enumerate her struggle and highlight her achievements.

title: Yogini

The film is a lyrical expression of the story of 28 women, mostly from the marginalised and suppressed sections of the society and their fearless struggle to free themselves from the bondage of tradition to fulfil the desires of their mind and body.

Surya then proposes to Gitanjali, but she refuses in front of Ajay. Believing that Gitanjali doesn't truly love Ajay, Surya continues to pursue her without causing conflict. The film follows Surya's efforts to win Gitanjali's heart with his positive attitude and outlook.

I have given everything for my children. Yet they are not satisfied with me. Thought this life is meaningless. That's why I am here to commit suicide. The first one was focus engrossed in the second one's story and changed his decision and went back. Just then a far goods train whistle was coming nearby.

As his fraudulent actions lead to a heartbreaking breakup and a downward spiral into mental instability, he reaches the brink of despair. However, a disillusioned but principled man, disenchanted by the world of fraud, receives an unforeseen call from the actor-turned-scammer. In a pivotal moment of redemption, he chooses to answer his last call, sparking a profound transformation that could alter both their lives forever.

overview: A few days after the son was posted at the border, news arrived that they had lost him in an operation. But the daughter-in-law refuses to believe it and starts looking for her husband with the blessing of Sai Baba.

title: Khyanikaa: The Lost Idea
cast: Amrita Choudhury|Susant Misra|Swastik Choudhury|Choudhury Bikash Das|Hrushikesh Bhoi
overview: The film is a fantasy driven tale of two men, a poet and a painter, claiming possession over the same Idea, in a rural village portrayed as a wonderland. Idea is personified as a beautiful young lady, free of all bondage. The two men try to justify their claim over their Idea through their forms of art.  Unable to settle the conflict, the two men approach ‘Fate’, personified as a big fat man of authority, to judge their claims. They soon realize that Idea is no one’s possession and it isn’t wise to rely on ‘Fate’ for a judgement. They decide to bury their ‘Fate’, and settle the matter in peace. Idea, portrayed as a free spirit, gets impressed by a kid who resides in an alternate world of fantasy, and decides to venture into the new creative world. The real world, with all its materialistic obsessions, rigid notions and prejudices, loses the Idea forever.

title: Omm: I Am Not God
cast: Saroj Das|Illu Banarjee|Prakruti Misra

title: Sabittri
overview: The story-line revolves around Sabitri, a valiant female freedom fighter, focusing on the struggles of tea laborers during the tumultuous period of 1971. Sabitri's life was marked by uncertainties during the war, and as the newly independent country initiated trials for war criminals, she took on the role of a witness, tirelessly fighting to protect Sabitri and her war-born child Mongol from the clutches of adversity.

title: Lahari
cast: Choudhury Jayaprakash Das|Choudhury Bikash Das|Dipanwit Dashmohapatra|Swastik Choudhury
overview: A slice-of-life film, 'Lahari' meanders through the lives of two friends: boatman Bhuta and fisherman Dinu, and takes us on their journey of trying to establish indigenous methods of livelihood for survival and to elevate their present situation. In the process, the film depicts the invasion of urban capitalism, superficial and auto-centred, personified by tourists, confronted to a certain authenticity and way of life.

title: Bhagia Bharija
cast: Harihara Mohapatra|Debjani Deghuria|Bobby Mishra|Pupindar Singh
overview: A husband's unwavering support for his wife's dreams leads him down a path of difficult choices, testing the boundaries of loyalty and sacrifice. A thought-provoking tale about love's many facets.

title: Bagha Bajari

overview: Story of the film 4 friends remember their childhood teacher and go out to visit him. However, in the course of events, they have been caught in the trap of the flea market game. Wild animals are being killed one after another from the forests of Odisha, tiger skins are being seized at various times. Wildlife trafficking has emerged as a major problem for Odisha. While all these things touch the story of the film, it shows the violent behavior of humans like tigers.

overview: A fictional story that comprises emotional relationships that undergo strain through healthy marriages, friendships and cold blood betrayal.

title: 2014 Fear of the Year
overview: Seven friends set out on a trek but are forced to seek shelter in an abandoned house after their car breaks down. Left alone in the middle of a jungle, they soon encounter strange happenings.

title: Jabardast Premika
cast: Mihir Das|Jhillik Bhatacharjee|Babushaan Mohanty
overview: Chandu, a swindler, falls in love with Shalini and tries to impress her uncle. When he manages to do so, she tells him that in order to win her over, he must mend his ways.

title: Natraj 009
cast: Umakant Barik|Disco Reddy|Mitu Mithun|Suvendru Nanda|Chhabila Pradha

title: Boura Hatabaksa
cast: Lopamudra Mishra|Subhasri Sabita Palei|Rajesh Panda|Narayan Pati
overview: A mother's unconditional love and care for her son and family is well portrayed in the film in a very sensitive way.

title: Sadhana
cast: Sarat Pujari|Minati Mishra|Ananta Mohapatra|Dhira Biswal|Leela Dulali
overview: Sadhana was based on the novel ‘Chhinapatra’ by Ashapoorna Devi. The film was adjudged as 2nd Best Regional Film (Odia) and received President’s Silver Medal. Actor Sarat Pujari was co-producer of Sadhana. He also written dialogues under the pseudo name Shiladitya, assisted by Minati Mishra.

title: Loafer
cast: Babushaan Mohanty|Archita Sahu|Mihir Das|Buddhaditya Mohanty
overview: Sanju is an orphan who works as a pizza delivery boy to earn his living. However, his life takes a major twist when he falls for the daughter of a politician.

title: Tu Mo Hero
cast: Mihir Das|Jhillik Bhatacharjee
overview: Khushi falls in love with Prem due to his personality. However, her father is against their relationship and tries to do whatever it takes to keep them apart.

title: I Cannot Give You My Forest
overview: ‘I cannot give you my Forest’ is a modern day rendition of the David and Goliath story, played out in an Orwellian setting.  The film is an intimate poetic window into the lives of the Kondh adivasis in Odisha- who eschew the duality of Man and Nature. The Kondh have internalised the Forest – pacing the rhythms of their lives with the cycle of the seasons. The Forest is a metaphor for their identity and their sovereignty. Against the foil of the bloodshed in what the Indian government calls the ‘Red Corridor’, their philosophy gives a counterpoint to the dominant discourse.

title: School Master
cast: Uttam Mohanty|Mihir Das|Baishali Parida|Jayaram Samal|Dukhiram Swain
overview: The film portrays the ambitions and struggles in a relationship among members of a middle-class family.

title: Neela Mastarani
cast: Minaketan Das|Priyanka Mahapatra|Biraj Dash|Santosh Mishra|Sibani Mohapatra
overview: The village as a bastion of traditional values and the power of that tradition has over ordinary individuals caught up in the often unforseeable complexities of daily life.

title: Aasakta
cast: Chandan Kar
overview: Drugs and Substance abuse is a menace thats deepening its roots in our society. AASAKTA  is an initiative through the cinematic medium to spread awareness primarily among the youth against this evil that is destroying not just individuals but families and communities.

title: Tu Sei Nilanayana
cast: Sambit Acharya

title: To Premare Mu Bandha
cast: Mihir Das|Manoj Mishra|Mahashweta Ray|Minaketan Das|Aswin Tripathy
overview: It is an Odia movie starring Mihir Das in a prominent role.

title: Sambalpuri Weavers
overview: A Documentary Film by ULB FILMS Presents, the story is about the plight of Sambalpuri handloom weavers who are struggling for their survival when their hereditary profession sounds death knell. Through this film we have tried to aware everybody and depict the hard work and dedication of the weavers to save the life of a centuries old famous traditional art.

title: Nua Bou
cast: Sarat Pujari|Prashant Nanda|Dhira Biswal|Padma Biswas|Lila Dulari
overview: Sura Babu lives with his wife Parbati, brother Raju & son Debi. Parbati loves Rabi more than his own son. Parbati falls ill and Raju comes to Puri believing that Lord Jaganath's prasad can cure Parbati and brings prasad. The illness continues and native doctor Das is called in. Parbati gradually cured in. Later Parbati's mother and sister Champa come to stay with her. Parbati's mother is not well disposed towards mischievous Raju and tries to influence Parbati against him. Her efforts fail as Champa take side of Raju. Dr Das's assistant Mukund and doctor Rabi, a new comer to the village compete for Champa's hand. Dr Das makes the proposal to Sura Babu on behalf of Mukund for Champa's hand. Sura agrees with a misunderstand that Doctor Das himself wants to marry Champa. In the meantime Mukund decided that he is not suitable for Champa. On the marriage day sura Babu forces Dr. Das to marry Champa. At the last moment Raju is found in bridal attire

title: Mahalakhmi Puja
cast: Bauri bandhu|Jharana Das|Anubha Gupta|Sarat Pujari|Srikant Mitra
overview: Made in the budget of Rs. 85,000, this is the debut film of Sarat Pujari. The tale of Goddess Lakshmi leaving the temple to teach brothers Lord Jagannath and Lord Balabhadra a lesson was presented in the movie. This movie later remade in Hindi as "Jai Jagannath". Prashant Nanda acted as child Shri Krushna. Geeta Dutt was in the Hindi version. Famous singer Hemant Kumar also given voice in this film.

title: Anutap
cast: Samuel Sahu|Suresh Mishra|Shyamalendu Bhattacharjee|Banaja Mohanty|Saudamini Mishra

overview: Deepak is taking two births in the movie. In first birth, he is the son of a Zamindar and fell in love with a potter’s daughter. But they couldn’t get married due to some other’s evil planning and got died. After intermission, he took birth in a aristocrat family. Then what happens is the suspense.

title: To Bina Mo Kahani Adhaa
cast: Anubhav Mohanty|Biju Badajena|Archita Sahu|Ajit Das|Anita Das
overview: After a girl sends Arun to jail, he gets angry and decides to take revenge against her. after he gets out of jail, he woos her in order to get married to her to ruin her life.

title: Tate Sohala Ku Mate Satara
cast: Susanket Mishra|Piyali Dash|Sukant Rath|Choudhury Jayaprakash Das|Jitendra Ojha

title: Abhimanyu
overview: Hari, who is a welder in a small factory, witnesses a murder and inadvertently gets involved in the crime. He is now forced to prove his innocence.

title: Kanyadana
cast: Jasmin Rath|Mahashweta Ray|Bikram

title: Dear Love
cast: Gurudev Maharathi|Tamanna Vyas|Samaresh Routray|Jogesh Jojo

title: Byaase Sunucha
cast: Dipanwit Dashmohapatra
overview: A Carefree Artist confronts The Pioneer of Odia literature Byaasakabi Fakir Mohan, to lament about the current state of the Odia Language and how it has been looked down upon by the elites of the state. Will his voice be heard?

title: Rahichi Rahibi Tori Pain
cast: Bibhhuti Bhusan Behera|Siddhanta Mahapatra|Namita Das|Sritam Das|Pradyumna Lenka

overview: Lalu, a simple boy who belongs to a barber's family in Bargarh, falls in love with Priti, a girl from the neighbourhood, who is studying to be a doctor.

overview: While the four main characters of the story are going through life, time has taken and left them in such a situation that they’ve become guilty in the eyrs of the society Loving is not a sin. Then why are two people constantly trying so hard to name their feelings relationship if they love it? Society does not accept their efforts.

title: Jor Jar Mulak Tar

overview: 1986 Oriya film directed by Raju Misra.

title: Diary 1984
cast: Satya Prakash|Amiya Bubu
overview: Inspired from a real life the short film showcases the story of a poor boy, the struggle in his life & how he fights with his destiny to become successful.

title: Katha Deithili Maa Ku
cast: Siddhanta Mahapatra|Rituparna Sengupta|Bijay Mohanty|Laboni Sarkar|Harihara Mahapatra
overview: Abinash Patnaik is a state level boxer. To participate in the state championship, he leaves his wife Sumita and son Ajay, because one condition of the contest is participants should be unmarried. He pretends to be a bachelor, and in an unavoidable circumstance, he marries another woman, Rama. Ajay, who is also a boxer, tries to unite with his stepmother and father as he had promised to his mother as she died.

title: ACP Sagarika
overview: The movie revolves around ACP Sagarika, who only cares for justice and tries to solve the mysterious serial killings happening in the city.

title: Champion
cast: Archita Sahu|Manoj Mishra|Sanu

title: Aadim Vichar
cast: Lochani Bag|Shankar Behera|Tapaswini Guru|Purushottam Mishra|Atal Bihari Panda
overview: Sukru Majhi, a 84 years old Kondh tribal and always a righteous, humanist and loving person. He has three sons lives with their wives and two grand children in a village.Majhi lives a very happy life until an Ayurvedic Practitioner (Vaidya) comes to the village.The Vaidya is a tout, keeps an greedy eye on the lands of the locals.

title: Paradeshi Chadhei
overview: Biswaranjan Choudhury has three grandson. The dilemma arises when one of the grandson marries a foreigner.

title: Ice-Cream
cast: Deep Sarkar|Pankaj Mallick|Rakhee Bose|Amit Saha
overview: A boy's desire to have an ice-cream, and the journey taken to fulfill that.

title: Vote
cast: Shreya Mohanty|Usasi Misra|Hara Rath|Chakradhar Jena|Ranu Padhi
overview: The film revolves around a respected educator, Hari Master and his two sons Biplab and Sangram. Following his retirement, Hari Master`s health deteriorates and he becomes physically incapacitated. The two brothers eventually go on to marry their respective wives who happen to belong to opposing political parties. A battle ensues between the two brothers during election time as to which party gets to secure the old man`s vote, only to end in a tragic twist resulting in Hari Master`s sudden death. The brothers make amends with each other after this but not before learning a bitter tasting lesson.

title: Priye Tu Mo Sie
cast: Amlan Das|Elina Samantaray|Bobby Mishra|Abhishek Giri|Bhupati Tripathy
overview: Love doesn't look at caste or religion. Neither rich nor poor. He doesn't see who is the son of a poor labourer who is the daughter of a rich landlord. But if all love stories succeed, here will the answer.. 'Priye Tu Mo Siye'.

title: The Healing Touch
cast: Gargi Mohanty|Gajendra Padhi
overview: A husband is getting treated in hospital because of Covid-19. After trying his best the doctor leaves everything on the hands of God. The husband then talks to his wife for the last time.

title: Sindur Niye Khela
cast: Siddhanta Mahapatra|Rachana Banerjee|Debu Bose
overview: Sindur Niye Khela is a 2001 Bengali action drama film starring Siddhanta Mahapatra, Rachana Banerjee, Jyoti Mishra, and Bijoy Mohanty. Varsha, an astute and powerful businesswoman, is opposed by her factory workers. Frustrated by their opposition, she marries Raj, the union leader, by manipulating his mother to fulfil her selfish ambition.

title: Ghara Sansara
cast: Sujata Anand|Prashant Nanda|Sarat Pujari|Niranjan Satapathy|Netrananda Mishra

overview: In order to satisfy his ego, Birendra, a heartless landlord, kills his own sister and her husband when they get married against his wishes.

title: Torch
cast: Soumya Ranjan Rpout
overview: The documentary film is set in a remote village near the famous Konark temple in India, on the life of a poor farmer's son who is amazed by the advent of technology in their lives after the arrival of a steel torch to their home.

cast: Subhasis Sharma|Suryamoyee Mohapatra|Ankit Kumar|Premanjan Parida|Kalia Sandha

title: Most Wanted Mafia
cast: Divyadisha Mohanty

cast: Kusmita Samal|Biswajeet Swain

title: Manika Jodi
cast: Urabashi Joshi|Akshaya Mohanty Kashyap|Sukhalata Mohanty|Mayadhar Rout|Samuel Sahu
overview: Sarojini and Nilambar Roy were in love. But eventually Nilambar refused to marry Sarojini and radiated malicious rumours in her name. Sarojini commit suicide. Sarojini's elder brother Barada Pattanaik could not take his sister's tragic death easily.  Decades later, in order to restore peace between the family, Siddharth Ray, the elder son of Nilambar Ray asks for Barada Pattanaik's niece Shaila's hand for his younger brother Partha. Shaila becomes Ray family's daughter in law at the age of twelve.  Barada Pattanaik still seeks revenge and hence concocts plans to destroy the Ray Family.

title: Arundhati
cast: Braja Giri|Minati Mishra|Sarat Pujari|Dhira Biswal|Sujata Anand
overview: Arundhati wants to marry Manoj but Biswajit claims Arundhati is his wife Madhu who supposedly died in a train accident. Eventually the confusion is resolved.

title: Dhare Alua
cast: Prithviraj Mishra|Mala Matthews|Shibani Mahapatra|Dolagobinda Jena|Soumendra Tripathy
overview: Hemant, a scribe who is wrongfully sentenced to jail. He sends his children, Bulu and Runu, to stay with a family acquaintance for their safety. However, the children flee and take shelter at a stranger doctor's place. The doctor's son, Lalit, is a rebel who wants to remove injustice by force. Lalit and his wife, Sumitra, take care of the children, and when Hemant is released from jail, he recognizes Lalit's revolutionary spirit. The circumstances turn ripe for revolutionary changes, but societal apathy and passiveness thwart any such possibilities. The movie ends with a ray of hope provided by the children.

title: Bandini
cast: Subhasis Sharma|Riya Dey|Bobby Mishra|Saroj Dash|Shubhranshu Nayak

title: Raavan
cast: Anubhav Mohanty
overview: Upcoming movie of anubhav mohanty

title: Sala Budha
cast: Atal Bihari Panda|Lochani Bag
overview: The story of 'Sala Budha' or 'The stupid Old man' revolves around an old village head, the Sarpanch of a village, who tries his best to take care of the subjects at any cost. The film has successfully depicted the strong relationship of the earlier days in the villages of western Odisha and the innocence, simplicity and righteousness of the Old man, who finally gets his reward from the King. This is nice motivational and inspirational movie which says with positive thinking and wit all obstacles can be cleared.

title: Bye Bye Dubai
cast: Sabyasachi Mishra|Archita Sahu|Buddhaditya Mohanty|Papu Pom Pom
overview: Nisha lives in Odisha and is in love with Prem who is obsessed about going to Dubai where her twin sister lives. But Prem's father creates problems for them with his rigid views and principles.

title: Nari Nuhen Tu Narayani
cast: Siddhanta Mahapatra|Rachana Banerjee|Mihir Das|Bijay Mohanty|Debu Bose
overview: The film revolves around the life of a young woman named Narayani, who is portrayed as a strong, independent, and self-respecting individual. The story is set in a rural backdrop and explores themes of women's empowerment, social justice, and the struggle against societal norms and injustices. Narayani's character is depicted as a symbol of resilience and courage, as she fights against the oppressive forces in her life, including patriarchal dominance and social evils.

cast: Sujata Anand|Harish Mahapatra|Shantilata Bal|Sarat Mohanty|Biren Routray

overview: The story of Sahari Bhaga is 'The struggle of a boyfriend to help his loved one's aim come true'.

cast: Anubhav Mohanty

cast: Sanghamitra|Bithika|Aparna|Lisa|Leena Mohanty
overview: This is a musical movie. It is based on rasa leela of Prabhu SriKrushna. There were total 81 songs in this film. More than hundred child artist worked in the film.

overview: A young teacher's life takes a turn when a group of villagers convinces him to join politics and become an MLA.

2 Chocolate
overview: Raja falls head over heels for Ahana, but she is not able to reciprocate. Sometimes, two people need to grow apart to realize how much they need to be together.

overview: Indian film with Uttam Mohanty, Aparajita Mohanty and Sarat Pujari

overview: In a world where success and betrayal are always lurking, can love still prevail? ‘Happy Ending’ has the Answer…

cast: Pupindar Singh|Abhisekh Rath|Tanushree Dash|Pradyumna Lenka|Chakradhar Jena

cast: Atal Bihari Panda|Chandana Singh|Lochani Bag
overview: SalaBudha is back again to exact revenge.

title: Dustbin

overview: Sibu, a mysterious sweeper-turned-informant, helps a young girl, uncovering secrets through trash. As their bond deepens, danger looms, forcing him to navigate a complex web.

title: Keun Dunia Ru Asila Bandhu
cast: Sabyasachi Mishra|Archita Sahu|Buddhaditya Mohanty|Mihir Das|Pushpa Panda
overview: An extraterrestrial being invades and lands on the planet Earth and brings change to the lives of all the people around him.

title: Sampark – Michha Mayara Pratishruti
overview: Rishi, the beloved son of a kind mother, bears the burden of being the sole source of happiness for his family as his father is paralyzed from a brain stroke. Tragically, his beloved mother is murdered. What led to her death and who is responsible for this heinous act?

title: Deluxe Mitha
overview: Plot Kept Under Wraps.

overview: Two people are close friends and are inseparable despite the vast difference in their social status and backgrounds.

cast: Rakesh Deo|Piyali Dash|Prithviraj Nayak|Udit Guru

title: To Bina Mun Kichi Chanhe Na
Mane Mane Mana Khojuthila
cast: Priyanka Sahoo

title: 72 Hours - Life or Death
overview: A happy family of husband, wife and a loving daughter are entangled in a dreadful drive. They forced him over time to choose between responsibility and morality. What will he do? The clock is ticking.. Time left- 72Hours.

title: Aamis
cast: Lima Das|Arghadeep Baruah|Neetali Das|Chandan Bhuyan|Momee Borah
overview: A lonely, married woman bonds with a younger man over their shared love of unusual foods. As their excursions become more adventurous, their relationship begins to take a dark turn.

title: Jilmil Jonak
cast: Jatin Bora|Nishita Goswami|Raag Oinitam
overview: A successful businessman who remains away from his family for a long time witnesses a drastic change in his life when suddenly his present gets confronted by his past.

title: Kothanodi: The River of Fables
cast: Seema Biswas|Adil Hussain|Zerifa Wahid|Urmila Mahanta|Kapil Bora
overview: Four folk tales from Assam re-imagined as a narrative about four mothers, each facing demons of her own.

title: Bulbul Can Sing
cast: Arnali Das|Manoranjoan Das|Manabendra Das|Bonita Thakuriya|Pakija Begam
overview: Coming-of-age drama about a young girl living in rural India, fighting her way through love and loss as she figures out who she really is.

title: Village Rockstars
cast: Bhanita Das|Basanti Das|Manabendra Das|Boloram Das|Rinku Das
overview: In a small village in northeast India, 10-year-old Dhunu dreams of having her own rock band. Her vibrant spirit, imagination and self-assurance stand out in a world where girls are expected to be timid and submissive. With her gang of boys and the support of her widowed mother, Dhunu faces the struggles of her daily life and hopes for the day she can finally play on a real guitar.

title: Swargarath
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Bonny Deori|Ronnie Deori|Kamal Lochan Deka|Rimjhim Deka
overview: Swargarath is an Assamese film about the life of a mortuary van driver, three college students and two police persons. Their lives crisscross one day while running after a bag full of money. The film depicts that no matter whatever route one person may take to fulfill his or her desire, at the end they get whatever is written.

title: Rodor Sithi
cast: Adil Hussain|Saurabh Hazarika|Zubeen Garg|Jaya Seal
overview: Rodor Sithi is a Assamese language musical drama film directed by Baharul Islam; based on a play titled Beyond the Obvious written by the director himself. The film is produced by Ikramul Majid under the banner of Alternative Cinematics and stars Zubeen Garg, Angaraag Mahanta, Bhagirathi and Adil Hussain in the lead roles.

title: Bokul
cast: Ankita Borah|Anupam Borah|Nirab Das|Udayan Duarah|Dwijen Mahanta
overview: Three characters: a lonely fisherman, a young rickshaw puller and a single mother, all coincidentally named Bokul find their lives connected when a young stranger comes to town.

title: Rador Pakhi
cast: Sulakshana Baruah|Kamal Lochan Deka|Arun Nath|Bina Patangia
overview: Jyoti, an aspiring writer, from Assam, is destined to be bedridden as she is diagnosed with Spinal Muscular Atrophy at a tender age. A battle she is fated to fight for life. Even though life was hostile to her, Jyoti does not let her sufferings take better of her. Torn between her obligations towards her family and her aspirations, she decides to fight against all odds to lead an independent life in becoming an acclaimed author.

title: Ahetuk
cast: Gunjan Bharadwaj|Amrita Gogoi|Tapan Das|Rajiv Kro|Zubeen Garg
overview: Ahetuk is a Assamese language romantic thriller film directed by Bani Das, veteran Assamese film director and a screenwriter who delivered the Assamese audiences some blockbusters like Maharathi, Mon, Kadambari. His movies are popularly known for an individualistic stamp of visual splendor which is a combine package of romance, action and drama. Ahetuk is another entertainment package, with Gunjan Bhardwaj and Amrita Gogoi in lead role. Actor Tapan Das is also playing an important character in this film. A deep quest for the meaning of those aspects of life which are really meaningless! That’s ‘Ahetuk’ for you—a journey in celluloid that tries to depict how we chase our desires in life and often hit a blank wall of nothingness. Produced by Raj Kumar Jain.

title: Local Utpaat
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Poonam Gurung|Tony Deori Basumatary|Sarmistha Chakravorty|Johnny Deori
overview: Local Utpaat is an Assamese action comedy starring and directed by Kenny Basumatary.

title: Maj Rati Keteki
cast: Adil Hussain|Sulakshana Baruah|Shakil Imtiaz|Mahendra Rabha|Moumita Talukdar
overview: After a long gap of more than ten years, renowned writer Priyendu Hazarika returns to the town where once he was inspired to begin his journey as a writer. A book at times imitates the author's life. Memories stir and he remembers people he loved and lost. He admits to lacking the courage to weave a painful, harsh truth into his stories. At the end of the day however, he decides to face his own truth, alone, away from the appreciative audience.

title: Boomba Ride
cast: Sadagar Daw|Dipali Pegu|Hiranya Pegu|Indrajeet Pegu
overview: The film is about a lower primary school where the main struggle of the teachers is to keep the school alive as it has only one student, named Boomba. A time comes when things did not go as it was expected and while the school was on the verge of its collapse Boomba with his upright wisdom goes on to save his school making all of them realize that what education can do to a society.

title: Bidurbhai
cast: Trailukya Baruah|Bolin Bora|Uddipana Bora|Hirok Jyoti Bordoloi|Sarmistha Das
overview: Four friends from impoverished backgrounds devise a risky scheme to make quick money. Initially, they revel in a newfound lavish lifestyle, but their joy is short-lived as they confront moral dilemmas and face severe repercussions from their actions.

title: Local Kung Fu 3
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Utkal Hazowary|Montu Deori|Bibhash Singha|Bonny Deori
overview: Fresh of earning his yellow belt, a wannabe don Bonzo, is humiliated when two skilled brothers cut his hair during a fight. Seeking revenge, he turns to Dulu and Tansen for help. As tension rises, Dulu and Tansen manage to knock out one of the brothers. The story culminates in a dramatic showdown, where honor, identity, and redemption are fiercely fought over.

title: Chameli Memsaab
cast: Binita Borgohain|George Baker|Hadi Alam Bora|Anil Chatterjee|Abha Dhulia
overview: The film is set in a tea garden in Assam, where a British tea estate owner Berkeley (George Baker), he falls in love with Chameli (Binita Borgohain), is local girl who works in the tea estate. Subsequently, Berkeley marries Chameli, however later finds himself accused of her murder.

title: Gulai Soor
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Tony Deori Basumatary|Himanshu Gogoi|Himanshu Prasad Das|Bolin Borah
overview: In the vibrant backdrop of Majuli, a retired master thief, Diga, takes an unlikely student, Gulapi, under his wing. As Gulapi learns the art of deception, he becomes driven by a personal quest that challenges the norms of his community. This heartwarming drama-comedy, set in the 1940s to 1980s, explores themes of identity, acceptance, and redemption. With stunning cinematography and a rich periodic setting, Gulai Soor promises to be a captivating and emotional ride.

title: God On The Balcony
cast: Pranami Bora|Suneet Bora|Binod Lal Das|Arun Hazarika|Harish Khanna
overview: The film is set in a remote village of Assam,India. It revolves around Khagen, a farmer, whose wife dies is an incident. He struggles to carry the dead body in his bicycle back home from the hospital due to the unavailability of an ambulance. As he walks through the pebbled roads with the body and his young daughter,he comes across two reporters and as a result, their journey turns to a different battle altogether.

title: Kalsandhya: Twilight of Death
cast: Chetana Das|Hemen Barman|Munin Barua|Debashree Roy|Ashish Vidhyarthi
overview: Ranjit is an educated and unemployed young man, desperately looking for a job. He is taught to use a gun by people who promise to show him a new way of life and lead him to a better future.

title: Dr. Bezbaruah 2
cast: Adil Hussain|Zubeen Garg|Nipon Goswami|Kingkini Bhattacharyya
overview: Shantanu finally agrees to return to his birthplace Assam after seven long years to attend his sister's wedding but his fate welcomes him with some odd surprises. Will Shantanu be able to fight the demons of his past or is he just a part of a bigger conspiracy? Sequel to the 1969 Assamese thriller Dr. Bezbarua.

title: Joymoti Never Left
cast: Satyashree Agarwala Das|Radha Das|Tridisha Goswami|Raghu Pratap|Arghadeep Baruah
overview: In 1935, celebrated writer Jyotiprasad Agarwala directed the first Assamese film: Joymoti – a milestone in Indian cinema. Joymoti had a troubled legacy, the film vanished around the time of India's independence, to resurface only partly in the early 70s, with more reels reappearing over time.

title: Mission China
cast: Zubeen Garg|Deeplina Deka|Siddharth Nipon Goswami|Pabitra Rabha|Yankee Parashar
overview: Mission China is all about a journey or a mission of a retired colonel, who is appointed to rescue the daughter of the home minister of the state, who had been kidnapped by Lama, an extremist rebel making its establishment on the borders of China.

title: Sokamoka
cast: Pranami Bora|Rajiv Kalita|Ridip Choudhury
overview: Alaka, a middle-aged woman in rural Assam, is confronted by the return of her queer husband after several years, whether real or a dream in its entirety, forcing her to face the unresolved pain of their fractured relationship while grappling with her own emotional survival.

title: Ajeyo
cast: Rupam Chetia|Prathibha Choudhury|Jupitora Bhuyan|Kapil Bora
overview: Ajeyo is a 2014 Assamese language drama film directed by Jahnu Barua; based on the Sahitya Akademi Award winner 1997 Assamese novel Ashirbador Rong written by Arun Sharma and adapted as screenplay by the director himself.

title: Aparoopa
cast: Girish Karnad|Suhasini Mulay|Biju Phukan|Runu Devi
overview: Set in the tea plantations of Assam in northeast India, where a young woman quits her studies to marry a wealthy man whom her father owes money. The monotony of her days is broken by the arrival an old university acquaintance.

title: Satya: The Truth
cast: Utpal Das|Udayan Duarah|Darathie Bhardwaj|Moromi Saikia|Mahesh Bora
overview: In this poignant drama set in the aftermath of India's decision to decriminalize same-sex relationships, Satya, a young man from a small town, falls in love with a successful businessman from Guwahati. But with homophobia still rampant in Assam, Satya's relationship with Amar comes to a sudden end, leaving him alone and struggling to cope.
