However, with the help of childhood friend Samir, Satya begins to rebuild his life and discovers that there may be hope for love and acceptance in a world that can be harsh and unforgiving. With powerful performances and stunning visuals, this film offers a touching exploration of love, identity, and community in modern-day India.

title: Raag
cast: Adil Hussain|Zerifa Wahid|Kapil Bora|Kenny Basumatary
overview: Raag is a 2014 Assamese language drama film, starring Adil Hussain and Zerifa Wahid in the lead roles. The film was directed by Rajni Basumatary and produced by Assam State Film Corporation Limited in association with Manna Films.

title: Aloxuwa Mon
cast: Barsha Rani Bishaya|Saurabh Hazarika|Arup Baishya|Bishnu Kharghoria|Nabadeep Borgohain
overview: Aloxuwa Mon is a 2009 Assamese-language drama film directed by Rajesh Bhuyan. The film features the likes of Barsha Rani Bishaya, Saurabh Hazarika, Arup Baishya, and Bishnu Kharghoria in the lead roles. The story, screenplay, and dialogue were crafted by Munin Barua. The musical score includes hits such as 'Masore Bhale Paw', 'Nao Loi Aanim', etc. by Zubeen Garg. The film is available for free to watch on 'NK Production Movies' YouTube channel.

title: The Flight
cast: Tom Alter|Trisha Saikia|Bishnu Kharghoria|Triveni Bora|Bhageerathi Bai Kadam
overview: The film, based on Indira Goswami's Dontal Haatir Uiye Khuwa Haoda, is set in 1940s Assam. Three widows struggle to lead dignified lives despite the extreme restrictions mandated by law and custom. The arrival of a young American scholar, a poisonous snakebite, and the theft of ancestral jewelry combine to bring the situation of the young and beautiful widow Giribala to a painful crisis.

title: Fireflies
cast: Pranami Bora|Banjamin Daimary
overview: Jahnu lives in a remote village by the banks of the river Brahmmaputra in in Assam, Northeast India. The villagers mock him for the femininity that he proudly wears on his body. Jahnu dreams of getting an operation and becoming a woman. Jahnu's sister, Jumu, who has decided to never come out as a queer woman to protect her parent's reputation in the village, worries that Jahnu might also have to live a painful life like her, although both the siblings have never spoken about their struggles aloud. Jahnu and Jumu's elder brother, Baba is extremely unhappy about his gender nonconformist siblings who he thinks have made their family dishonorable in the village. Jahnu's life takes a drastic turn when his romantic relationship with Palash catches attention of the villagers. With Palash refusing to acknowledge the relationship, Jahnu has to decide if he would continue living a life hiding himself or let himself walk forth with his truth.

title: Kaka
cast: Ramen Barman
overview: Assamese feature film "Kaka", produced by Sanyukta Bezbaruah and directed by Ramen Barman, has bagged 7 prestigious awards and 4 numbers of official selection: “Best Feature Film” category till date at the Druk International Film Festival, the Indo Dubai International Film Festival, the Gangtok International Film Festival, Indian Independent Film Festival and the King Review Festival, the Cult Critic Movie Awards and the Knight of the Reel Awards, and an official selection for the Dubai International Film Festival, IMO International Film Festival, the Cinemaking International Film Festival, and the Maharaja Film Festival.

title: Emuthi Puthi
cast: Neetali Das|Kenny Basumatary|Pratibha Chaudhary|Lima Das|Srishti Sharma
overview: A rebellious teenager Ritika needs money to escape home while her eccentric granny Makhoni wants to travel 500 kilometres in search of a mythical fish for a perfect exit from the world. Both elope together from home one night, chased by one very harried policewoman - Makhoni's daughter and Ritika's mother, Indira.

title: Kanyadaan
cast: Jatin Bora|Rituparna Kataki|Arun Nath|Mridula Baruah|Jayanta Das
overview: Utpal, the youngest son in a middle class joint family, falls in love with a woman from a wealthy family. Apart from his sisters-in-law, no one knows about his romance.

title: Semkhor
cast: Aimee Baruah|Jaganniath Seth
overview: Diro belongs to the Samsa community in Semkhor. When Diro dies, his wife, who worked as an assistant mid-wife, takes care of their three children. She gets her only daughter Muri, aged just eleven, married to Dinar. Unfortunately, Muri dies after giving birth to a girl child. As per the custom of Semkhor, if a woman dies during child birth, the infant is buried alive along with the mother. But Diro’s wife protects Muri’s infant, indicating a new dawn in Semkhor.

title: Bira
overview: In a remote Assam village known for black magic, the evil spirit Bira awakens, unleashing ancient curses and dark rituals that threaten a family's life.

title: Bhaimon Da
cast: Bondip Sarma|Yasashree Bhuyan|Arghadeep Baruah|Pakija Begam|Kalpana Kalita
overview: "Bhaimon Da" tells the biographical story of Assamese filmmaker Munin Barua, exploring his life from his youth to his final days, as well as the challenges faced by Assamese cinema during his time.

title: Ishu
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria|Tonthoi Leishangthem|Kapil Garo|Monuj Borkotoky
overview: Ambika, little Ishu's favourite aunt, has gone missing after the evil village quack has declared her as a witch. Will Ishu get her back

title: Rainbow Fields
cast: Victor Banerjee|Dipannita Sharma|Nakul Vaid|Naved Aslam|Nipon Goswami
overview: Rainbow Fields is an Assamese movie starring Dipannita Sharma and Victor Banerjee in prominent roles. The movie also stars Nakul Vaid, Naved Aslam, Nipon Goswami and Panchi Bora. It is a drama directed by Bidyut Kotoky with Anurag Saikia as musician, forming part of the crew.

title: Firingoti
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria|Hemen Choudhury|Hemen Choudhury|Moloya Goswami|Chetana Das
overview: The story is set in 1962, the time of Sino-India war. It revolves around a widowed teacher named Ritu who is transferred to Koronga, a small Assamese village. The school here was destroyed by fire ten years earlier. Ritu takes on the challenge of rebuilding the school and starts campaigning among the villagers.

title: Priyaar Priyo
cast: Zubeen Garg|Aradhana Buragohain|Pranjal Saikia|Gunjan Bhardwaj|Bikram Rajkhowa
overview: Directed by Munin Barua.  With Zubeen Garg, Aradhana Buragohain, Pranjal Saikia, Gunjan Bhardwaj

title: Mahapurush
cast: Brajen Bora|Dinesh Das|Gayatri Mahanta
overview: Brajen Borah’s Assamese multi-starrer film Mahapurush. It is the last Assamese film to be shot on celluloid and boasts of a stellar cast comprising Brajen Borah, Pranjal Saikia, Dinesh Das, Ashim Baisya, Gayatri Mahanta, Madhurima Kakoty, Chetana Das, Atul Pachani, Dilip Barua, late Pramod Barua and late Hadi Alam Bora in key roles. It had all the commercial ingredients of a successful venture with action, comedy, romance, tragedy and emotion all rolled into one.

title: Hiya Diya Niya
cast: Jatin Bora|Luna Lahkar|Ravi Sharma|Geetawali Rajkumari|Mridula Baruah
overview: A rich family searches for a husband for their daughter. The father wants his daughter to get married to his friend's son who lives in a village but the mother and daughter prefer a NRI boy.

title: Sri Raghupati
cast: Ravi Sarma|Arun Hazarika|Preety Kongana|Rina Bora
overview: Raghupati Rai Baruah, an ACS officer known for his sincerity and diligence, sets forth on an impetuous journey of rescuing missing women. During the investigation, he uncovers a women trafficking racket, which further leads to complicated situations.

title: Haanduk: The Hidden Corner
cast: Bishal Anurag|Nivedita Baruah|Bandoi Chetia|Jitu Kumar Moran
overview: Lives under political violence

title: Pokhila
cast: Gayatri Mahanta|Raag Oinitam|Arun Hazarika|Anup Hazarika|Pakija Begam
overview: Assamese film

title: Village Rockstars 2
cast: Bhanita Das|Basanti Das|Manabendra Das|Boloram Das|Bhaskar Das
overview: Dhunu, now in her late teens, still climbs trees, swims, and most importantly, dreams of continuing her childhood life as a guitarist in her rock band. However, life does not unfold as Dhunu wishes. As she faces the bitter and sour moments of life, she stands on the threshold of leaving her once-happy childhood behind.

title: Local Kung Fu 2
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Utkal Hazowary|Tony Deori Basumatary|Suneet Bora|Sarmistha Chakravorty
overview: Local Kung Fu 2 is an action adaptation of William Shakespeare's Comedy of Errors with a twist One pair of twins - the pair who grew up in Guwahati - knows fighting, whereas the other pair - from Tezpur - don't.

title: Dikchow Banat Polakh
cast: Kulada Kumar Bhattacharya|Mala Goswami|Mina Ingti
overview: Dikchow Banat Palaax” an Assamese feature film presented by Assam state film(Finance & Development) corporation Ltd & Canvascope , starring Kulada Kumar Bhattacharjee, Mala Goswami, Chinmoy Chakravarty, Sajan Nayak in leading roles, directed by Sanjib Sabhapandit was It has been selected for Indian Panorama at the International Film Festival of India (IFFI) to be held November 20, 2016 in Goa.

title: Aranya
cast: Biju Phukan|Bidya Rao|Riku Khan|Tara
overview: Film starring Biju Phukan and Bidya Rao.

title: Sringkhal
cast: Adil Hussain|Saurabh Hazarika|Jaya Seal
overview: Sringkhal is a Assamese drama film directed by Prabin Hazarika, based on an Assamese short story by Dr. Bhabendra Nath Saikia of the same name. Based against a rural backdrop, Sringkhal portrays how a widow, Ambika, struggles for survival and brings up her children after her husband passes away. Jaya Seal Ghosh and Badal Das respectively won the Best Actor Female and Best Supporting Actor Male for their performance in this film in Prag Cine Awards 2014.

title: Pokhi
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria
overview: Pokhi (Assamese: পখী) is an Assamese language drama film directed by Jahnu Barua. It was released in 1998 as is the second instalment of his trilogy — the other two being Xagoroloi Bohu Door (1995) and Konikar Ramdhenu (2003). Pokhi won a National Award for Best Feature Film in the Assamese Category in 2000.

title: Songs for Rain
cast: Maitri Das|Deep Jyoti Kalita|Bina Potongia
overview: The lack of rains and a dying river has put the lives of the inhabitants of a remote fisherman's village at stake. Deprived of their main source of income and finding it increasingly difficult to sustain themselves, the villagers who have consulted oracles and conducted "frog-weddings" are now desperately looking for a way out of their plight. An unusual solution presented by a priest seems like a possible cure for the curse and though reluctant at first, the villagers decide to go ahead with it for the greater good of the village. Village simpletons nicknamed Benga and Bengi, suddenly find themselves at the centre of the chaos that ensues - and it changes their lives forever.

title: The Catastrophe
cast: Indra Bania|Badal Das|Purnima Pathak|Pranjal Saikia|Tara
overview: A simple farmer becomes the victim of a greedy landowner in this social melodrama. Bora (Indra Bania) is forced to give up the farm his father had paid for when the landowner asks for a mortgage receipt that was never given. He loses his livestock and sends his young son to work as an errand boy to the villainous landlord. Bora's ultimate humiliation occurs when he is forced to put up political banners that espouse the virtues of the man who drove him from his land and ruined his life.

title: Dau Huduni Methai
cast: Reshma Mushahary|Ahalya Daimary|Nita Basumatary

title: Rag Birag
overview: A young man shocks his relatives by announcing that he will become an ascetic, renouncing the family.A daughter of divorced parents, who lives with her mother, loves him but fails to talk him out of his resolve. She meets Swamiji of an ashram, who before becoming a monk was her lovers uncle,15 years ago. On her persuasion, the swami meets his nephew to dissuade him from becoming an ascetic, tells him of the beauties and merits of non ascetic life. He falls prey to her charms and shocks her by admitting his lust for her. The Swamis mother dies and he goes for a period for penance for his libidinous desire.Another nephew of the Swami-a man of the world-runs a restaurant; in him, Pari finds hope for the future.

title: Baghjan
cast: Monuj Borkotoky|Jadumoni Baruah|Sobita Borah|Dondeswar Borah|Hemanta Moran
overview: Fisherman Manab lives with his wife Bharabi in a small village, a fertile oil and gas field. One day, during oil extraction, a massive blast happens and the whole village catches on fire. Bharabi dies in the fire. Manab can't take it. He feels that his wife is still alive, burning in the fire and trying to talk to him.

title: Abhadra
cast: Chiranjeet Borah|FairyPriya Ahmed
overview: Abhadra revolves around a roadside Romeo and his misadventures. A menace in his family, he finally finds his true love. Will he be able to win her trust? Abhadra directed by Aman Kumar and produced by Arup Adhikari,Rachana Adhikari under A2 Creations Film & Art.

title: Adhinayak
cast: Jatin Bora|Arup Borah|Nishita Goswami|Rimpi Das|Hiranya Deka
overview: Follow the life of Raja, a mechanic, and the relationship he shares with other people around him.

title: Joonbai 4
cast: Nayan Nilim|Arun Hazarika|Madhurima Chaudhury|Debasish Upadhyay|Rina Bora
overview: Indra has a son and Bonti-Arun get married.

title: A Letter to Home
cast: Nilim Chetia|Rahul Rabha|Akhil Gogoi|Kalpana Phukan|Urmila Mahanta
overview: Glimpses of lives from a village in Assam reveal the relationship between its history and the present. People’s lives and beliefs are entangled with ecological strings , as nature stands witness to the narratives that unfolded there. A young boy, Rahul, hopes to write a book on his experience of growing up in this village. His mother, being deeply connected with nature can sense messages and signs arising from nature.. Urmila, a pregnant lady, is driven by sensorial experiences. But, In contrast to the serenity and harmonious living; there lurks a violent societal past.These peaceful and quiet lives intersect in a space where traumatic memories of death and loss in Assam’s thirty years of secessionist movement keep resurfacing.

title: The Winter Rain
cast: Dipankar Roy|Anchit Udayaditya|Anchit Udayaditya|Jit Chaliha|Trisha Saikia
overview: An emotionally charged Assamese film about love and acceptance, exploring same-sex relationships beyond societal norms.

title: Bhoga Khirikee
cast: Seema Biswas|Zerifa Wahid|Kasvi Sharma|Bishnu Kharghoria
overview: Bhoga Khidikee is a 2018 Assamese drama film directed by Jahnu Barua. It was the opening film of 2nd Guwahati International Film Festival. The film is based on the real life experiences of a village girl in upper Assam and is set against the socio-political landscape of the state in 2015

title: Jetuka Paator Dore
cast: Aimee Baruah|Raag Oinitam|Bishnu Kharghoria|Kapil Bora|Bikram Rajkhowa
overview: Radha, an orphan who grows up to be a rebellious student, with the help of her childhood friend Rajat, tackles issues that have been plaguing their village. Will she be able to bring about a change?

title: Jeeya Jurir Xubax
cast: Victor Banerjee|Bishnu Kharghoria
overview: Jeeya Jurir Xubax is a 2014 Assamese language drama film written and directed by Sanjib Sabhapandit. It was produced by Utpal Kumar Das and features ensemble cast, including Victor Banerjee and Bishnu Kharghoria.

title: Unmona Mon
cast: Jatin Bora|Jayashree Goswami|Jupitora Bhuyan|Rimpi Das|Arun Hazarika
overview: Assamese romantic movie

title: Shinyor
cast: Priyashree Kashyap|Pranami Bora|Simashree Bora
overview: An Assamese film directed by Kangkan Rajkhowa. Shinyor is the story of a young journalist who, in the process of gathering news, becomes news herself.

title: Paani
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria|Aimee Barua|Himanshu Prasad Das|Asha Bordoloi
overview: Shekhar Kapur`s directorial venture depicts the scenario many years into the future, where the earth`s water supply has run-out and the events and wars that follow as a result.

title: Bridges
overview: A short film by adhiraj kashyap.

title: Antony Mur Naam
cast: Biju Phukan|Purabi Sharma|Reba Phukan|Abdul Majid|Parag Saliha
overview: Anthony, an orphan baby, is raised by a priest at the church. However, he grows up to be a gang leader who robs from the rich and gives to the poor.

title: Tora's Husband
overview: A loving father strains to keep his small-town business afloat while his relationships deteriorate amidst personal loss and lockdowns during the pandemic.

title: Shakuntala aru Sankar Joseph Ali
cast: Mridula Baruah|Nipon Goswami|Tapan Das|Amala Katarki|Nandini Sharma
overview: Assamese film

title: The Nellie Story
cast: Arghadeep Baruah|Mintu Baruah|Swagata Bharali|Bhoisnavi Bora|Asha Kuthari Choudhury
overview: Rajiv Pator, a doctoral candidate at Gauhati University, travels to the secluded villages of Nellie to look into the truth behind the massacre of Muslims on 18 February 1983, also known as the Nellie massacre.

title: Hiya Diba Kak
cast: Angoorlata Deka|Jatin Bora
overview: Hiya Diba Kak (2014), romance released in Assamese language, starring  Jatin Bora, Angoorlata, Biju Phukan, Nipon Goswami. the film was directed  by Rajiv Bora and produced by Bhupen Goswami

title: Narakasur
cast: Mrinal Riku Sarmah|Ritismita Bora|Oprotirodhyo|Kishor Lahkar|Jayshree
overview: "Narakasur" is a short film in which we've endeavoured to utilize the art of masks to narrate the story of King Narakasur in a theatrical form. Mrinal, a dedicated science teacher in a government school, employs a unique blend of evolutionary theory and the mythology of Vishnu's avatars to engage his students. However, his nights turn bizarre as he becomes entangled in a recurring cycle, transforming into a feral being. Through this surreal journey, we explore the delicate boundary between evolved humanity and primal instincts in contemporary society along with a portrayal of what reverse evolution might entail.

title: The Tale of Kumbhaganj
cast: Rohit Das|Bhaskar|Jani Basumatary|Swapnil Deka|Arnab Nath
overview: Set in the peaks of the Kumbhaganj mountain range, relentless treasure hunter Raman risks everything to unearth a mythical treasure. But as his obsession spirals, the real question arises—does materialistic desire corrupt the man, or does the man expose the greed lurking within us all?

title: Fagungatha
overview: The film tells the poignant tale of two star-crossed lovers whose paths fatefully intertwine yet remain forever apart. The film captures the essence of love that remains unfulfilled, illustrating how its echo can become greater and more profound than love that is consummated.

title: Ningol Thajaba
cast: Somendro Rajkumar|Gokul Athokpam|Jeenita Kshetrimayum|Thongam Thoithoi
overview: An NRI boy falls in love with a Manipuri country girl. However, things become complicated when the girl's overprotective brother opposes their relationship.

title: Days of Autumn
cast: Kalpana Phukan|Paban Phukan|Gaurav Mod
overview: An elderly couple lives a mundane life in a remote village in Assam.An atmosphere of absence pervades their household. One morning, a young boy comes to sell winter clothes and talks about his home which is three states away. A pleasant breeze signals the subtle change of season and hints towards a solitary time packed with memories of youth.

title: Pikhaas
cast: Nirupom Saikia|Achinta Raj Kashyap|Jeanette Bay|Tribeni Gogoi|Mintu Baruah
overview: A chilling tale of inner demons, beauty, and the beast within. Will beauty tame the monster or succumb to its darkness? Experience the nightmare that will haunt your imagination.

title: A Silent Way
cast: Xewan Xing Yein|Mahika Sharma|Torulota Kutum|Diganta Panging
overview: This is life story of Paigam, an Assmese tribal, who faces a tough life from childhood to old age.

title: Ringa Ringa Mon
cast: Utpal Das|Krishna Das|Tapan Das|Purabi Sharma|Bhaskar Bora
overview: Assamese film

title: Bengal Police Chapter 01: M16
cast: Piyali Chakraborty

title: Can They Hear Our Songs?
cast: Adhiraj Kashyap|Jyotishree RU Baishya|Sariful Haque
overview: Can they hear our songs? is a short experimental film by Mehdi Jahan, inspired by the sufi oral storytelling tradition of his ancestral village in Assam. A tradition that is slowing fading away from the cultural landscape of Assam.

title: Up Down & Sideways
overview: As they work in cooperative groups — preparing the terraced fields, planting saplings, or harvesting the grain and carrying it up impossibly steep slopes — the rice cultivators of Phek sing. The seasons change, and so does the music, transforming the mundane into the hypnotic. The love that they sing of is also a metaphor for the need for the other – the friend, the family, the community, to build a polyphony of voices. Stories of love, stories of the field, stories of song, stories in song. Up down and sideways is a musical portrait of a community of rice cultivators and their memories of love and loss, created from working together on the fields.

title: River
cast: Nirab Das|Anupam Kaushik Borah|Amrita Goswami|Violet Nazir Tiwari|Jhilmil Hazrika
overview: A middle aged Bisnu leads a simple life in a fishing village on the banks of the Brahmaputra. One cloudy morning, during the fag end of the monsoons, he finds a corpse enmeshed in his net. Taken over by an obsession about the boy and his village, Bisnu embarks on a journey across Assam that would open him up to a world he had no idea about and would have been better off not knowing.

title: Soul of Silence
cast: Samar Jyoti Sarkar|Jeet Baruah|Swagata Bharali|Anamika Sarania|Raju Roy
overview: Soul of Silence is an anthology that represent three stories of labour families and individuals from Assam. These below poverty line people also have different frequencies of emotions and conflicts. This film tries to draw them on screen

title: Samarpan
cast: Ashoke Singh|Sikha Hazarika|Sapunti Bordoloi
overview: There is an endless or infinite imagination and creations on the woman body. But surprisingly a women is not the sole owner of her own body. A woman is always tormented, harassed, exploited and neglected in different ways. Why so much injustice are prevailing towards the woman in this world?

title: Green Blackberries
overview: In a small tribal village in India’s North Eastern Region lives a young schoolgirl—the academically gifted Nishu. Her school consists of one room, housing children from kindergarten to sixth grade. On the day of her final exam, Nishu sets off from home as usual with her elder sister, crossing a river by motorboat. But suddenly disaster strikes. The boat stalls, stuck against a jutting rock. Will Nishu make it to school on time? If not, what will become of her dream of moving with her sister to the city?

title: Suspended Inspector Boro
cast: Utkal Hazowary|Kenny Basumatary|Suneet Bora|Poonam Gurung|Anupam Kaushik Borah
overview: Inspector Boro is an incorruptible, no-nonsense cop highly skilled in martial arts who gets suspended for bashing up a well connected gang of traffickers. A Superintendent of Police asks him to unofficially track down a girl named Sabrina Rai who has been missing for four days. While investigating, he learns that someone had taken her from her village to Guwahati city under the pretext of training her for the hospitality industry. While trying to track her down, Inspector Boro finds that her phone is switched off and she is missing from her hostel. He then heads to Guwahati and punches and kicks his way to the uncomfortable truth - Sabrina might have been entangled in a trafficking ring run by a corrupt policeman.

title: TRP Aru…
cast: Urmila Mahanta|Gunjan Bharadwaj|Prince Chowhan|FairyPriya Ahmed
overview: Assam Film (Fianance and Development) Corporation Limited has produced the film under the banner of J.K Enterprise. “TRP aru…” depicts the story of current trend in broadcasting media's crazy run to enhance their Television Rating Points (TRP). The Script is written by Manimala Mahanta.

title: The Face
cast: Rishabh Sharma|Rimi Hazarika
overview: New action and romantic Assamese film. The film is directed by Rajib Dutta and produced by Barnali Hazarika under the banner of ‘Santoshi Ma Production’. The story, screenplay and dialogues of the film are written by Palash Pawan. The film deals with real life incidents. There are some faces that work for the betterment of society, who are concerned about keeping it neat and clean, but sometimes there also exists some faces, the opposite forces, that are hell–bent on destroying it. How two faces can make a change to society by nullifying all the pollutants of from it is the main theme of ‘The Face’.

title: Grahan
cast: Diganta Hazarika|Farhin Choudhury
overview: Grahan is an Assamese language romantic drama film directed by Tilak Sarma and produced by M.Choudhury under the banner of BMC Media Production, Guwahati. It stars Diganta Hazarika, Farhin Choudhury in the lead roles.The story, written by Bilkis Mazumdar, is based on love and friendship as seen through the eyes of the younger generation.

title: Uroniya Mon
cast: Utpal Das|Rimpi Das|Jupitora Bhuyan|Hiranya Das
overview: Assamese film starring Utpal Das and Rimpi Das

title: Indramalati
cast: Manabhiram Barua|Raseswari Baruah|Mohini|Nishan|Phani Sarma
overview: Indramalati is the second Assamese language film, directed by the great Assamese poet Jyotiprasad Agarwala  Jyotiprasad Agarwala wrote the story of Indramalati, which was a tale of romance.

title: Forest
cast: Mridula Baruah|Sushil Goswami|Bishnu Kharghoria|Golap Datta|Lakshmi Sinha
overview: With this ecological drama, Assam’s leading director Jahnu Barua continues exploring the conflict between corrupt state politics and a determined individual (cf. Halodiya Choraye Baodhan Khaye, 1987). The forest ranger confronts illegal timber merchants and contractors on behalf of impoverished tribals. The honest ranger’s activities get him into trouble and he is constantly transferred from one post to another, to the annoyance of his wife who wants him to settle down and look after their ailing child. Eventually she supports her husband’s fight and the tribals realise they need weapons to defend themselves against rapacious outsiders.

title: Bekaar 2
cast: Aasish Dutta|Sandhani Dutta|Bhaskar Gogoi|Gayatri Bhuyan|Bhargob Jyoti Bhuyan
overview: Fast forward to Bekaar', these creatives have now transformed themselves to actively serving and strong willed men who've been through their prime, settled and have everything they ever wanted as hopeful-youngsters, however with the course of time, the artists in them have been supressed along with their friendship. Fortunately, destiny did wanted them to be reunited and that was done by their long lost friend, 'GURU'. It's not just another night but a well executed storyline following each of their lives making 'Bekaar 2' the perfect bittersweet and yet another philosophical, drunk-honest and comical sequel to 'Bekaar'.

title: Eyes on the Sunshine
cast: Rajat Kapoor|Boloram Das|Udayan Duarah|Bibhuti Bhushan Hazarika|Bidya Bharati

title: Suma Poroxote
cast: Indumouli Neog|Debasmita Benarjee
overview: Suma Poroxote is an Assamese movie. The movie is directed by Jonmoni Devi khaund and featured Indumouli and Debasmita as lead characters.

title: Ronuwa
cast: Rajiv Kro|Pranami Bora|Rodali Bora|Barnali Dutta
overview: Although Makon did not study much, the lessons that life has taught her are now the basis of her existence. It has inspired her in overcoming hardships and has enabled her to bear all pain. She has learn that life is a school in itself, which provides all the answers one seeks. Her little world comprises her husband Jadhav, a boy and a girl who are nine-ten year old. A cycle rickshaw puller, Jadhav earns barely enough to support his family. Makon runs a small shop along the footpath. Besides fulfilling their responsibilities towards their household they manage to send their children to a government school. They have greater aspirations for their children.

title: Local Kung Fu
cast: Kenny Basumatary|Utkal Hazowary|Sangeeta Nair|Bonny Deori|Kabindra Dass
overview: Local Kung Fu's plot revolves around Charlie, "an ordinary boy from Guwahati with a delicate stomach", his girlfriend and a number of madcap characters such as a wannabe local don and a thief who is rumoured to roam naked.

title: The Catfish
cast: Pranab Jyoti Das|Pompi Kakati|Gadhuli Deka|Bhubaneswar Deka|Sushila Kalita
overview: The catfish will linger in every villager's mind, stealing their sleep.

title: Prem Kisim Kisim
cast: Pabitra Baruah|Gayatri Mahanta|Jyoti Bhuyan|Chetana Das|Shyamontika Sharma
overview: Assamese film

title: Joonbai 3
cast: Nayan Nilim|Arun Hazarika|Gayatri Mahanta|Madhurima Chaudhury|Rina Bora
overview: Due to the mutual estrangement between Netra and her wife with Indra-Junali, both families got separated. Will the two families be able to reunite?

title: Ganga: Ekhoni Bowati Hiya
cast: Arup Vaishya|Prastuti Parashar|Raag Oinitam|Munmi Kalita|Jogesh Kashyap
overview: Ganga: Ekhoni Bowati Hiya revolves around January 12.

title: Anuradha
cast: Diganta Hazarika|Pranami Bora|Meghranjani Medhi
overview: Anuradha is an Assamese language drama film directed by Rakesh Sharma and starring Meghranjani and Diganta Hazarika in the lead roles. The film was produced by Luit Kumar Barman under the banner of M L Entertainment and Cine Dream Unlimited.

title: The Home My Mother Never Found
overview: Mehdi Jahan attempts to depict his mother's interaction with disturbing memories that trigger her panic attacks. In his mother’s memory, private, everyday experience is combined with political events from the history of India: Partition, the Indo-China War, the Assam Movement. She describes her experiences in the form of letters addressed to her mother, the director’s grandmother, who passed away several years ago. These touching messages about family, love, and homeland prove to have a therapeutic effect on the heroine and give her a sense of peace.

title: Joonbai 2
cast: Nayan Nilim|Gayatri Mahanta|Arun Hazarika|Rina Bora|Bishnu Kharghoria
overview: Indra left from his house with his wife Jonali after an argument with his brother Netra. What happens next?

title: Tales From Our Childhood
overview: The Film-maker’s childhood friend dons a borrowed uniform and poses as an ULFA rebel.  Another friend opens an old diary. Some other friends rehearse a play from the film-maker’s childhood days.  A poem by an ULFA rebel is recited. The film embarks on a journey to revive the memory of growing up in Assam in the 1990s – a turbulent time when the United Liberation Front of Assam (ULFA) was heading an armed rebellion for independence from India.  Violence, death, and disappearance dominate the stories from the film-maker’s childhood.  The film recollects and reconstructs fragments of those memories through personal narratives of the film-maker’s friends, parents, and relatives.

title: Senai Mur Dhulia
cast: Jatin Bora|Barsha Rani Bishaya|Seema Mudoi|Raj Sharma|Chetana Das
overview: A rich girl falls in love with a poor dhul player

title: Made in Nalbari
cast: Bibhuti Bhushan Hazarika|Arun Nath|Jintu Kumar Kashyap
overview: Three strangers embark on a journey together. They each have their own reasons for undertaking this journey, but they quickly find that they have more in common than they initially thought.

title: Jyoti and Joymoti
overview: A fatally shot rebel stumbles upon an old woman in a mysterious forest. Personal memories and collective histories blend into one entity as the old lady’s story unfolds, transforming the landscape into a theater of dreams and memories where several scenes from the history of Assam play out again.

title: It's a Long Way to the Sea
cast: Sushanta Barooah|Baruah|Mirel|Arun Nath|Kashmiri Saikia
overview: Powal is a boatman in Nemuguri village that is situated on the bank of the river Dihing. Since there is no bridge at that point of the river, Powal's job is assured. For some three generations his forefathers have been ferrying people to and fro. Life goes on smoothly until Powal begins to hear persistent reports about a bridge to be built across the river.

title: Echoes Within
cast: Anala Koch|Upama Koch|Binarani Koch|Menaka Koch
overview: “Can I be nostalgic about something I’ve never experienced?” asks debut filmmaker Pranami Koch. She has in mind her grandmother, a person she never knew who belonged to the Koches, a people in India with their own culture and traditions. In her search for connection and identity, Pranami travels to the countryside and immerses herself in the Koch community.

title: Poetry of Whispers
cast: Maitri Das|Eemon Ray|Apurba Saha
overview: The emotionless life of the city is seen to make people mentally distant from each other, even though they live in the same space. Frustrated with his monotonous and melancholic life in a hostel located amidst a city, Biswa gets a call from his girlfriend Mukuta who has gone home which is in a village in Assam. Mukuta's mother is no more and her father lives alone at home when she is away. During the phone conversation, Biswa realizes the contrasting difference between Mukuta's relationship with her home and his own relationship with his city life. He finds it interesting enough to make a film out of it.

title: Moi
cast: Aasish Dutta
overview: A psychological thriller set in a surreal atmosphere. The film focuses on a man who is trying to put screenplay on his black demonic like diary, he deep dives into his mind for it then it sheds light on the darker section of thoughts the character tries to push away, but whenever the facade of morality is removed the darker thoughts reign and at the end it gets twisted a bit.

title: The Resonance
cast: Urmila Mahanta|Vansh Bhardwaj|Udayan Duarah|Dorathi Bharadwaj|Manoj Barkotoky
overview: The Resonance (Anunaad) focuses on the soul-tearing topic of bridal slavery occurring in some parts of India. The film opens in a sleepy rural area surrounded by tea gardens where girls dream of migrating to other parts of the country to escape the poverty and hopelessness in which their families are plunged. Lured by a nexus of brokers and human traffickers, they begin a journey from the lush green fields of Assam to the dry, foggy winter of Haryana, in Northern India, where they risk being trafficked as purchased brides and face a life of constant humiliation and violence at the hands of their husbands and their families.

title: Rape In The Virgin Forest
cast: Onjali Bodosa|Narzary Tiken
overview: A film about the indiscriminate destruction of forest taking place in the foothills of Himalaya, particularly in Bodoland area of Assam (India) and predominantly inhabited by the indigenous Bodo people.

title: Adomya
cast: Pranami Bora|Sulakshana Baruah|Runu Devi|Pranjal Saikia
overview: Juri faces several hardships after her husband dies of AIDS. She is thrown out of her in-laws' house. Soon, she returns to her village and gives birth to a baby girl.

title: Borosi
cast: Toufique Rehman|Madhusmita Borkotoky
overview: Borosi is a 2014 Assamese Suspense movie based on a story written by politician & former Law Minister of India Dinesh Goswami and directed by Prodyut Kumar Deka and produced by Debashish Goswami under Manjushree Films & Entertainment.

title: Wings of the Tern
cast: Beena Baruwati|Basanta Duarah
overview: The film depicts the story of Basanti, a young village woman, pitted against two men in a small town environment of the sixties. After the death of her husband Mathura, she starts dreaming of a new life with her former lover Dhananjay.

title: Dr. Bezbarua
cast: Nipon Goswami|Biju Phukan|Tara
overview: Dr. Bezbarua is a 1969 Assamese language thriller film, the first film of this genre in the language, directed by Brajen Barua and produced by Rangghar Cine Productions.

title: Abhimani Mon
cast: Utpal Das|Meghranjani Medhi|Rajkumar|Bhargav Kataki|Akashitora Saikia
overview: 'Abhimani Mon' is a 2009 Assamese-language film directed by Rajesh Bhuyan and written by Munin Barua, featuring Utpal Das and Meghranjani Medhi in the lead roles. The film is a part of Bhuyan's contributions to Assamese Cinema during the 2000s. The musical score includes songs like 'Koliya Meghe', 'Pogola Pogola', 'Lahe Doi', etc., performed by Zubeen Garg. The film is available to watch for free on 'NK Production Movies' official YouTube channel.

title: Amateurs
cast: Bhaskar Mishra|Kailash Sarma
overview: Set in 1982, during the six-year Assam Movement, the film is based on the life struggle of an amateur dhol drummer (Dhuliya) in Assamese folk dramas.

title: Third
overview: A short film about the stories of transgender people residing in Assam, a northeastern state of India. The documentary focuses on the alienation of transgender people in the Assamese society which is mostly conservative in nature, due to which most transgender people are compelled to leave their homes at a very early age.

title: The Seventh String
overview: Nishtha who had fallen in love with a 31 year old man when she was only 13. She had to leave her hometown. After 12years she comes back. While roaming around with her friends, she came across a hut where a lot of people meet and talk to each other and share their own stories. Finally she went back to that hut and shared her story. She just wants to be free from her past. She wants to forgive her and let it go. At the end of the story a man who was present during her story stops her to tell her that he was the one who had hurt her and made her go through so many things. She looks at him and tells him that she already knew it.

title: Price of Freedom
overview: "Kuhkhal" is a masterpiece created by filmmaker Jahnu Barua based on the life and idealism of the great martyr of Assam, Kuhkhal Konwar.  Director : Jahnu Barua  Editor : Hue-en Barua  Cast : Sanjib Sabhapandit, Gary Richardson, Bina Potongia, Dinesh Das, Prithviraj, Rabha, Anup Hazarika, Victor David Sasoon, Sakir Hazarika, Paul Carlin, Philips Bose  Released : 1998

title: The Quest
overview: A tired rebel Amrit returns to his village after four years of serving to a losing cause. He tries to pick up where he left off, but he sees people staring at him and stop conversations at his sight, and it troubles him. As he tries to fit back in while making an honest living, he realizes the daily drudgery of life. He doubts if coming back was the right decision. Does Amrit find hope and the courage to overcome it?

title: Bekaar
cast: Aasish Dutta|Bhaskar Gogoi|Bustob Pritom Borah|Debasish Kalita|Monuranjan Dutta
overview: A group of creatives/ artists in a society very contradicting to their crafts which happen to be childhood friends, take a break from their days of struggle to get together every night. It's one of those nights where they are drunk-honest,  philosophical topped up with great comical timing.

title: Maar
cast: Aasish Dutta|Chiranjib Dutta|Eshan Kaushik
overview: "MAAR" is an upcoming Assamese Feature Film to be Written and Directed by Aasish Dutta under the banner ABEYANCY™. Produced by Anjumoni Saikia Dutta, Original Score by Fardin Irfan, Music by Riyan Saikia and D.O.P Mrinal Jyoti Bora. Film is on Pre-Production state.

title: Xunyota
cast: Bidya Bharati|Angshu Borah|Hemanta Debnath
overview: Xunyota, meaning 'void', touches upon the unspoken nuances of grief and loss. The story explores the changing trajectory of a young, school-going girl, Bina's life, after her mother is left bed-ridden by a terminal illness.

title: Advitya
cast: Arnab Ayan|Niha Rani Das|Pranjal Saikia
overview: Advitya is an upcoming Indian Assameae language superhero film written and directed by Arindam Sharma. The film is produced by Brojendra Nath Sarma under Krrishna Kraft Productions (India) Pvt. Ltd.

title: Chik Mik Bijuli
cast: Bijoy Shankar|Ila Kakoti|Bidya Rao|Krishna Hazarika
overview: An Assamese film.

title: Conflict
cast: Aasish Dutta
overview: Depiction of the aftermath of the vicious loop hole of desires, where an individual embarks on against his will, or not.  'Conflict' is the first ever short film conceptualized &  visualized by the director Aasish Dutta, his frequent collaborator Mrinal Jyoti Borah and one of his best mates, Lt. Rohan Baruah under their self-found banner Vintage Reels. The decision of re-releasing this short film under the banner ABEYANCY has been locked in.

title: Whist
overview: Whist is a short documentary film on the folklores, sacrificial rituals of animals during the Hindu festival, Manasha Puja being held annually in the Indian state of Assam. People gather in large numbers to witness the bizarre yet thrilling practices of Shaman folk dance, Deodhani dance; to name a few, usually performed by individuals who are said to have been influenced by the deity.

title: My Shadows and I
overview: The film tries to explore the mental state of a person who left his family to join the armed struggle in the state of Assam in the North-Eastern part of India, only to return a few years later to find absolutely nothing left of what he once knew as "home".

title: Morisika
overview: "Morisika" is a captivating short film that delves into the mystical concept of mirages, where loved ones can suddenly transform into illusions without warning. The story follows individuals who are haunted by the possibility of losing their beloved companions to the ephemeral nature of these mirages. As they navigate this unpredictable world, they are forced to confront their deepest fears and insecurities, questioning the authenticity of their relationships and the fragility of human connection. Through stunning visuals and poignant storytelling, "Morisika" explores themes of loss, grief, and the transient nature of love, leaving viewers with a haunting reminder of the impermanence of life and the power of memory.

title: Haioi Lily Toie Mure Kolija Khali
cast: Poran JR|Hrishikesh Das|Kashyap Jyoti Kalita
overview: When a heated argument erupts between two close friends, Rishi & Akash, over a girl named Lily, a seemingly ordinary day spirals into chaos.

title: Haladhar
overview: The tale is set in a village in Assam. It is the fallow season and the village is preparing for its annual Bhaona performance. Balaram , a farmer, has got two large pieces of wood from the forest to make ploughs, one of which he has promised to his brother in law. Maghi Mahajan, the rich man of the village, appears and asks for one of the two logs. Balaram refuses.

title: Jwlwi - The Seed
cast: Rajni Basumatary|Raj Agnihotri|Mondeep Basumatary|Sansri Basumatary|Sattyakee Dcom Bhuyan
overview: Set in Assam's insurgency ridden 90s, Jwlwi- The Seed is a story of hope lost and found through resolute perseverance even in the face of seemingly insurmountable odds.

title: Man with the Binoculars
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria|Rima Das
overview: About how a man, in the final stages of his life, reflects back on his life through what is happening in the present.He sees how he is adversely affecting his surroundings, his daugher, his daugher in laws... but can he make the change that is demanded of him, and can he, in the process, discover himself come to free others and himself

title: Joon Jole Kopalot
cast: Debajit Mazumdar|Bhagawat Pritam|Barsha Rani Bishaya|Trisha Saikia|Lipika Borah
overview: Assamese film

title: The Fragrance of Fallen Parijats
overview: Explores the tension between a Father-in-law and a widowed Daughter-in-law when the presence of another man in her life irks him.

title: Upasharga
cast: Kinkar Deka|Anil Deka|Rajjashree Sharma|Chandan Kashyap
overview: Kinkar, the prime member of a Ojapali (a traditional folk form in Assamese language) and Anil, one of the member of a local band party group are childhood friends. Their day to day lives are pretty messed up due to deprived financial condition. Amidst such situation they meet a outsider dumb person Rajen, who was working in a poultry farm. Renu, who sometimes visit their village to sell female garments, has her own struggle. Eventually, they find a short cut way to earn easy money which leads them towards a disastrous ending

title: The Horse From Heaven
overview: Kuxhol is travelling to the city with Goti, the horse from heaven. Kuxhol tells the amazing story about their adventures to everyone he meets on his way. He claims Goti to be the fastest horse in the world. Everyone finds it bizarre in the beginning as they can see that Goti is not a horse, but a donkey. Well, eventually his audience starts believing in his tale and the Heaven's Horse.

title: The New Dawn
cast: Nilim Dutta|Rajib kr. Doley|Pushpa Misong
overview: National Award Winning Movie

title: Samiran Barua Ahi Ase
overview: An anthology that includes stories of a terrorist leader who is wanted by various people for their selfish motives.

title: Azan Fakir Saheb
cast: Bishnu Kharghoria|Arun Nath|Prithviraj Rabha|Jayanta Bhagawati
overview: Ajan Faquir Saheb is an Assamese language biographical film produced by Bani Kalita and directed by Asif Iqbal Hussain. The film was released on 25 April 2008. The film is based on the life of Ajan Fakir, the Sufi saint and poet who came to Assam from Baghdad.  Taken from Wikipedia.

title: My Quarantine Diary
cast: Bhaskar Baruah|Kaushik Hazarika
overview: A short film that depicts the psychological journey of a 37-year-old protagonist, a successful designer who returns during the peak of Covid 19 pandemic to his hometown in Assam, India from Paris. He plans to unite and live with his longtime lover. But, following the pandemic regulations, he had to stay confined in a hotel room for days where he recalls their previous conversations and slowly enters into a delusional phase. The film shows how the power of one's desires dictates one's dreams.

title: Yakasi’s Daughter
overview: 14-year-old school dropout Jariyum and her 17-year fiancé Migam live a traditional life  with their families in a remote, nondescript riverine island somewhere in Upper Assam  where only certainty is uncertainty thanks to perennial natural calamities

title: Step of Hope
overview: Ye Lon leads efforts to preserve the culture, language, and identity of the endangered Tai Phake tribe

title: The Veil
cast: Jatin Khanikar|Rodali Bora|Durgashri Bora
overview: Reshma lives in a small village in a river island of the Brahmaputra. Her father Aminul insists on her early marriage and begetting children rather than going to school. The Mulla Gaonbura lecherously plans to make Reshma his fourth wife. Hafeez, an honest teacher helps Reshma to fulfil her dreams by admitting her in his school. But Mulla Gaonbura spreads a scandal against Hafeez leading to his suicide. A few village youths encourage her and eventually Reshma comes out of the veil of darkness to the light of knowledge

title: Kauri
cast: Aasish Dutta|Fardin Irfan|Mujtahid Hussain
overview: A guy in his late teenage struggling his transition into adulthood. It follows the life of Onirbaan who falls into a phone addiction and serial victim of badluck and later he tries to escape that.

title: Sand Dune and a Lullaby
overview: Long take, dramatic excercise

title: He Used To Bring Me Apples
overview: A deadly epidemic has claimed several lives in a remote village in Assam. The villagers are convinced of foul play. For several years, there have been attempts by the authorities to get the villagers displaced in order to use their lands for setting up factories but they have been  offering a firm resistance, despite industrial wastes from a neighbouring industrial area affecting their fields. They are being led by a woman in her late 50s, Ayesha. Ayesha’s husband joined the insurgency in Assam several years ago and never returned. Despite him being gone for more than 3 decades, Ayesha hopes he’ll return one day. She promised to look after his village people in his absence. Ayesha, herself suffering from the disease, lives in a state where her memories and dreams are as real as her present. It’s as if she’s living different stages of her life simultaneously.

title: Before Spring
cast: Monuj Borkotoky|Ranjita Boruah|Himbarsha Das|Deepjyoti Kakati|Upasana Priyam
overview: Jun (17), whose widowed mother works as a maid, When Monikanta's (60) financial dependence on his much-younger wife causes unhappiness in the family, he crosses the river looking for livelihood, only to discover his wife with another man.

title: Small time Cinema
cast: Kandarpa Nath|Sayamuni Nath|Mohammad Zia|Kubara Hosseni
overview: Small-Time Cinema is a documentary that follows two Youtube filmmaking groups, one living in Balochistan, Pakistan, and one, in Assam, India. The film follows these groups, as they make space for their complex history and cultures, beyond a blanket Indian or Pakistani identity.

title: Last Headhunters of the Nagas
overview: There are few surviving headhunters of their last generation, who used to kill people to collect heads and other body parts, living on the hills of Naga. Their lives have been majorly affected with the arrival of new generation.

title: The Barren Bride
cast: Prodip Borah|Pradipta Hazarika
overview: In rural Assam, India, a girl’s onset of menstruation is celebrated publicly through elaborate rituals symbolising her readiness for childbearing and marriage. But the young Gunati suffers from a disease that obstructs menstruation, placing her in a pitiable, degrading situation. She faces a dilemma, when, despite her condition, a young man proposes marriage. The film poignantly conveys Gunati’s alienation and ostracisation, presenting a woman’s perspective in a strictly patriarchal society.

title: Jaangfaai Joonaak
overview: Jaangfai Joonak literally means from the `shadow of silence`. The film has been showcased in the Indian Panorama Film Festival 2012 and is directed by Sanjib Sabhapandit a national award winning filmmaker of Assam. The film focusses on the theme of lost childhood in a manner so as to juxtapose it to the contemporary society we live in. The regional film is being highly acclaimed already for the manner in which it has been shot extensively in digital format before being converted to the celluloid format. A lot of acclaim surrounds this intelligently shot film.

title: My Son, My Precious
overview: A teacher comes to a village and an old man asks her to tutor his sickly grandson. The teacher becomes curious about the old man and the boy. She finds out from a colleague that the boy's mother had been seduced by a man and died in child birth. Winner of the Golden Montgolfiere at the Three Continents Film Festival.

title: Go On, Rituparna
overview: A short film that follows the journey of Rituparna Neog – known as “Xun” to her mother, and “Piku” or “Ritu” to friends – who has blazed a trail for queer and trans rights, gender justice, and access to free libraries in the state of Assam and throughout India.

title: Bekaar 3
cast: Aasish Dutta|Bhargob Jyoti Bhuyan|Sarangapani Bordoloi|Chiranjib Dutta|Swarangee Kashyap
overview: The final instalment of 'Bekaar Trilogy' from the banner ABEYANCY™.  With continuation to the Bekaar storyline it will provide the story about origin of the trilogy. Original cast & crew are returning to the project and some new cast has been added to the film - COME VISIT SOON

title: The Lyrical Rongdanis
cast: Juleshwari Rabha|Keteki Rabha|Mukul Rabha|Kajoli Rabha|Kamal Rabha
overview: A musical documentary woven around the endangered musical culture of the Rangdani Rabhas from Manikganj, Meghalaya, North East India.

title: The Children of God
overview: Sanam, a young school girl, begins to feel that she is psychologically transformed from a girl to a boy, and starts to cut her hair, wear, walk and behave like a boy. One day, when she reaches her class late, the class teacher humiliated, bullied and abused her in the classroom. Even the class teacher asked her to take off her panty to check her gender. At such a critical moment, she even thinks of committing suicide. The compassionate principal of her school shows her a way out by giving the mobile number of Kuhi, a member of LGBTQ community. Sanam discovers herself in a new world, and finds a space of her own through her encounter with Kuhi.

title: Grajhya.... to embrace
overview: Differing perceptions based on different personalities is absolutely a matter of personal orientation. How one perceives a subject is completely unique and we cannot term the same to be wrong, even though this might not be in conjunction with societal norms. Will it ever be possible to find a way out to address the issues of dispute arising out of ego and regret between a mother who was an actress in the nineties and her painter son in his thirties? How far does one’s acceptability match the other’s?

title: The Caress
overview: A middle aged transman crosses path with an old lover and share a dinner together that heals the resentment between them and frees both of them from regrets.

title: Nine Hills One Valley
cast: Anam Ahum
overview: In this bilingual Manipuri film the desire for ethnic supremacy and emergence of politics of identity had put the people of Manipur to an unceasing violence, amplifying further mistrust and animosity amongst its population. Yet, in the face of distressed memories, hope thrives.

title: Towards Hope
overview: A documentary inspired by the true life experiences of Assamese trans-man Milin Dutt.

title: Papori
overview: Papori (Assamese: পাপৰী) is a 1986 Indian Assamese language feature film directed by Jahnu Barua. The film stars Gopi Desai, Biju Phukan, Sushil Goswami, Chetana Das and Dulal Roy. The film was released in 1986

title: Runumi
cast: Kanaklata Saikia|Neyimuddin Ahmed|Suresh Goswami|Indreshwar Barthakur|Hironmoyee Devi
overview: The film is based on Henrik Ibsen’s play The Warriors at Helgeland.

title: The Golden Wing
overview: Biopic of Pratima Barua Pande

title: Final Destination Bloodlines
cast: Kaitlyn Santa Juana|Teo Briones|Rya Kihlstedt|Richard Harmon|Owen Patrick Joyner
overview: Plagued by a violent recurring nightmare, college student Stefanie heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

title: Lilo & Stitch
cast: Maia Kealoha|Sydney Agudong|Chris Sanders|Zach Galifianakis|Billy Magnussen
overview: The wildly funny and touching story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
cast: Mason Thames|Nico Parker|Gerard Butler|Nick Frost|Gabriel Howell
overview: On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup stands apart, defying centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon. Their unlikely bond reveals the true nature of dragons, challenging the very foundations of Viking society.

title: STRAW
cast: Taraji P. Henson|Sherri Shepherd|Teyana Taylor|Sinbad|Rockmond Dunbar
overview: What will be her last straw? A devastatingly bad day pushes a hardworking single mother to the breaking point — and into a shocking act of desperation.

title: The Amateur
cast: Rami Malek|Holt McCallany|Danny Sapani|Rachel Brosnahan|Michael Stuhlbarg
overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.

title: Predator: Killer of Killers
cast: Lindsay LaVanchy|Louis Ozawa|Rick Gonzalez|Michael Biehn|Doug Cockle
overview: While three of the fiercest warriors in human history—a Viking raider, a ninja in feudal Japan, and a WWII pilot—are killers in their own right, they are merely prey for their new opponent: the ultimate killer of killers.

title: Diablo
cast: Scott Adkins|Marko Zaror|Alanna de la Rosa|Diana Hoyos|Lucho Velasco
overview: Ex-con Kris Chaney seizes the daughter of a Colombian gangster to fulfill a noble promise to the young girl's mother. When her father enlists both the criminal underworld and a psychotic killer to exact his revenge, Kris relies on everything he's ever learned to stay alive and keep his word.

title: The Accountant²
cast: Ben Affleck|Jon Bernthal|Cynthia Addai-Robinson|J.K. Simmons|Allison Robertson
overview: When an old acquaintance is murdered, Wolff is compelled to solve the case. Realizing more extreme measures are necessary, Wolff recruits his estranged and highly lethal brother, Brax, to help. In partnership with Marybeth Medina, they uncover a deadly conspiracy, becoming targets of a ruthless network of killers who will stop at nothing to keep their secrets buried.

title: Deep Cover
cast: Bryce Dallas Howard|Orlando Bloom|Nick Mohammed|Paddy Considine|Sonoya Mizuno
overview: Kat is an improv comedy teacher beginning to question if she’s missed her shot at success. When an undercover cop offers her the role of a lifetime, she recruits two of her students to infiltrate London’s gangland by impersonating dangerous criminals.

title: Sinners
cast: Michael B. Jordan|Hailee Steinfeld|Miles Caton|Jack O'Connell|Wunmi Mosaku
overview: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

title: Life After Fighting
cast: Bren Foster|Cassie Howarth|Luke Ford|Annabelle Stephenson|Anthony Nassif
overview: Retired martial arts world champion Alex Faulkner has settled into a simple life, when the disappearance of two of his students leads to an unthinkable discovery close to home. Just when all hope of finding the children is lost, he locates the imprisoned girls and unsurfaces an international child trafficking operation, which draws him back into the fight of his life against those behind it.

title: Utopia
cast: Moe Dunford|Charlotte Vega|Michael D. Xavier|Daniel Bernhardt|Jason Flemyng
overview: A soldier searching for his missing wife breaks into a high-tech facility, believing she's been caught in a human trafficking ring. But beyond its walls, he finds a surreal, futuristic fantasy park where reality and illusion blur. As he navigates this seductive and dangerous world, a shocking truth pulls him deeper into a deadly game where nothing is as it seems.

title: 28 Years Later
cast: Alfie Williams|Jodie Comer|Aaron Taylor-Johnson|Ralph Fiennes|Edvin Ryding
overview: Twenty-eight years since the rage virus escaped a biological weapons laboratory, now, still in a ruthlessly enforced quarantine, some have found ways to exist amidst the infected. One such group lives on a small island connected to the mainland by a single, heavily-defended causeway. When one member departs on a mission into the dark heart of the mainland, he discovers secrets, wonders, and horrors that have mutated not only the infected but other survivors as well.

title: A Minecraft Movie
cast: Jason Momoa|Jack Black|Sebastian Eugene Hansen|Emma Myers|Danielle Brooks
overview: Four misfits find themselves struggling with ordinary problems when they are suddenly pulled through a mysterious portal into the Overworld: a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To get back home, they'll have to master this world while embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected, expert crafter, Steve.

title: The Twisters
cast: Tiffany|Mark Justice|Kayla Fields|Paul Logan|Curtis Strong
overview: A deadly patchwork of destructive cyclones is on an apocalyptic path of convergence at a populated Midwest city center. There, the twisters will merge into one mega tornado that threatens to obliterate the cities for hundreds of miles around.

title: Distant
cast: Anthony Ramos|Naomi Scott|Kristofer Hivju|Zachary Quinto|Izzy Jones
overview: After crash-landing on an alien planet, an asteroid miner must contend with the challenges of his new surroundings, while making his way across the harsh terrain to the only other survivor – a woman who is trapped in her escape pod.

title: Kayara
cast: Naomi Serrano|Nate Begle|Charles Gonzales
overview: A courageous and athletic teenager, Kayara dreams that she is destined to be the first female to break into the league of Chasquis - the official messengers of the Incan empire. As she learns what it takes to be a Chasqui along with its challenges, she tackles every mission she gets and discovers the ancient stories of her land and her people.

title: Possessions
cast: Clive Standen|Yeardley Smith|Mason Wells|K.C. Clyde|Reynada Robinson
overview: Follows a father who seeks a fresh start with his son after the loss of his wife, and purchased a storage unit facility sight unseen, but secrets buried behind the metal doors become a parent's worst nightmare.

title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
cast: Tom Cruise|Hayley Atwell|Ving Rhames|Simon Pegg|Esai Morales
overview: Ethan Hunt and team continue their search for the terrifying AI known as the Entity — which has infiltrated intelligence networks all over the globe — with the world's governments and a mysterious ghost from Hunt's past on their trail. Joined by new allies and armed with the means to shut the Entity down for good, Hunt is in a race against time to prevent the world as we know it from changing forever.

title: Ballerina
cast: Ana de Armas|Anjelica Huston|Keanu Reeves|Norman Reedus|Lance Reddick
overview: Taking place during the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Eve Macarro begins her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma.

title: A Working Man
cast: Jason Statham|Jason Flemyng|Merab Ninidze|Maximilian Osinski|Cokey Falkow
overview: Levon Cade left behind a decorated military career in the black ops to live a simple life working construction. But when his boss's daughter, who is like family to him, is taken by human traffickers, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

title: Snow White
cast: Danny Bonaduce|Jessica Chancellor|D. C. Douglas|Kim Little|Andrew Fernie
overview: When the Queen’s jealousy turns deadly, Snow White must join forces with gnomes to fight back against her stepmother’s wrath.

title: Snow White
cast: Rachel Zegler|Gal Gadot|Andrew Burnap|Jeremy Swift|Jason Kravits
overview: Following the benevolent King's disappearance, the Evil Queen dominated the once fair land with a cruel streak. Princess Snow White flees the castle when the Queen, in her jealousy over Snow White's inner beauty, tries to kill her. Deep into the dark woods, she stumbles upon seven magical dwarves and a young bandit named Jonathan. Together, they strive to survive the Queen's relentless pursuit and aspire to take back the kingdom.

title: 28 Days Later
cast: Cillian Murphy|Naomie Harris|Brendan Gleeson|Megan Burns|Christopher Eccleston
overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.

title: Echo Valley
cast: Julianne Moore|Sydney Sweeney|Domhnall Gleeson|Kyle MacLachlan|Fiona Shaw
overview: Kate lives a secluded life—until her troubled daughter shows up, frightened and covered in someone else's blood. As Kate unravels the shocking truth, she learns just how far a mother will go to try to save her child.

title: KPop Demon Hunters
cast: Arden Cho|May Hong|Ji-young Yoo|Ahn Hyo-seop|Yunjin Kim
overview: When K-pop superstars Rumi, Mira and Zoey aren't selling out stadiums, they're using their secret powers to protect their fans from supernatural threats.

title: Moana 2
directors: David G. Derrick Jr.|Jason Hand|Dana Ledoux Miller
cast: Auliʻi Cravalho|Dwayne Johnson|Hualālai Chung|Rose Matafeo|David Fane
overview: After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana journeys alongside Maui and a new crew to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she's ever faced.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
cast: Jay Baruchel|Gerard Butler|Craig Ferguson|America Ferrera|Jonah Hill
overview: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father.

title: Thunderbolts*
cast: Florence Pugh|Sebastian Stan|Julia Louis-Dreyfus|Lewis Pullman|David Harbour
overview: After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap, seven disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts.

title: Shadow Force
cast: Kerry Washington|Omar Sy|Jahleel Kamara|Mark Strong|Da'Vine Joy Randolph
overview: Kyrah and Isaac were once the leaders of a multinational special forces group called Shadow Force. They broke the rules by falling in love, and in order to protect their son, they go underground. With a large bounty on their heads, and the vengeful Shadow Force hot on their trail, one family's fight becomes all-out war.

title: Warfare
cast: D'Pharaoh Woon-A-Tai|Will Poulter|Cosmo Jarvis|Kit Connor|Finn Bennett
overview: A platoon of Navy SEALs embarks on a dangerous mission in Ramadi, Iraq, with the chaos and brotherhood of war retold through their memories of the event.

title: Elio
cast: Yonas Kibreab|Zoe Saldaña|Remy Edgerly|Brandon Moon|Brad Garrett
overview: Elio, a space fanatic with an active imagination, finds himself on a cosmic misadventure where he must form new bonds with eccentric alien lifeforms, navigate a crisis of intergalactic proportions and somehow discover who he is truly meant to be.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
cast: Jay Baruchel|Cate Blanchett|Gerard Butler|Craig Ferguson|America Ferrera
overview: Five years have passed since Hiccup and Toothless united the dragons and Vikings of Berk. Now, they spend their time charting unmapped territories. During one of their adventures, the pair discover a secret cave that houses hundreds of wild dragons -- and a mysterious dragon rider. Hiccup and Toothless find themselves at the center of a battle to protect Berk from a power-hungry warrior.

title: Captain America: Brave New World
cast: Anthony Mackie|Harrison Ford|Danny Ramirez|Shira Haas|Tim Blake Nelson
overview: After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.

title: Karate Kid: Legends
cast: Jackie Chan|Ben Wang|Ralph Macchio|Joshua Jackson|Sadie Stanley
overview: After a family tragedy, kung fu prodigy Li Fong is uprooted from his home in Beijing and forced to move to New York City with his mother. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition – but his skills alone aren't enough. Li's kung fu teacher Mr. Han enlists original Karate Kid Daniel LaRusso for help, and Li learns a new way to fight, merging their two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

title: Fear Below
cast: Hermione Corfield|Jake Ryan|Josh McConville|Kevin Dee|Clayton Watson
overview: A rag-tag team of divers attempting to salvage a sunken car from a river are thwarted by a highly aggressive bull shark.

title: Until Dawn
cast: Ella Rubin|Michael Cimino|Odessa A'zion|Ji-young Yoo|Belmont Cameli
overview: One year after her sister Melanie mysteriously disappeared, Clover and her friends head into the remote valley where she vanished in search of answers. Exploring an abandoned visitor center, they find themselves stalked by a masked killer and horrifically murdered one by one...only to wake up and find themselves back at the beginning of the same evening.

title: xXx
cast: Vin Diesel|Asia Argento|Marton Csokas|Samuel L. Jackson|Michael Roof
overview: Xander Cage is your standard adrenaline junkie with no fear and a lousy attitude. When the US Government "recruits" him to go on a mission, he's not exactly thrilled. His mission: to gather information on an organization that may just be planning the destruction of the world, led by the nihilistic Yorgi.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
cast: Jay Baruchel|America Ferrera|F. Murray Abraham|Cate Blanchett|Gerard Butler
overview: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless’ discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup’s reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their kind.

title: Kiff Lore of the Ring Light
cast: Kimiko Glenn|H Michael Croner|Eric Bauza|Vella Lovell|Nic Smal
overview: Kiff and her friends go on an adventure to destroy a ring light of immense power.

title: Kiff Lore of the Ring Light
cast: Kimiko Glenn|H Michael Croner|Eric Bauza|Vella Lovell|Nic Smal
overview: Kiff and her friends go on an adventure to destroy a ring light of immense power.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
cast: Jim Carrey|Ben Schwartz|Keanu Reeves|Idris Elba|Colleen O'Shaughnessey
overview: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.

title: In the Lost Lands
cast: Milla Jovovich|Dave Bautista|Arly Jover|Amara Okereke|Fraser James
overview: A queen sends the powerful and feared sorceress Gray Alys to the ghostly wilderness of the Lost Lands in search of a magical power, where she and her guide, the drifter Boyce, must outwit and outfight both man and demon.

title: Lilo & Stitch
cast: Daveigh Chase|Chris Sanders|Tia Carrere|David Ogden Stiers|Kevin McDonald
overview: As Stitch, a runaway genetic experiment from a faraway planet, wreaks havoc on the Hawaiian Islands, he becomes the mischievous adopted alien "puppy" of an independent little girl named Lilo and learns about loyalty, friendship, and ʻohana, the Hawaiian tradition of family.

title: The Last Stand of Ellen Cole
cast: Lin Shaye|Liz Caribel Sierra|Craig Tate|Ty Olsson|Karan Gill
overview: When an evil contractor goes to extreme measures to evict a testy tenant who is standing in the way of his new project, he fails to take into account that this seemingly harmless old woman is a trained killer and will do anything to protect her beloved home.

title: My Old Ass
cast: Maisy Stella|Aubrey Plaza|Percy Hynes White|Maddie Ziegler|Kerrice Brooks
overview: An 18th birthday mushroom trip brings free-spirited Elliott face-to-face with her wisecracking 39-year-old self. But when Elliott’s "old ass" starts handing out warnings about what her younger self should and shouldn't do, Elliott realizes she has to rethink everything about family, love, and what's becoming a transformative summer.

title: Jurassic World Rebirth
cast: Scarlett Johansson|Jonathan Bailey|Mahershala Ali|Rupert Friend|Manuel Garcia-Rulfo
overview: Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, covert operations expert Zora Bennett is contracted to lead a skilled team on a top-secret mission to secure genetic material from the world's three most massive dinosaurs. When Zora's operation intersects with a civilian family whose boating expedition was capsized, they all find themselves stranded on an island where they come face-to-face with a sinister, shocking discovery that's been hidden from the world for decades.

title: F1 The Movie
cast: Brad Pitt|Damson Idris|Kerry Condon|Javier Bardem|Kim Bodnia
overview: Racing legend Sonny Hayes is coaxed out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team—and mentor a young hotshot driver—while chasing one more chance at glory.

title: Mufasa: The Lion King
cast: Aaron Pierre|Kelvin Harrison, Jr.|Tiffany Boone|Kagiso Lediga|Preston Nyman
overview: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion an expansive journey of a group of misfits searching for their destiny.

title: Baby Blue
cast: Dylan Sprayberry|Lia McHugh|Anthony Turpel|Aramis Knight|Alexia Ioannides
overview: A group of teens stumble across the story of now dead serial killer Baby Blue and decide he'd be the perfect subject of a true crime vodcast. But when they start digging, they quickly discover that his murder spree never stopped. Now they are being targeted from beyond the grave.

title: Materialists
cast: Dakota Johnson|Chris Evans|Pedro Pascal|Zoë Winters|Marin Ireland
overview: A young, ambitious New York City matchmaker finds herself torn between the perfect match and her imperfect ex.

title: The Gorge
cast: Miles Teller|Anya Taylor-Joy|Sigourney Weaver|Ṣọpẹ́ Dìrísù|William Houston
overview: Two highly trained operatives grow close from a distance after being sent to guard opposite sides of a mysterious gorge. When an evil below emerges, they must work together to survive what lies within.

title: Tin Soldier
cast: Scott Eastwood|Jamie Foxx|Robert De Niro|Nora Arnezeder|Joey Bicicchi
overview: An ex-special forces operative seeks revenge against a cult leader who has corrupted his former comrades, the Shinjas. This leader, known as The Bokushi, promises veterans a purpose and protection, but is revealed to be a destructive influence. The ex-soldier, Nash Cavanaugh, joins forces with military operative Emmanuel Ashburn to infiltrate the Bokushi's fortress and expose his reign of terror

title: The Monkey
cast: Theo James|Tatiana Maslany|Christian Convery|Colin O'Brien|Adam Scott
overview: When twin brothers find a mysterious wind-up monkey, a series of outrageous deaths tear their family apart. Twenty-five years later, the monkey begins a new killing spree forcing the estranged brothers to confront the cursed toy.

title: Inside Out 2
cast: Amy Poehler|Maya Hawke|Kensington Tallman|Liza Lapira|Tony Hale
overview: Teenager Riley's mind headquarters is undergoing a sudden demolition to make room for something entirely unexpected: new Emotions! Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust, who’ve long been running a successful operation by all accounts, aren’t sure how to feel when Anxiety shows up. And it looks like she’s not alone.

title: My Massive Cock
cast: Matt Barr|Julia Davis
overview: An extra-large penis is an object of desire for many. But for some men, extra-large seriously complicates their lives and relationships, and penis reduction surgery seems the only answer.

title: Venom: The Last Dance
cast: Tom Hardy|Chiwetel Ejiofor|Juno Temple|Rhys Ifans|Stephen Graham
overview: Eddie and Venom are on the run. Hunted by both of their worlds and with the net closing in, the duo are forced into a devastating decision that will bring the curtains down on Venom and Eddie's last dance.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
cast: Ryan Reynolds|Hugh Jackman|Emma Corrin|Matthew Macfadyen|Dafne Keen
overview: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

title: Interstellar
cast: Matthew McConaughey|Anne Hathaway|Michael Caine|Jessica Chastain|Casey Affleck
overview: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

title: Words of War
cast: Maxine Peake|Ciarán Hinds|Jason Isaacs|Naomi Battrick|Harry Lawtey
overview: This is the TRUE STORY of the world-renowned journalist and human rights activist Anna Politkovskaya went from being a local print journalist to braving the Chechen killing fields and exposing Russian state corruption under Vladimir Putin. She refused to give up reporting on the war in Chechnya despite numerous acts of intimidation and violence, including being poisoned. She was ultimately murdered in the elevator of her block of flats and it remains unclear who paid for the contract killing.

title: The Legend of Ochi
cast: Helena Zengel|Willem Dafoe|Emily Watson|Finn Wolfhard|Razvan Stoica
overview: In a remote village on the island of Carpathia, a shy farm girl named Yuri is raised to fear an elusive animal species known as ochi. But when Yuri discovers a wounded baby ochi has been left behind, she escapes on a quest to bring him home.

title: The Wild Robot
cast: Lupita Nyong'o|Pedro Pascal|Kit Connor|Bill Nighy|Stephanie Hsu
overview: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.

title: The Substance
cast: Demi Moore|Margaret Qualley|Dennis Quaid|Edward Hamilton-Clark|Gore Abrams
overview: A fading celebrity decides to use a black market drug, a cell-replicating substance that temporarily creates a younger, better version of herself.

title: On Swift Horses
cast: Daisy Edgar-Jones|Jacob Elordi|Will Poulter|Diego Calva|Sasha Calle
overview: In the 1950s, a seemingly sensible newlywed and her wayward brother-in-law undertake parallel journeys of risk, romance, and self-discovery.

title: Claudia
cast: Deborah Raffin|Nicholas Ball|John Moulder-Brown|Barbara Jefford|Elizabeth Counsell
overview: Eager to escape her high-society life among the English Elite, a woman falls in love with a young musician. Her husband, however has other plans for her.

title: Superman
cast: David Corenswet|Rachel Brosnahan|Nicholas Hoult|Edi Gathegi|Anthony Carrigan
overview: Superman, a journalist in Metropolis, embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.

title: Despicable Me 4
cast: Steve Carell|Kristen Wiig|Will Ferrell|Sofía Vergara|Miranda Cosgrove
overview: Gru and Lucy and their girls—Margo, Edith and Agnes—welcome a new member to the Gru family, Gru Jr., who is intent on tormenting his dad. Gru also faces a new nemesis in Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina, forcing the family to go on the run.

title: Fear Street: Prom Queen
cast: India Fowler|Suzanna Son|Fina Strazza|Katherine Waterston|Lili Taylor
overview: Who will be voted queen at Shadyside High's 1988 prom? For underdog Lori, competition is cutthroat even before someone starts killing off the candidates.

title: Havoc
cast: Tom Hardy|Jessie Mei Li|Timothy Olyphant|Forest Whitaker|Justin Cornwell
overview: When a drug heist swerves lethally out of control, a jaded cop fights his way through a corrupt city's criminal underworld to save a politician's son.

title: Rosario
cast: Emeraude Toubia|David Dastmalchian|Paul Ben-Victor|Diana Lein|Emilia Faucher
overview: Wall Street stockbroker Rosario Fuentes returns to her grandmother's apartment after her sudden death. While sorting through her belongings, Rosario discovers a hidden chamber that's filled with occult artifacts tied to dark generational rituals. As supernatural occurrences begin to plague her, she must confront her family's buried secrets and face the truth about the sacrifices and choices they made.

title: Novocaine
cast: Jack Quaid|Amber Midthunder|Ray Nicholson|Jacob Batalon|Betty Gabriel
